[TalonEmpire](https://www.fanfiction.net/u/14811437/TalonEmpire)

**Summary:** Shinji Ikari, after getting tired of fighting against his father in his countless lives, finally decided to help him with his scenario - under only one, but an unnegotiable condition.  
简介：经历了无数次与父亲对抗的疲惫后，碇真嗣最终决定在他的计划中助其一臂之力——但有一个不可商榷的条件。

Author's Notes: Hello everyone! This is a fanfiction inspired by Re-Take and Shadowfang6421's Relapse. The idea is new – Shinji decided to help Gendo's scenario since he grew tired of fighting against him in the countless cycles he experienced. How would everything change? The tone will be s bit dark – you know how EVA works.  
作者的话：大家好！这是一篇受《重来》和 Shadowfang6421 的《复发》启发的同人小说。构思新颖——真嗣决定帮助源堂的计划，因为他厌倦了在无数次循环中与他对抗。一切将会如何改变？基调会有点暗——你知道 EVA 的风格。

I do not own Evangelion  
我不拥有《新世纪福音战士》

I'm not a native English speaker so I sincerely hope someone may find this idea interesting and elaborate on it. Just take my idea and off you go.  
我不是英语母语者，所以衷心希望有人会觉得这个想法有趣并加以拓展。尽管拿走我的想法，然后放手去做吧。

### Chapter 1: Prologue: Here We Go Again  

_"As of 01:12:30 PM today, a special state of emergency has been declared for the Kanto and Chubu regions surrounding the Tokai district. All residents must evacuate to their designated shelters immediately. Repeating: As of 01:12:30 PM today, the Kanto and Chubu regions surrounding the Tokai district have been declared to be under a state of emergency. All residents must evacuate to their designated shelters immediately."  
截至今天下午 1 点 12 分 30 秒，已宣布对围绕东海地区的关东和中部地区实施特别紧急状态。所有居民必须立即撤离至指定避难所。重复：截至今天下午 1 点 12 分 30 秒，围绕东海地区的关东和中部地区已被宣布进入紧急状态。所有居民必须立即撤离至指定避难所。_

Shinji looked at the telephone headset in his left hand, letting out a frustrated groan. Last time hadn't been too bad – he got together with Asuka surprisingly early – just after the fight with Sahaquiel. In fact, it was a record for him. Most of the time they would get together after the kiss, sometimes later, sometimes sooner.  
真嗣看着左手中的电话耳机，发出了一声沮丧的呻吟。上次还不算太糟——他意外地很早就和明日香在一起了——就在与萨哈魁尔战斗之后不久。实际上，这对他来说是个纪录。大多数时候，他们会在接吻后才在一起，有时晚些，有时早些。

But that didn't matter for now.  
但眼下这并不重要。

Because all of those different lives he experienced had ended.  
因为所有那些他经历过的不同生活都已经结束了。

Last time it ended with Third Impact – not an uncommon destiny.  
上次以第三次冲击结束——并非罕见的命运。

Shinji gripped the headset with such force that it began to crack. He threw it on the wall; the plastic creation shattered into pieces, falling down to the ground.  
真嗣紧握着耳机，力度之大以至于它开始裂开。他将耳机摔向墙壁；这塑料制品碎裂成片，散落一地。

Just how many times had he been through this?  
他究竟经历了多少次这样的循环？

The first time he thought he was given a second chance – to fix everything. He was ecstatic. He tried everything he could to make things right; he brought Rei out of her shell, he got together with Asuka and helped her through her mental breakdown, he even saved Kaji – but in the end, SEELE still won, and murdered Asuka just as brutal as the first time – but that time, he had to watch.  
第一次他以为自己得到了第二次机会——去修正一切。他欣喜若狂。他竭尽所能去弥补过错；他让丽走出了自己的壳，他与明日香走到一起并帮助她度过精神崩溃，他甚至救了加持——但最终，SEELE 依然获胜，并以同样残忍的方式杀害了明日香——但那一次，他不得不亲眼目睹。

Then he was given another chance. Then another. Then another.  
然后他又得到了一次机会。接着又是一次。再然后又是一次。

Shinji shook the thoughts off – he didn't need brooding now. He needed to get out of here quickly – there were still slim chances of danger being in the middle of the battleground.  
真嗣甩开了这些念头——他现在不需要沉思。他需要尽快离开这里——战场上仍有微小的危险可能。

He learned this lesson from experience.  
他从经验中学到了这个教训。

The ground shook just on time – this time Shinji was already hundreds of meters away from his original spot. The VTOL crashed down to the ground; a fireball engulfed his former spot.  
地面恰到好处地颤动——这一次，真嗣已经远离了原来的位置数百米。垂直起降飞机坠落地面，火球吞噬了他原先所在的地方。

The sound of engine roaring captured his attention. He smiled as a familiar blue RA130 pulled closer and screeched to a halt in front of him. Shinji got sentimental in the first few times and almost had a breakdown every time he saw the familiar Major – Captain for now – but he soon grew out of it after he realized he still had many encounters like this awaiting. "Sorry I'm late! Get in the car!" Shinji smiled and hopped in. Misato Katsuragi slammed the pedal; the car rushed down the empty street thrice the speed limit.  
引擎的轰鸣声吸引了他的注意。一辆熟悉的蓝色 RA130 逐渐靠近，尖锐地刹车停在他面前，他笑了。真嗣在最初几次见到这位熟悉的大尉——现在是上尉——时感到动情，几乎每次都会崩溃，但很快他就意识到还有许多类似的遭遇在等待着他，于是逐渐习惯了。“抱歉我来晚了！上车！”真嗣笑着跳上车。葛城美里猛踩油门；车子以三倍于限速的速度冲下空旷的街道。

Deep down the ground, inside NERV headquarters, Gendo Ikari smirked behind his clasped hands as the generals of JSSDF continued ordering effortless attacks against the Third Angel.  
在地底深处，NERV 总部内，碇源堂双手合十，嘴角露出一丝冷笑，看着日本自卫队的高级将领们继续对第三使徒发起徒劳的攻击。

He didn't know his scenario would face a substantial alternation today.  
他不知道今天自己的剧本会面临重大的改变。

"Misato, don't stop here," Shinji said calmly as they passed a certain part of the highway.  
“美里，别在这里停下，”真嗣平静地说道，他们经过高速公路的某个部分。

"Eh?" Misato blinked, "but… aren't you interested in the battle?" With that being said, she still released the brakes and the car sped up once more.  
“诶？”美里眨了眨眼，“但是……你不是对战斗感兴趣吗？”尽管如此，她还是松开了刹车，车子再次加速。

"I…just want to get as far away from…that thing as possible." His tone was unwavering.  
"我……只想尽可能远离……那东西。" 他的语气坚定不移。

"Sure," Misato frowned, "you don't have a sense of adventure, do you?"  
"当然，" 美里皱眉道，"你就没有一点冒险精神，是吧？"

Just like Shinji had calculated, the world went white as they passed through a tunnel. From the hundreds - perhaps even thousands – of cycles he experienced, one thing he learned to do was to make sure Misato would drive into the tunnel when the N2 mine went off.  
正如真嗣所计算的那样，当他们穿过隧道时，世界变成了一片白色。从他经历的数百次——或许甚至数千次——循环中，他学会了一件事，那就是确保美里会在 N2 地雷爆炸时驶入隧道。

Misato slammed on the brakes – the screech of the tires echoed in the tunnel, magnifying as the sound waves bounced off the walls.  
美里猛踩刹车——轮胎的尖叫声在隧道中回荡，声音波纹在墙壁间反弹，愈发响亮。

"That…was a good idea," Misato let out a sigh of relief; Shinji just smirked in response. She always had the same reaction.  
“那……是个好主意，”美里松了口气；真嗣只是微微一笑作为回应。她总是有同样的反应。

XXXXXX

He had seen the same sight so many times that even the magnificent sight of Geofront wouldn't amaze him anymore. However, Shinji still acted amazed – much to Misato's satisfaction. His thought kept wandering around a specific person as Misato went on about how great NERV was and how it was the savior of mankind.  
他已见过这景象无数次，以至于连地底都市的壮观景象也无法再让他惊叹。然而，真嗣仍装出惊叹的样子——这让美里颇为满意。当美里滔滔不绝地讲述 NERV 的伟大以及它是人类救星时，真嗣的思绪却始终围绕着某个特定的人。

His father. 他的父亲。

Shinji loathed his father – the emotion was accumulated through the countless lives he lived. He was always a manipulative monster – he never hesitated to use the Second Child to blackmail his own son in order to achieve his desired end of the scenario. He tried to fight against him – he really tried. But he could never protect Asuka in the process.  
真嗣憎恨他的父亲——这种情感是在他无数次生命中积累起来的。他总是一个操纵人心的怪物——从不犹豫利用第二适格者来要挟自己的儿子，以达到他想要的剧情结局。他试图反抗他——他真的尝试过。但在过程中，他永远无法保护明日香。

Shinji began to emphasize his father.  
真嗣开始强调他的父亲。

This time, he would do something completely different. Not that he gave up – he simply didn't want to see Asuka get hurt anymore.  
这次，他要做出完全不同的选择。并非他放弃了——只是他再也不想看到明日香再受伤害。

"So this is the Third Child?" Ritsuko Akagi asked, her eyes arrogant, if not condescending.  
“这就是第三适格者吗？”赤木律子问道，眼神中带着傲慢，甚至有些轻蔑。

"Excuse me, ma'am," Shinji huffed, "my name is Shinji Ikari."  
“对不起，女士，”真嗣喘着气说，“我叫碇真嗣。”

"Well, he does resemble a lot of his father."  
“嗯，他确实很像他父亲。”

Shinji couldn't help but chuckle at the remark. The doctor couldn't have been farther from the truth, nor could she have been closer.  
听到这话，真嗣忍不住笑了。医生的话既离真相甚远，又近在咫尺。

Shinji pretended to be surprised as the lights lit up, Unit 01's purple armor shining under the artificial lights.  
灯光亮起时，真嗣假装惊讶，零号机的紫色装甲在人造灯光下闪闪发光。

"You won't find this in the manual." Ritsuko interrupted as Shinji scanned through the manual, "This is Man's ultimate humanoid fighting machine, the first model of the synthetic life form Evangelion, Unit 01. Built here in secret, it is Mankind's last hope."  
"你不会在手册里找到这个。" 赤木律子打断道，当真嗣翻阅手册时，"这是人类终极的人形战斗机器，合成生命体初号机，EVA Unit 01。在这里秘密建造，它是人类的最后希望。"

"Is this part of what my father's been doing?"  
"这是我父亲一直在做的事的一部分吗？"

"Correct. It's been a while." Shinji raised his head, looking directly into his father's cold gaze. His own was just as stern.  
"没错。已经有一段时间了。" 真嗣抬起头，直视着他父亲冷漠的目光。他自己的眼神也同样坚定。

"Father…" Shinji's voice was cold and stern, Commander Ikari raised an eyebrow hearing the voice.  
"父亲……" 真嗣的声音冷酷而严厉，碇司令听到这声音时扬起了一边的眉毛。

"We're moving out." "我们出发。"

"Moving out?! Unit 00's still in cryo-stasis, isn't it?" Misato glanced at Unit 01, "wait a second. You're going to use Unit 01?"  
"出发？！零号机还在冷冻状态，不是吗？" 美里瞥了一眼零号机，"等等。你要用零号机？"

"There's no other way." Ritsuko looked at Shinji, "Shinji Ikari. You will pilot it."  
"没有其他办法了。" 律子看着真嗣，"碇真嗣，你将驾驶它。"

"But even Rei Ayanami took seven months to synchronize with her Eva. It's impossible for him to do it! He just got here!"  
"但即使是绫波零也花了七个月才与她的 Eva 同步。他不可能做到的！他才刚到这里！"

"He just has to sit in the seat. We don't expect-"  
"他只需要坐在座位上。我们并不指望-"

"I'll pilot it," Shinji cut her off. Normally he would fight back a little, but considering this time he didn't intend to hide anything – from his father – he reckoned he could at least prevent Rei from getting hurt. Gendo Ikari narrowed his eyes – Shinji wasn't a little bit like what he was expecting.  
"我来驾驶它，" 真嗣打断了她。通常他会稍作反抗，但考虑到这次他不打算向父亲隐瞒任何事，他觉得至少可以避免让绫波受到伤害。碇源堂眯起了眼睛——真嗣并不完全是他所预料的那样。

Ritsuko and Misato fell silent at his words. "Alright then," Akagi broke the silence first, "follow the instructions."  
律子和美里在他的话后陷入了沉默。"好吧，" 阿卡季首先打破了沉默，"按照指示行动。"

Shinji still had to act startled by the procedures – especially the LCL infusion. "Oh my God, his sync rate is 87.5%, that's incredible!" Ritsuko exclaimed, "he's born for this!"  
真嗣仍然得表现得对这些程序感到惊讶——尤其是 LCL 注入。"哦，天哪，他的同步率是 87.5%，太不可思议了！" 律子惊呼，"他天生就是干这个的！"

Gendo smirked. Things were getting back to normal.  
源渡微微一笑。一切正逐渐恢复正常。

"Father…" Shinji's voice captured his attention, "we need to talk…after the battle."  
"父亲……" 真嗣的声音吸引了他的注意，"战斗结束后，我们需要谈谈。"

_"EVA LAUNCH!" "EVA 出击！"_

XXXXXX

AN: Um, yeah that's the prologue. I left out a lot of unnecessary details – people who watched the TV series should know what they were, and those who haven't shouldn't be reading this. The next chapter may take longer to upload since I'm still wrapping up my other story – You Can (Not) Redo, which is my priority.  
作者注：嗯，这就是序章了。我省略了很多不必要的细节——看过电视剧的人应该知道那些是什么，而没看过的就不应该读这个。下一章可能需要更长时间上传，因为我还在完成我的另一部作品——《你无法重来》，那是我目前的优先事项。

## *Chapter 2*: Chapter 2: Deviance  
*第二章*: 第二章：偏差

Disclaimer: I do not own Evangelion  
免责声明：我不拥有《新世纪福音战士》

**Chapter 2: Deviance 第二章：偏差**

The fight was elegant and clean, just like Asuka said how it should be, and just like how it was in most of his earlier cycles. Shinji overpowered the Third Angel without too much effort; he fought it like actual fighting, _brawling –_ but not _combat_. He easily prevented Toji's sister from getting hurt – that was never troubling for him since his second chance. He couldn't show too much of his extraordinary EVA piloting skills he acquired from his countless lives, yet.  
战斗优雅而干净，正如明日香所说的那样，也正如他在大多数早期循环中所经历的那样。真嗣毫不费力地击败了第三使徒；他像真正的格斗一样与之搏斗——但并非战斗。他轻松地阻止了东治的妹妹受伤——这对他来说从未构成困扰，自他的第二次机会以来便是如此。他还不能展示出他从无数次生命中获得的非凡 EVA 驾驶技能。

"Good job, Shinji-kun," came Misato's voice in the communication channel, "go to retrieve shaft E-17, we'll handle the logistics."  
“干得好，真嗣君，”通讯频道中传来美里小姐的声音，“去回收 E-17 号井，我们会处理后勤。”

The sensation of weightlessness produced by the drop from the surface to the Geofront did little to distract him from his turmoil of thoughts. He had made a decision – a decision he'd never made before. How should he explain it? Would Gendo understand?  
从地面坠入第三新东京市所带来的失重感，并未能让他从纷乱的思绪中分神。他做出了一个决定——一个前所未有的决定。该如何解释呢？碇源堂会理解吗？

Shinji got a change of clothes and stepped out of the changing room. Misato should be taking him to negotiate his living arrangements now – and then he would meet his father in the elevator. That would be his chance.  
真嗣换好衣服，走出了更衣室。美里应该会带他去商讨居住事宜——然后他将在电梯里与父亲见面。那将是他的机会。

"Father…we need to talk," just like he predicted, Gendo Ikari showed up when the elevator door opened. He didn't answer; he was just staring at him with a cold expression. Misato felt a chill ran down her spine. _'I'm taking him in…if possible,'_ she thought.  
“父亲……我们需要谈谈，”正如他所预料的，当电梯门打开时，碇源堂出现了。他没有回答，只是用冷漠的表情盯着他。美里感到一阵寒意窜过脊背。‘我要带他走……如果可能的话，’她心想。

"I don't have time for irrelevant business," Gendo finally replied, his voice devoid of emotions.  
"我没时间处理无关紧要的事," 源渡终于回答道，他的声音毫无情感。

"Trust me…this is relevant," Shinji said calmly, his tone making Gendo narrowed his eyes. "Be quick," he said.  
"相信我…这是相关的," 真嗣平静地说，他的语气让源渡眯起了眼睛。 "快点说，" 他命令道。

"I prefer…your office than here, father," Shinji continued, "it's…safe from outside disturbances."  
"我更喜欢…在您的办公室而不是这里，父亲，" 真嗣继续说，"那里…可以避免外界的干扰。

Gendo narrowed his eyes further – Shinji was absolutely not what he was expecting him to be. In fact, he could be said as a complete antithesis of his expectations. "Follow me, pilot," he ordered, "Captain, go finish your own business."  
源渡眯起眼睛，更深了——真嗣绝对不是他所预期的样子。事实上，他可以说是完全背离了他的预期。“跟我来，驾驶员，”他命令道，“舰长，去忙你自己的事。”

XXXXXX

The office was cold and dark. No matter how many times he'd been here, it still gave him chills. "Speak, pilot," Gendo clasped his hands together, glaring at Shinji with a stern look.  
办公室冷清而昏暗。无论来过多少次，这里依然让他感到寒意。“说吧，驾驶员，”源渡双手合十，严厉地瞪着真嗣。

"I-" Shinji chose his next words carefully. One wrong step, he could be dead the next second. "I want to help you."  
“我——”真嗣小心翼翼地选择下一句。一步走错，下一秒他可能就死了。“我想帮你。”

Gendo Ikari blinked in surprise. He almost forgot what it was like to be surprised. "Help me…for what?" His tone just carried a tinge of curiosity.  
碇源堂惊讶地眨了眨眼。他几乎忘记了惊讶是什么感觉。“帮我…为了什么？”他的语气只是带着一丝好奇。

"Your…scenario," Shinji spoke slowly, "to…meet my mother."  
“你的…计划，”真嗣缓缓地说，“去…见我的母亲。”

In a blink of an eye, Gendo pulled out his pistol and aimed at his son, his hands were slightly shivering. "Who are you?" He demanded, his composure breaking down.  
眨眼之间，碇源堂拔出手枪对准了他的儿子，他的手微微颤抖。“你是谁？”他厉声质问，镇定自若的外表开始崩溃。

"I am Shinji Ikari, the Third Child, the pilot of Unit 01," he answered in calm. Gendo's reaction was expected – he had prepared himself to walk on a fine line. "more importantly…I came from the future."  
"我是碇真嗣，第三适格者，初号机的驾驶员，"他平静地回答。碇源堂的反应在意料之中——他已经准备好走钢丝了。"更重要的是……我来自未来。"

"I do not have time for jokes, _pilot_," Gendo released the gun's safety.  
"我没时间听你开玩笑，驾驶员，"碇源堂解开了手枪的保险。"

"I'm not joking, _father,_" Shinji stood his ground, "I know everything because I've seen them. I've experienced them." He sighed, bad memories resurfacing, "Third Impact…it offered me more than you think."  
"我不是在开玩笑，父亲，"真嗣坚定地站在原地，"我知道一切，因为我亲眼见过。我亲身经历过。"他叹了口气，不好的记忆再次浮现，"第三次冲击……它给予我的比你想象的更多。"

Gendo weighed his options. On one hand, his sanity was telling him this was just some cosmic fluke or a very real dream. On the other hand, his mind was telling him Shinji was telling the truth – there's _no way_ he could ever know about Third Impact, much less his plan to reunite with Yui. Even old men of SEELE didn't know it. On the third hand – it wouldn't hurt to hear more. "Explain yourself," he ordered, not putting the gun down.  
碇源堂权衡着他的选择。一方面，他的理智告诉他这可能只是某种宇宙巧合或是一个非常真实的梦境。另一方面，他的内心却在告诉他真嗣说的是真的——他不可能知道第三次冲击，更不用说他计划与唯重聚的事。就连 SEELE 的老人们也不知情。第三方面——再多听一些也无妨。“解释一下，”他命令道，枪并未放下。

"In short, I was at the center of Third Impact," he started, "and I refused the reality, then somehow I was sent back here," he left out all the details he didn't want his father to know, "I know what you want, father, and I also know how to stop SEELE," he improvised since he really had no idea how to do that – he had never succeeded – that's why he was here at the moment.  
“简而言之，我曾是第三次冲击的中心，”他开始说道，“我拒绝了这个现实，然后不知怎么就被送回了这里，”他省略了所有不想让父亲知道的细节，“我知道你想要什么，父亲，我也知道如何阻止 SEELE，”他即兴发挥，因为他真的不知道该怎么做——他从未成功过——这就是他此刻在这里的原因。

"Why?" Gendo snorted. He wasn't just going to believe everything his son said, but a little insight into his motives would help.  
“为什么？”碇源堂嗤之以鼻。他不会轻易相信儿子所说的一切，但了解一下他的动机会有所帮助。

"Because…let's say we're in the same shoes, father," Shinji kept gazing at the Commander, "you're doing all this for mother…and I…am doing all this for _her_." He took a deep breath, closing his eyes for a moment, then reopened them, returning his gaze.  
"因为…假设我们处境相同，父亲，" 真嗣继续凝视着指挥官，"你做这一切是为了母亲…而我…也是为了她。" 他深吸一口气，闭上眼睛片刻，然后重新睁开，目光再次回到父亲身上。

Gendo chuckled internally. He'd never thought his socially awkward son would ever care about someone else so much – especially a girl. On second thought, this could be a perfect tool to blackmail his son. "What's your offer?" He lowered his gun.  
碇源堂内心轻笑。他从没想过自己这个社交笨拙的儿子会如此关心别人——尤其是个女孩。转念一想，这或许是个完美的工具来要挟他的儿子。"你的提议是什么？" 他放低了枪。

"Simple. I've got intel," Shinji sighed in relief internally, "I know _future_. I know why did you fail. I know how to help you win, in the end," Gendo raised his eyebrows, "however, there's one, and only one condition, that you would _never_ violate," he trailed off, waiting for his father's reply.  
"很简单。我有情报，" 真嗣内心松了口气，"我知道未来。我知道你为何失败。我知道如何帮你最终获胜，" 碇源堂扬起眉毛，"不过，有一个，且仅有一个条件，你绝不能违背，" 他停顿下来，等待父亲的回应。

Gendo pondered for a moment. He had to admit that Shinji's offer was alluring – of what he said was true in the first place, of course. "Prove you're really from the future," he finally decided to ask.  
源堂沉思片刻。他不得不承认，真嗣的提议颇具诱惑力——当然，前提是他所言非虚。“证明你确实来自未来。”他最终决定这样问道。

"What more do I need to do?" Shinji frowned, "I've already said so much that I wasn't supposed to know at all. Do you really need me to list the date of every incoming Angel attack? Do I need to draw every Angel for you?" His frown turned into a smirk, "or…do I need to say Rei Ayanami, the First Child, is a clone of Lilith and my mother?"  
“我还需要做什么？”真嗣皱眉，“我已经透露了那么多本不该知道的信息。你真的需要我列出每一次使徒袭击的日期吗？还是需要我为你画出每一个使徒？”他的皱眉转为一丝讥笑，“或者……我需要说出绫波零，第一适格者，是莉莉丝和我母亲的克隆体？”

"Hm." Gendo's tone was cold as usual, but his heartbeat rate had already doubled, cold sweat forming on his forehead. "What is your condition?"  
“嗯。”源堂的语气一如既往地冷漠，但他的心跳已加速一倍，额头上渗出了冷汗。“你的条件是什么？”

"Don't worry, it's not as ill-willed as you may think," Shinji's smirk still on his face, "I only need to…"  
"别担心，没你想象的那么恶意，" 真嗣的嘴角依然挂着一丝得意的笑，"我只是需要……"

XXXXXX

"Asuka, get up and pack your stuff," Kaji Ryoji clapped his hands, trying to wake up the sleeping redhead. The said girl grudgingly opened her eyes – and shot them open once she recognized the person calling her. "KAJI!" She squealed like a schoolgirl, "it's so nice for you to come and see me!" She recalled Kaji's words, "wait, pack my stuff? Where we going?" Her face lit up as an idea formed in her mind, "ow! I'd love to go on a romantic trip with you, Kaji!"  
"明日香，起来收拾东西，" 加持良治拍了拍手，试图唤醒熟睡的红发少女。少女不情愿地睁开眼睛——随即在认出叫醒她的人后瞪大了双眼。"加持！" 她尖叫起来，像个女学生一样，"你能来看我真是太好了！" 她回想起加持的话，"等等，收拾东西？我们要去哪儿？" 她的脸因一个念头而亮了起来，"哦！我愿意和你一起去浪漫之旅，加持！"

Kaji chuckled nervously. He'd never gotten used to Asuka's crush on him. "No, Asuka. We're going to Japan. Specifically Tokyo-3, where NERV headquarters is."  
加持尴尬地笑了笑。他从未习惯明日香对他的迷恋。"不，明日香。我们要去日本。具体是第三新东京市，NERV 总部所在地。"

Asuka raised her eyebrows, "Tokyo-3? Why?"  
明日香挑了挑眉，“第三新东京市？为什么？”

"The Angels have come, and they need trained pilots and more EVAs. It's a direct order from the Commander."  
“使徒出现了，他们需要训练有素的驾驶员和更多的 EVA。这是司令官的直接命令。”

Asuka practically jumped from the ground, "YESSSSS! I've been waiting for this moment for so long!" She started to perform martial arts, pretending the air was her enemy.  
明日香几乎是从地上跳了起来，“耶！我等这一刻等了好久了！”她开始表演武术，假装空气是她的敌人。

Kaji chuckled at her enthusiasm, "good to see you excited, Asuka. The plane leaves in the afternoon, so quickly pack your stuff. Unit 02 will be transferred through the sea; it should arrive no more than two weeks later."  
加持对她的热情轻声笑道，“很高兴看到你这么兴奋，明日香。飞机下午起飞，所以赶紧收拾你的东西。二号机将通过海路运输；应该不超过两周就能到达。”

"Speaking of the Angels…you said they've come? So I assume they've already fought one?"  
“说到使徒……你说他们来了？那我猜他们已经打过一场了？”

"Yup. In fact, the Third Child completely obliterated it."  
“没错。实际上，第三适格者彻底摧毁了它。”

Asuka frowned, "I bet he just got lucky, being a rookie and all that! New comer's luck! His skills definitely nowhere mine!"  
明日香皱眉道：“我敢打赌他只是运气好，毕竟是个新手嘛！新人的运气！他的技术肯定远不如我！”

"He got a sync rate of 87.5% from his first time in an EVA," Kaji remarked.  
“他第一次驾驶 EVA 就达到了 87.5%的同步率，”加持评论道。

"MEIN GOTT IN HIMMEL!" Asuka cried. She worked so hard to get her own sync rate to the high 60s, and now this Third Child…he just came out of nowhere and ate her sync rate alive?! What a humiliation. "It must be a malfunctioning of the system! No matter what, I'll show him how a real pilot does it!"  
“我的天哪！”明日香惊呼。她费了那么大劲才把自己的同步率提升到 60 多，而这个第三适格者……他突然冒出来，把她的同步率全抢走了？！真是奇耻大辱。“一定是系统出了故障！无论如何，我要让他见识一下真正的飞行员是怎么做的！”

Kaji smirked as Asuka stomped off to her room. His plan of setting up a rival as motivation for the Second Child seemed to start off well.  
加持看着明日香跺脚走向她的房间，嘴角勾起一抹微笑。他设想的通过引入竞争对手来激励二号机驾驶员的计划似乎开局良好。

XXXXXX

Gendo Ikari sat in the empty office alone, musing about the events that transpired today. _"No matter what you do, I want the Second Child out of it. I will help you with your scenario, under only this one condition," said Shinji in a stern voice, "no room for negotiation. Think what you would do for mother, father, then you'll know what I would do for her."_ He let out a sigh. If what he said was true…there's no need to threaten him with the Second Child anymore since he would do it himself. He knew Shinji knew what would happen if he was the one who broke their deal first.  
碇源堂独自坐在空荡荡的办公室里，沉思着今天发生的事情。“无论你做什么，我要二号机驾驶员退出。我会帮你实现你的计划，但只有一个条件，”真嗣用严肃的语气说，“没有商量的余地。想想你为了母亲、父亲会怎么做，你就会明白我为了她会怎么做。”他叹了口气。如果他说的是真的……那么就没有必要再用二号机驾驶员来威胁他了，因为他自己会去做。他知道真嗣明白如果他先违背协议会发生什么。

He still had to make sure - really sure - that Shinji was telling the truth.  
他仍然需要确认——真正确认——真嗣说的是真话。

Gendo smirked behind his clasped hands. With the help from his son - maybe he could finally see Yui again.  
源渡在他紧扣的双手后微微一笑。有了他儿子的帮助——也许他终于能再次见到唯了。

XXXXXX

AN: Later chapters will be much longer. Treat this one as some sort of prologue as well. Now we've finally known Shinji's condition for helping his father – but would he really help him? Or did he have his own plans? How would the early addition of the Second Child into the pilot roster change everything else? Stay tuned! Leave a review!  
作者注：后续章节将会更长。将这一章视为某种序章吧。现在我们终于知道了真嗣帮助他父亲的条件——但他真的会帮他吗？还是说他有自己的计划？第二适格者提前加入驾驶员名单会如何改变其他一切？敬请期待！留下你的评论吧！

## *Chapter 3*: Chapter 3: A Familiar Ceiling  
*第三章*: 第三章：熟悉的天花板

Disclaimer: I do not own Evangelion  
免责声明：我不拥有《新世纪福音战士》

_'this'_ is character's thoughts  
'这'是角色的内心想法

_"this"_ is lines spoken in German  
"这"是用德语说的话

"this" is conversation "这"是对话

**Chapter 3: A Familiar Ceiling  
第三章：熟悉的天花板**

In all of the cycles he experienced, Misato's apartment had always been messy and grubby, full of garbage and empty beer cans. Shinji started cleaning the apartment the moment he got there; when he and Misato were splitting the chores, he intentionally lost most rounds of the rock-paper-scissors.  
在所有经历过的循环中，美里小姐的公寓总是凌乱肮脏，满是垃圾和空啤酒罐。真嗣一到那里就开始打扫；当他和美里分担家务时，他故意在大多数剪刀石头布的回合中输掉。

After all, he was the reason Misato died in his first life – his inaction had led to the death of two women he held the dearest. At least, doing the chores was something he was good at, and it did help soothe his guilt – only by a bit.  
毕竟，他在第一世中是导致美里死亡的原因——他的不作为导致了两位他最珍视的女性丧生。至少，做家务是他擅长的事，这确实有助于缓解他的内疚感——尽管只是微乎其微。

He thought the only way he could redeem himself was through complete avoidance of Third Impact, as well as the extermination of SEELE.  
他认为自己唯一能赎罪的方式就是彻底避免第三次冲击的发生，以及消灭 SEELE。

Shinji lay in the bathtub; the warm and soothing water did little to help alleviate his turmoil of thoughts. He had made a decision, and there's no turning back now. His father was surprisingly cooperative; maybe he saw part of himself in his son – a person who would do anything for his loved ones.  
真嗣躺在浴缸里，温暖舒缓的水流对他的思绪纷扰几乎无济于事。他已经做出了决定，现在没有回头路了。他的父亲出奇地配合；也许他在儿子身上看到了自己的影子——一个为了所爱之人愿意做任何事的人。

_'Like father, like son,'_ Shinji mocked himself. In retrospect, the reason he decided to help his father was simple but compelled. The Angels, unlike what SEELE and NERV had always thought, were never a serious problem – at least in most of his lives.  
“有其父必有其子，”真嗣自嘲道。回想起来，他决定帮助父亲的原因简单却强烈。使徒，与 SEELE 和 NERV 一直以来的认知不同，从未构成真正的威胁——至少在他大多数的人生中是如此。

SEELE was the final boss he had to deal with.  
SEELE 是他必须面对的最终 Boss。

In all of his previous lives, he had been using Unit 01 as a lever, trying to move the world. It never worked – the fact that he was lying here in the bathtub was the proof of that – because the Unit 01-lever wasn't strong enough. During the endgame between NERV and SEELE, Shinji had to fight all the MP EVAs with a damaged and barely-functioning NERV as his support.  
在他所有的前世中，他一直利用初号机作为杠杆，试图改变世界。但这从未奏效——他现在躺在浴缸里这一事实就是证明——因为初号机这个杠杆不够强大。在 NERV 与 SEELE 的最终对决中，真嗣不得不在受损且勉强运作的 NERV 支援下，与所有量产机战斗。

So, what if he chose to stand by his father's side from the very beginning, using his foreknowledge to help NERV become stronger, then maybe, just maybe, in the endgame, they could stand a chance-  
那么，如果他从一开始就选择站在父亲身边，利用他的先知先觉帮助 NERV 变得更强大，也许，只是也许，在最终决战中，他们能有一线生机——

There was still another wrinkle to his plan.  
他的计划中还有一个未解的难题。

His mother. 他的母亲。

In some of his former cycles, he and Asuka stood their ground fighting against the MP EVAs – just as they were about to win, Unit 01 would always awaken and summon the Lance of Longinus, no matter where it was. His mother _wanted_ Third Impact to happen – and he couldn't do anything about it.  
在他之前的某些循环中，他和明日香曾坚守阵地，与 MP EVA 战斗——就在他们即将胜利之际，初号机总会觉醒并召唤朗基努斯之枪，无论它身在何处。他的母亲希望第三次冲击发生——而他对此无能为力。

Shinji's train of thought screeched to a halt as a voice called out to him, "Shinji-kun! Don't spend too much time bathing! We're getting up early tomorrow!"  
真嗣的思绪戛然而止，一个声音向他喊道：“真嗣君！别泡澡太久！我们明天要早起！”

_'Okay, this is new,'_ Shinji frowned, "what for? I'm enjoying myself in here!" He had always been using the time of his first bath in Katsuragi Residence to collect his thoughts and form a plan about his new chance – it never got interrupted before.  
“好吧，这倒是新鲜，”真嗣皱眉道，“为什么？我在这儿正享受呢！”他向来利用在葛城宅邸的第一次沐浴时间整理思绪，规划新机遇——从未被打断过。

"We're going to pick up the Second Child from the airport!" Came Misato's cheerful voice.  
“我们要去机场接二号孩子！”美里欢快的声音传来。

Shinji blinked. This was new as well – they'd always meet each other on _Over the Rainbow,_ a ship that carried so many memories. He started panicking; on one hand, he wasn't sure this flap of wings of a butterfly would cause whether a tornado or a rainbow in their relationship. On the other hand, he had no idea how much an early addition of a pilot and an EVA Unit would change the Angel fights and the scenario.  
真嗣眨了眨眼。这也是新的情况——他们总是在“彩虹之上”号船上见面，那艘船承载了太多回忆。他开始慌乱；一方面，他不确信这只蝴蝶翅膀的扇动会在他们的关系中引发龙卷风还是彩虹。另一方面，他完全不知道提前加入一名驾驶员和 EVA 单位会如何改变天使战斗和整个局面。

He wasn't prepared for this variation, nor had he any idea of how this transpired.  
他没准备好应对这种变化，也不知道这一切是如何发生的。

"Oh," he answered offhandedly, immersed in his own thoughts. On second thought, it wasn't a bad thing; he could spend more time with Asuka – although he had already spent years, if not centuries with her – not to mention the addition of an EVA Unit could help a lot in battles. Ramiel had always been a formidable enemy.  
"哦，"他漫不经心地回答，沉浸在自己的思绪中。转念一想，这也不是件坏事；他可以花更多时间与明日香相处——尽管他已经与她共度了数年，如果不是数百年的话——更不用说增加一台 EVA 单位能在战斗中提供很大帮助。雷米尔一直是个强大的敌人。

"C'mon, show some attitude!" Ah, _Misato's_ voice was always pleasant to hear – not so much for _Captain_ or _Major Katsuragi_. "The Second Child's a girl! She's a real looker, long red hair that shines in the sun, brilliant blue eyes, and her bust…hmmm, you should totally see her in a plug suit," she finished with a teasing remark.  
"快点，展现点态度！"啊，美里小姐的声音总是那么悦耳——对葛城上尉或大佐来说就不那么美妙了。"二号机驾驶员可是个女孩！她真是个美人，长长的红发在阳光下闪耀，明亮的蓝眼睛，还有她的胸围……嗯，你绝对应该看看她穿插入栓服的样子，"她以一句调侃的话结束了这段描述。

_'Oh Misato, I've seen her much more than that,'_ Shinji mentally chuckled, "Alright Misato, if you say so." He stood up from the bathtub and flushed the water.  
'哦，美里，我见她的次数可比你想象的要多得多，'真嗣在心里暗笑，"好吧，美里，既然你这么说。"他从浴缸中站起身，放掉了水。

"Ha you little pervert!" Misato blabbed happily, satisfied that she always had a way to get the male species psyched up.  
“哈，你这个小色鬼！”美里开心地嚷嚷着，满意地觉得自己总有办法让男性兴奋起来。

XXXXXX

The airport was exceedingly crowded; it's expected since the recent Angel Attack was undoubtedly scary, people were fleeing the city. Shinji sighed as he realized another problem of Asuka's early introduction to the pilot roster.  
机场异常拥挤；这可以理解，因为最近的使徒袭击无疑很可怕，人们都在逃离这座城市。真嗣叹了口气，意识到让明日香提前加入驾驶员名单的另一个问题。

Rei Ayanami. 绫波零。

Before, Shinji would try to bring Rei out of her shell before Asuka arrived, so they could have a…less strained relationship. Shinji knew why Asuka hated Rei so much. The indifference of Rei's attitude toward her reminded her of the doll – Asuka told him her darkest memories in his second chance. So all he needed to do was to make Rei more responsive to the outside world – or at least teach her to act like one.  
以往，真嗣总会在明日香到来之前设法让丽走出她的壳，以便他们能有一个……不那么紧张的关系。真嗣明白明日香为何如此憎恨丽。丽对她的冷漠态度让她想起了那个玩偶——明日香曾在他的第二次机会中向他吐露了她最黑暗的记忆。因此，他需要做的就是让丽对外界更加敏感——或者至少教会她表现得像一个正常人。

His plans worked well – in most of his former lives those two became good friends.  
他的计划通常很奏效——在他前几世的大多数时间里，这两个人成了好朋友。

However this time he didn't have the chance. Fortunately – he felt bad about thinking like this – Rei was still in the hospital recovering from the injuries she received from the last harmonic test, so he still got time to brace Asuka for it.  
然而这次他没有机会了。幸运的是——他觉得这样想有些不好——丽仍在医院里从上次谐波测试中受的伤中恢复，所以他还有时间让明日香做好准备。

_'Speak of the devil…'_ Shinji thought in amusement as a familiar voice came to him. "Hullo Misato! How have you been?"  
'说曹操，曹操到……' 真嗣心中暗笑，一个熟悉的声音传入耳中。"嗨，美里！你最近怎么样？"

He prepared himself for the encounter. He straightened up his pilot's uniform – a standard NERV uniform with a breastpin that had 'EVA-01' imprinted on it, an outfit he specifically required from his father. A good, yet impactful first impression was always important.  
他准备好迎接这次会面。他整理了一下自己的驾驶员制服——这是一套标准的 NERV 制服，胸针上印有'EVA-01'字样，这是他特意向父亲要求的。一个好的、有影响力的第一印象总是很重要的。

"Hello, Asuka! Oh my god you've grown a lot since the last time I saw you!"  
“你好，明日香！哦，天哪，自从上次见面以来，你长高了不少！”

"Of course! And my figure filled out as well!" An arrogant voice replied.  
“当然！我的身材也变得更好了！”一个傲慢的声音回答道。

Shinji raised his head and looked in the direction of the voice. There she was – wearing a yellow sundress and the ever-present A-10 clips, accompanied by two Section 2 Agents – but there's no sign of Kaji. Shinji frowned; this might be another significant variance.  
真嗣抬起头，朝声音的方向看去。她就在那里——穿着一件黄色太阳裙，戴着那标志性的 A-10 发夹，身边还有两名第二分部的特工——但并没有看到加持先生的身影。真嗣皱了皱眉；这可能又是一个重大的差异。

真嗣揉了揉脸颊，咧嘴一笑。

"Roter Teufel." "红魔。"

Asuka grumbled something inaudible and shot Shinji a glare before turning to sort out her belongings. Shinji stood there with a turmoil of thoughts in his head. It's not like he didn't think about asking his father to make the arrangement, but he squashed the idea as soon as it came to him. For one, he knew sooner or later they _would_ be living together, so he's not worried about it. For another, he didn't want to actively force Asuka to do something she probably wouldn't want to do; it's not fair for her. Shinji just didn't have the heart to do it.  
明日香咕哝了一句听不清的话，瞪了真嗣一眼，然后转身整理自己的东西。真嗣站在那里，脑海中思绪纷乱。他并非没想过请求父亲安排这一切，但这个念头一冒出来就被他压了下去。一方面，他知道迟早他们会住在一起，所以并不担心。另一方面，他不想主动强迫明日香做她可能不愿意做的事；这对她不公平。真嗣就是不忍心这么做。

He loved her, after all.  
他毕竟爱她。

Still, he was surprised at how far his father was willing to go to…help him? That couldn't be right. His father never _helped_ him; he _manipulated_ him.  
尽管如此，他还是惊讶于父亲愿意走多远来…帮助他？这不可能对。父亲从未帮助过他；他操纵他。

Shinji shook the thoughts off, turning around, and headed to the kitchen. If his father had really issued the order, he might as well accept his good fortune – and make the most out of it.  
真嗣摇摇头，转身走向厨房。如果父亲真的下了命令，他不妨接受这份好运——并充分利用它。

XXXXX

## *Chapter 4*: Chapter 4: A Hedgehog's Dilemma  
*第 4 章*: 第 4 章：刺猬的困境

Disclaimer: I do not own Evangelion  
免责声明：我不拥有《新世纪福音战士》

**Chapter 4: A Hedgehog's Dilemma  
第 4 章：刺猬的困境**

_'Center the target, pull the switch.'  
'瞄准目标，拉动开关。'_

Doctor Ritsuko Akagi, arguably the smartest person in NERV. She was a brilliant scientist, the head of Project E, and the chief consultant of the Evangelion weaponry department. Still, she couldn't help but frown a little as she witnessed the ranged weapon training of the Third Child.  
赤木律子博士，可以说是 NERV 中最聪明的人。她是一位杰出的科学家，E 计划的首席，也是福音战士武器部门的首席顾问。然而，当她目睹第三适格者的远程武器训练时，还是不禁微微皱起了眉头。

Don't get it wrong – he was doing great. In fact, a little bit too good considering his non-existent background knowledge in guns. Although he had some trouble handling the pallet rifle initially, it looked more like he failed intentionally. It looked like…he was acting to be a rookie.  
别误会——他表现得很好。事实上，考虑到他对枪械知识的一无所知，他的表现好得有点过头了。虽然他一开始在操作弹匣步枪时有些困难，但看起来更像是有意为之。他表现得……像是在装作新手。

It was not how fast he was able to familiarize himself with the weapon and the Evangelion weapon system that raised her suspicions. It was the way he handled the weapon that intrigued her – the micro-details, such as how he positioned his finger on the trigger or how he grabbed the rifle butt – those minor habits showed that he was definitely a veteran, not a newcomer.  
让她起疑的并非他迅速熟悉武器和 EVA 武器系统的能力，而是他使用武器的方式——那些微小的细节，比如他如何放置手指在扳机上，或是如何握住枪托——这些细微的习惯表明他绝对是个老手，而非新手。

Ritsuko shook it off, thinking she must've been paranoid. Nothing in his file indicated that he had ever touched a weapon before – he was closely monitored for most of his life. Events as significant as touching rifles would positively be emphasized in bold with an underscore in his files.  
律子摇了摇头，觉得自己可能多虑了。他的档案中没有任何迹象表明他曾接触过武器——他一生中的大部分时间都受到严密监控。像接触步枪这样重要的事件，档案中肯定会用粗体加下划线着重强调。

"C'mon, Third! It's just a rifle! It's kids' stuff! I could do this when I was only seven!" The Second Child's half-annoyed, half-amused voice came into the comm channel, "I can't wait to beat you in a simulator, this way you can know your place!" _'Beneath me,'_ was left unsaid, but everyone could hear it in her haughty tone.  
“来吧，三号！这不过是一把步枪！小孩子玩意儿！我七岁就能做到了！”二号适格者的半恼半笑的声音通过通讯频道传来，“我迫不及待要在模拟器中打败你，这样你就能知道自己的位置了！”‘在我之下’虽未明说，但她傲慢的语气中人人都听得出来。

Shinji chuckled internally since he knew his combat skills would eat hers alive; in most of his former lives, he would require NERV to give him additional training in hand-to-hand combat and martial arts, to the extent that he could subdue a thug twice his size without so much as breathing. He stopped receiving the training several cycles ago since there wasn't really anything left for him to master. He reckoned he could use the time to spend more time with Asuka.  
真嗣暗自发笑，因为他知道自己的战斗技巧会让她望尘莫及；在他大多数的前世中，他需要 NERV 为他提供额外的近战格斗和武术训练，以至于他能够轻松制服一个比自己大两倍的恶棍而不喘一口气。由于没有什么可再精进的了，他早在几个周期前就停止了这些训练。他觉得可以利用这段时间多陪陪明日香。

Shinji pulled the trigger; the simulated Sachiel fell to the ground, raising a cloud of dust and dirt. "Good job, Shinji-kun," came Ritsuko's voice, "now since the Second Child insisted, we're going to connect her to the simulator as well, then you two can have a match." As she finished speaking a red Evangelion suddenly appeared in front of Shinji, its eyes carried an EVA-equivalent predatory gleam.  
真嗣扣动扳机；模拟的萨基尔倒地，扬起一片尘土。“干得好，真嗣君，”传来律子的声音，“既然二号适格者坚持，我们将她连接到模拟器上，这样你们俩就可以对战了。”她话音刚落，一架红色的 EVA 突然出现在真嗣面前，眼中闪烁着 EVA 特有的狩猎光芒。

"C'mon, Third! Let's see what you got!" came Asuka's excited voice, her EVA assumed a defensive posture.  
“来吧，三号！让我看看你的本事！”明日香兴奋的声音传来，她的 EVA 摆出了防御姿态。

Shinji furrowed his brows; Asuka was _never_ defensive, she should be attacking him relentlessly right now. "As-Soryu-san, I'd really like to see how a well-trained pilot like you attack her enemies. Acting defensive against a novice is…dishonorable," He provoked, smirking smugly.  
真嗣皱起眉头；明日香从不防守，她现在应该毫不留情地攻击他。“As-Soryu-san，我真的很想看看像你这样训练有素的飞行员是如何攻击敌人的。对一个新手采取守势是……不光彩的，”他挑衅道，得意地笑了。

Asuka's smirk turned into a frown, her eyes carried a murderous look. "You asked for it, bastard!" She growled, willing her simulated EVA dashing forward to the purple giant. She threw a fake punch to the side of its face, thinking to distract Shinji, then she would deliver a well-calculated uppercut with all her might, hoping to vent all her annoyance and irritation accumulated these days on the boy, who was also the very source of these emotions.  
明日香的微笑变成了皱眉，她的眼中带着杀气。“你自找的，混蛋！”她咆哮着，操控着模拟 EVA 向紫色巨人冲去。她朝它的脸侧虚晃一拳，想分散真嗣的注意力，然后她将全力打出一个精心计算的上勾拳，希望能把这几天积累的所有烦恼和愤怒都发泄在这个男孩身上，他也是这些情绪的源头。

Unfortunately, Shinji had already expected the assault. He sighed internally, _'she always uses the same strategy,'_ he thought with amusement. He paid no attention whatsoever to her fake punch; instead, he raised his arm, blocking her uppercut with ease, and delivered a sweep-kick to her lower leg. Surprised that Shinji somehow read through her mind and retaliated successfully, the moment of distraction made Asuka losing her balance under the powerful kick.  
不幸的是，真嗣已经预料到了这次攻击。他内心叹息，‘她总是用同样的策略，’他带着一丝趣味想道。他对她的虚晃一拳毫不在意；相反，他抬起手臂，轻松挡住了她的上勾拳，并朝她的下盘踢出一记扫堂腿。惊讶于真嗣竟然看穿了她的心思并成功反击，这一瞬间的分神让明日香在强力的一脚下失去了平衡。

The red EVA fell on its back, lying flat on the ground. Asuka yelped as the purple EVA crouched above her, using its weight to prevent her from getting up. She silently cursed, both in the shame that she lost to a rookie and the fear of the incoming pain.  
红色 EVA 仰面倒地，平躺在地上。明日香惊呼一声，只见紫色 EVA 蹲伏在她上方，利用体重阻止她起身。她心中暗骂，既因败给一个新手而感到羞愧，又因即将到来的疼痛而恐惧。

But it never came. 但疼痛却始终未至。

Inside the test plug, Shinji hyperventilated, his eyes went wide as visions flashed before his eyes.  
在测试驾驶舱内，真嗣呼吸急促，双眼圆睁，眼前闪过一幕幕幻象。

_They were on the beach, beside the red sea. The black moon hanged on the sky, a star-ring composed of human souls circled around the earth. Half of a giant white face lay on the horizon, its single eye stared at them blankly.  
他们站在红海边的沙滩上。黑色的月亮悬挂在天空，由人类灵魂组成的星环环绕着地球。地平线上躺着半张巨大的白色面孔，那只独眼空洞地凝视着他们。_

_He sat on the torso of a red-haired girl, she had bandages on her right eye and left arm. He was strangling her, and she caressed his face.  
他坐在一个红发女孩的躯干上，她的右眼和左臂缠着绷带。他正掐着她的脖子，而她抚摸着他的脸。_

Shinji froze in place as the vision struck him; initially Asuka wondered why he didn't continue his attack, but she soon shook it off and decided to utilize this perfect opportunity to counterattack. She kicked him in the groin area forcefully, causing Shinji to groan in pain, and hastily got up on her feet.  
真嗣被这景象惊得僵在原地；起初明日香不明白他为何没有继续攻击，但她很快抛开疑惑，决定利用这个绝佳机会进行反击。她用力踢向他的裆部，让真嗣痛苦地呻吟，随即迅速站起身来。

The purple EVA crouched on the ground like a fetus, unable to get up; Asuka momentarily felt bad about kicking him in the crotch so hard, but the ecstasy brought to her by victory flooded the guilt.  
那台紫色的 EVA 像胎儿一样蜷缩在地上，无法起身；明日香一时对刚才狠狠踢中他下体的举动感到些许内疚，但胜利带来的狂喜很快淹没了这份愧疚。

"Ha, look at you Third, how _pathetic_," she remarked, the extreme pomposity in her voice making several people on the bridge to cringe, "after all, proper combat skill beats brute force!"  
“哈，看看你，第三适格者，多可怜，”她嘲讽道，语气中的极度傲慢让桥上的几个人都皱起了眉头，“毕竟，真正的战斗技巧胜过蛮力！”

_He was lying on the floor.  
他躺在地板上。_

_Pathetic. 可悲。_

_Help me, Asuka! 帮帮我，明日香！_

_No._

The purple EVA jumped to its feet as Asuka continued berating its pilot. She blinked in surprise, her combat reflex kicked in and she immediately assumed a defensive posture. She was expecting him to kick her or punch her, thus it took her brain several seconds to fully register the sensation of pressure around her neck.  
紫色的 EVA 站起身来，而明日香继续责骂着它的驾驶员。她惊讶地眨了眨眼，战斗本能立刻让她摆出了防御姿势。她本以为他会踢她或打她，因此她的脑子花了好几秒钟才完全意识到脖子上的压迫感。

He was strangling her. 他在掐她的脖子。

Asuka wanted to yell, but the phantom sensation was too overwhelming. She wanted to fight back, but he was lifting her into the air, her feet barely touching the ground.  
明日香想大喊，但那种虚幻的感觉太过强烈。她想反击，但他把她举到了空中，她的脚几乎碰不到地面。

"Cut the connection! NOW!" Ritsuko watched the scene in horror as the vitals of both Children were going wild. Maya complied instantly and shut down the simulator.  
“切断连接！现在！”律子惊恐地看着两位驾驶员的生命体征疯狂波动。玛雅立刻照做，关闭了模拟器。

The overwhelming physical feeling was gone in an instant, but the mental effect caused by his actions would forever remain in Asuka's mind. She panted heavily, suppressing a surge of nauseousness, massaging her neck. "Cough! Wha-what's gotten into you, Shinji?" She muttered to herself, still hard to believe he just did what he did. She opened the video feed to Shinji's test plug, wanting to throw several creative curses at him; how dare he _choked_ her, in a _simulated_ fight?!  
"那股强烈的身体感觉瞬间消失，但他行为造成的心理影响将永远留在明日香的心中。她喘着粗气，强压下涌上来的恶心感，揉着脖子。“咳！什、什么鬼，真嗣？”她喃喃自语，仍难以相信他刚刚所做的一切。她打开真嗣测试插入栓的视频反馈，想要对他破口大骂；他怎么敢在模拟战斗中掐她？！”

Asuka started getting scared of him.  
明日香开始害怕他了。

The window popped up, Asuka immediately started, "Fuck you, Third! Are you a fucking man or not?! You degen-" she trailed off as she saw the expression on his face – the blank stares, the trembling of his body visible even through the video feed, and the complete unresponsiveness to the outside world.  
窗口弹出，明日香立刻开始骂道：“去你的，三号！你他妈算不算个男人？！你这个变态——”她话音未落，就看到了他的表情——空洞的眼神，即使在视频反馈中也能看到他身体的颤抖，以及对外界完全无动于衷。

She silently cursed and opened up a comm channel to the bridge, "what the fuck is going on with your jerk pilot?!" She demanded.  
她默默咒骂着，打开通讯频道联系舰桥，“你们那个混蛋飞行员到底在搞什么鬼？！”她质问道。

"Pilot Soryu, condition report," came Ritsuko's slightly worried voice.  
“飞行员 Soryu，状况报告，”Ritsuko 略带担忧的声音传来。

"My throat fucking sours, but otherwise okay," she replied, "answer my question, what's the bastard pilot up to?!"  
“我喉咙难受得要命，但除此之外还好，”她回答，“回答我的问题，那个混账飞行员在搞什么？！”

"Watch your language, pilot," Dr. Akagi said coldly, "that's not how you talk to you supe-"  
"注意你的言辞，驾驶员，" 赤城博士冷冷地说，"这不是你对上级说话的方式-"

"I just got fucking **strangled,** in case you didn't notice, _doctor_," Asuka growled, "I believe I have every fucking right to know what the hell happened!"  
"我刚刚被他妈的勒住了，如果你没注意到的话，医生，" 明日香咆哮道，"我相信我有权知道到底发生了什么鬼事！"

Ritsuko let out a long sigh, "from the readings he had a violent panic attack, severe PTSD even," she replied, "nothing concerning you-"  
律子长叹一口气，"从他的读数来看，他经历了一次剧烈的恐慌发作，严重的创伤后应激障碍，"她回答道，"这与你无关-"

"I FUCKING LIVE WITH HIM, DOCTOR!" Asuka was livid, roaring, "and I'm NOT coming near him, until you figure out how to keep his hands off my _throat!"_  
"我他妈的跟他住一起，医生！" 明日香怒不可遏，咆哮道，"在我知道怎么让他别再掐我脖子之前，我绝不会靠近他！"

Although Ritsuko was extremely annoyed by the redhead's attitude, she had to admit that Asuka had a point – a good point. "Alright Pilot Soryu, we'll demand answers from him after…he wakes up from his…current state."  
尽管律子对这位红发少女的态度极为不悦，但她不得不承认明日香说得有道理——一个很好的观点。"好吧，飞行员索吕，我们会在他……从目前的状态中醒来后，向他追问答案。"

"Which is?" Asuka questioned, her curiosity got into place.  
"什么状态？" 明日香追问道，她的好奇心被勾了起来。

"He's semi-conscious, his bodily functions are working, but he's barely responsive," Ritsuko explained, "we'll get him out of the test plug and bring him to medical wing. He should be lucid enough in a few hours. In the meantime you can do whatever you want." The LCL in her test plug drained and the hatch opened, "you're dismissed, pilot."  
"他处于半清醒状态，身体机能还在运作，但反应极其微弱，" 律子解释道，"我们会把他从测试插槽中移出，送到医疗翼。几个小时后他应该就能清醒了。在此期间，你可以做任何你想做的事。" 她测试插槽中的 LCL 液体排空，舱门打开，"你可以离开了，驾驶员。"

"Whatever." Asuka got out the entry-plug in one swift movement; she couldn't help but frown in confusion.  
"随便吧。" 明日香迅速从插入栓中出来，不禁皱眉，感到困惑。

_'Just what the fuck is going on with the Third Child?'  
'第三适格者到底是怎么回事？'_

XXXXXX

Shinji could start hearing people talking as consciousness slowly returned to him. His eyes focused on the white ceiling above him, only having one thought in his mind.  
随着意识逐渐回归，真嗣开始能听到人们的交谈声。他的眼睛聚焦在头顶的白色天花板上，心中只有一个念头。

_'Ah…The Ceiling…' '啊……天花板……'_

He moaned in displeasure and tried to get up into a sitting position. "Ah, you're awake," came to him Ritsuko's voice, "are you lucid?" She asked.  
他不悦地呻吟着，试图坐起身来。“啊，你醒了，”传来的是律子的声音，“你清醒吗？”她问道。

"Argh…I feel like I had a bad nightmare," he replied, rubbing his forehead, "what happened? How did I end up here?" He asked, carrying a tinge of dread. The answer was probably not something he wanted to hear.  
"哎呀…我感觉像是做了个噩梦，"他揉着额头回答，"发生了什么？我怎么会在这里？"他带着一丝恐惧问道。答案可能不是他想听的。

"In simple terms, you lost your mind in the simulator," Shinji gritted his teeth, Ritsuko continued, "you attacked Pilot Soryu in a…censurable manner."  
"简单来说，你在模拟器里失控了，"真嗣咬牙切齿地说，律子继续道，"你以一种…不可原谅的方式攻击了驾驶员惣流。"

Shinji clenched his fists, having a good guess of what transpired. He must've relived his darkest moments again, potentially triggered by Asuka's behaviors or words. The severe PTSD had happened to him before. Although they were extremely fortuitous, each time he had it had a big impact on the people around him, as well as his own mental state. He always forgot what he did during his…outbursts, but the emotional burden remained.  
真嗣紧握双拳，大致猜到了发生了什么。他一定是再次经历了最黑暗的时刻，可能是被明日香的行为或言语触发的。这种严重的创伤后应激障碍之前也发生过。尽管每次都极为偶然，但每次发作都对他周围的人以及他自己的心理状态产生了重大影响。他总是忘记自己在…发作期间做了什么，但情感负担依然存在。

"What happened to Asuka? Is she okay?" He probed, couldn't help but carry a hint of worry in his voice, not unnoticed by the perceptive doctor.  
"明日香怎么了？她还好吗？" 他探问道，声音中不由自主地带着一丝担忧，这并未逃过那位敏锐医生的察觉。

"Pilot Soryu is…irritated and agitated, but suffered no physical damage," she reassured, "she's…anxious that we demand answers from you."  
"惣流驾驶员目前情绪烦躁且激动，但身体上并无损伤，" 她安慰道，"她……对于我们向你索要答案感到焦虑。"

"Figures…" Shinji sighed. Still, he was happy that no one got hurt – at least physically. "Well…I want to talk to her, privately. Where is she?"  
"意料之中……" 真嗣叹了口气。尽管如此，他还是很高兴没有人受伤——至少在身体上。"那么……我想私下和她谈谈。她在哪儿？"

"I'm afraid that's not going to happen," said Ritsuko, Shinji raised an eyebrow, "she clearly stated that we keep you away from her 'until you figure out how to keep his hands off my throat', that's what she said."  
"恐怕那是不可能的，" 赤木律子说道，真嗣挑了挑眉，"她明确表示要我们让你远离她，直到你'弄清楚如何让他不再掐我脖子'，她是这么说的。"

"Damn it…" Shinji silently cursed, albeit using more colorful language. Now he knew exactly what happened to her. How do you reconcile with someone you tried to strangle?

He looked at Toji first, "look, Suzuhara, Asuka has been training for this for her whole life, and I'm sure she will save your, or everybody on earth's lives one day, if not several times," the redhead's expression softened as she heard the words. Shinji then turned to Asuka, "Asuka, he was just trying to be nice. And I'm _looking forward_ to you saving my life in battle one day, then I _will_ thank you properly."  
"你们两个，停下，" 真嗣强硬地打断道。他太清楚这种争执接下来会演变成什么。他先看向了阿薰，"听着，铃原，明日香为了这一天已经训练了一辈子，我相信她总有一天会救你，或者地球上所有人的命，哪怕不止一次，" 听到这些话，红发少女的表情缓和了下来。真嗣接着转向明日香，"明日香，他只是想表示友好。而我期待着有一天你在战斗中救我一命，到时我会好好感谢你。"

Asuka bit on her lips; why would the almighty Shinji-sama defend her? And why she wanted appreciation, or at least attention from him so badly? A moment later, a confident smirk crept up her face, "just you wait, Third. I _will_ save your sorry ass one day."  
明日香咬着嘴唇；为什么无所不能的真嗣大人会为她辩护？而为什么她如此渴望他的赞赏，或者至少是他的关注？片刻后，她脸上浮现出一丝自信的微笑，"等着瞧吧，第三适格者。总有一天我会救你那可怜的命。"

It was that moment Shinji felt the vibration in his pocket. He took out his phone at the same time Asuka did. The pilots looked at each other – this could only mean one thing. Rei Ayanami approached them, "Second Child, Third Child. We're needed at NERV. Please hurry." She left in swift movements without another word.  
就在那一刻，真嗣感觉到口袋里的震动。他和明日香同时拿出手机。两位驾驶员对视一眼——这只能意味着一件事。绫波零向他们走来，"第二适格者，第三适格者。我们需要前往 NERV。请快点。" 她迅速离开，没有再多说一个字。

Shinji turned to Toji, "listen, whatever you do, don't come out of the shelter," he began walking away while Asuka was already running down the hallway, "If you're so interested in the battle I could even get you tapes, just don't come out of the shelter." Seeing Toji nodded hesitantly, he sprang off as well, hoping his words could get into Kensuke's ears.  
真嗣转向了渡志，“听着，无论发生什么，都不要离开避难所，”他一边说着一边走开，而明日香已经跑向了走廊，“如果你对战斗那么感兴趣，我甚至可以给你录像带，只要别离开避难所。”看到渡志犹豫地点头，他也迅速离开，希望自己的话能传到健介的耳朵里。

XXXXXX

Gendo Ikari's office had always been cold and dark; Shinji shivered a little upon entering, despite that he shouldn't be afraid of the person inside it anymore. Gendo's face hid behind his clasped hands, his eyes concealed by his orange glasses. This way no one could read him through his emotions. "Is there anything noteworthy to report, pilot?" He said, his voice cold, but not without a hint of curiosity.  
碇源堂的办公室总是阴冷而昏暗；真嗣一进去就微微颤抖了一下，尽管他不应该再害怕里面的人了。碇源堂的脸隐藏在他紧握的双手后面，他的眼睛被橙色眼镜遮住。这样，没有人能通过他的情绪读懂他。“有什么值得报告的事情吗，驾驶员？”他说道，声音冰冷，但带着一丝好奇。

"Yes, Commander," Shinji replied. The fourth Angel had always been an easy enemy since his second chance after he learned how to deal with the energy whips effectively, added the lack of distraction from Toji and Kensuke he could deal with the Angel of Morning without so much as a second breath. Asuka, of course, was both jealous and irritated that he got another solo Angel kill. There was one problem, though. "Back then, NERV extracted the S2 engine from the Fourth Angel and installed it on Unit 04. When they tested it, the engine exploded, taking Unit 04, Nevada branch, and thousands of lives along with it. So if you wanna do experiments on it that's fine, just… don't try to activate it. It'll end badly." Shinji had always felt the famous 'survivor's guilt' when he heard the news of Nevada Branch; he wanted to save the people there, but he couldn't do anything before – not if he didn't want to expose himself. This time he could finally do something about it – he could only hope his father would listen to him.  
“是，司令。”真嗣回答道。自从他学会如何有效应对能量鞭笞后，第四使徒便一直是个容易对付的敌人，再加上没有东治和剑介的干扰，他可以轻松应对晨曦使徒，几乎不费吹灰之力。当然，明日香对此既嫉妒又恼火，因为他又独自击败了一个使徒。但有一个问题。“那时，NERV 从第四使徒中提取了 S2 引擎并安装在四号机上。测试时，引擎爆炸，连带四号机、内华达支部以及成千上万的生命一同消失。所以如果你想对它进行实验，没问题，只是……别试图启动它。那会酿成大祸。”每当听到内华达支部的消息，真嗣总会感到那著名的“幸存者愧疚”；他想要拯救那里的人们，但之前他无能为力——除非他不想暴露自己。这次他终于能有所作为了——只希望父亲能听从他的劝告。

Gendo pondered for a moment. There's no way his son could know about NERV's plans on the mostly intact S2 engine; that's another undeniable evidence that his son was…somehow telling the truth. If what he said about the explosion was true as well, then it would be a great help to his scenario – one more working Evangelion was always welcomed. "I see. Is there anything else?"  
源堂沉思片刻。他的儿子不可能知道 NERV 关于基本完好的 S2 引擎的计划；这无疑是另一个不可否认的证据，证明他的儿子……不知怎么地在说实话。如果他关于爆炸的说法也是真的，那么这对他的计划将是一个巨大的帮助——再多一台可运作的 EVA 总是受欢迎的。“我明白了。还有别的吗？”

"Yes," Shinji continued, "tell Kaji Ryoji to transport Adam through air, not sea. There's an Angel in the Pacific Ocean. Or…the scenario could be devastated."  
“是的，”真嗣继续说道，“告诉加持良治通过空运而不是海运运输亚当。太平洋上有一只使徒。否则……计划可能会被摧毁。”

The explosion of _Over the Rainbow_ was something he never wanted to witness ever again.  
《彩虹之上》的爆炸是他再也不想目睹的场景。

"Hm." Gendo blinked as he heard his words, but soon regained his composure as he reminded himself that his son knew much more than he could ever imagine, so he might as well accept the fact. "I see. Anything else?"  
"嗯。" 听到自己的话，碇源堂眨了眨眼，但很快恢复了镇定，他提醒自己，儿子知道的远比他所能想象的要多，所以最好还是接受这个事实。"我明白了。还有别的吗？"

"No, nothing for now, sir."  
"没有了，目前没有，先生。"

"Good. Your information could really help." Gendo remarked, "dismissed."  
"很好。你的信息确实很有帮助。" 碇源堂说道，"解散。"

Shinji nodded and left the office. Minutes passed as Gendo waited for SEELE to start their meeting, a turmoil of thoughts in his mind. _'Should I listen to my son? Does he have his own…plans?'_ He kept his unwavering facial expression as twelve monoliths appeared around him.  
真嗣点点头，离开了办公室。几分钟后，碇源堂等待着 SEELE 开始他们的会议，心中思绪纷乱。'我应该听我儿子的吗？他有自己的……计划吗？'他保持着不变的面部表情，周围出现了十二座巨石碑。

"Ikari, what do you plan to do with the S2 engine of the Fourth Angel?" SEELE 01 started, "it could be useful to Evangelion technology."  
“碇，你打算如何处理第四使徒的 S2 引擎？”SEELE 01 开口问道，“它可能对 EVA 技术有用。”

Gendo mused for a moment before he spoke up, "I'll let Dr. Akagi run some simple test on it, then I shall decide."  
碇源堂沉思片刻后开口道：“我会让赤木博士先进行一些简单的测试，然后再做决定。”

"Fair enough." SEELE 03 remarked, "when will Unit 02 arrive?"  
"说得有理。" SEELE 03 问道，"二号机何时抵达？"

"The fleet is supposed to dock at New Yokosuka three days later. I'll send the Second Child and the Third Child to pick it up at the bay." Gendo replied.  
"舰队预计三天后停靠新横须贺。我会派二号适格者和三号适格者去码头接应。" 碇源堂回答道。"

"I see." SEELE 01 said, "keep the scenario in check, Ikari."  
"明白了。" SEELE 01 说，"控制好局面，碇。"

The monoliths disappeared; Gendo Ikari picked up the secured landline.  
那些巨石碑消失了；碇源堂拿起加密的座机电话。

"Kaji." A voice came from the speaker.  
"加治。" 扬声器中传来一个声音。

"Ikari." Gendo replied, "leave the fleet with the package immediately. I've already granted you the authorization to use any of the aircraft on the carrier. Land at NERV airport."  
"碇。" 源堂回答道，"立即带着包裹离开舰队。我已经授权你使用航母上的任何飞机。在 NERV 机场降落。"

"Roger." Kaji replied through the phone, his voice just carried a hint of disappointment.  
"收到。" 加持通过电话回答，语气中隐约带着一丝失望。

XXXXXX

## *Chapter 5*: Chapter 5: Propinquity  
*第五章*: 第五章：亲近

Disclaimer: I do not own Evangelion  
免责声明：我不拥有《新世纪福音战士》

**Chapter 5: Propinquity 第五章：亲近**

"Baka-Shinji! Where is my lunch?" Asuka barked, slamming her hands on the table, her face leaned threateningly toward the poor boy, whose only fault was not fast enough to take out _two_ bentos from his school bag in _one_ second.  
"笨蛋真嗣！我的午餐呢？" 明日香厉声喝道，双手猛拍在桌子上，脸庞威胁性地逼近那个可怜的男孩，他的唯一过错就是没能在一秒钟内从书包里拿出两个便当。

Her unrestrained volume drew the attention of nearly everyone in the classroom; the class fell silent as people turned heads in their direction, frowning. Someone in the back row murmured a barely audible "Do they live together?"  
她那毫不掩饰的音量几乎吸引了教室里所有人的注意；班级陷入了沉默，人们纷纷转头看向他们，皱起了眉头。后排有人低声嘀咕了一句几乎听不清的“他们住在一起吗？”

"Um," Shinji sweatdropped under the questioning gazes of his classmates, silently cursing that Asuka grew too careless. He took out the bento and handed it to Asuka, who accepted with a huff and turned around to leave.  
“呃，”真嗣在同学们的审视目光下汗颜，暗自咒骂明日香太过大意。他拿出便当递给明日香，后者哼了一声接过，转身离去。

"Wait, Asuka," Shinji called out to the redhead, who looked back at him with a frown. "What is it?" She said annoyedly.  
"等等，明日香，" 真嗣对着那位红发女孩喊道，她回头皱眉看着他。"什么事？" 她不耐烦地说。

"You haven't met Rei properly yet, have you?" He asked. Although it was risky to let her meet Rei so early since he hadn't had a chance to…prepare Rei for the meeting yet, but he figured sooner than later Asuka would encounter Rei by herself – fortunately during yesterday's Angel Attack those two didn't have a chance to talk - and that would end badly. Therefore, he decided to take the initiative; this way he could at least act as a cushion if the meeting went too wrong.  
"你还没正式认识绫波吧？" 他问道。虽然这么早让她见绫波有些冒险，因为他还没来得及……为这次会面准备绫波，但他认为明日香迟早会自己遇到绫波——好在昨天的使徒袭击中她们俩没机会交谈——那将会很糟糕。因此，他决定主动出击；这样一来，他至少可以在会面出问题时充当缓冲。

"Rei? Oh, you mean the First Child?" She put a finger under her chin, "well, might as well introduce myself. I didn't have a chance yesterday." She grabbed Shinji's wrist and dragged him along, eliciting another wave of murmurs around the class.  
"绫波？哦，你是说那个第一适格者？" 她用手指托着下巴，"好吧，那就自我介绍一下。昨天没机会。" 她抓住真嗣的手腕，拉着他一起走，引得班上又是一阵窃窃私语。

The mid-day sun in Japan baked the earth and every creature that dared to come out of their shelters. Most students chose to have their lunches inside the building – a wise choice. Asuka had been complaining non-stop ever since they stepped out. "What a time you chose, Baka!" She poked at his ribs, eliciting a pained yelp from the boy.  
"日本正午的阳光炙烤着大地和每一个敢于走出避难所的生物。大多数学生选择在建筑物内用餐——这是个明智的选择。自从他们走出室外，明日香就一直在不停地抱怨。“你选的这是什么时间啊，笨蛋！”她戳了戳他的肋骨，引得男孩发出痛苦的叫声。”

"There she is," Shinji pointed at a blue-haired girl, who was sitting on a bench reading a book. As Asuka headed off in her direction, Shinji called out, "Asuka," the redhead looked back at him with a quizzical expression, "she's…not talkative, so don't get offended if she ignores you."  
“她在那儿，”真嗣指着一个坐在长椅上读书的蓝发女孩。当明日香朝她走去时，真嗣喊道，“明日香，”红发女孩回头带着疑惑的表情看着他，“她…不太爱说话，所以如果她不理你，别介意。”

"Oh, whatever." Asuka replied half-heartedly, walking closer to the First Child, who showed no sign of noticing people approaching her whatsoever. "Hello, First Child, the Pilot of Evangelion Unit 00, you know, the prototype," said Asuka as her shadow loomed over the blue-haired girl, a smirk on her face. Seeing no reaction from her, Asuka's brows furrowed a little. Still, she decided to play nice for now, recalling Shinji's warning, "I'm Asuka, the pilot of the production model. Let's be friends!"  
“哦，随便吧。”明日香半心半意地回答，走近了这位第一适格者，她完全没有注意到有人接近的迹象。“你好，第一适格者，零号机驾驶员，你知道的，那个原型机，”明日香说着，她的影子笼罩在蓝发女孩身上，脸上带着一丝得意的笑容。看到对方毫无反应，明日香的眉头微微皱起。不过，她决定暂时表现得友好一些，回想起真嗣的警告，“我是明日香，量产机的驾驶员。让我们做朋友吧！”

"Why?" Rei asked in her usual monotone voice.  
“为什么？”丽用她一贯的单调声音问道。

"Because it would be con-" "Ah Ayanami!" Shinji hastily interjected as he realized where this line of conversation would lead to, "because we are all pilots, and we should look after each other in battles! EVA is a bond, right, Asuka?" He winked at the redhead, who was irritated by his rude interruption a moment ago and glaring at him.  
“因为这会……”“啊，绫波！”真嗣急忙打断，意识到这个话题会走向何方，“因为我们都是驾驶员，战斗中应该互相照顾！EVA 是一种纽带，对吧，明日香？”他向红发女孩眨了眨眼，她刚才因他的粗鲁打断而恼火，正瞪着他。

_'EVA is a bond…'_ "I think we can be…friends, Pilot Soryu, Pilot Ikari," Rei finally replied after several seconds of musing. Shinji let out a long sigh of relief while Asuka shot him a curious look. "It looks like you know her well," she probed as they headed to the building, her voice mocking, but Shinji could undoubtedly catch a hint of sharpness.  
“EVA 是一种纽带……”“我想我们可以成为……朋友，索吕号驾驶员，碇号驾驶员，”丽沉思了几秒后终于回答。真嗣长舒了一口气，而明日香则好奇地看了他一眼。“看来你很了解她，”他们走向建筑时，她用嘲讽的语气试探道，但真嗣无疑捕捉到了一丝尖锐。

"What? I think this is my first time I've ever spoken-"  
"什么？我想这是我第一次说话——"

"But you called her Rei, while she calls you Pilot Ikari," Asuka snorted, "the way you said her name came out so naturally."  
"但你叫她丽，她却叫你碇司令，" 明日香嗤之以鼻，"你叫她名字的方式那么自然。"

_'Damn it,'_ Shinji silently cursed at his carelessness, dripping cold sweat, "but you heard her, we weren't even friends!"  
'该死，' 真嗣暗自咒骂自己的粗心，冷汗直流，"但你听到了，我们甚至不是朋友！"

"Hmph, there's something fishy you're not telling me, _Pilot Ikari._ Not that I cared enough to know." Asuka remarked and sped up her pace, leaving a confused Shinji behind.  
"哼，碇司令，你肯定有什么猫腻没告诉我。不过我也没兴趣知道。" 明日香说着加快了脚步，留下一脸困惑的真嗣。

XXXXXX

"YES!" Came Asuka's ecstatic shriek from the living room. Inside his room, Shinji furrowed his brows, "what is it, Misato?" He stuck out his head through the crack of the door and shouted, making sure both of his roommates could hear him, "did Asuka's favorite cartoon started playing or something?"  
"太好了！" 客厅里传来明日香兴奋的尖叫声。在房间里的真嗣皱起眉头，"怎么了，美里？" 他探出头，透过门缝大声问道，确保两位室友都能听到，"是明日香最喜欢的卡通开始播放了吗？"

A flying pillow landed on the 'Shinji's-face' tarmac. "For fuck's sake, THIRD, mind your own damn business, will you? And I don't watch cartoons, only brats like you do!"  
一个飞来的枕头正中'真嗣脸'跑道。"看在老天的份上，第三适格者，管好你自己的事，行吗？我又不是看卡通的小孩，只有你这种小鬼才看！"

Shinji shook his head, "what were you so excited about, anyway?"  
真嗣摇了摇头，“你到底在兴奋什么？”

"Anta Baka? My EVA's gonna arrive tomorrow, of course."  
“笨蛋吗你？我的 EVA 明天就到了，当然兴奋。”

"Oh? What, are we supposed to pick it up?"  
“哦？什么，我们是要去接它吗？”

"Yeah, you two will be coming with me to New Yokosuka bay tomorrow." Misato interjected, "we'll pick up Unit 02 from there."  
“是啊，你们两个明天跟我去新横须贺湾。”美里插话道，“我们会在那里接走 02 号机。”

Shinji raised an eyebrow. They weren't going to pick up Unit 02 from the sea? This was unexpected. How were they going to fight Gaghiel, then? They had always been using more or less the same strategy in his former lives; after all, there weren't many other ways to fight an Angel underwater. He had no idea how to fight it on land – to be honest, he wasn't even sure whether Gaghiel would appear that day. Did this mean the order of the Angels would also change?  
真嗣挑了挑眉。他们不打算从海上接走 02 号机吗？这出乎意料。那么他们将如何对抗加吉尔呢？在他之前的生命中，他们总是或多或少地使用相同的策略；毕竟，水下对抗使徒的方法并不多。他不知道如何在陆地上战斗——老实说，他甚至不确定加吉尔那天是否会出现。这是否意味着使徒的顺序也会改变？

Shinji didn't like the feeling of losing control.  
真嗣不喜欢这种失去控制的感觉。

One absolute power he held over his enemies was information. But incorrect information could only bring unforeseen consequences to him.  
他掌握的绝对权力之一是对敌人的信息优势。但错误的信息只会给他带来无法预见的后果。

The Angel was drawn by Adam in the fleet carried by Kaji; that he was sure of. He silently blessed the fact that he told his father about it. He could only hope commander Ikari listened to him and told Kaji to leave the fleet as soon as possible. If the Angel attacked while there's no pilot there…  
那个使徒是由加持在舰队中绘制的；这一点他确信无疑。他默默庆幸自己告诉了父亲这件事。他只能希望碇司令听从他的建议，并告诉加持尽快离开舰队。如果使徒在无人驾驶的情况下发动攻击……

The fact that he was still alive in this world was his only reassurance.  
他仍活在这个世界上，这是他唯一的安慰。

XXXXXX

"Sir, the sonar of destroyer Atago picked up a large submerged object 30 nautical miles northern the fleet, sir."  
"长官，驱逐舰爱宕的声纳在舰队北面 30 海里处探测到一个大型水下物体，长官。"

"Is it moving?" "它在移动吗？"

"The extension line of its current path shows it's heading toward the New Yokosuka Bay, sir."  
"根据其当前路径的延伸线显示，它正朝向新横须贺湾方向前进，长官。"

"Speed?" “速度？”

"15 knots, sir." “15 节，长官。”

The commander of the Pacific Fleet frowned. Ryoji Kaji had left the fleet yesterday by a transport helicopter; he should be on land right now. Could the underwater object be an enemy? If it was, could it be after Unit- the _toy_ that required the entire Pacific Fleet as convey? Surely no one on earth would dare to challenge such the most powerful fleet in the world, right?  
太平洋舰队司令皱起了眉头。碇源堂昨天已经乘运输直升机离开了舰队；他现在应该在陆地上。水下物体会是敌人吗？如果是，它会是冲着 Unit——那个需要整个太平洋舰队护送的玩具而来的吗？地球上 surely no one would dare to challenge the most powerful fleet in the world, right?

"Keep an eye on it, report any anomalies."  
“留意一下，有任何异常立即报告。”

Kaji stretched his back, lying comfortably in the bed. He had thought hotels near the seaports were all subpar in quality, but his experience proved him wrong. Maybe he got NERV's special treatment; he didn't know, he also didn't care.  
加持伸了个懒腰，舒适地躺在床上。他原以为港口附近的酒店质量都不怎么样，但这次经历证明他错了。或许是 NERV 给了他特殊待遇；他不清楚，也不在乎。

He rolled over and looked at the suitcase lying on the floor beside his bed. There was a much more critical thing that needed his constant attention.

He hoped the helicopter could bring him straight to NERV headquarters, but the fuel reserve of vehicles was the problem humanity never solved. Commander's order was to let him leave the sea as soon as possible; now that he was on land, so everything would fine, right?

Tomorrow, he would see Misato again. A reunion he had been looking forward to for years. He smiled himself to sleep.  
明天，他就能再次见到美里了。这是他多年来一直期盼的重逢。他微笑着进入了梦乡。

The Pacific Fleet was indeed a magnificent sight, even more so when Shinji beheld it up close, contrary to what he saw on the helicopter. 太平洋舰队确实壮观，尤其是当真嗣近距离看到它时，与在直升机上所见截然不同。数十艘护卫舰、驱逐舰、巡洋舰、战列舰、运输船和航空母舰挤满了新横须贺的军港，尽管这里专为停靠大型军舰而设计。

Without the ecstatic cries from Kensuke and immature flirt attempts at Misato from Toji, the trip felt...dull. What's worse, Asuka being Asuka, was not really talking to him; even stranger, she kept stealing glances at him when she thought he wasn't looking. Shinji sighed internally; why this girl had to be so stubborn? If she just asked-

_Shinji, why don't you do anything?! Hold me, kiss me, kill me! Do something!

真嗣忍不住笑了起来，这些相同的词句他已经听过无数次了。

明日香眯起眼睛，用一种杀气腾腾的眼神瞪着他，“有什么遗言吗？！”

Unit 02 stood on the flight deck of _Over the Rainbow,_ having attached to the umbilical cable; thankfully, they didn't need to jump from ship to ship this time. Although Asuka never disappointed him in playing battleship hopscotch, he couldn't help but worry every time they did it. It was a life-or-death situation, after all.  
02 号机站在彩虹之上的飞行甲板上，已经连接上了脐带电缆；谢天谢地，这次他们不需要从一艘船跳到另一艘船了。尽管明日香在玩跳船游戏时从未让他失望，但他每次都忍不住担心。毕竟，这是生死攸关的情况。

"I've got visuals on the target," Asuka declared as she saw the Angel began to surface, exposing its upper half to them. It looked something along the lines of a twisted fusion of a whale and a manta-ray, only bigger. Once it was within close proximity of the ship, it shot out of the water and leaped to them. Just as Shinji thought it would slam on the flight deck, the air around the Angel simmered as it activated its AT-Field, lifting its immense body up as the Angel continued flying forward.  
“我已经看到目标了，”明日香宣布道，她看到使徒开始浮出水面，向他们暴露出上半身。它看起来像是鲸鱼和蝠鲼的扭曲融合体，只是更大。当它靠近船只时，它从水中射出并向他们跃来。正当真嗣以为它会撞上飞行甲板时，使徒周围的空气开始沸腾，它激活了 AT 力场，将其庞大的身躯抬起，使徒继续向前飞行。

_'Of course Angels could do that,'_ Shinji quickly regained his composure from his state of shock, "wait, where is it going?" His eyes traced Angel's path; at the end of the extension line he saw a large helipad, where a greenish transport chopper had just taken off.  
“当然天使可以做到那样，”真嗣迅速从震惊状态中恢复镇定，“等等，它要去哪儿？”他的目光追随着天使的轨迹；在延伸线的尽头，他看到了一个巨大的停机坪，那里一架绿褐色的运输直升机刚刚起飞。

His eyes widened in fear as realization struck him. Of course the Angel was looking for Adam. Why should it care about fighting the EVAs?  
他的眼睛因恐惧而睁大，当意识到真相时。当然，天使是在寻找亚当。它为何要在意与 EVA 的战斗呢？

The Angel kept floating toward the helipad; its larger-than-the-aircraft-carrier body loomed over EVA Unit 02 and New Yokosuka Bay beneath it. Asuka willed her EVA running after the big fish, trying to come up with a way to kill it. The helicopter pilot watched in dread as a gigantic fish-like creature flew toward him, hiding his face behind his raised arm in a futile attempt to block the inevitable.  
天使继续向停机坪飘去；它那比航空母舰还要庞大的身躯笼罩在 EVA 二号机和新横须贺湾之上。明日香操控着她的 EVA 追赶着这条大鱼，试图想出一个杀死它的方法。直升机驾驶员惊恐地看着一个巨大的鱼形生物向他飞来，绝望地举起手臂试图遮挡即将到来的命运。

Shinji's mind was on overdrive. He never thought Gaghiel could fight anywhere other than underwater. As the Angel came closer to its target, he closed his eyes. What's the worst could happen? Another reset?  
真嗣的思绪飞速运转。他从没想到加吉尔能在水下以外的地方战斗。当使徒逐渐逼近目标时，他闭上了眼睛。最坏的情况会是什么？再来一次重置吗？

_'But she will die again, and this time because of you,'_ his mind argued. Shinji clenched his fist, his knuckles became white. He would never let her die because of his own inaction ever again. He already promised to himself after the first cycle.  
“但她会再次死去，而这次是因为你，”他的内心争辩道。真嗣紧握拳头，指节变得苍白。他绝不会再因为自己的不作为而让她死去。在第一次循环后，他就已经对自己许下了承诺。

Suddenly an idea struck him, "Asuka, expand your AT-Field!" Shinji shouted, "we need to neutralize the Angel's AT-Field!"  
突然，一个念头闪过他的脑海，“明日香，扩展你的 AT 力场！”真嗣大喊，“我们需要中和使徒的 AT 力场！”

Asuka was also confused by the Angel's behavior. She complied with his request reflexively since she didn't really have a plan. Unit 02's AT-Field expanded, the ground shook as it collided with Gaghiel's. The Angel of fish fell to the ground as its already-under-heavy-stress AT-Field collapsed, its long mouth slammed on the tarmac from where Kaji's helicopter just took off.  
明日香也对使徒的行为感到困惑。她下意识地遵从了他的请求，因为她并没有真正的计划。二号机的 AT 力场扩展，地面在它与 Gaghiel 的碰撞中震动。鱼形使徒倒在地上，其本已承受重压的 AT 力场崩溃，长嘴猛地砸在柏油路上，正是 Kaji 的直升机刚刚起飞的地方。

"Phew that was fucking close," the pilot cursed, pulling up the plane. Kaji let out a sigh he didn't know he was holding as they went farther and farther from the Angel.  
“呼，真他妈的险。”飞行员咒骂着拉起飞机。Kaji 长出了一口气，他甚至没意识到自己一直屏着呼吸，随着他们离使徒越来越远。

The Angel of fish lay on the ground, unable to move an inch. "That was not half bad an idea, coming from a rookie like you, Baka-Shinji," Asuka smirked triumphantly as she willed her EVA coming close to the immobilized Angel, pulling out her progressive knife. Gaghiel simply lay there like a fat fish on a chopping block, placing itself at the redhead's mercy.  
鱼形使徒躺在地上，动弹不得。“这主意还不赖，对你这样的新手来说，笨蛋真嗣，”明日香得意地笑着，操控她的 EVA 靠近无法动弹的使徒，拔出高振动粒子刀。Gaghiel 就像砧板上的大鱼一样躺在那里，任由红发少女摆布。

XXXXXX

Kaji stood in Gendo's office, the black case that held Adam on his desk. "Well, my goodness, that was a rather eventful trip, wasn't it? Your son and Pilot Soryu really saved the world there. Was it caused by this I wonder?" He opened the case on the desk, revealing Adam. "It's restored itself this far, even though it's frozen and suspended, it's still alive. It's actually quite amazing really. So, I'm guessing this is the key to the Human Instrumentality Project?"  
加持站在碇源堂的办公室里，那个装着亚当的黑箱子放在他的桌上。“哎呀，那次旅行真是惊心动魄，不是吗？你的儿子和驾驶员惣流真是拯救了世界。我想，这难道是由此引起的吗？”他打开桌上的箱子，露出亚当。“尽管被冻结并处于休眠状态，它已经恢复到这种程度，依然活着。这真的很了不起。那么，我猜这就是人类补完计划的关键？”

"Correct." Gendo agreed, pushing up his glasses. _'And I have my son's help…although his ultimate purpose isn't to help me.'_ "This is the first human… this is Adam." _'Thankfully, I listened to him…if the Angel attacks on the sea…'_  
"“正确。”碇源堂同意道，推了推眼镜。‘而且我有我儿子的帮助……尽管他最终的目的并非助我一臂之力。’“这是第一个人类……这是亚当。”‘幸好我听了他的……如果使徒在海上发起攻击……’”

Kaji bowed a little and left the office, leaving Gendo Ikari - the most dangerous silent schemer on earth - alone with his turmoil of thoughts.  
加持微微鞠躬，离开了办公室，留下碇源堂——地球上最危险的沉默策划者——独自陷入思绪的纷扰之中。

XXXXXX
