## *Chapter 6*: Chapter 6: Checks and Balances  
*第六章*：第六章：制衡之道

Disclaimer: I do not own Evangelion  
免责声明：我不拥有《新世纪福音战士》

**Chapter 6: Checks and Balances  
第六章：制衡之道**

The EVA cages were usually quiet when there were no Angel Attacks nor harmonic tests, added that few people dared to raise their volume there, dreading the chastise that's named Commander Ikari.  
在没有使徒袭击或谐波测试的情况下，EVA 笼通常是安静的，再加上很少有人敢在那里提高音量，唯恐招致碇司令的训斥。

Today became a divergence from the routine as the silence was broken by the excited shriek coming from a certain redhead.  
今天，这种常规被打破了，因为某个红发女孩的兴奋尖叫声打破了寂静。

"YES!" Asuka exclaimed as the gigantic laser printer finished drawing the last stroke of the killmark. A lifelike 1:300 Gaghiel paint now sat on the upper right torso of Unit 02, much to Asuka's satisfaction. A killmark. Of an Angel. On her Unit 02, not on Unit 01 – her rival EVA Unit, piloted by the invincible Shinji-sama, not to mention it already had two killmarks painted on it. She literally got aroused whenever she set her eyes on the masterpiece.  
“太棒了！”明日香欢呼道，巨大的激光打印机完成了击杀标记的最后一笔。一个栩栩如生的 1:300 加吉尔涂装现在位于 02 号机右上躯干，这让明日香非常满意。一个击杀标记。一个使徒的标记。在她的 02 号机上，而不是在 01 号机——她的竞争对手 EVA 上，由无敌的碇真嗣驾驶，更不用说它已经画有两个击杀标记了。每当她看到这件杰作时，她都会感到兴奋不已。

"Asuka, I made my own contribution as well, don't forget," Shinji reminded, smirking.  
“明日香，我也做出了自己的贡献，别忘了，”真嗣提醒道，嘴角带着一丝微笑。

In fact, NERV was planning on splitting the credit, but since it was 'EVA Unit 02' which killed it, and the killmark went on the EVA, not – say, plugsuits of the pilots who killed it – their final decision was to have it printed on Unit 02 only.  
事实上，NERV 原本计划平分功劳，但由于是‘EVA 02 号机’击杀了它，而且击杀标记是画在 EVA 上，而不是——比如说，画在击杀了它的驾驶员的插入栓服上——他们最终决定只在 02 号机上打印这个标记。

"What, you were just there to disturb me with your perverted thoughts! Who knew what went on in your dirty brain that time!" Asuka retorted, her cheeks heating up at the embarrassing memory. After she dealt the fatal blow to the Angel's core, the explosion sent her EVA flying away and landed hard on a nearby hill. The collision threw Shinji off the seat since he didn't have a harness, and his face ended up sitting conveniently between her breasts.  
"什么，你当时只是在那里用你的变态想法打扰我！谁知道你那肮脏的脑子里当时在想些什么！" 明日香反驳道，想到那尴尬的记忆，她的脸颊开始发热。在她对使徒的核心造成致命一击后，爆炸将她的 EVA 炸飞，重重地摔在附近的小山上。撞击使得真嗣因为没有安全带而从座位上摔了下来，结果他的脸正好落在了她的胸部之间。

Shinji sighed mentally at the memory. A minor concussion and bruising weren't really worth it.  
真嗣在心里叹了口气，回忆起那段经历。轻微的脑震荡和擦伤真的不值得。

"If you weren't there to distract me, I would've killed it much faster!" Asuka continued to boast; Shinji interjected, "to your credit, Asuka, you performed well in combat, you didn't disappoint me with your piloting skills, but," he paused for a second, adjusting his composure under her glare that dared him to say the rest, "I was the one who came up with the plan. You really think you could've beaten the Angel all by yourself, Asuka? We work as a team. If we were late by one second…Kaji-san, your boyfriend, as you said, could've been killed."  
"如果你不在那里分散我的注意力，我本可以更快地干掉它！" 明日香继续自夸；真嗣插话道，"值得称赞的是，明日香，你在战斗中表现出色，你的驾驶技术没有让我失望，但是，" 他在她的瞪视下停顿了一下，那眼神似乎在挑战他继续说下去，"是我提出了那个计划。你真的认为你能独自打败使徒吗，明日香？我们是作为一个团队工作的。如果我们晚了一秒……正如你所说的，你的男朋友加持先生可能就已经死了。"

Asuka's fist clenched tightly as she decided between 'kill him now' and 'give him credit.' Seconds later she let out a long sigh, "you're lucky I don't feel like killing people today, Third Child," her voice not as cold as she intended it to be. She knew perfectly well that Kaji indeed was mere inches from seeing the God, and she would never forgive herself if that happened.  
明日香紧握拳头，在“现在就杀了他”和“给他点面子”之间抉择。几秒钟后，她长叹一声，“算你今天走运，我不太想杀人，第三适格者，”她的声音并没有如她所愿那般冰冷。她非常清楚，加持确实只差几英寸就能见到神，如果真的发生了，她永远无法原谅自己。

"So? Team?" Shinji probed.  
“那么？团队怎么样？”真嗣试探性地问道。

"Don't push your luck," Asuka hissed, turning to leave.  
“别得寸进尺，”明日香低声呵斥，转身离开。

Shinji sighed. Fortunately, he had his own ways to cheer up the moody Second Child.  
真嗣叹了口气。幸运的是，他有自己的办法来哄这位情绪多变的二号适格者开心。

XXXXXX

Asuka was assaulted by the _heavenly_ aroma of one of her favorite German dishes as she stepped into the apartment. She frowned in confusion before sniffing the air several more times, which confirmed her suspicion.  
明日香一踏进公寓，就被一股她最爱的德国菜的诱人香气所包围。她困惑地皱起眉头，又多次嗅了嗅空气，这证实了她的猜想。

Someone was making _Käsespätzle_. Only her mother had made it for her.  
有人在做奶酪蛋面。只有她母亲曾为她做过这道菜。

Her puzzlement only grew with every step she took as she marched to the living room. Who could be cooking? Definitely not Misato, not that she would eat it if it really was her. Could it be takeout? She squashed that thought since all of the nearby restaurants didn't so much as make European food, let alone German ones.  
她每走一步，困惑便加深一分，当她走向客厅时。谁会在做饭呢？肯定不是美里，就算真是她做的，她也不会吃。会是外卖吗？她否定了这个想法，因为附近的所有餐馆连欧洲菜都不怎么做，更别提德国菜了。

Could it be Shinji? 会是真嗣吗？

As absurd as it sounded, that's the most probable one among all.  
尽管听起来荒谬，但这在所有可能性中是最有可能的一个。

But why would he do that? He was her competition, not so much as…a friend. She would call him a working partner at most. She bet he regarded her the same. Even though he almost cooked every meal for the whole house, he never tried making German cuisine before.  
但他为何要这么做？他是她的竞争对手，谈不上是……朋友。她最多称他为工作伙伴。她敢打赌，他也是这么看她的。尽管他几乎为整个屋子的人做饭，却从未尝试过做德国菜。

Still, her eyes couldn't lie. Shinji, in a pink-blue apron, was standing in front of the stove. Beside him, a plate full of _Käsespätzle_ was sitting on the kitchen cupboard.  
然而，她的眼睛不会说谎。真嗣穿着粉蓝色围裙，站在炉子前。他旁边，一盘满满的奶酪蛋面放在厨柜上。

"Smells…mediocre, but considering it's your first try I'll give it a pass," Asuka remarked.  
“闻起来……一般般，但考虑到这是你第一次尝试，我就勉强通过吧，”明日香评论道。

"Oh my my, Shinji's secret plan to defuse the bomb actually worked," said Misato as she gulped down a can of beer, "I mean, what else could girls want? Keep it up, and she'll be falling into your arms in no time."  
“哎呀呀，真嗣的秘密计划居然成功拆弹了，”美里一边喝着啤酒一边说道，“我是说，女孩们还能要求什么呢？继续保持，她很快就会投入你的怀抱了。”

Asuka wanted to retort since she found the idea ridiculous; he made it clear that he thought being her…boyfriend would be pitiful, right? On second thought, she regarded this as a perfect opportunity to pay him back. "Oh, I know no boy could reject my beauty. Sadly he'll never succeed, I've already met a real man, while he's just a little boy."  
明日香本想反驳，因为她觉得这个想法很荒谬；他明明已经表明了，他认为做她的……男朋友会很可怜，对吧？但转念一想，她认为这是个绝佳的报复机会。“哦，我知道没有男孩能拒绝我的美貌。可惜他永远不会成功，我已经遇到了一个真正的男人，而他只是个小男孩。”

"Says the little girl who lost in the sync test again." Shinji shot back.  
“说这话的小女孩又在同步测试中输了。”真嗣回击道。

"I will destroy you in the next sync test! Just you wait!" Asuka crushed the empty cola can in her hand.  
"下次同步测试中我会彻底打败你！等着瞧吧！" 明日香捏扁了手中的空可乐罐。

Shinji smiled internally. After all the time he spent with the fiery redhead, he had already mastered how to use her pride to motivate her to try harder while not hurting her too much. From the almost 7 percent increase in her sync rate in today's test, he knew his plan was working just as expected.  
真嗣内心微微一笑。毕竟与这位火爆的红发少女相处了这么久，他早已掌握了如何利用她的骄傲来激励她更加努力，同时又不至于伤害到她。从今天测试中她同步率近 7%的提升来看，他知道自己的计划正如预期般奏效。

Shinji came to the dining table and put down three plates of _Käsespätzle_ before turning to the bathroom.  
真嗣走到餐桌前，放下三盘奶酪面疙瘩，然后转向浴室。

"Asuka, are you alright?" Misato asked in a sincere voice, "you look…down."  
"明日香，你还好吗？" 美里用真诚的语气问道，"你看起来……情绪低落。"

"Can't imagine why is, can you?" Asuka muttered, "obviously it's because of that baka."  
"想不出为什么，你能吗？" 明日香嘀咕道，"显然是因为那个笨蛋。"

"Oh?" Misato winked, "having a crush on him?"  
"哦？" 美里眨了眨眼，"对他有意思吗？"

To her surprise, Asuka didn't even try to act defensively, "it's not that…he just," she paused for a moment, "he gets under my skin so easily. Every insult I throw at him, he has a way to throw it back at me, or dodge it completely. What's worse, he won't even leave me alone."  
令她惊讶的是，明日香甚至没有试图采取防御姿态，“不是那样的……他只是，”她顿了一下，“他轻易就能激怒我。我对他说的每一句侮辱，他都有办法回敬给我，或是完全避开。更糟糕的是，他甚至不让我一个人待着。”

"Sounds like he took a liking to you."  
“听起来他对你有好感。”

"Don't make me laugh," Asuka snorted.  
“别逗我笑了，”明日香嗤之以鼻。

"You don't know what's inside a man's heart," Misato said and walked over to her purse, pulling something out of it, "well, you'll need this to get in tomorrow." Misato handed her a new ID card. "Your new ID card, it finally came today."  
"你不知道一个人心里藏着什么，" 美里说道，走向她的手提包，从中取出某物，"嗯，明天你需要这个才能进来。" 美里递给她一张新的身份证。"你的新身份证，今天终于到了。"

Asuka took the card and saw her picture on the front. "Oh look, a shitty picture of me! What the HELL is this lighting?! I look like a fucking ghost!"  
明日香接过卡片，看到正面有自己的照片。"哦，看，我这张糟糕的照片！这他妈是什么光线？！我看起来像个鬼一样！"

"You still look cute, just relax." Misato sighed, "So, always have that with you, Asuka, otherwise you can't get into Geofront." She smirked, "also, could you do me a favor, Asuka?" She asked with a promising look, one which indicated nothing good would come next.  
"你看起来还是很可爱，放松点。" 美里叹了口气，"所以，要一直带着它，明日香，否则你进不了地底都市。" 她微微一笑，"另外，你能帮我个忙吗，明日香？" 她带着一种预示不祥的神情问道。

"Why would I?" "我为什么要这么做？"

"Can you take this other card to Rei?" Misato handed over a mostly identical card for Rei, ignoring her impoliteness, "Hers is expired, and I forgot to give it to her when we saw her. Can you drop it off to her tomorrow? She lives in the southern section of town, from when this place was still called Hakone, and not Tokyo– 3. Don't worry, I'll have Section-2 watch over closely."  
"你能把这个给丽送去吗？" 美里递给明日香一张与丽几乎相同的卡片，无视她的无礼，"她的过期了，我们上次见她时我忘了给她。你明天能送过去吗？她住在镇南边，那时候这里还叫箱根，不是东京-3。别担心，我会让第二课密切监视的。"

"Me?" Asuka asked as she stared at the picture of Rei on the card. "There's no way-"  
"我？" 明日香看着卡片上丽的照片问道，"不可能——"

"Ah Misato, I can do it," Shinji said as he came out of the bathroom.  
"啊，美里，我能做到的。" 真嗣从浴室出来时说道。

"Awww," Misato grinned smugly, "Shinji's going to her home. Alone. Asuka you need to work fast, or Rei's gonna steal him!"  
"哎呀呀，" 美里得意地笑着，"真嗣要去她家了。一个人。明日香，你得抓紧了，不然丽就要把他抢走了！"

"As if I care!" Asuka barked.  
"谁在乎啊！" 明日香厉声说道。

"Misato…" Shinji sighed as he took Rei's ID card, "just let the kid be."  
"美里…" 真嗣叹了口气，接过绫波的身份证，"就让那孩子去吧。"

Asuka shot him a death glare before digging in the food. After all, the German dish was too good to waste.  
明日香瞪了他一眼，然后继续享用美食。毕竟，这道德国菜太美味了，不能浪费。

XXXXXX

_'I really should talk with my father about it…'_ Shinji sighed internally as he approached the familiar demolition zone. He was in the old section of town, and everything looked run down. The concrete facades were cracked and weathered, several buildings in the area were half deconstructed, the road heavily worn and cracked with weeds coming up between the cracks. The plants along the row of buildings were heavily overgrown; the lines painted on the road were faded.  
'我真的应该和父亲谈谈这件事…' 真嗣内心叹息着，走向那片熟悉的拆迁区。他身处旧城区，一切看起来都破败不堪。混凝土外墙裂痕累累，饱经风霜，几栋建筑半毁，道路严重磨损且裂缝纵横，裂缝间长满了野草。沿街的植物茂密得过分；路面上画的线条也已褪色。

The entire area looked abandoned.  
整个区域看起来荒废已久。

Shinji stood in front of apartment 402 and swallowed. The door of the condo was scuffed, and the paint was starting to peel. He didn't even bother knocking; he had learned that he would never get an answer. He carefully pushed the door open and walked inside, slipping off his shoes in the entryway.  
真嗣站在 402 号公寓前，咽了咽口水。公寓的门上有刮痕，油漆也开始剥落。他甚至懒得敲门；他知道永远不会有人应答。他小心翼翼地推开门，走了进去，在入口处脱下鞋子。

The room was filthy with garbage strewn around like it didn't matter. The light in her room was broken, her bed and pillow had dried bloodstains, and was covered in what looked like clean clothes. There was a mini-fridge in her room, with a half dozen medication on top of it. In the corner, a cardboard box filled with bloody bandages sat in the shadows.  
房间里满是垃圾，散落一地，仿佛无所谓。她房间的灯坏了，床和枕头上有着干涸的血迹，上面还盖着看似干净的衣服。房间里有一个迷你冰箱，上面放着半打药物。角落里，一个装满血迹斑斑绷带的纸箱藏在阴影中。

Shinji walked to the far-end corner of the room, facing the wall, and waited. Moments later he could hear the noise of bathroom door opening behind him; he started, "Ayanami?"  
真嗣走向房间的尽头，面对着墙角等待。片刻后，他听到身后浴室门打开的声音；他一惊，“绫波？”

"Yes, Pilot Ikari?" Came a monotoned reply.  
“是的，碇司令？”传来一个单调的回答。

"Put some clothes on first, please," Shinji said as he kept staring at the wall.  
“请先穿上衣服，”真嗣说着，继续盯着墙壁。

"Why? I'm only in my natural state," came the same cold voice. "Do you not wish to see me in my natural form?"  
"为什么？我只是处于我的自然状态，" 那个冷冰冰的声音再次响起。"你不想看看我的自然形态吗？"

"Not exactly, but yeah," Shinji sweatdropped. Maybe he should have waited outside her room for her to get ready first.  
"不完全是，但也可以这么说，" 真嗣汗颜。也许他应该先在外面等她准备好。

Shinji turned around after the rustling sound of wearing clothes subsided. Ayanami wore her usual school uniform, walking toward the door, completely ignoring the presence of another person in her room.  
真嗣在衣物摩擦声停止后转过身来。绫波穿着她平常的校服，走向门口，完全无视了房间里还有另一个人。

"Ayanami!" Shinji called out, Rei stopped and turned around, "yes, Pilot Ikari?"  
"绫波!" 真嗣喊道，绫波停下脚步转过身来，"是的，碇司令？"

"You can call me Shinji, I call you Ayanami, right?"  
"你可以叫我真嗣，我叫你绫波，对吧？"

"That's…agreeable, Shinji-kun."  
"那样……可以的，真嗣君。"

"Also," Shinji took out Rei's new ID card, "you need this to get into Geofront."  
"还有，" 真嗣拿出绫波的新身份证，"你需要这个才能进入地底都市。"

Rei took the card without another word; just as she was about to turn around and leave, Shinji called her again, "Ayanami, we're friends, right? Do you know what friends are for?"  
绫波接过卡片，一言不发；正当她准备转身离开时，真嗣再次叫住她，"绫波，我们是朋友，对吧？你知道朋友是用来做什么的吗？"

"A friend is a person who you know well and who you like a lot, but who is usually not a member of your family, nor engaging in sexual activities with you." Rei replied instantly, "am I correct?"  
"朋友是一个你非常了解且喜欢的人，但他通常既不是你的家人，也不与你发生性关系。" 绫波立刻回答道，"我说的对吗？"

"Right, but there's more to that," Shinji let out a breath, "for us pilots, we need to watch out for each other in combat. We fight together, and we keep each other safe."  
“对，但这只是其中一部分，”真嗣呼出一口气，“作为驾驶员，我们在战斗中需要互相照应。我们并肩作战，保护彼此的安全。”

"Your proposition is…acceptable," Rei answered after a moment of musing, "I will protect my friends in battles."  
“你的提议……可以接受，”绫波沉思片刻后回答，“我会在战斗中保护我的朋友。”

Shinji sighed in relief as Rei exited the room. It was easier than he expected since he didn't have time to appropriately interact with Rei this time; he was preoccupied with the unexpected early arrival of the redhead. Still, the result was constructive, to say the least. This way he wouldn't be worried about Ramiel fight anymore, right?  
看着绫波离开房间，真嗣松了口气。这比他预想的要简单，毕竟这次他没有足够的时间与绫波好好交流；他正忙于应对红发少女的意外提前到来。不过，至少结果是积极的。这样一来，他就不必再为对抗雷米尔的战斗担心了，对吧？

Shinji felt a chill ran down his spine as he stepped inside Commander Ikari's office. He was never a fan of taking tourist trips here, but he didn't have any other options. He needed a safe and private place to plan and negotiate with his father, after all. And no other place on earth was more suitable than here.  
真嗣走进碇司令的办公室时，感到一股寒意沿着脊背直下。他从来不喜欢来这里‘观光’，但别无选择。毕竟，他需要一个安全私密的地方与父亲策划和谈判。而地球上没有比这里更合适的地方了。

"Pilot, anything important?" A cold and stern voice echoed in the room.  
“驾驶员，有什么重要的事吗？”一个冷酷而严厉的声音在房间里回荡。

"Yes, father," Shinji replied, "first, I want a change of Ayanami's accommodation."  
“是的，父亲，”真嗣回答，“首先，我希望更换绫波的住处。”

"Denied," Gendo said instantly, "that's outside of our deal."  
"拒绝," 源渡立刻说道，"这超出了我们的协议。"

"But she lives in a literal garbage dump," Shinji raised his volume, "at least treat her like a human!"  
"但她住在垃圾堆里啊，" 真嗣提高了音量，"至少把她当人对待！"

"Her accommodation is more suitable than necessary," Gendo continued, "I have my own reasons, and I'm sure you know which, to keep her living there."  
"她的住处比必要的还要合适，" 源渡继续说，"我有自己的理由，而且我相信你知道是哪些，让她住在那里。"

Shinji pondered for a moment. His father, as insightful, smart, and sensitive as he was, saw right through him as if he was transparent. He indeed knew why Gendo kept Rei living in a remote wasteland - to avoid her from gaining more personalities and emotions that might introduce unnecessary risks to the scenario.  
真嗣沉思片刻。他的父亲，如同洞察秋毫、聪慧且敏感，一眼就看穿了他，仿佛他是透明的一般。他确实知道源堂为何让绫波住在偏远的荒地上——为了避免她获得更多人格和情感，这些可能会给计划带来不必要的风险。

Deprogramming Gendo Ikari's little robot had always been one of his most urgent tasks in all of his earlier cycles since he knew Rei was a crucial part of the success of Ikari's scenario. However, in this life, his father knew about his status from the very beginning, which insinuated he would definitely watch closely about the interactions between him and Rei, given Gendo's untrusting persona.  
重新编程碇源堂的小机器人一直是他在所有早期循环中最紧迫的任务之一，因为他知道绫波是碇计划成功的关键部分。然而，在这一世，他的父亲从一开始就知道他的状态，这暗示着鉴于碇的不信任性格，他肯定会密切关注他与绫波之间的互动。

Shinji silently swore, feeling sorry toward Rei since he suspected he couldn't do much about her emotionless state this time. But he could only apologize to himself.  
真嗣默默发誓，对绫波感到抱歉，因为他怀疑这次自己无法为她无情感的状态做些什么。但他只能向自己道歉。

Afer all, he owed to Asuka, but not Rei.  
毕竟，他欠明日香，但不欠绫波。

"But the buildings there were about to collapse!" Still, he tried, "and it did, before!"  
“但那里的建筑快要倒塌了！”他仍试图辩解，“之前也确实倒塌过！”

"If she dies, she can be replaced," Gendo's voice lowered the temperature of the room by a fraction of a degree, "you should be perfectly aware of that."  
“如果她死了，可以被替换，”碇源堂的声音让房间的温度下降了几分，“你应该非常清楚这一点。”

"Father," Shinji matched his father's, "yes, I know about her nature, which means I also know she's the closest of a family to me other than you in this world, to you as well. Do you really not care about her well-being at all? I'm not even asking for the impossible, just...get her out of the shithole. Wherever is okay."  
"父亲，" 真嗣语气与父亲相仿，"是的，我了解她的本质，这意味着我也知道她是这个世界上除了你之外最亲近我的家人，对你也是如此。你真的完全不在乎她的安危吗？我甚至不是在要求不可能的事，只是……让她离开那个鬼地方。任何地方都行。"

Gendo pondered. The image of Rei emerged in his mind - then it overlapped with Yui. His heart fluttered. "I see. I'll get her new accommodation inside Geofront. The position is irrelevant to you. No more room for negotiations." Seeing Shinji nodded with an understanding and appreciative smile, he continued, "is there anything else?"  
碇源堂沉思着。丽的形象在他脑海中浮现——然后与唯重叠。他的心微微颤动。"我明白了。我会给她在 Geofront 安排新的住处。位置与你无关。没有更多谈判的余地。"看到真嗣点头，带着理解和感激的微笑，他继续问道，"还有其他事吗？"

"Yes. The next Angel...is coming. It's powerful. I don't want people to get hurt, especially Asuka. And I know how to defeat it, so I need your cooperation."  
"是的。下一个使徒……即将来袭。它很强大。我不希望有人受伤，尤其是明日香。而且我知道如何击败它，所以我需要你的配合。"

"I'm listening," Gendo perked up his ears.  
"我在听着呢，" 源渡竖起了耳朵。

The monitor flashed bright light as the self-propelled particle cannon exploded, making several people on the bridge gasp at the destructive power exhibited by the looked-innocuous blue octahedron. Misato silently blessed the fact that the Commander demanded to test out the Angel's capabilities before engaging it with an EVA, which now looked to be a brilliant choice.  
监视器上闪烁着耀眼的光芒，自走粒子炮爆炸的瞬间，让桥上的几个人因那看似无害的蓝色八面体所展现的破坏力而倒吸一口凉气。美里默默庆幸指挥官要求在用 EVA 对付使徒之前先测试其能力，现在看来这是一个明智的决定。

Shinji gripped the controls of his EVA tightly as a clearly annoyed voice came through the comm channel, "oh c'mon, why are we still not being deployed yet?"  
真嗣紧紧握住 EVA 的操纵杆，通讯频道中传来一个明显不耐烦的声音："哦，拜托，我们为什么还不能出动？"

"Be patient, Asuka, in case you haven't noticed the Angel just vaporized half of a hill with a single shot," Shinji shook his head, trying to shake off unhelpful imaginary scenes, where his favorite girl was there being shot at.  
“耐心点，明日香，你可能没注意到，那个使徒刚刚一击就蒸发了半个山头，”真嗣摇了摇头，试图摆脱那些无益的幻想场景，在那里，他最喜欢的女孩正被枪击。

"Hmph, I bet you just don't want me to take the ki-wait the Angel did WHAT?"  
“哼，我打赌你只是不想让我拿走那个——等等，使徒做了什么？”

Shinji chuckled and turned off the video feed.  
真嗣轻笑一声，关闭了视频源。

"Okay we need to think," Misato said after she came down from her state of shock, "Tactical analysis."  
"好吧，我们需要思考，" 美里从震惊中回过神来说道，"战术分析。"

"After an analysis using dummies and live weapons, the Angel is surmised to take out any perceived threat within a 7,500m radius."  
"通过使用假人和实弹武器进行分析，推测使徒会在 7,500 米半径内消灭任何感知到的威胁。"

"So, close quarters combat is off the table then." Misato concluded, spinning the pen, "what is MAGI suggesting?"  
"那么，近战格斗就不考虑了。" 美里总结道，旋转着笔，"MAGI 有什么建议？"

"MAGI suggested we self-destruct NERV HQ, Captain."  
"MAGI 建议我们自行销毁 NERV 总部，舰长。"

"Captain, we do have a time limit for response. Its drill is currently working through the second armor plate now. With a bore of 17.5m it could theoretically drop its AT-Field long enough, or collapse to a small enough form to slip down here and destroy us."  
"舰长，我们的响应时间有限。它的钻头目前正在穿透第二层装甲板。直径 17.5 米的钻头理论上可以暂时降低 AT 力场，或者缩小到足够小的形态潜入这里摧毁我们。"

"We only have 24 of the 25 armor belts installed, and at its current rate of penetration gives us only 11 hours 17 minutes until it breaks through. According to the MAGI, at 6 minutes 54 seconds past midnight, the Angel will have broken through our defenses."  
"我们只安装了 25 层装甲带中的 24 层，按照目前的穿透速度，我们只剩下 11 小时 17 分钟就会突破。根据 MAGI 的计算，在午夜过后 6 分钟 54 秒，使徒将突破我们的防线。"

"We have two working Evangelions, Unit 01 and Unit 02. Unit 00 hasn't been calibrated for combat yet."  
"我们有两台可用的 EVA，零壹号机和零贰号机。零零号机尚未完成战斗校准。"

"Things aren't looking great for us are they? And we can't let it get down here, otherwise we'd be at its mercy." Misato massaged her temple, "what options do we even have to fight?"  
"情况对我们不太有利，是吧？而且我们不能让它降落到地面，否则我们就只能任其摆布了。" 美里揉着太阳穴，"我们还有什么办法可以对抗呢？"

"Well, we always have the option to send up a white flag, Captain." Hyuga half laughed.  
"嗯，我们总可以升起白旗投降，舰长。" 日向半开玩笑地说道。"

"Hell no." Misato said. "I don't believe in a no-win scenario."  
"绝对不行。" 美里说，"我不相信有什么必输的局面。"

"Misato, this isn't a simulation you can cheat," Ritsuko said with amusement. "And you're no James T. Kirk. We don't really have many options."  
"美里，这不是你能作弊的模拟训练，" 律子带着几分戏谑地说，"你也不是詹姆斯·T·柯克。我们真的没有太多选择。"

"Well, we can't attack it up close or at range." Misato slammed her hand down hard on the table, "How about at extreme range? Let's snipe the fucker!"  
"好吧，我们不能近距离攻击，也不能远距离攻击。" 美里重重地拍了一下桌子，"那极远距离呢？我们远程狙击那家伙！"

"With what exactly?" “具体用什么？”

"Erm, let me think-" “呃，让我想想——”

"I believe a high-powered, external source, Positron Beam Rifle that the JSSDF is working on should suffice, Captain," a stony voice drew the attention of everyone on the bridge. Following the sound, they saw Commander Ikari looking down at them with a stern look.  
“我认为，日本自卫队正在研发的高能外部电源阳电子炮应该足够了，舰长，”一个冷硬的声音吸引了舰桥上所有人的注意。顺着声音望去，他们看到碇司令正俯视着他们，神情严肃。

"Commander…but we'll need the power of entire Japan to pierce its AT-Field!" Ritsuko exclaimed, "How do we plan on getting the power necessary?"  
“指挥官……但我们需借助整个日本的电力才能穿透它的 AT 力场！”律子惊呼，“我们如何获取所需的能量？”

"We'll have a national-wide blackout and shunt all the power to the rifle, we can set up transformers temporarily to transfer the power to the best position to snipe it from, just outside its weapons range."  
“我们将实施全国范围的停电，并将所有电力转移到狙击枪上，可以临时搭建变压器，将电力传输到最佳狙击位置，就在其武器射程之外。”

"But-" "但——"

"It's an order, follow it." Commander cut her off with a voice that left no room for negotiation.  
“这是命令，执行吧。”指挥官以不容商榷的语气打断了她。

"…so that's the plan. Any questions?" Misato looked at the Children with an inscrutable expression; the plan sounded insane, but she somehow liked it. Seeing both the Second and Third Children shook their heads, she continued, "good. One of you will take the shot-"  
“…所以这就是计划。有什么问题吗？”美里用一种难以捉摸的表情看着孩子们；这个计划听起来疯狂，但她不知为何却喜欢它。看到二号和三号适格者都摇了摇头，她继续说道，“很好。你们中的一个将执行射击——”

"Pick me pick me!" Asuka raised her hand, jumping. It should be easy – aim and kill. Handling a sniper rifle in an EVA was a subject she had been strictly trained on; she had the confidence to take the point.  
“选我选我！”明日香举起手，跳了起来。这应该很简单——瞄准并击杀。在 EVA 中使用狙击步枪是她经过严格训练的科目；她有信心担任这个任务。

"I'll do it," Shinji stated, his voice firm. After all, he had shot and killed the Angel countless times, to the extent he could kill it with one shot, not needing so much as Ayanami's protection. He didn't know how good Asuka was at shooting rifles, but he was sure he could do it impeccably.  
“我来吧，”真嗣坚定地说道。毕竟，他已经无数次射击并杀死了使徒，甚至可以一击必杀，不需要绫波的保护。他不知道明日香狙击步枪的水平如何，但他确信自己能完美完成任务。

"No you're not! This kill is mine, Third!" Asuka frowned, "I'm the one with more training on rifles!"  
"不，你不是！这个击杀是我的，三号！" 明日香皱眉，"我在步枪训练上比你多得多！"

"Shinji, Asuka's right. She had a lot more training on the subject than you." Asuka smirked superciliously as she heard Misato's words.  
"真嗣，明日香说得对。她在这一领域的训练比你多得多。" 明日香听到美里的话后，得意地扬起了嘴角。

"But-" "但——"

"It's alright Shinji, she can handle it," Misato reassured, "you have your own job, though. We've jury-rigged a shield from the bottom of one of the United Nations Space Administration's Explorer Class Shuttles. It's 10 cm of titanium-tungsten alloy, covered in heat-resistant carbon-carbon tiles, and has been coated five times with an ultra-dense electromagnetic dissipating coating. It can withstand the enemy's attack for an estimated 15 to 17 seconds."  
"没关系，真嗣，她能应付得来，" 美里安慰道，"不过你有你自己的任务。我们从联合国太空管理局的一艘探索级穿梭机底部临时改装了一块盾牌。它由 10 厘米厚的钛钨合金制成，覆盖着耐热碳碳瓦片，并涂了五层超密集电磁散逸涂层。预计能抵挡敌人的攻击 15 到 17 秒。"

"So I'm on defense?" Shinji asked in dismay – but worrying internally.  
"所以我是防守方？" 真嗣沮丧地问道——内心却感到担忧。

"Essentially." "基本上是。"

"Ha, getting defense from the invincible Shinji-sama! I'm ever so grateful!" Asuka scorned, "not that I needed your defense in the first place!"  
"哈，从无敌的真嗣大人那里得到防守！我真是感激不尽！" 明日香嘲讽道，"不过我本来就不需要你的防守！"

In a short while, Shinji couldn't even decide whether he should be happy to hear that.  
不久之后，真嗣甚至无法确定他是否应该为此感到高兴。

All across the country, the lights began to blink out of existence, as it was plunged into darkness, as the power was transferred to NERV's control from the next 6 hours. The electrical machinery on site began to hum to life, and static could be felt in the air. On the temporary cage near the Entry Plugs, Asuka and Rei were sitting and watching as Tokyo–3 went dark from their respective platforms.  
全国各地的灯光开始逐一熄灭，因为电力在接下来的六小时内被转移到 NERV 的控制下，整个城市陷入了黑暗。现场的电气设备开始嗡嗡作响，空气中能感受到静电。在靠近插入栓的临时笼子里，明日香和绫波坐在各自的平台上，看着第三新东京市逐渐变暗。

"First Child? What are you doing here?" Asuka probed, "I thought you are not being deployed in this sortie."  
“第一适任者？你在这里做什么？”明日香问道，“我以为这次任务没有安排你。”

"I'm here as backup in case you fail."  
"我是来当后备的，万一你失败了。"

"More like in case we're dead…" Asuka muttered sadly before a confident smirk emerged on her face, "but don't worry, you won't have a chance to deploy! I'll take care of this one!"  
"更像是万一我们挂了……" 明日香悲伤地嘀咕着，随即脸上浮现出自信的微笑，"不过别担心，你没机会出手的！我会搞定这个的！"

"Do you trust Ikari-kun?" Rei suddenly asked.  
"你相信碇君吗？" 绫波突然问道。"

Asuka's brows furrowed, "what? I mean, I guess I could trust him in combat. He's such a wonderboy isn't he!"  
明日香皱起眉头，“什么？我是说，我想我可以信任他在战斗中的表现。他不就是个奇迹小子吗！”

"He was designated to protect you, is he not?" Rei continued.  
“他被指派来保护你，不是吗？”绫波继续说道。

"Yeah, but I don't need it!"  
“是啊，但我并不需要！”

"Is he your friend?" "他是你的朋友吗？"

"What?" Asuka's frown deepened. She'd never thought Ayanami would be willing to respond to her questions, let alone actively forwarding a conversation. "I…I don't know." She replied after several long seconds, her voice carried a great uncertainty.  
"什么？" 明日香的眉头皱得更深了。她从未想过绫波会愿意回应她的问题，更不用说主动推进对话了。"我……我不知道。" 她回答道，声音中带着极大的不确定。

"Ikari-kun said friends protect others in battles, if he's willing to protect you, he must consider you as a friend. I deem him as a friend, so I will protect him." Rei continued in a flat voice, "we're friends as well, Pilot Soryu. Therefore, I will protect you as well."

She could feel his body temperature much higher than hers through the touch. "Shinji, please wake up!" Asuka pleaded. _'No no no no no! You can't die on me! Not after I owed you so much!'_  
明日香没有在他身上发现任何伤痕，但他一动不动。她进入插入栓，轻轻摇了摇他的肩膀。通过触碰，她能感觉到他的体温比她的高得多。“真嗣，请醒醒！”明日香恳求道。‘不不不不不！你不能就这样离开我！在我欠你那么多之后！’

Asuka put her index finger under his nose, her stomach twisted as she couldn't feel him breathing. _'NO NO NO NO!'_ She moved her finger onto his carotid, sensing his pulse grew weaker and weaker with each second.  
明日香将食指放在他的鼻子下，当她感觉不到他的呼吸时，她的胃部一阵紧缩。‘不不不不！’她将手指移到他的颈动脉上，感觉到他的脉搏每秒都在变得越来越弱。

_'At least he's alive…but he's dying…I need to do something! THINK, SORYU!'_ Suddenly she recalled her first aid training; she blushed a little at the thought, but the embarrassment was nothing compared to Shinji's life.  
‘至少他还活着……但他正在死去……我需要做点什么！动脑筋，惣流！’突然，她想起了自己的急救训练；想到这里，她脸颊微微泛红，但与真嗣的生命相比，这点尴尬根本不算什么。

Asuka grabbed both of his shoulders and put gently lay him down on his back. She put one hand on top of the other, interlocking her fingers, and put them on Shinji's chest. _'Come back to me!'_ She compressed his chest with forceful pushes, trying to drag him back from the death's doorstep.  
明日香抓住他的双肩，轻轻地让他平躺下来。她将一只手叠在另一只手上，十指相扣，然后放在真嗣的胸口。'回到我身边来！' 她用力按压他的胸膛，试图将他从死亡的边缘拉回。

After 30 forceful compressions, she saw no sign of him waking up. "DAMN IT! WAKE UP!" She punched his chest hard.  
经过 30 次有力的按压后，她仍未见到他苏醒的迹象。"该死！醒过来！" 她重重地击打他的胸膛。

_'I had to this! It's the only way...'_ She took a deep breath and leaned her face closer to his. Asuka puckered up her lips, their faces merely inches from each other.  
'我不得不这么做！这是唯一的办法...' 她深吸一口气，将脸贴近他的。明日香撅起嘴唇，两人的脸庞仅相隔几英寸。

A turmoil of thoughts stormed in her mind. Would this count as a kiss? She'd never kissed anyone before, much less a boy. She had saved the opportunity for Kaji. But what gives? If she didn't do this, he would die while she could do something about it. She would forever live in guilt.  
思绪如风暴般在她脑海中肆虐。这算不算是一个吻呢？她从未吻过任何人，更别提一个男孩了。她本想把这份机会留给加持。但那又怎样？如果她不这么做，他就会在她有能力挽救的情况下死去。她将永远活在愧疚之中。

Not to mention he looked kind of cute…  
更别说他看起来还挺可爱的……

"Ah, FUCK IT," Asuka jerked her head forward. Their lips met.  
“啊，去他妈的，”明日香猛地向前一甩头。他们的唇触碰在一起。

Asuka pinched his nose to prevent air from escaping his lungs. She breathed in and out, using the corner of her eye to check the rise and fall of his lungs.  
明日香捏住他的鼻子，以防空气从他的肺部逸出。她深呼吸，用眼角余光检查他胸膛的起伏。

Suddenly Shinji's body stirred; he opened his eyes and looked up weakly, his cobalt eyes meeting her bright blue. "ARWTFGH?" Incoherent sounds came out from his throat as his eyes went wide.  
突然，真嗣的身体动了动；他睁开眼睛，虚弱地向上看去，深蓝色的眼睛与她明亮的蓝色眼睛相遇。"ARWTFGH?" 他喉咙里发出含糊不清的声音，眼睛瞪得大大的。

"Ahhhh!" Asuka jumped to her feet, hastily wiping her mouth clean, her face furiously blushing. "You…nothing happened! You remember nothing!" _'YOU'RE ALIVE! Thank God!'_  
“啊！”明日香跳了起来，急忙擦干净嘴巴，脸颊因羞愤而通红。“你…什么都没发生！你什么都不记得！”‘你还活着！感谢上帝！’

Shinji smiled weakly as his brain registered the event that just transpired, "Asuka… don't worry, I won't tell anyone how good it felt to have your li-"  
真嗣虚弱地笑了笑，他的大脑刚刚记录下刚刚发生的事件，“明日香…别担心，我不会告诉任何人，你的吻感觉有多好…”

"SHUT IT," Asuka cut him off, her blush turned luminescent. Not that she's going to admit it felt nice to her as well. "Well Baka, are you feeling okay?"  
“闭嘴，”明日香打断了他，她的脸颊变得通红。她可不会承认那感觉对她来说也很美妙。“笨蛋，你感觉还好吗？”

"Yeah…aside that I'm dizzy…" Shinji moved into a sitting position, his back leaned on the side of the entry plug, "Asuka…" the redhead looked at him inscrutably, "yes?"  
“嗯…除了有点头晕…”真嗣坐起身来，背靠在插入栓的侧面，“明日香…”红发的女孩不解地看着他，“怎么了？”

"Thank you. I really do."  
"谢谢你，我真的非常感谢。"

That was it. He kept his promise. Asuka felt butterflies in her stomach as she saw his warm smile and heard his words said in a genuine tone. "Y-you're welcome, Baka-Shinji." She tilted her head, "I should thank you as well."  
就是这样。他遵守了承诺。明日香看到他温暖的笑容，听到他用真诚的语气说话，心中不禁涌起一阵悸动。“不…不用谢，笨蛋真嗣。”她微微侧头，“我也应该感谢你。”

"See…like I said, when we work together, we do great things," Shinji stuck out his hand, smiling, "so, team?"  
"看吧…就像我说的，当我们齐心协力时，我们能成就伟大的事，”真嗣伸出手，微笑着，“那么，团队合作？”

Asuka smiled back, sticking out her own hand.  
明日香回以微笑，伸出自己的手。

"Team." “团队。”

XXXXXX

## *Chapter 7*: Chapter 7: No Way Out

**Chapter 7: No Way Out  
第七章：无路可逃**

Gendo Ikari was a man outstandingly proficient in self-restraint and controlling emotions, which greatly annoyed SEELE members since it prevented them from reading his true thoughts hid behind his stony mask. As twelve black monoliths emerged around the said man, he kept his unwavering expression without so much as blinking.  
碇源堂是一个极其擅长自我克制和控制情绪的人，这让 SEELE 的成员们颇为恼火，因为这让他们无法看穿他那石像般面具下隐藏的真实想法。当十二座黑色巨碑环绕着这个男人出现时，他保持着不动声色的表情，连眼睛都不曾眨一下。

Even the old birds like SEELE members needed to hide behind 'SOUND ONLY'.  
即便是像 SEELE 成员这样的老手，也需要躲在‘仅限语音’的背后。

"Ikari, I've been informed NERV disposed of the S2 engine extracted from the Fourth Angel," SEELE 01 started, "explain yourself."  
"碇，我得知 NERV 处理了从第四使徒身上提取的 S2 引擎，" SEELE 01 开始质问，"解释一下。"

"Dr. Akagi deemed it too damaged to be useful," Gendo Ikari replied. In fact, the S2 engine recovered from the Angel of Morning, although partially damaged, was still utilizable in many means. After fierce tussling with himself, he decided to listen to Shinji, the undoubtedly time traveler, the person who was secretly helping him with his scenario, not to mention - his own son. "We detected the possibility of it exploding, so we disposed of it as soon as possible." He stretched the truth to its limit.  
"赤木博士认为它损坏太严重，无法利用，"碇源堂回答道。实际上，从晨曦使徒身上回收的 S2 引擎虽然部分受损，但仍有许多用途。经过一番激烈的思想斗争，他决定听从无疑是时间旅行者的真嗣——那个暗中帮助他实现计划的人，更不用说——他自己的儿子。"我们检测到它有爆炸的可能性，所以尽快处理掉了。"他尽可能地夸大了事实。

"Hm," SEELE 03 pondered, "an S2 engine could be a decisive addition to Evangelion technology. Is it wise to just throw it away? We don't get many such opportunities."  
"嗯，" SEELE 03 沉思道，"S2 引擎对 EVA 技术可能是个决定性的补充。就这么扔掉明智吗？我们可没多少这样的机会。"

"Dr. Akagi had run some simple tests on it. We've recorded all data we got, and we'll share it with other branches." Gendo conceded.  
"赤木博士已经对它进行了一些简单测试。我们记录了所有获得的数据，并将与其他分支共享。" 碇源堂让步道。"

"I see. By the way, good work on sabotaging Jet Alone," SEELE 01 spoke, "we can't let anyone outside disrupt the scenario."  
"我明白了。顺便说一句，破坏 Jet Alone 的工作做得不错，" SEELE 01 说道，"我们不能让外界任何人干扰剧本。"

Gendo chuckled internally at Keel's words, "it was what I must do. Even if their intention wasn't to rival NERV, an actual droid would be no match against the Angels."  
源堂在心里暗笑基尔的话，“这是我必须做的。即便他们的意图并非与 NERV 竞争，一个真正的机器人也无法与使徒匹敌。”

"Correct. It's the AT-Field of the Evangelion that defeats them. Speaking of which," SEELE 05 switched to a questioning tone, "the Third Child exhibited unusual usage of his AT-Field during the sortie against the Sixth Angel. He generated a magnetic field through some unforeseen method. I demand an explanation."  
“没错。是 EVA 的 AT 力场击败了它们。说到这个，” SEELE 05 转换了语气，质疑道，“在与第六使徒的战斗中，第三适格者展现了对 AT 力场的异常运用。他通过某种未预见的方法产生了磁场。我要求一个解释。”

"I am no scientist, and Dr. Akagi is still digging into the recordings. We may never know the truth behind it," Gendo improvised, "perhaps it was just his survival instinct at work."  
“我不是科学家，赤木博士仍在研究录像资料。我们可能永远无法得知真相，”源堂即兴回答，“或许那只是他的求生本能发挥了作用。”

"Hm," SEELE 01's voice carried a hint of suspicion, "you will inform us of any possible disruptions to the scenario as soon as possible, Gendo." He demanded before the monoliths disappeared into the void.  
"嗯，" SEELE 01 的声音带着一丝怀疑，"你会尽快通知我们任何可能扰乱计划的情况，碇。"他在石碑消失于虚空前命令道。

"The old men are certainly getting suspicious," Fuyutsuki put his hand behind his back, "we may have to play safer."  
"那些老头子确实越来越疑心了，" 冬月将手背在身后，"我们可能得更谨慎些。"

"No doubt." Gendo responded halfheartedly. His deal with his son was between the two of them only. Even Kozo had no idea about it, so he couldn't even provide constructive suggestions.  
"毫无疑问。" 碇源堂半心半意地回应。他与儿子的交易仅限于他们两人之间。就连葛城也没有察觉，因此也无法提供建设性的建议。

Only one thought remained in his mind. _'Son…'_  
他的脑海中只剩下一个念头。'儿子…'

XXXXXX

"Soryu, could you write down the answer to question two?" Nebukawa Sensei requested after Shinji finished answering question one – a reasonably easy geometric proof problem.  
“惣流，你能写下第二题的答案吗？”在真嗣回答完第一题——一个相当简单的几何证明问题后，Nebukawa 老师问道。

Not so easy for Asuka, who couldn't even comprehend half of the words written on the blackboard. "Yes, teacher," she bit down her lips and headed to the blackboard, writing random equations on it.  
对明日香来说就没那么容易了，她甚至无法理解黑板上写的一半内容。“是的，老师，”她咬了咬嘴唇，走向黑板，在上面随意写下一些方程式。

"Soryu, this is incorrect. Why did you write the Lorentz contraction equation under a trigonometric problem?" Nebukawa Sensei said disbelievingly.  
"惣流，这不对。为什么你把洛伦兹收缩公式写在一个三角函数问题下面？" 碇老师难以置信地说道。

Asuka's mouth became a thin line, "well, they are related, aren't they?" Her pride refused to let her admit her mistake and incompetence, "you need the Pythagorean theorem to derive the equation for-"  
明日香的嘴角紧抿成一条线，"嗯，它们是有联系的，不是吗？" 她的自尊心不允许她承认错误和无能，"你需要用勾股定理来推导这个公式的……"

"Soryu, do you understand what the problem is asking for?" The Sensei cut her off, dreading he wouldn't be able to follow her if she continued.  
"惣流，你明白题目在问什么吗？" 老师打断了她，担心如果她继续说下去，自己会跟不上。

"Yeah, it's about…trigonometry."  
“嗯，是关于……三角函数的。”

Nebukawa Sensei sighed, "listen, the length of side A is 6, and the angle…"  
Nebukawa 老师叹了口气，“听着，边 A 的长度是 6，而角度……”

After the Sensei spoke out the problem, Asuka quickly solved it with skill. She turned back to her seat; her irritation only grew as she saw Shinji was looking at her with an odd expression, his eyes indubitably carried a tinge of amusement.  
老师说完题目后，Asuka 迅速熟练地解了出来。她转身回到座位；看到 Shinji 正用一种奇怪的表情看着她，眼中无疑带着一丝戏谑，她的烦躁感愈发强烈。

_Shinji I.: Having trouble reading kanji?_ Her laptop flashed a massage.  
真嗣一：看不懂汉字吗？她的笔记本电脑闪现了一条信息。

She huffed. _Asuka LS.: No shit sherlock!_  
她哼了一声。明日香·兰格雷：废话少说！

_Shinji I.: I can help you with that.  
真嗣一：我可以帮你。_

_Asuka LS.: I don't need your help!  
明日香 LS.: 我不需要你的帮助！_

_Shinji I.: You don't WANT my help. We're a team, remember? We can help each other.  
真嗣 I.: 你不是不想要我的帮助。我们是团队，记得吗？我们可以互相帮助。_

_Asuka LS.: Oh? Am I looking it right? The invincible Shinji-sama needing help from the poor Asuka?  
明日香 LS.: 哦？我看起来对了吗？无敌的真嗣大人需要可怜的明日香的帮助？_

_Shinji I.: You don't need to be so scornful, Asuka.  
真嗣一：你不必如此轻蔑，明日香。_

_Asuka LS.: Whatever. Speak what you need.  
明日香·L·绫波：随你怎么说。有什么事就直说吧。_

Shinji pondered for a moment. What could he need from her? His German was almost flawless, his grades were always at the top of the class, much to Asuka's annoyance. Still-  
真嗣沉思片刻。他能从她那里需要什么呢？他的德语几乎完美无缺，成绩也总是班级顶尖，这让明日香颇为恼火。不过——

_Shinji I.: I could use a second hand when cooking. This way, I'll have time to make some cakes.  
真嗣一：做饭时有个帮手会好很多。这样我就有时间做些蛋糕了。_

He could practically feel her radiating surprise. _Asuka S.: Deal. You teach me kanji, I'll help you cook. And you MUST make me the cakes I want._  
他几乎能感受到她散发出的惊讶。明日香·S·兰格雷：成交。你教我汉字，我帮你做饭。而且你一定要做我想要的蛋糕。

Shinji smiled. _Shinji I.: Deal._  
真嗣笑了。真嗣一：成交。

XXXXXX

Ritsuko took a sip of her coffee as she analyzed the data of the Ramiel fight, as someone snuck up from behind her and wrapped their arms around her, making her gasp. "Still a world-class workaholic, eh Ritsuko?" Kaji asked.  
律子抿了一口咖啡，正分析着拉米尔战斗的数据，突然有人从背后悄悄靠近，双臂环抱住她，让她惊呼出声。“还是一如既往的世界级工作狂啊，律子？”加持问道。

"Ah, Kaji, it's been a long time."  
“啊，加持，好久不见。”

"Yes, it has, and yet you still seem to not have a boyfriend." Kaji said, stroking her face lightly. "Perhaps the men of NERV have simply lost their mind to leave such a rose like yourself untouched and lonely."  
“是啊，很久了，可你似乎还是单身。”加持轻抚她的脸颊，说道，“或许是 NERV 的男人们都失去了理智，竟让如此一朵玫瑰独自绽放，无人问津。”

"Well, Kaji, it's nice to see you haven't changed."  
“哎呀，加持，你还是老样子。”

"Perhaps I could be the one to pluck the rose…"  
"或许我可以成为摘取玫瑰的那个人…"

"He's just an idiot as ever," Misato stormed into the room, carrying a bag of baked cakes in her hand, "I say, you should try some of these cakes Shinji…and Asuka made. So tasty. Even the cake shops can't make something like this." She complimented as she walked to Kaji and Ritsuko's side, handing them the cakes.  
"他还是一如既往的傻瓜，" 美里气冲冲地走进房间，手里提着一袋烤蛋糕，"我说，你应该尝尝这些蛋糕，真嗣…还有明日香做的。太美味了。连蛋糕店都做不出这样的味道。" 她一边称赞一边走到加持和律子身边，递给他们蛋糕。

Kaji grabbed one and took a bite, "hmm…delicious, indeed," his brow furrowed, "Shinji's just full of surprises, isn't he?"  
加持拿起一块咬了一口，"嗯…确实美味，" 他的眉头微皱，"真嗣总是充满惊喜，不是吗？"

"Elaborate," Misato said after she swallowed another cake.  
"详细说说，" 美里咽下又一块蛋糕后说道。

"The things he can do… aren't listed in his file," Kaji massaged his chin, "for instance, he shouldn't know how to speak German at all."  
"他会的那些事……档案里都没提，" 加持揉着下巴，"比如说，他根本不应该会讲德语。"

"What? He could've learned the language by himself," Misato retorted before her own frown crept up her face, "though his German is indeed…disturbingly fluent, almost as good as a native speaker."  
"什么？他可能是自学的啊，" 美里反驳道，随即自己也皱起了眉头，"不过他的德语确实……流利得让人不安，几乎和母语者一样好。"

"See what I mean? Moreover, his file says he's shy and reserved. But the Shinji we know? He, of all people, gets under _Asuka's_ skin. Repeatedly. Easily." Kaji's expression turned serious, "he _pushes_ her to do things. Even I had a hard time to do that, at least in the beginning."  
"明白我的意思了吗？而且，他的档案上写着他害羞且内向。但我们认识的碇真嗣呢？他，偏偏就是那个能轻易惹恼明日香的人。屡试不爽。" 加持的表情变得严肃，"他推动她去做事。即便是我，一开始也很难做到这一点。"

"Are you saying we have an imposter on our hands?" Misato questioned, half to herself.  
"你是说我们手上的这个是冒牌货？" 美里自言自语地问道。"

"No," Ritsuko interjected, "the DNA tests checked out. The brain scans as well. He's the real Shinji."  
"不，" 律子插话道，"DNA 检测和脑部扫描都证实了。他是真正的碇真嗣。"

"Well, I think you guys are just paranoid," Misato half-laughed, "I'd say-" She was cut off by the raspy sound of klaxons that suddenly went off.  
"哎，我觉得你们就是太疑神疑鬼了，" 美里半笑着说，"我得说——" 她被突然响起的刺耳警报声打断了。

"Level–2 battle stations, a Pattern Orange has been detected, Dr. Akagi and Captain Katsuragi, report to Central Dogma at once!"  
"二级战斗准备，检测到橙色模式，赤木博士和葛城上尉，立即前往中央教条报到！"

"You've got to be kidding me… another fucking Angel?" Misato said in exasperation, grimacing.  
"你一定是在开玩笑吧……又他妈一个使徒？" 美里恼火地说，皱起了眉头。

"I guess so, Pattern Orange tends to lead straight to Pattern Blue." Ritsuko deadpanned. "Which means more mess to clean up…"  
"我想是的，橙色模式通常直接导致蓝色模式。" 律子面无表情地说。"这意味着更多的清理工作……"

XXXXXX

"What do you mean, I'M NOT BEING DEPLOYED?!" Shinji shouted incredulously.  
"你什么意思，我不能被部署？！" 真嗣难以置信地喊道。

"There's no other way, Unit 01 is still under repairs. The last Angel really did a number on it," Misato frowned slightly, "don't worry, Rei and Asuka will handle it just fine."  
"没有其他办法了，初号机还在修理中。上一个使徒确实把它弄得一团糟，" 美里微微皱眉，"别担心，绫波和明日香会处理得很好的。"

"Damn right!" Asuka clapped her hands together. After the defeat of Ramiel, she was tied with Shinji in terms of Angel kill count, which she was bragging about non-stop. "Ooo, too bad Baka-Shinji is gonna get surpassed!"  
“当然厉害！”明日香双手一拍。在击败雷米尔后，她和真嗣的使徒击杀数持平，这让她不停地炫耀。“哦哦，可惜了，笨蛋真嗣要被超越了！”

Shinji again had a bad feeling of losing control. Israfel was always defeated by he and Asuka's synchronized attack in all of his former lives. The week-long synchronization training was something he was always looking forward to, even though he could already predict Asuka's movements impeccably. It was selfish, but still necessary if he wanted to keep the suspicions at a minimum.  
真嗣再次感到一种失控的预感。在前世中，伊斯拉斐尔总是被他和明日香的同步攻击击败。为期一周的同步训练是他一直期待的，尽管他已能完美预判明日香的动作。这虽自私，但为了将怀疑降到最低，仍是必要的。

Now though, he wasn't even going to sortie.  
但现在，他甚至不打算出击。

It's not that he didn't trust Asuka's piloting and combat skills. But the fact that he'd almost never seen her fight Angels without him by her side was what made him worry. Last time when he wasn't on the battlefield…  
并非他不信任明日香的驾驶和战斗技能。但几乎从未见过她在他不在身边的情况下与使徒战斗，这才是让他担忧的原因。上次他不在战场上……

The Angel destroyed her. 使徒摧毁了她。

Asuka saw the face he was making and misunderstood the real reason behind it. She smirked smugly, "how does it feel? You're gonna lose to a girl?"  
明日香看到了他的表情，误解了背后的真正原因。她得意地笑了笑，"你感觉如何？要输给一个女孩了吗？"

"Asuka…" he started. "明日香…" 他开口道。

"What?" "什么？"

"Be careful." "小心点。"

Asuka blinked in surprise. "Hmph, I'll be as careful as I deem necessary! I don't need you to worry!" She sounded less disdainful than she intended it to be. There was something in his voice…and his concerning, if not nervous looks…  
明日香惊讶地眨了眨眼。"哼，我会小心到我认为必要的程度！不需要你担心！" 她的语气没有她想表现得那么轻蔑。他的声音里有些东西…还有他那关切，如果不是紧张的表情…

XXXXXX

Two large transport aircraft flew in the air, heading for the shoreline, carrying Unit 00 and Unit 02. The pilots waited patiently to deploy while Misato explained their plan.  
两架大型运输机在空中飞行，朝着海岸线前进，搭载着零号机和二号机。飞行员们耐心等待着部署命令，而美里则向他们解释计划。

"Due to the extensive battle with the Sixth Angel, most of Tokyo-3's intercept system is out of commission. As of right now, we're at 24 percent effectiveness. And for the purposes of killing Angels, it may as well be zero." Misato said over the comm. "We're deploying Unit 00 and Unit 02 to intercept and destroy the target before it comes to shore. So, we'll launch you and power you up on the surface, you'll move to intercept and take turns attacking this thing, is that understood?"  
“由于与第六使徒的激烈战斗，东京-3 的大部分拦截系统已经瘫痪。截至目前，我们的有效性仅为 24%。对于消灭使徒而言，这几乎等同于零。”美里通过通讯设备说道，“我们将部署零号机和二号机，以拦截并摧毁目标，阻止其登陆。因此，我们将在地面上启动你们并为其充能，你们将移动至拦截位置并轮流攻击这个目标，明白了吗？”

"Roger." "You got it Misato!"  
“收到。”“明白了，美里！”

"This sucks! I want to fight this Angel solo, so wondergirl can't steal my kill!" Asuka bemoaned. This was a perfect opportunity to claim her triumph over her rival, even though it could be only temporary.  
“这太糟糕了！我想独自对付这个使徒，这样奇迹女孩就不能抢走我的猎物了！” 明日香抱怨道。这是一个完美的机会，可以暂时超越她的对手，哪怕只是暂时的。

"Asuka, it's standard procedure, get over it. Trust me, two on one will be a lot better than one on one." Misato said, eliciting a huff from the redhead. "Evangelion Unit 00… Evangelion Unit 02… LAUNCH!" The Captain ordered. Both Evangelions slid out of the restraint racks on their planes, and fell to Earth from thousands of feet high.  
“明日香，这是标准程序，别纠结了。相信我，二对一总比一对一要好得多。”美里说道，惹得红发少女哼了一声。“零号机……二号机……发射！”舰长下令。两台 EVA 从各自的飞机约束架上滑出，从数万英尺高空坠向地球。

Near the ground, Ayanami activated her retro rockets, deploying them from the shoulder pylons, landing gracefully on the beach and staying crouched, awaiting the power cables.  
接近地面时，绫波启动了她的反推火箭，从肩部挂架上展开，优雅地降落在海滩上并保持蹲姿，等待电源电缆的连接。

Asuka on the other hand did something far more artful, doing several somersaults in the air before throwing the retro rockets on at the last moment, and landing heavily in the sand.  
另一方面，明日香则展现了一番更为巧妙的技艺，她在空中连续翻了几个筋斗，最后一刻才发射了反向火箭，重重地落在沙地上。

Unit 02 wielded a Progressive Glaive, which simply put a giant Progressive Knife on the end of a long metal rod, while Unit 00 was wielding a Pallet Rifle. A large burst of water shot up from the ocean, revealing an odd, humanoid figure that stood taller than the Evangelions. Its arms and legs were shaped like crescents that were platinum in color with a lilac hue in the sunlight.  
二号机手持一把渐进式戟，简单来说就是在长金属杆末端装上了一把巨大的渐进式刀，而零号机则持有一把托盘步枪。海面上突然喷发出一股巨大的水柱，显露出一个比福音战士还要高大的奇异人形生物。它的四肢呈新月形，颜色为铂金色，在阳光下透出紫罗兰色调。

"I've got visuals on the target," Rei reported.  
“我已经捕捉到目标的影像。”绫波报告道。

"Will you just shut up and just cover me? I'll handle this ugly fuck myself!" Asuka smirked and willed her EVA forward.  
"你能不能闭嘴，就掩护我？这个丑陋的混蛋我自己来对付！" 明日香冷笑一声，操控着她的 EVA 向前冲去。

"Providing fire support," Rei said calmly as she began spreading around suppressing fire. Israfel's AT-Field deployed, stopping the bullets. She began focusing her attack on the Core to try and cause some damage while Unit 02 crouched down like a tiger. Asuka gripped the control yokes tightly and pushed them forward.  
"提供火力支援，" 绫波平静地说道，开始四处散布压制火力。伊斯拉菲尔的 AT 力场展开，挡住了子弹。她开始集中攻击核心，试图造成一些伤害，而 02 号机则像一只猛虎般蹲伏下来。明日香紧紧握住控制杆，猛地向前推去。

"CHARGE!" "冲锋！"

Unit 02 leaped into the air, destroying several buildings along the way. The crimson EVA Unit brought down the Prog Glaive towards Israfel in a vicious swing. "YAAAAHHHHH!" Asuka shouted a battle cry as the Prog Glaive sliced Israfel right down the middle, revealing its fleshy pink interior.  
02 号机一跃而起，沿途摧毁了数座建筑。赤红的 EVA 单位挥舞着 Prog 战斧，猛烈地劈向伊斯拉斐尔。“呀啊啊啊啊！”明日香发出战斗的呐喊，Prog 战斧将伊斯拉斐尔从中劈开，露出了其粉红色的肉质内部。

"Nice work Asuka!" Misato exclaimed happily, feeling proud of the girl.  
“干得漂亮，明日香！”美里兴奋地赞叹道，为这个女孩感到骄傲。

"I told you I was the best, Misato!" Asuka boasted, "hm, does this mean now I'm officially having more kills than the invincible-" She trailed off as she saw the stunning sight in front of her. The Angel started to reform into two copies of its original self, their Cores moved to where the sternum is on the human body, and they shrunk in size, now roughly the height of an Evangelion. One was colored gold, while the other was silver, and they were poised to attack Unit 02.  
“我早就说过我是最棒的，美里！”明日香自夸道，“哼，这是不是意味着我现在正式比那个无敌的——”她话音未落，眼前惊人的一幕让她愣住了。天使开始分裂成两个原版的自己，核心移动到了人类胸骨的位置，体型缩小，现在大约与 EVA 相当。一个呈金色，另一个呈银色，它们准备向 02 号机发起攻击。

"Asuka look out!" Misato's voice echoed through her cockpit, "It's not dead!"  
"明日香，小心！" 美里在她的驾驶舱中回响，"它还没死！"

The gold one moved towards Unit 02, but it was intercepted by a hail of bullets, and no AT-Field stopped it. Unit 02 moved back and brought its weapon to bear, swinging at the silver one as it moved forward and sliced its shoulder clean through. Moments later, it healed itself and pressed forward. Unit 00's hail of gunfire on the gold one has left several holes in it, but it too also reformed. They both then moved towards poor Unit 02. "Asuka!" Misato shouted, "AIM FOR THE CORE!"  
金色机体向 02 号机移动，但被一阵弹雨拦截，没有任何 AT 力场能阻挡它。02 号机后退并举起武器，向逼近的银色机体挥去，将其肩膀干净利落地切断。片刻后，银色机体自我修复并继续前进。00 号机对金色机体的枪林弹雨留下了几个孔洞，但它也重新组合。两者随后都向可怜的 02 号机逼近。"明日香！"美里大喊，"瞄准核心！"

"Got it!" Asuka replied as she swung the Prog Glaive at the gold one, and cut its Core deeply, causing it to shoot out blood. "Got him!" The silver one's Core glowed and then the gold one's healed. "WHAT THE ACTUAL FUCK!" Asuka screamed. "HOW IS THIS FAIR!"  
"明白！" 明日香回应，挥动 Prog Glaive 砍向金色机体的核心，深及内部，使其喷出血液。"搞定他了！"银色机体的核心发光，随后金色机体的伤口愈合了。"这他妈的怎么回事！"明日香尖叫。"这怎么公平！"

"Asuka, you hit the Core, right?"  
"明日香，你击中了核心，对吧？"

"Yeah, I did, it bled and everything!"  
"是的，我做到了，它还流血了呢！"

Misato frowned, then her face lit up as an idea struck her, "Try break two cores at the same time!"  
美里皱了皱眉，随即脸上闪过一丝灵光，""试试同时击破两个核心！"

"Roger!" "Roger." "罗杰！" "收到。"

Unit 02 waited for Unit 00 to lay suppressive fire on target Alpha; when it did, Asuka piloted her EVA dashing to target Beta, wielding the prog glaive, trying to break its Core at the moment Unit 00's gunfire hit target Alpha. Her plan should be unblemished – under normal circumstances, which didn't include Angel fights. Two halves of Israfel moved in unison; the silver half grabbed Unit 02's arms while the gold one took its legs, tossing the gigantic humanoid in the air as If it was a toy.  
初号机等待零号机对阿尔法目标进行压制射击；当零号机开火时，明日香驾驶着她的 EVA 冲向贝塔目标，挥舞着长柄战斧，试图在零号机火力击中阿尔法目标的瞬间破坏其核心。她的计划本应完美无缺——在非使徒战斗的正常情况下。然而，伊斯拉斐尔的两个部分同步行动；银色部分抓住了二号机的双臂，金色部分则抓住了它的双腿，像抛玩具一样将这个巨大的人形机体抛向空中。

"Ahh! Let go of me, you fucks!" Asuka cried, trying to get her EVA back in control, and failed miserably as the Israfel pair threw her over the hill. The crimson EVA crashed head down into the side of a mountain and ceased operating.  
"啊！放开我，你们这些混蛋！" 明日香喊道，试图重新控制她的 EVA，但失败得一塌糊涂，因为伊斯拉斐尔双双将她抛过了山丘。赤红的 EVA 头朝下撞上山腰，停止了运作。

"Unit 00, engaging the targets," Rei said calmly as she threw the pallet rifle away and picked up her prog knife, only that the small knife was far from enough to defeat the Angel. Unit 00 charged the gold Angel and stabbed it through the Core, making it bleed. She then threw that Angel aside and then sunk the Prog Knife into the silver one's Core. Ayanami moved away from both Angels and saw them standing back up, apparently healed and coming at her again. They both landed a synchronized punch to Unit 00's abdomen, momentarily stunning Ayanami with the tremendous force of the hit. Utilizing her moment of immobile state, the Angels lifted her up and threw her in a similar fashion to Unit 02, making the blue EVA Unit slamming into the sea.  
「零号机，接触目标。」绫波平静地说道，她扔掉了手中的弹射步枪，拾起高频振动刀，然而这把小刀远不足以击败使徒。零号机冲向金色使徒，一刀刺穿其核心，使其流血。随后，她将那使徒甩到一旁，又将高频振动刀插入银色使徒的核心。绫波远离了两名使徒，只见它们重新站起，显然已经痊愈，再次向她袭来。它们同时击中零号机的腹部，巨大的冲击力让绫波短暂失神。趁她无法动弹之际，使徒将她举起，如同对待二号机一般，将蓝色 EVA 机体猛地抛入海中。

XXXXXX

The darkened room was faintly lit up as the projector came to life. Asuka had her head tilted down, looking at the floor as the slideshow started. Rei stood beside her in an utterly unimpressed manner. Shinji was there as well, a blank expression on his face. They felt they needn't be reminded about the catastrophe that was their most recent mission.  
昏暗的房间随着投影仪的启动而微微亮起。明日香低着头，目光落在地板上，幻灯片开始播放。绫波站在她身旁，一脸漠然。真嗣也在场，面无表情。他们觉得无需再被提醒最近那场灾难性的任务。

"At 10:58 AM, Unit 00 was attacked by both of the targets, Alpha and Beta which had separated from the original target…"  
上午 10 点 58 分，零号机遭到原目标分离出的阿尔法和贝塔两个目标的攻击……

Asuka sighed. Averting her eyes from the slideshow wasn't going to keep her from being forced to relive the most disastrous sortie in the history of the Evangelion Project. It especially didn't help for Asuka to have Kaji sitting right behind her. As the presenter continued, the Second Child started murmuring to herself about the reason for the mission being such a catastrophic failure. "It's all wondergirl's fault." Asuka growled, looking up at the screen to see pictures of her and Rei's respective EVAs sticking feet up while the rest of their bodies were either buried under dirt in Asuka's case, or submerged underwater in Rei's.  
明日香叹了口气。避开幻灯片并不能让她免于重温《福音战士计划》历史上最灾难性的出击。特别是当加持就坐在她身后时，这尤其无济于事。随着讲解者继续，第二适格者开始喃喃自语，思考任务为何会如此灾难性地失败。“都是那个奇迹女孩的错。”明日香咆哮着，抬头看向屏幕，看到她和绫波的 EVA 分别翘着脚，身体部分在明日香的情况下被埋在土里，而在绫波的情况下则沉入水下。

As the presenter continued on, Auka felt her fists begin to clench. This was so embarrassing. This was not how her perfect opportunity to beat Shinji was supposed to be. She was supposed to win with glory and elegance, not disaster and failure. "This is all your fault!" She exclaimed, shooting out of her chair, pointing an accusatory finger at her partner.  
随着讲解者继续，明日香感到自己的拳头开始紧握。这太尴尬了。这并不是她击败真嗣的完美机会应有的样子。她本应光荣而优雅地获胜，而不是以灾难和失败告终。“这都是你的错！”她大喊着，从椅子上跳起来，用指责的手指向她的搭档。

Rei Ayanami completely ignored her complaints, which fueled her anger even more.  
绫波零完全无视了她的抱怨，这让她更加愤怒。

She started missing Shinji as her partner, both in and outside of combat.  
她开始怀念真嗣作为她的搭档，无论是在战斗中还是战斗外。

"Enough!" Vice Commander Fuyutsuki roared. "We were lucky that the UN was able to at least send the Angel into retreat, but heed my words, it will be back." Fuyutsuki was not the type of person to get angry. If anything, he had a much calmer demeanor than even Commander Ikari. To see him like this was quite unsettling. "When it does come back, you both will work as a team, and you will destroy it." He glared at both of them, especially at Asuka, because even he knew that she was the root of why the mission was a failure. "Is that understood?"  
“够了！”副司令冬月吼道，“我们很幸运，联合国至少能让使徒撤退，但听我说，它还会回来的。”冬月并不是那种容易发怒的人。相反，他的举止比司令碇源堂还要冷静。看到他这样，实在令人不安。“当它再次回来时，你们两个要作为一个团队，消灭它。”他瞪着他们俩，尤其是明日香，因为他知道她才是任务失败的根本原因。“明白了吗？”

"Yes sir." They replied together.  
“是的，长官。”他们齐声回答。

"Good." He sat back down in his chair. "You two are dismissed. Captain Katsuragi will give you further instruction from here."  
“很好。”他重新坐回椅子上，“你们两个可以离开了。葛城司令会从这里给你们进一步指示。”

Asuka sighed in relief once the Vice Commander's burning glare was off of them. It felt like he had just drained all their energy away by doing so little as looking at them. All three pilots slowly trudged out of the room, leaving the adults to discuss this further. As the door closed shut behind them, Asuka leaned her arm against the wall and rested her head on her forearm. "Mein Gott, that was awful."  
当副司令那灼热的目光从他们身上移开后，明日香松了一口气。感觉他仅仅是用目光就抽走了他们所有的精力。三位驾驶员缓缓走出房间，留下大人们继续讨论。当门在他们身后关上时，明日香靠在墙上，将头枕在手臂上。“我的天，真是糟糕透顶。”

"So it looks like you're working with Ayanami, huh?" Shinji said nonchalantly, still worried about the incoming synchronization training. He knew Rei would have no problem being paired with her, but not so much in Asuka's case. If their training routine took a hit, Asuka would complain, and Rei would most likely ignore her, which would irritate her even more. He needed to be highly discreet if he wanted to prevent the vicious cycle.  
“看来你和绫波一起工作了，是吧？” 真嗣随意地说道，心中仍担忧着即将到来的同步训练。他知道绫波与她搭档不会有问题，但换成明日香就不一定了。如果训练效果受到影响，明日香会抱怨，而绫波多半会无视她，这只会让她更加恼火。如果他想避免这种恶性循环，就必须非常谨慎。

"Hmph, she's not half a pilot as you are," Asuka blurted out, "that doesn't mean you're anywhere near me, got that?" She hastily added.  
“哼，她连你一半的飞行员水平都没有，” 明日香脱口而出，“这并不意味着你能接近我，明白吗？” 她急忙补充道。

Shinji chuckled but made no further comments. Within the lifelong time he'd known her, he had quickly come to learn that her pride was her strongest character trait. He knew this was a massive blow to her ego, and he felt terrible about it. However, he was also aware that she may have needed a good punch to the pride if it made her a better teammate because of it.  
真嗣轻笑一声，但没有进一步评论。在他认识她的漫长岁月里，他很快了解到她的骄傲是她最鲜明的性格特点。他知道这对她的自尊心是个巨大打击，他为此感到难过。然而，他也意识到，如果这能让她成为更好的队友，那么或许她需要这样的打击来磨砺自己的骄傲。

XXXXXX

AN: Hm, I love short and quick updates. It's also good for setting up cliffhangers. I have to say though, I've already got the entire plotline planned, including the ending. Next chapter – sync training, character development. Stay tuned and leave a review!  
作者笔记：嗯，我喜欢简短而迅速的更新，也适合设置悬念。不过得说，整个剧情走向，包括结局，我已全盘规划好了。下一章——同步训练，角色成长。敬请期待并留下您的评论！

## *Chapter 8*: Chapter 8: Juxtaposition  
*第八章*: 第八章：并置

Disclaimer: I do not own Evangelion.  
免责声明：我不拥有《新世纪福音战士》。

**Chapter 8: Juxtaposition 第八章：并置**

Shinji stared at the unprecedented _dazzling_ sight in front of him, summoning all of his willpower just to hold back a round of laughter, but still failed miserably. Asuka and Rei both wore the ludicrous 'sync outfit', a clashing ensemble of black spandex shorts and a loose-fitting top that threatened to fall off the shoulders.  
真嗣盯着眼前前所未有的耀眼景象，竭尽全力才勉强忍住一阵大笑，但最终还是失败了。明日香和绫波都穿着那套荒谬的'同步装'，黑色紧身短裤搭配一件松垮的上衣，肩膀处似乎随时都会滑落。

It wasn't the outfit themselves that broke his composure – it was the fact that Asuka wore the blue one, while Rei wore the pink one, the colors of their clothes contrasted by the colors of their hair and eyes, creating an unmatched ridiculous and comical scene.  
并非衣服本身让他失去了镇定——而是因为明日香穿的是蓝色那件，而绫波穿的是粉色那件，衣服的颜色与她们的发色和眼睛形成鲜明对比，构成了一幅荒谬又滑稽的画面。

"What are you laughing at?!" Asuka barked at Shinji, her face blushed a deep red which added more contrast to the sight, "urgh, I don't even know why we're wearing this stupid thing! This is child abuse!"  
“你在笑什么？！”明日香对真嗣吼道，她的脸涨得通红，为这景象增添了更多对比，“呃，我甚至不知道我们为什么要穿这种蠢东西！这是虐待儿童！”

"Calm down, Asuka, you look pretty good in this," Shinji remarked casually after his laughter died down. Even though her personality was downright annoying, he still had to admit that Asuka's feminine figure was unrivaled.  
“冷静点，明日香，你穿这个挺好看的，”真嗣在笑声平息后随意地说道。尽管她的性格确实令人讨厌，但他不得不承认明日香的身材无可挑剔。

"Huh? Pervert! I knew it!" Asuka huffed, and her blush deepened. However, she actually felt a sense of relief that Shinji, who she thought was gay, finally acknowledged her beauty. It's not that she needed his confirmation to know she was pretty – the constant leering gazes she got at school, the extremely annoying amount of love letters, and the numerous date requests she received objectively proved it.  
“啊？变态！我就知道！”明日香哼了一声，脸颊上的红晕更深了。然而，她内心其实感到一丝宽慰，因为被她误以为同性恋的真嗣终于承认了她的美貌。并非她需要他的认可来证明自己的魅力——学校里那些令人厌烦的痴迷目光、堆积如山的情书，以及络绎不绝的约会邀请，都客观地证明了这一点。

Still, all the attention she gained at school never made her feel like this. She didn't know why, but Shinji's recognition just made a difference.  
尽管如此，学校里所有的关注从未让她有过这样的感觉。她不知道为什么，但真嗣的认可就是有所不同。

Asuka smirked before her eyes settled on her training partner standing beside her. Her smirk quickly turned into a slight frown. The First Child didn't look half bad as her in the outfit that perfectly outlined her body. It annoyed her even more when she saw Shinji seemed to turn his attention away from her to Rei. However, her assumption that Shinji was more attracted to Rei couldn't have been farther from the truth.  
明日香微微一笑，目光落在了站在她身边的训练搭档身上。她的笑容很快变成了轻微的皱眉。这位第一适格者穿着紧贴身形的服装，看起来并不逊色于她。更让她恼火的是，她注意到真嗣似乎将注意力从她身上转移到了绫波身上。然而，她认为真嗣对绫波更有吸引力的想法，实际上大错特错。

"Alright, listen you two," Captain Katsuragi came into the room, "the two halves of the Angel move in unison, so we suppose we need to attack them with two perfectly in-sync EVA as well." Seeing the pilots nodded, she continued in a cheerier voice, "so… we're going to defeat the Angel with music and dance!" She proudly held up a flash drive and dangled it in front of them.  
"好了，你们两个听我说，" 葛城美里队长走进房间，"这个使徒的两部分是同步行动的，所以我们认为我们也需要用两台完全同步的 EVA 来攻击它们。" 看到驾驶员们点头，她用更欢快的声音继续说，"所以……我们要用音乐和舞蹈来击败使徒！" 她自豪地举起一个闪存盘，在他们面前晃了晃。

"Gott…I should've seen this coming, from this ridiculous outfit!" She tugged the collar of her outfit, "seriously though, which genius thought this is a good idea?!"  
"天哪……我早该料到会是这样，从这荒谬的服装就能看出来！" 她拉了拉衣领，"说真的，到底是哪个天才认为这是个好主意？！"

"The genius' called Kaji, Asuka," Shinji chuckled in amusement.  
"天才少女叫加持，明日香，" 真嗣轻笑出声。

"Ka-" Asuka choked, "argh, forget it! What exactly do we need to do, Misato?"  
"加——" 明日香哽住，"啊，算了！我们到底需要做什么，美里？"

"Simple," Misato smiled, "like I said, you'll time your movements with this music." She held up the flash device once again. "As for the dance, you're going to play DDR. That's what the machine there is for." She pointed at the dance machine in the living room.  
"简单，" 美里微笑道，"就像我说的，你们要配合这段音乐来移动。" 她再次举起闪存盘。"至于舞蹈，你们要玩 DDR。那台机器就是用来跳舞的。" 她指向客厅里的跳舞机。

"Wonderful…" Asuka mumbled in exasperation, "just fucking wonderful…"  
“太棒了……”明日香恼怒地咕哝着，“真是他妈的棒极了……”

The following day, Misato woke up the pilots at precisely 6 am. It was supposed to be the first day of their actual dancing session. After a whole afternoon of familiarization with the music and the dance routine, Asuka and Rei got a decent memory of them.  
次日清晨，美里在 6 点整准时叫醒了驾驶员们。这本应是他们实际舞蹈训练的第一天。经过整个下午对音乐和舞蹈动作的熟悉，明日香和绫波已经大致记住了。

"...and that's how you get sync scores. Remember, both of you need to get 100 percent to have a chance to defeat the Angel. Now let's try this. Asuka, go to the left mat. Rei, you'll have the right one. Okay. Both of you, put on your headset. Okay. Ready? Three, two, one!"  
"...这就是如何获得同步率的方法。记住，你们俩都需要达到 100%才有机会击败使徒。现在我们试试这个。明日香，去左边的垫子。绫波，你用右边的。好了。你们俩，戴上耳机。好了。准备好了吗？三，二，一！"

The rhythm was too familiar to Shinji, however the scene was at least disorientating. Rei and Asuka moved in sync, not much away from he and Asuka's best synchroneity. He felt confused, as Asuka and Misato, at first; there's something wrong about it, but he couldn't quite put his finger on it.  
节奏对真嗣来说太过熟悉，然而场景至少让他感到迷惑。绫波和明日香同步移动，与他和明日香的最佳同步度相差无几。他感到困惑，和起初的明日香与美里一样；总觉得有些不对劲，但他又说不上来具体是什么。

Misato watched the scene in utter disbelief as well. She'd never thought two persons with such antithetical personalities could work together so well.  
美里也难以置信地看着这一幕。她从未想过两个性格如此迥异的人能合作得这么好。

Shinji continued to stare at the unbelievable sight in front of him.  
真嗣继续盯着眼前这不可思议的景象。

Then Asuka made a misstep.  
随后，明日香犯了一个错误。

Rei did as well. 丽也做得很好。

The pilots temporarily ignored the minor deviance and continued dancing, but it didn't go unnoticed by Shinji, who was looking at them intently. Then, he thought of his first time syncing with Rei – they nailed it in one try as well.  
驾驶员们暂时忽略了这一细微偏差，继续跳舞，但这一幕并未逃过真嗣的眼睛，他正专注地观察着他们。随后，他想起了自己第一次与丽同步时的情景——他们也是一次就成功了。

His brain slowly started connecting the dots. When he was trying to sync with Asuka, it was always more of _him_ predicting _her_ movements, not the other way around. But Rei… she's not _predicting_ Asuka's movements. She was _mimicking_ them.  
他的大脑开始慢慢将这些线索串联起来。当他试图与明日香同步时，总是他在预测她的动作，而非反过来。但丽……她并没有在预测明日香的动作。她是在模仿她们。

Shinji watched them dancing for longer, paying close attention to Rei's behaviors. He soon found out that even though the two danced almost in perfect sync, Rei's movements were nearly always a split second later than Asuka's. Not the kind of delays the dance machine would recognize.  
真嗣继续观察着他们的舞蹈，特别留意了绫波的行为。他很快发现，尽管两人几乎完美同步，但绫波的动作总是比明日香慢上那么一瞬间。这不是舞蹈机器能识别的那种延迟。

Now it all made sense to him. Rei, being a half Angel, must've possessed inhuman perceptiveness and reflex. She _saw_ Asuka's movements and _replicated_ them. Just like how she did with him.  
现在这一切对他来说都解释得通了。作为半个使徒，绫波必定拥有超乎常人的感知力和反应速度。她观察明日香的动作并加以模仿，就像她对他所做的那样。

After the final beat of the music sounded, the scoreboard showed a 95 percent sync score. Asuka stared at Rei in utter disbelieve, while the blue-haired girl stood there indifferently. The silence lasted about ten seconds before Misato finally spoke up, "Well, that was...quite impressive. Keep up the work. I don't think you guys will need much effort to accomplish our goal, considering this is your first time doing it."  
随着音乐最后一个节拍响起，计分板上显示出了 95%的同步率。明日香难以置信地盯着绫波，而蓝发女孩则漠然地站在那里。沉默持续了大约十秒钟，直到美里终于开口，“嗯，这真是……相当令人印象深刻。继续努力。考虑到这是你们第一次尝试，我想你们达成目标不会费太多力气。”

"Look wondergirl! We just aced it!" Asuka exclaimed in joy; her grin quickly faded and turned into a frown after Rei completely ignored her enthusiasm and continued standing on the dance mat in silence.  
"看啊，奇迹女孩！我们刚刚完美过关了！" 明日香兴奋地喊道；她的笑容很快消失，转而皱起了眉头，因为绫波完全无视了她的热情，继续默默地站在跳舞垫上。

It reminded her of the doll.  
这让她想起了那个玩偶。

"Wondergirl?" Asuka probed. "Ayanami?" She added after getting no reaction whatsoever.  
"奇迹女孩？" 明日香试探性地问道。"绫波？" 她补充道，因为完全没有得到任何反应。

"Yes, Pilot Soryu?" Rei finally responded, fixing her gaze with the redhead.  
“是的，碇司令？”绫波终于回应道，目光与红发少女交汇。

“该死……我发誓，如果那是故意的——”

"Asuka!" Shinji interjected absentmindedly, "it's just who Ayanami is, so please-" the words came out without his brain processing it.  
“明日香！”真嗣不经意间插话道，“绫波就是这样的人，所以请——”这些话未经大脑便脱口而出。

"Oh, I see what this is," Asuka cut him off; Shinji's heart sunk as he saw how _hurt_ she looked. She turned to Shinji, "I thought we were a team…and now you're defending her! I'm done with this!" She snarled angrily and stormed out of the apartment, slamming the shut so hard that it bounced back partly opened.  
"哦，我明白了这是怎么回事，" 明日香打断了他；真嗣的心沉了下去，因为他看到她看起来多么受伤。她转向真嗣，"我以为我们是团队……现在你却在为她辩护！我受够了！" 她愤怒地咆哮着，冲出了公寓，用力甩门，以至于门反弹回来，半开着。

Shinji silently cursed at his carelessness, "I'll go after her!" He said to Rei and Misato before rushing to the door and slid his shoes on, running out as well.  
真嗣默默地咒骂自己的粗心，"我去追她！" 他对绫波和美里说，然后冲向门口，穿上鞋子，也跑了出去。

The convenience store was the place Shinji firstly went to; just like he expected, Asuka was crouched in front of the refrigerator case. He walked to her side and crouched down next to her. "Asuka…" he started.  
便利店是真嗣首先去的地方；正如他所料，明日香正蹲在冰箱前。他走到她身边，蹲下来。"明日香……" 他开口道。

"Go away, Baka-Shinji," said Asuka in a low voice. "I don't want to talk to you right now…"

"Asuka, there's life outside of EVA and Angels, wouldn't you say?" Shinji smiled, putting his hand over hers, "you don't need to rely on it for anything. Piloting EVA to defeat the Angels, I mean. He paused for a second, locking his gaze with the redhead, "even if you don't want to be my…friend, we're still a team."

Asuka's heart fluttered hearing his words. Compared to Shinji, she piloted the EVA for more selfish reasons. Maybe she could change, just like how he did? _'Why does he make a difference? I've never felt like this before!'_ "Who said I don't?" She smirked.  
"听到他的话，明日香的心跳加速了。与真嗣相比，她驾驶 EVA 更多是出于自私的理由。也许她也能像他那样改变？'为什么他会让我感觉不同？我以前从未有过这种感觉！' “谁说我不能？”她得意地笑了。”

"I'm glad," Shinji's smile turned into a grin.  
"“我很高兴，”真嗣的微笑变成了咧嘴笑。”

"Now give me my bags, I picked it out, I can carry it myself!" Asuka grabbed the bags from Shinji, who took a bag back. "If we're friends, then we can each carry a bag, Asuka," said Shinji with his warm smile. "You don't have to do everything on your own, right?"  
"“现在把我的包给我，是我挑的，我自己能拿！”明日香从真嗣手中夺过包，真嗣也拿回了一个。“如果我们是朋友，那我们可以各自拿一个包，明日香，”真嗣带着温暖的微笑说。“你不必什么事都自己来，对吧？””

Asuka looked at Shinji and said nothing, but her smile had widened a bit. _'Do I truly need to be alone?'_  
明日香看着真嗣，一言不发，但她的笑容稍稍扩大了些。'我真的需要独自一人吗？'
