The rest of their training session went comparatively uneventfully; there wasn't really anything to put the effort in since their synchronization was almost perfect from the very beginning. In fact, Asuka put more effort into not blow up at Rei than practice the dance.  
他们训练的其余部分相对平静无事；由于从一开始他们的同步率就几乎完美，实际上并没有什么需要特别努力的地方。事实上，明日香在避免对绫波发火上投入的精力比练习舞蹈还要多。

The day before the battle quickly came.  
战斗前的那一天很快到来了。

Asuka's icy blue eyes shot open. It was the same dream as before. It was always the same dream. Her sheets were soaked with sweat, and her clothes were drenched. She laid there for a moment, wondering if sleeping by Rei's side was indeed a good idea.  
明日香冰蓝色的眼睛猛地睁开。又是那个梦，和之前一样的梦，总是同样的梦。她的床单被汗水浸透，衣服也湿透了。她躺在那里片刻，思索着睡在丽身边是否真的是个好主意。

Asuka looked down at her shirt and panties, knowing that she'd have to change them since they were so drenched. She leaned up from her bed and grabbed a clean pair of underwear and the sleep shirt she wore the night before out of her dresser. She quickly got a change of clothes, making sure she didn't wake up Rei, and laid back down.  
明日香低头看着自己的衬衫和内裤，知道必须得换掉，因为它们湿透了。她从床上坐起，从抽屉里拿出一套干净的内衣和昨晚穿的睡衣。她迅速换了衣服，确保没有吵醒丽，然后又躺了回去。

But sleep wouldn't come. The blue-haired girl constantly reminded her of the doll…and fueling her nightmare. Even though she had company by her side, the loneliness was chewing her alive.  
但睡意并未降临。蓝发女孩不断让她想起那个玩偶……加剧了她的噩梦。尽管身边有人陪伴，孤独感却如猛兽般吞噬着她。

_'It's always been normal for me to be alone… so being alone shouldn't bother me…'  
“一直以来，独自一人对我来说是常态……所以孤独不应该困扰我……”_

Asuka sighed heavily and got up from her futon again, walking to the closet Shinji was sleeping in. She carefully opened the door and looked inside. The room was so small to the extent she could touch both sides of the wall at the same time. A wave of guilt suddenly surged through her - she was the reason Shinji got shoved in here.  
明日香重重地叹了口气，再次从她的被褥上起身，走向真嗣正在睡觉的壁橱。她小心翼翼地打开门，向里面望去。这个房间小到她可以同时触碰到两边的墙壁。一股愧疚感突然涌上心头——真嗣被塞进这里都是因为她。

Asuka walked to his bed and laid down abruptly, her back facing Shinji's. A sudden gasp could be heard from the said boy.  
明日香走到他的床边，猛地躺下，背对着真嗣。突然，可以听到那个男孩发出了一声惊呼。

"Don't turn around," she hastily said, "Can I just lay here for a while? I… wouldn't mind some company tonight."  
"别转身，" 她急忙说道，"我可以在这里躺一会儿吗？我……今晚不介意有人陪伴。"

Shinji blinked in surprise. Before she would usually give him hits with the 'Wall of Jericho' reference, but now…she became rather direct with her needs. He had no idea of what changed, but he was sure it was a good change.  
真嗣惊讶地眨了眨眼。以前她通常会用'耶利哥城墙'的典故来调侃他，但现在……她变得相当直接地表达自己的需求。他不知道是什么改变了，但他确信这是一个好的变化。

"Sure, come to me if you're lonely. Just…don't hog my blanket."  
"当然，如果你感到孤独就过来吧。只是……别霸占我的毯子。"

Asuka felt tightness in her chest. During the month they lived together, although Shinji tended to push her and annoy her, he did nothing but took care of her. What had she done? Nothing but lazing around, leaving all the chores to him unless it's indispensable.  
明日香感到胸口一阵紧缩。在他们同居的那个月里，尽管真嗣总是推搡她、惹她生气，但他所做的无非是照顾她。她又做了什么呢？除了懒散度日，把所有家务都推给他，除非万不得已。

What did she do to earn his warmth and company?  
她究竟做了什么，才换来他的温暖与陪伴？

Nevertheless, she quickly fell asleep with a slight smile on her face.  
尽管如此，她很快便带着一丝微笑沉沉睡去。

XXXXXX

"Unit 00, are you ready?" Misato's voice echoed through the First Child's entry plug. "Yes." Rei replied casually. "Unit 02, are you ready?" "You better believe I am!" Asuka's enthusiasm brought a smile to the face of everyone in the control room, save for Fuyutsuki. Last night's sleep was the best she had in a while. Even more so when her nightmare started to resurface, there was a voice there, comforting her, wiping away the bad dream, telling her she didn't need to be alone.  
"“零号机，准备好了吗？”美里少校的声音在第一适格者的插入栓内回响。“是的。”绫波平静地回答。“二号机，准备好了吗？”“你最好相信我准备好了！”明日香的热情让控制室里的每个人都露出了微笑，除了冬月。昨晚是她一段时间以来睡得最好的一次。更让她感到安慰的是，当她的噩梦开始重现时，有一个声音在那里，安慰她，驱散了噩梦，告诉她不必孤单。”

And she knew she had a specific person to thank for.  
"而她知道，有一个人她特别需要感谢。”

"Good." Captain Katsuragi nodded. "Just remember your choreography and everything should be fine."  
“很好。”葛城队长点头道，“只要记住你的动作编排，一切都会顺利的。”

"Oh, by the way." Ritsuko leaned over Misato's shoulder and spoke into the microphone. "You two have increased your average sync scores by five percent. Asuka, you're gonna catch up to Shinji in no time if you keep this up."  
"哦，顺便说一句。" 律子俯身在美里肩上，对着麦克风说道。"你们俩的平均同步率提高了五个百分点。明日香，照这样下去，你很快就会赶上真嗣了。"

"Woo, does this mean I'm going to be the best?" Asuka boasted, although her focus less so on the scores, and more so on the imminent battle. After defeating the Angel, she would surpass the invincible Shinji-sama in every way. The exciting thought made her grew increasingly impatient about the incoming fight.  
"哇哦，这是不是意味着我会成为最棒的？" 明日香自夸道，尽管她的注意力更多地集中在即将到来的战斗上，而不是分数。击败使徒后，她将在各个方面超越无敌的真嗣大人。这个令人兴奋的想法让她对即将到来的战斗越来越不耐烦。

"Captain Katsuragi!" Maya called. "The Seventh Angel is approaching!" "Perfect." She made a sly grin. "EVA Units Launch!"  
"葛城指挥官！" 伊吹呼叫道。"第七使徒正在接近！" "太好了。" 她狡黠地一笑。"EVA 机体，出击！"

As their launch platforms shot out from the cages, Asuka and Rei could hear the music running through their heads. They would be doing this without their umbilical cords, and there was only a 62 second window for them to complete the mission, so they had to act with perfect synchronization and precision. Once the platforms reached the surface, both Unit 00 and 02 shot up into the air, catching a glimpse of the Angel lurking below in the reinforced Tokyo-3. Acting as one, the two EVA pilots reached for the spears in their right shoulder pylon and withdrew them, chucking both downwards onto the Angel, splitting him down the middle, causing Alpha and Beta to take their two separate forms.  
随着发射平台从笼中弹射而出，明日香和绫波能听到脑海中回响的音乐。她们将在此刻脱离脐带电缆，仅有 62 秒的时间完成任务，因此必须以完美的同步与精确行动。平台一到达水面，零号机与二号机便腾空而起，瞥见了藏匿于加固的第三新东京市下的使徒。两位 EVA 驾驶员如一体般同步，伸手从右肩挂架上取下长矛并抽出，将两支矛向下投掷，贯穿使徒，使其一分为二，呈现出阿尔法与贝塔两种形态。

Upon landing, both pilots looked to their sides to see the weapons that had been readied for them. Rei gathered the attention of Alpha with her rifle while Asuka opened fire onto Beta using the canon. Once they had picked agro from them, the two EVA Units discarded their weapons as Alpha and Beta fired lasers at them from their elongated fingers. Each blast came to barely miss their target though, as Unit 00 and 02 made perfect backflips for each shot fired at them as they retreated towards the center of the city.  
着陆后，两位驾驶员各自侧目，看到了为他们准备好的武器。丽用步枪吸引了阿尔法的注意，而明日香则用加农炮向贝塔开火。一旦从它们那里拉到了仇恨，两台 EVA 单位便丢弃了武器，阿尔法和贝塔从它们伸长的手指中发射激光攻击。尽管每次爆炸都险些击中目标，但零号机和二号机每次都以完美的后空翻躲过，撤退至城市中心。

Shinji watched the battle intently; at first, it seemed to be going well, but there's something not right.  
真嗣专注地观看着战斗；起初，一切似乎进展顺利，但总觉得有些不对劲。

Knowing that the battle was coming to a close, the two EVA Units leaped high up into the air and began diving towards the Angel in a corkscrew motion and then flipping forward as Unit 00 extended its right leg out for a kick, while Unit 02 extended its left.  
意识到战斗即将结束，两台 EVA 单位高高跃起，开始以螺旋状俯冲向使徒，随后零号机伸出右腿，二号机伸出左腿，向前翻转进行踢击。

With a vicious impact, both feet landed on the cores.  
随着猛烈的冲击，双脚同时落在了核心上。

But what happened next was unexpected by anyone.  
但接下来发生的事情出乎所有人的意料。

"What the fuck?!" Asuka cried incredulously as both halves of Israfel stood their ground. "We destroyed both cores at the same time, didn't we?!"  
"“搞什么鬼？！”明日香难以置信地喊道，伊斯拉菲尔的两半依然屹立不倒。“我们同时摧毁了两个核心，不是吗？！”

As the fight came to an end, Shinji finally realized the most significant wrinkle in the plan.  
随着战斗接近尾声，真嗣终于意识到了计划中最大的变数。

The difference in Asuka and Rei's sync rates.  
明日香和绫波同步率的不同。

The higher your sync rate was, the lower the latency for your EVA to respond to your commands. While Shinji and Asuka's sync rates were always in the high 70s or 80s when they fought the Angel, Rei and Asuka had a sync rate difference of almost 40 percent, leading to 0.4 seconds of delay, added that Rei had to _watch_ Asuka's movements first, it only amplified the latency between their supposedly simultaneous movements.  
同步率越高，EVA 响应指令的延迟就越低。虽然真嗣和明日香在对抗使徒时同步率通常在 70%到 80%之间，但绫波和明日香的同步率差距近 40%，导致有 0.4 秒的延迟，再加上绫波必须先观察明日香的动作，这使得她们本应同步的动作之间延迟更加明显。

The latency only accumulated throughout the entire battle. Half a second was enough for Israfel to regenerate.  
延迟在整个战斗过程中不断累积。半秒钟的时间已足够伊斯拉斐尔进行再生。

The music ended, leaving everyone dumbfounded, including Rei Ayanami.  
音乐结束，所有人都目瞪口呆，包括绫波零。

Taking advantage of Asuka's moment of distraction, target Alpha and Beta grabbed the crimson EVA Unit, lifting it into the air. However, this time Israfel wasn't going soft on its enemy. "Put me down you-"  
趁明日香分神之际，目标阿尔法和贝塔抓住了绯红的 EVA 初号机，将其举向空中。然而，这一次伊斯拉斐尔并未对敌人手下留情。“把我放下，你这——”

CRACK

"OH MY GOD! HER SPINAL COLUMN HAS JUST BEEN BROKEN!" Maya shouted as she saw the readings, "Unit 02 has gone silent! Pilot status is unknown!"  
"我的天哪！她的脊柱刚刚断裂了！" 玛雅喊道，她看到了读数，"二号机已经沉默！驾驶员状况不明！"

Not any softer for Unit 00 as both halves of Israfel fired their beams in unison at the center of its chest, melting the heavy armor plating in an instant.  
零号机也没有好到哪里去，伊斯拉斐尔的两半同时发射光束，直击其胸口中央，瞬间融化了厚重的装甲板。

"Unit 00 has gone silent as well!" Aoba reported in a shaky voice.  
"零号机也沉默了！" 青叶用颤抖的声音报告道。

Gendo Ikari watched the battle with an almost invisible frown, his hands clasped together tightly.  
碇源堂凝视着战斗，几乎看不见地皱了皱眉，双手紧紧相扣。

Shinji's eyes went wide, sweat dripping down from his forehead, his heart racing. Without instruction, he rushed to the EVA cages.  
真嗣的眼睛瞪得大大的，汗水从额头滴落，心跳加速。未经指示，他便冲向了 EVA 的笼子。

Israfel continued to roar in triumph atop the Geofront, a broken setting sun framed behind it.  
伊斯拉斐尔继续在 GEO 前线顶端咆哮着胜利，破碎的夕阳在其背后映衬。

XXXXXX

AN: I know Israfel doesn't really roar, but it fits the scene. Stay tuned and leave a review!  
作者注：我知道伊斯拉斐尔其实不会咆哮，但这样符合场景。敬请期待，并留下您的评论！

## *Chapter 9*: Chapter 9: Consequences  
*第九章*: 第九章：后果

Disclaimer: I do not own Evangelion. Explicit depiction of violence ahead. You've been warned.  
免责声明：我不拥有《新世纪福音战士》。前方包含暴力露骨描写，请谨慎阅读。

**Chapter 9: Consequences 第九章：后果**

"Shinji, you're our last hope," Misato said over the comm, her voice strangely calm considering the grim situation. "We, Asuka, Rei, the entire humanity, are all counting on you, I know you can do it."  
“真嗣，你是我们最后的希望，”美里在通讯中说道，她的声音异常平静，考虑到严峻的局势。“我们，明日香，绫波，全人类，都在依靠你，我知道你能做到。”

"I know," Shinji replied, gripping the controls of his EVA so tight that the plastic began to creak. Still, it's easier said than done. Israfel had always required two Evangelions to defeat, but now only Unit 01 was left, not to mention the damage it suffered from Ramiel – its left forearm was missing, and the chest armor was still damaged - hadn't been completely fixed yet.  
“我知道，”真嗣回答道，紧握着 EVA 的操纵杆，以至于塑料开始吱吱作响。尽管如此，说起来容易做起来难。伊斯兰一直以来都需要两台 EVA 才能击败，但现在只剩下初号机了，更不用说它从雷米尔那里受到的伤害——左前臂缺失，胸甲仍然受损——还没有完全修复。

He had no idea of how to fight it, except that he needed to break two cores at the same time.  
他不知道如何与之战斗，只知道他需要同时破坏两个核心。

There's no way to set off another N2 mine to slow down the Angel - they were almost directly above the Geofront, an N2 strike powerful enough to buy the time they needed would also wholly destroy NERV HQ, Tokyo-3 with its residents, as well as the silenced Unit 02 and Unit 00. Still, it was the last reserve.  
无法再引爆另一颗 N2 地雷来延缓使徒的行动——它们几乎直接位于地表之下，一颗足以争取所需时间的强力 N2 打击同样会彻底摧毁 NERV 总部、东京-3 及其居民，以及沉默的二号机和零号机。不过，这是最后的预备手段。

Not that Shinji would still want to have anything to do with this world if it really came to that.  
如果真的到了那一步，真嗣也不会再想与这个世界有任何瓜葛。

"Misato, what's Asuka's status?"  
“美里，明日香的情况如何？”

"Unknow, her entry plug is ejected. We're sending out a retrieval team to crash site," the Captain's words soothed his worries a little. As long as there's still a chance that she's alive, then he still had a reason to fight.  
“不明，她的驾驶舱被弹出。我们正派遣回收队伍前往坠机地点，”舰长的这番话稍稍安抚了他的担忧。只要还有她生还的可能，那么他就有继续战斗的理由。

Still, the Angel hurt Asuka, the girl he loved and promised to protect. He felt anger surge through his body at the thought. Shinji pushed the controls forward, willing his EVA to sprint toward the enemy. Israfel, now returned to its original form, stopped roaring and focused on its newest enemy. Unit 01 reached for its left shoulder pylon and picked up the progressive knife, charging at the Angel.  
尽管如此，天使伤害了 Asuka，他深爱并承诺保护的女孩。想到这里，他感到愤怒在体内涌动。Shinji 向前推动操纵杆，命令他的 EVA 向敌人冲刺。Israfel 恢复了原形，停止咆哮，专注于新的对手。初号机伸手抓住左肩支架，拾起高频刀，向天使发起冲锋。

Israfel blinked in confusion at the seemingly suicidal attack of its opponent, but soon prepared itself for defense. Maybe if he didn't slice it in half, he could find a way to defeat it. Shinji controlled Unit 01 jumped onto a building, trying to lure it away from the girls. His plan worked as the Angel lifted itself up using its AT-Field, leaping toward the purple EVA Unit.  
Israfel 对对手这看似自杀式的攻击感到困惑，但很快做好了防御准备。或许即使不能将其一分为二，他也能找到击败它的方法。Shinji 操控初号机跳上一栋建筑，试图将其引离女孩们。他的计划奏效了，天使利用 AT 力场将自己抬起，向紫色 EVA 单位跃去。

Shinji jumped away from the weaponry building just in time before Israfel crashed onto it, reducing the heavily armored construction into thousands of tons of rubble and debris of steel and concrete. Shinji was surprised to find the Angel seemed to be momentarily stuck in the ruins; utilizing the short period of its immobile state, before the Angel could use its AT-Field to shake off the wreckage, Shinji controlled Unit 01 dashed toward Israfel. Upon entering close-quarters combat distance, he activated his EVA's AT-Field, neutralizing the Angel's, and sank the prog knife into its grey flesh.  
真嗣刚从武器库建筑旁跳开，伊斯拉斐尔就猛地撞了上去，将这座重装甲建筑化为成千上万吨的钢铁和混凝土碎块。真嗣惊讶地发现，天使似乎暂时被困在了废墟中；他利用这短暂的静止状态，在天使能用 AT 力场甩开残骸之前，操控初号机冲向伊斯拉斐尔。进入近战距离后，他激活了 EVA 的 AT 力场，中和了天使的力场，并将高振动粒子刀刺入其灰色的肉体。

The Angel shrieked in pain and raised its horn-like arms, trying to push the purple mecha off. Unit 01 stood its ground however; instead of slicing the Angel that might cause it to split again, Shinji spun and twisted the knife back and forth, digging deeper and deeper into its body, hoping to locate the cores. Fortunately Israfel was weak in physical strength compared to - say, Zeruel – so the thrashing around of the Angel couldn't help it get rid of the purple behemoth.  
天使痛苦地尖叫起来，抬起它那角状的手臂，试图推开紫色的机甲。然而，初号机屹立不倒；真嗣没有选择劈砍天使，以免它再次分裂，而是旋转并扭动刀刃，越刺越深，希望能找到核心。幸运的是，伊斯拉斐尔在体力上比不上——比如说，塞鲁尔——所以天使的挣扎无法帮助它摆脱紫色巨人。

Now the disadvantage of missing a forearm fully revealed itself. Even though Shinji was gaining the upper hand in the fight, he could only inflict regeneratable injuries on the Angel. He wanted to open up the knife wound on Israfel's chest in order to find the cores, so another arm was indispensable.  
现在，失去前臂的劣势完全显现出来了。尽管真嗣在战斗中逐渐占据上风，但他只能对使徒造成可再生的伤害。他想要打开伊斯拉斐尔胸前的刀伤以找到核心，因此另一只手臂是不可或缺的。

Suddenly the Angel stopped struggling; just as Shinji thought it gave up fighting, Israfel split in half by itself.  
突然，使徒停止了挣扎；正当真嗣以为它放弃了战斗时，伊斯拉斐尔自行分裂成了两半。

"Okay that's fucking cheating," Shinji cursed in surprise and vexation.  
“好吧，这他妈的是作弊，”真嗣又惊又恼地咒骂道。

The two halves of Israfel quickly reclaimed the upper hand after a synchronized punch to both of Unit 01's sides. Shinji groaned in pain and jumped back from the twins, knowing how dangerous it was fighting in close quarters against them. To his relief, the two halves merged back into one as soon as Unit 01 hid behind a building - outside of its line of sight.  
伊斯莱尔的两个分身在同步向零号机两侧打出重拳后迅速夺回了优势。真嗣痛苦地呻吟着，从双胞胎面前跳开，深知与他们在近距离战斗有多危险。令他松一口气的是，零号机刚躲到建筑物后，两个分身便立即合二为一——超出了它的视线范围。

The Angel continued marching slowly toward the Geofront after it deemed the threat was neutralized. Finally, it stopped right above the place where Ramiel drilled at, its yin-yang-like eye glowed; a powerful beam shot out, impacting the ground and created a huge crater, raising a cloud of dust and dirt.  
天使在判定威胁被消除后，继续缓慢地向 Geofront 进发。最终，它停在了拉米尔钻探地点的正上方，其阴阳眼般的眼睛闪烁着光芒；一道强大的光束射出，击中地面并形成了一个巨大的弹坑，扬起了一片尘土。

"No you're not doing it!" Shinji shouted and willed his EVA forward, gripping his prog knife tightly. He leaped into the air, pouncing on the Angel. Just as his knife was about to hit the target, the Angel suddenly split in half again; Unit 01 missed its target as it went through the gap between target Alpha and Beta, slamming hard on the ground.  
“不，你不能这么做！”真嗣大喊着，操控他的 EVA 前进，紧紧握住手中的突击刀。他一跃而起，扑向天使。就在刀尖即将命中目标之际，天使突然再次分裂；零号机穿过阿尔法和贝塔之间的空隙，重重地摔在地上，未能击中目标。

Before Shinji could get back on his feet and recompose himself from the mild concussion caused by the heavy impact, the Israfel twins - apparently annoyed by the persistent purple mecha – decided to end it once and for all.  
在真嗣还没能从那次重击造成的轻微脑震荡中恢复过来，重新站稳脚跟之前，伊斯拉斐尔双胞胎——显然是被那台顽固的紫色机体惹恼了——决定一劳永逸地结束这一切。

Both halves of Israfel fired a simultaneous beam at Unit 01's chest, completely destroying its already damaged chest armor. The gold half grabbed the purple EVA's upper torso while the silver one gripped on both of Unit 01's legs, and then they started to pull hard.  
伊斯拉斐尔的两部分同时向初号机的胸部发射了光束，彻底摧毁了它本已受损的胸甲。金色部分抓住了紫色 EVA 的上半身，而银色部分则紧握住初号机的双腿，然后他们开始用力拉扯。

Everyone on the command deck watched in dread as Unit 01's body was stretched to its deformation limit, the sound of metal cracking and moaning under extreme stress echoed through NERV HQ.  
指挥舱内的每个人都惊恐地看着初号机的身体被拉扯到变形的极限，金属在极度压力下发出的断裂和呻吟声在 NERV 总部回荡。

Shinji screamed in agony as he felt his body was about to be torn apart. However he didn't have the ability to divide in half and continue to fight. He would never stand a chance with his current power, all of his professional combat skills notwithstanding; he was already risking a lot just by moving in ways that the designers of the Evangelions didn't dare to think of, breaking several laws of physics in the process. Still, it wasn't enough.  
真嗣痛苦地尖叫着，感觉自己的身体即将被撕裂。然而，他并没有能力一分为二继续战斗。以他目前的实力，即便拥有所有的专业战斗技能，也毫无胜算；他已经在冒险以使徒设计者们不敢想象的方式移动，过程中打破了多条物理定律。即便如此，这还不够。

He needed help…and fast. 他需要帮助……而且要快。

_Mother… 母亲…_

His vision went white.  
他的视野变得一片空白。

Whenever he actively called for help from his mother, Shinji would always experience a very short – in people outside of Unit 01's eyes - and small-scale instrumentality with the EVA. In fact, he hadn't done this for a while since he had already mastered fighting the Angels without needing her help.  
每当他主动向母亲寻求帮助时，真嗣总会与初号机一同经历一段在旁人看来极为短暂且规模有限的融合现象。实际上，自从他掌握了无需母亲协助就能对抗使徒的战斗技巧后，已经有一段时间没有这样做了。

Things had changed. 情况已经发生了变化。

_Mother? 妈妈？_

_Surprise. Confusion. 惊讶。困惑。_

Shinji looked intently at the white void around him, focusing on his thoughts. Another reason he never liked actively calling for her mother was the fact that he didn't know _whether he should_ know about her mother's whereabouts or not.  
真嗣专注地看着周围的白色虚空，集中思考。他不喜欢主动呼唤她妈妈的原因之一，是他不确定自己是否应该知道她妈妈在哪里。

Fortunately, Shinji already had the answer.  
幸运的是，真嗣已经有了答案。

_Mother…is that really you?  
母亲…真的是你吗？_

_'Shinji?' ‘真嗣？’_

_Mother… it's Shinji. 妈妈… 是真嗣。_

_'Shinji…how… you're really here. My son…how do you know I'm here?'  
'真嗣…怎么…你真的在这里。我的儿子…你怎么知道我在这里？'_

_I…I would never forget that day…when you disappeared from my life.  
我…我永远不会忘记那一天…当你从我的生活中消失。_

He could feel a wave of emotions surge through his body – sadness, surprise, and remorse.  
他可以感受到一波情绪涌遍全身——悲伤、惊讶和悔恨。

_'Shinji…I wondered if you'd ever find me here. I brought you there to see the contact experiment, hoping you could remember me. I'm so happy to see you here…'  
'真嗣……我在想你是否会找到我这里。我带你去看了接触实验，希望你能记起我。看到你在这里，我真的很高兴……'_

Shinji wanted to laugh. When he'd first learned about his mother's whereabouts, he was so happy that his mother was still somehow alive and watching over him all the time. However, after several more cycles, he quickly learned that his mother had her own plans to end the world.  
真嗣想笑。当他最初得知母亲的下落时，他非常高兴，因为母亲仍然以某种方式活着，并一直在关注着他。然而，经过几个循环之后，他很快意识到母亲有自己的计划来结束这个世界。

She willingly became the soul inside Unit 01 for several reasons; aside from wanting her son to be safe when the judgment day came, she also hoped to use the EVA as evidence that humanity existed. For her to do that, the EVA must _truly_ awaken and summon the Lance of Longinus, which usually led to the Third Impact.  
她自愿成为零号机内的灵魂，有多个原因；除了希望在审判日到来时保护儿子的安全外，她还希望利用 EVA 作为人类存在的证据。为此，EVA 必须真正觉醒并召唤朗基努斯之枪，这通常会导致第三次冲击的发生。

He could've accepted her mother's own plan…if she helped him that time…  
如果当时她帮助了他，他本可以接受母亲的计划…

_"Mother! Help me! I need to help Asuka! Please!" Shinji cried desperately at Unit 01 that was frozen in bakelite.  
“妈妈！救我！我得去帮明日香！求你了！”真嗣绝望地对着被封在树脂中的初号机喊道。_

_But it wouldn't move until the scream of Asuka finally died down, who kept believing Shinji, her knight in shining armor, would come and save her, till the last moment of her life.  
但初号机直到明日香的尖叫声最终消逝才有所动作，她一直坚信着，她的骑士，身披闪亮盔甲的真嗣，会在生命的最后一刻前来拯救她。_

He didn't need to expose himself to his mother right now, so Shinji shook the thought off as soon as it surfaced. Still, he couldn't help but feel anger rise. Toward her mother.  
他现在不需要向母亲坦露心迹，所以真嗣一产生这个念头就立刻甩开了。然而，他还是忍不住感到愤怒在升腾。对她的母亲。

_Mother…why did you leave me? Why?!  
妈妈……你为什么要离开我？为什么？！_

_'I'm sorry, Shinji. But I had to do this, or they'll erase me… I'm here to ensure the brighter future I promised you.'  
'对不起，真嗣。但我必须这么做，否则他们会抹去我……我在这里是为了确保我承诺给你的更美好的未来。'_

He could clearly feel the sorrow in his mother's voice. Shinji snorted internally - she'd always say the same thing. It didn't matter whether she really thought of that; he had a more critical task at hand. _Mother…will you help me? To defeat the Angel?_  
他清楚地感受到母亲声音中的悲伤。真嗣内心冷笑——她总是说同样的话。无论她是否真的这么想，这都不重要；他手头有一个更关键的任务。妈妈……你会帮我吗？去打败使徒？

_'Anything for you, my love.'  
'为了你，我的爱，什么都愿意。'_

Shinji barely held back his sneer as he heard the hypocritical words. Nevertheless, he could feel the warmth of LCL around him and almost animalistic power course through his body after he reopened his eyes.  
听到这些虚伪的话语，真嗣几乎忍不住要嗤之以鼻。然而，当他再次睁开眼睛时，他能感受到 LCL 环绕在身边的温暖，以及体内涌动的近乎野性的力量。

On the battlefield, Unit 01's jaw joints cracked; the purple beast held its head high and roared.  
战场上，初号机的下颚关节咔咔作响；那紫色的巨兽昂首咆哮。

"Captain, Pilot Ikari's sync rate is rising fast! 85, 90, 95!" Maya reported in haste, "his synchrograph is all over the place!"  
“舰长，碇真嗣的同步率正在快速上升！85，90，95！”摩耶急忙报告，“他的同步图谱完全乱了！”

"Berserk?" Dr. Akagi asked worriedly.  
"暴走？" 赤城博士担忧地问道。

"No! The pilot is in full control!" Aoba shouted in disbelief. "The AT-Field output of Unit 01 has just quintupled!"  
"不！驾驶员完全掌控着局面！" 青叶难以置信地喊道，"初号机的 AT 力场输出刚刚翻了五倍！"

Several hundred meters above them, Unit 01 uncurled its AT-Field in the form of a blast. The Israfel twins hastily raised their own AT-Field, but instantly shattered like substandard glass. Without the protection of the force field, target Alpha and Beta were pushed away from Unit 01 by the powerful explosion, crashing into and destroying several armored buildings along the way.  
在它们上方数百米处，初号机以冲击波的形式展开了 AT 力场。伊斯兰双胞胎急忙提升自己的 AT 力场，却瞬间如同劣质玻璃般破碎。失去了力场保护，目标阿尔法和贝塔被强大的爆炸力从初号机旁推开，沿途撞毁了数座装甲建筑。

Both halves of Israfel struggled back on their feet and jumped back together, merging into one body again. The Angel expanded its AT-Field one more time; its strength quadrupled instead of the simple addition of the AT-Fields of two halves. Nonetheless, its power was nowhere near Unit 01 under a near-berserk state. Two AT-Fields clashed together, making the ground shake under the enormous force.  
伊斯拉斐尔的两半身体挣扎着重新站起，然后一起跳开，再次合二为一。天使再次扩张其 AT 力场；其力量不是简单的两半 AT 力场的相加，而是四倍增强。尽管如此，它的力量远不及近乎狂暴状态的初号机。两个 AT 力场碰撞在一起，巨大的力量使得地面震动。

"Is this all you've got?!" Shinji scoffed, pushing his AT-Field forward, neutralizing the Angel's. Unit 01 leaped into the sky and landed on top of Israfel, using its prog knife to cut one of its horn-like arms off. The purple behemoth picked up the body part and placed it over its missing left forearm, its cells bonding with it and growing around it to form a fully fleshed and unarmored arm. It flexed its hand, cracking all of its newly developed digits as it did so. With a new limb, the Evangelion rose its gaze towards the Angel and opened its great maw as it made a bloodcurdling roar that turned everyone on the command deck's blood to ice.  
“你就这点本事吗？！”真嗣嗤之以鼻，推动自己的 AT 力场，中和了天使的力场。初号机一跃而起，落在伊斯拉斐尔的上方，用高振动粒子刀切下它一只角状的手臂。紫色巨人捡起那部分肢体，将其覆盖在缺失的左前臂上，细胞与之结合并围绕其生长，形成一只完全成形且无装甲的手臂。它弯曲着新生的手，活动着新长出的手指，发出噼啪声。有了新的肢体，福音战士抬起头，对着天使张开巨口，发出令人毛骨悚然的咆哮，让指挥舱内的每个人都感到血液凝固。

Shinji pulled out the other prog knife as well - one at each hand - as the Angel regenerated its own arm. He sneered at the sight, "let me see how fast you can regenerate."  
真嗣也拔出了另一把高振动粒子刀——一手一把——此时使徒正在再生它的手臂。他对此嗤之以鼻，“让我看看你能多快再生。”

With a twisted grin, Shinji maneuvered Unit 01 pounced on the Angel, wielding both of its prog knives. The purple beast crouched over Israfel, firmly suppressing it, and began brutally cutting, slicing, and chopping. The Angel shrieked in excruciating pain as pieces of its grey flesh were forcibly removed from its body, tons of LCL bursting out from the gigantic wounds.  
带着扭曲的笑容，真嗣操控初号机扑向使徒，双持高振动粒子刀。紫色巨人压在伊斯拉斐尔上方，牢牢压制住它，开始残忍地切割、劈砍。使徒发出撕心裂肺的惨叫，灰色的肉块被强行从身上剥离，大量 LCL 从巨大的伤口中喷涌而出。

People on the command deck tried their best to contain the shakings as the battle displayed on the big screen. More so for Maya Ibuki, who was responsible for monitoring Evangelion Units' vital signs, the readings of Unit 01 and its pilot _intimidated_ her. She had never seen anything like this ever before; she had heard from Akagi-Senpai that a berserk EVA could produce something alike. But right now, the Unit seemed to be perfectly under control of the pilot with an unbelievably high sync rate of 150 percent. To make things worse, she never saw such readings from a pilot. The readings, no matter how hard it was to believe, were indicating whoever inside Unit 01 was a raging beast.  
指挥甲板上的人们竭尽全力控制着因大屏幕上战斗而引起的震动。尤其是负责监控 EVA 机体生命体征的伊吹玛雅，零号机和其驾驶员的读数令她心生畏惧。她从未见过这样的情景；她曾听赤木前辈说过，狂暴的 EVA 可能会产生类似的现象。但此刻，这台机体似乎完全受驾驶员控制，同步率高达不可思议的 150%。更糟糕的是，她从未见过如此异常的驾驶员读数。这些读数，无论多么难以置信，都在表明零号机内的存在是一头狂暴的野兽。

Unit 01 was not just _fighting_ the Angel. It was _destroying_ it.  
零号机不仅仅是在与使徒战斗。它是在摧毁它。

Only one thought remained in Shinji's mind as he slaughtered the Angel.  
在屠戮使徒的过程中，真嗣心中只有一个念头。

_'You hurt Asuka' "“你伤害了明日香”_

Each and every limb on the Angel's body was being mercilessly sliced off within seconds of its reemergence. The Angel tried to split in half to escape the brutal murder, but the power needed to keep regenerating the lost flesh alone was enough to drain the S2 engine. If it forced itself to use more energy to separate, its own body would collapse first.  
天使的每一肢体在重现的瞬间便被无情地切割殆尽。天使试图分裂自身以逃脱这残酷的屠杀，但仅是维持再生失去的肉体所需的能量就足以耗尽 S2 引擎。若它强行使用更多能量来分离，其自身躯体将首先崩溃。

The battle was already over.  
战斗已然结束。

Shinji could vaguely see the two shining red cores as the Angel's was reduced to one-third of its original size, its regenerating rate failed to keep up with how fast it was losing flesh. 真嗣隐约能看到两个闪着红光的核，随着使徒的体积被削减至原来的三分之一，其再生速度已跟不上肉体消逝的迅猛。随着最后一记猛烈的切割，隐藏在伊斯拉斐尔体内的两个核心暴露无遗，真嗣同时将两把 prog 刀刺入其中。

The Angel screamed before it exploded into a giant cross. Unit 01 stood in the middle of a sea of blood, roaring triumphantly at the sky.  
使徒尖叫着，随后爆炸成一个巨大的十字形。初号机矗立在血海之中，对着天空发出胜利的咆哮。

"Is this… EVA's true form?" Ritsuko Akagi mumbled to herself, her expression screamed the word 'dread'. "Wha-what kind of beast did we create?" '_Is this also part of your scenario, Gendo?'_  
"“这难道是……EVA 的真正形态？”赤木律子喃喃自语，脸上写满了‘恐惧’二字。“我们究竟创造出了什么样的怪物？”“这也是你的剧本之一吗，碇？”

Inside the dark office, an almost invisible smirk crept up Gendo Ikari's face.  
在昏暗的办公室内，碇源堂的脸上浮现出一抹几乎难以察觉的冷笑。

"A-Angel neutralized," Maya reported in a shaky voice, "Unit 01 has shut down. The pilot vitals is returning back to normal."  
"A-天使已中和，" 真希波用颤抖的声音报告，"初号机已关闭。驾驶员生命体征正在恢复正常。"

"Roger," Misato shook her head, knowing she would never be able to look at Shinji in the same way as before, "send out the retrieval team…"  
"收到，" 美里摇了摇头，知道她再也无法以从前的方式看待真嗣了，"派出回收小组……"

Shinji got out of the entry plug deadpanned, hoping to make sure Asuka was okay as soon as possible. However, his wish had to be delayed since several Section 2 Agents intercepted him on the route. "The Commander requires your immediate presence," one of the man-in-black said in a cold voice, "please follow us."  
真嗣面无表情地从插入栓中出来，希望能尽快确认明日香是否安好。然而，他的愿望不得不推迟，因为几名第二课特工在路上拦截了他。"指挥官需要你立即前往，"其中一位黑衣人冷冷地说道，"请跟我们走。"

"Great…" Shinji murmured in exasperation.  
"真糟糕…" 真嗣无奈地喃喃自语。

The route to Gendo's office was time-consuming, considering he was outside of Geofront at that time. After one hour of traveling, he finally arrived at Gendo's office door, were still wearing the LCL drenched plug suit.  
前往碇源堂办公室的路程颇为耗时，毕竟他当时位于 Geofront 之外。经过一个小时的奔波，他终于抵达了碇源堂办公室的门前，身上依旧穿着那件浸满 LCL 的插入栓服。

"Come in," a familiar stony voice came to him.

"我明白了。" '这么说她还活着…并且对外界有反应！唯…等我！'

"One more thing… what's Asuka's condition?" Shinji asked; after all, her safety was his primary concern.

"真嗣," 在真嗣即将离开办公室之际，源堂叫住了他。真嗣惊讶地转过身来；他的父亲从未叫过他的名字，这让他更加震惊。

“初号机在今天的战斗中并未真正觉醒，”碇源堂回答，神情坚定不移，“自始至终都是驾驶员在掌控。”

"Third Child?" SEELE 04 asked in a curious tone, "how did he manage to control a berserk EVA?"  
"第三适任者？" SEELE 04 好奇地问道，"他是如何控制住狂暴的 EVA 的？"

"The EVA did not go berserk, I repeat," Gendo sounded a bit annoyed, "the EVA is connected to human emotions."  
"EVA 并未失控，我再重复一遍，" 碇源堂听起来有些不悦，"EVA 与人类的情感是相连的。"

"So you're implying it's your son who went 'berserk'?" SEELE 03 snorted, "you should come up with a better lie, Ikari."  
"所以你是暗示你儿子‘发狂’了？" SEELE 03 嗤之以鼻，"伊卡里，你该编个更好的谎话。"

"It was the truth," Gendo huffed, "Dr. Akagi's report clearly stated that the Third Child was in an extreme raging state."  
"那是事实，" 碇源堂哼了一声，"赤木博士的报告明确指出第三适格者处于极度狂暴状态。"

"Hm," SEELE 01 pondered, "do you think this may threaten the scenario?"  
"嗯，" SEELE 01 沉思道，"你认为这会威胁到剧本吗？"

"Negative. If anything his...abilities could contribute a lot fighting the Angels."  
"不对。如果有什么的话，他的...能力在对抗使徒方面能发挥很大作用。"

"I hope you're not covering for your son, Gendo," SEELE 11 spoke.  
"我希望你不是在为你的儿子遮掩，源堂，" SEELE 11 说道。

"I know what's more important. That's why I left him 10 years ago." Gendo improvised.  
"我知道什么更重要。这就是为什么十年前我离开了他。" 源堂即兴说道。

"Good. Keep an eye on any possible disturbances, especially the Third Child," SEELE 01 concluded. Gendo let out a small sigh of relief after the black monoliths disappeared. The old men were certainly getting increasingly difficult to deal with.  
"很好。留意任何可能的骚动，尤其是第三适格者，" SEELE 01 总结道。在黑色石碑消失后，碇源堂轻轻舒了一口气。这些老头子确实越来越难以应付了。

XXXXXX

Without wasting any more time Shinji hurried to the medical wing after he exited the office. His father's words were a significant assurance; still, he couldn't help but worry about her. He knew phantom sensations of EVA could do real damage to the pilot when the sync rate was high enough. He knew Rei was okay – and _even if_ she's not, she could be replaced, while Asuka couldn't without him starting a new cycle.  
没有浪费更多时间，真嗣离开办公室后急忙赶往医疗翼。父亲的保证意义重大；然而，他还是忍不住担心她。他知道，当同步率足够高时，EVA 的幻觉感受能对驾驶员造成实际伤害。他知道丽没事——即使她有事，也可以被替换，而明日香不行，除非他重新开始一个新周期。

"Excuse me, have you seen a red-haired girl?" Shinji asked as a nurse walked past him.  
"劳驾，您见过一个红发女孩吗？" 真嗣向经过的护士问道。

"Ah, yes, she's in room 303 I believe."  
"啊，是的，我想她在 303 房间。"

"Thanks!" Shinji continued running toward his destination. During the countless cycles he went through, he'd already had a good grip on pathfinding in the maze that was Geofront. Minutes later he arrived at the ward; he didn't even bother knocking on the door before rushing into the room.  
“谢谢！” 真嗣继续朝着目的地奔跑。在经历了无数次的循环后，他对这个迷宫般的第三新东京市的导航已经了如指掌。几分钟后，他到达了病房；他甚至没费心敲门就冲进了房间。

Asuka was lying on the bed among through a white blanket. Dr. Akagi stood at her bedside, carefully taking notes on her condition. "Doctor?" He called out; the blonde turned her head to him, surprised to find him already here, "Third Child? What are you doing here?"  
明日香躺在白色毯子下的床上。赤木律子博士站在她的床边，仔细地记录着她的状况。“博士？”他喊道；金发女子转过头来，惊讶地发现他已经在这里了，“第三适格者？你在这里做什么？”

"I'm here to check on Asuka," his reply came out without hesitation, "is she okay?"  
"我来这里是为了看看明日香，"他毫不犹豫地回答，"她还好吗？"

Ritsuko was tempted to educate him on courtesy, but she shook it off, still dreading today's near-berserk state of Shinji. "Well, the scans tell me nothing except she's perfectly fine physically," Shinji let out a sigh of relief as he heard the words. "However, we don't know what the neural link did to her. We need to wait for her to wake up."  
律子本想教育他注意礼貌，但还是摇了摇头，仍然对今天真嗣近乎狂暴的状态感到畏惧。"嗯，扫描结果显示她身体状况完全正常，"听到这话，真嗣松了一口气。"不过，我们还不清楚神经链接对她造成了什么影响。我们需要等她醒来。"

"Fine… I'll wait here." Shinji grabbed a chair and sat down at her bedside. He looked at the redhead with sadness filled in his eyes, a turmoil of thoughts rampaging in his mind. Asuka got hurt, not by his father, but by _him_ – although the direct cause was the Angel, if he didn't come up with his bold plan, none of this would ever happen to her. Was this the payback he got for helping his father's evil plan?  
"好吧……我会在这里等。"真嗣抓过一把椅子，坐在她的床边。他看着红发女孩，眼中充满了悲伤，脑海中思绪纷乱。明日香受伤了，不是因为他父亲，而是因为他——尽管直接原因是使徒，但如果他没有提出那个大胆的计划，她就不会遭遇这一切。这是他帮助父亲邪恶计划的报应吗？

He was the reason she got hurt. And he had already promised to himself that he would never hurt her ever again.  
是她因为他而受伤的。而他早已向自己承诺，再也不会让她受到伤害。

_'What went wrong?'_ Shinji mused. In all of his former timelines, the events were more or less the same; it gave him a false and deadly impression that as long as he followed the general trend, everything would be okay. He relied too much on his foreknowledge and lost the ability to improvise – which now backfired at him.  
“哪里出了问题？”真嗣沉思着。在他所有的前世时间线中，事件或多或少都是相同的；这给了他一个虚假且致命的印象，即只要他遵循大致趋势，一切都会好起来。他过于依赖先知先觉，失去了即兴发挥的能力——现在这反噬了他。

He needed to prepare himself for the worst.  
他需要为最坏的情况做好准备。

His train of thought screeched to a halt as a familiar voice came to him. "Argh…"  
他的思绪戛然而止，因为一个熟悉的声音传入耳中。“啊……”

Shinji followed the voice and saw his favorite redhead had woken up, struggling to get up from the bed. "Asuka!" He exclaimed in joy, failing to hide the happiness in his voice.  
真嗣顺着声音望去，看到他最喜爱的红发女孩已经醒来，正挣扎着从床上起身。“明日香！”他兴奋地喊道，声音中难掩喜悦之情。

"How long have I been out?" Asuka said hoarsely.  
“我昏迷多久了？”明日香沙哑地问道。

"About three hours after the battle," Dr. Akagi replied, "now, how do you feel in general?"  
“战斗结束后大约三个小时，”赤城博士回答，“现在，你总体感觉如何？”

"Like I was run over by a train…through my waist…What happened?"  
“感觉像是被火车从腰间碾过……发生了什么？”

"Your EVA's spinal column was broken. You were still connected at that time, so this was to be expected. Now try to move around a little."  
“你的 EVA 脊椎断了。当时你还连接着，所以这是预料之中的。现在试着稍微动一动。”

Shinji watched with a small smile as his love moved her head, then her arm, then-  
真嗣带着一丝微笑看着他的爱人移动头部，然后是手臂，接着——

Feeling his world tumbling down, Shinji's smile collapsed as he heard her later words.  
听到她后来的话，真嗣的世界仿佛崩塌了，他的笑容也随之消失。

"I-I-c-can't feel my l-legs."  
"我-我-我-我的腿没知觉了。"

XXXXXX

作者注：两天一更的节奏……别指望我能长期保持这个速度。三天一更或许更现实。敬请关注并留下您的评论！

## *Chapter 10*: Chapter 10: Choice of Fate  
*第十章*: 第十章：命运的选择

Disclaimer: I do not own Evangelion  
免责声明：我不拥有《新世纪福音战士》

**Chapter 10: Choice of Fate  
第十章：命运的选择**

Asuka's eyes grudgingly cracked open, finding herself staring at an unfamiliar ceiling, and was immediately assaulted by a wave of nausea and pain. She was lying on her back covered by a white sheet; some parts of her body hurt, others were somewhat numb – but she was indeed alive. The recollection of the latest battle slowly emerged from her mind as her consciousness returned. _'Oh shit…I lost…again…'_ She felt a wave of uncontrollable grief surge through her body.  
明日香不情愿地睁开双眼，发现自己正凝视着一片陌生的天花板，随即被一阵恶心与疼痛的浪潮袭击。她仰面躺着，身上盖着一条白床单；身体的某些部位疼痛，另一些则有些麻木——但她确实还活着。随着意识的恢复，最近那场战斗的记忆缓缓浮现于脑海。'该死……我又输了……'一股无法抑制的悲伤涌遍全身。

She was in the hospital, which meant someone else had defeated the Angel. Considering Israfel required two EVAs to beat, Shinji definitely got a share of the kill. Unacceptable failure. It was supposed to be _her_ victory, and now she was saved by him and the _doll_.  
她躺在医院里，这意味着有人击败了使徒。考虑到伊斯瑞尔需要两台 EVA 才能打败，真嗣无疑分得了一杯羹。不可接受的失败。本该是她的胜利，如今却被他和那个玩偶所救。

"Argh…" Asuka groaned as she tried to get into a sitting position, but failed. She felt like she was missing something.  
""啊……"" 明日香呻吟着试图坐起身，却失败了。她感觉好像少了些什么。

"Asuka!" The voice of a familiar boy came to her. She slowly turned her head in the direction of the voice, seeing Shinji was sitting beside her bed, his eyes expressed genuine concern that had been starting to melt her heart. Why would he stay by her bedside? Did he care about her that much? "How long have I been out?" She asked in a hoarse voice.  
""明日香！"" 一个熟悉的男孩声音传来。她缓缓将头转向声音的方向，看到真嗣坐在她的床边，眼中流露出真切的担忧，这开始融化了她的心。他为何会守在她的床边？他真的那么在乎她吗？""我昏迷多久了？"" 她用沙哑的声音问道。

"About three hours after the battle," Ritsuko Akagi's dutiful voice came to her, "now, how do you feel in general?"  
"战斗结束大约三个小时后，"赤木律子尽职的声音传来，"现在，你总体感觉如何？"

"Like I was run over by a train…through my waist," Asuka said in a displeased expression. "What happened?"  
“感觉像是被火车从腰间碾过一样。”明日香带着不满的表情说道，“发生了什么？”

"Your EVA's spinal column was broken. You were still connected at that time, so this was to be expected. Now try to move around a little."  
“你的 EVA 脊椎断了。当时你还连接着，所以这是预料之中的。现在试着稍微动一动。”

Asuka nodded and focused her thoughts on controlling the muscles. She could turn her head, her arms were working fine, she could…  
明日香点点头，集中精神控制肌肉。她能转动头部，手臂也运作正常，她可以……

"I-I-c-can't feel my l-legs," said Asuka, her voice trembling. She pinched her thigh, her fingers could feel the pressure, but her leg couldn't. "I c-can't feel them…" She could see Shinji's eyes went wide, his expression inscrutable. "Please, doctor, tell me I'm not crippled."  
"我-我-我-我的腿没-没感觉了，"明日香颤抖着声音说。她捏了捏大腿，手指能感觉到压力，但腿却毫无知觉。"我感觉不到它们……"她看到真嗣的眼睛睁大了，表情难以捉摸。"请告诉我，医生，我不是瘫痪了。"

"Hm, interesting," Ritsuko massaged her chin, "your physical check came healthy, CAT scan tells us nothing wrong…"  
"嗯，有意思，"律子揉着下巴说，"你的身体检查结果很健康，CAT 扫描也没发现任何异常……"

"But I can't feel my legs!" Asuka cried, "something's obviously wrong!"  
"但我的腿没有知觉了！" 明日香哭喊道，"显然有什么不对劲！"

"There's still so much we don't know about Evangelion technology," Ritsuko remarked casually, "your…incident could provide some useful data-"  
"我们对 EVA 技术还有很多不了解的地方，" 律子随意地评论道，"你的……事故可能会提供一些有用的数据——"

"I'm disabled, DOCTOR, and that's what you're fucking concerned with?!" Asuka yelled incredulously, "seriously, shouldn't you be thinking about how to get me back to normal?!"  
"我是残疾人，医生，这就是你他妈关心的？！" 明日香难以置信地喊道，"说真的，你不应该考虑如何让我恢复正常吗？！"

"I'm sorry, but there's nothing wrong with your body," Dr. Akagi replied in a stern voice, "if anything it's your head messing with you, which I have no idea how to deal with. In other words, the damage might be permanent at worst."  
"我很抱歉，但你的身体没有任何问题，" 赤木博士用严肃的语气回答，"如果有问题，那也是你的头脑在作祟，对此我毫无头绪。换句话说，最坏的情况是，这种损害可能是永久性的。"

"Permanent…" Asuka started giggling, then it became a bout of hysterical laughter. "Permanent damage…"  
"永久…" 明日香开始咯咯笑起来，随后变成了一阵歇斯底里的大笑。"永久性损伤…"

"There must be something we can do to cure her, right doctor?" Shinji asked worriedly. If Asuka became crippled, he didn't dare to think how much it would hurt her pride, not to mention she probably couldn't pilot an EVA anymore, which would hurt her more.  
"一定有什么办法可以治愈她，对吧医生？" 真嗣担忧地问道。如果明日香残疾了，他不敢想象这对她的自尊心会造成多大的伤害，更不用说她可能再也无法驾驶 EVA 了，这会让她更加痛苦。

The downward spiral of Asuka came much faster than he thought. And it was majorly his fault.  
明日香的急转直下比他预想的要快得多。而这主要都是他的错。

"I'm sorry, Shinji, but there's nothing I can do for now," Ritsuko closed her notebook, "I'll try my best to come up with solutions, but I can't make promises. After all, it's EVA we're dealing with."  
"对不起，真嗣，但目前我无能为力，" 律子合上笔记本，"我会尽力想出解决方案，但我不能保证。毕竟，我们面对的是 EVA。"

Shinji felt a cold ball grew in his stomach. Ritsuko Akagi, the head of project E, the most intelligent person in NERV, was the best shot to help Asuka. If she admitted she couldn't do anything, then no one else could.  
真嗣感到一股寒意在胃里凝结。赤木律子，E 计划的首席，NERV 中最聪明的人，是帮助明日香的最佳人选。如果她承认自己无能为力，那么其他人也无计可施了。

"You can go home if you want, but you'll need a wheelchair. Shinji," Ritsuko turned to the boy with a serious expression, "will you take care of our patient? I mean, help her move around and all that."  
"如果你想的话可以回家，但你需要一个轮椅。真嗣，"律子转向男孩，表情严肃，"你能照顾我们的病人吗？我是说，帮她移动和做其他事情。"

"Sure, doctor," Shinji replied. A glance at the redhead he could clearly see unwillingness and refusal in her eyes. He knew Asuka wanted to be independent; relying on someone else, for _basic life necessities,_ would be a massive blow to her ego.  
"当然，医生，"真嗣回答。他瞥了一眼红发女孩，清楚地看到她眼中的不情愿和拒绝。他知道明日香想要独立；依赖别人，哪怕是基本的生活需求，对她来说都是巨大的打击。

Maybe letting her move around in the wheelchair by herself would be a better idea…  
也许让她自己用轮椅移动会是个更好的主意……

XXXXXX

The wheelchair was nothing like Shinji had expected to see, though. To say NERV was technologically advanced would be a colossal understatement. The wheelchair NERV gave Asuka was more of a vehicle than medical equipment. It could move by itself using an electric engine, controlled by a console installed on the right armrest.  
这轮椅与真嗣所预想的截然不同。说 NERV 在技术上先进无比，简直是轻描淡写。NERV 给明日香配备的轮椅与其说是医疗设备，不如说更像一辆车。它可以通过安装在右侧扶手上的控制台，利用电动引擎自行移动。

"Okay, be careful," Ritsuko said as Shinji slowly lifted Asuka up from the bed, carrying her to the wheelchair. It took Shinji and a lot of persuasions and several miserably failed attempts by herself to convince Asuka to finally agree on letting him help her. The most convenient way for Shinji to put her onto the wheelchair was to carry her princess style, which the redhead felt oddly comfortable with. The fact that Shinji, who could grope a feel on her ass anytime he preferred, while she couldn't do anything about it since she couldn't feel it, actively avoided touching her sensitive spots, made Asuka put more trust in him taking care of her.  
“好，小心点。”律子说道，真嗣缓缓地将明日香从床上抱起，带她到轮椅旁。真嗣费了不少口舌，加上几次糟糕的尝试，才终于说服明日香同意让他帮忙。最方便的方式是公主抱，这让红发少女感到意外的舒适。尽管真嗣随时可以趁机摸她的臀部，而她因感觉不到而无可奈何，但他却主动避开了她的敏感部位，这让明日香对他照顾自己的信任增加了几分。

But it didn't soothe her sore mood a bit.  
但这丝毫没有缓解她糟糕的心情。

It was supposed to be the most glorious day of her career as an EVA pilot – surpassing the invincible Shinji-sama in terms of kill counts, sync rate, and combat experience. Instead, she lost to the same Angel twice, and lost her legs – possibly permanently. She barely held back the tears that threatened to come out from the corner of her eyes.  
这本应是她作为 EVA 驾驶员职业生涯中最辉煌的一天——在击杀数、同步率和战斗经验上超越无敌的真嗣大人。然而，她却两次败给了同一个使徒，并失去了双腿——可能永久性的。她勉强忍住了眼角即将涌出的泪水。

Which led to another question. "Doctor?" Asuka probed, her voice extremely nervous, "can I pilot the EVA ever again?"  
这又引出了另一个问题。“医生？”明日香试探性地问道，声音异常紧张，“我还能再次驾驶 EVA 吗？”

Shinji frowned. The redhead's unhealthy bond to her EVA was another standing issue he needed to take care of. He almost chuckled at her hypocritical attitude; a moment ago, she was berating Ritsuko because she cared more about 'getting useful data for Project E' than her health condition, now she was essentially following her example. Shinji sighed internally – among three people here in the ward, if anyone had the unhealthiest bond with the EVA, it was neither Ritsuko nor Asuka. "Seriously, Asuka, you should-"  
真嗣皱起了眉头。红发少女与 EVA 之间不健康的羁绊是他需要解决的另一个长期问题。他几乎要笑出声来，她的虚伪态度令人难以忍受；刚才她还因为惣流更关心“为 E 计划获取有用数据”而不是她的健康状况而责备她，现在她却几乎在模仿她的做法。真嗣内心叹息——在这间病房里的三个人中，如果有人与 EVA 的羁绊最不健康，那既不是惣流也不是明日香。“说真的，明日香，你应该……”

"Shut up you!" Asuka barked, her voice dripping venom, "Doctor?" She probed again, dreading that the answer might not be what she wanted to hear.  
"闭嘴，你！" 明日香厉声喝道，声音中充满了毒液，"医生？" 她再次试探，害怕答案可能不是她想听到的。

"I'm not sure…technically as long as you have a working brain, it should work," Ritsuko Akagi responded with a thoughtful expression. "However, we still need a sync test to be sure."  
"我不确定……从技术上讲，只要有正常运作的大脑，就应该能行，" 赤城律子带着沉思的表情回答，"不过，我们还是需要进行同步测试来确认。"

"When can you arrange it?" Asuka asked impatiently.  
"你什么时候能安排？" 明日香不耐烦地问。

"Asuka, you need to focus on your recovery first," Shinji interjected in a firm voice. "I suppose the next Angel wouldn't come in several weeks," he carefully chose his words. The next one would be Sandalphon – and he already had an idea how to defeat it by himself. "You'll have a better chance syncing with your EVA under a better health condition, don't you think?"  
"明日香，你首先需要专注于康复，" 真嗣坚定地说道。"我想下一个使徒不会在几周内出现，" 他谨慎地选择措辞。下一个将是桑达枫——他已经有了独自击败它的想法。"在更好的健康状况下，你与 EVA 同步的机会会更大，你不觉得吗？"

Asuka bit down on her lips, swallowing down the hot retort. As hard as it was for her to admit, Shinji was making a good point. "Shinji here's right, we don't expect you do well in your EVA under the current situation. I'll arrange the next sync test in…about five days. Sounds good?"  
明日香咬紧嘴唇，咽下了那股激烈的反驳。尽管难以承认，但真嗣说得有道理。"真嗣说得对，我们不期望你在目前的情况下能很好地驾驶 EVA。我会在……大约五天后安排下一次同步测试。听起来怎么样？"

"Alright." Asuka conceded, her expression mixed with pain and resignation. "Now I want to go home…"  
"好吧。" 明日香让步了，她的表情混合着痛苦和无奈。"现在我想回家……"

Asuka didn't say a word the entire way home, much to Shinji's apprehension. She kept staring out the window deep in thoughts, ignoring all kinds of small gestures of support Shinji gave her. He silently cursed; if getting defeated by Israfel in the first round was 'a hit on her ego' he wanted, then the recent events could be considered as a nuclear strike.  
回家的路上，明日香一句话也没说，这让真嗣感到十分不安。她一直凝视着窗外，陷入沉思，对真嗣给予的各种小支持视而不见。他默默咒骂；如果第一轮就被伊斯拉斐尔击败是‘打击了她的自尊’，那么最近发生的事情简直就是核打击。

Shinji carried her off the car with utmost care after arriving at their apartment and putting her down in the wheelchair that Misato brought to them from the vehicle. As soon as she settled on her seat, Asuka pushed the joystick forward, heading to the elevator, still not saying so much as a 'thanks'. It hurt Shinji a lot to watch her in this state; he hoped to have fun with her while they still can – before the later Angels arrive. Time around Israfel was supposed to be _light,_ and if the mood had already darkened to such degree, what would the later Angels bring, then?  
真嗣小心翼翼地将她从车上抱下来，到达公寓后把她放在了美里从车里带来的轮椅上。她一坐稳，明日香就推着操纵杆向前，朝电梯驶去，连一句'谢谢'都没说。看着她这副模样，真嗣心里很不是滋味；他本希望在后来的使徒到来之前能和她一起开心一下。伊斯拉斐尔出现的时候应该是轻松愉快的，如果气氛已经变得如此沉重，那么后来的使徒又会带来什么呢？

"Baka, are you coming or not?!" His dark train of thoughts abruptly crashed as an annoyed voice came to him; following the voice he could see Asuka waiting impatiently inside the elevator, tapping her finger in a rhythmic fashion. "Three seconds you don't come and I'll leave!"  
“笨蛋，你到底来不来？！”他阴郁的思绪突然被一个不耐烦的声音打断；顺着声音，他看到明日香不耐烦地在电梯里等着，手指有节奏地敲打着。“三秒钟你不进来，我就走了！”

Without hesitation Shinji dashed to the elevator, blocking the closing door just in time. The half-a-minute elevator ride was in awkward silence. Asuka sank deeper and deeper into her swirl of thoughts; now that she was disabled, how should she perform the living routine, then? She couldn't so much as freely move around in the apartment anymore without needing someone else's help, and she hated being dependent. Even though she could trust Shinji to take care of her for many things, there were some things she wasn't comfortable enough to let him do. For instance, bathing, peeing, and pooping – there's no way she would let him help her with those.  
毫不犹豫，真嗣冲向电梯，及时挡住了即将关闭的门。这半分钟的电梯之旅在尴尬的沉默中度过。明日香陷入了越来越深的思绪漩涡；如今她行动不便，该如何应对日常生活呢？她甚至无法在公寓里自由活动，而需要他人的帮助，这让她讨厌依赖别人。尽管她可以信任真嗣在很多事情上照顾她，但有些事情她还是无法放心让他来做。比如洗澡、上厕所——她绝不会让他帮忙做这些。

Thankfully there's still Misato…  
幸好还有美里……

Asuka shook the unhelpful thoughts off as the elevator arrived on the seventh floor. She drove the wheelchair to the apartment door, then irately found out the size of it wouldn't allow the wheelchair to go through. She let out a frustrated groan that came to Shinji's ear as if it was a stinging needle. The said boy hastily got to her side and picked her up from the wheelchair, carrying her into the apartment. "Put me on my bed," Asuka demanded as they came across the living room.  
电梯到达七楼时，明日香甩开了这些无益的念头。她驾驶轮椅来到公寓门前，然后恼火地发现门的大小不允许轮椅通过。她发出一声沮丧的呻吟，传到真嗣耳中就像一根刺。真嗣急忙赶到她身边，从轮椅上抱起她，将她带进公寓。“把我放到床上，”明日香在他们经过客厅时命令道。

Shinji complied without a problem. From the looks of him, Shinji definitely wasn't the type of a grown man like Kaji she had her eyes for, but Asuka's cheek started heating up, and her heart fluttered as she was carried princess style in his arms. Just several days ago, Shinji was constantly bickering with her and annoying her by pushing her to do things she didn't want to, but now he was taking care of her without complaining nor impatience.  
真嗣毫无问题地照做了。从外表看，真嗣显然不是像加持那样成熟的男人，但当她像公主一样被他抱在怀里时，明日香的脸颊开始发热，心跳加速。就在几天前，真嗣还一直在和她争吵，逼她做不想做的事，但现在他却毫无怨言和急躁地照顾着她。

What did she do to deserve all this?  
她做了什么值得这一切？

Nonetheless, such trivial thoughts were the least she had to worry about right now.  
尽管如此，这些琐碎的想法现在却是她最不需要担心的。

"Asuka, do you need something? Water, food?" Shinji probed after he helped Asuka settle down on the bed. He waited patiently for a reply, but got nothing from the unresponsive redhead.  
“明日香，你需要什么吗？水，还是食物？”真嗣在帮明日香安顿到床上后试探性地问道。他耐心等待着回应，但那位毫无反应的红发女孩什么也没给他。

He could no longer just sit aside and wait for Asuka to allow him to help her. He knew perfectly well that if he didn't interfere, then her wallowing in agony would eventually be the end of her. The redhead pulled her limp legs closer to her chest with her arms, curling up in the corner of the bed.  
他不能再只是坐在一旁等待明日香允许他帮助她了。他非常清楚，如果他不介入，那么她沉浸在痛苦中最终会毁了她。红发女孩用双臂将她无力的双腿拉近胸前，蜷缩在床角。

This wasn't the girl he was expecting to see at this period of the timeline. What he saw wasn't the Asuka Langley Soryu he had come to know and fell in love with. What he saw was a sad and lonely little girl who was too afraid to leave the safety of her corner and be a part of the rest of the world. She was so small and so weak that Shinji knew she could land on a pillow and still shatter into thousands of pieces. She just looked like she wanted to be left alone, and to remain alone until the rest of the world had forgotten about her.  
这不是他在这一时间线上预期会见到的女孩。他所看到的，不是他逐渐了解并爱上的惣流·明日香·兰格雷。他眼前的是一个悲伤而孤独的小女孩，她太过害怕离开自己的角落，不敢融入外面的世界。她如此渺小脆弱，仿佛落在枕头上都会碎成千片。她看起来只希望被独自留下，直到世界其他部分都遗忘了她。

"Asuka," Shinji sighed, looking up towards her window to see the full moon's gentle light shimmering down upon them. "I want for you to know that I'm here for you." Still no response coming from her. Asuka continued to remain curled up and unresponsive, his words seemingly falling empty onto her. He expected as much.  
"明日香," 真嗣叹息着，抬头望向她的窗户，只见满月的柔和光芒洒落下来。"我想让你知道，我在这里支持你。"她依然没有回应。明日香继续蜷缩着，毫无反应，他的话似乎落在了空处。他早有预料。

"Why are you doing this?" A barely audible whisper finally came from the other side of the room after what felt like an eternity for him, causing Shinji to turn his attention to the source of the noise.  
"你为什么要这样做？" 在他感觉仿佛过了一个世纪之后，房间另一边终于传来一声几乎听不见的低语，这让真嗣将注意力转向了声音的来源。

"Because I want to be here for you, Asuka." He answered, giving her the most honest response he had.  
"因为我想在你身边，明日香。" 他回答道，给了她最真诚的答复。

"But I want you to leave me alone." She growled, her voice partially muffled by her face being buried in her legs.  
"但我想让你离开我。" 她咆哮道，声音因脸埋在双腿间而有些模糊。

"But why? Why do you want me to lea-"  
"但为什么？你为什么想让我离开——"

"Because I just do, damn it!" Asuka screamed, instinctively trying to get up into a sitting position, but miserably failed, fueling her anger even more. "Why can't you get it through your thick skull that I just don't want you around?! Is it really that hard to understand?!"  
"因为我就是想这样，该死！" 明日香尖叫着，本能地试图坐起身来，却悲惨地失败了，这更加剧了她的愤怒。"你那厚脑袋怎么就是不明白我不想你在这儿？！真的有那么难理解吗？！"

Shinji felt a tug at his heart. He bit down on his upper lip to try to hold back the pain that her words inflicted upon him, but even an earthquake wouldn't make him leave. He knew perfectly well if there was ever a time that she needed to be held and told that someone was there for her the most, this was the time. "No." His reply came cold and stony, almost reminiscent of his father's tone of voice. "I'm not leaving you."  
真嗣感到心被揪了一下。他咬紧上唇，试图压抑她的话语带来的痛苦，但即使是地震也无法让他离开。他非常清楚，如果有什么时候她最需要被拥抱并被告知有人在她身边，那就是现在。“不。”他的回答冷硬如石，几乎让人想起他父亲的语气。“我不会离开你。”

"You're such an idiot!" She hissed, slamming back down on the bed, "Please, Shinji." Her stifled sobs continued to carry through. "Please just leave me alone. It'll make things easier for both of us."  
“你真是个傻瓜！”她低声怒斥，重重地躺回床上，“求你了，真嗣。”她的哽咽声持续传来。“请让我一个人待着。这样对我们俩都好。”

"You know I can't do that," Shinji shot back, "I'm your friend, Asuka, and I can't stand seeing you like this. If you really want to make things easier for us, then just tell me what you need."  
"你知道我不能那样做，" 真嗣反驳道，"我是你的朋友，明日香，我不忍心看你这样。如果你真的想让我们都好过些，那就告诉我你需要什么。"

Asuka chuckled, then let out a long sigh. "You're really an idiot…" She shook her head in resignation. "Shinji?"  
明日香轻笑一声，然后长叹一口气。"你真是个傻瓜……"她无奈地摇了摇头。"真嗣？"

"Yes, Asuka?" "什么事，明日香？"

"Can you make me some baked cakes? I don't fancy anything with too much grease right now."  
"你能给我做些烤蛋糕吗？我现在不想吃太油腻的东西。"

"Sure thing, Asuka," Shinji smiled a careful, if not happy smile, and proceeded to fulfill her wishes.  
“当然，明日香，” 真嗣小心翼翼地，如果不是开心地笑了笑，然后继续满足她的愿望。

"So you want to do the sync test on Monday? Why on a school day?" Ritsuko Akagi's inquisitive tone came through the speaker; on the other side of the phone, Asuka tightened her grip on the phone, "because I don't want Shinji to go there." She replied in a low voice, "Misato can carry me to Geofront. I've asked her. She said she needed to go there for paperwork that day, anyway."

For one, her pride wouldn't let her appear needy more than absolutely necessary; for another, she couldn't decipher the true intentions behind his actions. Why would he suddenly care about her so much? She still feared it was some kind of a game he was playing with her, although she already trusted him more than anyone else – maybe except Kaji.  
挂断电话后，明日香重重地叹了口气。她真的不希望真嗣再卷入这件事了，他已经牵扯得够多了。一方面，她的自尊不允许自己显得过于需要帮助；另一方面，她无法解读他行为的真正意图。为什么他会突然如此关心她？她仍然担心这可能是他在和她玩某种游戏，尽管她已经比信任任何人都要信任他——也许除了加持。

Maybe. 也许。

The cool morning breeze blew gently across Asuka's pale face, more or less soothing her bitter mood. Requiring constant nursing, especially from Shinji, wasn't her idea, but professional medical advice came from Dr. Akagi, approved by the Commander as an order.  
清晨的凉风轻轻吹拂过明日香苍白的脸颊，或多或少缓解了她的苦闷心情。需要真嗣不断照顾，尤其是来自他的关怀，并非她的本意，但这是赤木博士的专业建议，并得到了司令的批准作为命令。

Needing him to take care of her daily life routine in the apartment was already bad enough for her pride; now the constant company even extended to outside – she wanted to 'walk around' in the park in the morning, and since it was a Sunday, without school Shinji insisted on accompanying her.  
让他照顾她的日常生活已经够伤她的自尊了；现在这种陪伴甚至延伸到了户外——她想在早上'在公园里走走'，因为是周日，没有学校，真嗣坚持要陪着她。

Thankfully he still had to go to school during schooldays…  
幸好他工作日还得去上学……

Asuka shook the thoughts off, focusing on the road in front of her. The design of her electric wheelchair wouldn't allow a velocity more than 10 kilometers an hour, a usual jogging speed. Still, it was the first time driving something that wasn't an Evangelion, and she needed to pay utmost attention to avoid hitting random things on the road.  
明日香甩开这些思绪，专注于前方的道路。她的电动轮椅设计时速无法超过每小时 10 公里，相当于一般的慢跑速度。尽管如此，这是她第一次驾驶非 EVA 的交通工具，她必须全神贯注，以免撞上路上的各种障碍物。

Her scarcely improved mood only sunk lower when she noticed the looks she got from the pedestrians. They were different from what she got from school; instead of admiring, sometimes fearful, sometimes even lecherous gazes, people were looking at her with _pity._  
她那稍有好转的心情在注意到行人的目光时更加低落。这些目光与她在学校所遇到的截然不同；不再是仰慕、有时甚至是恐惧或色眯眯的眼神，人们现在看她的眼神充满了怜悯。

Her stomach clenched. She felt like she wanted to puke. At herself.  
她的胃部紧缩，感觉自己想吐，对着自己。

It only became worse when a group of kids looked at her and started giggling. Of course they were instantly silenced by the soul-piercing death glare she and Shinji shot out in unison, but the damage was already done.  
当一群孩子看着她并开始窃笑时，情况变得更糟了。当然，他们立刻被她和真嗣同时射出的穿透灵魂的死亡凝视所震慑，但伤害已经造成。

With a forceful pull on the console, the wheelchair stopped abruptly, surprising Shinji a little. "What's wrong, Asuka?" He probed cautiously.  
用力一拉操纵台，轮椅突然停了下来，让真嗣有点惊讶。“怎么了，明日香？”他小心翼翼地问道。

_"Everything is fucking wrong!"_ Asuka suddenly screamed in German after a few seconds of silence, which in turn caused more people to turn their heads in her direction. _"I hate you, I hate everyone!" 'But I hate myself the most…'_  
“一切都他妈的错了！”沉默几秒后，明日香突然用德语尖叫起来，这又引得更多人转头看向她。“我恨你，我恨所有人！”‘但我最恨的是我自己……’

Although her last thought didn't articulate into words, Shinji could almost swear he heard them. "Asuka…do you want to go home?"  
"尽管她最后的念头并未化为言语，但真嗣几乎可以发誓他听到了。“明日香…你想回家吗？””

"Home?" Asuka sneered, "what's the point of having someone useless like me in your home? I can only-"  
“回家？”明日香嗤之以鼻，“像我这样无用的人在你家有什么意义？我只能——”

"SHUT UP and LISTEN," Shinji cut her off in a firm voice, sending a chill ran down the redhead's spine. She had never heard him talking in this way before, or maybe she did, just not from him. Even though Shinji liked to banter with her, but in retrospect, Asuka could swear he never sounded…angry. "Home is not a place, Asuka. There are people who care about you. Me, Misato-san, Kaji-san, and your friend at school - Horaki-san, we all care about you. So I don't want to hear you say that ever again."  
“闭嘴，听我说，”真嗣用坚定的语气打断了她，让红发女孩的脊背一阵发凉。她从未听过他用这种方式说话，或许有过，但不是从他口中。尽管真嗣喜欢和她斗嘴，但回想起来，明日香可以发誓他从未听起来…如此生气。“家不是一个地方，明日香。有在乎你的人。我，美里小姐，加持先生，还有你在学校的朋友——洞木同学，我们都关心你。所以我不希望再听到你说那样的话。”

"Whatever…" Asuka conceded. She had to admit, though, Shinji was making a good point…there _were_ people who still care about her…  
“随便吧……”明日香让步道。不过她不得不承认，真嗣说得有道理……还有人关心她……

The EVA cages buzzed to life as the testing machines started running. "Entry Plug inserted…Commence Entry Plug LCL injection. LCL filled. Establishing A10 connections. A-10 connections established and stable. All circuits are operational…" Asuka sat nervously in her test plug, trying to force her will on the stupid machine. However, no matter how hard she tried, the EVA wouldn't listen to her, as if she was blocked by a door.  
EVA 驾驶舱随着测试机器启动而嗡嗡作响。“插入栓已插入……开始注入插入栓 LCL。LCL 已充满。建立 A10 连接。A-10 连接已建立并稳定。所有电路正常运行……”明日香紧张地坐在她的测试插入栓中，试图将自己的意志强加给这台愚蠢的机器。然而，无论她怎么努力，EVA 就是不听她的，仿佛被一扇门挡住了。

_I don't want you to get hurt anymore…darling. I have to protect you…  
我不想你再受到伤害了……亲爱的。我必须保护你……_

Asuka felt like the door was slammed on her face.  
明日香感觉自己像是被门狠狠地拍在了脸上。

"Absolute Borderline…" Maya paused at the step, frowning, "Akagi-Senpai, she's not even passing the Absolute Borderline."  
“绝对底线……”真嗣在台阶上停顿了一下，皱着眉头说，“赤木前辈，她连绝对底线都没达到。”

Ritsuko sighed, looking down at the readings from Asuka's sync score. "This was to be expected…"  
律子叹了口气，低头看着明日香的同步率分数。“这是预料之中的……”

Misato remained on the far end of the room, leaning against the wall with her arms crossed. Normally she would be right there next to her old college friend to act as a second set of eyes, not that Ritsuko needed them. In recent days though, the Captain had started to embrace the gift of ignorance. She knew that Asuka's scores would go down, but somehow she felt that if she just remained oblivious then all of the things that happened recently would just go away. "What do you want to do about it?" It was all she could ask.  
美里站在房间的另一端，双臂交叉倚靠在墙上。通常她会紧挨着这位大学时代的老朋友，充当第二双眼睛，尽管律子并不需要。然而最近，这位上尉开始享受起无知带来的礼物。她知道明日香的分数会下降，但不知为何，她觉得只要自己保持无知，最近发生的那些事情就会自行消失。“你想怎么办？”她只能这样问。

"We should start looking for a new pilot." Akagi was straight to the point about it.  
“我们应该开始寻找新的驾驶员。”赤木直子直截了当地说。
