“是是，去照顾你老婆吧，真嗣老兄！”他得意地咧嘴笑道。

"Toji…just shut it," Shinji said in exasperation, walking back to Asuka's side and sat down on the chair on his new spot.  
“阿薰……闭嘴吧，”真嗣无奈地说，走回明日香身边，坐在新位置的椅子上。

"Rise! Bow! Sit!" Came class rep's dutiful announcement as the Sensei went into the classroom,  
“起立！敬礼！坐下！”随着老师走进教室，班长尽职地宣布道，

"Hello class, before we start today, I have an announcement to make," Nebukawa sensei adjusted his glasses. "The school planned a trip to Okinawa next week. Everybody without health issues is going."  
"同学们，在开始今天的课程之前，我有一个通知要宣布，" 碇老师调整了一下他的眼镜。"学校计划下周去冲绳旅行。所有没有健康问题的同学都会参加。"

The class exploded into cheers and applauds, momentarily shifting the center of attention from the wheelchair-riding redhead to searching for friends they could hang out with. Asuka, however, her face darkened upon hearing the news. _'Everybody without health issues…which excludes me,'_ she brooded irately. Her mood only sunk lower as she remembered that she was supposed to go back to Germany next week, which meant losing Shinji – and she didn't dare to think of what would happen next.  
班级里爆发出欢呼和掌声，一瞬间将注意力从坐在轮椅上的红发女孩转移到了寻找可以一起玩耍的朋友。然而，明日香听到这个消息后脸色阴沉下来。'所有没有健康问题的同学……这不包括我，'她愤怒地沉思着。她的心情随着想起下周她本应返回德国，这意味着要失去真嗣——她不敢想象接下来会发生什么。

Even the highly sleep-inducing lecture of pre-impact life did nothing to help sort out the turmoil of thoughts in Asuka's mind.  
即使是关于冲击前生活的催眠讲座，也丝毫没有帮助明日香理清脑海中的混乱思绪。

XXXXXX

The lunch bell was seen as a saving grace by Asuka as she was on the edge of completely losing her composure under the stress of her dark thoughts. She had a lot on her mind that she wanted to talk about with Shinji, preferably privately, but going to the rooftop was impossible since one needed to climb stairs to get there, so the corner of the playground was the second-to-best spot they could find in school. Fortunately there was still one way she knew she could hide their conversation well. "Shinji," Asuka started as the said boy put down both of their bentos. _"What do you think about me going back to Germany?"_ She said in German.  
午餐铃声对明日香来说犹如救命稻草，她正因内心深处的阴暗思绪而濒临彻底崩溃的边缘。她有许多心事想与真嗣倾诉，最好能私下进行，但前往天台是不可能的，因为需要爬楼梯才能到达，因此学校操场的角落成了他们次佳的选择。幸运的是，她知道还有一种方法能很好地隐藏他们的对话。“真嗣，”明日香开口道，那男孩正放下两人的便当盒。“你觉得我回德国怎么样？”她用德语说道。

_"If you don't want to go back, I don't want you to leave either,"_ Shinji replied without hesitation.  
"如果你不想回去，我也不想让你离开，" 真嗣毫不犹豫地回答道。

_"Of course I don't want to go back,"_ Asuka huffed. _"I have no one back there. I'd rather…die than go back to Germany, where no one cares about me…"_ She sulked, her voice full of sorrow.  
"当然我不想回去，" 明日香气呼呼地说。"我在那里没有亲人。我宁愿……死也不愿回到德国，那里没人关心我……" 她沮丧地低声说道，声音充满了悲伤。

_"Asuka, I'm not letting you go,"_ Shinji said firmly and took hold of Asuka's hand, who initially tensed up at the sudden contact but gave in as she remembered that they had already done things much more intimate. _"I'll think of someway…"_ _'and it has a specific name',_ he thought, really hoping that his father could be useful this time.  
"明日香，我不会让你走的，" 真嗣坚定地说，并握住了明日香的手，她起初因突如其来的接触而紧张，但随即想起了他们已经做过更亲密的事情，便放松了下来。"我会想办法……" '而且它有个特定的名字'，他心想，真心希望这次他的父亲能派上用场。

Moreover, the upcoming Okinawa trip also indicated the discovery of the eighth Angel – another standing issue he needed to deal with.  
此外，即将到来的冲绳之旅也预示着第八使徒的发现——这是他需要处理的另一个悬而未决的问题。

_"I'll hold you onto that,"_ the uncertainty in Asuka's voice, however, was a stark contrast to her words. It was understandable, though. What could an Evangelion pilot do, whose rank in NERV was even lower than Misato and wasn't even in the chain of command? Nevertheless, she still held a glimmer of hope that Shinji, the person she trusted the most in the world, would keep his words. _"If you don't-"_  
“我会记住你这句话的，”但明日香的声音中透露出的不确定性与她的话形成了鲜明对比。不过，这可以理解。一个在 NERV 中级别甚至低于美里、且不在指挥链中的 EVA 驾驶员能做什么呢？尽管如此，她仍抱有一丝希望，相信她在这个世界上最信任的人——真嗣，会遵守他的承诺。“如果你不——”

Suddenly another voice came to them, interrupting Asuka's speech. "Can I join you, Shinji, Asuka?"  
突然，另一个声音打断了明日香的话。“我可以加入你们吗，真嗣，明日香？”

The said pair raised their head to see Rei Ayanami standing in front of them with a blank expression, a bento box held in her hand. Shinji had been cooking for Ayanami as well since his second cycle; after all, he couldn't stand seeing someone he considered as his half-sister living in such a low life quality. However, right now, he had a more important task at hand. "I'm sorry Ayanami, but Asuka and I are having some…private things to discuss." He replied as he saw the uncomfortable expression on Asuka's face.  
那对情侣抬起头，看到绫波零站在他们面前，面无表情，手里拿着一个便当盒。自从他的第二个循环以来，真嗣也一直在为绫波做饭；毕竟，他无法忍受看到自己视为半个妹妹的人过着如此低质量的生活。然而，现在他有一个更重要的任务在手。“对不起，绫波，但我和明日香有些…私事要讨论。”他回答道，同时注意到明日香脸上不自在的表情。

"We're all friends, are we not?" Rei said casually. "And I'm concerned with Asuka's condition, so I thought I should check on her as soon as she comes back to school, which is today. Isn't looking after each other are friends for?"  
“我们不都是朋友吗？”绫波随意地说道。“而且我对明日香的情况很关心，所以我想在她今天回学校后尽快看看她。互相照顾不就是朋友之间的责任吗？”

Asuka blinked. She never thought Rei…actually had emotions, and she…cared about her, just in her own weird way? As hard as it was for her to admit, Rei now resembled less of a doll than she initially thought. On second thought, Rei was also a pilot, which means sooner than later she would know the truth, so Asuka didn't have anything to lose for telling her. If anything, she might actually be helpful, considering how close her relationship with the Commander was. "Fine…join us if you want. But not a word to any other person!"  
明日香眨了眨眼。她从未想过绫波……真的有情感，而且……以她自己奇怪的方式关心着她？尽管难以承认，但绫波现在看起来并不像她最初认为的那样像个玩偶。再想想，绫波也是一名驾驶员，这意味着她迟早会知道真相，所以明日香告诉她也没什么损失。如果有什么的话，考虑到她和司令官的亲密关系，她可能真的会有所帮助。“好吧……如果你想加入就加入吧。但别对其他人透露一个字！”

"Friends keep each other's secrets. I am your friend, therefore I will keep your secret."  
“朋友之间保守秘密。我是你的朋友，因此我会保守你的秘密。”

"Good." Asuka sighed in relief. "Well, NERV Germany is demanding my presence, but I don't want to go back. So Shinji and I are thinking of ways to let me stay."  
"好。" 明日香松了口气。"嗯，德国的 NERV 分部要求我回去，但我不想走。所以我和真嗣正在想办法让我留下来。"

Rei's eyes widened a hair, the equivalent of a blink on ordinary people. "Why?"  
绫波的眼睛微微睁大，对于普通人来说相当于眨眼。"为什么？"

"Who the fuck knows? I guess since I can't pilot anymore, they…they…" Asuka choked on her last words, a pained expression crossed her face as she was again reminded of her uselessness.  
"谁他妈知道？大概是因为我不能再驾驶了，他们……他们……" 明日香说到最后哽咽了，痛苦的表情掠过她的脸庞，再次提醒了她自己的无用。

"Oh," Rei tilted her by a minuscule amount. "You shouldn't rely on EVA," the blue-haired girl continued. "There is happiness to be found outside of piloting them."  
"哦，" 丽轻轻地倾斜了一下她的身体。"你不应该依赖 EVA，"蓝发女孩继续说道。"在驾驶它们之外，还有幸福可以找到。"

"What was that?" Asuka hissed. "Are you just rubbing it off on my face?!"  
"那是什么？" 明日香低声咆哮。"你是在往我脸上抹吗？！"

"I am unable to bong with people without EVA," Rei continued, ignoring her outburst. "I see you have already found happiness outside of EVA. I…envy you."  
"我无法在没有 EVA 的情况下与人交往，" 丽继续说道，无视她的爆发。"我看到你已经在 EVA 之外找到了幸福。我……羡慕你。"

"You're not making any sense, wondergirl," Asuka's rage turned into confusion. "Happiness? Can't you see that I'm…very much unhappy right now?!"  
"你根本说不通，小奇迹女孩，" 明日香愤怒转为困惑，"幸福？你难道看不出来我现在……非常不开心吗？！"

"He makes you happy, doesn't he?" Ayanami glanced at Shinji.  
"他让你感到幸福，对吧？" 绫波瞥了一眼真嗣。

Asuka found herself in a speechless state. Did Shinji make her happy? Of course, she would admit that she needed him, trusted him, and felt _comfortable_ and _not lonely_ around him. But happiness? Although Shinji had said he only wanted her to be happy, she didn't think she could ever again, after that day…the day she became an Evangelion pilot, the simultaneously most happy and terrifying day of her life. "I…I don't know," she replied just above a whisper.  
明日香发现自己无言以对。真嗣让她感到幸福吗？当然，她会承认自己需要他，信任他，和他在一起感到舒适而不孤单。但幸福？尽管真嗣说过只希望她幸福，但她不认为在那一天之后自己还能再次感到幸福……那一天她成为 EVA 驾驶员，既是她一生中最快乐也是最恐怖的一天。"我……我不知道，" 她低声回答。

"It's easy to see," Rei kept using her monotone voice. "Your…light, shines when you're around him."  
“这很容易看出来，”绫波继续用她那单调的声音说，“你的……光芒，在他身边时闪耀。”

Two pairs of eyes glared at the blue-haired girl in shock. Utter failure of comprehension in Asuka's case, while Shinji couldn't believe Rei wished to disclose so much information about her origin. "Light? What the hell is that?!"  
两双眼睛震惊地瞪着蓝发女孩。明日香完全无法理解，而真嗣则不敢相信绫波愿意透露这么多关于她身世的信息。“光？那到底是什么鬼东西？！”

"It's classified." “那是机密。”

"Whatever…" Asuka rubbed her forehead, "but even if I've already found my happiness, I'm about to lose it if I don't get back into my EVA in one week!"  
“随便吧…”明日香揉了揉额头，“但即使我已经找到了我的幸福，如果一周内不能回到我的 EVA 里，我就要失去它了！”

"EVA is a mirror that reflects your heart. You need to open up yourself to it."  
“EVA 是你心灵的镜子。你需要向它敞开心扉。”

"What's there opening up to a damned machine for?"  
“对着一台该死的机器敞开心扉有什么用？”

"EVA is more than just a machine, Asuka," Rei fixed her red eyes on the girl.  
"EVA 不仅仅是一台机器，明日香，" 绫波凝视着女孩，红色的眼睛里透着坚定。

Asuka's lips turned into a thin line. More than just a machine? Then what could it be? She felt a chill ran down her spine as she recalled watching the footage of the Israfel battle. The way Unit 01 roared at the sky…machines could never do that, could they? If anything, she would say at that time Unit 01 was a raging beast.  
明日香的嘴唇抿成了一条细线。不仅仅是一台机器？那它还能是什么？她回想起观看伊斯拉斐尔战斗录像时的情景，那种脊背发凉的感觉再次袭来。零一机对着天空咆哮的样子……机器绝不可能做到那样，不是吗？如果非要形容，她会说那一刻的零一机就像一头狂怒的野兽。

It was at that moment she found Ritsuko's words extremely truthful. _'There's still so much I don't know about the EVA…'_  
就在那一刻，她觉得律子的那些话无比真实。'关于 EVA，我还有很多不了解的地方……'

XXXXXX

On their way back to the classroom, the strange looks Asuka received only got worse – there were even groups of people who seemed to come just to take a look at her pathetic state. Shinji silently cursed since he knew the information must've spread wide across the campus to attract so many people.  
在他们返回教室的路上，明日香收到的奇怪目光愈发恶劣——甚至有成群的人似乎专程前来只为看她狼狈的样子。真嗣默默咒骂，因为他知道这消息一定已经传遍了整个校园，才能吸引这么多人围观。

Shinji could feel his heart stung as he saw Asuka's face darken with each passing second. After hearing Asuka's knuckles crack in anger, he decided that was it. "Go away!" He yelled at a group of smaller kids who were looking at Asuka giggling. Shinji raised his fist, "Go away before I-"  
看到明日香的脸色随着每一秒过去而越发阴沉，真嗣感到心痛。听到明日香因愤怒而握紧的拳头发出声响后，他决定不能再忍。“走开！”他对一群窃笑的小孩吼道。真嗣举起拳头，“走开，否则我——”

He trailed off as he felt someone tugging his shirt. "Shinji…no need. I deserve to be laughed at, don't I?" Asuka let out a sorrowful chuckle, the warm feeling she got from Shinji defending her did little to help soothe her sore mood. "I'm nothing, no one. I failed in battle, I'm a disgrace of Evangelion project…I-"  
他话音未落，感觉有人拉扯他的衬衫。“真嗣…没必要。我活该被嘲笑，不是吗？”明日香苦笑一声，真嗣为她辩护带来的温暖感觉对缓解她糟糕的心情并无多大帮助。“我什么都不是，没人关心。我在战斗中失败了，我是福音战士计划的耻辱…我——”

"**Silence**," Shinji said sternly, shutting her up in an instant. "We've had this discussion before, Asuka," his tone softened as he continued. "This," he pointed at the wheelchair. "Tell me do you see this as a symbol of your failure?" Seeing Asuka nod hesitantly, he spoke up again. "But I don't. I see this as a mark of what you've contributed to the world."  
“安静，”真嗣严肃地说道，立刻让她闭上了嘴。“我们之前讨论过这个，明日香，”他的语气在继续时变得柔和。“这个，”他指着轮椅。“告诉我，你认为这是你失败的象征吗？”看到明日香犹豫地点头，他再次开口。“但我不是。我认为这是你为这个世界所做出的贡献的标志。”

Asuka blinked in confusion and surprise. "What are you talking about?"  
明日香困惑又惊讶地眨了眨眼。“你在说什么？”

"You might have been defeated by the Angel, but you didn't fail, Asuka," Shinji knelt down beside her wheelchair, so now he was looking up to her. "You and Ayanami weakened the Angel and found its weakness so that I could defeat it. I would've never been able to defeat it by myself." It was a lie he needed to say at the moment. "Whenever I see it, I think of your indispensable contribution to the battle, not…other things."  
"你或许被使徒打败了，但你并没有失败，明日香，" 真嗣跪在她轮椅旁，现在他是仰视着她。"你和绫波削弱了使徒并找到了它的弱点，我才能击败它。我一个人是绝对做不到的。" 这是他此刻需要说出的谎言。"每当我看到它，我想到的是你在战斗中不可或缺的贡献，而不是……其他事情。"

"You…really think that?" Asuka asked with hope that filled her voice, her blue eyes beaming in surprise.  
"你……真的这么想？" 明日香带着满怀希望的声音问道，她的蓝眼睛因惊讶而闪烁。

"Of course. You're not useless, Asuka," Shinji reassured. "Who cares what those imbeciles think? All people in NERV will remember what you did for the whole world."  
"当然。你不是无用的，明日香，" 真嗣安慰道。"那些蠢货怎么想谁在乎？NERV 的所有人都会记得你为全世界所做的一切。"

Asuka relaxed in the wheelchair, a small smile crept up her face. She didn't care about whether or not other people pitied her anymore. She realized that just like the praises she got from them before, they were all empty without real meaning behind them. Maybe people would forget about her, perhaps even NERV employees would forget about her, but she still had value as long as Shinji was by her side. It was probably only a tiny, even temporary victory of her bright side, but a victory nonetheless.  
明日香坐在轮椅上放松下来，一丝微笑悄悄爬上她的脸庞。她不再在意别人是否还对她抱有同情。她意识到，就像之前从他们那里得到的赞美一样，这些都毫无意义，背后没有真正的内涵。也许人们会忘记她，甚至 NERV 的员工也会忘记她，但只要真嗣在她身边，她依然有价值。这或许只是她光明面的一次微小甚至暂时的胜利，但胜利终究是胜利。

XXXXXX

## *Chapter 14*: Chapter 14: Everything I Do  
*第十四章*：一切我所为

Disclaimer: I do not own Evangelion  
免责声明：我不拥有《新世纪福音战士》

**Chapter 14: Everything I Do  
第十四章：我所做的一切**

Shinji entered Gendo Ikari's office with a complex of emotions, even the dark room's chilling environment didn't help put out the supernova inside his chest. "I'll be straight to the point, father," he started as soon as Gendo came into a talking distance. "There's no way Asuka's going back to Germany."  
真嗣带着复杂的情绪走进碇源堂的办公室，即便是昏暗房间的阴冷环境也无法平息他胸中如超新星爆发般的情感。“我会直截了当地说，父亲，”他一等碇源堂走近便开口道，“无论如何，明日香都不会回德国。”

"I understand," Gendo replied calmly. "However, the politics in here is delicate. Technically NERV Japan and NERV Germany are at the same level in terms of jurisdiction. We can't interfere with their decisions. However," he added before Shinji could say anything, "I will try to negotiate with them. Other than that, there's not much I can do, except you could try to destroy NERV Germany branch with Unit 01."  
"我明白，" 碇源堂平静地回答。"不过，这里的政治局势很微妙。从技术上讲，NERV 日本和 NERV 德国在管辖权上是平级的。我们不能干涉他们的决定。不过，" 他没等真嗣开口就补充道，"我会尝试与他们谈判。除此之外，我能做的并不多，除非你打算用初号机摧毁 NERV 德国支部。"

"I probably will if it comes to that," said Shinji half-jokingly. "If she's under normal conditions…I could've accepted it. But now she's as good as dead if we send her back. And you know what happens then."  
"如果真到了那一步，我可能会这么做，" 真嗣半开玩笑地说。"如果她处于正常状态…我或许能接受。但现在送她回去，她几乎等于死路一条。而且你知道那会发生什么。"

"Is that a threat?" Gendo narrowed his eyes by a hair, hid by the colored glasses.  
"这是威胁吗？" 碇源堂微微眯起眼睛，被有色眼镜遮住了。

"I'm just stating the reality," Shinji retorted.  
“我只是陈述现实，”真嗣反驳道。

"I see." Gendo fell silent for a moment. He would've done anything to get Yui back, even at the cost of the whole world. In a way, Shinji resembled a lot like himself, so he didn't doubt that there's a high chance that he would actually destroy NERV Germany if anything happened to the Second Child there. "I'll see what I can do."  
“我明白了。”碇源堂沉默了一会儿。为了找回唯，他愿意付出整个世界的代价。某种程度上，真嗣和他非常相似，所以他毫不怀疑，如果第二适格者在德国发生任何事，真嗣真的可能会摧毁德国 NERV。“我会看看能做些什么。”

"Father, no matter how much I hate it, we're in this together," Shinji added in a softer tone. "If we cooperate more, in the end, we both get what we want. A win-win situation."  
"父亲，无论我多么讨厌这一点，我们都是一条船上的人，" 真嗣用更柔和的语气补充道。"如果我们更多地合作，最终我们都能得到我们想要的。双赢的局面。"

"That is correct," Gendo said, his hands kept clasping together under his chin. "That means you should make more of your contribution as well."  
"没错，" 碇源堂说道，他的双手始终在下巴下交握。"这意味着你也应该做出更多的贡献。"

"Sure, how about some intel of the next Angel?" A smirk crept up his face. "Go search inside Mount Asama. Don't do anything yet, I have my own plan to defeat it…harmlessly."  
"当然，关于下一个使徒的情报怎么样？" 他脸上浮现出一丝得意的笑容。"去榛名山内部搜寻一下吧。先别行动，我自有办法无害地击败它……"

"I'm listening." Gendo perked up his ears.  
"我在听着。" 源度竖起了耳朵。

"Understood. I will inform the tactical division about it when they found the Angel," Gendo Ikari replied. "Anything else?"  
"明白了。战术部门发现天使后，我会通知他们。还有其他事吗？" 碇源堂回答道。"

"No. Not for now, father."  
"没有了。暂时没有，父亲。"

"Alright. Dismissed." "好了，解散。"

Gendo Ikari sat on his office chair as he watched Shinji leave the room. He could very well relate to his own son in such a situation. If he was Shinji, and Asuka was Yui…  
碇源堂坐在他的办公椅上，看着真嗣离开房间。在这种情况下，他完全能理解自己的儿子。如果他是真嗣，而明日香是唯……

一个决定已经做出。碇源堂拿起桌边的座机，拨打了德国分部负责人的号码。"威廉·施密特在此。"NERV 德国分部领导人的声音从扬声器中传来。

"Gendo Ikari," Gendo spoke into the microphone in a freezing voice, sending shivers ran down William's spine. "I've been informed that the German branch is demanding the presence of the Second Child. Explain."  
"碇源堂，" 源度用冰冷的语气对着麦克风说道，让威廉的脊背一阵发凉。"我被告知德国分部要求第二适格者的到场。解释一下。"

"Pilot Soryu is still a reserve pilot, so she's still under NERV Japan's jurisdiction," Gendo cut him off in a stern voice that left no room for negotiations. "Is that understood?"  
“飞行员惣流仍然是预备役，所以她仍归 NERV 日本管辖，”碇源堂用一种不容商榷的严厉语气打断了他，“明白了吗？”

"But she's NERV Germany's property, technically we could-"  
"但她从技术上讲是 NERV 德国的财产，理论上我们可以——"

"Doctor Ritsuko Akagi still needs her presence in NERV HQ, and as the head of Project E, her power overrides yours under this situation." Gendo Ikari remembered a document Dr. Akagi had sent him days ago about doing some necessary tests on the Second Child to find a solution to her problem, which now became handy.  
"Dr. Ritsuko Akagi 在 NERV 总部仍需要她的存在，作为 E 计划负责人，在这种情況下她的权力凌驾于你之上。" Gendo Ikari 想起了几天前 Dr. Akagi 发给他的一份文件，关于对二号适格者进行一些必要测试以解决她的问题，现在这变得很有用。

"Wait, I didn't see the official document," it was a small wonder William still dared to shot back.  
"等等，我没看到正式文件，" William 居然还敢反驳，真是令人惊讶。

Gendo Ikari huffed. He took out the request form and sighed on it. "From now on, it's officially an order. You will receive the document tomorrow."  
碇源堂哼了一声，拿出申请表叹了口气，“从现在起，这正式成为一项命令。你明天会收到文件。”

The commander of NERV waited patiently for a reply. After a long pause on William's side, a _defeated_ voice finally came to him. "Understood."  
NERV 的指挥官耐心等待着回复。在威廉那边长时间的沉默后，一个沮丧的声音终于传了过来，“明白了。”

A slight smirk crept up his face as Gendo hanged up the phone. No one would mess with his scenario and impede his reunion with Yui.  
一丝冷笑爬上了他的脸庞，当源渡挂断电话时。没有人能干扰他的剧本，阻碍他与唯的重逢。

_"Hadn't thought that far. But if the battery runs out, the muscle will still lock on." Came Shinji's dispassionate response. No matter what, he would NOT let her fall.

_What happened next, though registered by his eyes, he still refused to believe it. The coolant pipes he gripped on that were connected with Unit 02 snapped, and the crimson behemoth in white armor promptly started falling down.

_"Understood." The sudden shift of his tone chilled the bones of everyone in the command center.  
“明白了。”他语气的突然转变让指挥中心内的每个人都感到骨寒。_

_If Asuka's no more…then he wanted nothing from this world anymore.  
如果明日香不在了……那么他对这个世界再无所求。_

Asuka Langley Soryu's eyes cracked open, smiling as she felt the warmth of another body wrapped around her like a big spoon, though for some reason, her left hand was aching. For the last few days, they'd always fell asleep in such a position, to a point she had already been getting used to it. Even though the idea scared her – she should be independent and rely on nobody – Asuka still didn't want to give up the warmth and comfort of sleeping next to _Shinji._  
惣流·明日香·兰格雷的眼睛缓缓睁开，感受到另一具身体像大勺子一样环绕着她，带来温暖，尽管不知为何她的左手隐隐作痛。最近几天，他们总是以这样的姿势入睡，以至于她已经习惯了。尽管这个想法让她害怕——她应该是独立的，不依赖任何人——但明日香仍然不想放弃睡在真嗣身边的温暖和舒适。

A glance at the clock told her it was 4 in the morning. Asuka frowned since normally only nightmares would cause her to wake up so early, while the dream she just had – she and Shinji massacring a horde of human-sized Angels with shining swords and armor – was one of the best dreams she had recently.  
看了一眼时钟，她发现现在是凌晨四点。明日香皱起眉头，因为通常只有噩梦才会让她这么早醒来，而她刚刚做的梦——她和真嗣挥舞着闪亮的剑和盔甲，屠杀一群人形使徒——却是她近期做过的最好的梦之一。

Then why did she wake up so early?  
那她为什么这么早就醒了？

As the haziness of her brain slowly subsided, she could feel the _aching_ of her left hand quickly became _painful._ She looked down at her hand and saw Shinji had a vice-like grip on her fingers, his fingernails digging into her palm.  
随着大脑的迷糊逐渐消退，她能感觉到左手的疼痛迅速加剧。她低头看向自己的手，发现真嗣像钳子一样紧紧抓住她的手指，指甲深深嵌入她的手掌。

As much as Asuka liked physical contact with Shinji, he was now _hurting_ her. Asuka let out a low yelp of pain as his grasp suddenly increased in strength. She never knew Shinji, who looked thin and weak, possessed so much muscle power, nor did she understand why he was holding her so forcefully to the point that it hurt.  
尽管明日香喜欢与真嗣的肢体接触，但他现在弄疼了她。随着他的握力突然增强，明日香发出一声低沉的痛呼。她从未意识到看似瘦弱无力的真嗣竟有如此强大的肌肉力量，也不明白他为何要如此用力地抓着她，以至于让她感到疼痛。

She took a look at his peaceful face and confirmed his sleeping status, which created more confusion. People said dreams were a continuation of reality…so was this Shinji's way of saying, 'I'm not letting you go?' Although the thought fluttered her heart, the pain induced by his grip quickly wiped out all positive feelings. Asuka silently cursed since she knew if she didn't get out of this grasp soon her hand was going to bruise badly. She waited for his grip to loosen and took the opportunity; with a forceful pull, she got rid of his iron lock, shaking her hand to relax the sore flesh.  
她瞥了一眼他平静的面容，确认了他的睡眠状态，这反而增添了更多困惑。人们常说梦境是现实的延续……那么这是否意味着真嗣在用这种方式表达，‘我不会让你离开’？尽管这个念头让她的心微微颤动，但他的紧握带来的疼痛迅速抹去了所有积极的感受。明日香默默地咒骂着，因为她知道如果再不挣脱这个束缚，她的手将会严重瘀伤。她等待着他的握力放松，抓住机会；用力一拉，她摆脱了他的铁钳，摇晃着手以缓解酸痛的肌肉。

Asuka blinked as she saw the sudden shift of expression on Shinji's face. The relaxed look he had on his face before she pulled her hand out darkened instantly, and his face contorted, "No…' suka…" he mumbled, starting to twitch and turn in his sleep.  
明日香眨了眨眼，看到真嗣脸上的表情突然转变。在她抽出手之前，他脸上的放松表情瞬间变得阴沉，他的脸扭曲着，“不……明日香……”他喃喃自语，开始在睡梦中抽搐和翻转。

Suddenly Shinji's arm shot upward, waving in the air. Asuka fixed her gaze on the feebly waving hand; was he reaching out for something? Her college-graduate level brain wasted no time finding the answer before a look of shame crossed her face. But his grip was hurting her, otherwise she would've stayed in that way. Still-  
突然，真嗣的手臂猛地向上挥动，在空中无力地挥舞。明日香凝视着那只微弱挥动的手；他是在寻找什么吗？她的大学毕业生级别的大脑毫不费力地找到了答案，但随即脸上掠过一丝羞愧。但他的握力让她疼痛，否则她会那样待着。尽管如此——

"I 'an't los' 'suka…" Another mumble reached her ears, snapping her out of her train of thoughts. Did Shinji just… Asuka shook her head. Just how much did she mean to him? What about the other girl Shinji mentioned before? She found it was impossible to answer these questions, yet there was one thing she could do at the moment.  
"我不能失去你，伙伴……" 又一声含糊的话语传入她的耳中，打断了她的思绪。难道真嗣刚刚……明日香摇了摇头。她对他来说到底有多重要？那他之前提到的另一个女孩呢？她发现这些问题无法回答，但有一件事她现在可以做。

_"Sometimes emotional support is much more important than physical ones."  
"有时候，情感支持远比物质上的更为重要。"_

With a determined look in her eyes, Asuka snapped out her right hand and grabbed Shinji's. Although it was almost crushed in his immediate iron grip, Asuka gritted her teeth and endured the pain. Compared to what Shinji had done for her, a little…discomfort was nothing.  
眼中闪过坚定的光芒，明日香猛地伸出右手抓住了真嗣的手。尽管他的铁钳般的握力几乎让她感到剧痛，明日香咬紧牙关忍耐着。与真嗣为她所做的一切相比，这点……不适根本不算什么。

"Shinji… it's okay… I'm right here… I'm not leaving…" She whispered into his ears; slowly she could feel Shinji relax with each passing second, his grasp on her hand loosened in strength as well. Asuka's lips curled up a bit as she saw the expression on Shinji's face gradually returned to the previous peaceful state; just this time it also had a hint of a smile in it.  
“真嗣…没事的…我就在这儿…不会离开的…”她轻声细语地在他耳边呢喃；渐渐地，她能感觉到真嗣随着每一秒过去而放松下来，他紧握她手的力道也减弱了。明日香看到真嗣脸上的表情逐渐恢复到之前的平静状态，只是这次还带着一丝微笑，她的嘴角不禁微微上扬。

Even though he said he needed nothing from her, she still found a way to help him, and she was _happy_ that she could reciprocate his effort.  
尽管他说不需要她的任何东西，她还是找到了帮助他的方法，并且她很高兴能够回报他的努力。

For the first time since the battle against the seventh Angel, Asuka felt a note of pride for herself. It was substantial evidence that she was still useful, in her own way.  
自从与第七使徒的战斗以来，明日香第一次为自己感到一丝骄傲。这充分证明了她仍然有她自己的价值。

"Sleep well, Baka-Shinji," Asuka whispered into his ear one last time and lay down back on her bed, smiling herself to sleep.  
“睡个好觉，笨蛋真嗣。”明日香最后一次在他耳边低语，然后躺回自己的床上，微笑着进入梦乡。

The atmosphere in the research lab near Mount Asama had been tense ever since Captain Katsuragi had arrived. Although the woman was messy at home, she could be formal and professional when needed.  
自从桂木队长来到位于浅间山附近的研究实验室后，气氛就一直很紧张。虽然这位女士在家里不修边幅，但必要时她可以非常正式和专业。

They had been descending an unmanned drone into the pool of magma, hoping to find the source that was causing the disruption in the magma flow under Mount Asama. However, they hadn't found anything yet; and the drone was approaching dangerous depths.  
他们一直在将一架无人驾驶飞行器下降到岩浆池中，希望能找到导致浅间山下岩浆流紊乱的源头。然而，他们至今一无所获；而无人机正接近危险的深度。

"Captain Katsuragi," The lead scientist spoke up as he watched the altitude of the drone continue to drop more and more. "This drone will never be able to withstand the pressures you plan on putting it through."  
"葛城队长," 首席科学家在观察无人机高度持续下降时开口说道，"这台无人机根本无法承受您计划中的压力。"

"If we destroy it, then NERV will pay for a new one." She said in an indifferent tone.  
"如果我们毁了它，NERV 会出钱买新的。" 她用一种漠不关心的语气说道。"

"Maximum safety depth reached." The young research announced.  
"达到最大安全深度。" 年轻的研究员宣布道。"

"Continue the descend." Misato's gaze never moved a bit from the screen.  
“继续下潜。”美里目光始终未曾从屏幕上移开。

Moments later, a loud crack of metal was heard, and Misato gritted her teeth. They just needed to go a little bit farther down. The drone finally reached the depth that Misato wanted, and just at that moment, another loud crack was heard, and the video feed was severed.  
片刻后，一声金属断裂的巨响传来，美里咬紧牙关。他们只需再深入一点。无人机终于到达了美里所需的深度，就在此时，又一声巨响传来，视频信号被切断了。

"The drone has been destroyed." One of the engineers announced in comms.  
“无人机已被摧毁。”通讯中一名工程师宣布道。

"Did you get the photo?" Misato turned her head toward the screen that the technician was looking at.  
"你拿到照片了吗？" 美里转向技术人员正在查看的屏幕。

"Yeah." On the screen was a picture of what looked like a skeletal embryo of some sort. "The scan reads pattern blue." He swallowed hard, "It's an Angel."  
"嗯。" 屏幕上显示着一张看似某种骸骨胚胎的图片。"扫描结果显示为蓝色模式。" 他艰难地咽了口唾沫，"这是一只使徒。"

Misato took a deep breath and stood straight. "Everyone, this laboratory is now officially under the jurisdiction of NERV!" She announced, "This facility is to be locked down. No one is to get in or out! And anything that happens here is to be declared confidential!"  
美里深吸一口气，站直了身子。"所有人注意，这个实验室现在正式归 NERV 管辖！" 她宣布道，"该设施将被封锁。任何人不得进出！这里发生的一切都将被列为机密！"

EVA Unit 01 stood on the ground several miles away from Mount Asama, its pilot looking up at the sky where dozens of bombers were flying around, leaving stripes of white contrails behind them. The roar of the aircraft jet engines spread far away, declaring their hegemony of the sky.  
EVA 初号机矗立在距离浅间山数英里外的地面上，其驾驶员抬头望向天空，那里有数十架轰炸机盘旋着，留下一道道白色的尾迹。飞机喷气发动机的轰鸣声远远传开，宣告着它们对天空的统治。

Shinji Ikari leaned back on his pilot seat, patiently waiting for the operation to start. One of his worst nightmares was watching Asuka sink into the deadly abyss of Mount Asama; although he never failed to pull her out of death's door, he couldn't help but get anxious every time he waited beside the caldera while watching Unit 02 go down the molten pit.  
碇真嗣靠在驾驶座上，耐心等待行动开始。他最可怕的噩梦之一就是看着明日香沉入浅间山致命的深渊；尽管他从未失手将她从死神手中救出，但每次在火山口旁等待，看着 02 号机坠入熔岩深坑时，他都不禁感到焦虑。

He shook his head, trying to get rid of unhelpful recollected images of last night's bad dream. Even though he knew it was only a nightmare, the dream was too real to ignore. Only from the dreams he learned how grim the situation was every time he went down there to save her – one misstep and it would all be over.  
他摇了摇头，试图摆脱昨晚噩梦中那些无益的回忆。尽管他知道那只是一场梦，但梦境太过真实，无法忽视。正是在这些梦中，他了解到每次下去救她时情况有多么严峻——一步走错，一切都将结束。

Fortunately, this time Asuka was at a safe spot – the command deck in NERV HQ, observing the battle along with Misato and bridge bunnies. Shinji took a few deep breaths in LCL, preparing himself for the incoming fight.  
幸运的是，这次明日香在一个安全的地方——NERV 总部的指挥甲板，与美里和桥上的工作人员一起观察战斗。真嗣在 LCL 中深呼吸几次，为即将到来的战斗做准备。

"N2 depth charges drop ETA 10 seconds. All units stand by."  
“N2 深水炸弹投放倒计时 10 秒。各单位准备。”

At the moment, through enhanced vision monitor Shinji could see a small object falling down from one of the bombers, shining as the sunlight reflected on its metal exterior. The free-falling N2 depth charge plummeted into the caldera with a terminal speed of nearly 200 meters per second, raising a column of magma as it struck the lake of molten rock. As the depth charge sunk deeper and deeper into the mountain, the pressure around the firing pin quickly built up to the threshold.  
此刻，通过增强视觉监视器，真嗣可以看到一个小物体从其中一架轰炸机上坠落，阳光在其金属外壳上反射出光芒。自由落体的 N2 深水炸弹以近每秒 200 米的末速度冲入火山口，撞击熔岩湖时激起了一柱岩浆。随着深水炸弹深入山体，周围的压力迅速积累到触发引信的阈值。

With a blinding flash of light, Shinji temporarily lost all his information feed as the EMP wave caused by the blast swept across the area. Nuking a volcano was a dangerous thing to do, to say the least, and no one had ever done it before, so for safety reasons all personnel within a 100 miles radius was evacuated, leaving only Unit 01, Unit 00, and an unmanned power station on the site. The purple EVA Unit and the blue EVA Unit both uncurled their AT-Fields, blocking the incoming shockwave.  
随着一道刺眼的闪光，真嗣暂时失去了所有信息反馈，因为爆炸产生的电磁脉冲波横扫了整个区域。可以说，对火山进行核打击是极其危险的行为，而且从未有人尝试过，因此出于安全考虑，方圆 100 英里内的人员都被疏散，现场仅留下 01 号机、00 号机和一个无人发电站。紫色 EVA 和蓝色 EVA 都展开了 AT 力场，阻挡迎面而来的冲击波。

After the electronic interference and the blinding light subsided, Shinji could get a good view of the aftermath. The entire cone of the volcano was utterly wiped out, leaving a gigantic smoking crater on the ground. Huge columns of magma shot up to the air and splashed across the land nearby, flaming the sky, shaking the ground.  
电子干扰和刺眼光芒消退后，真嗣终于能清楚地看到后果。整个火山锥彻底被夷为平地，留下一个巨大的冒烟弹坑。炽热的岩浆柱冲天而起，溅落在附近的土地上，点燃了天空，震撼着大地。

"I'm reading some strange seismic activities," Shinji reported as he saw the warning messages on the panel. As if aroused by his words, a distorted roar hit him through his neural link with the EVA, sending chills down his spine. He had never heard Sandalphon shriek like this ever before. He could only hope it was not a bad sign.  
“我检测到一些异常的地震活动，”真嗣报告道，他注意到控制面板上的警告信息。仿佛被他的话所触发，一声扭曲的咆哮通过他与 EVA 的神经连接冲击着他，令他脊背发凉。他从未听过桑达尔丰如此尖叫。他只能希望这不是什么坏兆头。

With a loud noise of explosion an enormous silhouette leaped out from the crater into the air, its shape easily recognizable as Sandalphon. The weird thing was its skin seemed darker than he remembered, and it didn't even raise its AT-Field. Shinji shook his thoughts off and pulled out his prog knife specifically designed to cut through heavy armor, and entered combat stance. With Unit 00 by his side and all the air support he got, fighting Sandalphon on _land_ would be an easy task to do.  
随着一声爆炸巨响，一个庞大的身影从弹坑中跃入空中，其形状很容易辨认出是桑达尔丰。奇怪的是，它的皮肤似乎比他记忆中的更暗，而且甚至没有展开 AT 力场。真嗣甩开这些念头，拔出专门用于切割重装甲的程序刀，进入战斗姿态。有零号机在旁和所有空中支援，在陆地上对付桑达尔丰将是一项轻松的任务。

Or at least he thought so.  
至少他是这么认为的。

XXXXXX

Asuka kept her eyes focused on the big screen that was displaying the battle, recorded by one of the VTOLs on site. As a reserve pilot she wasn't sorting, not that she could pilot her EVA even if they put her in an entry plug. Still, she wanted to be helpful in some way, so she thought observing the battle and coming up with ideas that might help would be the best choice.  
明日香将目光锁定在大屏幕上，屏幕上正播放着现场一架垂直起降飞机录制的战斗画面。作为后备飞行员，她并未参与战斗，即便让她进入插入栓，她也驾驶不了她的 EVA。尽管如此，她仍想以某种方式提供帮助，因此她认为观察战斗并提出可能有助于战局的建议是最佳选择。

From the screen, she could see the Angel slowly creeping across the land like a reptile, in a…very much not graceful manner. She felt a note of jealousy firing up inside her chest. From the looks of it, the Angel was a weak one – it didn't even have an AT-Field! She doubted even the normally-useless UN military forces could kill it just as quickly. It's basically a free kill for Shinji and wondergirl. Why did Israfel come before this one? Why did Shinji and wondergirl get to face a feeble Angel, while she had to fight the strongest one so far and get utterly destroyed?  
从屏幕上，她能看到使徒像爬行动物一样缓慢地横穿大地，那种姿态……实在谈不上优雅。她感到一丝嫉妒在胸中燃起。从外表看，这个使徒相当弱小——它甚至没有 AT 力场！她怀疑即使是平时无能的联合国军队也能迅速将其消灭。这基本上是给真嗣和那个女孩的免费击杀。为什么伊斯拉斐尔会在这个使徒之前出现？为什么真嗣和那个女孩能面对一个虚弱的使徒，而她却不得不对抗迄今为止最强的那个并被彻底摧毁？

Nevertheless, she decided she didn't need to brood on such trivial things right now.  
尽管如此，她决定现在不必为这些琐事烦恼。

Asuka shook the unhelpful thoughts off and focused on the battle. From the video feed she saw Unit 00 raise a pallet rifle and fired. The 406 mm Armor-piercing fin-stabilized discarding sabot rounds flew across the air, heading toward the eighth Angel at sonic speeds. Asuka expected the Angel to raise its AT-Field to block the deadly shells; she knew even though the Angels were extraterrestrial existence, they were still made out of flesh and blood. Without the protection of AT-Fields they were nothing but fishes on a chopping board.  
明日香甩开这些无益的想法，专注于战斗。从视频中她看到零号机举起一个托盘式步枪并开火。406 毫米穿甲尾翼稳定脱壳弹以超音速飞向第八使徒。明日香预计使徒会升起它的 AT 力场来阻挡这些致命的炮弹；她知道尽管使徒是外星存在，但它们仍然是血肉之躯。没有 AT 力场的保护，它们不过是砧板上的鱼肉。

However, she couldn't believe what she saw next. The depleted-uranium shells that could easily penetrate several meters of homogeneous steel like paper ricocheted off its dark skin harmlessly, not so much as leaving a small scratch.  
然而，接下来的一幕让她难以置信。那些能轻易穿透数米厚均质钢板如纸般的贫铀弹，却在那漆黑皮肤的表面无害地弹开，连一丝微小的划痕都未留下。

Asuka frowned. The Angel seemed to have firmer skin than she thought…  
明日香皱起眉头。这使徒的皮肤似乎比她想象的还要坚硬……

Then she could see several B-52 bombers dropping dozens of bunker busters from 20000 feet high; those newest MOPs could break through up to 60 meters of steel and concrete, while the Angel had a height of merely 50 meters when its creeping. Therefore, she was totally expecting the missiles to pierce through the Angel from top to bottom.  
随后，她看到几架 B-52 轰炸机从两万英尺高空投下数十枚钻地弹；这些最新的 MOPs 能穿透多达 60 米的钢混结构，而使徒匍匐时的高度不过 50 米。因此，她完全期待着导弹能从上至下贯穿使徒。

So when the bunker busters hit the target and didn't even detonate before smashing themselves into thousand of pieces, Asuka felt a cold ball growing inside her stomach.  
所以当那些钻地炸弹击中目标，甚至在引爆前就自行粉碎成千片时，明日香感到一股寒意在胃中蔓延。

"The fuzes of our missiles shattered upon hitting the Angel," Aoba reported in an unbelieving voice. "The Angel must have a stronger armor than we thought."  
“我们的导弹在击中使徒时，引信就破碎了，”青叶用难以置信的语气报告，“使徒的装甲一定比我们预想的更强。”

"I get it now!" Ritsuko exclaimed. "The intense heat in the volcano must've adjusted its molecular structure!"  
“我明白了！”律子惊呼，“火山中的高温一定调整了它的分子结构！”

Asuka raised her eyebrows as the realization dawned on her. If the Angel could endure the extreme heat and pressure inside the volcano, then some pathetic AP shells or bunker busters would look like a five-finger exercise in comparison. She watched in dread as Unit 01 wielded its upgraded prog knife, charging toward the Angel. The purple EVA Unit leaped into the sky and brought the knife down onto its enemy.  
明日香扬起眉毛，意识到这一点时，她的心情沉重。如果使徒能承受火山内部的极端高温和压力，那么那些可怜的 AP 弹或碉堡破坏者相比之下就像五指练习一样简单。她恐惧地看着 01 号机挥舞着升级后的程序刀，向使徒冲去。紫色的 EVA 单位一跃而起，将刀劈向敌人。

With a loud sound of clank, the knife broke into pieces upon contact.  
随着一声清脆的撞击声，刀在接触的瞬间碎裂成片。

Asuka felt her blood freeze.  
明日香感到血液凝固。

XXXXXX

Shinji looked at the broken prog knife in his hand incredulously, dripping sweat like a rainstorm. He was aware that Sandalphon had a hard surface; he even brought the enhanced prog knife that he was sure could break through the Angel's skin, or at least do moderate damage on it. The calculation done on MAGI couldn't lie; he even surpassed MAGI's recommendation by a few notches just to make sure. But not so much as leaving a scratch?  
真嗣难以置信地看着手中断裂的程序刀，汗水如暴雨般滴落。他知道桑达尔夫的表面坚硬无比；他甚至带上了那把确信能穿透使徒皮肤的强化程序刀，或者至少能对其造成中等程度的伤害。MAGI 的计算不会说谎；他甚至超过了 MAGI 推荐的几个档次，只为确保万无一失。但连一丝划痕都没留下？

He felt his blood run dry as he realized his negligence.  
他意识到自己的疏忽，感到血液仿佛凝固了。

The N2 depth charge. N2 深水炸弹。

Of course, the knife could hurt a Sandalphon which had adjusted to a volcanic environment. But this time, it survived at the epicenter of an explosion as powerful as a nuclear strike. It didn't even need something so mundane as an AT-Field.  
当然，这把刀能伤害到一个已经适应了火山环境的桑达风。但这次，它在一个威力堪比核打击的爆炸中心存活了下来。它甚至不需要像 AT 力场这样平凡的东西。

Unfortunately, he didn't have the coolant to thermal-expansion the Angel this time.  
不幸的是，这次他没有冷却剂来热膨胀这个使徒了。

He became overconfident with all of his foreknowledge, didn't he? Now the butterfly effect was backfiring at him at full power.  
他因为所有的先知先觉而变得过于自信，不是吗？现在蝴蝶效应正以全力反噬他。

Shinji gritted his teeth and pushed the controls forward.  
真嗣咬紧牙关，向前推动操纵杆。

XXXXXX

Asuka watched the battle dripping cold sweat as the Angel was gaining the upper hand in every possible way. She saw Unit 01 got thrown away and slammed hard on a nearby hill. She saw the bombers and VTOLs dropping and firing everything they've got and not causing so much as a scratch. She gasped as Unit 00 pull out its prog knife and charge at the Angel before immediately defeated by a vicious swing of the tail of the Angel.  
明日香看着战斗，冷汗直流，因为使徒在各个方面都占据了上风。她看到初号机被扔出去，重重地撞在附近的小山上。她看到轰炸机和垂直起降机倾泻所有火力，却连一点擦伤都没造成。她倒吸一口凉气，只见零号机拔出进度刀，冲向使徒，却立刻被使徒的尾巴猛烈一击击败。

"Unit 00 has gone silent," Maya reported in a shaky voice.  
「零号机已无回应。」摩耶用颤抖的声音报告道。

Her eyes went wide as she saw Unit 01's readings went crazy. "Pilot Ikari's sync rate is spiking! Ninety-seven percent!" The jealousy of his sync rate only appeared as a dim afterthought.  
当她看到 01 号机的读数疯狂飙升时，她的眼睛瞪大了。"碇真嗣的同步率在飙升！百分之九十七！"对他同步率的嫉妒只在一瞬间闪过。

Asuka felt shivers ran down her spine as she heard the bone-chilling roar coming from Unit 01. She felt her anxiety soothed a bit, knowing how powerful the EVA would become under this state. She prepared herself to enjoy the slaughter.  
明日香感到一阵寒意沿着脊椎蔓延，当她听到零一机传来的令人毛骨悚然的咆哮时。她感到一丝焦虑被缓解，知道在这种状态下 EVA 会变得多么强大。她准备好享受这场屠杀。

Then the slaughter happened. Just the slaughtered wasn't the Angel.  
然后屠杀发生了。只是被屠杀的并非使徒。

Even with the newly acquired power, without a proper weapon Unit 01 couldn't make any progress. Asuka watched in dread as both sides expanded their AT-Fields, the ground shook as the phase space neutralized. And when it came to competing for physical strength, Unit 01, no matter how many physics laws it broke with its movements, was no match against Sandalphon's absolute defense.  
即便获得了新力量，没有合适的武器，初号机依然无法取得进展。明日香惊恐地看着双方扩展 AT 力场，地面在相位空间中和时震动。而在比拼物理力量时，初号机无论其动作打破了多少物理定律，都无法匹敌桑达菲翁的绝对防御。

_'Come on, Shinji!'_ Her initial jealousy had already vaporized under the pressure of the situation. She suddenly felt idiotic to envy other pilots getting more Angel kills than her - every time they sortie, it was a life-or-death situation for _humanity._ For every punch Unit 01 landed on the Angel she would silently cheer for it, and only had her heart sunk in disappointment as every time there was no damage done.  
'加油，真嗣！'她最初的嫉妒在局势压力下早已烟消云散。她突然觉得自己嫉妒其他飞行员比她击杀更多使徒是多么愚蠢——每次出击，都是人类生死攸关的时刻。每当初号机对使徒挥出一拳，她都会默默为之欢呼，但每次看到毫无损伤时，心中只有失望沉沦。

Asuka went mouth agape, and her mind went blank in fear as she saw Sandalphon cut off both of Unit 01's legs like a knife cutting through butter with another ferocious swing of its blade-shaped tail. The fortified armor stood no chance against something that had a stiffness index several levels above it, after all. The only saving grace for Shinji was his sync rate wasn't above one hundred.  
明日香目瞪口呆，恐惧让她的思绪一片空白，当她看到桑达菲翁再次猛烈挥动其刀刃状的尾巴，如同切黄油般切断了初号机的双腿。毕竟，强化装甲在硬度指数高出数级的东西面前毫无抵抗之力。真嗣唯一的幸运是他的同步率并未超过一百。

"SHINJI!" "真嗣！"

The redhead caught the one last glimpse of Unit 01's gaze before it fell down. From the deep sadness in it, she could swear it was conveying a message to her.  
红发少女在 01 号机坠落前捕捉到了它最后一瞥的目光。从那深邃的悲伤中，她发誓那目光在向她传递着某种信息。

_'I'm sorry, Asuka…' '对不起，明日香…'_

Sandalphon snorted at the wrecked immobile form of Unit 01 and Unit 00, then continued marching toward its long-anticipated reunion with its progenitor.  
桑达尔丰对 01 号机和 00 号机那破损不堪、无法动弹的身躯嗤之以鼻，随即继续迈步走向与它期盼已久的始祖重逢之路。

XXXXXX

AN: I'm not sure whether or not the technical details are believable, so consider this as a plot device at worst. As for the power of military doctors I made it up. Stay tuned and leave a review!  
作者注：我不确定技术细节是否可信，所以最坏情况下请将其视为情节工具。至于军医的能力，是我虚构的。敬请期待并留下评论！

## *Chapter 15*: Chapter 15: Updraft  
*第 15 章*: 第 15 章：上升气流

Disclaimer: I do not own Evangelion  
免责声明：我不拥有《新世纪福音战士》

**Chapter 15: Updraft 第 15 章：上升气流**

"Captain Katsuragi!" Gendo stood up from his chair and slammed his hands down onto his desk. "Send out Unit 02 now!"  
“葛城美里队长！”碇源堂从椅子上站起身，双手猛地拍在桌面上。“立即派出二号机！”

Misato went wide-eyed. If Shinji and Rei weren't able to defeat the Angel, then Asuka, even under her normal condition, wouldn't have a chance, not to mention she couldn't so much as activate her EVA right now. "But Unit 02 is…"  
美里瞪大了眼睛。如果真嗣和丽都无法击败使徒，那么明日香，即使在正常状态下，也毫无胜算，更不用说她现在连启动 EVA 都做不到。“但二号机它……”

"I said send it out now!" Gendo raised his volume, a stark contrast to his usual calm composure. He didn't know why or how Unit 01 could be defeated. Wasn't his son a looper? Or was the Angel just too powerful? Shinji did say about helping him with his scenario…so did this mean if he didn't have foreknowledge, everything would end even faster?  
“我说了，现在就派出它！”碇源堂提高了音量，与他平时的冷静沉着形成鲜明对比。他不知道为何或如何初号机会被击败。难道他的儿子是个失败者吗？还是使徒太过强大？真嗣确实提到过帮他处理他的剧本……这是否意味着，如果没有先知先觉，一切会结束得更快？

Misato gritted her teeth. Though she didn't want to do it, she really had no choice. If Unit 00 and 01 fell, then Unit 02 would be the only possible backup they had left. Even under its AT-Field-less state, their conventional weapons couldn't do anything more than simply annoy the Angel, let alone Sandalphon had already raised its AT-Field in defense against Unit 01 moments ago. "Asuka," Misato spoke into the microphone.  
美里咬紧牙关。虽然她不想这么做，但她真的别无选择。如果零号机和初号机倒下，那么二号机将是他们仅剩的可能支援。即便在无 AT 力场状态下，他们的常规武器也只能稍微惹恼使徒，更不用说桑达尔丰刚刚已经升起了 AT 力场防御初号机。“明日香，”美里对着麦克风说道。

"I'm already on it," The redheaded girl cut her off, driving her wheelchair at its top speed, heading to the EVA cages.  
“我已经行动了，”红发女孩打断她，以轮椅的最快速度驶向 EVA 机库。

"We're doomed," Ritsuko murmured in desperation, internally cursing at herself for why she didn't find the Fourth Child fast enough. "Asuka couldn't even activate her EVA, much less defeat this Angel."  
“我们完蛋了，”律子绝望地喃喃自语，内心咒骂自己为何没能尽快找到第四适格者。“明日香连启动 EVA 都做不到，更别提打败这个使徒了。”

"Still," The lavender-haired woman took in a deep breath and exhaled before turning to face the screen. "We have to hope."  
“尽管如此，”紫发女子深吸一口气，缓缓吐出，随后转向屏幕，“我们只能寄希望于此。”

Asuka parked the wheelchair on the maintenance bridge beside the entry plug of her EVA, which had been in a shallow frozen state for two weeks. She didn't even bother to change into a plug suit since it would take a painfully long time under her current crippled state with or without help. The female technician saw her here and immediately connected the dots before picking her up and helped her get inside the entry plug.  
明日香将轮椅停在维护桥上，旁边是她 EVA 的插入栓，已经浅冻了两周。她连换上插入服都懒得，因为以她目前瘫痪的状态，无论是否有人帮忙，这都将是一个漫长而痛苦的过程。一位女技师看到她在这里，立刻明白了情况，上前将她抱起，协助她进入插入栓。

Asuka closed her eyes as she stroked the controls of her EVA and the pilot seat, relishing in the familiar sensation of the touch. The feeling of synthetic plastic and rubber rubbing against her hand soothed her anxiousness with every passing moment, but it didn't wipe out her growing nervousness about what was to come.  
明日香闭上眼睛，轻抚着 EVA 的控制台和驾驶座椅，享受着熟悉的触感。合成塑料和橡胶摩擦手掌的感觉，每分每秒都在安抚她的焦虑，但并未消除她对即将到来之事日益增长的紧张感。

"Begin Activation!" Maya shouted over the comms. "Entry Plug inserted…Commence Entry Plug LCL injection. LCL filled. Establishing A10 connections. A-10 connections established and stable. All circuits are operational…"  
"开始激活！" 玛雅通过通讯器喊道。"插入栓已插入…开始注入插入栓 LCL。LCL 已充满。建立 A10 连接。A10 连接已建立并稳定。所有电路均正常运行…"

Asuka could feel it again, the invisible door blocking her from connecting with her EVA. She closed her eyes and concentrated on her thoughts, using her usual way of forcing her will onto the EVA. But it wouldn't work. The harder she pushed against the obstacle, the firmer it stood its ground.  
明日香再次感受到了那道无形的门，阻挡她与 EVA 建立连接。她闭上眼睛，集中精神，用她惯常的方式将意志强加于 EVA。但这次行不通。她越是用力推那障碍，它越是坚定地坚守原地。

"She's still not passing the absolute borderline!" Maya reported as she saw the disappointing readings on her terminal. "Her sync rate is too low to activate the EVA!"  
"她仍未突破绝对界限！" 玛雅报告道，看着终端上令人失望的读数。"她的同步率太低，无法启动 EVA！"

Everyone on the command deck fell silent. "Figures…" Ritsuko sighed dejectedly. "The world, it ends today…"  
指挥舱内的每个人都陷入了沉默。“果然……”律子沮丧地叹息道，“世界，今天就要终结了……”

A deep scowl crossed Misato's face. The world…would end? She knew NERV was established to fight the Angels, but that was it. She didn't even know why the Angels attacked them, nor she knew where did they come from. The fact that every Angel except Gaghiel had attacked Tokyo-3 was uncanny. Why here? Did NERV know where they were going to attack and built a fortress here? She found it impossible to answer these questions, but she needed to know what she was fighting for.

Suddenly Asuka noticed a subtle change in the Angel's skin. It seemed…lighter in color.  
突然，明日香注意到使徒皮肤上的细微变化。它似乎……颜色变浅了。

_"The intense heat in the volcano must've adjusted its molecular structure!"  
火山中的高温一定调整了它的分子结构！_

"I get it now!" Asuka exclaimed as the realization dawned on her. "It's physics! The Angel's constant exposure to air is weakening its skin!"  
"我现在明白了！" 明日香恍然大悟地喊道，"这是物理现象！天使长时间暴露在空气中，皮肤正在被削弱！"

Ritsuko patted her thigh, "right! Brilliant observation!" She typed furiously on her terminal. "The MAGI's calculation suggests that its physical strength has decreased by 15 percent since it came out of the volcano!"  
律子拍了拍大腿，"没错！观察得真敏锐！" 她在终端上飞速输入，"MAGI 的计算显示，自从它从火山中出来后，物理强度已经下降了 15%！"

"Only 15 percent?! In two hours?!" Asuka cried. "How long until the prog knife can cut through it?"  
"只有 15%？！两个小时内？！" 明日香惊呼，"还要多久才能用程序刀切开它？"

"5 hours at least," the joy in Ritsuko's voice was replaced by disappointment. "The density of air molecules is too low to have a significant influence on the Angel."  
"至少需要 5 小时，" 律子声音中的喜悦被失望所取代。"空气分子的密度太低，对使徒的影响微乎其微。"

"But I only have 5 minutes!" Cried Asuka as she narrowly avoided another tail strike.  
"但我只有 5 分钟！" 明日香一边喊着，一边险险躲过又一次尾击。"

"Go to building E-15. There's another power station there!"  
"去 E-15 号建筑，那里还有另一个发电站！"

"Roger!" Asuka willed her EVA sprint toward building E-15, a power supply building in the outer part of the city. Sandalphon wasn't going to let its enemy escape so easily, though.  
“罗杰！”明日香操控她的 EVA 向城市外围的 E-15 号供电大楼疾驰而去。然而，桑达尔丰并不打算轻易放过它的敌人。

Just as Asuka reached the power station, the Angel leaped into the air, coming down onto its opponent with its mouth wide open. "What the hell?" Asuka hastily rolled aside; the Angel came crashing down onto the building, turning the fortified skyscraper into a pile of rubble of steel and concrete.  
就在明日香抵达电站之际，天使一跃而起，张开大口向对手扑来。“搞什么鬼？”明日香急忙侧滚躲避；天使轰然坠落于大楼之上，将这座加固的摩天大楼瞬间化为钢筋混凝土的废墟。

"Verdammt!" Asuka looked at the screen that was showing a time remaining of 4 minutes. She scanned around the area, "where's the next power-" Asuka trailed off as she saw the place hundreds of meters in front of her, a smirk crept up her face.  
“该死！”明日香盯着屏幕上显示的剩余 4 分钟时间，环顾四周，“下一个电源在哪儿——”她话音未落，目光落在了前方数百米处，嘴角不禁勾起一抹笑意。

Lake Ashi. 芦之湖。

"Chase me, you ugly monster!" Asuka sprinted toward the vast water body, the single-minded Angel chasing after her. "Giant Stride entry!" Said Asuka before her EVA Unit spread its right leg forward and its left leg backward as she jumped into the lake gracefully.  
"追我啊，你这丑陋的怪物！" 明日香朝着广阔的水域疾奔，一心一意的使徒紧随其后。"大步跳入！" 明日香说完，她的 EVA 二号机右腿前伸，左腿后摆，优雅地跃入湖中。

Following its enemy, Sandalphon crept into the lake as well, raising a cloud of water vapor as its heated body made contact with the cold liquid. The Angel shrieked in agony and tried to get out, but Unit 02 had a firm grasp on its mushroom-like horns. "You're not going anywhere!" Asuka mustered all of her strength to pull the Angel into the deep-water zone.  
紧随其后的桑达丰也潜入湖中，其炽热的身体与冰冷的湖水接触，激起一片水汽。使徒痛苦地尖叫，试图逃脱，但二号机紧紧抓住了它蘑菇状的犄角。"你哪儿也别想去！" 明日香使出全身力气，将使徒拖入深水区。

Even though Lake Ashi had a maximum depth of merely 50 meters, it's deep enough to submerge the entire Angel at its creeping state. EVA Unit 02 stood at the bottom of the lake, its upper torso above the waterline. Sandalphon swung its blade-like tale at the crimson behemoth once again in a vain attempt of escape.  
尽管芦之湖的最大深度仅为 50 米，但它足以淹没处于缓慢状态的使徒。EVA 二号机站在湖底，其上半身露出水面。桑达尔丰再次挥动其刀刃般的尾巴，试图逃离这红色巨兽，但此举徒劳无功。

_CLANK_

"Ouch that hurts," Asuka looked down at the point of contact and surprisingly found out no real damage was inflicted onto her EVA. "Not so strong now, huh?" With an evil grin, Asuka pulled out her prog knife from her left shoulder pylon and aimed at what looked like the eye of the Angel.  
“哎哟，真疼，”明日香低头看着接触点，惊讶地发现她的 EVA 并未受到实际伤害。“现在不怎么强了吧？”带着邪恶的笑容，明日香从左肩支柱上拔出她的程序刀，瞄准了那看似使徒眼睛的部位。

Utilizing the fact that at the moment Unit 02 only had one of its arms suppressing it, Sandalphon twisted its body violently and got rid of Unit 02's grasp, opening its mouth wide and bit down onto the right leg of the crimson EVA Unit. "Ahhh!" Asuka yelped in pain, the sensation of her legs hurting was something she missed recently. "You're soooo gonna pay for it!"  
利用二号机此刻仅有一只手臂压制它的机会，桑达尔丰猛烈扭动身体，摆脱了二号机的抓握，张开大口咬住了红色 EVA 的右腿。“啊！”明日香痛呼出声，腿部受伤的感觉是她最近所怀念的。“你绝对会为此付出代价的！”

Sandalphon started swimming around in the lake, twisting and turning savagely along the way, trying to pull the leg off the EVA Unit. Asuka gritted her teeth, enduring the pain, and took a glance at the timer. Only one minute was left. "No time to waste…eat this, bastard!" Screaming, Asuka made Unit 02 open the top of both its right shoulder pylon. Followed by this was a loud bang as dozens of razor-sharp titanium spikes shot out of the pylon, piercing the Angel's armor, making it bellow in pain as the spikes made contact.  
桑达风开始在湖中游动，沿途扭曲翻滚，试图扯下 EVA 单位的腿。明日香咬紧牙关，忍着疼痛，瞥了一眼计时器。只剩下一分钟了。“没时间浪费了……吃我这一招，混蛋！”明日香尖叫着，让 02 号机打开了右肩塔架的顶部。紧接着是一声巨响，数十根锋利的钛合金尖刺从塔架中射出，刺穿了使徒的装甲，使其因接触到尖刺而痛苦地咆哮。

The Angel let go of Unit 02's leg under the intolerable agony. Asuka took a firmer hold on Angel this time; with a vicious swing, Unit 02 brought down the knife onto the Angel's core, causing for sparks to fly as it ripped right through it with little issue. The Angel made a deep groan of pain that echoed through her cockpit before the core gave in, exploding into a giant ball of fire, vaporizing the remaining water of Lake Ashi.  
在难以忍受的痛苦下，使徒放开了 02 号机的腿。明日香这次更紧地抓住了使徒；02 号机猛地一挥，将刀劈向使徒的核心，随着火花四溅，轻松地将其劈开。使徒发出了一声深沉的痛苦呻吟，声音在她的驾驶舱中回荡，随后核心崩溃，爆炸成一个巨大的火球，蒸发了芦之湖剩余的水。

"Asuka, y..y..you did it!" Misato's voice came through the comm channel, mixed with people's cheers in the background. She could practically hear the tears pouring out of her eyes. "But h..h..how did you…"  
“明日香，你……你做到了！”美里通过通讯频道传来声音，背景中夹杂着人们的欢呼声。她几乎能听到自己泪流满面的声音。“但是……你是怎么……”

"What do you expect," Asuka smirked confidently, "from the _great_ Asuka Langley Soryu?" She boasted, feeling proud of herself. "What about Shinji and wondergirl?" She inquired as she willed her EVA toward the retrieval elevator.  
"你还能指望什么，" 明日香自信地扬起嘴角，"来自伟大的惣流·明日香·兰格雷？" 她自夸道，对自己感到自豪。"那真嗣和那个笨蛋呢？" 她问道，同时操控着 EVA 向回收电梯移动。

"They're fine. No physical damage was done," Misato sighed. "You can go see them in the hospital when our medical team brings them back."  
"他们没事。没有受到身体上的伤害，" 美里叹了口气。"等我们的医疗团队把他们带回来后，你可以去医院看望他们。"

"Alright." She nodded, shutting off the comm channel with a punch on the buttons. She brought up a smile to her face as the realization of what she had just done kicked in. Not long ago she was sitting in her wheelchair brooding on how meaningless her life had become, and now she's here claiming the grandest victory against the most lethal Angel they had faced yet.  
"好吧。" 她点头，一拳敲下按钮关闭通讯频道。当意识到自己刚刚所做的事情时，她脸上露出了笑容。不久前她还坐在轮椅上，沉溺于生活变得多么无意义的忧郁中，而现在她却在这里，取得了对抗迄今为止最致命使徒的伟大胜利。

"Thank you, Shinji," She smiled. Even though she still hated the idea of relying on someone else, she felt she should make this one exception. After all, he had saved her life.  
“谢谢你，真嗣，”她微笑着。尽管她仍然讨厌依赖他人的想法，但她觉得应该破例这一次。毕竟，是他救了她的命。

With a hiss the hatch of her entry plug opened. At the moment, Asuka's mind was filled with joy and excitement, not paying much attention to other trivial stuff other than her grand comeback. She climbed out of her entry plug in a swift movement; she could see Misato running toward her with an expression mixed with relief, pride, and joy.  
随着一声嘶响，她的插入栓舱门打开了。此刻，明日香心中充满了喜悦和兴奋，除了她即将到来的华丽回归，其他琐事都无暇顾及。她迅速从插入栓中爬出；可以看到美里正向她跑来，脸上混合着释然、自豪和喜悦的表情。

Suddenly all of her expressions collapsed as the woman set her eyes on the girl. "What's wrong, Misato?" Asuka probed as she noticed the inscrutable expression on her face.  
突然，当女人注视着女孩时，所有的表情都消失了。“怎么了，美里？”明日香察觉到她脸上难以捉摸的表情，问道。

What came next, though, sent Asuka herself into a state of shock as well.  
然而，接下来发生的事情也让明日香自己陷入了震惊之中。

"…Did you just walk out of the entry plug by yourself?"  
“……你刚才是自己走出驾驶舱的吗？”

XXXXXX

## *Chapter 16*: Chapter 16: Compromises  
*第十六章*: 第十六章：妥协

Disclaimer: I do not own Evangelion  
免责声明：我不拥有《新世纪福音战士》

**Chapter 16: Compromises 第十六章：妥协**

Shinji's eyes slowly cracked open, surprised to find himself staring at the familiar ceiling of NERV hospital instead of the telephone booth he expected. As the haziness in his mind gradually subsided, he gasped as the recollection of the disastrous last battle against Sandalphon reemerged. The last thing he remembered was defeated by the Angel – but from the fact that, apparently, the cycle didn't restart, the Angel must've been defeated. Did EVA Unit 01 go berserk by itself? No, it couldn't be it. He lost both of the legs, there wouldn't be much the EVA could do under that kind of injury. Or did Rei do it? But he had never seen Unit 00 go berserk in battle ever before.  
真嗣的眼睛缓缓睁开，惊讶地发现自己正盯着 NERV 医院的熟悉天花板，而不是他预想中的电话亭。随着脑海中的朦胧逐渐消散，他倒吸一口凉气，因为与萨达拉冯那场灾难性的最后一战的记忆重新浮现。他最后记得的是被天使击败——但从显然循环没有重启的事实来看，天使一定已经被击败了。是 EVA 初号机自己暴走了吗？不，不可能。他失去了双腿，EVA 在那种伤势下也做不了什么。还是说绫波零做到了？但他从未见过零号机在战斗中暴走。

That only left one feasible conclusion.  
这只能得出一个可行的结论。

Asuka. 明日香。

If it really was her…then it could only insinuate one thing. She could pilot her EVA again.  
如果真的是她……那么只能暗示一件事。她可以再次驾驶她的 EVA 了。

For a short period of time, Shinji didn't know whether or not he should be happy about it. On one hand, this way Asuka could be self-confident and prideful again, and she wouldn't think of herself as useless anymore. These would all contribute to improving her mentality. On the other hand, this would also likely mean her unhealthy bond with the EVA would strengthen once more, something he prioritized to help her get rid of.  
有一段时间，真嗣不知道自己是否应该为此感到高兴。一方面，这样一来，明日香可以重新变得自信和骄傲，不再认为自己一无是处。这些都有助于改善她的心态。另一方面，这也可能意味着她与 EVA 之间不健康的联系会再次加强，这是他优先考虑帮助她摆脱的。

How could he convince her that she can be happy even without the EVA? How could he make her believe the life outside of piloting was much more colorful and brighter?  
他该如何说服她，即使没有 EVA，她也能快乐？他该如何让她相信，驾驶之外的生活更加丰富多彩、更加光明？

His musings were interrupted by a familiar voice. "Shinji! You're awake!"  
他的沉思被一个熟悉的声音打断。"真嗣！你醒了！"

He turned his head in the direction of the voice and saw a girl sitting on a chair at his bedside with gorgeous red hair and brilliant blue eyes, wearing the school uniform. "Asuka?" He said weakly, confused by the sight. "What are you doing here?"  
他顺着声音的方向转过头，看到一个女孩坐在他床边的椅子上，拥有一头艳丽的红发和明亮的蓝眼睛，身着校服。“明日香？”他虚弱地说道，对眼前的景象感到困惑。“你在这里做什么？”

"Anta Baka? I'm here to make sure you're okay," to Shinji's surprise Asuka admitted freely. He was totally expecting her to say things like 'I'm here to remind you how great I am that I defeated the Angel which defeated you' or something like that. "I mean, you were there for me, so consider this as a payback."  
“你这个笨蛋？我来确保你没事，”让真嗣惊讶的是，明日香坦率地承认了。他原本以为她会说些类似“我来提醒你我有多厉害，我打败了那个打败了你的使徒”之类的话。“我是说，你之前帮过我，所以就当这是回报吧。”

"Thanks," Shinji smiled a small smile. Then he noticed something different about the redhead, "Asuka, where's your wheelchair?"  
“谢谢，”真嗣微微一笑。随后他注意到红发女孩有些不同，“明日香，你的轮椅呢？”

A wide grin bloomed on her already beautiful face, making it now look angelic. "I'm recovered, see," she stood up from the chair, although her knees were still a little bit wobbly, "turns out after I synced with my EVA that has a fine spine my brain fixed itself, or something like that," Asuka sat down again. "Though my muscles still need recovery. I haven't used them since…then," she pointed at two clutches placed at the corner of the ward. "I'll have to use those instead until my legs are fully recovered."  
她那本就美丽的脸上绽放出一个灿烂的笑容，现在看起来宛如天使。“我恢复了，你看，”她从椅子上站了起来，尽管膝盖还有些摇晃，“似乎在我与那有着完美脊柱的 EVA 同步后，我的大脑就自我修复了，或者类似那样，”明日香又坐了下来。“虽然我的肌肉还需要恢复。自从那次之后，我就没再用过它们，”她指向病房角落里的两根拐杖。“在我双腿完全恢复之前，我得用这些代替。”

Shinji felt a huge stone had been lifted off his shoulders. The disastrous battle now seemed to yield more promising results than bad ones. "Good job, Asuka. Defeating the Angel, I mean," he let out a sigh of relief. "You saved us…saved me."  
真嗣感到肩上的重担终于卸下了。这场灾难性的战斗现在看来，结果比坏的更有希望。“干得好，明日香。我是说，打败了使徒，”他松了一口气。“你救了我们……救了我。”

"Hmph, I'm the great Asuka Langley Soryu, after all." She boasted. "And…" A smug smirk crept up her face. "Now I'm officially tied with you in Angel kill counts!"  
“哼，毕竟我是伟大的惣流·明日香·兰格雷嘛。”她自夸道。“而且……”她脸上浮现出一丝得意的笑容。“现在我在使徒击杀数上正式和你打平了！”

Shinji chuckled. Of course Asuka was still Asuka. "How did you manage to re-sync with your EVA, anyway?" It was another question he needed to know. Though from the looks of it, she didn't actually realize her mother was in there, otherwise she wouldn't be here with him in such a good mood.  
真嗣轻声笑了。当然，明日香还是那个明日香。“你是怎么重新与 EVA 同步的？”这是他需要知道的另一个问题。虽然从她的表情来看，她似乎并没有意识到她母亲就在里面，否则她不会在这里和他如此愉快地交谈。

Asuka's expression turned ponderous. "I…I had a talk with the EVA…it doesn't make sense anyway. I just found the right way to 'open up', I suppose."  
明日香的表情变得沉思。“我……我和 EVA 谈了谈……反正这也不合逻辑。我想我只是找到了‘打开’它的正确方式。”

With a hiss, the door of the ward slid open, revealing Dr. Akagi clad in a white lab coat behind it. "Oh, glad to see you awake, Shinji," the blonde doctor said. "How do you feel?"  
随着一声轻响，病房门滑开了，露出穿着白色实验服的赤木律子博士。“哦，很高兴看到你醒了，真嗣，”金发博士说道，“感觉如何？”

"Alive and whole, I guess," Shinji checked his bodily functions and was happy to found them all working fine. "When can I go home?"  
"活着而且完好无损，我想，" 真嗣检查了自己的身体机能，高兴地发现一切正常。"我什么时候可以回家？"

"As soon as you feel fit enough. I've already done the necessary tests, anyway." She said casually before a sly grin appeared on her face. "Actually, you'd better get going soon. She has been by your side ever since you came here." She glanced at Asuka. "I suppose she's really _hungry_ right now."  
"只要你感觉足够健康就可以。反正我已经完成了必要的测试。" 她随意地说道，随后脸上露出一丝狡黠的笑容。"实际上，你最好尽快离开。自从你来到这里，她就一直守在你身边。" 她瞥了一眼明日香。"我想她现在真的很饿。"

Asuka blushed, "well, I just want to be here when he wakes up so I can get him home and make me dinner as soon as possible, nothing more!"  
明日香脸红了，"嗯，我只是想在他醒来时在这里，这样我就能尽快带他回家并让他给我做晚饭，没别的！"

Shinji winked, "is that so? But you just said-"  
“真的吗？但你刚刚还说——” 真嗣眨了眨眼。

"Shut it, alright," Asuka huffed, her blush deepening with each passing second.  
“闭嘴，行不行，”明日香气呼呼地说，她的脸颊随着每一秒过去而越发红润。

Even though Shinji had had countless childish bickering with her to the extent he hardly found them amusing anymore, yet like an old joke that hadn't been heard in a long time, seeing that Asuka was confident and prideful just somehow brought down a ray of sunshine onto Shinji during this time of unexpected darkness.  
尽管真嗣与明日香之间幼稚的争吵已经多到他几乎不再觉得有趣，但就像许久未听的老笑话，看到自信骄傲的明日香，在这突如其来的黑暗时刻，不知为何给真嗣带来了一束阳光。

At the moment, Dr. Akagi's phone started to vibrate. She picked up her device and looked at the text message that just came through, and sighed. "Shinji," she started, glancing at the boy. Upon receiving a small nod, she continued, "the commander requires your immediate presence."  
此刻，赤城博士的手机开始震动。她拿起设备，看着刚刚收到的短信，叹了口气。“真嗣，”她开口道，目光瞥向男孩。在得到一个小小的点头后，她继续说，“指挥官要求你立即前往。”

Shinji silently sighed. He had been expecting this, but didn't think his father would be so impatient. "Asuka, come with me, then. We have some stuff to discuss." Ritsuko Akagi said to the redhead before turning her head to Shinji once again, giving him an almost sympathetic look, as if saying 'good luck'.  
真嗣默默叹息。他早有预感，但没想到父亲会如此急切。“明日香，跟我来吧，我们有事要讨论。”赤城律子对红发女孩说道，随后再次转向真嗣，给了他一个近乎同情的眼神，仿佛在说‘祝你好运’。

Something he knew he really needed right now.  
他知道，这正是他现在非常需要的。

XXXXXX

Sighing, Shinji entered Gendo Ikari's office with a dejected, yet determined expression on his face. His father had requested his immediate presence as soon as he woke up, which meant he wanted some serious explanations. Shinji knew after the last disastrous battle such interrogation was inevitable. Therefore he had been preparing his answers ever since he opened his eyes.  
叹了口气，真嗣带着沮丧却又坚定的表情走进了碇源堂的办公室。他的父亲在他醒来后立即要求他到场，这意味着他需要一些严肃的解释。在经历了上一场灾难性的战斗后，真嗣知道这样的审问是不可避免的。因此，自从他睁开眼睛以来，他一直在准备自己的答案。

He felt a shiver ran down his spine as the freezing atmosphere mainly produced by Commander Ikari's stern look assaulted him, the fact that he knew probably nothing good would come out of this conversation only made it worse. "Father," he started, fixing his eyes on his father, who clapped his hands together, covering his chin like usual.  
当他感受到由碇司令严峻目光所营造的冰冷氛围侵袭而来时，他的脊背不禁一阵发凉，他知道这场对话很可能不会有什么好结果，这使得情况更加糟糕。“父亲，”他开口道，目光紧盯着他的父亲，后者像往常一样双手合十，遮住了下巴。

"You will give me a thorough explanation of the last battle," Gendo Ikari spoke up. Even though the Angel was defeated, the situation was still too grim to his likings.  
“你将给我详细解释上一场战斗的情况，”碇源堂开口道。尽管使徒已被击败，但局势仍然严峻到令他不悦。

"My apologies first, father," Shinji summoned all of his willpower to withstand the invisible pressure his father was weighing on him and succeeded; he would never be able to do it if not for the fact that his actual age might be older than him. "I grew careless and omitted crucial details."  
"首先向您道歉，父亲，" 真嗣用尽所有意志力来抵御父亲无形中施加给他的压力，并成功了；若非他实际年龄可能比父亲还大，他永远无法做到这一点。"我一时疏忽，遗漏了关键细节。"

"Hm," Gendo narrowed his eyes by a hair. "I thought you should already know how to fight each Angels without any problem."  
"嗯，" 源渡微微眯起眼睛。"我以为你应该已经知道如何毫无问题地对抗每一位使徒了。"

"Indeed I know, however," Shinji's expression turned more serious, "that doesn't mean the Angels would be weaker in strength. This Angel had always been one of the most powerful ones, so I thought fighting it on land would be easier." It was a lie he needed to say under this situation.  
"我的确知道，然而，" 真嗣的表情变得更加严肃，"这并不意味着使徒的力量会减弱。这个使徒一直是最强大的之一，所以我认为在陆地上战斗会更容易。" 在这种情况下，他不得不说出这个谎言。

"Our deal includes you helping me with the scenario, but it seems even Angels are giving you a hard time right now, let alone SEELE," Gendo huffed.  
“我们的协议包括你帮我处理这个局面，但看来现在连使徒都让你头疼不已，更别提 SEELE 了，”碇源堂哼了一声。

"Some of the Angels…are really powerful," Shinji sighed, maintaining his poker face. "If I didn't have foreknowledge…things would end even faster, father."  
“有些使徒……真的很强大，”真嗣叹了口气，保持着扑克脸。“如果我没有预知……事情会结束得更快，父亲。”

Gendo Ikari pondered for a moment. Even though he was still suspicious, he couldn't deny that there was still a possibility he was telling the truth. "How can I make sure this won't happen again?"  
碇源堂沉思片刻。尽管他仍心存疑虑，但他不能否认这仍有可能性是真话。“我如何确保这种情况不会再发生？”

"I don't have any incentive to do otherwise, do I?" Shinji frowned. "If I fail against the Angels, Asuka could be hurt."  
"我没有理由不这么做，不是吗？" 真嗣皱眉道，"如果我输给了使徒，明日香可能会受伤。"

"Hm," Gendo pondered for a moment. How could he forget about the Second Child? He had to admit his son had a valid point. He really had no reasons to intentionally fail against the Angels. "Unit 01 is a crucial part of the scenario, and I'm sure you're aware of that."  
"嗯，" 碇源堂沉思片刻。他怎么忘了第二适格者？他不得不承认儿子说得有道理。他确实没有理由故意输给使徒。"初号机是计划的关键部分，我相信你很清楚这一点。"

"The Angel was defeated, and Asuka can pilot again," Shinji stood his ground. "I'd actually say the battle yielded a better result than it could have."  
"使徒已被击败，明日香也能再次驾驶了，" 真嗣坚定地说，"实际上，这场战斗的结果比预期的还要好。"

Gendo's gaze softened at another reminder of the positive reality. "Still, I want to see some materialized help." If all the 'help' he could bring him was merely winning against the Angels, then it would be unsatisfactory, considering his time traveler status.  
碇司令的目光在又一次提醒下变得柔和，意识到积极现实的正面影响。“不过，我希望能看到一些实质性的帮助。”如果他能带来的‘帮助’仅仅是战胜使徒，那么考虑到他身为时间旅行者的身份，这将是令人不满意的。

"Well, right now I actually have one," Shinji smirked, silently blessing the impeccable timing of the event. "Two weeks later a group of people would try to sabotage NERV's power generator to help SEELE test out NERV's capabilities and learn about NERV's layout. Catch them before they can do anything would provide a huge advantage in the final battle against SEELE."  
“嗯，现在我确实有一个，”真嗣微微一笑，默默感谢这完美的事件时机。“两周后，一群人将试图破坏 NERV 的电源发电机，以帮助 SEELE 测试 NERV 的能力并了解其布局。在他们行动之前抓住他们，将在最终对抗 SEELE 的战斗中提供巨大优势。”

"This is…indeed valuable intel," a subtle smirk appeared on Gendo's face. This was something he needed at the moment, an actual strike on SEELE. "This will do for now."  
“这……确实是有价值的情报，”碇司令脸上浮现出一丝微妙的笑意。这是他目前需要的，对 SEELE 的实际打击。“暂时就这样吧。”

"Also, the ninth Angel will attack during that time…without power, the situation could be dangerous," Shinji continued, internally sighing in relief. "But this time, if NERV could catch the saboteurs, with a working NERV HQ the Angel could be defeated easily."  
"而且，第九使徒会在那时发动攻击……没有电力，情况可能会很危险，" 真嗣继续说道，内心暗自松了口气。"但这次，如果 NERV 能抓住破坏者，拥有完好运作的总部，使徒就能轻易被击败。"

"I've heard the same thing last time," Gendo's voice turned cold again. "Make sure it won't happen this time."  
"上次我也听到了同样的话，" 碇源堂的声音再次变得冷酷。"确保这次不会再发生。"

"I know what I have to do," Shinji said in a firmer voice. "Anything else?"  
"我知道我该做什么，" 真嗣用更坚定的声音说道。"还有其他事吗？"

"No. You're dismissed." "不，你可以走了。"

Shinji let out a long sigh of relief after he exited Gendo's office. It went better than he had expected.  
真嗣在离开源渡的办公室后长长地松了一口气。情况比他预想的要好。

XXXXXX

"Long story short, we've reactivated your pilot status after your last sortie," Ritsuko Akagi kept her subdued professionalism as she debriefed the Second Child. "Moreover, NERV Germany isn't demanding you back anymore. Not that we would let you go, considering your importance as a pilot to us."  
"简而言之，我们在你上次出击后重新激活了你的驾驶员身份，"赤城律子保持着她那低调的专业态度，向二号机驾驶员汇报情况。"此外，德国 NERV 也不再要求你回去了。考虑到你对我们作为驾驶员的重要性，我们也不会让你离开的。"

"Well, I don't expect anything less," said Asuka, smirking pridefully. Everything was turning in a better direction, wasn't it? Even though she was worried about Shinji at that time, right now the pride and joy of winning the impossible battle overwhelmed nearly all other feelings.  
“哼，我可不指望会有什么不同，”明日香得意地笑着说。一切都在朝着更好的方向发展，不是吗？尽管那时她对真嗣感到担忧，但此刻战胜不可能之战的骄傲与喜悦几乎淹没了所有其他情感。

She was once again an Ace pilot who saved the day with style, just like what she aimed for. She even had her legs again, which meant she could be independent on most of the things once more.  
她再次成为了那个以风格拯救世界的王牌飞行员，正如她所追求的那样。她甚至重新拥有了双腿，这意味着她可以再次独立处理大多数事情。

Then what else did she need?  
那么，她还需要什么呢？

The image of a certain boy crossed her mind at the thought. She hated having these types of feelings. She hated it all. She just wished that she could hate everyone and be alone forever so that way no one could ever hurt her. But whether she liked to admit it or not, she didn't want to be alone.  
每当想到那个男孩，她的脑海中就会浮现出他的形象。她讨厌这种感觉。她讨厌这一切。她只希望自己能恨所有人，永远孤独，这样就没人能再伤害她了。但不管她愿不愿意承认，她并不想孤独。

Still, she knew she could only hurt him if she ever let him any closer than what they had right now, and she already did. She cared about him, and she thought maybe it was for the best for her to keep him at arms-length. What's more, she also knew he would only hurt her as well, just like all people before did.  
尽管如此，她知道如果让他比现在更亲近，只会伤害到他，而她已经这样做了。她在乎他，她认为也许保持距离对她最好。更重要的是，她也知道他只会像之前那些人一样伤害她。

Now that she had her EVA again, she could live with being alone. After all, she had been alone ever since that one day.  
现在她又有了 EVA，她可以忍受孤独。毕竟，自从那一天起，她就一直是一个人。

XXXXXX

"Tadaima." "我回来了。"

Extreme mental exhaustion couldn't be helped but radiated from Shinji's voice as he entered the apartment. The recent events strike him like a rain of meteors, leaving no room or time for him to catch so much as a breath. What's worse, his father seemed to get impatient and suspicious about his 'help'. In reality, there wasn't so much he could do except defeating the Angels like flipping a coin, but he even started to fail against them, something that almost never happened before in his other cycles.  
极度的心理疲惫无法掩饰地从真嗣的声音中流露出来，他走进公寓时如此。最近的事件如流星雨般打击着他，让他连喘息的空间和时间都找不到。更糟糕的是，他的父亲似乎对他的‘帮助’越来越不耐烦和怀疑。实际上，除了像抛硬币一样击败使徒，他并没有太多能做的，但现在他甚至开始在这些战斗中失败，这在之前的循环中几乎从未发生过。

Fortunately, Kaji's little sabotage group sent by SEELE could be said as a timely assist to him.  
幸运的是，加持由 SEELE 派遣的小型破坏小组可以说是及时的帮助了他。

In retrospect, the team of saboteurs did nothing good to the scenario, if not impeding it, not to mention the risk they brought since the ninth Angel attacked so coincidentally. This time with NERV that would be running at full capacity, and an Angel as weak as Matarael wouldn't stand a chance against them.  
回想起来，那群破坏者对局势毫无益处，即便没有阻碍，他们带来的风险也不容忽视，尤其是在第九使徒如此巧合地袭击时。这次 NERV 将全力运转，像 Matarael 这样虚弱的使徒根本无法与之抗衡。

"What took you so long?" A slightly annoyed voice pressed the emergency stop button of Shinji's train of thoughts. He lifted his head and saw his favorite redhead was looking at him with a slight scowl on her face, hands on her hips. "I'm starving, go make me some dinner!"  
“你怎么这么慢？”一个略带不悦的声音按下了真嗣思绪的紧急停止键。他抬起头，看到他最喜欢的红发女孩正双手叉腰，微微皱眉地看着他。“我饿死了，快去做晚饭！”

"I had some serious business to attend to," he stretched the truth to the limit.  
“我有些重要的事要处理，”他尽可能地夸大了事实。

Asuka huffed. "Well, now that you're back, stop wasting time and get to it!"  
明日香哼了一声。“好了，既然你回来了，别浪费时间，快点开始吧！”

Shinji frowned as he noticed a subtle change in Asuka's attitude. Not too long ago, the same person was smiling at and thanking him with gratefulness, and now she even started _demanding_ things. Shinji could feel cold sweat forming on his forehead as he failed to read her behaviors. He thought after him taking care of her and giving her what she needed at the time, their relationship would turn into a better direction, not the opposite.  
真嗣皱起眉头，注意到明日香态度上的微妙变化。不久前，同一个人还对他微笑并充满感激地向他道谢，现在她甚至开始要求这要求那。真嗣感到额头上冷汗直冒，因为他无法理解她的行为。他以为，在他照顾她并给予她当时所需之后，他们的关系会朝着更好的方向发展，而不是相反。

Still, one thing he was sure of.  
不过，有一件事他是确定的。

She started pushing him away.  
她开始推开他。

His eyelids dropped after he took a glance at the clutch leaned against the wall of the living room. Even though technically, according to schedule today was Asuka's turn to make meals, he couldn't bring himself to reject her…request under her current condition.  
他瞥了一眼靠在客厅墙边的手提包后，眼皮垂了下来。尽管按照计划，今天本应是明日香做饭的日子，但他无法在她的这种状态下拒绝她的……请求。

How could he refuse her…how was he worthy of her…for what he had done to her?  
他怎能拒绝她……他何德何能……竟对她做了那样的事？

Replacement? Second chances? Shinji chuckled. Why was he even doing all this? He wanted redemption, but he could never earn her forgiveness…because she's gone.  
替代品？第二次机会？真嗣轻声笑了。他为何要这么做？他渴望救赎，却永远无法得到她的原谅……因为她已经不在了。

Whether or not Asuka noticed the storm of emotions wasn't important to him anymore. Shinji walked to the kitchen without another word and started doing one of the best things he could do, while the redhead at first fixed an odd gaze at his back until he disappeared around the corner, then sighed and went to watch TV.  
明日香是否察觉到他内心的风暴，对他来说已不再重要。真嗣一言不发地走向厨房，开始做他能做的最好的事情，而红发少女起初用奇怪的目光盯着他的背影，直到他在拐角处消失，然后叹了口气，去客厅看电视。

Moments later, the hissing sound of the front door opening captured the attention of the two roommates. "Tadaima!" Misato's cheerful voice filled the apartment, lighting up the atmosphere in an instant. "Oh, hi Asuka! Where's Shinji?"  
片刻后，前门打开的嘶嘶声吸引了两位室友的注意。“我回来了！”美里欢快的声音充满了公寓，气氛顿时活跃起来。“哦，嗨明日香！真嗣呢？”

The said girl used her thumb pointed in the direction of the kitchen while keeping her eyes focused on the screen, and at the same time "Making dinner!" Could be heard. Misato nodded, "by the way, your next sync test is scheduled to be on next Monday."  
那女孩用拇指指向厨房的方向，眼睛却紧盯着屏幕，同时可以听到她说：“在做晚饭！”美里点点头，“顺便说一下，你的下一次同步测试安排在下周一。”

"Great!" Asuka exclaimed in joy, a sky-to-earth contrast to her previous gloomy mood.  
“太好了！”明日香欢呼道，与之前的阴郁情绪形成了天壤之别。

Shinji raised an eyebrow. "Sync test?"  
真嗣挑了挑眉。“同步测试？”

"Oh, she hasn't told you yet?" Said Misato as she came to the fridge for a beer. "Asuka's now active pilot again, so she can't skip sync tests anymore."  
“哦，她还没告诉你吗？”美里说着走向冰箱拿啤酒，“明日香现在又恢复为现役驾驶员了，所以她不能再跳过同步测试了。”

Now it all made sense to him. Asuka had her EVA again, her life's purpose. He was wondering what had happened between now and then for her to change her attitude so drastically. Knowing how much of a treasure she regarded her connection to the EVA, Shinji now understood that her pride must've stood up again. That could only lead to one thing…  
现在这一切对他来说都变得合情合理了。明日香重新获得了她的 EVA，她生命中的目标。他在想，从现在到那时之间发生了什么，让她如此彻底地改变了态度。知道她对与 EVA 的联系有多么珍视，真嗣现在明白了她的骄傲一定又重新树立起来了。这只能导致一件事……

And he was pretty ambivalent on that.  
对此他感到相当矛盾。

"I think the Shinji-sama should've figured it out by himself, right?" Asuka huffed. "After all, I saved the day, including his sorry ass."  
“我觉得真嗣大人应该自己想明白的，对吧？”明日香哼了一声。“毕竟，是我救了这一天，包括他那可怜的屁股。”

Shinji shook his head. He knew piloting the EVA meant almost everything to her, at least before they got together. He could've asked his father to reactivate her pilot status, of course; but ultimately, she relied on her actual ability to pilot to confirm her own usefulness. In fact, she would've deemed it as pity if NERV let her have the name of a pilot while she couldn't activate the EVA.  
真嗣摇了摇头。他知道驾驶 EVA 对她来说几乎意味着一切，至少在他们在一起之前是这样。他本可以请求父亲重新激活她的驾驶员身份，当然；但最终，她依靠自己实际的驾驶能力来确认自己的有用性。事实上，如果 NERV 让她拥有驾驶员的名号却无法启动 EVA，她会认为这是怜悯。

Now though, she had every reason, and every right to pilot again. Even though debonding Asuka and her EVA was always a prioritized task for him to do, he couldn't bring himself to do it…not right after the last battle.  
但现在，她有充分的理由和权利再次驾驶。尽管解除明日香与她的 EVA 的绑定一直是他的优先任务，但他无法让自己这么做……尤其是在上一场战斗之后。

"Well, I'm just glad that you made it, Asuka," smiling a careful smile, Shinji picked up the dishes and brought them to the dining table.  
“嗯，我很高兴你来了，明日香。”真嗣小心翼翼地笑了笑，拿起盘子带到餐桌旁。

Asuka's expression turned thoughtful before a smirk crossed her face, "Of course you should be happy! After all, I'm a better pilot, having me in battle would reduce your workload, Ja?"  
明日香的神情变得若有所思，随即嘴角勾起一抹笑意，“你当然应该高兴！毕竟，我是个更优秀的驾驶员，有我在战斗中会减轻你的负担，对吧？”

"That's not what I meant, Asuka," still, he had to try. "I'm glad that you're okay, and your legs are working fine right now."  
“我不是那个意思，明日香，”他还是得尝试解释，“我很高兴你没事，而且你的腿现在也恢复得很好。”

He could clearly see the ambivalence in Asuka's eyes as she swallowed something she wanted to say. She bit down on her lips, looking down at the table, before digging into the meal. Shinji's mood improved a little as he saw Asuka wolfing down the food before her.  
他清楚地看到了明日香眼中的矛盾，她咽下了原本想说的话。她咬了咬嘴唇，低头看着桌子，然后开始用餐。看到明日香狼吞虎咽地吃着面前的食物，真嗣的心情稍稍好转了一些。

After all, it was one thing he could do for her to make her happy.  
毕竟，这是他能为她做的，让她开心的一件事。

"I'm finished." Said Asuka before she put down her utensils and stood up from the table. "Also…I think we should probably stop sleeping together, since I… don't need your assistance anymore, it would be inappropriate." She glanced at Misato, who was compromising a lot just by letting them sleep together.  
“我吃完了。”明日香放下餐具，从桌边站起身说道，“还有……我想我们应该停止一起睡了，既然我……不再需要你的帮助，那样就不合适了。”她瞥了一眼美里，美里能让他们同床共枕已经做出了很多妥协。

To her surprise, instead of the disappointment and sorrow she expected to see from him, Shinji simply smiled a warm smile and nodded. "If that makes you comfortable, sure."  
令她惊讶的是，他并没有表现出她预想中的失望和悲伤，真嗣只是温暖地笑了笑，点头同意：“如果这样让你感觉舒服，当然可以。”

In fact, he actually felt a little bit happy that she grew out of clinging to him as if he was a life-saving straw.  
事实上，她不再像抓住救命稻草一样依赖他，他反而感到一丝高兴。

Asuka's lips became a thin line. She nodded as well before turning to her own room.  
明日香的嘴唇抿成了一条细线。她也点了点头，然后转身回到自己的房间。

The subtle hint of sadness in her eyes went unnoticed by the preoccupied boy.  
她眼中微妙的悲伤，被心事重重的男孩忽略了。

XXXXXX
