**Chapter 17: Interlude I: Should I want him?  
第十七章：间奏一：我该渴望他吗？**

I finally lifted my eyelids after three long rounds of alarm ringers. Yawning, I grumbled in annoyance and waited for the alarm to be disabled. But it never stopped blaring. I frowned. Normally it should…  
在经历了三遍漫长的闹铃轰炸后，我终于抬起了眼皮。打着哈欠，我恼怒地咕哝着，等待闹钟被关闭。但它却从未停止尖叫。我皱起了眉头。通常它应该……

Oh. He wasn't sleeping with me anymore.  
哦，他不再和我一起睡了。

It had been a while since I _asked_ him to sleep apart, but I guess old habits die hard. I even thought 'normally'. Shameful that I got used to somebody else taking care of me…I should be independent and not rely on anyone.  
自从我要求他分开睡已经有一段时间了，但我想旧习难改。我甚至开始“正常”思考。羞愧的是，我习惯了有人照顾我……我应该独立，不依赖任何人。

I got up from my bed that felt too big for me and stretched my limbs. A glance and the clock told me it was seven in the morning. Today was a Monday, and I had to go to school. Therefore, I quickly got a change of clothes and exited my bedroom, heading to the bathroom to start my morning routine.  
我从那张大得让我感觉不适的床上起身，伸展四肢。瞥了一眼时钟，告诉我现在是早上七点。今天是星期一，我得去上学。因此，我迅速换了衣服，走出卧室，前往浴室开始我的早晨例行程序。

When I crossed the kitchen area, I saw Shinji already up and cooking breakfast like usual. Even though I wanted to be independent, I could give this a pass.  
当我穿过厨房区域时，看到真嗣已经起床，像往常一样在做早餐。虽然我想保持独立，但这一幕还是可以接受的。

He just cooked too good of a meal. I couldn't resist it. At all. I even willingly took all his chores in exchange for him cooking all the meals.  
他做的饭菜实在太美味了。我完全无法抗拒。甚至心甘情愿地接下了他所有的家务活，以换取他负责所有餐食。

During the first few days after the battle, I was somewhat uncomfortable being around him for obvious reasons. In a way, I rejected him, and I was scared that he would get angry with me and leave me. But he didn't. Instead, he continued to be friendly with me as if he wasn't influenced by my bitchy moves. What did I do to deserve this?  
战斗后的头几天，因为显而易见的原因，我在他身边总感到有些不自在。某种程度上，我排斥他，害怕他会因此对我发火并离开我。但他没有。相反，他一如既往地对我友好，仿佛并未受到我那些刻薄举动的影响。我何德何能，能得到这样的对待？

For some reason I didn't know, today he seemed more nervous than usual. Before he would hum some songs while cooking, but today he just worked in silence, the small smile he wore all the time to tell other people – or perhaps only to me - that he felt happy was nowhere to be seen as well.  
不知为何，今天他似乎比平时更加紧张。以往他会在做饭时哼唱几首歌，但今天他却只是默默地忙碌着，那一直挂在脸上、用来告诉别人——或许只是对我——他感到开心的微笑，也消失不见了。

"Good morning," I said as I shoved my messy long hair behind my ears. "Morning," Shinji replied as if he was on autopilot, still focused on the breakfast…or rather thoughts in his head.  
“早上好，”我一边说着，一边将凌乱的长发捋到耳后。“早，”真嗣机械地回应，依旧专注于早餐……或者说，是他脑海中的思绪。

One thing that confused me was his rapidly shifting personality. One moment before, he could be competitive or even antagonistic to me; the next second, he was totally nice and kind. Sometimes even wimpy. Were they only his façades to hide his secrets?  
让我感到困惑的一点是他的性格变化无常。前一刻他还可能对我充满竞争意识甚至敌意；下一秒就变得完全友善和蔼。有时甚至显得懦弱。这些难道只是他用来隐藏秘密的伪装吗？

Speaking of which…I think I could understand him-  
说到这个……我想我能理解他——

It. Understand it. 它。理解它。

Still, he shared something with me, didn't he? For some unspoken reason, the girl he talked about constantly nagged at me, and his mother…he told me his mother was dead the day we met.  
尽管如此，他还是与我分享了一些东西，不是吗？出于某种未言明的原因，他经常提及的那个女孩总是让我心烦意乱，还有他的母亲……他告诉我，我们相遇的那天，他的母亲已经去世了。

I shook the thoughts off and continued from where I left off. After I finished washing and cleaning, I came out of the bathroom and went straight for breakfast. Toast and scrambled eggs with a cup of milk as a supplement, just the way I liked it. "Slept well last night?" He asked as he put down his own portion on the table.  
我甩开这些思绪，从刚才停下的地方继续。洗漱整理完毕后，我走出浴室，直接去吃早餐。吐司、炒蛋，外加一杯牛奶作为补充，正是我喜欢的搭配。“昨晚睡得好吗？”他放下自己的那份早餐，问道。

I pondered for a moment. The first few days where I slept alone weren't as bad as I had expected, and I almost relinquished the idea that it was Shinji who took my nightmares away.  
我沉思片刻。最初独自入睡的几天并没有我预想的那么糟糕，我几乎要放弃那个念头，认为正是真嗣带走了我的噩梦。

Almost. Until they came back again.  
差点就成功了。直到他们再次回来。

"Not too bad, I guess," I lied. Though I knew my swollen eye bags and red eyes betrayed me as I saw the suspicion in his look. However, he made no remarks and dug into his meal. I let out a small sigh.  
“不算太糟吧，我想。”我撒了谎。尽管我知道我肿胀的眼袋和红肿的眼睛已经出卖了我，从他眼神中的怀疑就能看出来。然而，他并未多言，只是埋头吃饭。我轻轻叹了口气。

On the bus ride to school, we often would chat about random stuff. He always seemed to have endless topics to talk about, which intrigued me. I thought boys at his age were all perverts who think with their genitals, not brains. He made a special exemption, I had to admit.  
在去学校的公交车上，我们常常会闲聊些无关紧要的事情。他似乎总有说不完的话题，这让我感到好奇。我原以为他这个年纪的男生都是下半身思考的变态，而不是用脑子。他算是个例外，我不得不承认。

"Hi Asuka!" I was greeted by the enthusiastic class representative as I entered the classroom. After the battle with Sandalphon I had a lot of time to think. I felt guilty for pushing her away simply because she said the wrong thing at the wrong time. I knew she wasn't malicious; she was only trying to be helpful.  
“嗨，明日香！” 我一进教室，就被热情的班长迎接了。与桑达菲翁一战后，我有大量的时间去思考。我因为她在不恰当的时机说了不恰当的话而推开她，感到内疚。我知道她并无恶意，只是想帮忙而已。

"Hello Hikari," I greeted back somewhat listlessly, still haunted by the nightmare last night. Sitting down on my chair, I opened my laptop and checked my inbox. I snorted as I saw dozens of new date requests that occupied my screen. Without second thoughts, I discarded all of them like I always did.  
“你好，光，”我有些无精打采地回应，昨晚的噩梦仍萦绕心头。坐到椅子上，我打开笔记本电脑，检查邮箱。看到屏幕上挤满了数十个新的约会请求，我不禁嗤之以鼻。毫不犹豫地，我像往常一样将它们全部删除。

I am an elite pilot who saved the world single-handedly; I don't have time to deal with immature kids who only want to grope a cheap feel on me. Even if I wanted to date someone, Shinji would be my first and only choice.  
我是一名单枪匹马拯救世界的精英驾驶员；我没有时间应付那些只想在我身上占便宜的不成熟孩子。即使我想约会，真嗣也会是我的首选，也是唯一的选择。

And that would likely mean relying on him once again, which I didn't want to.  
而这很可能意味着我不得不再次依赖他，这是我所不愿的。

XXXXXX

"Rise! Bow! Sit!" The Sensei came in and continued lecturing on how meaningful and colorful pre-impact life was. I despised it at first since it was so dull that it made me extremely sleepy. My opinion had changed, though. Soon I found out that the benefit of him being repetitive was he also didn't care about what the students do. So I could utilize the time as I preferred and not suffer any form of homework, which was a waste of my time since I couldn't learn anything new from it.  
“起立！鞠躬！坐下！”老师走了进来，继续讲述着冲击前生活的意义和多彩。起初我对此深恶痛绝，因为它枯燥至极，让我昏昏欲睡。但我的看法改变了。很快我发现，他重复性的讲课方式的好处在于，他也不在乎学生们在做什么。因此，我可以随心所欲地利用这段时间，而不必承受任何形式的作业，那些作业对我来说纯属浪费时间，因为我从中无法学到任何新东西。

It seemed like many people had the same ideas as me.  
似乎很多人都有和我一样的想法。

A _horde_ of admirers and fans started sending PMs to me, mainly praising me for how I defeated the Angels. The day I came back to school after the battle against the eighth Angel, I began bragging about how every other pilot failed while I saved their asses and the world as their last line of defense. Of course people complimented and praised me; not too long ago this would have made my day, but I didn't enjoy it as much recently. In fact, now they annoyed me to the extent I regreted bragging about it in the first place.  
一群崇拜者和粉丝开始给我发私信，主要是赞扬我如何击败了使徒。在与第八使徒战斗后返校的那天，我开始吹嘘其他驾驶员都失败了，而我作为最后一道防线拯救了他们的屁股和世界。当然，人们会赞美我；不久前这会让我一整天都开心，但最近我并没有那么享受。事实上，现在这些赞美让我感到厌烦，甚至后悔当初吹嘘。

What's this…emptiness that I felt?  
这种……空虚感是什么？

Just a small 'thank you' from Shinji…outweighed thousands of meaningless and hollow praises I received from other students.  
仅仅是一个来自真嗣的小小‘谢谢’……就胜过了我从其他学生那里收到的无数空洞无意义的赞美。

Why?

Because they didn't understand me like Shinji could. The feeling of losing your legs inside an EVA was something they'd never experience. Getting boiled alive by a high-energy particle beam? Not in a million years. Not to mention-  
因为他们不像真嗣那样理解我。在 EVA 中失去双腿的感觉，他们从未体验过。被高能粒子束活活煮沸？一百万年也不会有。更不用说——

The lunch bell to me sounded the most pleasant melody in the world; today we would have a sync test, which meant we could leave school after lunch. "Ikari? Could you please come here for a second?" I turned my head in the direction of the voice and saw Sensei waving his hand feebly at Shinji, who nodded in acknowledgment and walked to the podium. They talked about stuff I couldn't hear clearly, still, I caught several phrases like 'advanced education' and 'your father'. I grew curious.  
对我来说，午餐铃声是世界上最悦耳的旋律；今天我们要进行同步测试，这意味着午饭后就可以离开学校了。“碇君？你能过来一下吗？”我顺着声音的方向转过头，看到老师无力地向真嗣挥手，真嗣点头示意后走向讲台。他们谈论着我听不清楚的事情，但我还是捕捉到了几个词，比如‘高级教育’和‘你父亲’。我变得好奇起来。

"Shinji, what you were talking about with Sensei?" I probed as I, wondergirl, and Shinji walked on our way to NERV HQ. Sweat dripped down from my body, soaking my school uniform. To say that the day was hot was like simply saying EVAs are 'big'.  
“真嗣，你刚才和老师谈了些什么？”我一边问，一边和真嗣以及明日香走在去 NERV 总部的路上。汗水从我身上滴落，浸湿了我的校服。说今天很热，就像简单地说 EVA‘很大’一样。

Well, EVAs aren't 'big'. They are _colossal_.  
嗯，EVA 可不算‘大’。它们是巨型的。

"He asked me if I want to participate in an advanced education program, and he wanted to talk about it with my…guardian." He replied nonchalantly as if he had already expected it to happen.  
“他问我是否想参加一个高级教育项目，并希望与我的……监护人谈谈。”他漫不经心地回答，仿佛早已预料到会发生这种事。

It was another thing that slightly irritated me. Shinji always got full grades on all subjects and made it look easy by submitting the exams earlier than everyone else. Since I sat near him, I observed him answering the questions one time. The way he filled the answer sheet… I'll put it this way: he might as well be copying straight from the solutions sheet. Damn it, I was supposed to be the most intelligent person in the school! Even though my Kanji had improved a lot thanks to his assistance, I still had no chance to surpass him.  
这又是让我略感恼火的一点。真嗣总是在所有科目上取得满分，并且总是比其他人提前交卷，显得轻而易举。有一次我坐在他旁边，观察他答题。他填答案的方式……这么说吧：他简直就像直接从答案纸上抄的一样。该死，我本该是学校里最聪明的人！尽管在真嗣的帮助下，我的汉字水平有了很大提高，但我仍然没有机会超越他。

"Good for you, someday you may get enrolled into a college early, just like me," I tried to remind myself that I should still be superior in terms of educational level.  
"干得好，总有一天你也许能像我一样提前进入大学，"我试图提醒自己，在教育水平上我仍应保持优越。

We continued to trek down the road. Shinji had been tense and nervous all the way, as if he was walking toward some expected doom. Even though I wanted to push him away, his sore mood started affecting me as well. "How about we go buy some ice cream? The weather is cooking me alive," I pointed at a small shop on the side of the street.  
我们继续沿着路走下去。真嗣一路上都紧张不安，仿佛正走向某种预料中的厄运。尽管我想把他推开，但他糟糕的情绪也开始影响我。"我们去买点冰淇淋怎么样？这天气热得我快熟了，"我指着街边的一家小店说。

"Good idea," he smiled a small smile for the first time of the day, turning to the grocery store.  
"好主意，"他今天第一次露出了微笑，转向杂货店。

The first thing he did after entering the store was to look at the clock. I knew he valued punctuality, but I felt this was a little bit overboard. When we left the school, we still had several hours to spend along the way, after all.  
他进店后做的第一件事就是看了一眼时钟。我知道他很看重守时，但我觉得这有点过头了。毕竟，我们离开学校时，还有好几个小时可以在路上消磨。

To my surprise, he let out a sigh of relief, his face visibly lit up. The cool temperature produced by the buzzing air-conditioning of the store must've soothed his dismal mood, I supposed. "Strawberry flavor," I said.  
令我惊讶的是，他松了一口气，脸上明显亮了起来。我想，店里空调发出的凉爽温度一定舒缓了他糟糕的心情。“草莓味。”我说。

"Vanilla please." “请给我香草的。”

"…"

"Wondergirl?" I turned around to look at the First Child, who was staring into nothingness like usual. I sighed, "Ayanami?"  
"奇迹少女？" 我转过身，看向那位总是凝视虚无的首位孩子。我叹了口气，"绫波？"

"Yes, Asuka?" She blinked and looked at me. Good.  
"什么事，明日香？" 她眨了眨眼，看向我。很好。

"What flavor do you fancy? Ice cream, I mean."  
"你喜欢什么口味的？我是说冰淇淋。"

"I do not deem eating ice cream necessary."  
"我认为吃冰淇淋并非必要。"

I found myself at a loss for words. Well, she had always been acting like this, so I couldn't really blame her. As much as I knew she wasn't actually a doll since she could show emotions in her own weird way, I still felt annoyed by her indifferent attitude.  
我一时语塞。好吧，她总是这样，我也不能真的怪她。尽管我知道她并非真的像玩偶一样，因为她能以自己古怪的方式表达情感，但她那种漠不关心的态度还是让我感到恼火。

"Ayanami, not everything you do should be 'necessary', alright? Sometimes you do things for your own likings and interest." Of course, Shinji would say it to her. "Your suggestion is…acceptable." I felt tightness grow inside my chest as I saw wondergirl's lips curled up a bit at his words, at which he smiled his own smile. Damn it, he's mine-  
“绫波，不是你做的每件事都得是‘必要的’，好吗？有时候你做事情是为了自己的喜好和兴趣。” 当然，真嗣会对她说这些。“你的建议……可以接受。” 当我看到奇迹女孩听到他的话后嘴角微微上扬，他也回以微笑时，我感到胸口一阵紧缩。该死，他是我的——

No. He's not mine anymore. I pushed him away, didn't I? So why was I complaining? I at least deserved it.  
不。他不再是我的了。是我推开他的，不是吗？那我为什么还在抱怨呢？至少这是我应得的。

I forever only had myself and my EVA.  
我永远只有自己和我的 EVA。

XXXXXX

We continued marching toward the entrance of the Geofront. The sunshine grew increasingly baking with each passing moment, so when I saw the shadow cast by the gigantic dome of Geofront entrance, I rushed to the place. Leaning on the cool metal wall, I panted heavily and wiped out the sweat on my forehead. Shinji and wondergirl came in together moments later. I took out my NERV ID card and swiped it through the slot of the identification device. A green passing sigh showed up with an acute 'beep' sound, and the door opened. We entered the Geofront and took the train elevator.  
我们继续向 Geofront 的入口行进。阳光越来越炽热，每走一步都感觉更加烤人，所以当我看到 Geofront 入口巨大穹顶投下的阴影时，便急忙跑了过去。倚靠在冰凉的金属墙边，我大口喘着气，擦去额头上的汗水。不久后，真嗣和那个女孩一起走了进来。我拿出 NERV 的 ID 卡，在识别装置的插槽上刷了一下。随着一声尖锐的‘哔’声，绿灯亮起，门打开了。我们进入了 Geofront，乘坐列车电梯。

"Just you wait, Shinji. I'll beat you in this sync test!" I boasted, partially trying to get myself psyched up for it. Last time my sync rate was only 0.5 percent lower than the invincible Shinji-sama's, and while I was improving with each test, he seemed to hold at a specific threshold. Today would be my best chance.  
“等着瞧吧，真嗣。这次同步测试我一定会赢你！”我夸口道，部分也是为了给自己打气。上次我的同步率只比无敌的真嗣大人低了 0.5 个百分点，而且随着每次测试，我都在进步，而他似乎停滞在一个特定的阈值。今天将是我最好的机会。

"We'll see about that, Asuka," he said back with a smirk, his mood visibly brighter than before. What changed? Did that ice cream cast a spell on him? Or was it-  
“那我们就拭目以待吧，明日香，”他带着一丝得意的笑容回应，情绪明显比之前高涨了许多。是什么改变了？是那冰淇淋对他施了魔法吗？还是别的什么——

My musings were interrupted by a distant yet undoubtedly sound of cartridge explosion. "Did…did you hear that?" I lowered my volume. Nodding, Shinji's turned his expression grim instantly, "that was…gunfire."  
我的沉思被远处传来的，确凿无疑的弹药爆炸声打断。“你……你听到了吗？”我压低了声音。点头间，真嗣的表情瞬间变得凝重，“那是……枪声。”

As if aroused by his words, I could hear several more rounds of pistol firing, mixed with sidearms and sub-machine guns. "What the fuck?" I shouted in a whisper. "Are we under an armed invasion or something?!"  
仿佛被他的话唤醒，我能听到更多手枪射击声，夹杂着副武器和冲锋枪的声音。“搞什么鬼？”我低声惊呼，“我们是被武装入侵了吗？！”

"I advise we hurry to the EVA cages." Wondergirl cut in at the moment. As much as I hated to admit it, she had an absolute point. Ironically, the inside of our entry plugs could be both the safest and most dangerous places in the world.  
“我建议我们赶紧去 EVA 格纳库。”绫波零此时插话道。尽管我讨厌承认，但她的话确实有道理。讽刺的是，我们的插入栓内部可能是世界上最安全也最危险的地方。

Fortunately, we didn't encounter any foes on our way to the EVA cages. There were groups of armed security troops patrolling the area, a sight I had never seen before. "Misato!" I called out as I saw the Captain of NERV standing in front of the Evangelion Chamber, Kaji was there with her as well. "What the hell is going on?!"  
幸运的是，我们在前往 EVA 笼的路上没有遇到任何敌人。武装安全部队的小组正在该区域巡逻，这是我从未见过的景象。“美里！”我看到 NERV 的队长站在福音战士机库前，加持也在她身边。“这到底是怎么回事？！”

"Thank god you are all okay kids!" She pulled Shinji and me into a light hug. The warm sensation temporarily wiped out my nervousness; maybe Misato did care about me…  
“谢天谢地，你们都平安无事！”她轻轻地拥抱着真嗣和我。那温暖的触感暂时消除了我的紧张；也许美里真的在乎我……

"There's a small group of armed soldiers inside NERV HQ, sabotaging our facilities."  
“有一小队武装士兵潜入了 NERV 总部，正在破坏我们的设施。”

"They've already destroyed the communication system, but luckily we caught them before they could do anything worse."  
“他们已经破坏了通讯系统，但幸运的是，我们及时阻止了他们进一步的行动。”

As I processed the shocking information Misato told me, I could obviously see the anxiousness in Kaji. "Kaji-san, what are you doing here?" I asked. I didn't feel like clinging to him anymore, for whatever reasons, and I actually felt slightly liberated that I no longer have the urge to seduce him by any means.  
当我消化着美里告诉我的惊人消息时，我明显能看出加持的焦虑。“加持先生，你在这里做什么？”我问道。我不再有任何理由依附于他，实际上，我感到一丝解脱，不再有通过任何手段诱惑他的冲动。”

"Ah, Katsuragi wanted to talk with me for something, so I came along. When we got inside the elevator, it was when the gunfire started. We thought you all have a sync test today, so here is the most probable place you'll come."  
“啊，葛城想和我谈些事情，所以我来了。当我们进入电梯时，枪战就开始了。我们以为你们今天有同步测试，所以这里是最有可能来的地方。”

I noticed the almost invisible smirk that crept up Shinji's face as if he was the person behind the curtain.  
我注意到真嗣脸上几乎难以察觉的窃笑，仿佛他就是幕后操纵的那个人。

"Well, I guess an Angel attack would be the worst thing that could happen right now…" I remarked offhandedly.  
“嗯，我想现在最糟糕的事莫过于使徒来袭了……”我随口说道。

Then the Angel alarm blared.  
接着，使徒警报响起了。

Speaking of the devil… 说曹操曹操到……

"Just fucking wonderful…" Misato mumbled in exasperation. "Get into your respective entry plugs!" We were already on our feet before she spoke the command, though. I felt I was turning hot-blooded as I changed into my plugsuit. Another Angel. Another opportunity to shine. Another chance to declare my usefulness to the world. Another evidence that I could be independent. Not to mention I would surpass Shinji in terms of Angel kill counts if I got this one by myself.  
“真是糟糕透顶……”美里恼怒地咕哝着，“各自进入插入栓！”她还没下令，我们就已经站起来了。我换上插入栓服时，感觉自己热血沸腾。又一个使徒。又一个展现自我的机会。又一个向世界证明我有用的机会。又一个证明我能独立存在的证据。更别提如果我独自干掉这个使徒，就能在使徒击杀数上超过真嗣。

I sat in my entry plug and waited impatiently. "EVA LAUNCH!" Ooooo…when she shouted that, I swore she was the most attractive woman in the world. A wave of a feeling of overweight assaulted me as the launch shaft shot upwards with me and my EVA.  
我坐在插入栓里，焦急地等待着。“EVA 发射！”当她喊出这句话时，我发誓她是世界上最迷人的女人。随着发射井向上疾射，一股沉重感袭来，我和我的 EVA 一同冲向战场。

I settled my eyes on the Angel as soon as I came to the surface since its size was disproportionately large. It has four disturbingly long legs and a round, pea-shaped body. Its spherical body was covered by numerous yellow eyes, and all of the ones I could see seemed to be focusing in on me, making me cringe.  
我一浮出水面，目光便立刻锁定在那只天使身上，因为它的体型大得不成比例。它有四条长得令人不安的腿和一个圆润的豌豆形身体。它那球形的身体上布满了无数黄色眼睛，我能看到的所有眼睛似乎都在盯着我，让我不禁皱眉。

I looked over at my teammates, who were standing not far away from me, assuming a combat stance. I grabbed a progressive spear while Unit 01 held a pallet rifle in his hand, and Unit 00 crouched into a sniping position, holding a sniper rifle. I liked how they gave me the leading attack role; I was the best pilot, after all.  
我瞥了一眼不远处的队友们，他们摆出了战斗姿态。我抓起一把渐进式长矛，零号机手持一把板条箱步枪，初号机则蹲伏成狙击姿势，手持狙击步枪。我喜欢他们让我担任主攻角色；毕竟，我是最优秀的驾驶员。

"I've got this," I said into the comms before pushing the controls forward. "Asuka, don't be so reckless!" If it weren't for the worry that literally radiated from his voice, I would've thought he only wanted to halt my attack and claim the kill himself. Still, I didn't hesitate and continued charging forward. I leaped into the air while pushing my AT-Field against the Angel's, neutralizing it without too much trouble. So far, this Angel seemed weak. I grinned and brought the spear down onto its body.  
“我能搞定。”我对着通讯器说道，然后向前推动操纵杆。“明日香，别这么鲁莽！”如果不是他声音中明显流露出的担忧，我可能会以为他只是想阻止我的攻击，自己抢夺击杀。尽管如此，我并未犹豫，继续向前冲锋。我跃入空中，同时用 AT 力场对抗天使的力场，毫不费力地将其中和。到目前为止，这只天使似乎很弱。我咧嘴一笑，将长矛刺向它的身体。

Upon contact, I saw globs of yellowish liquid burst out from the gigantic wound inflicted by my spear. Initially I thought it was LCL, but the fact that my weapon melted and turned into smoke made me think otherwise. "It's acid!" I shouted into the microphone as I tried to jump away from the Angel, but it was too late.  
接触瞬间，我看到从那巨大的伤口中喷涌出黄色的液体。起初我以为是 LCL，但我的武器融化成烟的事实让我改变了想法。“是酸！”我对着麦克风大喊，试图跳离使徒，但为时已晚。

I screamed in pain as acid rained down onto my EVA, the crucifying burning sensation on my back felt like millions of ants stinging. I summoned all of my remaining consciousness to roll aside, away from the imminent danger.  
我痛苦地尖叫，酸雨倾泻在我的 EVA 上，背上的灼烧感如同千万只蚂蚁叮咬。我用尽剩余的意识向一旁翻滚，远离迫在眉睫的危险。

"Providing suppressive fire." Came wondergirl's monotone voice as I saw a round of 406mm armor-piercing shells burst out from the muzzle of her sniper rifle, heading toward the Angel at sonic speeds. With me still holding up my AT-Field, the Angel failed to raise its own and took the bullets with its soft body tissues.  
“提供压制火力。”明日香那平淡的声音传来，我看到她狙击枪的枪口喷出一轮 406mm 穿甲弹，以超音速射向使徒。在我仍支撑着 AT 力场的同时，使徒未能展开自己的力场，用柔软的身体组织承受了子弹。

Unlike the last Angel we fought, this one visibly possessed weaker body strength. The metal shells tore its skin and flesh apart without issue; tons of LCL mixed with acid surged out from the holes created by the impacts. My heart sank as I saw the red core through the wounds at the center of its body cracked and exploded.  
与上次我们战斗的那个天使不同，这个天使明显拥有较弱的身体力量。金属弹壳毫不费力地撕裂了它的皮肤和肌肉；大量的 LCL 混合着酸液从撞击造成的孔洞中涌出。当我看到它身体中央的红色核心通过伤口裂开并爆炸时，我的心沉了下去。

Damn it. This one was indeed an easy kill. And wondergirl stole it from me.  
该死。这个确实是个容易的击杀。而那个神奇女孩从我手中抢走了它。

Even though I felt I should hate her for stealing the kill, I couldn't. I knew it wasn't her intention; she only followed the orders. If anything, I only had my own carelessness and bad luck to blame on.  
尽管我觉得我应该因为她抢走了击杀而恨她，但我做不到。我知道那不是她的意图；她只是服从命令。如果有什么，我只能怪自己的粗心和坏运气。

I sighed in disappointment and willed my damaged EVA back to the retrieval points. It wasn't a big deal at all. I could've killed the Angel by myself, that I was sure of. Therefore, I could probably deal with the next one just as quickly, and I didn't intend to lose the opportunity twice.  
我失望地叹了口气，催动受损的 EVA 返回回收点。这根本不算什么大事。我确信自己本可以独自消灭那个使徒。因此，我大概也能同样迅速地对付下一个，我可不打算两次错失机会。

I _will_ kill the next Angel by myself.  
我将独自消灭下一个使徒。

Asuka Langley Soryu would _not_ lose.  
惣流·明日香·兰格雷绝不会输。

XXXXXX

The three of us pilots sat back on a grassy ledge overlooking the architectural marvel that's Tokyo-3 as the moon rose and the blanket of night took over. "I wonder why there are so few stars in the sky?" Suddenly Shinji's half-questioning voice came to me. I scoffed and crossed one leg over the other, rolling my eyes. "It's called the light pollution, idiot. If the city doesn't have lights, you would see a lot more stars." Strangely, I didn't expect him to ask such a simple question, considering his extraordinary performance in school. Maybe he used it as a conversation opener, I didn't know.  
我们三个驾驶员坐在草坡上，俯瞰着东京-3 这座建筑奇迹，随着月亮升起，夜幕渐渐笼罩。'不知道为什么天上的星星这么少？' 突然，真嗣半带疑问的声音传入我耳中。我嗤之以鼻，翘起一条腿，翻了个白眼。'那叫光污染，傻瓜。如果城市没有灯光，你会看到更多的星星。' 奇怪的是，我没想到他会问这么简单的问题，毕竟他在学校的表现非同寻常。也许他只是用这个问题作为开场白，我不清楚。

"I do not enjoy being surrounded by brightness. I want to be able to see the stars," I heard wondergirl saying. Frowning slightly, I followed, "well, I enjoy brightness. It should be human's instinct to go after light, wouldn't you say?"  
'我不喜欢被亮光包围。我想看到星星，' 我听到明日香说。我微微皱眉，接着说，'嗯，我喜欢亮光。追逐光明应该是人类的本能，你不觉得吗？'

"I prefer brightness as well," Shinji's voice carried an unmeasurable depth in it. "I hate darkness, but I couldn't escape from it. I tried, but I always fail...the experience, the memories...the unforgiven." He took a glance at me; the pure sadness behind his mask literally poured out from his eyes.  
'我也喜欢亮光，' 真嗣的声音中带着难以估量的深沉。'我讨厌黑暗，但我无法逃离它。我尝试过，但总是失败...那些经历，那些记忆...那些无法原谅的。' 他瞥了我一眼；他面具背后的纯粹悲伤，从眼中倾泻而出。

I suddenly felt incredibly guilty. Was it because of me distancing myself from him? "Why do you like brightness, Asuka?"  
我突然感到无比内疚。是因为我疏远了他吗？“为什么你喜欢明亮，明日香？”

I bit down on my lips. "When I lived in Berlin, I was surrounded by lights. I got used to it, I guess." I felt my mood dropping as I recalled my experience in NERV Berlin. Endless training and work, nothing but...darkness and despair.  
我咬紧了嘴唇。“在柏林生活时，我被灯光环绕。我想我已经习惯了。”回忆起在 NERV 柏林的经历，无尽的训练和工作，除了...黑暗和绝望，我的心情也随之低落。

I found the actual reason for my craving for brightness the same as him.  
我发现我对光明的渴望，原因竟与他相同。

"I also enjoy being around with you as my friends," Rei spoke up abruptly, shutting off my train of thoughts. "Do you enjoy being around with me as well?"  
"我也喜欢和你们这些朋友在一起，" 绫突然开口说道，打断了我的思绪。"你也喜欢和我在一起吗？"

"Of course Ayanami," Shinji's reply came instantly. As for me, although I couldn't exactly say 'enjoy', she was at least a tolerable company. "You're...an okay friend, I guess."  
"当然，绫波，" 真嗣立刻回答道。至于我，虽然不能准确地说'喜欢'，但她至少是个可以忍受的伙伴。"你算是个……还不错的朋友吧。"

Friend. I sneered internally at the thought. A vague term created for ambiguity.  
朋友。我内心冷笑了一下这个想法。一个为了模糊不清而创造的含糊词汇。

"Do you enjoy Shinji-kun's company more than mine, Asuka?"  
"你更喜欢真嗣君的陪伴，而不是我吗，明日香？"

I choked at the unexpected question. The short and simple answer would be capitalized 'YES', but there were more careful considerations. In retrospect, even after I pushed Shinji away, he continued to be friendly to me. All of the achievements I had till today wouldn't be possible if he didn't burst into my room on that day when I attempted suicide and held me tight that night.  
我被这突如其来的问题呛到了。简短直接的回答当然是'是'，但还有更多需要仔细考虑的因素。回想起来，即使在我推开真嗣之后，他依然对我保持友好。如果没有那天他闯进我房间，在我自杀未遂的那个夜晚紧紧抱住我，我今天所取得的一切成就都不可能实现。

Then I closed off myself as soon as I could. He should be mad at me, for I practically used him then dumped him like a broken tool once I grew out of it. Instead, he just took it and...  
然后我尽可能快地封闭了自己。他应该对我生气，因为我几乎利用了他，一旦我不再需要，就像丢弃一个破损的工具一样抛弃了他。然而，他只是默默承受，并且...

In fact, I care about him, a lot. I can even say I like him. But...I don't think I deserve him. I could only hurt him if we move forward, and I'm afraid he would hurt me as well.  
事实上，我很在乎他，非常在乎。我甚至可以说我喜欢他。但是...我觉得自己配不上他。如果我们继续发展，我只会伤害他，而且我也害怕他会伤害我。

I couldn't comprehend; The way he acted toward me, the almost unconditional affection he gave me, reminded me of my momma. But I couldn't accept it.  
我无法理解；他对我的态度，他几乎无条件给予我的爱，让我想起了妈妈。但我无法接受。

I'm not some love-struck teenager who would accept unconditional love from anyone. I can only accept it from momma since she had every reason to love me without second thoughts, but she's already gone. I don't think I can love anyone else other than my mother just because they act as if they love me. I need substantial reasons and proof from them.  
我不是那种会接受任何人无条件爱的痴情少年。我只能接受来自妈妈的爱，因为她有充分的理由毫无保留地爱我，但她已经离开了。我不认为仅仅因为他们表现得好像爱我，我就能爱上除母亲以外的任何人。我需要他们提供充分的理由和证据。

And I fail to know why he would...pamper me. The other girl before me he mentioned…even though he said otherwise, I still couldn't get rid of the feeling that I was only her replacement. It was the only logical conclusion I could come up with.  
我不明白他为何会...宠溺我。他提到我之前的那个女孩……尽管他否认，我仍无法摆脱自己只是她替代品的感受。这是我唯一能得出的合理解释。

And it scares me. 这让我感到害怕。

What if it was only a game he's playing with me?  
如果这只是他和我玩的一场游戏呢？

I know I want him, but _should_ I want him? Do I deserve him? Can I actually love him? Can he understand me like how I want?  
我知道我想要他，但我应该想要他吗？我配得上他吗？我能真正爱他吗？他能像我希望的那样理解我吗？

Not to mention now I had my EVA again, I could live with being alone...an independent elite pilot is what I've always wanted, isn't it?  
更不用说现在我又有了 EVA，我可以忍受孤独……一个独立的精英驾驶员一直是我所渴望的，不是吗？

However, the reason for me piloting was to gather attention from other people...whom I didn't really care about anymore. Then what else should I want?  
然而，我驾驶 EVA 的原因是为了吸引其他人的注意……那些我不再真正关心的人。那么我还应该想要什么呢？

What's stranger, he was willing to give me space as I demanded. He didn't even protest when I said that we should sleep apart. And his respect to my modesty...I didn't even know it existed in the male species.  
更奇怪的是，他愿意按照我的要求给我空间。当我提出我们应该分开睡时，他甚至没有抗议。他对我的矜持的尊重……我甚至不知道这在男性物种中是存在的。

Did that mean he doesn't want me? Or at least he didn't want my body?  
这是否意味着他并不想要我？或者至少他并不想要我的身体？

Everything was so confusing and ambiguous...it frustrated me.  
一切都那么混乱和模糊……这让我感到沮丧。

Even if I want to go further with him, I need to sort out my own feelings at first, shouldn't I?  
即使我想与他更进一步，我也需要先理清自己的感情，不是吗？

Still, I thought I should at least give him something that would tell him that I really cared about him. "I do enjoy Shinji's company. I'd say he's my best friend here, no doubt," I turned my head to him. "So let's keep it that way, okay?"  
尽管如此，我想我至少应该给他一些东西，让他知道我真的很在乎他。“我确实喜欢和真嗣在一起。毫无疑问，他是我在这里最好的朋友，”我转头对他说，“所以让我们保持这样，好吗？”

"Sure. I can say the same thing to you, Asuka." He smiled his trademark grin that I had never seen him show anybody else ever before.  
“当然。我也可以对你说同样的话，明日香。”他露出了那个我从未见他对其他人展示过的标志性笑容。

Shit...I just couldn't...  
该死...我就是做不到...

I closed my eyes and smiled a sad smile of my own.  
我闭上眼睛，露出了自己悲伤的微笑。

XXXXXX

## *Chapter 18*: Chapter 18: Flux  
*第十八章*: 第十八章：变迁

an and threw it on the floor. "This should be professional soldiers' job! Just what the hell is NERV planning on?!" She glanced at Kaji. "Kaji…do you know how do they find the pilots?"  
“他们还是孩子，该死！”美里提高音量，将啤酒罐压碎，扔到地板上。 “这应该是职业军人的工作！NERV到底想搞什么鬼？！”她看了加吉一眼。 “加持……你知道他们是怎么找到飞行员的吗？”

Ryoji blinked, taken back by the intense curiosity of the Major of NERV. "The Marduk institute, of course," he knew it was a lie, but it was the only answer Misato needed to hear. He really didn't want to drag the woman he loved down the pit.  
良司因 NERV 少校强烈的好奇心而眨了眨眼。 “当然是马杜克学院，”他知道这是一个谎言，但这是美里唯一需要听到的答案。他实在不想把自己心爱的女人拖入深渊。

"I know that," Misato turned his gaze to the man standing next to her. "But how? How do they pick out pilots? Is there like some sort of test they take, or something?"  
“我知道。”美里将目光转向站在她身边的男人。 “但是如何？他们如何挑选飞行员？他们是否参加了某种测试，或者其他什么？”

Kaji had trouble feeding the woman lies. One day she'd learn the truth. Today was not that day, however. "You could say that, I guess. Though they're not exactly traditional tests." He wasn't necessarily lying, but he wasn't giving her anywhere near the whole truth either.  
加治很难向这个女人撒谎。有一天她会知道真相。然而，今天不是那一天。 “我想你可以这么说。尽管它们并不完全是传统的测试。”他不一定是在撒谎，但他也没有告诉她全部真相。

"What a load of bullshit…" She could give Asuka a pass at that, but nothing in Shinji's file indicated he was tested by any means. "But Shinji's records-"  
“真是一派胡言……”她可以让明日香通过，但真嗣的档案中没有任何内容表明他接受过任何测试。 “但是真嗣的记录——”

"Do you seriously believe anything from his file anymore, Katsuragi?" Kaji cut her off with a firm voice as he recollected his interactions with the supposedly-shy-and-reserved boy. "From what I see, the Shinji we know could be said as a complete antithesis to what his file describes."  
“葛城，你真的相信他档案中的任何内容吗？”梶回想起自己与这个看似害羞、矜持的男孩的互动，用坚定的声音打断了她的话。 “据我所知，我们所知道的真嗣可以说与他的档案描述完全相反。”

"But who else could he be?!" Even though she didn't want to, she still had to admit that Kaji had a point. Still, if she had to choose between 'someone else replaced him' and 'his personality changed', the latter would look like a more believable one based on Occam's razor. "We've done so many tests on the pilots we could literally map the cellular structure of their bodies."  
“但他还能是谁？！”虽然她不愿意，但她还是不得不承认加持说的有道理。不过，如果她必须在“其他人取代了他”和“他的性格改变了”之间做出选择，根据奥卡姆剃刀原理，后者看起来更可信。 “我们对飞行员进行了如此多的测试，我们可以准确地绘制出他们身体的细胞结构。”

"It's just a feeling I have…" Kaji looked up at the night sky. At the moment a piece of cloud once again blocked the moonlight that had just broken out of the overcast. "Sometimes…he reminds me of the commander."  
“这只是我的一种感觉……”卡吉抬头看着夜空。此刻，一片云彩再次挡住了刚刚从阴天中透出来的月光。 “有时候……他让我想起了指挥官。”

Misato felt a chill ran down her spine, both at the mention of the mysterious and dreadful supreme leader of NERV and the recollection of Shinji's certain actions. "A boy at his age…" His thoughts turned to Asuka. The two seemed not on a good term recently, at least Asuka looked like she was actively avoiding him. Why would she do that? Did he do something improper?  
一提到NERV神秘而可怕的最高领袖，一想到真嗣的某些举动，美里就感到脊背发凉。 “一个像他这个年纪的男孩……”他的思绪转向明日香。两人最近的关系似乎不太好，至少明日香看起来是在主动躲避他。她为什么要这么做？他是不是做了什么不正当的事？

"The Commander…do you know what he's up to? You two seem…close," the lavender-haired Major diverted the subject. It was another thing she desired to know.  
“指挥官……你知道他在做什么吗？你们两个看起来……很亲密。”淡紫色头发的少校转移了话题。这是她想知道的另一件事。

"I'd rather drink tea," Kaji said in an expression that questioned her intelligence.  
“我宁愿喝茶，”梶说道，表情质疑她的智商。

"Wha-that's not what I meant!" Blushing slightly, Misato hastily waved her hand in repudiation. "I want to know…why the Angels attack us? Why here, of all places?"  
「什、我不是那个意思！」美里脸色微红，连忙摆手表示否认。 “我想知道……为什么天使攻击我们？为什么是这里？”

"I'm…digging on it," Kaji responded discreetly. In a way, he wasn't lying. He knew what Adam was about, but other than that…he still had a lot to search for. And he intended to put in more effort. Chuckling, he added, "you're just full of questions today, Katsuragi."  
“我正在……挖掘它，”卡吉谨慎地回答。从某种程度上来说，他并没有说谎。他知道亚当是做什么的，但除此之外……他还有很多东西需要寻找。并且他还打算付出更多的努力。他笑着补充道，“葛城，你今天充满了疑问。”

"It's just I feel like I've been kept in the dark a lot…and I want to know what's going on."  
“只是我觉得我一直被蒙在鼓里……我想知道发生了什么事。”

Kaji threw his gaze forward as the rising moon peeked through the cracks between the thick Cumulonimbus. "Trust me Katsuragi," he narrowed his eyes slightly to express his own frustration with seeking out the truth. "We all want to know what's going on."  
当升起的月亮从厚厚的积雨云之间的缝隙中探出头来时，梶将目光投向前方。 “相信我，葛城，”他微微眯起眼睛，表达自己对寻找真相的挫败感。 “我们都想知道发生了什么事。”

"Kaji…" Misato's voice suddenly turned softer. "Shinji and Asuka…now they look happy together. What about us?"  
“加持……”美里的声音突然变得柔和起来。 “真嗣和明日香……现在他们看起来很幸福。我们呢？”

"I know a place just outside the city perimeter. How about after tomorrows' sync test?"  
“我知道城外有一个地方。明天的同步测试之后怎么样？”

"Alright, but you're paying."  
“好吧，不过你要付钱。”

XXXXXX

Inside NERV's testing chamber, Dr. Akagi and Major Katsuragi patiently stood by as they watched the varying synch rates fluctuate on the monitor. "Pilot Soryu and Pilot Ayanami's results are stabilizing," Maya Ibuki reported, watching the readings on the monitor. "Pilot Ikari's sync rate is still fluctuating between 75 and 85 percent!"  
在 NERV 的测试室内，赤城博士和桂木少校耐心地站在一旁，观看监视器上不同的同步率波动。 “飞行员 Soryu 和飞行员 Ayanami 的成绩正在稳定，”伊吹麻也一边看着显示器上的读数，一边报告道。 “碇飞行员的同步率仍然在百分之七十五到百分之八十五之间波动！”

"How am I doing, Misato?" So came Asuka's inquisitive yet slightly nervous voice.  
“我怎么样，美里？”明日香好奇又略带紧张的声音传来。

"You're at 80 percent, good job Asuka!"  
“你已经完成了百分之八十，干得好，明日香！”

The redhead pouted and cut off the video feed. Her sync rate had been steadily increasing since the battle against Sandalphon, where she initially reached a sync rate of 85 percent, with the highest point at 90 percent. In fact, in the first sync test after the battle, she could already get a 75 percent, a new personal high for her during sync tests.  
红发人撅起嘴，切断了视频。自从与桑多芬一战之后，她的同步率就一直在稳步提升，最初达到了85%的同步率，最高达到了90%。事实上，在战斗结束后的第一次同步测试中，她就已经达到了75%，创下了她个人同步测试的新高。

However, her goal was to surpass the invincible Shinji-sama; she wasn't going to be satisfied just by refreshing her own records. The difference between their sync rates had always been minuscule yet unsurpassed, and it frustrated her.  
但她的目标是超越无敌的真嗣大人；她不会仅仅满足于刷新自己的记录。他们的同步率之间的差异一直很小但却是无与伦比的，这让她感到沮丧。

The Third Child, on the other hand, was having a turmoil of thoughts in his mind. After Asuka's sync rates had gotten close to his, every sync test became a dilemma. He could intentionally lower his sync rates and easily let her win, but was it the best choice? He couldn't hide his true colors in battles, and once she found out that he…_pitied_ her by letting her win, her pride would be in shambles.  
而老三，心中却是思绪纷乱。当明日香的同步率接近他时，每次同步测试都变得两难。他可以故意降低同步率，轻松让她获胜，但这是最好的选择吗？他在战斗中无法掩饰自己的真面目，而一旦她发现他……怜悯她而让她获胜，她的自尊心就会荡然无存。

And it would _not_ end well.  
而且结局不会好。

_"You were slacking off during the sync tests on purpose, weren't you?!"  
“你在同步测试的时候是故意偷懒的吧？！”_

_"I'd rather die, than be pitied by the likes of you!"  
“我宁愿死，也不愿被你们这样的人可怜！”_

But he couldn't occupy the top spot forever, either. During his first few cycles, he was having fun by surpassing her sync rate just by a notch in every sync test, and it wasn't until later he learned how much it could hurt her.  
但他也不可能永远占据第一的位置。在他最初的几个周期中，他在每次同步测试中都比她的同步率高出一个档次，这让他很开心，直到后来他才知道这会对她造成多大的伤害。

"Shinji, focus!" Misato's voice echoed through his test plug, snapping him out of his dark train of thoughts. Nevertheless, he still couldn't shake them off…today Asuka's sync rate was closer to his than ever before.  
“慎二，集中注意力！”美里的声音在他的测试插头中回响，把他从黑暗的思绪中拉了出来。尽管如此，他还是无法摆脱它们……今天明日香的同步率比以往任何时候都更接近他。

"His sync rate is taking a significant drop compared to the last sync test," Ritsuko remarked. "A whole two points of decrease…how very concerning."  
“与上次同步测试相比，他的同步率显着下降，”Ritsuko 评论道。 “整整减少了两个点……真是令人担忧。”

Misato raised an eyebrow as she saw the stabilized results on the screen. She opened a comm channel to Unit 02's test plug and spoke into the microphone, "Asuka, keep up the good work! Your sync rate surpassed Shinji's by 0.5 percent! You're number one!"  
看到屏幕上稳定下来的结果，美里扬起了眉毛。她打开了02号机测试插头的通讯通道，对着麦克风说道：“明日香，继续努力！你的同步率比真嗣高了0.5%！你是第一！”

"YYYEESS!" Instantly came the thunder-loud redheaded shriek that made several people in the observation room grimace. "You heard that, Shinji?! Heh, of course the ace Evangelion Pilot is none other than myself! Spiking up and down like you…Hah! You've got to be stable to be the best!"  
“是啊是啊！”紧接着，一声雷鸣般的红发尖叫声，让观察室里的几个人都皱起了眉头。 「你听到了吗，真嗣？！嘿，新世纪福音战士的王牌飞行员当然不是别人，就是我！像你一样上下波动……哈！你必须稳定才能成为最好的！」

Shinji let out a chuckle. If the results were set…  
慎二发出一声轻笑。如果结果已定……

"Asuka, I knew you're amazing. I'm so glad that you're here with us."  
“明日香，我知道你很棒。我很高兴你和我们在一起。”

Asuka blinked. She did _not_ expect him to say something like this. Blushing slightly, she added, "well, so you've finally taken note of my brilliance." A smirk bloomed on her face, "then leave the next Angel to me! And you, First Child," her smirk turned into a smug grin. "You're just left in the dust."  
明日香眨了眨眼睛。她没想到他会说出这样的话。她脸色微红，补充道：“好吧，你终于注意到了我的才华。”她脸上绽放出一抹坏笑，“那就把下一个天使留给我吧！还有你，老大。”她的坏笑变成了得意的笑容。 “你就只剩下尘埃了。”

"Don't get too hyped, Asuka." Ritsuko's cut off her bragging with a cooling voice. "Although your sync rate is number one right now, it's still nowhere near as high as Eighth Angel, though."  
「明日香，别太激动了。」律子用冷静的声音打断了她的吹牛。 “虽然你现在的同步率是第一，但还是比不上第八天使。”

"Well, if anything, the problem is on your side!"  
“好吧，如果有的话，问题就在你这边！”

Ritsuko rolled her eyes, tapping her pencil onto her clipboard. "Lower her a bit farther into the contamination zone."  
律子翻了个白眼，用铅笔敲着写字板。 “把她放低一点，进入污染区。”

"Rits!" Misato exclaimed unbelievingly. "How is this safe?! She's already close to the contamination zone as it is! What do you think you are doing!"  
“律！”美里不可置信地惊呼道。 “这怎么安全？！她已经接近污染区了！你以为你在做什么！”

"True," She replied nonchalantly, not really caring about now the Major of NERV. "But I want to test something." As Asuka was lowered farther into the contamination zone, Akagi looked closely at her score. The alarm sounded, yet no change was spotted. "Figures..." She shook her head in disappointment. "Pull her back." The alarm silenced, and Misato let out a sigh of relief as Asuka was removed from the contamination zone.  
“是的，”她漫不经心地回答，现在已经不太关心NERV少校了。 “但我想测试一些东西。”当明日香进一步下降到污染区时，赤城仔细观察了她的分数。警报拉响，却没有发现任何变化。 “数字……”她失望地摇摇头。 “把她拉回来。”警报消失了，当明日香被移出污染区时，美里松了口气。

"What the hell was that, Rits?!" Misato shouted into her college friend's face, a deep scowl on her face.  
“那到底是什么啊，里兹？！”美里对着她大学朋友的脸喊道，她的脸上满是深深的愁容。

The blonde doctor let out another sigh. "Pushing her into the contamination zone had little effect on her sync rate…I want to know what made her able to pilot again, with such a high sync rate."  
金发医生又叹了口气。 “将她推入污染区对她的同步率几乎没有影响......我想知道是什么让她能够以如此高的同步率再次驾驶。”

Misato narrowed her eyes, "well, I guess since at that time she was the only hope, her survival instinct must've taken over."  
美里眯起眼睛，“好吧，我想既然那时她是唯一的希望，她的求生本能一定占了上风。”

"That's what I thought first. But her sync rate took another spike after we told her Shinji was okay." The head of Project E threw a look at the Major of NERV.  
“我一开始也是这么想的。但在我们告诉她真嗣没事后，她的同步率再次飙升。” E计划负责人看了NERV少校一眼。

"Where are you getting at? Just stop beating around the bush already!"  
“你到底想说什么？别再拐弯抹角了！”

"Tell me, Misato," Ritsuko shut off her notebook. "Are they…romantically involved?"  
“告诉我，美里。”律子关上了笔记本。 “他们……有浪漫关系吗？”

Misato's expression first turned thoughtful before shaking her head in denial. "Not that I know of. They are pretty friendly to each other, but that's it."  
美里的表情先是若有所思，然后摇头否认。 “据我所知，没有。他们彼此非常友好，但仅此而已。”

"Well if the two do get together, I advise you to make sure they keep it under wraps," Ritsuko remarked before she instructed Maya to end the tests for today.  
“好吧，如果两人真的在一起了，我建议你确保他们保密，”律子在指示玛雅结束今天的测试之前说道。

Misato raised an eyebrow. "Why's that?"  
美里扬起一边眉毛。 “为什么？”

"What do you think how Commander Ikari would react if he learns that two of his pilots are dating?" The faux blonde made a sly grin as she continued. "Office relationships could be disastrous, and you should know that better than anyone else."  
“你觉得如果碇司令得知他的两名飞行员正在约会，他会作何反应？”假金发女郎继续说道时露出了狡猾的笑容。 “办公室关系可能是灾难性的，你应该比任何人都清楚这一点。”

The ex-girlfriend of a particular special inspector rolled her eyes.  
某位特别督察的前女友翻了个白眼。

XXXXXX

Even after the sync test that could be considered a grand victory, Asuka still couldn't get rid of the emptiness that had been haunting her recently. As she and Shinji went on their respective ways from in front of the door of the female changing room, Asuka had kept her gaze on Shinji's back until his silhouette disappeared around the corner. She sighed and turned around, just to be surprised by the sudden emergence of Kaji Ryoji from behind the vending machine. Before she could say anything, the husky man started, "you like him, don't you?"  
即使在这场堪称大胜的同步测试之后，明日香仍然无法摆脱最近困扰她的空虚感。当她和真嗣从女更衣室门前各自走去时，明日香的目光一直注视着真嗣的背影，直到他的身影消失在拐角处。她叹了口气，转身，却惊讶地发现自动售货机后面突然出现了梶良治。还没等她说话，壮汉就开口了：“你喜欢他，不是吗？”

Asuka blinked, taken aback by the abrupt question. "Wha-what?! As if I'd ever like that baka!" Hastily denying on reflex, she pouted while couldn't help but blush a little.  
明日香被这突如其来的问题吓了一跳，眨了眨眼睛。 “什-什么？！好像我会喜欢那个baka！”她本能地连忙否认，撅起嘴，不禁脸红了一些。

"You don't need to hide it from me, Asuka," Kaji smirked, shaking the coffee can in his hand. "You know how well I know you."  
“你不需要对我隐瞒，明日香。”梶傻笑着摇晃着手中的咖啡罐。 “你知道我有多了解你。”

"Whatever…" Asuka huffed in resignation.  
“随便吧……”明日香无奈地叹了口气。

"I take things are going swimmingly between you two?" Kaji winked at her, using an overly courteous tone that Asuka didn't like to hear from him.  
“我觉得你们两个之间进展得很顺利吧？”加持对她眨了眨眼，语气过于礼貌，明日香不喜欢听到他这样说。

"Not really…" Slumping her shoulders, Asuka admitted.  
“其实也不是……”明日香垂下肩膀承认道。

Kaji narrowed his eyes ever so slightly after he heard her words. Leaning closer, he said, "So things aren't going well?"  
听到她的话，梶微微眯起了眼睛。他凑近了一些，说道：“所以事情进展不顺利？”

"I…" Asuka fixed her gaze at the wall beside her, her left feet nervously twitching. "I don't know…I guess I like him…but I'm scared of getting close to him. I don't know what he wants from me…or rather, I don't know what I can do to reciprocate the effort." She clenched her fists, letting out a frustrated groan. "Damn it...why does he have to be like this?!"  
“我……”明日香盯着旁边的墙壁，左脚紧张地抽搐着。 “我不知道……我想我喜欢他……但我害怕接近他。我不知道他想从我这里得到什么……或者更确切地说，我不知道我能做些什么来回报他努力。”她握紧了拳头，发出一声沮丧的呻吟。 “可恶……他为什么要这样？！”

"Let me guess… he's unrealistically good to you?" Seeing Asuka nod hesitantly, Kaji rubbed his chin and continued, "think about it this way…even if you found that reason someday…at that point you'd have already lost everything, and there's nothing you can do besides regretting it." Asuka went wide-eyed. "You won't know what you have until you lose them. If after everything and he's gone…how would you take it? Even under such a situation, are you still going to deny your own feelings?"  
“让我猜猜……他对你太好了？”看到明日香犹豫地点点头，梶摸了摸下巴，继续道：“这样想想……就算有一天你找到了那个理由……到时候你就已经失去了一切，除了后悔，也没有什么办法。”明日香睁大了眼睛。 “直到失去他们，你才会知道自己拥有什么。如果一切之后，他都走了……你会如何接受？即使在这样的情况下，你还会否认自己的感情吗？”

Asuka bit down on her lips as she processed Kaji's words. Recalling Shinji and wondergirl's interactions had always brought a tingle of jealousy in her chest, and the thought of completely losing him…  
明日香咬着嘴唇，处理着加持的话。回想起真嗣和wondergirl的互动，她的胸口总是升起一股嫉妒的刺痛，一想到要彻底失去他……

Asuka felt a chilling shiver assaulted her entire body.  
明日香感觉全身一阵寒意袭来。

"Me and Katsuragi…we went through a lot more than you guys…emotionally, I mean. We danced around each other for a long time...You're walking on the path I and Katsuragi couldn't take," Kaji droned on before chuckling in resignation. "Well, who am I to act like I have all the answers?" He patted her shoulders lightly. "But in the end, you need to make your own decision, Asuka. Just make sure you won't regret it in the future." Waving his hand, the special inspector walked away, leaving a silent redhead with the blizzard of emotions in her head.  
“我和葛城……我们经历了比你们多得多的事情……我是说，在情感上。我们围着对方跳舞了很长一段时间……你们走的是我和葛城无法走的路，”梶子嗡嗡地说。在咯咯地笑着辞职之前。 “好吧，我是谁，可以表现得好像我知道所有答案？”他轻轻拍了拍她的肩膀。 “但最终，你需要做出自己的决定，明日香。只要确保你将来不会后悔就好。”特派督察挥了挥手，走开了，留下一个沉默的红发女郎，脑子里充满了暴风雪般的情绪。

## *Chapter 19*: Chapter 19: Turning Point  
*第十九章*: 第十九章：转折点

Disclaimer: I do not own Evangelion  
免责声明：我不拥有《新世纪福音战士》

**Chapter 19: Turning Point  
第十九章：转折点**

"This is the place," Commander Ikari held his arms out and gazed upon the blood-red sea that was once Antarctica. "Where Adam was awakened, and purified this continent of the original sin."  
"就是这里，" 碇司令张开双臂，凝视着曾经是南极洲的血红色海洋。"亚当在此苏醒，净化了这个大陆的原罪。"

"If by purify you mean the annihilation of half of the human population, then sure," Fuyutsuki snorted, not really buying Gendo's twisted obsession with destruction.  
"如果你所谓的净化是指消灭了半数人类，那确实如此，" 冬月哼了一声，并不真正认同碇源堂对毁灭的扭曲执着。

Gendo ignored Kozo's scolding and returned his gaze to the red ocean. His son had told him to get the Lance of Longinus around this time of the scenario, while he would deal with the incoming Angel himself.  
源度无视了荒巻的责骂，将目光重新投向那片红色的海洋。他的儿子曾告诉他，在这个剧情的时间点上，他需要去获取朗基努斯之枪，而他自己则将亲自应对即将到来的使徒。

Speaking of his son… 说到他的儿子……

Putting his clasped together hands behind his rear, Gendo thought of how similar they were when treating their loved ones. Nothing else in the world mattered more than Yui to him, and from his words, Gendo was sure Shinji was just like him. He would destroy the whole world along with all the lives on the planet and not blink. A chill ran down his spine as Gendo thought of what would happen if they lost the Second Child – what would Shinji do? Annihilate the whole world and go on to another cycle?  
将双手紧扣置于身后，源渡思考着他们在对待所爱之人时的相似之处。对他来说，世界上没有什么比唯更重要，而从他的话语中，源渡确信真嗣也和他一样。他会摧毁整个世界以及星球上的所有生命，并且毫不犹豫。想到如果他们失去了二号适格者会发生什么——真嗣会怎么做？毁灭整个世界并进入下一个循环吗？

_'Like father, like son…'_ Gendo chuckled. _'What would you have become if I didn't abandon you ten years ago?'_  
'有其父必有其子……'源渡轻笑道，'如果十年前我没有抛弃你，你会变成什么样呢？'

"You seem to have a lot of faith in your son," Fuyutsuki's voice interrupted his train of thoughts.  
“你似乎对你的儿子很有信心，”冬月的声音打断了他的思绪。

"Where does that come from?" Gendo's eyes went wide by a millimeter.  
“这从何说起？”源渡的眼睛微微睁大了些。

"He comes to your office a lot," the Sub-Commander of NERV looked up at the sky. "So, picking up father's role again, Ikari? Trying to make it up to him?"  
“他经常来你办公室，”NERV 的副司令抬头望向天空，“所以，源渡，你又重新扮演起父亲的角色了吗？试图弥补他？”

"Hm," his almost questioning words created another tornado of thoughts inside Gendo's head. Who was Shinji to him? A coworker? A subordinate? An 'assistance'? His intel about the sabotage group sent by SEELE really helped him a lot – they didn't get to map the layout of NERV, which would be a considerable advantage to him during the end game between him and SEELE.  
“嗯，”他近乎疑问的话语在源渡脑海中掀起了一场思想的龙卷风。真嗣对他来说是什么？同事？下属？还是‘助手’？他对 SEELE 派来的破坏小组的情报确实帮了大忙——他们没能绘制出 NERV 的布局图，这将在他与 SEELE 的最终对决中成为他的重要优势。

Did he consider him his son anymore?  
他是否还把他视为自己的儿子？

Gendo found the last question hard to answer. Before he wouldn't even hesitate to say he only had faith in himself, and he would think of Shinji as his tool to achieve his reunion with Yui at most, but now…knowing what the other 'Gendos' had done to the Second Child, Shinji's equivalent to his Yui, he couldn't help but feel _guilty_.  
源堂发现最后一个问题难以回答。以前他甚至不会犹豫地说他只相信自己，他会把真嗣看作是实现与唯重聚的工具，但如今……知道其他‘源堂’对二号机驾驶员所做的事情，真嗣相当于他的唯，他不禁感到内疚。

After all, Shinji might be the only one in the world whom he could relate to, to _emphasize_ with.  
毕竟，真嗣可能是世界上唯一一个他能与之产生共鸣、感同身受的人。

Moreover, he wasn't that concerned about Shinji betraying him in the end as much as he did in the beginning. He knew Shinji would go on for another cycle after this one, so why should he care that much? At least, it was something he should worry about later, not now.  
此外，他不像最初那样担心真嗣最终会背叛他。他知道真嗣在这个循环结束后还会继续下一个，那他为什么要如此在意呢？至少，这是他以后应该担心的事情，而不是现在。

_'Shinji…how much did I hurt you?'_ He hated, _loathed_ SEELE for what they did to Yui, which he was sure of. Looking up at the sky, Gendo could hear the announcer of the ship sounding. "This is the bridge. NERV transmission: we've just detected an Angel in earth's orbit above the Indian ocean."  
'真嗣…我究竟伤害了你多少？' 他痛恨、厌恶 SEELE 对唯所做的一切，这一点他确信无疑。抬头望向天空，源堂能听到船上的广播响起。"这是舰桥。NERV 通讯：我们刚刚检测到在印度洋上空地球轨道上有一只使徒。"

As for defeating the Angel, Shinji had told him this one he would deal with it using the method that had never failed before. Gendo had been demanding explanations from him of his failure against the Angels; even though he had failed before, he still trusted him to put in most of his effort every time.  
至于击败使徒，真嗣曾告诉他，这次他将采用之前从未失败过的方法来应对。源堂一直要求他解释对抗使徒失败的原因；尽管他之前失败过，但他仍然相信他会每次都全力以赴。

After all, to Shinji, the only alternative other than winning would be losing the Second Child. And Gendo was sure Shinji would never intentionally let that happen.  
毕竟，对真嗣来说，除了胜利之外的唯一选择就是失去第二适格者。而碇源堂确信真嗣绝不会故意让这种情况发生。

Turning his head to the southern part of the sky, he could faintly see a new star moving across the sky at visible speed, hordes of smaller stars that could be easily identified as N2 aerial mine explosions flashing around it.  
他转头望向南方的天空，隐约可见一颗新星以肉眼可见的速度划过天际，周围无数较小的星光闪烁，显然是 N2 空中水雷爆炸的痕迹。

"Do you have faith in humanity, Fuyutsuki?" Seeing the grey-haired elder nod, Gendo continued, "we shall see how it goes."  
“你对人类有信心吗，冬月？”看到灰发的长者点头，碇源堂继续说道，“我们拭目以待。”

XXXXXX

"What?!" Asuka didn't even try to hold her tongue. "You want us to catch it with our hands?!"  
"什么？！" 明日香连掩饰都懒得掩饰，"你要我们用手去抓它？！"

Across the thick glass floor that remained suspended above the Geofront, Misato stood opposite the three EVA pilots. The First Child didn't seem bothered by it, though not thrilled, either. Shinji kept his calm composure, very much like Rei's, only had more determination in his eyes. As for Asuka, she was visibly taken aback by the boldness of the plan.  
在悬浮于地表之上的厚玻璃地板对面，美里站在三位 EVA 驾驶员的对面。第一适格者似乎并不为此感到困扰，但也并不兴奋。真嗣保持着冷静的姿态，与绫波颇为相似，只是眼中多了几分坚定。至于明日香，她显然被这个大胆的计划吓了一跳。

"We need all the three EVAs to cover the estimated impact zone we've calculated using the MAGI. Just catch the Angel before it hits the ground, and you'll be fine." Misato explained casually. "I understand it you don't want to partake in this sortie. If you want to quit, you can tell me right now. No one will blame you."  
"我们需要三台 EVA 覆盖我们用 MAGI 计算出的预计冲击区域。只要在天使落地前抓住它，你们就没事。" 美里随意地解释道，"我理解你们可能不想参与这次出击。如果你们想退出，现在就可以告诉我。没人会责怪你们的。"

"Tch!" She expected that much of a reaction out of Asuka. "I'm not going to let that Angel flatten this place I consider my home!" She smirked proudly. "Besides, after I get this kill my kill count will surpass Shinji's! So why would I chicken out!"  
"哼！" 她预料到明日香会有这样的反应。"我不会让那个使徒毁了我视为家园的地方！" 她得意地笑了笑。"而且，这次击杀后我的击杀数将超过真嗣！那我为什么要退缩呢！"

"Good." Major Katsuragi nodded in satisfaction. "And you, Rei?"  
"很好。" 葛城美里少校满意地点点头。"那么，绫波呢？"

"I accept the mission." Rei's voice was flat as usual.  
"我接受任务。" 绫波的声音一如既往地平淡。

"I see." The Major of NERV turned her head to the last pilot. "Shinji, what about you?"  
"明白了。" NERV 的少校转向最后一位驾驶员。"真嗣，你呢？"

"I'm not going to sit around and let the girls fight that thing by themselves, you know," said Shinji as he glanced at his side where Asuka and Rei stood.  
"我不会坐视不管，让女孩们独自对付那东西，你知道的，" 真嗣说着，瞥了一眼站在他身旁的明日香和绫波。

"Hmph," Asuka stomped her feet on the glass floor. "I don't think I'll need your help, anyway. I can take out this Angel by myself! Just wait and see!"  
"哼，" 明日香在玻璃地板上跺了跺脚。"反正我觉得我不需要你的帮助。我一个人就能干掉这个使徒！等着瞧吧！"

"Well, you're supposed to fill out a will according to the procedures," said Misato as she scanned the document once again.  
“嗯，你应该按照程序填写遗嘱，”美里再次审视了一遍文件，说道。

Asuka rolled her eyes. "I don't need to fill one out. I'm not going to die." "I do not deem it necessary." The blue-haired pilot concurred. "I don't plan on dying today, either, Misato." Shinji followed.  
明日香翻了个白眼。“我不需要填这个。我不会死的。”“我认为没有必要。”蓝发驾驶员附和道。“我今天也不打算死，美里。”真嗣接着说。

The Major, who was keeping a serious face, couldn't help but smile a little. All three of them were faced with an almost astronomical probability of dying, and yet they still stood their ground. "Alright then. Let's get ready!"  
一直保持严肃表情的大校忍不住微微一笑。他们三人面对着几乎天文数字般的死亡概率，却依然坚守阵地。“好吧。那我们准备出发吧！”

Asuka felt the elevator ride down to the EVA cages had to have been the longest one minute of her life. Even though she said otherwise, she couldn't help but feel anxious about what was to come. On the positive side, this could be her ladder to the top one place of Evangelion pilots, her definitive evidence that she could be alone and rely on no one else but herself. On the negative side, she could very likely die in the mission, not to mention Shinji and wondergirl.  
明日香觉得从电梯下降到 EVA 格纳库的那一分钟，绝对是有生以来最漫长的一分钟。尽管她嘴上不承认，但内心深处还是忍不住对即将到来的任务感到焦虑。从积极的一面看，这可能是她通往 EVA 驾驶员顶峰的阶梯，是她证明自己可以独立、无需依赖任何人的确凿证据。从消极的一面看，她很有可能在任务中丧生，更别提真嗣和那个怪女孩了。

Speaking of that idiot…  
说到那个笨蛋……

Her talk with Kaji that day only made her worry more about the situation. Thinking about losing him had always brought a twitch in her stomach, and today…  
那天与加持先生的谈话让她对局势更加担忧。一想到可能会失去他，她的胃就忍不住抽搐，而今天……

"Shinji," the redhead sighed and patted on the boy's right shoulder. "Oi, earth to Shinji!"  
“真嗣，”红发女孩叹了口气，拍了拍男孩的右肩。“喂，真嗣，回神啦！”

"Yes, Asuka?" The brown-haired boy snapped his head in her direction, seemingly just broke out from his own mind world.  
“什么事，明日香？”棕发男孩猛地转头看向她，仿佛刚刚从自己的思绪中挣脱出来。

"You're not allowed to die out there, you got that?" Asuka tried to sound as threateningly as possible. However, the tenderness still flowed out despite her best efforts. "You're my…best friend here, and I don't want you to die because you can't pull yourself together during an Angel attack!"  
"你可不能在那里死掉，明白吗？" 明日香试图尽可能地显得威胁十足。然而，尽管她尽了最大努力，温柔之情依然流露出来。"你是我的……这里最好的朋友，我不希望你因为在一个使徒攻击中无法振作而死去！"

"Sure?" Shinji replied, a bit uncertain of where it came from.  
"真的吗？" 真嗣回答道，对这种情感的来源有些不确定。

"I'm serious," Asuka hissed. "If you die today, I will never forgive you, and I will kill you myself!" Completely ignoring the impossibility of her statement, Asuka continued as courtesy, "and it goes to you, too, wondergirl."  
"我是认真的，" 明日香低声说道，"如果你今天死了，我永远不会原谅你，我会亲自杀了你！" 完全无视她话语中的不可能性，明日香继续以礼貌的口吻说，"还有你，奇迹女孩，也一样。"

"Alright, I promise," Shinji smiled a small smile.  
"好吧，我保证，" 真嗣微微一笑。

"I'll hold you onto that," Asuka smiled back.  
"我会记住你的承诺，" 明日香回以微笑。

"If I die, I can be replaced," came Rei's usual response.  
"如果我死了，我可以被替换，" 丽一如既往地回答道。

Rolling her eyes, Asuka facepalmed and spoke up, "well, I don't even know why I'm worried. Just witness the great Asuka Langley Soryu kick this Angel's ass! Just don't get in my way!" A cocky grin started to find its way to her face.  
翻了个白眼，明日香捂脸叹道，“唉，我到底在担心什么啊。看我，伟大的惣流·明日香·兰格雷，把这使徒打得落花流水！别挡我的路就行！”一丝得意的笑容开始在她脸上绽放。

Shinji let out a silent sigh. He could only hope things could go well in this battle.  
真嗣无声地叹了口气。他只能祈祷这场战斗能顺利进行。

The weather seemed to have its own ideas on defeating the Angels, though. Thick overcast that loomed over the entire sky as if deliberately making the mission as difficult as possible. Unit 00, 01, and 02 crouched in a starting position as their pilots awaited Misato's commands to engage in the mission. They had to sortie without umbilical cables to compensate for speed, and under the full-performance mode, the EVA only had 3 minutes of operational time, which meant they needed to kill the Angel fast.  
然而，天气似乎也有自己的想法来对抗使徒。厚厚的云层笼罩着整个天空，仿佛故意让任务变得尽可能困难。零号机、零一号机和零二号机蹲伏在起始位置，它们的驾驶员等待着美里指挥官下达任务开始的命令。他们必须在没有脐带电缆的情况下出击以弥补速度，并且在全性能模式下，EVA 只有 3 分钟的运行时间，这意味着他们需要迅速消灭使徒。

"The Angel has been sighted!" Aoba announced to everyone on the command deck. "Estimated time of impact: five minutes!"  
“使徒已被发现！”青叶向指挥舱内的所有人宣布。“预计接触时间：五分钟！”

"Alright everyone," Misato spoke into the microphone. "Get ready to engage the target." After receiving verbal confirmations from the pilots, the Major continued. "We can only use the MAGI's rough estimated trajectory to get you within ten thousand meters of the target. After that, you're on your own." She took a deep breath. "EVAs launch!"  
“好了，各位，”美里对着麦克风说道。“准备与目标交战。”在收到驾驶员的口头确认后，美里指挥官继续说道：“我们只能利用 MAGI 的粗略估计轨迹让你们接近目标一万米范围内。之后，就靠你们自己了。”她深吸了一口气。“EVA 出击！”

The second their umbilical cables detached, all three EVA Units shot forward, their battery timers slowly counting down. The roaring of thunders could be heard traveling across the sky as the pilots willed their EVAs dart through the fortified metropolis. Each heavy step shook the ground around them, leaving large indentions in the dirt.  
当他们的脐带电缆一断开，三台 EVA 机体便疾驰而出，电池计时器缓缓倒数。雷鸣般的轰响划破天际，驾驶员们操控着 EVA 在加固的都市中穿梭。每一步都震撼着地面，留下深深的足迹在泥土中。

Ayanami controlled her EVA leaped over a series of high-voltage powerlines, not because she was worried about collateral damage; she simply didn't want to waste energy and time on the would-be-lost momentum.  
绫波控制着她的 EVA 跃过一系列高压电线，并非担心附带损害；她只是不想在即将失去的势头中浪费能量和时间。

Asuka seemed to be putting her past track skills to use, leaping over the obstacles like hurdles while not losing the slightest bit of momentum.  
明日香似乎在运用她过去的田径技巧，像跨栏一样跃过障碍物，丝毫没有减慢速度。

"You're now within ten thousand meters of the target!" Major Katsuragi's voice echoed through their Entry Plugs. "It's all up to you now!"  
“你们现在距离目标不到一万米了！”葛城美里少校的声音在插入栓中回响，“接下来就看你们的了！”

Shinji looked up at the sky and tried to spot the Angel. Even though every time it would land around the same place, the uncertainty principle of Quantum mechanics made it certain that minor discrepancies were destined to occur. The airflow of the atmosphere, the effect of solar winds, and other trivial stuff all affected the final trajectory of the Angel.  
真嗣抬头望向天空，试图寻找使徒的踪迹。尽管每次它都会降落在相似的地方，但量子力学的测不准原理使得微小的偏差注定会发生。大气流动、太阳风的影响以及其他琐碎因素，都会影响使徒的最终轨迹。

Fortunately, something as colossal as the Tenth Angel wasn't going to be influenced that much.  
幸运的是，像第十使徒这样庞大的存在，并不会受到太大的影响。

Shinji took the most direct route to where he knew the Angel would land around, no hurry in his pace since he knew he would have plenty of time left.  
真嗣选择了最直接的路径前往他预知使徒会降落的区域，步伐不急不缓，因为他知道自己还有充足的时间。

That was until he saw Asuka picking up her speed and broke the sound barrier as he heard a loud BANG of the sonic boom.  
直到他看到明日香加速并突破了音障，随即听到一声响亮的音爆巨响。

Inside the entry plug of Unit 02, Asuka watched intently at the sky, trying to locate where the thunders were the densest. If the displacement of clouds created thunders, then those areas must be where the Angel was falling from. She had the determination to kill this Angel by herself, and she would put in her best effort to achieve it.  
在二号机插入栓内，明日香紧盯着天空，试图找出雷电最密集的地方。如果云层的移动产生了雷电，那么那些区域必定是使徒坠落的地方。她决心独自消灭这个使徒，并将全力以赴实现这一目标。

Gritting her teeth, Asuka willed her EVA picking up speed more and more, even though she had already surpassed Mach 1. Unit 02 dashed with extreme speed towards the point of impact, destroying everything along its way. Asuka had no idea an Evangelion was capable of such speeds, but now wasn't exactly the best time to question it. Once she reached the location the Angel was descending to, she reared her feet back and slid on her heels, digging the EVA's feet into the ground while she held her arms firmly up to the sky. "AT-Field Maximum!"  
咬紧牙关，明日香催动她的 EVA 不断加速，尽管她已经超过了音速。02 号机以极速冲向撞击点，沿途一切尽被摧毁。明日香从未想过 EVA 能达到如此速度，但现在显然不是深究的时候。一旦到达天使降临的位置，她后退一步，脚跟滑动，将 EVA 的双脚深深插入地面，同时双臂坚定地举向天空。“AT 力场，全开！”

The clouds above her began to disperse as the giant eye forced its way through the thunderstorm, colliding directly onto Unit 02's AT Field. At first, Asuka tried to use one of her arms to pull out her progressive knife, but the mountain-like pressure quickly made her perish the thought. She bellowed out in pain as she could feel her arms began failing against the weight of the vast Angel.  
头顶的云层开始散开，巨大的眼睛强行穿透雷暴，直接撞击在 02 号机的 AT 力场上。起初，明日香试图用一只手臂拔出她的高振动粒子刀，但山一般的压力很快让她打消了这个念头。她痛苦地大喊，感觉到自己的双臂在天使的沉重压迫下开始支撑不住。

"YYAAAAHHH!" Asuka cried as she summoned all of her strength, trying to merely stand up straight. The Angel sensed the obstacle below it and contracted its body, using the inertia to push itself down further.  
“呀啊啊啊！”明日香竭尽全力嘶喊，试图仅仅站直身体。天使感知到下方的阻碍，收缩身体，利用惯性进一步向下压。

Asuka could feel her left knee gave in as she fell down into a kneeling position. No matter how hard it was for her to admit it, she didn't stand the slightest of a chance against the Angel alone.  
明日香感觉到左膝一软，跪倒在地。无论多么难以承认，她独自一人面对使徒毫无胜算。

Throwing all of her pride and shame aside, Asuka screamed.  
抛开所有的骄傲与羞愧，明日香尖叫起来。

"SHINJI! AYANAMI! I NEED YOUR HELP! PLEASE HURRY!"  
“真嗣！绫波！我需要你们的帮助！请快点！”

Shinji felt a cold ball grow inside his stomach as he heard the desperate pleading of his love over the comms. "Asuka, hold on!" He yelled into the comm channel, hoping to give at least mental support. Then, breaking the sound barrier, Unit 01 rushed atop the hill where Unit 02 was holding the Angel on and deployed its own AT-Field. Rei joined shortly after, using its prog knife to tore a cut on the Angel's AT-Field, opening it just enough for Shinji to reach through.  
听到通讯器中爱人绝望的恳求，真嗣感到一股寒意在胃里凝结。“明日香，坚持住！”他对着通讯频道大喊，希望能给予至少精神上的支持。随后，突破音障，初号机疾驰至山顶，与零号机一同牵制使徒，并展开了自己的 AT 力场。绫波紧随其后，利用高振动粒子刀在使徒的 AT 力场上撕开一道口子，为真嗣创造出足够穿透的机会。

Unit 01 pulled out its own prog knife as well and aimed at the Angel's eye. "Now die!" Shinji roared, thrusting the ultra-sharp blade through the hole in the AT Field and cutting into the core located in its pupil.  
初号机也拔出了自己的高频振动刀，瞄准使徒的眼睛。“现在去死吧！”真嗣咆哮着，将超锋利的刀刃穿过 AT 力场的缺口，切入位于其瞳孔中的核心。

Suddenly, Asuka could feel all the force pressing against her let off as the Angel became nothing more than dead weight. She looked up to see Shinji pull the knife out of the monster's core, causing a spew of LCL to drench the three EVAs. A resounding shriek could be heard from the Angel as its body began to expand and bubble before it exploded into a giant ball of fire.  
突然间，明日香感觉到所有压在她身上的力量都消失了，使徒变成了毫无生气的重物。她抬头看到真嗣从怪物的核心中拔出刀刃，导致大量 LCL 喷涌而出，将三台 EVA 淋湿。使徒的身体开始膨胀并冒泡，随后发出一声震耳欲聋的尖叫，爆炸成一个巨大的火球。

Back in NERV HQ, Misato let out a breath that she didn't know she was holding, falling back onto the chair, resting her right hand atop her forehead. People around her exploded into cheers as she recomposed herself. "Phew, that was close." She grabbed the microphone, "Good work you three." She spoke into the device, not bothering hiding the joyfulness and appreciation in her voice the slightest. "We'll send a recovery team to pick you up."  
在 NERV 总部，美里长长地呼出一口气，她甚至没意识到自己一直在屏息，向后倒在椅子上，右手放在额头上。周围的人们爆发出欢呼声，她重新振作起来。“呼，真是千钧一发。”她拿起麦克风，“你们三个干得漂亮。”她对着设备说道，丝毫不掩饰声音中的喜悦和感激之情。“我们会派回收队伍去接你们。”

No one noticed a certain redhead who curled up to a ball in her pilot seat.  
没有人注意到一个红发女孩蜷缩在她的驾驶座上，像一个球一样。

XXXXXX

Asuka had been tossing and turning on her bed for the past hour, yet sleep wouldn't come. The nightmare she had just woken up from was the worst one she had ever since...they started sleeping apart.  
明日香已经在床上辗转反侧了一个小时，但睡眠依旧不肯降临。她刚刚从噩梦中醒来，这是自他们开始分开睡以来最糟糕的一次。

Her mind drifted back to today's battle against the Tenth Angel. The fact that she lost another chance to claim her top spot of Evangelion pilots wasn't bothering her as much anymore; the real killer was her unavoidable dependence on people other than herself.  
她的思绪飘回到今天与第十使徒的战斗。失去再次夺回 EVA 驾驶员榜首位置的机会，这件事已经不再像以前那样困扰她了；真正让她感到痛苦的是，她无法避免地依赖着除自己以外的人。

She could only found solace in the fact that she was the leading role in the sortie, the one who held the sky for her teammates.  
她只能从自己是出击中的主角，是为队友撑起天空的那个人这一事实中找到慰藉。

Nonetheless, her illusion that she didn't need anyone and only rely on her EVA now seemed like a cosmic joke to her.  
尽管如此，她曾经认为自己不需要任何人，只依靠 EVA 的想法，现在对她来说就像是一个宇宙级的笑话。

As Asuka stared at the ceiling above her, all the frustration, loneliness, emptiness, and anxiousness came crashing down on her just like what the Angel did today, making her suffocate more with each passing second.  
当明日香凝视着头顶的天花板时，所有的挫败感、孤独、空虚和焦虑如今天使所做的那样，一股脑儿地向她袭来，每过一秒都让她更加窒息。

The redhead let out an irritated groan. If she had already relied on him once, one more time wouldn't be too much of a deal. Even though it would make her appear needy, even pathetic since she was the one who pushed him away, she couldn't care less about it right now.  
红发女孩发出了一声烦躁的呻吟。如果她已经依赖过他一次，再多一次也不算太过分。尽管这会让她显得需要帮助，甚至有些可怜，毕竟当初是她推开了他，但此刻她已经顾不了那么多了。

Having made a decision, Asuka got off her bed and left her room. Tiptoeing across the hallway, she carefully slid Shinji's room door open and entered the small closet. At first glance, she thought he was sleeping, so she had decided only to sleep next to him and left the room before he could wake up. However, after she lay down, she could hear him gasp in surprise. Asuka silently cursed, but there was no chickening out anymore.  
下定决心后，明日香从床上起身，离开了房间。她踮着脚穿过走廊，小心翼翼地推开真嗣的房门，进入了那个小衣橱。起初，她以为他在睡觉，所以决定只是躺在他旁边，并在他醒来之前离开房间。然而，当她躺下后，却听到他惊讶的喘息声。明日香暗自咒骂，但现在已经没有退缩的余地了。

"Baka-Shinji, can I stay here for tonight? I'd rather not be alone right now."  
"笨蛋真嗣，今晚我能留在这里吗？我现在不想一个人。"

"Sure..." Came Shinji's sleepy response. However, his actions were not so sloppy. He turned around and put one of his arms over her waist, dangling down to her abdomen.  
""当然可以..."" 真嗣睡意朦胧地回答。然而，他的动作并不马虎。他转过身，一只手臂搭在她的腰间，垂落到她的腹部。

Asuka tensed up, "I didn't say you could hold-"  
明日香紧张起来，""我没说你可以抱——"

"Asuka," Shinji cut her off with a firmer voice. "You came here because you had a nightmare, right? I just had one, too. We did this before and I can say we both enjoyed it, so let's keep the bad dreams away from both of us, okay?"  
“明日香，”真嗣用更坚定的声音打断了她。“你来这里是因为做了噩梦，对吧？我也刚做了个噩梦。我们以前也这样做过，而且我可以说我们都从中得到了乐趣，所以让我们一起把噩梦赶走，好吗？”

As much as she wanted to retort, she couldn't bring herself to do it since she was indeed relishing in the warmth and the familiar physical contact. Melting into his embrace, Asuka smiled a little and let out a content sigh.  
尽管她很想反驳，但她确实沉浸在这温暖和熟悉的身体接触中，无法自拔。在真嗣的怀抱中融化，明日香微微一笑，发出满足的叹息。

Though it didn't help to wipe out the insecurities in her head. Now she was once again relying on him, but was it the right thing to do? "Shinji," she started, her voice uncertain. "Who...am I to you?"  
虽然这并没有消除她内心的不安。现在她又一次依赖他，但这样做对吗？“真嗣，”她开口，声音带着不确定。“我……对你来说是谁？”

"You're my best friend, why ask?"  
“你是我的好朋友，为什么要问？”

"Don't give me that!" Asuka snapped. "I want your honest answer: why do you care about me?!"  
"别跟我说那些！" 明日香厉声道，"我要你老实回答：你为什么关心我？！"

Shinji fell silent for a moment. What should he say? Not the actual truth - that he was sure of. Or could he tell the reason why he was attracted to Asuka Langley Soryu in the first place? "Because...I feel you're the only one who can understand me, Asuka." The said girl went wide-eyed. "No one else could understand what being an EVA pilot is like. All they see is the shining front. The pain we suffer, the risks we take..." He trailed off as his voice became more sorrowful. "Aside from you're pretty, of course." Chuckling, Shinji added.  
真嗣沉默了一会儿。他该说什么呢？不是真正的真相——这一点他很确定。还是说他最初被惣流·明日香·兰格雷吸引的原因？"因为...我觉得你是唯一能理解我的人，明日香。" 明日香瞪大了眼睛。"没人能理解成为 EVA 驾驶员的感受。他们只看到光鲜的一面。我们所承受的痛苦，我们所冒的风险..." 他的声音越来越悲伤，渐渐低沉下去。"当然，你也很漂亮。" 真嗣轻笑一声补充道。

_'So he wasn't objectifying me...'_ Asuka felt warmth growing inside her chest. Unlike most of the boys she encountered in school, Shinji saw her as a person, not just a hot foreign exotic girl.  
'所以他并没有物化我...' 明日香感到胸中涌起一股暖意。与学校里大多数男生不同，真嗣把她看作一个有血有肉的人，而非仅仅是一个性感的异国美女。

With that being said, she was still flattered by his acknowledgment of her figures. "What about wondergirl? She's a cute butt, and an EVA pilot as well," Asuka probed.  
尽管如此，她还是对他的认可感到受宠若惊。“那 wondergirl 呢？她有个可爱的屁股，还是个 EVA 驾驶员，”明日香试探道。

"Actually...I see her more of a sister," replied Shinji truthfully.  
“实际上……我更多把她看作是妹妹，”真嗣真诚地回答。

Somehow his admissions made Asuka feel more relieved. _'So he treats her as a sister? Then does it mean he treat me as...'_ Before her train of thought could reach its final destination, though, Shinji started up again. "Asuka...all I want to say is you don't have to be alone. There's life outside of EVA...have you ever considered playing music?"  
不知为何，他的坦白让明日香感到更加安心。‘所以他把她当妹妹看待？那是不是意味着他把我当作……’然而，在她思绪到达终点之前，真嗣又开口了。“明日香……我只想说，你不必孤单一人。EVA 之外还有生活……你有没有考虑过玩音乐？”

"Huh? Music? Like, instruments?" Asuka raised an eyebrow. "Why?"  
"嗯？音乐？像乐器那种吗？" 明日香挑了挑眉。"为什么？"

"Because you need a life outside the EVA world, me too," said Shinji as he relished in the scent of strawberry shampoo emitted from her long red hair.  
"因为你需要在 EVA 世界之外的生活，我也一样，" 真嗣说着，享受着她长长的红发散发出的草莓洗发水的香味。

"But I don't have time for it!" Frowning slightly, Asuka raised her volume a little bit. "Besides, there're more Angel attacks right now!"  
"但我没时间搞这些！" 明日香微微皱眉，提高了些音量。"再说，现在天使袭击更频繁了！"

"What did I say about life outside of EVA, Asuka? Getting away from it and have fun while you can is the point." Shinji patiently led her. "Don't you ever get tired?"  
"我在 EVA 之外的生活是怎么跟你说的，明日香？远离它，趁还能享受时尽情玩乐才是重点。" 真嗣耐心地引导她。"你难道不觉得累吗？"

Tired? From the EVA, or from maintaining the masks? Asuka felt he was questioning both. Getting no responses from her, Shinji continued, "You're tired...but you won't do anything about it. That happened to me once, too."  
累？从 EVA 中解脱，还是维持那些面具？明日香觉得他两方面都在质疑。见她没有回应，真嗣继续说道，"你感到疲惫...但你却不采取任何行动。我也曾有过这样的经历。"

"You can understand me, Asuka."  
"你能理解我，明日香。"

The redhead mused. Was it the real reason for his unrealistic affection for her? He thought she could understand him...but could he comprehend her like how she wanted? She didn't want sympathy from anyone. "Shinji...you told me your mother is dead...right?"  
红发少女沉思着。他对她那不切实际的情感，真的是出于这个原因吗？他以为她能理解他...但他又能像她所期望的那样理解她吗？她不希望从任何人那里得到同情。“真嗣...你告诉过我你妈妈去世了...对吧？”

"Yeah..." Came his sullen reply. "She died...after an incident with the EVA." Asuka blinked in shock. "And my father...abandoned me afterward." Shinji knew this was the time, Asuka was trying to open up to him. If he didn't offer his support right now, she would go down her downward spiral once again, and there was no way he would allow it to happen.  
“嗯...”他闷闷不乐地回答。“她是在一次 EVA 事故后去世的。”明日香震惊地眨了眨眼。“而我父亲...在那之后抛弃了我。”真嗣知道这是关键时刻，明日香正试图向他敞开心扉。如果他现在不给予支持，她将再次陷入那螺旋下降的状态，他绝不允许这种情况发生。

"My momma...died as well, also after an accident with the EVA..." Asuka slowly let the words flow out. If he could be honest with her, if he could open up to her, she could as well. "And my father...hooked up with another woman right after...and I was ignored."  
“我妈妈...也是在一次 EVA 事故中去世的...”明日香缓缓地吐露着这些话。如果他能对她坦诚，如果他能向她敞开心扉，她也可以。“而我父亲...就在那之后和另一个女人在一起了...我被忽视了。”

Silence descended upon them. "You're just like me." None of the two knew who said it first, but Shinji was sure it was a side effect of his countless sync trainings with her.  
寂静笼罩着他们。“你和我一样。”两人都不知是谁先说出的这句话，但真嗣确信这是他与她无数次同步训练的副作用。

As for Asuka, she could feel a new sensation flowing through her body. Like spotting a hunter's lodge with firelight inside the deepest part of a dark forest, or catching the ray of piercing light from a lighthouse on a vast storm-raging ocean - it was a feeling of connection and mutual comprehension. Finally, she found the one, the person who might as well be a reflection of her, who also cared about her. They were two sides of the same coin, and once they found out about each other and join together, they became a whole.  
至于明日香，她能感觉到一种新的感觉在体内流淌。就像在黑暗森林深处发现一间有火光的猎人小屋，或是在狂风暴雨的广阔海洋上捕捉到灯塔的刺眼光芒——这是一种联系与相互理解的感觉。终于，她找到了那个人，那个可能是她镜像的人，也关心她的人。他们是同一枚硬币的两面，一旦发现彼此并联合起来，他们就成为了一个整体。

Asuka felt the emptiness in her heart was gradually filled with joy and surprise.  
明日香感到心中的空虚正逐渐被喜悦和惊喜填满。

In the end, he actually _could_ understand her like how she wanted.  
最终，他真的能像她所希望的那样理解她了。

"Idiot..." Asuka whispered. What now? Now she wanted him more than ever. He was the one in the world she had been seeking from the deepest part of her heart; now that she had him at her side, what should she do next?  
“笨蛋……”明日香低声说道。现在怎么办？现在她比以往任何时候都更想要他。他是她从内心深处一直在寻找的那个人；现在他就在她身边，她接下来该怎么办？

Which brought up another question that she dreaded his answer might not be what she wanted to hear.  
这又引出了另一个她害怕他的回答可能并非她所愿听的问题。

Would he ever want her the way she wanted him?  
他是否也会像她渴望他那样渴望她？

Nonetheless, Asuka knew if he ever dared to toy with her feelings, she would make him suffer in more than one way.  
尽管如此，明日香知道如果他胆敢玩弄她的感情，她会让他以多种方式受苦。

She didn't want to lose the...relationship they had right now, and moving forward too fast without knowing how far he wanted to go with her would very likely put an end to it. Still, Asuka Langley Soryu knew she had to take action from now on - before everything could become too late. "Well, actually I'd like to play some instruments someday later. With you."  
她不想失去他们现在的这种...关系，如果进展太快而不了解他想和她走多远，很可能会结束这一切。不过，惣流·明日香·兰格雷知道她必须从现在开始采取行动——以免为时已晚。“嗯，其实我想以后能和你一起玩些乐器。”

"Sure. I'm looking forward to it." Cracking a warm smile, Shinji let out a content exhale, satisfied that he made real progress bringing her out of her shell.  
“当然，我很期待。”真嗣露出温暖的笑容，满意地呼出一口气，因为他确实让她走出了自己的壳。

The redhead smiled herself to sleep as well, her nightmare was replaced by sweet dreams for the first time in a long while.  
红发女孩也带着微笑入睡，她的噩梦终于被久违的甜美梦境所取代。

XXXXXX

"The Tenth Angel really did a number on Unit 02," looking at the damaged form of the crimson EVA Unit, Ritsuko frowned since she knew the repairs would be extensive.  
“第十使徒对二号机真是造成了不小的破坏，”看着那受损严重的赤红 EVA 二号机，律子皱起了眉头，因为她知道修复工作将会非常繁重。

"Well, better get started." Said one of the technicians beside her. "How do we deal with the lost organic tissues?"  
"好吧，最好开始吧。" 她旁边的一位技术员说道。"我们怎么处理丢失的有机组织？"

"I'd say we use the newly delivered protein blocks," Ritsuko pushed her glasses up her nose. "We don't know when's the next Angel attack, so we'd better hurry."  
"我想我们用新送来的蛋白质块，" 律子推了推她的眼镜。"我们不知道下一次使徒攻击是什么时候，所以最好快点。"

"So we're delaying the construction of Pribnow Box?" The technician raised an eyebrow.  
"那么我们推迟 Pribnow 盒子的建造吗？" 技术员挑了挑眉毛。"

"Still, it's an acceptable trade-off."  
“尽管如此，这仍是一个可接受的折中方案。”

The head of the logistic department sighed in resignation. "Alright, if you say so." The idea of the construction of Pribnow Box came from Dr. Akagi, so if now she wanted the materials for other uses, he didn't have anything to say in the matter.  
后勤部门负责人叹了口气，无奈地说：“好吧，既然你这么说。”普里博盒的建设构想源自赤木博士，既然她现在需要这些材料用于其他用途，他对此也无话可说。

After the technician left the Evangelion Chamber, Ritsuko Akagi returned her gaze back to the crimson Unit 02. Looking at the creation of her mother and herself, the head of Project Eva doubted.  
技术人员离开 EVA 格纳库后，赤木律子将目光重新投向那台深红色的零二号机。凝视着由她与母亲共同创造的杰作，这位 EVA 计划负责人心生疑虑。

_'Do I actually know what they are?'  
'我真的知道它们是什么吗？'_

XXXXXX

## *Chapter 20*: Chapter 20: Uncertainty  
*第二十章*: 第二十章：不确定性

Disclaimer: I do not own Evangelion.  
免责声明：我不拥有《新世纪福音战士》。

**Chapter 20: Uncertainty 第二十章：不确定性**

The rising sun had just begun to light up the pre-dawn skies when Shinji woke. The alarm was not loud, but Shinji was used to wake in the first two seconds of its sound. He reached to deactivate it. A glance at the alarm told him it was 6:45 in the morning.  
当真嗣醒来时，初升的太阳刚刚开始照亮黎明前的天空。闹钟的声音并不大，但真嗣习惯在它响起的前两秒醒来。他伸手去关闭闹钟。瞥了一眼闹钟，告诉他现在是早上 6 点 45 分。

Looking down from his position, he could see strands of red hair that threatened to cover his face. The owner of them was facing the other side, her legs intertwined with his.  
从他的位置向下看，他能看到几缕红发，这些发丝似乎要遮住他的脸。头发的主人正背对着他，双腿与他的交缠在一起。

Smiling to himself a little, Shinji slowly disentangled himself from the redhead and rose from his futon. For the past two weeks, they'd fell asleep like this several times as long as they made sure Misato was adequately underwater. Asuka, well, _this_ Asuka was closer to him than ever, but she wasn't willing to take the last step – being clear with their relationship. And Shinji was clear that he needed to find a way to convince her that he indeed loved her more than anything else in the world.  
微微一笑，真嗣缓缓地从红发少女身边抽身，起身离开他的被褥。过去两周里，只要确保美里充分沉浸在水下，他们便多次这样入睡。眼前的明日香，比以往任何时候都更亲近他，但她不愿迈出最后一步——明确他们的关系。真嗣清楚，他需要找到方法，让她相信他确实深爱着她，胜过世间一切。

It could wait, though. And there was something else that had Shinji worry more.  
不过，这可以等一等。还有其他事情更让真嗣担忧。

Today they were supposed to participate in the simulation test where Ireul was expected to attack. That was not his primary concern, though. The fact that the date of the test was delayed by one week was what introduced anxiety. In all of his former cycles, this particular test had always taken place on the same date, at least he remembered so.  
今天他们本应参加模拟测试，预计 Ireul 会发起攻击。但这并不是他主要担心的问题。测试日期被推迟一周的事实才真正引起了他的焦虑。在他所有的前世循环中，这个特定的测试总是在同一个日期进行，至少他记得是这样。

Learning from his mistakes with the Seventh and the Eighth Angel, Shinji had to treat this seemingly insignificant discrepancy seriously.  
从第七和第八使徒的错误中吸取教训，真嗣必须认真对待这个看似微不足道的差异。

"G'd 'orning…" So came the sleepy greetings from his favorite redhead. "Morning, Asuka," Shinji joyed a reply. "I'm going to make breakfast, and you should get up as well before Misato could notice anything."  
"早安……" 他最爱的红发女孩带着睡意问候道。"早，明日香，" 真嗣愉快地回应，"我要去做早餐了，你也该起床了，别让美里注意到什么。"

"Right…" Asuka yawned and stretched her limbs, getting up from the futon as well. "Thanks for the warmth last night," she grinned and gave him a peck on the cheeks, something that had become her habit since a few days ago. "And don't forget that you're going to the mall with me and Hikari today after the stupid test." She only asked Hikari to go as her wingman, though. The main target was Shinji, and she would also have someone to carry her bags. Two birds with one stone, a brilliant plan worthy for the great Asuka.  
"好吧……" 明日香打了个哈欠，伸了伸懒腰，也从被褥上起身。"谢谢你昨晚的温暖，"她笑着在他脸颊上轻吻了一下，这是她几天前养成的习惯。"别忘了，今天考完那无聊的试后，你要和我还有美里一起去商场。" 她之所以叫美里一起去，只是为了找个伴儿。主要目标是真嗣，而且还有人帮她拎包。一箭双雕，这可是伟大的明日香才能想出的绝妙计划。

"Sure, I guess I'll just have to carry the loot, then."  
"好吧，看来我只能负责搬运战利品了。"

"Baka, you don't get to complain!" Said Asuka in mock anger before carefully sliding the bedroom door open and swiftly left the room.  
"笨蛋，你可没资格抱怨！" 明日香假装生气地说道，然后小心翼翼地拉开卧室门，迅速离开了房间。

Commander Ikari sat completely stationary at his desk in the middle of the darkened room. Around him were black, monolithic holograms with the SEELE insignia printed on them, as well as a number for each monolith ranging from one to twelve.

"What's NERV's current progress on the development of the Dummy Plug system?" SEELE 01, chairman Keel spoke up first as usual, his voice a bit raspy and hoarse.

Gendo almost failed to suppress a chuckle if not for his skilled composure-controlling abilities. Nevertheless, he had to find a way to explain the delay in constructing the Dummy Plug System. 如果不是凭借高超的自控力，碇源堂几乎要忍不住笑出声来。然而，他必须找到解释 Dummy Plug 系统延迟建造的理由。“如果我们能使用绫波的思维模式而不是……您的小宠物的，我们本可以按时完成并交付的。”
