Hikari's looked around her as if scanning the area for enemies before bringing her lips right next to Asuka's ear. "My older sister, Kodama Horaki, one of her friends is having a huge crush on you. She asked me to ask you if you could go on a date with him." She whispered, having to hide her schoolgirl giggle.  
光环顾四周，仿佛在扫描是否有敌人，然后将嘴唇贴近明日香的耳朵。“我姐姐，堀越小珠，她的一个朋友对你非常着迷。她让我问问你，能不能和他约会。”她低声说道，努力掩饰自己的少女窃笑。

"What?!" The redhead jumped back, taken aback by the boldness of the request, especially not from Hikari. "A date?!"  
“什么？！”红发女孩惊得跳开，对这大胆的请求感到意外，尤其是来自光。“约会？！”

Making a begging face, Hikari folded her hands together and pleaded. "Oh please, Asuka? You're not dating anyone, right? Just one date? He's a great guy, really!"  
做出一副乞求的表情，光双手合十恳求道：“哦，求你了，明日香？你又没在和谁约会，对吧？就一次约会嘛？他是个好人，真的！”

"There's no way." Asuka's reply was plain and simple, and her tone made it clear that negotiation was out of the question.  
“绝不可能。”明日香的回答直截了当，语气表明谈判毫无余地。

"Oh, c'mon! He's a handsome and gentle upper-class student. You won't regret it!"  
"哦，拜托！他是个英俊又温柔的优等生。你不会后悔的！"

"No." She added more firmness into her voice. If she wanted Shinji all by herself, it was only fair for her to completely be Shinji's. Even though for some unspoken reason she doubted Shinji wouldn't leave her even if she goes on the date, the idea just didn't feel right, _virtuous_ to her.  
"不行。" 她的语气更加坚定。如果她想独自拥有真嗣，那么她就应该完全属于真嗣。尽管出于某种未言明的原因，她怀疑即使她去约会，真嗣也不会离开她，但这个想法就是让她觉得不对劲，对她来说不正直。

"You don't have to like him, just one date! Do me a favor, please!"  
"你不必喜欢他，就一次约会！帮帮我，好吗？"

"No is a no, Hikari. I'm sorry, but there's just no way. I'm not gonna go on a date with some random guy whom I've never met before, just because you asked!" Although she deemed Hikari her friend, impatience and irritation still radiated from her voice.  
“不行就是不行，光。抱歉，但真的没戏。我不会因为你一句话就去和一个素未谋面的陌生人约会！”尽管她把光视为朋友，但声音中仍透出不耐与烦躁。

Instead of the sulky and disappointed tone she had expected from Hikari, the brunette grinned smugly. "Oh, I know what this is about." Asuka didn't like the full-swing teasing tone she was using. "You have a crush on Shinji, don't you?" Hikari threw a look in the direction where Shinji left.  
"出乎意料的是，光并没有用她预想中的那种闷闷不乐和失望的语气，而是得意地笑了。“哦，我知道这是怎么回事了。”明日香不喜欢她这种全然挑逗的语调。“你对真嗣有意思，对吧？”光朝着真嗣离开的方向瞥了一眼。”

Out of sheer reflex, Asuka made a near horrified expression as she jumped forward and placed one of her hands over Hikari's mouth. "No!" She exclaimed in a hushed tone. "What makes you think that?!"  
"出于纯粹的反射性动作，明日香做出近乎惊恐的表情，向前一跃，用手捂住了光的嘴。“不！”她压低声音惊呼，“你怎么会这么想？！””

"C'mon, it's so obvious," Hikari winked at her. "The whole class knows. Are you even aware that on average, for every five minutes you would steal a glance at him?"  
"拜托，这么明显," 光对她眨了眨眼。"全班都知道。你有没有意识到，平均每五分钟你就会偷看他一眼？"

"Are you serious?" Asuka thought she had been subtle about her feelings for Shinji, especially considering that not a long while ago, she was actively keeping a distance from him.  
"你是认真的吗？" 明日香以为她对真嗣的感情已经很隐晦了，尤其是考虑到不久前，她还刻意与他保持距离。

"Yeah," Hikari nodded. Grinning, she added, "So, I understand if you don't want to go out with my sister's friend."  
"是啊," 光点头道。她笑着补充说，"所以，我理解如果你不想和我姐姐的朋友出去。"

"Of course not," Asuka held her head up. "Actually, you know what. If everyone knows, I think I'll just straight ask Shinji out on a date." _'A proper one,'_ her mind added.  
"“当然不是，”明日香昂起头，“其实，你知道吗。如果大家都知道了，我想我会直接约真嗣出去约会。”‘正式的那种，’她的心里补充道。”

"Ohhhh, I feel so happy for you, Asuka!" Hikari giggled like a schoolgirl she was.  
“哦，我真为你感到高兴，明日香！” 光就像个女学生一样咯咯笑着。

XXXXXX

_Asuka laid on her back on the couch while a silly soap show played on the television. She wasn't really paying much attention to the content, though, since her mind was occupied by other things right now.  
明日香仰躺在沙发上，电视里播放着一部傻乎乎的肥皂剧。她其实并没有太关注剧情，因为此刻她的心思被其他事情占据着。_

_She lifted herself up and looked at the hallway leading to the front door with an unreadable expression. She had convinced herself to ask Shinji out on a date, and in a way, it still worried her. Even though all the stuff they had been secretly doing was much more intimate, they were still ambiguous. But a date? It could be considered as an official announcement that they were now a couple, boyfriend and girlfriend. Of course blind dates wouldn't lead to such a conclusion, but given the intimate interactions between her and Shinji, it was safe to say this would seal their deal.  
她坐起身来，目光投向通往大门的走廊，脸上带着难以解读的表情。她已经说服自己邀请真嗣出去约会，尽管如此，这件事仍让她感到不安。尽管他们之间那些秘密进行的亲密行为远比约会更为私密，但关系依旧暧昧不清。然而，一次约会？这几乎可以被视为他们正式成为情侣的宣告，男朋友和女朋友。当然，相亲并不会导致这样的结论，但考虑到她和真嗣之间的亲密互动，可以说这次约会将会是他们关系的定音之锤。_

_Shinji hadn't come home yet, and Asuka could feel her courage of asking him out on a date was gradually slipping away with each passing moment.  
真嗣还没回家，而明日香感觉到自己约他出去的勇气正随着每一分每一秒逐渐消逝。_

_Her musings were interrupted by the hissing sound of the door sliding open and an announcement of "I'm home!" from Shinji. As he stepped through the living room, Asuka mustered up all of her willpower. It's now or never.  
她的思绪被门滑开时的嘶嘶声打断，真嗣喊着“我回来了！”走进客厅。当他穿过起居室时，明日香鼓起所有的意志力。机不可失，时不再来。_

_"Shinji, are you available tomorrow?" She blurted out, her eyes still focused on the TV screen rather than its content.  
“真嗣，你明天有空吗？”她脱口而出，眼睛依旧盯着电视屏幕，而非其内容。_

_"Actually I'm occupied tomorrow, why ask?" Shinji replied as he put down his schoolbag on the couch beside her.  
"其实我明天有事，干嘛问这个？" 真嗣边回答边把书包放在她旁边的沙发上。_

_"What?!" Asuka exclaimed. "What's on your schedule tomorrow?"  
"什么？！" 明日香惊呼。"你明天有什么安排？"_

_"The anniversary of my mother's death," Shinji answered with a slightly strained voice. "I have to visit her grave tomorrow."  
“我母亲的忌日，”真嗣回答时声音略显紧张。“明天我得去扫墓。”_

_"Oh." The redhead fell silent. So the was the result of her unprecedented courage of actively asking someone else out on a date. Extreme disappointment and irritation weren't enough to describe her feelings. But she couldn't blame him, though. Shinji didn't decide the date of her mother's decease, did he?  
“哦。”红发女孩沉默了。原来这就是她前所未有的勇气主动约人出去的结果。极度的失望和恼怒都不足以形容她的心情。但她不能怪他，不是吗？真嗣并没有决定他母亲去世的日期，对吧？_

_Speaking of which… 说到这个……_

_"Well, be strong, Shinji." Asuka stood up and placed a hand on his shoulder, keeping her reassuring smile. "Just remember that I understand you."  
"嗯，坚强点，真嗣。" 明日香站起身，把手放在他的肩膀上，保持着安慰的微笑。"记住，我理解你。"_

_"Thanks, Asuka." Shinji replied with a warm smile that almost melted her heart. "Do you have any plans for tomorrow? I hope you won't get too bored alone at home."  
"谢谢你，明日香。" 真嗣回以一个温暖的微笑，几乎融化了她的心。"你明天有什么计划吗？希望你不会在家太无聊。"_

_"I'll be fine. Worst case scenario, I'll just go to Hikari's and play video games with her." Asuka reassured him.  
"我会没事的。最坏的情况，我就去光那里和她一起玩游戏。" 明日香安慰他道。_

_"Really, if you don't want to me go I can stay home and spend the time with you," Shinji said.  
"真的，如果你不想我去的话，我可以留在家里陪你，" 真嗣说。_

_"C'mon, Shinji, it's the anniversary of your mother's death! You should really go," Asuka insisted, this time with more firmness in her voice. On second thought, this could be a final test of her endurability on being alone. "Trust me, I'll be fine."  
"快点，真嗣，今天是你母亲的忌日！你真的应该去，" 明日香坚持道，这次她的语气更加坚定。转念一想，这可能是对她独自忍受能力的最终考验。"相信我，我会没事的。"_

_"Alright, if you say so..." Shinji conceded.  
"好吧，既然你这么说..." 真嗣让步了。"_

And now Asuka felt like a huge idiot for saying she would be okay because now she was bored shitless. After Shinji had gone to visit his mother's grave, Misato quickly left the apartment to her friend's wedding as well, leaving her alone in the apartment. She didn't have plans to go to Hikari's place, she just said it to let Shinji rest assured. And the consequences were now coming crashing down on her.  
现在明日香觉得自己像个超级大傻瓜，因为她说过自己会没事的，结果现在无聊透顶。真嗣去拜访他母亲的墓地后，美里也很快离开了公寓去参加朋友的婚礼，留下她一个人在公寓里。她并没有计划去光那里，只是那么说让真嗣放心。而现在，后果正向她袭来。

She tried to watch TV, but all the stuff on it was boring soap shows, and nothing interested her. Playing the gaming console she tried later, but without Shinji playing it with her, it would be pointless since almost all the fun from it came from Shinji.  
她试图看电视，但上面全是乏味的肥皂剧，没有一样能引起她的兴趣。后来她尝试玩电子游戏机，但没有真嗣陪她玩，这毫无意义，因为几乎所有的乐趣都来自真嗣。

Calling Hikari was also out of the question since she had told her she would ask Shinji out on a date today, and taking that back now would make her look pathetic.  
给光打电话也不可能，因为她已经告诉光她今天要约真嗣出去，现在反悔会让她显得很可怜。

She thought she could be alone by herself, she thought being alone wouldn't bother her. But that seemed not to be the case anymore, not after she learned that company could be good, as long as it was someone she liked.  
她曾以为自己可以独自一人，以为孤独不会困扰她。但似乎情况已不再如此，自从她了解到陪伴可以是美好的，只要那是她喜欢的人。

"I've had enough," Asuka muttered to herself as she jumped up from the couch. After changing into a set of comfortable clothes, Asuka walked to the apartment door and took a deep breath before turning the doorknob and stepped outside.  
“我受够了，”明日香喃喃自语，从沙发上跳了起来。换上一套舒适的衣物后，明日香走到公寓门前，深吸一口气，转动门把手，踏出了门外。

She could still go to that place, and she was sure he wouldn't mind.  
她仍可以去那个地方，她确信他不会介意。

XXXXXX

## *Chapter 21*: Chapter 21: Connection  
*第 21 章*: 第二十一章：联系

Disclaimer: I do not own Evangelion. One Kaji/Misato scene I adopted from my other fic Sincerely Yours cuz I'm lazy :/  
免责声明：我不拥有《新世纪福音战士》。一段改编自我的另一篇作品《真诚的你的》里的加持/美里场景，因为我懒 :/

**Chapter 21: Connection 第二十一章：连接**

Misato rolled her head back as she downed her fourth shot of sake since the reception started. She and her college friends – namely, Ritsuko and Kaji sat around a small table while other guests of the wedding ceremony chatted and laughed among themselves.  
自从招待会开始，美里仰头喝下了她的第四杯清酒。她和她的大学朋友们——特别是律子和加持——围坐在一张小桌子旁，而婚礼的其他宾客则在周围聊天欢笑。

"Life doesn't get any better than this! YYEEAAAHH!" Misato exclaimed as she slammed the empty bottle onto the table. "More!"  
"生活还能更美好吗！YYEEAAAHH！" 美里将空瓶猛地拍在桌上，"再来！"

"Katsuragi, do you even know what is self-control?" Kaji gazed at his ex-lover disapprovingly. Deepening his frown as he saw Misato smirked and shook her head, he continued. "You can't act as if we are still in college."  
"葛城，你到底懂不懂什么叫自制力？" 加持不满地看着他的前女友。看到美里咧嘴一笑并摇头，他的眉头皱得更深了，"你不能表现得好像我们还在大学里一样。"

"What gives," Misato huffed, filling up her glass bottle once again. "Don't be such a spoiled sport. I can handle my liquor. We've done much worse in college, and in my home as well." She threw a playful look at Kaji, and her cheeks were starting to turn pink.  
"怎么了，" 美里哼了一声，再次将她的玻璃瓶倒满。"别这么扫兴。我酒量好得很。大学时我们干过更出格的事，在我家也是。" 她俏皮地瞥了加持一眼，双颊开始泛红。

"From the looks of it, you're only a few drinks away from throwing up…" Ritsuko sighed. Binge drinking was a horrible habit, and as a doctor, she knew that better than anyone, especially the drunk Major of NERV sitting in front of her.  
「看样子，你再喝几杯就要吐了……」律子叹了口气。酗酒是个糟糕的习惯，作为医生，她比任何人都清楚这一点，尤其是眼前这位烂醉如泥的 NERV 本部长大。

"Well… I'm gonna go powder my nose…" Came a drunken voice as Misato staggered to her feet. "I wanna good for…for the n'xt batch…" Waving her hand, the Major Drunk walked away from the table limply.  
「嗯……我去补个妆……」醉醺醺的声音传来，美里摇摇晃晃地站起身。「我要漂漂亮亮地……迎接下一轮……」她无力地挥了挥手，踉跄着离开了桌子。

Ritsuko rolled her eyes, unable to make sense of Misato's inarticulate mumblings. "Typical Misato isn't it? Drinks her problems away…"  
律子翻了个白眼，无法理解美里含糊不清的嘟囔。「典型的美里，不是吗？用酒精来逃避问题……」

"Well, everyone has their own ways to deal with their issues," Kaji chuckled. His eyelids dropped as his thoughts drifted to his own world of darkness. "Still, it worries me that… she's drinking too much. I don't like seeing her losing control of herself like this."  
"嗯，每个人都有自己处理问题的方式，" 加持轻笑道。他的眼皮垂下，思绪飘向自己那片黑暗的世界。"不过，她喝得太多还是让我担心。我不喜欢看到她这样失去自我控制。"

"I see that you still care about her, even after that hard breakup you had," Ritsuko smirked. "Why didn't you just admit you love her?"  
"看来你还是关心她的，即使经历了那么痛苦的分手，" 律子微微一笑。"为什么不干脆承认你爱她呢？"

"I couldn't…" Kaji's gaze fell onto the table. "I have my own issues, too, from Second Impact… things I don't like thinking about. It's just easier that way."  
"我不能……" 加持的目光落在桌面上。"我自己也有第二次冲击带来的问题……有些事情我不想去想。这样更简单些。"

"Stubborn as all men…" Ritsuko shook her head. "Well, it's your own problems, who am I to question them?"  
"男人都这么固执……" 律子摇了摇头。"好吧，这是你自己的问题，我何必多问呢？"

"Speaking of which…" Kaji snapped his fingers, reaching for something inside his pocket. "I got you something you might like." Taking out a red trinket and placing it on the table, Kaji smirked. "This is a cat souvenir."  
"说到这个……" 加持打了个响指，伸手从口袋里掏东西。"我给你带了个你可能喜欢的东西。" 他拿出一个红色的小饰品放在桌上，嘴角勾起一抹笑意。"这是一个猫咪纪念品。"

Ritsuko accepted the small gift with a smile. Though her expression quickly turned serious after a careful examination of the object. Being a professional cat-lover, the blonde doctor had come across numerous trinkets before, including this one, but she was sure this specific type could only be found in one place. "What were you doing in Kyoto?"  
律子微笑着接受了这份小礼物。但仔细审视后，她的表情很快变得严肃起来。作为一名专业的猫咪爱好者，这位金发女医生见过许多类似的饰品，包括这一个，但她确信这种特定的类型只能在某个地方找到。"你去京都做什么了？"

Kaji leaned back in his seat, just a little wide-eyed. "I was visiting Matsushiro." He replied. "Why do you ask?"  
加持靠在椅背上，眼睛微微睁大。“我去了松代。”他回答道，“你为什么问这个？”

Knowing how well in terms of controlling emotions the special inspector was, Ritsuko knew such a reaction from him could be considered a jump-up for ordinary people. "You better be careful." She said in a stern voice after gazing at the man for a moment. "Aren't you afraid of getting burned? You should know better than anyone what typically happens to people who get burned in your line of work."  
深知这位特别检察官在控制情绪方面的能力，律子明白他的这种反应对普通人来说可能算是大惊小怪了。“你最好小心点。”她盯着他片刻后，用严肃的语气说道，“你难道不怕被烧伤吗？你应该比任何人都清楚，在你这种工作中，被烧伤的人通常会有什么下场。”

Instead of an immediate response, Kaji leaned back on his seat and rubbed his chin. He knew Ritsuko was right - he was indeed walking in the minefield. If he wasn't careful enough, he doubted Commander Ikari would keep ignoring the fact that he was de facto a spy.  
加持没有立即回应，而是靠回座位，揉了揉下巴。他知道律子说得没错——他的确是在雷区行走。如果不够小心，他怀疑碇司令不会一直无视他实际上是个间谍的事实。

"Hey guys, I'm back…" Misato Katsuragi's tired voice came to the duo. "So…who wants to keep going?" Asked the Major Alcoholic as she slumped down on her chair.  
"嘿，伙计们，我回来了……" 葛城美沙的声音疲惫地传到两人耳中。"那么……谁还想继续？" 这位酗酒少校一边问，一边瘫坐在椅子上。

"Well, I'm game!" Kaji exclaimed as he gulped down a bottle of beer in a single shot.  
"好啊，我奉陪！" 加持兴奋地喊道，一口气喝干了一瓶啤酒。

"Well, I'll leave you to it," Ritsuko sighed, getting up from her seat. "Have fun, you two."  
"那我就先失陪了，" 律子叹了口气，从座位上起身。"你们俩好好玩吧。"

"See ya, Ritz…" Misato slurred a response. "Now it leaves only me and the slob..."  
"再见，丽兹…" 美里含糊地回应道。"现在只剩下我和这个懒鬼了..."

"Be nice, Katsuragi." Kaji let out a sigh. "I might have to carry you home."  
"别这么说，葛城。" 加持叹了口气。"我可能得把你背回家了。"

"I'll be...fine. I can handle this myself." Misato hiccuped, a smell of alcohol spread into the air.  
"我会...没事的。我自己能应付。" 美里打了个嗝，酒气在空气中弥漫开来。"

"Sure you can…" Kaji muttered in defeat. Sighing, the ponytailed man stood up and went for the bar with the drunk woman following closely behind him.  
“当然可以……”加持低声嘀咕着，语气中带着无奈。叹了口气，这位马尾男子站起身，向吧台走去，那位醉酒的女子紧随其后。

XXXXXX

The graveyard looked just like what Shinji had always remembered - thousands of grave markers stood idly on the ground, telling the eeriness and trepidation of the place. He stood in front of her mother's grave, 'Yui Ikari', her name was imprinted on the marble chunk. Gendo Ikari stood beside him, gazing at the endless grey sky above them covered by dark overcast.  
墓地看起来和真嗣记忆中的一样——成千上万的墓碑静静地矗立在地面上，透露出这个地方的阴森与不安。他站在她母亲的墓前，‘碇唯’，她的名字刻在那块大理石上。碇源堂站在他身旁，凝视着被乌云覆盖的灰暗天空。

Her mother's body wasn't even in her grave, and both of them knew that perfectly well. Still, this was the most appropriate place for remembrance.  
她母亲的遗体甚至不在墓中，这一点两人都心知肚明。即便如此，这里仍是缅怀的最佳场所。

He was sorely tempted not to come and spend more time with Asuka, considering this time his father had already known his true identity. However, such activity he had done so many times, it might as well be a timed ritual for him.  
他非常想不去见明日香，多花点时间陪她，考虑到这次他父亲已经知道他的真实身份。然而，这样的活动他已经做过太多次，对他来说几乎成了定时的仪式。

"Mother…" Shinji sighed. He hated her mother for her inaction when the Second Child needed his help the most, but he had to maintain a working relationship with her every time he sat inside Unit 01's entry plug.  
“妈妈……”真嗣叹了口气。他恨她的母亲在二号机驾驶员最需要帮助时无所作为，但每次他坐在初号机插入栓里时，又不得不与她保持工作关系。

"It's not the memories that we keep that are important." Gendo Ikari spoke, keeping a straight face as he looked over his son's shoulder. "It's the legacy we leave behind."  
“重要的不是我们保留的记忆。”碇源堂说道，面无表情地从儿子的肩膀上方看过去。“而是我们留下的遗产。”

"Legacy? Did my mother leave any of them?" Shinji turned his head to face his father, not fully able to decipher his emotions.  
“遗产？我母亲留下了什么吗？” 真嗣转头面对父亲，无法完全解读他的情绪。

"Yui left behind two legacies." Gendo's tone was calm and collected as it always was. "The Evangelion, and you."  
“唯留下了两份遗产。” 源渡的语气一如既往地平静而沉着，“初号机，还有你。”

"I'm her legacy?" Shinji couldn't believe what he thought he had heard; was his father actually showing some kind of support? He would rather believe that this was simply his father's way of manipulating him. He had to admit that this might work before, but the hatred toward his father had already wholly suppressed any positive feelings.  
“我是她的遗产？” 真嗣不敢相信自己所听到的；父亲竟然在表现出某种支持？他宁愿相信这只是父亲操纵他的手段。他不得不承认这可能曾经有效，但如今对父亲的恨意已经完全压制了任何正面情感。

"Of course." Gendo replied. "All the things that you accomplish will give meaning to Yui's life."  
"当然。" 源渡回答道。"你所完成的一切将为唯的生命赋予意义。"

Shinji blinked. His father had never said anything like this ever before. Was it because he knew about his looping status, and since he was now helping him, Gendo could actually let down some of his guards? "Hey, father?"  
真嗣眨了眨眼。他的父亲从未说过这样的话。是因为他知道了自己的循环状态，既然现在他在帮助他，源渡能真正放下一些防备吗？"嘿，爸爸？"

"What?" The old Ikari's tone was still cold.  
"什么事？" 老碇的语气依旧冰冷。

"When you met Mom, how did you know you were in love?"  
"当你遇见妈妈时，你是怎么知道你爱上她的？"

Commander Ikari found relief in the fact that Shinji was facing away from him. Otherwise, he might've seen his eyes go wide from the question. "The other mes… didn't tell you?"  
碇司令在得知真嗣背对着他时松了一口气。否则，他可能会看到自己因这个问题而瞪大了眼睛。"另一个我……没告诉你吗？"

"No. Not that I could remember." Replied Shinji truthfully.  
"没有。至少我记不得了。" 真嗣如实回答道。"

Gendo's gaze fell upon the imprinted name on the grave marker. "It's a long story…"  
源堂的目光落在墓碑上刻印的名字上。“说来话长……”

"I'm willing to listen." Shinji put both of his hands clasped together behind his head.  
“我愿意听。”真嗣将双手交叉放在脑后。

"When I was in college…I had always been alone. In fact, I wanted to be left alone. I was disappointed by the human society, which is one of the reasons I wanted to join SEELE."  
“当我还在上大学的时候……我一直都是一个人。事实上，我想要独处。我对人类社会感到失望，这也是我想加入 SEELE 的原因之一。”

"I tended to get into street fights a lot." Shinji almost chuckled at that admission.  
“我以前经常卷入街头斗殴。” 碇真嗣几乎因为这个自白而轻笑出声。

"One day after a bad fight, professor Fuyutsuki came found me, and bailed me out of jail."  
“有一天，在一场糟糕的打斗之后，冬月教授找到了我，把我从监狱里保释出来。”

"It was then I met her, your mother, Yui. She was professor Fuyutsuki's top student at that time."  
“就是在那时我遇见了她，你的母亲，碇唯。她是当时冬月教授最优秀的学生。”

"At first I didn't really like her that much. She was harsh, tough to handle. But I could see the compassionate and the caring side of her." Shinji's eyes went wide a little.  
"起初我并不太喜欢她。她严厉，难以相处。但我能看到她那充满同情和关怀的一面。" 真嗣的眼睛微微睁大了些。

"She had connections with SEELE, a secret organization I craved to get in, so I thought I could use her as my bridge. We spent more time together and fell in love."  
"她与 SEELE 有联系，一个我渴望加入的秘密组织，所以我以为可以利用她作为我的桥梁。我们相处的时间越来越多，最终坠入了爱河。"

"No one loved me after your grandparents, so when she said 'I love you'…she was the only thing that mattered to me in the world. She made me open up my heart to the world."  
"在你祖父母之后，没有人再爱过我，所以当她说'我爱你'时……她成了我在这个世界上唯一在乎的人。她让我敞开心扉去拥抱这个世界。"

"Then SEELE came in. And I think you know the rest." Gendo Ikari trailed off, leaving Shinji with his turmoil of thoughts in his head.  
“然后 SEELE 介入了。我想剩下的你都知道了。”碇源堂话音渐弱，留下真嗣脑海中翻腾的思绪。

His father's experience…why did it sound…  
他父亲的经历……为何听起来……

"Shinji…" Gendo started up again after a long-lasting silence. "Do you hate me?"  
“真嗣…” 碇源堂在长时间的沉默后再次开口。“你恨我吗？”

"Absolutely," Shinji blurted out. It was one of the few things he was still sure of at the moment.  
“当然恨，”真嗣脱口而出。这是他此刻为数不多还能确定的事情之一。

"Is it because of the Second Child?" Seeing Shinji nod, Gendo continued. "No offense…but I personally don't see anything likable from the behavior of the Second Child."  
“是因为二号适格者吗？”看到真嗣点头，碇源堂继续说道。“无意冒犯……但我个人并不觉得二号适格者的行为有什么值得喜欢的地方。”

After musing for a long moment, Shinji spoke up. "Before, I hated you because you abandoned me when I was four. I tried to do anything for you just to get your affection, and I thought piloting the EVA could help me get it. But I was wrong."  
沉思良久后，真嗣开口了。“之前，我恨你是因为你在我四岁时抛弃了我。我试图做任何事情来赢得你的爱，我以为驾驶 EVA 能帮我得到它。但我错了。”

"You never gave me what I wanted from you. I was merely your tool to reunite with mother."  
“你从未给我想要的。我只是你用来与母亲重聚的工具。”

"When I had enough of it and tried to run away, she came into my life." Even though he didn't specify her name, Gendo was sure whom he was referring to.  
“当我受够了这一切并试图逃跑时，她进入了我的生活。”尽管他没有明确指出她的名字，但碇源堂确信他指的是谁。

"Actually when I first met her, I could even say I was irritated by her attitude. Everything she did annoyed me. She made fun of me, humiliated me, and even physically assaulted me."  
"实际上，我第一次遇见她时，甚至可以说我对她的态度感到恼火。她做的每件事都让我心烦。她取笑我，羞辱我，甚至还对我进行身体攻击。"

"Her attitude and behavior were so confusing...even though most of her actions told me that she hated me, sometimes she showed me the other side of her that no one else knew."  
"她的态度和行为如此令人困惑...尽管她的许多行为告诉我她讨厌我，但有时她会向我展示别人不知道的另一面。"

"She was so strong and confident, while I merely tried my best to just…survive."  
"她如此坚强自信，而我只是尽力...生存下去。"

"I didn't know what of her attracted me. Maybe it was because of the loneliness she occasionally showed me, or maybe I thought she could understand me."  
"我不知道她身上有什么吸引了我。也许是因为她偶尔向我展示的孤独，或者我认为她能理解我。"

"That one night…when she cried for momma, I knew she was just like me."  
"那个夜晚……当她为妈妈哭泣时，我知道她和我是同类。"

"Gradually, every time she gets hurt…or if she turns away from me, it hurts me so much…"  
“渐渐地，每次她受伤…或是她从我身边转身离去，都让我心如刀割…”

"Oppositely, whenever she smiles at me...brings me farther away from the cliff of completely losing myself."  
"相反，每当她对我微笑……都让我远离彻底迷失自我的悬崖边缘。"

"And then _you_ hurt her." Shinji's tone turned 180 degrees from sorrowful to freezingly deep, eliciting a shiver ran down Gendo's spine.  
"然后你伤害了她。" 真嗣的语气从悲伤一转而为冰冷深沉，令源堂不由得打了个寒颤。

The older Ikari's eyelids dropped. Even though he didn't want to admit it, one of the reasons he abandoned him ten years ago was he didn't wish for Shinji to turn into a man like him. Now though, it seemed the plan had backfired – now he was more Gendo than Gendo himself.  
年长的碇的眼睛垂了下来。尽管他不愿承认，十年前抛弃真嗣的原因之一，就是他不希望真嗣变成像他这样的人。然而现在，计划似乎适得其反——如今真嗣比他自己更像碇源堂。

What had he done? 他究竟做了什么？

"What would you do…if she's…no more?" Gendo questioned, trying to keep his voice calm but still let worry flow out from his voice.  
“如果她……不在了呢？”源堂问道，努力保持声音平静，却仍流露出担忧。

"Simple. I end the world." As much as he didn't want to do it, in fact in his earlier cycles, even if Asuka was gone he would still try to fix the world. Now though, he had been through enough and lost enough to the extent he didn't care anymore. Not to mention without Asuka, he stood absolutely zero chance of winning against SEELE.  
“很简单。我终结这个世界。”尽管他并不想这么做，事实上在他早期的循环中，即使明日香不在了，他仍会试图拯救世界。但现在，他经历了太多，失去了太多，以至于他不再在乎了。更不用说没有明日香，他绝对没有机会战胜 SEELE。

Gendo Ikari was taken aback by the bluntness of his response, but soon regained his composure. After all, he was basically doing the same thing, wasn't he?  
源堂·伊卡里被他直率的回答惊到，但很快恢复了镇定。毕竟，他基本上也在做同样的事情，不是吗？

At the moment Shinji seemed to hear a soft rustling sound coming not far away from him. He turned his head but found no one. Shaking the illusions off, he continued. "Nothing else in the world matters to me, anyway. There's nobody who can take her place."  
此刻，真嗣似乎听到不远处传来一阵轻微的沙沙声。他转过头去，却没发现任何人。他摇摇头驱散幻觉，继续前行。“对我来说，世界上其他一切都无关紧要。没有人能取代她的位置。”

"I love her, absolutely. I love Asuka. No, love couldn't even properly describe it."  
"我爱她，绝对是真心的。我爱明日香。不，爱这个词甚至不足以准确描述这种感情。"

"She anchors me to the reality. Without her, I'd have already lost my mind…inside this endless madness."  
"她让我脚踏实地。没有她，我早已在这无尽的疯狂中失去理智。"

Gendo felt a tug at his heart. Wasn't Yui the only one that gave him direction as well? His own life would've been entirely meaningless without her, wouldn't it?  
碇源堂感到心中一阵牵动。难道不是只有唯给了他方向吗？没有她，他的人生岂不是完全失去了意义？

"Even your mother doesn't mean anything to you anymore?"  
“即使是你母亲对你来说也毫无意义了吗？”

"I guess I need her help in battles, but outside of that? Absolutely not." This time his voice didn't waver the slightest.  
“我想在战斗中我需要她的帮助，但除此之外？绝对不。”这一次，他的声音没有丝毫动摇。

"I see." Gendo slowly let out the words. If it wasn't sanity telling him otherwise, Shinji could swear his voice carried a hint of sadness in it.  
"我明白了。" 碇缓慢地吐出这几个字。如果不是理智在提醒他，真嗣几乎可以发誓他的声音中带着一丝悲伤。

"I should…probably get going right now." Sighing, Shinji turned away from the grave marker. "Asuka's alone at home, and I don't want to let her wait for too long."  
“我应该…现在就动身了。” 叹了口气，真嗣转身离开了墓碑。“明日香一个人在家，我不想让她等太久。”

Gendo nodded. "I understand."  
碇源堂点了点头。“我明白。”

Understand? That he needed to get to Asuka's side as soon as possible, or something more profound? Shinji felt his father was implying more. Nevertheless, it was not exactly the best time to muse on such things right now. Asuka was alone at home, and he needed to go back soon.  
明白？是指他需要尽快赶到明日香身边，还是更深层次的含义？真嗣觉得父亲暗示了更多。然而，现在并不是深思这些的最佳时机。明日香一个人在家，他需要尽快回去。

"See you later…father." Saying, Shinji went on his way home, leaving the older Ikari standing silently in front of the grave marker with his hurricane of thoughts.  
“再见……爸爸。” 说着，真嗣踏上了回家的路，留下年长的碇在墓碑前静静站立，思绪如狂风暴雨般翻涌。

None of the two noticed a pair of sapphire eyes behind one of the grave markers staring at them in utter shock.  
两人都没有注意到，在一座墓碑后面，一双蓝宝石般的眼睛正震惊地盯着他们。

Katsuragi's hours of binging finally came to a peak at her twelfth shot. She bent over a trashcan in a back alley, vomiting into it while Kaji held her hair back. She was expelling the contents of her stomach quite violently, and besides supporting her, Kaji was holding Misato's hair, so she didn't get chunks of vomit caught in her long lavender hair.  
葛城连续狂饮数小时后，终于在第十二杯时达到了顶峰。她弯腰在一条后巷的垃圾桶旁呕吐，加持帮她撩起头发。她吐得非常猛烈，除了支撑她，加持还帮忙托着美里紫色的长发，以免呕吐物粘在她的长发上。

She retched one last time before slumping down, going limp as her ex-lover held onto her to keep her on her feet. He handed her a bottle of water he was able to grab before heading out, which she was more than happy to snatch out of his hands. The lavender-haired woman chugged down a few gulps, and then spit out the rest into the alleyway, getting rid of anything that was left behind in the transition from her stomach to the trashcan.  
她最后一次干呕后瘫软下来，身体无力地靠在前恋人身上，他扶着她让她不至于倒下。他递给她一瓶出门前抓起的水，她急切地从他手中夺过。紫发的女子猛灌了几口，然后将剩下的吐进了小巷里，把从胃里到垃圾桶的残留物清理干净。

"Drinking till you throw up, how old are you? We're not in college anymore." Kaji shook his head. "You don't need to drink yourself sick."  
“喝到吐，你多大了？我们不再是大学生了。”卡吉摇了摇头。“你不需要把自己喝得生病。”

"Old enough to regret it," Misato said weakly as she stumbled along the way. "So much stuff's been happening lately… you'd drink a lot too if you were me. All that NERV and Shinji and Asuka business…"  
“足够大到后悔了，”美里虚弱地说着，踉跄前行。“最近发生了太多事……如果你是我，也会喝很多的。全是 NERV、真嗣和明日香那些事……”

"You and I both know this has nothing to do with Asuka or Shinji," the special inspector frowned a little. "It worries me to see you like this, that's all."  
"你我都知道这与明日香或真嗣无关，" 特别检察官微微皱眉。"看到你这样，我感到很担忧，仅此而已。

"Well, I'm like this a lot, just mostly at home, that way, I'm not staggering home drunk…" Misato admitted. "Can you help me up, Kaji?"  
"嗯，我经常这样，只是大多在家里，这样我就不会醉醺醺地回家了……" 美里承认道。"你能扶我起来吗，加持？

"Of course." Kaji said as he turned her around and lifted her up onto his back, holding her legs up with his hands while she loosely wrapped her arms around his neck, her high heels dangling from her fingers. "Would you rather I carry you to your apartment?"  
"当然。" 加持说着将她转过身，背起她，双手托住她的双腿，而她则松松地环住他的脖子，高跟鞋在她手指间晃荡。"你宁愿我把你送到公寓吗？"

"Yeah, I'm having trouble in these high heels, the world keeps turning…" Misato slurred.  
"是啊，这高跟鞋让我走不稳，世界一直在转……" 美里含糊地说道。

"Of course it is…" Kaji sighed.  
"当然会这样……" 加持叹了口气。

"Thanks, Kaji…" "谢谢，卡吉…"

Kaji began the walk back in silence, hoping not to disrupt Misato's very-needed rest after her binge drinking. Though his assumption that Misato was sleeping was wrong; moments later a weak voice floated to him.  
加治默默地开始往回走，希望不打扰到美里因酗酒而急需的休息。尽管他以为美里在睡觉的猜测是错误的；片刻之后，一个微弱的声音飘向他。

"Kaji," Misato spoke up, breaking the silence. "I think I've changed."  
“加治，”美里打破了沉默，“我觉得我变了。”

"You're right." He smirked. "You're even prettier than when I met you in college." Sweet-talking had always been one of his lady-killing moves, the lavender-haired woman had to hide her smile. "Not what I meant." Her tone sounded much more serious, a sharp contrast from Kaji's lightheartedness.  
“你说得对。”他微微一笑，“你甚至比我们在大学相遇时更漂亮了。”甜言蜜语一直是他征服女性的手段之一，这位紫罗兰色头发的女子不得不掩饰自己的微笑。“我不是那个意思。”她的语气听起来严肃得多，与加治的轻松态度形成鲜明对比。

She took in a deep breath and exhaled before continuing. "I'm sorry that I wanted to break up with you. When I told you there was another man, I lied." She looked over at him, seeing that he was keeping his eyes straight forward, not the least bit phased by her words. "But you already knew that, didn't you?"  
她深吸一口气，缓缓吐出，然后继续说道：“对不起，我曾想和你分手。当我告诉你有另一个男人时，那是谎话。”她瞥向他，见他目光直视前方，对她的言辞丝毫不为所动。“但你早就知道了吧？”

"No." He lied. Of course from the day she said she wanted to break up with him because there was another man, he knew she was lying. Being a well-trained spy, half of his job description was being able to read people through their masks. "Though I had a feeling that…you did it to make me say what you desperately wanted to hear from me."  
"不。" 他撒了谎。当然，从她那天说想分手因为有另一个男人开始，他就知道她在撒谎。作为一名训练有素的间谍，他工作的一半内容就是透过面具读懂人心。“虽然我有种感觉……你这么做是为了让我说出你迫切想从我这里听到的话。”

"Well, you're right…" Misato raised her head and looked up at the sky. At the moment the thick grey overcast had become thin, and the moonlight was occasionally peeking through the cracks between the layers of clouds. "I suddenly realized how much like my father you were…always caught up in the line of work and never paid enough attention to me." Kaji kept his eyes focused on her, but did not rear his head. "I couldn't believe that I wanted a man just like my father. I was terrified." Misato looked over at her ex-lover, and frowned. "So I ran. I was afraid of being with you. I thought I hated my father." She took in a breath, sucking in the night air.  
"嗯，你说得对……" 美里抬起头，望向天空。此刻厚重的灰色云层变得稀薄，月光偶尔从云层的缝隙中透出。"我突然意识到你有多像我父亲……总是忙于工作，从未给予我足够的关注。" 加持始终注视着她，却没有抬起头。"我无法相信自己想要一个像我父亲那样的男人。我感到恐惧。" 美里看向她的前恋人，皱起了眉头。"所以我逃了。我害怕与你在一起。我以为我恨我的父亲。" 她深吸一口气，吸入夜晚的空气。

"And then I fell in love with a man just like him." She lowered her head. "I thought joining NERV would be a way to sever those ties. And then it turned out my father was with NERV. So then I just tried to bury it all by swearing my life to avenge him by killing the Angels."  
"然后我爱上了像他一样的男人。" 她低下头。"我以为加入 NERV 可以切断这些联系。结果发现我父亲也在 NERV。于是我试图通过发誓为杀死使徒来为他复仇，以此埋葬这一切。"

"You chose that path, Katsuragi." He tried his best to sound reassuring. "You don't have to feel bad about it. None of this is your fault."  
"你选择了那条路，葛城。" 他尽力让自己的声音听起来安慰。"你不必为此感到内疚。这一切都不是你的错。"

"Don't bullshit me, Kaji! That was not my choice!" She snapped, raising her volume. "I just ran away! I just wanted to escape from the real world and my father!"  
"别跟我胡扯，加持！那不是我的选择！" 她厉声说道，提高了音量。"我只是逃跑了！我只是想逃离现实世界和我父亲！"

"Misato, there's no need to apologize, I forgave you long ago," said Kaji in a soft voice.  
"美里，没必要道歉，我早就原谅你了，" 加持用柔和的声音说道。

"Well, the problem is, I loved you…" Misato's voice turned tenderer as well. "But did you love me?"  
"问题是，我爱你……" 美里的声音也变得温柔起来。"但你爱我吗？"

"Of course I did, Misato…" Kaji's eyes went wide slightly. "I never stopped."  
"当然我做了，美里…" 加持的眼睛微微睁大。"我从未停止过。"

"But why couldn't you say it?!" Misato cried. "It's only four simple letters…"  
"但为什么你不能说出来？！" 美里哭喊道。"这只是四个简单的字母…"

"You know why I can't…I can't say it to anyone because I haven't forgiven myself for…my brother's death."  
"你知道我为什么不能…我不能对任何人说，因为我还没有原谅自己…我哥哥的死。"

Misato pushed herself down from Kaji's back and staggered away from him a bit. Kaji caught her and held her tight, their faces merely inches from each other. "Ryoji…" Misato mumbled. "I can't believe I still want you."  
美里从加持的背上撑起身，踉跄地离开他几步。加持抓住她，紧紧拥入怀中，两人的脸庞仅相隔几英寸。“加持……”美里喃喃道，“我真不敢相信我还想要你。”

"I can." Looking directly into her eyes, Kaji smiled lovingly. "You never stopped, and neither did I."  
“我能。”加持直视着她的眼睛，温柔地微笑，“你从未停止过，我也一样。”

"Wha-" “什——”

She was brought to silence as Kaji held her close to him and locked his lips with hers. Misato's entire body began to tremble in his arms as he kissed her. Suddenly she felt a lightness in her left hand as she dropped her high heels onto the ground, making a hollow clack as they landed. Though, other than the man who held her that time, she didn't care about anything else.  
当加持将她紧紧拥入怀中，双唇相锁时，她陷入了沉默。在加持的亲吻下，美里全身开始在他臂弯中颤抖。突然间，她感到左手一轻，高跟鞋掉落在地，发出空洞的咔嗒声。然而，除了当时拥抱着她的那个男人，她对其他一切都漠不关心。

XXXXXX

Shinji hummed Ode to Joy as he paced back to the apartment. Today went better than he had been expecting – he was positively surprised that his father would open up to him, at least partially. Even though it helped a little changing his perception of his father, considering the countless crimes 'Gendo Ikari' had committed, he still felt happy about it.  
真嗣哼着《欢乐颂》，缓步走回公寓。今天的情况比他预想的要好得多——他父亲至少愿意向他敞开心扉，这让他感到意外的惊喜。尽管改变对父亲的看法只是微不足道的一步，考虑到‘碇源堂’犯下的无数罪行，他依然为此感到高兴。

Not to mention he finally learned about his father and mother from a first-personal perspective. It would help him a lot in the future – if this cycle turned out to be a failure as well.  
更不用说他终于从第一人称的视角了解到了父亲和母亲的故事。这将对他未来大有裨益——如果这个循环最终也以失败告终的话。

The downside, though, was he spent more time with his father at the graveyard than he normally would have. The day was turning dark, and he _almost_ regrated talking with Gendo so long, considering the opportunity cost was spending less time with Asuka.  
不过，缺点是他花在墓地与父亲相处的时间比平时多了。天色渐暗，他几乎后悔与源堂聊了这么久，考虑到机会成本是与明日香相处的时间减少了。

"Tadaima," he announced as he slipped his shoes off in the corridor. "Asuka? Are you home?" He called out, wondering why he received no replies whatsoever.  
“我回来了，”他一边在走廊脱鞋一边宣布。“明日香？你在家吗？”他喊道，纳闷为何没有得到任何回应。

Maybe she was at Hikari's place just like she said? Shaking his head, Shinji walked through the corridor and entered the living room. "Oh hi Asuka, so you _are_ at home," Shinji greeted as he saw the redhead standing in front of the couch instead of sitting on it. "Are you bored? How about some video ga-" He trailed off as he noticed the unreadable mixture of expressions on her face.  
也许她像她说的那样在光那里？晃了晃头，真嗣穿过走廊进入客厅。“哦，嗨明日香，原来你在家，”真嗣看到红发女孩站在沙发前而不是坐在上面时打招呼道。“你无聊吗？要不要玩点电子游戏——”他话音未落，注意到她脸上那难以解读的复杂表情。

Asuka stood there, crossing her arms together in front of her chest in a defensive posture and glaring at him with a soul-piercing look, as if wanting to cut him open and make him spill all of the secrets inside him.  
明日香站在那里，双臂交叉于胸前，摆出一副防御的姿态，用一种能穿透灵魂的目光瞪着他，仿佛想要将他剖开，让他吐露所有秘密。

"Asuka, are you alrigh-" “明日香，你还好吗——”

He was cut off by Asuka's abruptly raised hand. Slowly, she spoke up.  
他话未说完就被明日香突然举起的手打断。她缓缓开口。

"Today. At graveyard. I heard you."  
“今天。在墓地。我听到你了。”

Shinji felt his blood turn icy cold.  
真嗣感到血液变得冰冷。

XXXXXX

## *Chapter 22*: Chapter 22: Promises  
*第 22 章*: 第 22 章：承诺

Disclaimer: I do not own Evangelion, nor do I own RE-TAKE.  
免责声明：我不拥有《新世纪福音战士》，也不拥有《RE-TAKE》。

**Chapter 22: Promises 第二十二章：承诺**

Asuka Langley Soryu jogged on the street, heading to the graveyard she knew where Shinji would be at. The sky was covered by thick overcast, and she was afraid of getting caught in the rain, but considering the only alternative would be bored to death, she could only accept the risk.  
惣流·明日香·兰格雷沿着街道慢跑，前往她知道真嗣会在的墓地。天空被厚厚的云层覆盖，她担心会被雨淋到，但考虑到唯一的替代方案是闷得要死，她只能接受这个风险。

Standing in front of the main entrance of the graveyard, Asuka cringed as she saw a literal forest of black grave markers standing on the ground. She didn't know how many of them were caused by Angel attacks, how many of those lives could have been saved if she had performed better in battles.  
站在墓地的主入口前，明日香看到地面上密密麻麻的黑色墓碑，不禁皱起了眉头。她不知道其中有多少是天使袭击造成的，有多少生命本可以在她战斗表现更好时被挽救。

Nonetheless, she didn't exactly feel guilty about it. It wasn't her fault that the Angels attacked them, after all.  
尽管如此，她并没有真正感到内疚。毕竟，天使袭击他们并不是她的错。

Taking a deep breath and walking into the graveyard area, Asuka scanned around, trying to locate where Shinji was at. A smirk came to her face as she saw two human silhouettes standing next to each other, a stark disparity from the neatly and uniformly arranged grave markers made it conspicuous.  
深吸一口气，走进墓地区域，明日香环顾四周，试图找到真嗣的位置。当她看到两个人影并肩站立时，嘴角露出了微笑，与整齐划一排列的墓碑形成鲜明对比，显得格外显眼。

Her logic told her the other person standing beside Shinji was Commander Ikari, and her own eyes soon proved it true. From the looks of it, they were chatting about something, Asuka suddenly felt hesitant to intrude. After all, it was their family reunion, as an outsider, there's a high chance that she wouldn't be welcomed-  
她的逻辑告诉她，站在真嗣旁边的人是碇司令，而她的眼睛很快证实了这一点。从外表看，他们似乎在谈论什么，明日香突然感到犹豫是否该打扰。毕竟，这是他们的家庭团聚，作为一个外人，她很可能会不受欢迎——

"…the Second Child." “……第二适格者。”

Asuka's eyebrows raised as she thought she heard her designation. Curiosity started an absolute massacre on her internal battlefield of whether or not to go to them. Slowly and lightly walking toward the duo, Asuka perked up her ears and eavesdropped.  
听到自己的称呼，明日香眉头一挑。好奇心在她内心是否接近他们的战场上掀起了一场绝对的大屠杀。她缓缓地、轻轻地走向那两人，竖起耳朵偷听。

"…she came into my life." Asuka felt her breath quicken. She? Was he talking about the other girl he mentioned before? The redhead couldn't hear their conversation clearly, but getting any closer would risk her being discovered. Not that she was afraid of getting caught, but she was curious to see where this conversation would lead to, even though she dreaded to hear more of Shinji's possible romantic history.  
“……她走进了我的生活。”明日香感到呼吸加快。她？他是在说之前提到的那个女孩吗？红发少女听不清他们的对话，但再靠近就会冒着被发现的危险。倒不是她害怕被抓到，只是她好奇这场对话会如何发展，尽管她害怕听到更多关于真嗣可能的恋爱史。

Hiding behind another grave marker, Asuka listened in.  
躲在另一个墓碑后面，明日香侧耳倾听。

"…first met her, I could even say I was irritated by her attitude…made fun of me, humiliated me, and even physically assaulted me."  
……第一次见到她时，我甚至可以说被她的态度惹恼了……她取笑我，羞辱我，甚至还对我进行身体攻击。

What? Asuka raised an eyebrow. This sounded disturbingly similar to-  
什么？明日香挑了挑眉。这听起来令人不安地相似于——

"…attitude and behavior were so confusing...most of her actions told me that she hated me, sometimes she showed me the other side of her that no one else…"  
"…态度和行为如此令人困惑...她的大多数举动都让我觉得她恨我，但有时她又会向我展示无人知晓的另一面…"

"…so strong and confident, while I merely tried my best to just…survive."  
"…如此坚强自信，而我只是尽力…生存下去。"

"I didn't know what of her attracted me…because of the loneliness she occasionally showed me…she could understand me." Okay. Now Asuka knew Shinji was indeed talking about his romantic encounters. The logical side of her was screaming at her to stop listening, but she decided to continue. She needed to know about it if she wanted him all hers.  
"我不知道她哪一点吸引了我…也许是因为她偶尔流露出的孤独…她能理解我。" 好吧。现在明日香知道真嗣确实在谈论他的浪漫经历。她理智的一面在尖叫让她别再听下去，但她决定继续。如果她想完全拥有他，她需要了解这些。

"That one night…when she cried for momma, I knew she was just like me." Taking a sharp inhale, Asuka felt a shiver ran down her spine.  
“那一晚…当她哭着找妈妈时，我就知道她和我一样。”阿斯卡深吸一口气，感到一阵寒意窜过脊背。

"Gradually, every time she gets hurt…or if she turns away from me, it hurts me so much…"  
“渐渐地，每次她受伤…或是她从我身边转身离去，都让我心如刀割…”

"…whenever she smiles at me…brings me farther away…completely losing myself."  
“…每当她对我微笑…都让我越陷越深…彻底迷失自我。”

"...nd then you…" "...然后你…"

"What would you do…if she's…" She couldn't make out what Commander Ikari said from his cold and husky voice.  
"你会怎么做…如果她是…" 她听不清碇司令那冷酷而沙哑的声音说了什么。

"...ple. I end…" "...人们。我结束…"

"Nothing else in the world matters to me, anyway…nobody who can take her place. I love her." _'Wow,'_ Asuka thought. Those were some serious confessions. She felt her heart sunk as the realization dawned on her. If he was so loyal, then there's no way she could have him completely hers. Tears, for the first time in a long while, threatened to come out from the corner of her eyes. Damn it, why did it hurt so much, knowing that she didn't have the slightest of chan-  
“世界上其他的一切对我都不重要……没有人能取代她。我爱她。” ‘哇，’ 明日香心想。这可是相当严肃的告白。她感到心沉了下去，当意识到这一点时。如果他如此忠诚，那么她完全拥有他是不可能的。泪水，久违地，开始在眼角涌动。该死，为什么知道她连一丝机会都没有会这么痛——

"I love Asuka." “我爱明日香。”

Oh.

Asuka's eyes went wide. 明日香的眼睛瞪大了。

"…anchors me to the reality...out her I'd have already lost my mind…inside this endless madness."  
"…将我锚定在现实中…没有她，我早已精神崩溃…在这无尽的疯狂之中。"

She forgot how to breathe.  
她忘记了如何呼吸。

"…your mother doesn't mean anything to you…" "…I need her help in battles, but outside of that? Absolutely not."  
"…你母亲对你来说毫无意义…" "…我需要她在战斗中帮忙，但除此之外？绝对没有。"

Asuka shot up from her spot and rushed to the exit of the graveyard. What the hell was that? She had a hard time believing what her brain told her she had heard. Shinji, the boy she desperately wanted, _absolutely loved_ her, more than his _mother?!_  
明日香猛地从她的位置上跳起来，冲向墓地的出口。那到底是什么鬼？她很难相信自己的大脑告诉她所听到的话。真嗣，那个她拼命想要得到的男孩，竟然绝对地爱着她，甚至超过爱他的母亲？！

She found it difficult to understand that he… If he had said it in front of her right there and then, she probably wouldn't give in to it. The similar phrases she had seen too many times from the absurd amount of date requests she received. She knew perfectly well they were all hollow and meaningless, and she never paid the slightest bit of attention to them.  
她发现很难理解他……如果他当时就在她面前说出来，她可能不会接受。她从那些荒谬的大量约会请求中见过太多类似的措辞。她非常清楚它们都是空洞无意义的，她从未对它们给予过丝毫关注。

However, he wasn't saying it for her to hear. He said it to his father, he confessed his feelings when he thought she couldn't listen to it. he meant everything he said. Asuka suddenly felt stupid doubting his true intentions before – though it wasn't really her fault since she thought no one would ever love her, let alone _more than anything else in the world._  
然而，他并不是说给她听的。他对他的父亲说，他在以为她听不到的时候坦白了自己的感情。他说的每一句话都是真心的。明日香突然觉得自己之前怀疑他的真实意图真是愚蠢——尽管这并不完全是她的错，因为她一直认为没有人会爱她，更不用说爱得超过世界上其他任何事物了。

Nothing else mattered to him anymore...not even his mother. There were still people other than Shinji she cared about, Kaji, Misato, Hikari...even wondergirl.  
对他来说，什么都不再重要了……甚至包括他的母亲。除了真嗣，她还有其他关心的人，加持、美里、光……甚至是那个奇迹女孩。

Hyperventilating, Asuka burst into the apartment and slammed the door shut. Sliding down to the ground against the wall, Asuka buried her face in her hands.  
过度换气的明日香冲进公寓，砰地一声关上门。她顺着墙滑坐在地上，双手掩面。

Did she love him as much as he loved her?  
她对他的爱，是否和他对她的爱一样深？

Probably not... 大概不会...

But did she love him?  
但她爱他吗？

There's one way to make sure herself…  
有一种方法可以确保她自己…

Asuka regained some of her semblances and deeply inhaled. Crossing her arms in front of her chest, she waited for the inevitable.  
明日香恢复了一些神态，深深地吸了一口气。她交叉双臂抱在胸前，等待着不可避免的事情。

"Today. At graveyard. I heard you."  
“今天。在墓地。我听到你了。”

XXXXXX

Asuka glared at the frozen form of Shinji Ikari with an illegible mix of expressions, her sapphire pupil sparkling intensely. The apartment was dead silent, with occasional chirpy sounds of cicadas in the distance.  
明日香盯着真嗣一动不动的身影，眼神中混杂着难以解读的情绪，蓝宝石般的瞳孔闪烁着强烈的光芒。公寓里死寂无声，远处偶尔传来蝉鸣的欢快声响。

"A-Asuka, wha-what did you hear?" Finally, Shinji spoke up after taking a deep breath. He didn't remember saying anything about his looping status, and that's the only fact that was keeping him sane right now.  
"A-明日香，你-你听到了什么？" 终于，真嗣在深吸一口气后开口了。他不记得自己说过任何关于循环状态的事，而这唯一的事实正是他此刻保持理智的支柱。

"Close your eyes." Came Asuka's abrupt request, her voice plain yet carried a subtle hint of determination.  
"闭上眼睛。" 明日香突然要求道，她的声音平淡却隐含着一丝微妙的决心。

"What?" "什么？"

"I said close your eyes."  
"我说了，闭上眼睛。"

Shinji did as she said so. He could hear Asuka slowly walking toward him, each heavy footstep of her like the countdowns of a timing bomb as it put more pressure on top of his heart. The sound of footsteps stopped as he could literally feel her breath tickling his face. What was she going to do? Slap him? Kick him in the balls? Or-  
真嗣照她说的做了。他能听到明日香缓缓向他走来，每一步沉重的脚步声都像是定时炸弹的倒计时，让他的心脏承受着更大的压力。脚步声停止时，他几乎能感觉到她的呼吸轻拂着他的脸颊。她要做什么？扇他耳光？踢他的下体？还是——

Having Asuka's soft and tender lips on his – he missed it a lot - was not an unfamiliar sensation to him, so he recognized it within one second after his brain registered the feeling. Instead of abruptly jumping away from the sudden surprise like what he would've done a long while ago which had been proven disastrous, Shinji quickly composed himself and wrapped his arms around the redhead's waist.  
明日香柔软温润的唇贴在他的唇上——他非常怀念这种感觉——对他来说并不陌生，所以在他的大脑感受到这种感觉的一秒钟内就认了出来。与很久以前可能会因为突如其来的惊喜而猛然跳开的灾难性反应不同，真嗣迅速镇定下来，双臂环抱住红发少女的腰间。

Cracking his eyes open slightly, he saw Asuka's eyes closed shut, her cheeks blushing the faintest bit of pink. Moments later, she started to make some content 'hmmm' sighs, raising her arms and holding him in a loose embrace as well.  
他微微睁开眼睛，看到明日香紧闭双眼，脸颊泛起淡淡的粉红色。片刻之后，她开始发出满足的'嗯嗯'声，抬起双臂，也松松地拥抱着他。

Asuka wanted to gasp as she felt something slip between her lips; she wanted to stop and maybe even yell at him for taking this a little bit farther than she intended it to go. Yet her body found no reasons to resist him. This was what she wanted and had been missing. Her first kiss was after she and Shinji's sortie against Ramiel when she performed CPR to save his life. She thought it felt nice, _pleasant_, but it was nothing when compared to what she was experiencing right now.  
当感觉到有什么东西滑入她的唇间时，明日香本想倒吸一口气；她想停下来，甚至可能对他大喊，因为他把这事儿做得比她预期的更深入了一些。然而，她的身体却找不到任何抗拒他的理由。这就是她所渴望且一直缺失的。她的初吻是在她和真嗣对抗雷米尔的出击后，她为了救他而进行心肺复苏时发生的。她觉得那感觉不错，愉快，但与现在所经历的相比，简直不值一提。

Even though she had abundant knowledge in the subject of matter, but they were only theoretical. And now she found even the theoretical descriptions couldn't be trusted anymore as she literally saw stars flashing in front of her eyes.  
尽管她在这一领域拥有丰富的知识，但那些都只是理论上的。而现在她发现，就连这些理论描述也不再可信，因为她眼前真的闪烁着星星。

Her body fell limp as she felt him push his weight against her, forcing her to lean against the wall while they continued to kiss. Asuka's heart was beating so hard as if it was a diesel engine, and she was sure Shinji could feel the pulse through her lips. She could feel his tongue playfully dancing with his, sending bolts of electricity ran down her spine. No longer being able to control her own body with reason anymore, Asuka gave in and let her impulse guide her to do what she thought she should do.  
她的身体在他压上来的重量下变得瘫软，被迫倚靠在墙上继续亲吻。明日香的心跳得如此剧烈，仿佛是一台柴油发动机，她确信真嗣能通过她的唇感受到那脉动。她能感觉到他的舌头与她的嬉戏共舞，一股股电流沿着她的脊椎窜下。理智再也无法控制自己的身体，明日香放弃了抵抗，任由冲动引导她去做她认为应该做的事。

The warm water penguin waddled his way across the living room, stopping briefly as he saw two teenagers doing the unmentionables. He shook his head and headed to his freezer. After all, he had seen weirder stuff from these two-legged creatures.

She found it really irritable that Misato treated them as her shipping project – if their guardian could be more mature than she was, Asuka didn't have to worry about it.  
"是啊，我绕了很多弯路才确定这一点……但我确信这是值得的。" 红发女孩微笑着，回想起那个美妙的吻的感觉。当意识到这一点时，她的脸变得紧张。"请保密，好吗？我不希望美里……发疯或者什么的。" 她觉得美里把他们当作自己的配对项目真的很烦人——如果他们的监护人能更成熟一些，明日香就不用担心了。"

"Well, I think she'll approve of you two going out," Kaji assured. "At least I approve with all fours. We ask you kids to do our adults' job. It's unfair to…snatch the happiness from you when you found it."  
"嗯，我想她会同意你们交往的，" 加持保证道。"至少我举双手双脚赞成。我们让你们这些孩子承担我们成年人的工作。从你们找到幸福时夺走它是不公平的。"

"Thanks, Kaji…" Asuka sighed in relief.  
“谢谢你，加持…” 明日香松了口气叹道。

"Though, you might consider taking things slower." Came to her Kaji's serious voice. "I'm telling you this from my personal experience."  
“不过，你或许该考虑放慢脚步。” 加持严肃的声音传来，“这是我个人经验的忠告。”

"Fine…I will," after a moment of hesitation, Asuka conceded half-heartedly. Even though Kaji didn't spell it out, she knew perfectly well what he was referring to. "See you later, Kaji…"  
“好吧…我会注意的，” 明日香犹豫片刻后半推半就地答应了。尽管加持没有明说，但她完全明白他在指什么。“再见，加持…”

"See ya kiddo." Kaji nodded before turning around and headed off. Closing the apartment door behind him, the ponytailed man let out a relaxed sigh.  
“再见，孩子。” 凯吉点头后转身离开。关上公寓门，这位扎着马尾的男人放松地叹了口气。

Almost taking a father's role of the redhead, he really hoped she could find some happiness inside the madness of Angel Wars. As a spy who walked in the minefield, he knew he couldn't take care of her forever, and she needed someone else to love her, to keep her loneliness away.  
他几乎扮演了一个父亲的角色，真心希望她能在天使战争的疯狂中找到一些幸福。作为一名行走在雷区的间谍，他知道无法永远照顾她，她需要有人去爱她，驱散她的孤独。

Knowing how beautiful and exotic Asuka was, Kaji was almost certain that she would have hordes of boys lined up in front of the door of her home for her date with. But the fact that she never went out with anyone intrigued him – he knew what happened in her childhood from reading her files, but did it have such an impact on her attitude to the extent that she did her best to push everyone away?  
知道明日香有多美丽和异国情调，凯吉几乎可以肯定会有成群的男孩在她家门口排队等她约会。但她从未与任何人出去的事实让他感到好奇——他从她的档案中了解她的童年发生了什么，但这是否对她的态度产生了如此大的影响，以至于她尽全力推开所有人？

Now though, she finally found someone, someone who had earned Kaji's trust. This way, he could devote himself to his work with more effort.  
然而现在，她终于找到了一个人，一个赢得了加持信任的人。这样一来，他可以更加全心全意地投入到工作中。

He winced as the image of another woman emerged from his mind. How would she take it if something happened to him? Kaji sighed. If Asuka and Shinji could find their own happiness, there was still a chance for him, however tiny, that he could seek his own happiness with the woman he loved as well.  
他皱了皱眉，脑海中浮现出另一个女人的影像。如果他出了什么事，她会怎么想？加持叹了口气。如果明日香和真嗣能找到他们自己的幸福，那么他仍有那么一丝微小的机会，去追寻与他所爱的女人共同的幸福。

## *Chapter 23*: Chapter 23: Inside the Still Darkness  
*第 23 章*: 第 23 章：静谧黑暗之中

Disclaimer: I do not own Evangelion.  
免责声明：我不拥有《新世纪福音战士》。

**Chapter 23: Inside the Still Darkness  
第 23 章：静谧黑暗之中**

Dr. Akagi's grin widened once the results of the sync test started to come back in. She could hear Maya chatting idly with other bridge bunnies in the distance, but paid no attention since such activity had become a regular, considering how boring it was to wait for the sync rates to stabilize.  
当同步测试的结果开始陆续返回时，赤木博士的笑容更加灿烂了。她能听到玛雅在远处与其他桥上的工作人员闲聊，但并未在意，因为等待同步率稳定这种无聊的事情已经成了常态。

Though Major Katsuragi had been more quiet than usual.  
尽管葛城美里少校比平时更为沉默。

_"Oh my God…" Misato gasped as she set her eyes on the white giant humanoid, her pistol dropped on the floor. "Is this…Adam?"  
“我的天啊…”美里倒抽一口气，目光落在那白色巨人身上，手中的枪滑落在地。“这是…亚当吗？”_

_"No, this is Lilith, the Second Angel," Kaji Ryoji's expression was unreadable.  
“不，这是莉莉丝，第二使徒，”加持良治的表情难以捉摸。_

_"The…Second Angel? What is NERV doing, keeping an Angel in the basement?! What the hell is going on, Kaji?!"  
"第二使徒？NERV 在地下室里养着一个使徒？！这到底是怎么回事，加持？"_

_"I once didn't know better," Kaji's narrowed his eyes. "From now on, I'll do my best."  
"我曾经不懂事，"" 加持眯起了眼睛。""从今往后，我会尽力的。"_

"Damn, a whole five points of increase over the last time," Ritsuko shook her head in disbelief. Though, complaining was not on the table. Walking to Misato's side, she started upon having her attention. "Asuka's sync rate is skyrocketing. She's even leaving Shinji behind by a few points. I wonder what do you know about it?"  
"该死，比上次整整提高了五分，"" 律子难以置信地摇了摇头。虽然抱怨不在她的选项之内。走到美里身边，她开始引起她的注意。""明日香的同步率正在飙升。她甚至把真嗣甩在了后面。你对此有什么了解吗？"

"What?" Misato's expression was completely clueless. "It's a good thing, isn't it?"  
"什么？" 美里一脸茫然。"这是好事，不是吗？"

"True," the blonde doctor crossed her arms. "But knowing the cause could help me with improving Rei's scores, and also…preventing Asuka from going back down. On second thought, if the cause is unstable, we can take precautions as well."  
"确实，" 金发女医生交叉双臂。"但了解原因能帮助我提高零的分数，同时……防止明日香再次下滑。再想想，如果原因不稳定，我们也可以采取预防措施。"

"Don't look at me as if I know everything," Misato shrugged. "She's been acting perfectly normal at home." She paused for a moment, recalling her charges' behaviors recently. The morning after her hungover on the day of the wedding, the two made breakfast together, a sight she didn't remember seeing ever before. Moreover, Asuka seemed to steal much more glances at Shinji than usual. Sighing, she reiterated. "Well, relatively speaking."  
"别用那种我知道一切的眼神看我，" 美里耸了耸肩。"她在家里表现得完全正常。" 她停顿了一下，回想最近孩子们的行为。宿醉婚礼后的早晨，两人一起做了早餐，这是她以前从未见过的景象。此外，明日香似乎比平时更多地偷看真嗣。她叹了口气，重申道。"嗯，相对而言。"

"I suggest you keep a close eye on them, considering-" She was cut off by an abrupt blaring of alarms. Dr. Akagi hastily rushed over to the monitors. "What's going on?"  
"我建议你密切关注他们，考虑到——" 她的话被突如其来的警报声打断。赤城博士匆忙赶到监视器前。"发生什么事了？"

"Asuka, her plug depth is exceeding 100!" Maya hurried her report.  
"明日香，她的插入栓深度超过 100 了！" 真希急忙报告道。"

"What the hell? Pull her back!" Dr. Akagi exclaimed. As the head of Project E, she knew better than anyone else the danger of staying for too long inside the contamination zone. The physical mutation was one thing, mental pollution was what worried her the most.  
"搞什么鬼？把她拉回来！" 赤城博士惊呼。作为 E 计划的负责人，她比任何人都清楚在污染区内停留过久的危险。身体变异是一回事，精神污染才是她最担心的。

"I can't!" Maya shouted as she furiously typed on her keyboard. "Unit 02 is not responding to our signal!"  
“我做不到！”玛雅大声喊道，她愤怒地在键盘上敲击。“二号机没有响应我们的信号！”

"Cut the power!" “切断电源！”

"Wait! The systems are getting back to normal!" Aoba interjected, at the same time, the alarm subsided as well. "The readings are stabilizing! Plug depth returning to safety zone!"  
“等等！系统正在恢复正常！”青叶插话道，与此同时，警报也逐渐平息。“读数正在稳定！插头深度正在返回安全区域！”

Letting out a huge sigh of relief, Dr. Akagi opened a comm link to Asuka's entry plug. "Asuka? What the hell happened in there?!"  
长长地舒了一口气，赤木律子博士打开了与明日香插入栓的通讯链接。“明日香？里面到底发生了什么？！”

"How am I supposed to know?!" A furious redheaded storm raged across the observation room. "I felt like I was punched in the face! Had your software gone mad or something?!"  
“我怎么知道？！”一头红发的风暴在观察室中怒吼。“我感觉像是被人打了一拳！是你的软件出问题了吗？！”

"Well, at least our pilot looks normal…" Ritsuko rubbed her forehead. "It might be a glitch of the system. I'll investigate the incident after this sync test. End the test now, we don't want…another malfunciton. Oh right," she started up again before the redhead went offline. "Meet me in my office, Asuka."  
“好吧，至少我们的驾驶员看起来正常……”律子揉了揉额头。“可能是系统故障。我会在这次同步测试后调查这个事件。现在结束测试，我们不希望……再次出现故障。哦对了，”她还没等红发女孩下线就又开口了。“来我办公室一趟，明日香。”

"Whatever…" “随便吧…”

The doctor closed her notebook, beginning to make her way down the gray metal hall, her high heels clacking against the metal floor with each step she took. Being a brilliant scientist, she was confident that the system she developed should be flawless, at least always secure. Precautions were taken, safeties were set to ensure unwanted incidents wouldn't happen from their side.  
医生合上笔记本，开始沿着灰色的金属走廊前行，高跟鞋在金属地板上发出清脆的响声。作为一名杰出的科学家，她自信自己开发的系统应该是完美无缺的，至少始终是安全的。她采取了预防措施，设置了安全机制，以确保不会因为他们的失误而发生意外。

Which meant if anything, today's event was caused by the pilot. The only way she knew that could abruptly power up the bond between the EVA and pilot…Ritsuko gasped as the realization struck her. Was she somehow communicating with her mother? That would explain her abnormally high sync rate as well as the sudden dive into the contamination zone. At least that was what she could deduce from the evidence she had.  
这意味着，如果今天的事件有什么原因，那一定是飞行员造成的。她唯一知道的可能突然加强 EVA 与飞行员之间联系的方式……律子倒吸一口凉气，当这个念头击中她时。难道她在以某种方式与她的母亲沟通？这可以解释她异常高的同步率以及突然闯入污染区的行为。至少根据她掌握的证据，这是她能得出的结论。

And the conclusion terrified her.  
而这个结论让她感到恐惧。

She stopped at her door, reaching her finger out to hit a button on the panel next to the automatic door, causing it to open.  
她在门前停下，伸出手指按下旁边自动门面板上的按钮，门随即打开。

Asuka was already in her office waiting, the smell of LCL still fresh on her. "What'd you call me in here for?" She was already starting to sound like her patience was running thin.  
明日香已经在办公室里等候，LCL 的气味还萦绕在她身上。“你叫我进来有什么事？”她已经开始显得有些不耐烦了。

"I want to know what happened during today's sync test," Ritsuko put bluntly. Seeing the inscrutable gaze from the redhead, she tried again. "Let me rephrase that." She started to tap her index finger on her desk. "Today your sync rate was phenomenal. However during the test, you went deep into the contamination zone, which was extremely dangerous. Knowing what happened can help me make sure this won't happen again."  
“我想知道今天同步测试时发生了什么，”律子直截了当地说。看到红发少女那难以捉摸的目光，她尝试换个说法。“让我换个方式说。”她开始用食指轻敲桌面。“今天你的同步率非常惊人。然而在测试中，你深入了污染区，这极其危险。了解发生了什么能帮助我确保这种情况不会再发生。”

Asuka put a finger on her chin and mused. "Well, I was simply meditating on my seat as usual, then…erm, I felt something hit me in the face, and the universe went…boom in front of my eyes." Replied Asuka truthfully, not really knowing what took place herself.  
明日香用手指轻触下巴，沉思着。“嗯，我只是像往常一样坐在座位上冥想，然后…呃，我感觉有什么东西打在了脸上，接着宇宙就在我眼前…砰的一声炸开了。”明日香如实回答，其实她自己也不太清楚发生了什么。

"Do you feel…different? Altered? In any way?" She couldn't tell whether she was lying - or deceiving - but from the looks of her, the part of what she said was at least technically true.  
“你感觉……不一样吗？改变了？在任何方面？”她不确定自己是在撒谎还是欺骗，但从她的表情来看，她所说的一部分至少在技术上是真实的。

Asuka raised an eyebrow. "What? Do you mean I could get…contaminated?" Her voice started gaining a hint of worry and dread.  
明日香挑了挑眉。“什么？你是说我可能会被……污染？”她的声音开始流露出一丝担忧和恐惧。

"Possibly, that's why I'm asking."  
“或许，这就是我提问的原因。”

The redhead gasped, though she regained a semblance of composure soon. "I don't feel particularly different…other than a mild headache."  
红发女孩倒吸一口气，但很快恢复了些许镇定。“我感觉没什么特别的变化……除了轻微的头痛。”

Dr. Akagi sighed. "Well, better safe than sorry…" She tore a piece of paper from her notebook and started writing. "Asuka, follow me to the medical wing. You're required to take a throughout physical and mental examination."  
赤城博士叹了口气。“嗯，安全总比遗憾好……”她从笔记本上撕下一张纸，开始书写。“明日香，跟我去医疗翼。你需要进行一次全面的身心检查。”

"Oh, c'mon! You've got to be kidding me! I…" She trailed off, unable to bring herself to say her plans of the afternoon out loud. Today she and Shinji were supposed to go hunting for a violin for their duet, but since no one else except Kaji knew about their newly established relationship, she intended to keep it secret as long as possible.  
"哦，拜托！你一定是在开玩笑吧！我…" 她话说到一半就停住了，无法将下午的计划大声说出口。今天她和真嗣原本打算去为他们的二重奏找一把小提琴，但由于除了加持之外没有人知道他们新建立的关系，她打算尽可能长时间地保密。

"Huh? Do you have any plans later, Asuka?" Ritsuko asked with a hint of curiosity in her voice.  
"嗯？你今天有什么计划吗，明日香？" 律子带着一丝好奇的语气问道。

Asuka bit down on her lower lip. "Nothing," she conceded. She was sure that Shinji wouldn't mind; after all, she had no way to control what NERV required her to do. Not to mention she was worried about the contamination thing herself.  
明日香咬了咬下唇。“没什么，”她让步道。她确信真嗣不会介意；毕竟，她无法控制 NERV 要求她做的事情。更不用说她自己也担心污染问题。

"Good. Follow me, then." Asuka sighed and accompanied the blonde doctor out of her office and down the hallway. She could only hope the examination wouldn't take too long.  
“好。那就跟我来。”明日香叹了口气，跟着金发医生走出了办公室，沿着走廊前行。她只能希望检查不会花太长时间。

XXXXXX

"Tadaima…" The Second Child's sullen voice floated from the entrance way, mixed with soft rustling sounds of her shoes rubbing the floor. "Welcome home!" Came Shinji Ikari's excited voice with a note of worry in it. "Asuka? I received your message. How did the examination go? Is there anything wrong?"  
“ただいま…”第二适格者闷闷不乐的声音从入口处飘来，夹杂着鞋子摩擦地板的轻微沙沙声。“欢迎回家！”真嗣·碇兴奋的声音中带着一丝担忧。“明日香？我收到了你的消息。检查怎么样？有什么问题吗？”

"Nothing, the Doctor said she couldn't find anything wrong…" Asuka sighed in exhaustion. Massaging her waist, she continued, "though it didn't help with me getting utterly wore out…"  
“没什么，博士说她没发现什么问题……”明日香疲惫地叹了口气。她揉着腰继续说：“尽管这并没有让我不那么筋疲力尽……”

"Well, I suppose our duet should wait, then. I'll let you have some rest first." Shinji conceded, his voice certain yet having a tingle of disappointment in it.  
“嗯，那我们的二重奏恐怕得推迟了。我先让你休息一下。”真嗣让步道，他的声音坚定却带着一丝失望的颤抖。

Asuka pouted, "cheer up, Baka! We can do this later! Besides, we didn't get to buy the violin, right? Even if I want to play right now, we can't!"  
明日香撅起嘴，“振作点，笨蛋！我们可以晚点再做！而且，我们还没买到小提琴，对吧？就算我现在想演奏，也没办法！”

"Actually…" Shinji went to 'their room', formerly Asuka's bedroom, and retrieved a new instrument box. "I bought this from the local instruments store after getting your message, I hope you like it." Saying, he opened the box in one swift move.  
"实际上…" 真嗣走向'他们的房间'，也就是以前的明日香卧室，取回了一个新的乐器盒。"收到你的消息后，我从当地乐器店买了这个，希望你会喜欢。" 说着，他利落地打开了盒子。

Raising her eyebrows in surprise, Asuka took a careful examination of the work of art inside it. Even though she had been paying less attention to instruments after her Evangelion training started, she still recognized the well-celebrated craftwork in an instant.  
明日香惊讶地挑了挑眉，仔细端详着盒内的艺术品。尽管自从开始进行 EVA 训练后她对乐器的关注减少了，但她还是立刻认出了这件备受赞誉的工艺品。

It was one of the iconic violins made by a well-known craftsman William Moennig's own hands in the late 1980s. The instrument – or more like an artwork, instead of merely an ordinary tool to produce music – only had a few of its types across the whole world, which in turn led to its soaring price.  
这是由著名工匠威廉·门宁在 1980 年代末亲手制作的一把标志性小提琴。这件乐器——或者更确切地说是一件艺术品，而非仅仅是一种普通的音乐制作工具——在全球范围内仅有少数几把，这也导致了其价格的飙升。

In simple terms, it's impossible for him to get it from some 'local instruments store', and how much did he pay for it…she couldn't even dare start to imagine.  
简而言之，他不可能从某个‘当地乐器店’买到它，而他为此付出了多少……她甚至不敢开始想象。

"Shinji…" the redhead started in a soft voice. "I…thank you. But…I can't accept it."  
“真嗣…”红发女孩轻声开口，“我…谢谢你。但是…我不能接受。”

"Why?" Shinji raised an eyebrow.  
"为什么？" 真嗣挑了挑眉。

"It's too valuable!" Asuka raised her volume. "I can't accept it without feeling bad about it!"  
"这太贵重了！" 明日香提高了音量。"我收下会感到不安的！"

"But I want to give it to you, Asuka," Shinji smiled a reassuring smile. "Your birthday…is getting close, right?" Nodding in confirmation, the redhead couldn't help but let another gleam of surprise leak from her eyes. "Treat this as your birthday gift from me. Besides, I don't have things to do with all the pilot salaries I get other than to make you happy."  
"但我想把它送给你，明日香，" 真嗣露出一个安心的微笑。"你的生日……快到了，对吧？" 红发女孩点头确认，眼中不禁又流露出一丝惊讶的光芒。"就当这是我给你的生日礼物吧。再说，我除了用这些驾驶员薪水让你开心之外，也没别的事可做。"

"But…" Still, she tried. "可是…" 她仍试图推辞。

"You can pay me back when it comes to my birthday, sounds fair?" He had to hide his sad smile when he said it. Birthday? That was something he had never experienced ever since…  
"你可以在我生日时还我，听起来很公平吧？" 他说这话时不得不藏起那抹苦笑。生日？自从那以后，他从未经历过……

Asuka's mouth became a thin line. "Fine." Finally, after a raging battle with herself, the redhead gave in. After all, if he loved her more than anything else in the world, she wasn't going to deny his way of telling her that he loved her.  
明日香的嘴角紧抿成一条线。"好吧。" 经过一番内心的激烈斗争，红发女孩最终妥协了。毕竟，如果他爱她胜过世界上的一切，她也不会拒绝他用这种方式告诉她他爱她。

There was something she could do right now, though. "Still, thank you very much, Shinji." Asuka took the violin case from the boy she fell in love with. With a smile both warm and appreciative, she continued. "This is the best birthday gift I've received so far, no competition. I don't know what I can do to…reciprocate, but I'll try my best! Now, let's start from a duet, shall we?"  
不过，她现在能做些什么。"尽管如此，非常感谢你，真嗣。" 明日香从她爱上的男孩手中接过小提琴盒。带着既温暖又感激的微笑，她继续说道："这是我迄今为止收到的最好的生日礼物，无可比拟。我不知道该如何……回报，但我会尽力的！现在，我们从二重奏开始，好吗？"

"I thought you want some rest first, Asuka," Shinji questioned.  
"我以为你想先休息一下，明日香，" 真嗣问道。

"Not anymore, not after…this," she threw a look at the delicate violin in her hands while caressing the shiny surface of it with utmost care. "So, what are we waiting for?"  
"现在不了，尤其是在……这个之后，" 她瞥了一眼手中的精致小提琴，小心翼翼地抚摸着它光亮的表面。"那么，我们还在等什么呢？"

"As you wish," Shinji grinned in joy and went to get his cello from the closet.  
"如你所愿，" 真嗣带着喜悦的笑容，从衣柜里拿出他的大提琴。

Pulling out another chair from the table, Shinji invited Asuka to sit beside him, so they could see each other's moves clearly. Asuka sat down and readied her instrument, waiting for Shinji to give the signal.  
从桌子上又拉出一把椅子，真嗣邀请明日香坐在他旁边，这样他们可以清楚地看到对方的动作。明日香坐下并准备好她的乐器，等待真嗣发出信号。

"Let's hear what the invincible Shinji-sama could do with his Cello, shall we?" Said Asuka, her voice mixed with amusement and anticipation.  
“让我们听听无敌的真嗣大人用他的大提琴能做什么吧，好吗？”明日香说道，她的声音混合着趣味和期待。

"Right. Bach's Cello Suite No. 1 in G Major, ready?" "Sure, the famous one. I can accompany you just right!"  
“好的。巴赫的 G 大调第一大提琴组曲，准备好了吗？”“当然，那首著名的曲子。我可以完美地伴奏！”

They looked into each other's eyes for a moment, and nodded simultaneously.  
他们彼此对视了一会儿，然后同时点了点头。

The sound of music flowed through Misato's apartment as Shinji slid the bow across the strings of his cello. The composition was one of the most famous cello music ever made, and fortunately, the redhead could accompany him gracefully with skill.  
音乐在美里公寓中流淌，真嗣用弓在提琴弦上滑动。这首曲子是史上最著名的提琴曲之一，幸运的是，红发女孩能优雅地用技巧与他合奏。

The music carried them as the melody flowed through the duo like a river of sound. It had been quite a while since Asuka had found herself in such a state of ease. She could almost forget about all of the troubles she had been through, all of the hardships she had faced, all of it felt as though it didn't even exist. It was just she and Shinji, her bow, and her violin.  
音乐旋律如声音之河般在两人间流淌。阿斯卡已经很久没有感到如此轻松了。她几乎可以忘记所有经历过的烦恼和困难，一切仿佛都不存在。只有她和真嗣，她的弓，和她的提琴。

After hours of playing, the Children finally pulled to a stop, content smiles on both of their faces. "You played well, Asuka." Shinji complimented, which caused Asuka to blush a little. After all, it was a compliment from someone who was much more proficient in music than her. "What do you expect, Baka-Shinji?" She boasted.  
经过数小时的演奏，孩子们终于停了下来，两人脸上都洋溢着满足的微笑。“你弹得很好，明日香。”真嗣称赞道，这让明日香微微脸红。毕竟，这是来自一个比她更擅长音乐的人的赞美。“你还指望什么，笨蛋真嗣？”她得意地说。

Looking into each other's eyes, both Children smiled and leaned closer to each other.  
两人对视着，孩子们微笑着，彼此靠得更近了。

_Beep…Beep…Beep… 哔…哔…哔…_

At the moment, they could hear firm knocking sounds from the front door. "Pilot Soryu and Pilot Ikari, NERV Headquarters requires your immediate presence."  
"哦，你他妈是认真的吗？！" 明日香喊道，本能地从那个吻中抽离。她和真嗣的手机同时响起，这只能意味着一件事。此刻，他们能听到前门传来坚定的敲门声。"驾驶员惣流和驾驶员碇，NERV 总部要求你们立即到场。"

"我并不意外……" 真嗣叹息道。

他只能更快地下沉。

战斗直觉是这位红发少女一直引以为傲的能力。就在阴影在她脚下蔓延开来的瞬间，02 号机一跃而起，到达了一座 100 米高的装甲建筑屋顶。“那是什么？！影子吗？”她惊呼道。

Shinji Ikari watched the whole scene with a madly beating heart, firing more shots into the shadow and the sphere that was chasing the crimson EVA Unit down like cat catching mouse.

听到真嗣冰冷彻骨的声音，美里感到脊背一阵发凉。深吸一口气恢复镇定后，她继续说道："先撤退重新集结！我们会把她救出来的，我保证。"

Now the filters were giving away, causing the LCL to break down, producing an uncanny smell.  
02 号机驾驶员再次睁开眼睛。她能感觉到自己的眼皮每秒钟都变得更加沉重。“这是……血吗？”通常情况下，LCL 虽然带有一丝铜腥味，但经过过滤后几乎闻不到。现在过滤器正在失效，导致 LCL 分解，产生了一种诡异的气味。

"I've only got one minute left…" Breathing was getting harder and harder as the LCL around her reached its last cycle before becoming completely drained of oxygen. "So…is this how it ends?" She found that she wasn't afraid of death at this point, at least not the worst worry. She wasn't scared of her life ending as much as at the beginning, but she was afraid of thinking about what she'd be leaving behind if she were to die here.  
“我只剩下最后一分钟了……”随着周围的 LCL 即将完成最后一个循环，氧气完全耗尽，呼吸变得越来越困难。“所以……这就是结局吗？”她发现自己此刻并不害怕死亡，至少不是最糟糕的担忧。她不像最初那样害怕生命的终结，但她害怕思考如果在这里死去，她将留下什么。

Shinji had said she was the only one anchoring him to reality. If she's gone, what would he do?  
碇君曾说过她是唯一将他固定在现实的人。如果她不在了，他会怎么做？

"I'm sorry, Shinji…" She had so many things she wanted to say to him, that she loved him as well, that she wanted him to be with her forever. Asuka watched the faint red light on her plugsuit's wrist faded and died out with a sad smile. She couldn't tell if she was crying or not since tears were dissolved into LCL the instant they came out. "So…rry…Shin…"  
“对不起，碇君……”她有那么多话想对他说，她爱他，她希望他永远和她在一起。明日香看着插座服手腕上微弱的红色灯光渐渐熄灭，带着悲伤的微笑。她无法确定自己是否在哭泣，因为泪水一出来就溶解在 LCL 中了。“对……不起……碇……”

Then it all went black.  
然后一切陷入了黑暗。

XXXXXX

"I said it's an order, follow it." Gendo Ikari gazed at the blonde doctor intensely, making the latter person shiver under pressure. "Under no condition are Unit 02 and the Second Child expandable."  
"我说了这是命令，执行它。" 碇源堂凝视着金发医生，目光锐利，让后者在压力下颤抖。"在任何情况下，二号机和第二适格者都不可牺牲。"

"But her batteries will be out of power right now anyway!" Dr. Akagi tried once more. "We have to try something before this Angel does worse!"  
"但她的电池现在肯定已经耗尽了！" 赤木律子再次尝试。"我们必须在使徒造成更大破坏之前采取行动！"

"Irrelevant." Commander Ikari huffed. Shinji had told him that in the end, Kyoko would definitely save her daughter, just like she had done several times before. All they needed to do was to wait. "Rescuing the pilot of Unit 02 is our top priority, I think I made it clear already."  
"无关紧要。" 碇司令哼了一声。真嗣曾告诉他，最终恭子肯定会像之前几次那样救出她的女儿。他们只需等待。"救援二号机驾驶员是我们的首要任务，我想我已经说得很清楚了。"

"But-" "但——"

"Follow the order, Dr. Akagi," Gendo lowered his voice by a few more degrees, if that was even possible.  
"执行命令，赤木博士，" 源度又压低了几分声音，如果这还有可能的话。"

Shinji Ikari watched the whole scene from his father's usual observation spot in his office with satisfaction and amusement. Commander Ikari's innate ability to intimidate people was finally put into good use. Even though he knew Asuka would be fine since her mother had saved her before, it would reveal the truth of her EVA to her, and he wasn't sure what of an impact it would introduce.  
真嗣·碇从父亲办公室里他常待的观察点，带着满意和戏谑的心情观看着整个场面。碇司令天生的威慑力终于得到了有效利用。尽管他知道明日香会没事，因为她母亲之前救过她，但这会揭示她 EVA 的真相，他不确定这会带来什么影响。

Going after her into the Angel would solve the problem since he could just ask her mother for help before Kyoko was needed.  
跟着她进入天使号就能解决问题，因为他可以在需要久子之前先向她的母亲求助。

A glance at the watch told him only one minute remained before Unit 02 would break out of the Angel. Nonetheless, nervousness still made his stomach clench.  
瞥一眼手表，他得知距离 02 号机突破使徒仅剩一分钟。然而，紧张感依旧让他的胃紧缩起来。

_Time Remaining: 00:00:29 剩余时间：00:00:29_

Shinji took a deep breath. It's happening at any moment.  
真嗣深吸了一口气。随时都可能发生。

真嗣皱了皱眉。难道他设定的计时器太早了？他迅速查看了一下日志，发现他甚至将计时器设定得比 EVA 在紧急模式下能运行的最长时间还要多出 5 分钟。

冷汗开始从真嗣的身体上滴落。指挥舱内人们的交谈声逐渐变得模糊。

"Asuka…where are you?" His gaze at the Angel intensified as time passed.  
“明日香…你在哪儿？”随着时间流逝，他对使徒的注视愈发强烈。

Shinji's hands started to tremble.  
真嗣的双手开始颤抖。
