## *Chapter 24*: Chapter 24: Falsity  
*第 24 章*: 第 24 章：虚假

Disclaimer: I do not own Evangelion.  
免责声明：我不拥有《新世纪福音战士》。

**Chapter 24: Falsity 第二十四章：虚伪**

After opening her eyes, the first thing she saw was the indiscernible landscape of the countryside across a large window. The train car swayed as it clattered along the railway, orange sunlight peeking through the glass and splashing over her body.  
睁开眼后，映入她眼帘的第一幕便是透过一扇大窗难以辨认的乡间景色。火车车厢随着铁轨的咔嗒声摇晃，橙色的阳光透过玻璃洒落在她身上。

_'Am I…dead?'_ was the first coherent thought Asuka made after her consciousness returned. The last thing she could remember was watching the timer countdown to zero. Surrendering to reality without fighting didn't exist in her dictionary, she would rather die than…well, she probably already did…  
‘我……死了吗？’这是明日香恢复意识后的第一个清晰念头。她最后记得的是看着计时器归零。在她的字典里，放弃抵抗屈服于现实是不存在的，她宁愿死也不愿……好吧，她可能已经……

The redhead gasped as she set her eyes on her sole companion in the train carriage – she couldn't make out her face clearly, but the unmistakable red A-10 clips standing on her head said louder than any words of her identity.  
红发女孩倒抽一口气，目光落在车厢内唯一的同伴身上——她的面容模糊不清，但那头顶上显眼的红色 A-10 发夹比任何言语都更能表明她的身份。

"Who…are you?" She asked, her voice slightly shaking.  
"你……是谁？" 她问道，声音微微颤抖。

"I am Asuka Langley Soryu." The figure intoned.  
"我是惣流·明日香·兰格雷。" 那身影低沉地说道。

"I am myself, not you!" Asuka barked at the other redhead, jumping up from her seat. "Stop using my face already!"  
"我就是我，不是你！" 明日香对另一个红发女子厉声说道，从座位上跳了起来。"别再用我的脸了！"

"I am more of you than you could possibly imagine," the faux redhead replied calmly, seemingly undisturbed by Asuka's attitude. "I want to understand you. Help me understand!"  
"我比你所能想象的更像你，"这位假红发女子平静地回答，似乎并未被明日香的态度所动摇。"我想了解你。帮我了解吧！"

"I don't want you to understand me! I already have someone who understands me!" Asuka cried, the image of Shinji emerging in her mind.  
"我不需要你了解我！我已经有人懂我了！"明日香哭喊着，脑海中浮现出真嗣的形象。

"Oh?" The other Asuka's voice gained a note of curiosity. "Who is it?"  
"哦？" 另一个明日香的语气中增添了一丝好奇。"是谁呢？"

"It's none of your business!" Asuka screamed.  
"这不关你的事！" 明日香尖叫道。

"So, I see you have chosen this path of life." The other redhead morphed into a school-uniform-wearing Asuka in an eyeblink. "This is Asuka Langley Soryu right now."  
"看来，你选择了这条人生道路。" 另一个红发女孩眨眼间变成了穿着校服的明日香。"这就是现在的惣流·明日香·兰格雷。"

Asuka crossed her arms together in front of her chest but made no verbal comments.  
明日香双臂交叉于胸前，却未发一言。

Slowly, the pseudo-Asuka started growing up at visible speeds. Her hair grew longer, her height grew taller, and her feminine figures started filling up as well. Then, at one moment, the red A-10 hair clips disappeared, leaving her long golden-red mane flow down from her head to her waist like a brilliant waterfall.  
渐渐地，那个假明日香开始以肉眼可见的速度成长。她的头发变长，身高增长，女性曲线也逐渐显现。随后，在某一刻，红色的 A-10 发夹消失了，一头金红色的长发如绚烂瀑布般从头顶倾泻至腰际。

"So?" Asuka snorted, though she had to admit older version of herself looked breathtaking.  
“所以呢？”明日香哼了一声，尽管她不得不承认，这个年长版的自己美得令人窒息。

"Being together with him unavoidably leads to this." A voice rang in her head. "At the cost of losing your status as an EVA pilot. Is this what you want?"  
"和他在一起，这不可避免地会发生。"一个声音在她脑海中响起。"以失去 EVA 驾驶员身份为代价。这是你想要的吗？"

Asuka bit down on her lower lips. Not long ago, she wouldn't even hesitate to answer negatively. Piloting an EVA was her life's purpose, or at least she thought so. But right now, she understood that through EVA, all she craved was attention and love - which Shinji could provide. If she had already got what she wanted from piloting EVA, the main reason she kept piloting was out of a sense of duty as well as not wanting to leave Shinji alone fighting the Angels. "If I really have to make that choice...I would choose him."  
明日香咬紧了下唇。不久前，她会毫不犹豫地给出否定答案。驾驶 EVA 曾是她生命的意义，至少她是这么认为的。但现在，她明白通过 EVA，她所渴望的不过是关注和爱——而真嗣能给予这些。如果她已经从驾驶 EVA 中得到了想要的东西，她继续驾驶的主要原因是一种责任感，以及不想让真嗣独自对抗使徒。“如果我真的必须做出选择……我会选择他。”

The pseudo-Asuka started reforming again. Besides getting older and taller, this time, a shiny silver object appeared on her left hand's ring finger. Frowning, Asuka walked closer and took a careful look at the object.  
伪明日香开始再次重组。除了变得更年长和更高之外，这次，她左手无名指上出现了一个闪亮的银色物体。明日香皱起眉头，走近仔细观察那个物体。

It was a wedding ring with 'I. S.' imprinted on it.  
那是一枚刻有‘I. S.’字样的结婚戒指。

"Is this what you want? To be dependent on someone else? You've always wanted to be alone."  
"这就是你想要的吗？依赖别人？你一直想独自一人。"

"I don't want to be alone!" Though she couldn't help but smile a bit at the image. Marriage sounded scary to her. Still, she found no reasons against it, especially if it was with Shinji.  
"我不想独自一人！" 尽管她忍不住对这个形象微微一笑。婚姻对她来说听起来很可怕。尽管如此，她找不到反对的理由，尤其是如果对象是真嗣的话。

"Hm." The voice sounded almost disappointed. Asuka watched intently at the adult version of herself, furrowing her brows as she seemed to catch no apparent changes to the image. Though that was changed very quickly as she noticed even though her face remained the same, her belly was undoubtedly becoming round.  
"嗯。" 那声音听起来几乎有些失望。明日香专注地看着成年版的自己，皱起眉头，似乎没有察觉到形象有明显的变化。不过很快她就注意到，虽然她的脸保持不变，但她的腹部无疑在变圆。

"You've always hated having kids, are you not? Under such a situation, do you still want to take this life path?"  
"你一直不喜欢有孩子，不是吗？在这种情况下，你还想走这条路吗？"

Raising kids. Asuka's eyes widened at the very thought. Truthfully she was indeed scared, _intimidated_ by the idea. She feared she would only follow her mother's example. But what would Shinji want? "I don't know…but as long as he is with me, I can handle everything!"  
养育孩子。想到这一点，明日香的眼中闪过一丝惊慌。说实话，她的确感到害怕，被这个想法所震慑。她担心自己只会重蹈母亲的覆辙。但真嗣会怎么想呢？“我不知道……但只要有他在我身边，我就能应对一切！”

"Stubborn poor little creature…" The image transformed again. This time the figure grew up much faster than before. Asuka saw herself went through adulthood, middle age, and finally – an elder Asuka sitting in a wheelchair. Her red hair that she took proud in faded in color, though she could still clearly make out her face. "Is this what you really want? Spend your whole life with him?"  
"固执的小可怜……" 影像再次变换。这一次，身影比之前成长得更快。明日香看到自己经历了成年、中年，最终——一个坐在轮椅上的老年明日香。她引以为傲的红发褪去了颜色，尽管她仍能清晰地辨认出自己的面容。“这就是你真正想要的吗？与他共度一生？”

Asuka nodded without so much as peradventure. "I think I do…I finally found someone who loves me and understands me… I'm not letting him go!"  
明日香毫不犹豫地点头。“我想我确实…我终于找到了一个爱我并理解我的人…我不会让他离开的！”

"If that's the case…" Asuka's eyes went wide as the elder version of herself morphed into a boy she fell in love with. "Stay with me forever…Asuka."  
“如果是这样的话…”明日香的眼睛睁得大大的，看着年长的自己变成了她所爱的那个男孩。“永远和我在一起…明日香。”

XXXXXX

Gendo Ikari stood silently behind his son, who was currently standing beside the railings and staring a death glare at the stationary form of the eleventh Angel, folding his hands together behind his rear. "Shinji…" He started, unsure of what to say.  
碇源堂默默地站在他儿子身后，儿子正站在栏杆旁，对第十一使徒的静止形态投以死亡凝视，双手交叉在背后。“真嗣…”他开口道，不确定该说什么。

"It's not your fault." The boy muttered, his eyes lifeless. Did he just break his record of how fast he could get Asuka killed? "It's my fault. I should've been the one sucked in there, not her."  
"这不是你的错。" 男孩喃喃道，眼神空洞。他是不是刚刚打破了让明日香最快死去的记录？"是我的错。我本该是被吸进去的那个人，而不是她。"

"What now?" Gendo probed cautiously. Still remembering Shinji's response of 'losing the Second Child,' he couldn't help but feel nervous about his son's mental state. Though he was half-certain that he had no way to end the world without Unit 01, and seeing him having no intention to get to the EVA whatsoever, Gendo didn't want to be the first one of them to turn against each other.  
"现在怎么办？" 碇源堂小心翼翼地试探。他仍然记得真嗣对“失去二号机驾驶员”的反应，不禁对他的儿子的心理状态感到紧张。虽然他半信半疑地认为没有初号机就无法结束世界，而且看到真嗣完全没有接近 EVA 的意图，碇源堂不想成为他们中第一个反目的人。

Not after sharing all those things with him…  
在他分享了所有那些事情之后……

He could've called Section 2 to restrain him, or even put him in jail. But without him piloting Unit 01, he stood no chance of winning against SEELE. Not to mention they still had more Angels incoming, and he was almost certain Unit 00 alone would be insufficient in defeating them.  
他本可以叫第二支部来制服他，甚至把他关进监狱。但没有他驾驶 01 号机，他根本没有机会战胜 SEELE。更不用说还有更多的使徒即将来袭，他几乎可以肯定仅凭 00 号机是无法击败它们的。

"She can't be dead. I don't believe it. Mrs. Soryu won't let her die like this." So mumbled Shinji, half to convince himself. He had absolutely zero idea of what would happen if the battery entirely runs out while inside Leliel – this had never happened before. "I still have hope."  
"她不可能死了。我不相信。碇司令不会让她就这样死去的。"真嗣喃喃自语，一半是为了说服自己。他完全不知道如果电池完全耗尽时还待在雷里尔内部会发生什么——这种情况从未发生过。"我还有希望。"

Gendo Ikari threw a look at the orb-shaped Angel, a slight frown crossed his face. If his son hadn't given up yet, there was no reason for him to lose hope as well. "Is there anything we can do? From outside?"  
碇源堂瞥了一眼球形的使徒，眉头微微皱起。既然他的儿子还未放弃，他也没有理由失去希望。“我们能从外部做些什么吗？”

"I don't know." Replied Shinji truthfully in a sullen voice. "I don't know…"  
"我不知道。" 真嗣用闷闷不乐的声音如实回答。"我不知道……"

What could he do? For some unspoken reason he didn't know, the Angel kept avoiding him from entering the shadow. As much as he didn't want to admit it, throwing all of the remaining 992 N2 mines was actually the best shot they got right now.  
他能做什么呢？出于某种未言明的原因，他不知道为什么使徒一直避开他进入阴影。尽管他不想承认，但投掷所有剩余的 992 枚 N2 地雷实际上是他们目前最好的机会。

Shinji sighed as he turned away from the spot. "Shinji-kun?" A familiar voice came to him, snapping his head in the direction. "Rei?" He was faintly surprised that Rei came to find him in his father's office, but shook it off since he recalled she was also a frequent visitor of this place.  
真嗣叹了口气，转身离开那个地方。"真嗣君？"一个熟悉的声音传来，他猛地转头望向声音的方向。"绫波？"他有些惊讶绫波会来他父亲的办公室找他，但随即想起她也是这里的常客，便不再多想。

"You shouldn't blame yourself." Rei's voice, although monotone as usual, carried a note of concern in it. "She wouldn't blame you."  
“你不应该责怪自己。”绫波的声音一如既往地平淡，却带着一丝关切。“她不会怪你的。”

"You don't understand, Rei," Shinji let out a sorrowful chuckle. Of course Ayanami didn't understand. She didn't even know the tip of the iceberg. "None of this should've happened…"  
“你不明白，绫波，”真嗣发出一声苦笑。当然，绫波是不会理解的。她连冰山一角都不了解。“这一切本不该发生……”

"I do not believe Asuka would want to see you like this." Ayanami kept her eyes locked with Shinji's, her crimson eyes meeting his cobalt.  
"我不认为明日香会希望看到你这样。" 绫波保持着与真嗣的目光对视，她的赤红眼眸迎上了他的钴蓝。

"Rei…" Shinji spoke softly. "You weren't there… I'm the one who couldn't save her…I had her in my hands, damn it!"  
"绫波…" 真嗣轻声说道。"你不在那里…是我没能救她…我曾握着她的手，该死！"

"But you tried." Ayanami kept going. "That's what matters."  
"但你尝试了。" 绫波继续说道。"这才是最重要的。"

The First Child could hear him snicker. "Rei…You either succeed, or you fail. It doesn't matter if you try. It's the end result that matters." He shook his head, though she couldn't see it.  
第一适格者能听到他在窃笑。“丽……你不是成功，就是失败。尝试与否并不重要。重要的是结果。”他摇了摇头，尽管她看不见。

"I do not think so. As long as you try, then there's nothing you should be sorry for."

Shinji shook his head and sneered. Oh he had been trying. He had been trying so hard for so long to the extent he couldn't even remember where it all started from. The red beach was the last place he saw her.  
真嗣摇了摇头，冷笑一声。哦，他一直在尝试。他努力了那么久，久到连一切开始的地方都记不清了。他最后一次见到她是在红海滩。

"If your roles were reversed, would you have blamed her? If she failed to save you, would you think of it as her fault?"  
"如果角色互换，你会怪她吗？如果她没能救你，你会认为是她的错吗？"

Shinji could feel his eyes go wide at her question. He looked down at his black leather school shoes, contemplating his response. Chuckling, he started. "Well, of course not…"  
真嗣听到她的问题，眼睛不由得睁大了。他低头看着自己黑色的皮鞋，思考着如何回答。轻笑一声，他开口道："“当然不会……”"

"Then I suppose we've reached a mutual understanding."  
"那么我想我们已经达成了共识。"

The state of an argument short when arguing with Ayanami was something Shinji had a hard time dealing with. Perhaps her straightforwardness and impeccable reasoning were indeed inherited from another planet.  
与绫波争论时总是很快陷入僵局，这让真嗣难以应对。或许她的直率和无可挑剔的逻辑，确实是从另一个星球继承而来的。

Still, it didn't help with the fact that Asuka was not coming back.  
尽管如此，这并不能改变明日香还未回来的事实。

Or was she? 还是说她并非如此？

"Could the Lance of Longinus help?"  
“朗基努斯之枪能帮上忙吗？”

Gendo Ikari's collected voice snapped him out of his black hole of thoughts. Raising an eyebrow, Shinji smashed his fist into his other palm. "Right!" He exclaimed. How came the Slayer of Gods didn't cross his mind? Maybe he had been through the same event so many times his brain only followed a set pattern instead of coming up with new ideas. "We can use the Lance to kill the Angel and get her out!"  
源渡源堂的声音突然响起，将他从思绪的黑洞中拉了出来。眉毛一挑，真嗣一拳击在另一只手掌上。“对啊！”他喊道。怎么没想到那位弑神者呢？或许是因为经历了太多次同样的场景，他的大脑只会遵循固定的模式，而无法产生新的想法。“我们可以用长枪杀死使徒，把她救出来！”

He needed to make sure of it…before he could do anything.  
他需要确认这一点……才能采取任何行动。

主能量供应系统：外部

驾驶着二号机的驾驶员眨了眨眼。无限能量？外部供给？她的脐带电缆确实丢失了，这一点她很确定。那么这些能量究竟是从何而来？

美里挑了挑眉。明日香主动要求事情，如此罕见，她觉得简直可以在日历上用一颗大红星标记这一天，更别提态度还这么好了。不过，她并不打算抱怨。如果她的年轻队员们想要一点私人时间，她对此毫无异议。“当然，我会在外面等。十分钟对你来说够吗？”

随着一声嘶嘶声，病房门紧紧关闭。明日香立刻抓住了伸治放在她床单上的双手，紧紧握住，仿佛铁钳一般。“伸治……”她轻声开口，声音温柔而轻盈。“我……我以为再也见不到你了……”她哽咽着，伪装成一声叹息。

伸治温柔地握紧她的手，毫不在意自己的手可能会被捏伤。“明日香……我以为我失去了你……倒计时归零后，我几乎要崩溃了。”他直视着她的眼睛，依然觉得那双蓝色眼眸在不言中能表达如此多的情感，令人着迷。“你……你是怎么逃出来的？”

是惣流女士吗？他需要知道这一切。

As much as Shinji trusted her to tell him the truth, he found her experience surreal. Not the dream part, but her EVA had infinite power left. It couldn't be Kyoto, otherwise she would've told him, considering they already talked about their mothers.

那会是什么呢？

她被放在唇边的一根手指止住了话语。“明日香...此刻已是完美无缺。你无需急于求成，我明白你对我的感情。”他露出了温暖的笑容。“能再次见到你，真好，明日香。”

"It's good to be back, too, Baka-Shinji," Asuka spoke in a tender voice.  
“能回来真好，笨蛋真嗣，”明日香用温柔的声音说道。

"Now, let's not make our guardian wait any longer, shall we?" Shinji stood up, though keeping their hands still in contact. "Do you want me to go home and make you something special, or do you want me to wait for you here?"  
“现在，我们别让监护人等太久，好吗？”真嗣站起身来，尽管他们的手依然紧握。“你想让我回家给你做点特别的，还是在这里等你？”

Asuka grinned. "I'd rather have a welcome home feast ready when I get there," at the moment her stomach growled in protest. Blushing, she continued, "I'll be looking forward to it!"  
明日香咧嘴一笑。"我更希望回家时有一顿欢迎宴等着我，"此时她的肚子咕噜抗议起来。她脸一红，继续说，"我可是很期待的！"

"Yes, ma'am." "遵命，女士。"

XXXXXX

It was about eleven o'clock in the night when Misato's routine binge drinking started to show its true colors. Unable to hold back her urinating desire anymore, Misato got up from her bed lazily and opened her bedroom door before turning on the lights in the living room.  
大约晚上十一点，美里惯常的酗酒行为开始显露出其真实面目。再也抑制不住尿意的她，懒洋洋地从床上爬起，打开卧室门，随后打开了客厅的灯。

"Ohhh…" Misato stumbled toward the bathroom. "Huh?" Still under the heavy influence of alcohol, she couldn't really make out the sight in front of her clearly – Asuka slid open her own bedroom's door, her eyes puffy and blurred. She wore a rather flimsy nightgown that faintly revealed the undergarments under it, carrying a thin sheet designed for the hot summer night.  
“哦……”美里跌跌撞撞地走向浴室。“嗯？”酒精的强烈影响下，她无法清晰地辨认眼前的景象——明日香拉开自己卧室的门，双眼浮肿模糊。她穿着一件相当单薄的睡裙，隐约透出里面的内衣，手里还拿着一条薄薄的床单，专为炎热的夏夜准备。

"Asuka?" Misato couldn't help but ask as the redhead slid the door close.  
“明日香？”美里忍不住问道，只见红发少女将门轻轻合上。

The said girl raised an eyebrow. Her drowsy mind failed to process why Misato was awake at this time of the day. "… Can't sleep…" She mumbled half to herself, not being able to distinguish between reality and illusions.  
那女孩挑了挑眉。她昏昏欲睡的头脑无法理解为什么美里会在这种时候醒来。“……睡不着……”她喃喃自语，半是对自己说，分不清现实与幻觉。

The effect of alcohol had just subsided a little. Misato curled her four fingers, thumbs-backward pointing behind her. "It's okay…you can sleep in my-"  
酒精的影响刚刚消退了一些。美里蜷起四根手指，拇指向后指向她身后。“没事的……你可以睡在我的……”

However Asuka walked straight to Shinji's room before Misato even started speaking, her movements were so skilled it didn't look like it was the first time she'd done this at all.  
然而，还没等美里说完，明日香就直接走向了真嗣的房间，她的动作如此熟练，看起来完全不像是第一次这么做。

"…Room…" Asuka had already entered Shinji's room and shut off the door when Misato let out her final word.  
“…房间…” 在美里说出最后一个字时，明日香已经进入了真嗣的房间并关上了门。

"Eh?" Misato shook her head. About two seconds later, the meaning of Asuka's actions reached the conscious brain. A confused Pen-Pen walked out of Misato's bedroom, attracted by the bright light, and joined Misato together staring at Shinji's bedroom door.  
“诶？” 美里摇了摇头。大约两秒后，明日香的行为意义才传达到她的意识中。被明亮的灯光吸引，困惑的企鹅 Pen-Pen 从美里的卧室走出，与美里一起盯着真嗣的卧室门。

Misato blinked, pretty sure she just saw something that was not there. "They… they've always been like this for these days?"  
美里眨了眨眼，确信自己刚刚看到了不该存在的东西。“他们…这些天一直这样吗？”

Pen-Pen nodded, waving his wings in a particular fashion.  
Pen-Pen 点了点头，用翅膀做了一个特别的动作。

"They've done much more?!" Misato failed to contain her volume.  
“他们做了更多？！”美里没能控制住自己的音量。

Pen-Pen nodded again. Pen-Pen 再次点了点头。

"Wha-" Misato tried her best to sort out the turmoil of thoughts in her head, then rushed into the bathroom after dawning horror of realization struck her.  
“什——”美里竭力整理着脑海中纷乱的思绪，随即在意识到可怕真相的瞬间冲进了浴室。

## *Chapter 25*: Chapter 25: Interlude II  
*第 25 章*：第 25 章：间奏 II

**Chapter 25: Interlude II: Calm Before the Storm  
第二十五章：间奏 II：风暴前的宁静**

"Misato…" Asuka tried again, her voice was a perfect mix of exasperation and resignation. Shinji sat beside her on the couch, their hands together in a tight grip. "We didn't have sex, no matter what you're imagining!"  
“美里…” 明日香再次尝试，她的声音完美地融合了恼怒与无奈。真嗣坐在她旁边的沙发上，两人的手紧紧相握。“我们没有发生关系，不管你在想象什么！”

"Asuka, I could understand it when you needed…assistance," Misato carefully chose her words, not wanting to stir up painful memories. "But now? What's the reason for you two sleeping together?"  
“明日香，当你需要…帮助时，我能理解，”美里小心翼翼地选择措辞，不想勾起痛苦的回忆。“但现在呢？你们俩睡在一起的理由是什么？”

"How about that we're together, satisfied?" Asuka barked, raising their clasped hands for her to see. "Now you can have Kaji for all I care!"  
"瞧我们这样在一起，满意了吧？" 明日香嚷道，举起他们紧握的手让她看。"现在你可以尽情拥有加持，我才不在乎呢！"

"Wha-you brat, there's nothing - awww damn it," Misato conceded; Asuka smirked in triumph. Messaging her temple, the lavender-haired woman continued, "you two are just cute together. I'm happy for you, really. However, sleeping together? How would you convince me that you would never do stupid things under the heat of a moment?" She didn't find any condoms or pills in the trashcan - she didn't know whether it should make her relieved or worry.  
“什-你这小鬼，没什么——哎呀该死，”美里无奈地承认；明日香得意地笑了。轻敲自己的太阳穴，紫发的女子继续说道，“你们俩在一起真是可爱。我真为你们高兴，真的。但是，睡在一起？你怎么说服我你们不会在激情时刻做出蠢事？”她没在垃圾桶里找到避孕套或药片——她不知道这该让她松一口气还是担忧。

"Misato… we've been…sleeping in the same bed, sometimes hers, sometimes mine, for a long while. Just to keep the loneliness away. And we still… hadn't done anything you wouldn't approve yet. What makes you think we will?" Shinji interjected. "We might be teenagers, but we're responsible."  
"美里…我们一直…轮流睡在彼此的床上，有时是她的，有时是我的，已经很久了。只是为了驱散孤独。而我们仍然…还没有做过任何你不会同意的事情。你凭什么认为我们会呢？" 真嗣插话道。"我们可能是青少年，但我们是有责任心的。"

"Damn right," Asuka followed, conveniently ignoring the first thing she tried to do after they officially became together. "We're not like you, indecent adults! I'm still a prim and proper young lady!"  
"没错，" 明日香接着说，顺带忽略了他们正式在一起后她试图做的第一件事。"我们不像你们这些不检点的成年人！我仍然是个端庄得体的年轻女士！"

Misato silently cursed at her own obliviousness. "But…this is too dangerous. I just…" Her gaze fell. "I just don't want you to repeat my path. Okay, few rules," she raised her hand, her fingers spread. "First, no sex is allowed in my apartment!" She ticked off her thumb. "Second, you can sleep together, but with the door open," she ticked off her index finger; Asuka's expression turned from surprised to dejected once again. "Third, you can go on dates, but come back home before ten." She ticked off another finger.  
美里默默地咒骂自己的迟钝。“但是……这太危险了。我只是……”她的目光低垂。“我只是不想你们重蹈我的覆辙。好吧，几条规矩，”她举起手，手指张开。“第一，我的公寓里不允许发生性行为！”她弯下拇指。“第二，你们可以一起睡，但门必须开着，”她弯下食指；明日香的表情从惊讶转为沮丧。“第三，你们可以约会，但必须在十点前回家。”她又弯下一根手指。

Asuka sighed. "Rest assured, Misato. We will follow the rules…and take things slower. If you still have doubts, you can always ask Dr. Akagi to give me physicals, right? She will know about…my condition."  
明日香叹了口气。“放心吧，美里。我们会遵守规则……并且放慢节奏。如果你还有疑虑，随时可以请赤木博士给我做体检，对吧？她会了解我的……状况。”

"Right. Speaking of which…" Misato snapped her fingers. "Ritsuko said she wanted to give you a thorough examination today."  
“对。说到这个……”美里打了个响指。“律子说今天想给你做个彻底的检查。”

"WHAT?!" Asuka exclaimed. "But I just had one!"  
"什么？！" 明日香惊呼。"但我刚刚才喝了一瓶！"

Misato shrugged. "We can never be too careful. No one knows what could happen to your body after 19 hours of constant exposure to LCL."  
美里耸了耸肩。"我们永远不能太过小心。没人知道你的身体在连续 19 小时暴露于 LCL 后会发生什么。"

"Fine!" Asuka pouted. "好啦！" 明日香噘着嘴说道。

XXXXXX

"Are you fucking kidding me? There's still more after this?!"  
"你他妈的在逗我吗？这之后还有？!"

The redheaded hurricane swept across the hallway of NERV despite the weather forecast saying otherwise. Major Katsuragi, unfortunately, stood at the right front quadrant of the storm, taking the worst hit. Rubbing her ears, she said, "Now, now Asuka, calm down. The Human Instrumentality Committee insists that you have a few words with them. They have power over us, so we can't really do anything about it. I've told them about your condition. They've consented to keep it short."  
尽管天气预报并非如此，红发飓风还是席卷了 NERV 的走廊。不幸的是，葛城美里少校正好站在风暴的前端，承受了最猛烈的冲击。她揉着耳朵说道：“好了，好了，明日香，冷静点。人类补完委员会坚持要你和他们谈几句。他们有权有势，我们也没办法。我已经向他们说明了你的情况。他们同意尽量简短。”

"Whatever…just get this over with," Asuka growled in annoyance. Energy bars and mineral water weren't exactly the feast she's been looking forward to, and the fact that she'd been denied Shinji's cooking for even longer didn't help, if not making the anxiety worse. "Where?"  
"随便吧……赶紧结束这事儿，"明日香恼怒地咕哝着。能量棒和矿泉水远非她期待的大餐，而且被剥夺了更长时间享受真嗣的料理，这不仅没有缓解，反而加剧了她的焦虑。"去哪儿？"

"In the teleconference room. Just upstairs." Misato answered. "Follow me."  
"在视频会议室。就在楼上。" 美里回答道，"跟我来。"

"Right on your heels." Asuka made a pouty face and followed along. The NERV hallway was busy, to say the least, after the attack of the eleventh Angel, designated Leliel. Technicians and officers jogged past the duo without so much as courteous greetings.  
"紧随其后。" 明日香做出一副赌气的表情，跟了上去。NERV 的走廊在第十一使徒 Leliel 袭击后，至少可以说是忙碌不堪。技术人员和官员们匆匆从两人身边跑过，连基本的礼貌招呼都顾不上。

The door of the teleconference room slid open, Asuka shivered as a wave of cold air washed through her. The room was dark with six seats that surrounded a table lighted by different colors, though there were no holograms of their interrogators present, only the blonde Doctor of Project E stood in the corner of the room with a notepad in her hands.  
会议室的门缓缓滑开，一股寒气袭来，让明日香不禁打了个寒颤。房间内昏暗，六把椅子环绕着一张被不同颜色灯光照亮的桌子，尽管没有审讯者的全息影像，只有金发的 E 计划博士站在房间角落，手里拿着笔记本。

Asuka tried to maintain her poker face with the visible effort since the eeriness of the environment was freaking every one of her nerves out. Major Katsuragi, on the other hand, seemed to be much calmer as if she had been here many times before. A beam of light from overhead shined on them; an ancient voice sounded. "Pilot Soryu, when you were absorbed into the Angel, did it try to communicate with you in any means?"  
明日香努力维持着扑克脸，周围环境的诡异让她每一根神经都紧绷着。葛城美里少校则显得镇定许多，仿佛已经来过这里多次。一束光线从头顶照射下来，一个古老的声音响起：“Soryu 驾驶员，当你被使徒吸收时，它是否尝试以任何方式与你沟通？”

The pilot of Unit 02 gulped; the voice sounded like sawing trees to her, making her cringe. As much as she wanted to yell at those people for wasting her time that would've been spent with Shinji, she still needed to show some courtesy to those… higher-ranking officers? "No, sir. I do not remember such an occurrence. Everything is fuzzy when the life support ran out."  
02 号机驾驶员咽了口唾沫；那声音对她来说就像锯木头一样刺耳，让她不禁皱眉。尽管她很想对那些人发火，指责他们浪费了她本可以和真嗣在一起的时间，但她仍需对那些……高级军官保持一定的礼貌。“没有，长官。我不记得有这样的事。生命维持系统失效后，一切都变得模糊不清。”

"That is if you remember correctly," another voice sounded.  
“那只是如果你记得正确的话，”另一个声音响起。

"Dr. Akagi's examinations detected none of outside tampering with her memories," Misato threw a glance at the said woman, who looked like she was taking notes.  
"赤木博士的检查并未发现她的记忆有外部篡改的痕迹，" 美里瞥了一眼那位正在做笔记的女性。

"The AC recorder of Unit 02 ceased functioning not long after the absorption. So we can't confirm it." The voice was becoming increasingly annoyed. "How can we know whether the Angels were interested in human minds?"  
"二号机的外部记录器在吸收后不久就停止工作了。所以我们无法确认。" 声音变得越来越不耐烦。"我们怎么知道使徒是否对人类的心灵感兴趣？"

"No offense, but we can't answer that," Misato said resignedly. "We don't even know whether or not they have their own minds, let alone understand humans."  
"无意冒犯，但我们无法回答这个问题，" 美里无奈地说。"我们甚至不知道它们是否有自己的心智，更别提理解人类了。"

The members decided to change the subject since they knew they were not getting anywhere with this determined Major. "Do we know whether the eleventh Angel is related in anyways with the next one?"  
成员们决定换个话题，因为他们知道在这个坚定的少校面前毫无进展。“我们是否知道第十一使徒与下一个有什么关联？”

"Negative. From the past patterns, the Angels never showed any sign of coordination."  
“否定。从过去的模式来看，使徒从未表现出任何协同迹象。”

"Right, they had been acting on their own." The voice said, "at least until now."  
“对，它们一直各自为战。”那个声音说道，“至少到目前为止。”

Misato's eyebrows raised. What were they implying by that statement? Would Angels attack in coordination in the future? It was already hard enough to fight one Angel at a time, facing two at once? Or even more? She didn't dare to imagine how that would turn out. "Excuse me…What did you mean by that?"  
美里眉头一挑。他们这话是什么意思？难道使徒将来会协同攻击？本就难以一对一应对，同时面对两个？甚至更多？她不敢想象那会是什么局面。“请问……您这话是什么意思？”

"This is irrelevant to you. Now leave."  
“这与你无关。现在离开。”

Misato shrugged and tapped Asuka on the shoulder, who nodded and followed her out of the room. This place was creepy that she didn't want to stay here any longer.  
美里耸了耸肩，轻拍明日香的肩膀，后者点头后跟着她离开了房间。这个地方阴森森的，她不想再待下去了。

As the duo left the room, Dr. Akagi's dark eyes kept tracking the slender form of the redhead until they disappeared behind the door. From the throughout physical and mental examination given to the redhead, she couldn't even find a minuscule amount of anomaly. Ritsuko dreaded she was an imposter created by the Angel, and the fact that Unit 02 literally broke the first law of thermodynamics didn't help  
当两人离开房间时，赤木律子的深邃目光始终追随着红发少女纤细的身影，直到她们消失在门后。从对红发少女进行的全面身心检查来看，她甚至找不到一丝一毫的异常。律子担心她可能是使徒制造的冒牌货，而二号机实际上打破了热力学第一定律的事实更是雪上加霜。

From theories, EVAs could go berserk and act on their own free will. However, when Unit 02 came out, the pilot was in total control. Ritsuko narrowed her eyes further. As for the AC recorder being dysfunctional…she checked the hard disk of the recorder after the battle, but all the data was gone. The data wasn't _damaged_ or _deleted; it_ was more like…_formatted._  
根据理论，EVA 可能会发狂并自行其是。然而，当二号机出现时，驾驶员完全掌控了局面。律子眯起眼睛更深地思索。至于 AC 记录器的故障……她在战斗后检查了记录器的硬盘，但所有数据都消失了。数据既未损坏也未被删除；更像是……被格式化了。

Did Asuka format the data by herself? Ritsuko sighed. There were still so many things she didn't know about the EVAs, and she intended to find out.  
是明日香亲自整理的数据吗？律子叹了口气。关于 EVA，她还有太多未知，而她决心要一探究竟。

XXXXXX 翻译文本：XXXXXX 翻译结果：XXXXXX

"We're home…" came a tired voice from the front door of the apartment, followed by rustling sounds of two pairs of shoes slipping off.  
“我们回来了……”公寓前门传来疲惫的声音，紧接着是两双鞋子脱下的窸窣声。

"Welcome home!" Shinji shouted from the kitchen. "Dinner's almost ready!"  
"欢迎回家！" 真嗣从厨房喊道，"晚饭快好了！"

"Almost? What took you so long?" Asuka questioned. "It's been almost two hours, right? I was hoping to have-" She trailed off and went mouth agape as she set her eyes on the content on the dining table.  
“差点？怎么花了这么久？”明日香质问道，“都快两小时了，对吧？我还指望能——”她话音未落，目光落在餐桌上的内容时，嘴巴张得大大的。

It was a German feast. Nothing like one or two German dishes she had been expecting.  
这是一场德国盛宴。与她之前预期的那种一两道德国菜完全不同。

"Shinji…" She started, suddenly feeling guilty scolding him before. "Did…did you make all of this? For me?"  
“真嗣…”她开口道，突然为自己之前的责备感到内疚。“你…你做了所有这些吗？为了我？”

"Of course, who else would I do this for?" Shinji replied, picking up the last dish and headed to the dining area. "C'mon. You might want to hurry before it gets cold."  
“当然，除了你我还能为谁做这些呢？”真嗣回答，端起最后一道菜走向餐厅。“快来吧。趁热吃，别等凉了。”

Asuka had to blink away the hotness that suddenly surged up the corner of her eyes. No one had ever done anything like this for her ever before, not even her momma. "Thank you, Baka-Shinji." Smiling a warm smile that could make at least two people's hearts flutter, she sat down beside the table and dug in.  
"明日香不得不眨眼驱散突然涌上眼角的灼热感。从未有人为她做过这样的事，就连妈妈也没有。“谢谢你，笨蛋真嗣。”她露出一个温暖的微笑，足以让至少两个人的心为之颤动，随即坐到桌旁，开始享用。”

"Awww, adorable isn't it," Misato blabbed happily as she beheld the pleasant scene.  
"“哇，真可爱，不是吗？”美里开心地赞叹着，目睹这温馨的场景。”

"Asuka, your birthday is next Sunday, right?" Shinji's inquiry came to her.  
"明日香，你的生日是下周日，对吧？" 真嗣的询问传到了她耳中。

Asuka swallowed her mouthful of food before raising her eyes to look at Shinji. "Actually, yeah," she replied after a few seconds of ponderings. Damn, if not for him reminding her, she couldn't even remember her own birthday since she had never had one ever since her mother died and her enrollement into the Evangelion Program.  
明日香咽下口中的食物，抬起眼眸看向真嗣。"其实，是的，"她沉吟几秒后回答。该死，要不是他提醒，她甚至记不起自己的生日，自从母亲去世并加入福音战士计划以来，她从未真正庆祝过生日。

"Are you going to throw a surprise party for your sweetheart, hmm?" Misato winked.  
"你打算给你的心上人办个惊喜派对吗，嗯？" 美里眨眼道。

"Well…" “嗯……”

"Shinji," Asuka interjected in a firm voice. "You…" Her tone turned softer as she continued. "You've done enough for me. I want to reciprocate. How about this?" She rubbed her chin. "On my birthday, you will take me out on a date, but _I_ will be the one planning. This way, we can both enjoy my birthday, while I can also do something for you!"  
"真嗣," 明日香坚定地插话道。"你……"她的语气变得柔和起来，继续说道。"你为我做的已经够多了。我想回报你。这样如何？"她摩挲着下巴。"在我生日那天，你带我出去约会，但由我来策划。这样，我们都能享受我的生日，同时我也能为你做点什么！"

Shinji pondered for a moment. Even though he was almost certain he could plan the date better than her since he had more experience, especially when compared to Asuka's non-existent-if-not-only-theoretical knowledge on the subject of matter, she was making a valid point. Knowing how proud she was, completely pampering her in a relationship wouldn't benefit her mentality. She needed to confirm that she had her own place in this relationship, and it's necessary.  
真嗣沉思了一会儿。尽管他几乎可以肯定自己能比她更好地策划这次约会，毕竟他的经验更丰富，尤其是与明日香在这方面的非存在性——如果不是仅限于理论知识的话——相比，她的提议确实有道理。知道她有多骄傲，完全在关系中宠溺她并不利于她的心态。她需要确认自己在这种关系中有自己的位置，这是必要的。

"Sure, I'll see what the great Asuka Langley Soryu has for me!"  
"当然，我倒要看看伟大的惣流·明日香·兰格雷有什么安排给我！"

"Just you wait, Shinji. I'm sure our date will blow your mind." Asuka smirked, her usual haughtiness returning to her voice. "I tried to ask you out for a date before, but you had other business to attend to that time. This time, though, you don't get to escape from it!"  
“你就等着吧，真嗣。我敢肯定我们的约会会让你大吃一惊。”明日香得意地笑了，她那惯有的傲慢语气又回来了。“我之前想约你出去，但你那时有别的事要忙。这次，你可逃不掉了！”

Misato watched her charges with satisfaction and amusement, feeling proud that her parenting approach finally started to bear fruit.  
美里满意而有趣地看着她的孩子们，感到自豪，因为她的育儿方法终于开始见效了。

Commander Ikari sat in the middle of the circle of monoliths in his standard pose, covering his mouth with his folded hands and using the reflection from his glasses to hide his eyes. Not that he needed to hide his features, though, as everything the Committee was weighing on him had no bearing on him.  
碇司令以他标准的姿势坐在石碑圈的中央，双手合十遮住口部，利用眼镜的反光隐藏双眼。虽然他并不需要隐藏自己的表情，毕竟委员会所施加的压力对他而言并无实质影响。

"The prototype of the Dummy Plug System is not quite meeting our expectations," SEELE 01 growled deeply; impatience radiated from his husky voice. "Our trust in you is running thin."  
“Dummy Plug 系统的原型机未能达到我们的预期，”SEELE 01 低沉地咆哮道，粗哑的声音中透出急躁。“我们对你的信任正在减弱。”

Not that he actually trusted Gendo in the first place.  
倒不是说他一开始就真的信任源堂。

"Computers would never be as good as human pilots," Gendo huffed.  
"“计算机永远比不上人类飞行员。”源渡哼了一声。”

"Irrelevant." SEELE 03 snapped. "What we need is stability, not acrobatic skills!"  
"无关紧要。" SEELE 03 厉声道。"我们需要的是稳定，不是杂技技巧！"

"Regardless, that's the best we've got so far." Staring straight ahead, Gendo Ikari spoke. "The development of Dummy Plug System is a delicate process. We need more time and resources."  
"无论如何，这是我们目前最好的方案。" 碇源堂直视前方说道。"Dummy Plug 系统的开发是一个精细的过程。我们需要更多的时间和资源。"

"Our schedule is seriously delayed!" SEELE 05 interjected, his voice on fire. "You're here only because we have a use for you, keep that in mind!"  
"我们的计划严重滞后了！" SEELE 05 插话道，声音中带着怒火。"你能在这里只是因为我们有用得着你的地方，记住这一点！"

"Of course." A faint smirk appeared on his face, hidden behind his clasped hands. From his son, he learned that the Dummy Plug System was mainly used in the MP EVAs. Delaying its development would definitely impede their construction process, which would likely buy them more time.  
"当然。" 他脸上掠过一丝淡淡的微笑，隐藏在紧扣的双手之后。从他儿子那里，他得知 Dummy Plug 系统主要用于 MP EVA 中。推迟其开发无疑会阻碍他们的建造进程，这很可能会为他们争取更多时间。

Now it seemed his plan was starting to take effect.  
现在看来，他的计划似乎开始见效了。

"Do we have any updates on Units 03 and 04?" Gendo Ikari started again.  
“03 和 04 号机有什么新进展吗？”碇源堂再次问道。

"We still want to hold onto them a bit longer," SEELE 07 replied. "Tests aren't yet concluded."  
“我们还想再保留它们一段时间，”Seele 07 回答道，“测试尚未完成。”

Even though he didn't say it out loud, Gendo still saw his true intentions through his mask. Evangelions were the ultimate war machines of humanity, as a world superpower, it's comprehendible that the United States would want to have one or two of them under its belt. He wasn't going to make it easy for them, though. "I need more Evangelions to fight the Angels. Make it quick."  
尽管他没有明说，碇源堂仍透过他的面具看穿了他的真实意图。EVA 是人类的终极战争机器，作为世界超级大国，美国想要拥有一两台也是可以理解的。但他不会让他们轻易得逞。"我需要更多的 EVA 来对抗使徒。尽快完成。"

"You already have three perfectly working Units," SEELE 07 shot back. "Why do you need more?"  
"你已经有三台功能完好的 EVA 了，" SEELE 07 反驳道，"为什么还需要更多？"

"True, but we all know Unit 01 and Unit 00 are…necessary," Gendo retorted. "I need more expandable Units. During the last sortie, we almost lost Unit 02 and its pilot. Better safe than sorry." Of course, he would never let the old men know the importance of the Second Child, or he could risk SEELE blackmailing him.  
"确实，但我们大家都知道零号机和初号机是……必要的，" 碇源堂反驳道，"我需要更多可扩展的 EVA。在上一次出击中，我们差点失去了二号机及其驾驶员。宁可备而不用，也不要用而无备。" 当然，他绝不会让那些老头子知道二号适格者的重要性，否则他可能会面临 SEELE 的威胁。"

"Still-" "尽管如此-"

"Transfer Unit 03 to NERV Headquarters," SEELE 01 cut him off. "One Evangelion is enough for the North American branch to delve into."  
"将 03 号单位转移至 NERV 总部，" SEELE 01 打断了他。"北美分部研究一台 EVA 已经足够了。"

"As far as I'm concerned, Unit 03 doesn't have a pilot, correct?" Commander Ikari probed. Knowing that Unit 03 was possessed by the Angel from Shinji, while he only needed working EVAs, turning it down would be the only logical course of action. "I demand Unit 04 to be transferred along with its test pilot."  
"就我而言，03 号机没有驾驶员，对吧？" 碇司令试探道。他知道 03 号机被真嗣体内的使徒侵占，而他只需要可用的 EVA，拒绝接收是唯一合理的做法。"我要求将 04 号机及其试飞员一并转移过来。"

"Fine." SEELE 07 conceded, "Prepare to receive Unit 04 and the test pilot on Saturday."  
"好吧。" SEELE 07 让步道，"准备在周六接收 04 号机和试飞员。"

"Understood." With that, the holograms of the monoliths faded into the darkness, the lights lit up moments later. Gendo Ikari unclasped his hands, standing up from his seat. Fixing a gaze at the image of the Tree of Life imprinted on the roof of his office, he smirked, tasting his small victory.  
"明白了。" 随着话音落下，那些巨石的全息影像逐渐消失在黑暗中，片刻后灯光亮起。碇源堂松开双手，从座位上站起身来。他凝视着办公室天花板上印着的生命之树图像，嘴角勾起，品味着这场小小的胜利。

"Yo, Shin-man, why are you grinning like an idiot?" The Jock Stooge probed as he came back from the cafeteria, carrying several hotdogs and a soda drink. "Did you fall in love or something?"  
"哟，真嗣，你笑得像个傻子似的，怎么回事？" 体育生跟班从自助餐厅回来，手里拿着几根热狗和一瓶汽水，好奇地问道，"你是不是恋爱了？"

Snapping back to reality, Shinji shook his head and fixed a gaze at his friend that questioned his sanity. "Drop it, alright?" In fact, he was just happy that Asuka came out of Leliel unharmed, so he couldn't help but grin as he was zoning out. He just solved…well, _went through_ an unprecedented deviance yet managed to not fuck it up.  
回过神来，真嗣摇了摇头，用一种质疑朋友理智的眼神盯着他。“别提了，好吗？”实际上，他只是很高兴明日香从雷里尔毫发无损地出来了，所以在走神时忍不住笑了。他刚刚解决了一个前所未有的偏差，但幸好没有搞砸。

"Shin-man, did she…" Kensuke threw a sideways glance at the Red Devil, who was walking toward them but still having a distance, and whispered into Shinji's ear. "Did she get you whipped or something?"  
“真嗣，她是不是……”健介斜眼瞥了一眼正朝他们走来但还有一段距离的红发恶魔，低声对真嗣耳语道。“她是不是把你驯服了还是怎么的？”

Shinji sighed in exasperation. He had always found Kensuke and Toji's endless interest in his personal life annoying. "It's not that. She almost got hurt during the last Angel attack. I'm just happy that she's okay." He executed his technically accurate statement.  
真嗣无奈地叹了口气。他一直觉得健介和东治对他个人生活的无尽兴趣很烦人。“不是那样的。她上次在对抗使徒时差点受伤。我只是很高兴她没事。”他给出了一个技术上准确的说法。

"Sure, just let us know if you need help!" Toji hid his mouth behind his hand in a vain attempt to block the sound waves that traveled through the air. "Remember, we're-"  
"当然，需要帮忙就告诉我们！" 冬二用手掩住嘴，试图阻挡声波在空气中传播，"记住，我们是——"

"Whatcha talkin' about, stooges?" Came redheaded jump-scaring voice that literally made Toji and Kensuke jump from their spot. "You'd better not be speaking ill of me behind!"  
"你们这帮家伙在说什么呢？" 一个红头发的声音突然出现，吓得真治和健介从座位上跳了起来。"你们最好别在背后说我坏话！"

"Hi Asuka, here's your lunch," Shinji took out a gracefully packed-up bento box from his school bag. "It's a new recipe I found out recently."  
"嗨，明日香，这是你的午餐。" 真嗣从书包里拿出一个精心包装的便当盒。"这是我最近发现的新食谱。"

The redhead accepted the bento box with an appreciative smile; Kensuke and Toji raised their eyebrows. "Thanks," she added, eliciting increasingly confused looks from the two stooges.  
红发女孩带着感激的微笑接过便当盒； Kensuke 和 Toji 挑起了眉毛。“谢谢，”她补充道，这让两个跟班越来越困惑。

Their expression turned utterly horrified as Asuka sat down beside Shinji's spot, the routine seat for them.  
当 Asuka 坐在 Shinji 旁边的位置上时，他们的表情变得完全惊恐，那是他们惯常的座位。

"Why are _you_ sitting here, Soryu?!" Toji exclaimed in shock, starting to gather attention from their classmates. "This is _my_ spot!"  
“你为什么坐在这里，Soryu？！” Toji 震惊地喊道，开始引起同学们的注意。“这是我的座位！”

"What, I choose my own seat to eat, how is this any of you monkeys' business?" Asuka said back, though her hands didn't stop unpacking her dearest lunch. "Besides, you can just go eat with Hikari."  
“什么，我选个自己的座位吃饭，关你们这些猴子什么事？”明日香回嘴道，手上的动作却没停，继续拆着她最珍爱的午餐。“再说了，你们可以去找光吃饭啊。”

Toji choked and waved his hand viciously, declaring how he wanted nothing to do with the pigtailed dictator with red ears. "But…you usually eat with the class rep, why change now?" Kensuke asked in bewilderment, glancing at the said brunette, who was chatting with other girls.  
剑介被呛得直摆手，红着耳朵宣称自己绝不想和那个扎马尾的独裁者扯上关系。“但是…你通常不是和班长一起吃的吗，怎么现在改了？”真嗣困惑地问道，目光瞥向正在和其他女生聊天的棕发女孩。

"I…" Asuka pondered for a moment. While the school didn't know about their newly officialized relationship yet, she didn't exactly have a problem with her classmates knowing about it. In fact, she wanted to announce to the whole school that he was hers and she was his, elite EVA pilots who saved the city more than once.  
“我…”明日香沉思片刻。虽然学校还不知道他们新近确立的关系，但她并不介意同学们知晓。事实上，她想向全校宣布，他是她的，她是他的，他们是多次拯救城市的精英 EVA 驾驶员。

The only thing keeping her from revealing their in-love status was Misato's obliviousness, but now that they were exposed to her as well, she saw no reason to hold back anymore. "Well, Shinji's just a pleasantly enjoyable company. Do you have any problem with that?"  
唯一让她没有公开他们恋爱状态的原因是美里的一无所知，但现在他们也被她发现了，她觉得没有理由再隐瞒了。"嗯，真嗣只是个令人愉快的伴侣。你对此有什么问题吗？"

"Enjoyable company?" Muttering to himself, Toji blinked in confusion, still too dense to get the meaning behind the curtain.  
"愉快的伴侣？" 东治喃喃自语，困惑地眨了眨眼，仍然迟钝得无法理解幕后的含义。

Kensuke, on the other hand, had a dawning horror swept across his face. "Wait…are you…what exactly do you mean?"  
而另一边，健介的脸上逐渐浮现出惊恐之色。“等等……你是……你到底是什么意思？”

Asuka pouted. Are they seriously that oblivious? Just as she was about to shake it off and enjoy her lunch, from the corner of her eyes, she could see several girls looking in their direction – or more precisely, at Shinji, with promising looks.  
明日香撅起了嘴。他们真的那么迟钝吗？正当她准备抛开这些，享受午餐时，眼角余光瞥见几个女生正朝他们这边看过来——更确切地说，是盯着真嗣，脸上带着意味深长的表情。

She clenched her fists in irritation. As an elite EVA pilot and a great cook who made his own bentos as well as Ayanami's and Soryu's, he was considered a hot catch for girls in the school. Even though he had always been polite in declining their offers to have lunch together, his courtesy and mannerism only increased his prominence.  
她紧握双拳，感到一阵恼火。作为一名精英 EVA 驾驶员和一位出色的厨师，他不仅自己制作便当，还为绫波和惣流准备，因此在校园里被视为抢手的男生。尽管他总是礼貌地拒绝与她们共进午餐的邀请，但他的礼貌和举止反而增加了他的魅力。

Now it was Asuka's chance to claim him properly, in front of everyone.  
现在轮到明日香在众人面前正式宣称对他的所有权了。

"Of course he's the most enjoyable company here. He's my boyfriend, after all." She said it in a loud yet not disturbing volume, making sure people surrounding them could hear her demonstrative announcement.  
“当然，他在这里是最令人愉快的伙伴。毕竟，他是我男朋友。”她以一种响亮但不扰人的音量说道，确保周围的人都能听到她的宣示性声明。

Just as she expected, the whole class fell silent in an eye blink.  
正如她所料，整个班级在眨眼间陷入了沉默。

"What?" Asuka asked innocently. "Why making that face?" Seeing no reactions from her classmates whatsoever, she decided to take the more direct yet somewhat shameful approach.  
“什么？”明日香天真地问道，“为什么做那个表情？”看到同学们毫无反应，她决定采取更直接但有些羞耻的方法。

Before Shinji could even protest, he was pulled into a kiss. He wasn't going to resist, though. Asuka's forceful yet effective way of claiming him was no stranger to him, and he enjoyed it himself immensely.  
在真嗣还没来得及抗议之前，他就被拉入了一个吻。不过，他并不打算反抗。明日香那种强势却有效的方式宣告对他的占有，对他来说并不陌生，他自己也乐在其中。

The two of them quickly drowned into their own worlds to the extent the explosive chatter that rippled through the classroom didn't disturb them the slightest.  
两人很快沉浸在自己的世界里，以至于教室里此起彼伏的喧闹声丝毫没有打扰到他们。

After a minute or so, Asuka reluctantly pulled away from the kiss. "Any questions?"  
大约一分钟后，明日香不情愿地从亲吻中抽离。“有什么问题吗？”

"I thought I was joking about the married couple thing…" Toji, unable to close his mouth, mumbled in utter disbelief.  
“我以为我开玩笑说我们是夫妻的事…” 无法合上嘴的冬二喃喃自语，完全不敢相信。

"Man, the devil actually got you whipped…" Said Kensuke in shell shock.  
“天哪，你居然被那家伙制得服服帖帖……”健介震惊地说道。

In the distance, Asuka could see Hikari giving her a thumbs-up and a schoolgirl grin. She smiled back – if not for her - however unintentional - interference, Asuka wasn't sure if she could get what she had now.  
远处，明日香能看到光子向她竖起大拇指，脸上带着女学生的笑容。她也回以微笑——如果不是光子无意中的介入，明日香不确定自己是否能得到现在的一切。

The sound of footsteps on the grated floor of the catwalk echoed throughout the darkened hangar as Chairman Keel walked alongside Morthur Argan, the official representative of SEELE from the United States. His facial features definitely spoke about his abundant experience in political maneuvers.  
脚步声在昏暗的机库中回荡，主席基尔与来自美国的 SEELE 官方代表莫瑟·阿尔根并肩走在格栅地板的走道上。他的面部特征无疑透露出他在政治策略上的丰富经验。

Wasting no to arrive in Germany, aside from that the United States demanded explanations from Keel about his decision regarding his arrangement of Unit 04 - which could be done using telecommunication, he also wanted to inspect the development process of the MP EVAs, something the Committee held high expectations with.  
毫不拖延地抵达德国，除了美国要求基尔就其对 04 号机安排的决定给出解释——这可以通过电信方式进行，他还想亲自检查 MP EVA 的开发进程，委员会对此寄予厚望。

The United States, being a major financial and resource supporter of the construction of the MP EVAs as well as the operational expenditure of NERV in general, required good reasons to continue their funding that could be used on – say, infrastructure and medical system, instead of the money-blackhole that was Human Instrumentality Project.  
美国作为 MP EVAs 建设以及 NERV 整体运营支出的主要财务和资源支持者，需要充分的理由来继续其资助，这些资金本可以用于——比如基础设施和医疗系统，而非投入那个无底洞般的人类补完计划。

"So this is the…prototype of the EVA series?" Argan's eyes settled on the white behemoth in front of him. The outline resembled that of a human skeleton, save for the narrowed ribcage and the oddly shaped head. Argan traced his eyes over its featureless head, and even with a lack of aesthetic detail, he was still able to make out one telltale part of its visage that sent shivers down his spine. It had a sick, twisted smile.  
“所以这就是……EVA 系列的……原型机？”Argan 的目光落在了他面前的白色巨人身上。其轮廓类似于人类骨骼，除了收窄的胸腔和奇异的头形。Argan 的视线掠过其无特征的头部，尽管缺乏美学细节，他仍能辨认出那令人脊背发凉的面部特征——一个病态扭曲的微笑。

"Correct. Though, we've encountered…minor drawbacks. The S2 engine is still underdeveloped, and we'll require more money and resources to keep up with the schedule." Keel let out a sigh. Dr. Katsuragi's S theory, no matter how detailed, was still purely theoretical. Without a live sample of the S2 engine, Germany had a real hard time creating such a physics-law-breaking power source.  
“没错。不过，我们遇到了……一些小问题。S2 引擎仍处于未成熟阶段，我们需要更多的资金和资源来跟上进度。”Keel 叹了口气。Katsuragi 博士的 S 理论，无论多么详尽，终究只是理论。没有 S2 引擎的活体样本，德国在创造这种打破物理定律的动力源方面确实遇到了巨大困难。

Argan took another glance at the fearful appearance of the EVA before speaking up. "No offense, but I doubt the public opinion in America will favor such designs."  
阿甘又瞥了一眼 EVA 那令人畏惧的外观，然后开口道：“无意冒犯，但我怀疑美国公众的意见不会支持这样的设计。”

"Irrelevant." Keel snorted. "This has nothing to do with the public, anyway."  
“无关紧要。”基尔冷哼一声，“反正这与公众无关。”

"But we need the support of the House and the Senate!" Argan raised his volume, exasperated by Keel's lack of awareness of politics in the US. "If the voters don't buy it, no one in the Congress will stand by our side anymore! You can't seriously be oblivious to that, can you? People pay more taxes because we tell them only EVAs can beat the Angels, not to let you build these ugly machines!"  
“但我们需要众议院和参议院的支持！”阿甘提高了音量，对基尔对美国政治的无知感到恼火，“如果选民不买账，国会里就没人会站在我们这边了！你不会真的对此一无所知吧？人们多交税是因为我们告诉他们只有 EVA 能打败使徒，不是让你造这些丑陋的机器！”

Of course he was aware. Keel could be said as one of the most politically influenced people in the world. "That's why I told the Nevada Branch to transfer Unit 04 to Japan." Keel smirked as he saw the quizzical expression on Argan's face. Compared to Keel, Argan was still too young and naïve. "What are the EVAs for, ambassador?"  
"他当然清楚。可以说，基尔是世界上受政治影响最深的人之一。“所以我才让内华达支部把 04 号单位转移到日本。”基尔看到阿尔根脸上的困惑表情，不禁露出了一丝得意的笑容。与基尔相比，阿尔根还是太年轻、太天真了。“EVA 是用来做什么的，大使？””

"Like I said, to defeat the Angels?" Argan probed.  
“就像我说的，为了击败使徒？”Argan 试探性地问道。

Keel chuckled, shaking his head. "Their perceived use…could be different to their real use." He fixed his gaze on the terrifying mouth of the MP EVA Unit. "Say, after all of the Angels are defeated…what the public would think of the EVAs?"  
Keel 轻笑一声，摇了摇头。“他们所认为的用途……可能与实际用途大相径庭。”他凝视着 MP EVA 单位那令人胆寒的巨口。“比如说，在所有使徒都被击败之后……公众会如何看待 EVA 呢？”

Argan's mouth widened slightly as dawning realization hit him. He knew the end of the Angel Wars would be the Third Impact, but the public didn't. "So…we spread Japan threat theory, that they want more EVAs because Japan wants to wage wars against them after the Angel Wars? Then we raise our tax rate because we need more EVAs to defend ourselves?"  
Argan 的嘴角微微上扬，恍然大悟。他知道使徒战争的终结将是第三次冲击，但公众并不知情。“所以……我们散布日本威胁论，说他们想要更多 EVA 是因为日本想在使徒战争后对他们发动战争？然后我们提高税率，因为我们需要更多 EVA 来保卫自己？”

Keel nodded in satisfaction. "I'll leave the details to you."  
基尔满意地点点头。“细节就交给你处理了。”

XXXXXX

## *Chapter 26*: Chapter 26: Transparency  
*第 26 章*: 第 26 章：透明度

"That was a hell of a bolt," the copilot hissed, still frightened by the intensity of the lightning.  
"那真是一道可怕的闪电，"副驾驶低声说道，仍被雷电的强度吓得不轻。

"Relax. This plane is designed to take much worse." The captain remarked. "See, the systems are getting back to normal."  
"放松。这架飞机设计得能承受更糟糕的情况。"机长评论道。"看，系统正在恢复正常。"

"We should've waited for the thunderstorm to dissipate before we take off," the copilot said.  
"我们应该等雷暴消散后再起飞，"副驾驶说。

"It's not our decision. NERV values punctuality."  
"这不是我们能决定的。NERV 重视准时。"

"Let's just get this over with. Increasing the altitude to forty thousand feet."  
"赶紧把这事搞定吧。增加高度到四万英尺。"

Under the transport plane, the eyes of Unit 04 dimmed.  
在运输机下，04 号机组的眼睛暗淡了下来。

XXXXXX

"How rare of you coming out with us, Shinji," said Kensuke happily as he walked along with Shinji and Toji from school. "I thought you'd spend all your time with the Red-err Soryu-san."  
“你居然会跟我们一起出来，真难得啊，真嗣，”健介高兴地说，他和真嗣、东治一起从学校走出来。“我还以为你会整天和红——呃，惣流同学在一起呢。”

Shinji smiled. Indeed he preferred spending more time with Asuka, especially now that they're together, but today Asuka went shopping with Hikari for cosmetics and accessories. She clearly stated that she didn't want him to tug along since she wanted to surprise him for their date tomorrow. "Well, I finally get out from the Devil's grasp."  
真嗣笑了笑。确实，他更喜欢和明日香在一起，尤其是现在他们在一起了，但今天明日香和光去买化妆品和饰品了。她明确表示不想让他跟着，因为她想在明天的约会中给他一个惊喜。“好吧，我终于从恶魔的掌控中解脱出来了。”

"Hey Shinji," Kensuke lowered his voice into a near-whisper, a tone Shinji knew all too well. "I heard Unit 04 is coming to Japan?"  
"嘿，真嗣，" 健介压低了声音，近乎耳语，这种语调真嗣再熟悉不过了。"我听说 04 号机要来日本了？"

"Wait, where'd you hear that from?" Shinji inquired.  
"等等，你从哪儿听说的？" 真嗣问道。

"My father. He's a technician at NERV," Kensuke smirked. "Anyway, do you know who the pilot is?"  
"我爸。他在 NERV 做技术员，" 健介得意地笑了笑。"话说回来，你知道驾驶员是谁吗？"

"I think they're sending us one from America," Shinji replied with a shrug.  
"我想他们是从美国派了一个过来。" 真嗣耸了耸肩回答道。

Kensuke's face promptly fell in disappointment. "Damn, I hoped they could let me be the pilot!" In fact, this time, Shinji actually thought about making Kensuke or Toji as the pilot of Unit 04, the Fourth Child. It's not like there was an Angel in there. He'd never met this new pilot from America ever before since the pilot would always vanish in the Nevada incident. Even though fighting Angels could be dangerous, Shinji wanted at least someone he could trust fighting by his side. "Man, it's really cool to be a pilot, isn't it?"  
健介的脸立刻露出了失望的神情。"该死，我本以为他们能让我当驾驶员呢！" 实际上，这次真嗣真的考虑过让健介或东治担任四号机，即第四适格者的驾驶员。反正那里也没有使徒。他从未见过这位来自美国的新驾驶员，因为对方总会在内华达事件中消失。尽管与使徒战斗可能很危险，但真嗣至少希望能有一个他信任的人与他并肩作战。"伙计，当驾驶员真的很酷，不是吗？"

"You might change your mind after fighting an Angel." So saying, Shinji threw a glance at the Jock on his other side, who was checking his newest lottery.  
"你可能会在和使徒战斗后改变主意。" 说着，真嗣瞥了一眼他旁边的体育生，那人正在检查他最新的彩票。

"Tch, I didn't win anything this time." Toji huffed and threw the lottery aside.  
“啧，这次什么都没中。” 真嗣哼了一声，把彩票扔到了一边。

XXXXXX

Bathing in the pale yellow light of the setting sun, Shinji paced his way back to the apartment after breaking up with Toji and Kensuke from the arcade. Asuka should be back at home very soon - making her wait for food to eat would be beyond cruel, especially when she just came back from some shopping trip with loot.  
沐浴在夕阳淡淡的黄光中，真嗣从游戏厅与东治和健介分手后，缓步走回公寓。明日香应该很快就会回家了——让她饿着肚子等饭吃实在是太残忍了，尤其是她刚从购物之旅满载而归。

As he walked past the building that was the Geofront entrance area, a particular person captured his attention. He had blond curls and pale skin, so Shinji could easily classify him as a foreigner. Though foreigners were not a rare sight in Tokyo-3, an international fortress metropolis, the fact that he just came out of the Geofront still intrigued him.  
当他走过地底都市入口区域的那栋建筑时，一个特别的人吸引了他的注意。那人有着金色的卷发和苍白的皮肤，真嗣一眼就能判断出他是外国人。虽然在这个国际化的堡垒都市第三新东京市，外国人并不罕见，但他刚从地底都市出来这一点，还是引起了真嗣的好奇。

The blond boy seemed to be reading a pile of documents of sorts. He raised his head and saw Shinji, then looked back and forth between him and the paper. "Shinji Ikari, the Third Child, right?"  
金发男孩似乎正在阅读一堆文件之类的东西。他抬起头，看到了真嗣，然后在他和文件之间来回打量。“碇真嗣，第三适格者，对吧？”

"Who are you?" Shinji said without confirming his own identity.  
“你是谁？”真嗣没有确认自己的身份。

"Oh, I am the candidate of the Fourth Child," his Japanese was a bit crooked but recognizable nonetheless.  
“哦，我是第四适格者的候选人，”他的日语有些生硬，但仍然可以辨认。

"I see. I am the Third Child, Shinji Ikari, pleased to meet you," Shinji replied in a courteous voice. After countless cycles of redoing, he finally met the original test pilot for Evangelion Unit 04 in person, who had always been sucked into the sea of Dirac and never came out when the activation of the S2 engine on Unit 04 gone wrong.  
"我明白了。我是第三适格者，碇真嗣，很高兴见到你，" 真嗣礼貌地回答。经历了无数次的重复，他终于亲自见到了原本的 EVA 四号机测试驾驶员，那位在四号机 S2 引擎启动失败时被卷入狄拉克海、从未归来的人。

His first impression of the boy was guilty. After all, every time he knew the Nevada incident would happen, but he couldn't do anything except watch. "So, I hear the activation test will take place tomorrow?" The arrangement still annoyed him a little since it was the day when he and Asuka would have their date, but since this time Unit 03 was still in America, he deemed it wouldn't be too much of a deal.  
他对那男孩的第一印象是愧疚。毕竟，每次他知道内华达事件会发生，却除了旁观什么也做不了。“所以，我听说启动测试将在明天进行？”这个安排仍让他有些不快，因为那本是他和明日香约会的日子，但由于这次三号机还在美国，他觉得应该不会太成问题。

"Right." The Fourth Child replied nonchalantly. Shinji narrowed his eyes as he recognized the documents he was reading – they were he, Asuka, and Rei's personal files. Even though everyone who worked in NERV had access to these files – the ones without too many details of their background information – he still felt a bit uncomfortable seeing others reading them, especially Asuka's. "Say, are the girls here all so pretty and hot?" Speaking, the Fourth Child scanned up and down Rei's profile picture, then Asuka's.  
"好吧。" 第四适格者漫不经心地回答。真嗣眯起眼睛，认出了他正在阅读的文件——那是他和明日香、绫波的个人档案。尽管在 NERV 工作的每个人都能接触到这些文件——那些没有太多背景细节的档案——他仍然感到有些不自在，尤其是看到别人阅读明日香的档案时。"话说，这里的女孩都这么漂亮又火辣吗？" 说着，第四适格者上下打量着绫波的档案照片，然后是明日香的。

A slight scowl crept up Shinji's face. He didn't like his attitude, at all. Asuka was needless to say, and now even Rei, whom he considered his half-sister, was being objectified as well, and this time by a pilot - whom he had to work together with from now on.  
真嗣的脸上掠过一丝不悦。他一点也不喜欢这种态度。明日香自不必说，现在甚至连他视为半个妹妹的绫波也被物化了，而且这次是一个他今后必须与之合作的驾驶员。

"I've never known people can have blue hair before. Did she dye her hair or something? I like it," the Fourth Child smirked.  
"我以前从不知道有人能拥有蓝发。她是染的吗？我喜欢。" 第四适格者得意地笑了。

"Her name is Rei Ayanami, I consider her as my cousin," Shinji lowered his voice, getting close to the _known_ direction.  
"她叫绫波零，我当她是我的表妹，" 真嗣压低了声音，靠近已知的方向。

"Is that so? You wouldn't mind me dating her, would you?" The Fourth Child, apparently displeased by his tone, starting to add a note of threat and arrogance in his voice. "Hmm…how about this one with red hair? She looks hot. I wonder how she looks like in her plugsuit," the Fourth Child licked his lips.  
"是吗？你不介意我追求她吧？" 第四适格者显然对他的语气感到不悦，开始在话语中加入一丝威胁和傲慢。"嗯……那个红头发的呢？她看起来很火辣。不知道她穿上插入栓服会是什么样子，" 第四适格者舔了舔嘴唇。

"She's my girlfriend." Shinji's voice started to drift into a familiar tone.  
"她是我的女朋友。" 真嗣的声音开始带上了熟悉的语调。

Truth to be told, the Fourth Child visibly shivered under the suffocating pressure. However, as a veteran womanizer for his age, he stood up to the challenge. "It only makes it more exciting, am I correct? How about I date both of them?"  
说实话，第四子在令人窒息的压力下明显颤抖。然而，作为一个与他年龄相符的情场老手，他迎难而上。“这只会让它更加刺激，我说得对吗？不如我同时追求她们两个？”

"Try me." “试试看。”

The Fourth Child felt his blood temperature decreasing as Shinji's freezing voice swept through him. Shinji Ikari's Absolute Zero Degree Beam Cannon shot out from his eyes, a look only twelve most evil people in the world could endure. He didn't necessarily need to threaten the Fourth Child, though, knowing who Rei was and who Asuka was. Still, if he wanted to play that game, Shinji would as well.  
第四子感到自己的血液温度随着真嗣冰冷的声音而下降。碇真嗣的绝对零度光束炮从他的眼中射出，这种眼神只有世界上十二个最邪恶的人才能承受。不过，真嗣并不一定需要威胁第四子，他知道绫波是谁，也知道明日香是谁。尽管如此，如果他想玩这个游戏，真嗣也会奉陪。

"Tch. I w-will," the Fourth Child maintained his breaking down composure with visible effort.  
“啧。我、我会，”第四子努力维持着即将崩溃的镇定，显得十分吃力。

Shinji chuckled, retracting his looks. He almost felt bad executing such an attack that was saved for his father on a 14-year-old boy who was also a pilot, who could be a great helping hand in the final battle against SEELE.  
真嗣轻声笑了出来，收回了自己的目光。对一个同样是驾驶员的 14 岁男孩使用这种本应留给他父亲的攻击手段，他几乎感到有些内疚，这个男孩在最终对抗 SEELE 的战斗中本可以成为得力的帮手。

Almost. 差不多了。

XXXXXX

In recent times, Asuka Langley Soryu often found herself under a particular state of mind – daydreaming about the incoming events, mainly caused by the anticipation of the time she and Shinji would be spending together later. As of today, such anticipation grew to a peak since it was her birthday and they were going to have their first date, and Asuka had promised to knock his socks off with it.  
近来，惣流·明日香·兰格雷常常发现自己处于一种特殊的心境中——幻想着即将到来的事件，主要是因为她对即将与真嗣共度的时光的期待。到了今天，这种期待达到了顶峰，因为今天是她的生日，他们将迎来他们的第一次约会，明日香承诺要让这次约会精彩到让他难以忘怀。

Of course, no perfect day was without its flaws.  
当然，没有哪一天是完美无缺的。

"Hey guys, please meet the candidate for the Fourth Child." Major Katsuragi's courteous voice floated to her. Throwing a side-way glance at the boy standing beside the Major, Asuka cringed as she recognized the look he was giving to her and Rei Ayanami. It was a look she knew all too well – a perverted leering gaze, trying to tear off your clothes through pure willpower.  
“嘿，大家请见见第四适格者。”葛城美里礼貌的声音飘入她的耳中。斜眼瞥向站在美里旁边的男孩，明日香皱眉认出了他投向她和绫波零的目光。那是一种她再熟悉不过的眼神——一种猥琐的窥视，试图仅凭意志力就剥去你的衣物。

Asuka suppressed a wave of nauseous feelings that surged up from her stomach. Knowing that she probably needed to work with him while wearing _plugsuits_ in the foreseeable future didn't help, if not making it worse.  
明日香强压下胃里涌起的恶心感。知道在可预见的未来可能需要和他一起穿着插入栓服工作，这不仅没有帮助，反而让情况更糟。

Damn it. Shinji would never look at her this way – he looked at her with love, not lust. Not to mention Shinji was much more handsome than him. Speaking of whom, they had a date today. Oh yeah, she had it well-planned. They would go to the cinema first, then if they still had enough time-  
该死。真嗣永远不会这样看她——他看她时带着爱意，而非欲望。更别提真嗣比他英俊多了。说到真嗣，他们今天有约会。哦对，她已经计划好了。他们先去看电影，然后如果时间还够——

"…Asuka! Pay attention!" Major Katsuragi's annoyed voice snapped her out of her train of thoughts. "It's the third time you've spaced out today. I don't know what's going on behind the beautiful face of yours but could you please at least focus for now?!"  
"…明日香！专心点！" 葛城美少校不悦的声音将她从思绪中拉回。"今天你已经是第三次走神了。我不知道你那张漂亮的脸蛋背后在想些什么，但至少现在请你集中注意力好吗？！"

"Ah, sorry," Asuka blurted out. "I just have a lot on my mind."  
"啊，抱歉，" 明日香脱口而出。"我只是脑子里事情太多了。"

Misato exhaled an exasperated sigh. "Well, now it's your turn to introduce yourself."  
美里叹了口气，显得有些无奈。"好吧，现在轮到你自我介绍了。"

"Oh right." Asuka cleared her throat. "I'm Asuka Langley Soryu." She said on autopilot. "Are we done here? When can w-I leave?"  
"哦，对了。" 明日香清了清嗓子。"我是惣流·明日香·兰格雷。" 她机械地回答。"我们完了吗？我什么时候可以离开？"

"Why such a hurry?" Misato probed.  
"为什么这么急？" 美里追问道。

"How about I have a date waiting for me? Is that a good enough reason for you?" Asuka said back, a bit annoyed, not noticing the raised eyebrows from the Fourth Child.  
"比如我有个约会等着我？这个理由够充分吗？" 明日香有些不耐烦地回道，没注意到第四适格者挑起的眉毛。

"Fine. If you want, you can leave now. Just…" Misato rubbed her chin. "I'm going to Matsushiro today with our new pilot for the activation test of Unit 04. I'm probably gonna be away from home for a few days, so I'll ask Kaji to look after you, he'll come tonight. Don't do anything I would disapprove of at home, alright?"  
"好吧。如果你愿意，现在就可以走了。只是……" 美里揉了揉下巴。"我今天要和新驾驶员一起去松代进行 04 号机的启动测试。我可能要离家几天，所以我会让加持来照顾你，他今晚过来。别在家里做任何我会不高兴的事，好吗？"

The Fourth Child narrowed his eyes. Apparently, the redhead lived together with the Third Child. He could only imagine the unmentionable stuff they must've been doing on their own. Damn.  
第四适格者眯起了眼睛。显然，红发女和第三适格者住在一起。他只能想象他们私下里一定在做些不可描述的事情。该死。

"Alright, alright." Asuka turned around and grabbed Shinji's wrist, who offered no resistance whatsoever and was dragged along. "Let's go Shinji. We have a long day ahead of us."  
"好了，好了。" 明日香转过身抓住真嗣的手腕，真嗣毫无反抗地被拉着走。"走吧，真嗣。我们今天还有很长的一天要面对。"

With the pair gone from the meeting room, only Misato, Rei, and the Fourth Child were left. "Well, surely we've got some beauties here," the Fourth Child started, throwing a wink at Rei. "Rei Ayanami, correct?"  
随着那两人离开了会议室，只剩下美里、绫波和第四适格者。“好吧，我们这里肯定有不少美人呢，”第四适格者开口道，向绫波眨了眨眼。“你是绫波零，对吧？”

Rei Ayanami looked intently at the Fourth Child. From her objective analysis, he was moderately handsome, even a bit manly, much more mature-looking than other boys at his age. "Yes?" She replied with her usual monotone.  
绫波零专注地看着第四适格者。从她的客观分析来看，他算是英俊的，甚至有些男子气概，比同龄的其他男孩看起来要成熟得多。“是的？”她以一贯的平淡语调回应道。

"I'm new here. Could you please show me around this…labyrinth?" The Fourth Child smiled a smile that could be easily labeled as seducing.  
"我是新来的。你能带我参观一下这个……迷宫吗？" 第四子微笑着，那笑容很容易被贴上诱惑的标签。

"No." Rei's response came out clean and neat.  
"不行。" 丽的声音干净利落。

"Why?" The Fourth Child frowned a little.  
"为什么？" 第四子微微皱眉。

"Because I am an undateable subject."  
“因为我是个不适合约会的对象。”

The Fourth Child blinked in surprise. How come this looking quiet and cultivated girl had such a sharp tongue? And how was she so insightful? Having abundant knowledge dealing with girls, the Fourth Child wouldn't submit just yet, though. "I wasn't trying to date you. Maybe we can just be friends, right?"  
"第四个孩子惊讶地眨了眨眼。这个看起来文静有教养的女孩怎么说话这么尖锐？她又怎么如此洞察人心？尽管对处理女孩们的事颇有经验，第四个孩子还不打算就此认输。“我并不是想和你约会。或许我们可以只是做朋友，对吧？””

"No. You're not interesting." Her voice decreased by several degrees, if that was even possible for her. "Only if I'm ordered to, then I will." Finished speaking, Rei turned around from him and promptly left the room with delicate footsteps, leaving a wholly defeated Fourth Child in the room.  
"“不。你不够有趣。”她的声音又降了几度，如果这还有可能的话。“只有被命令了，我才会这么做。”说完，丽转身离开了他，轻盈地走出房间，留下一个彻底败下阵来的第四个孩子在屋内。”

Misato watched the whole scene with amusement, though her identity wouldn't allow her to laugh just yet. "Alright, let's go. People at Matsushiro wouldn't be too happy if we're late."  
"美里饶有兴致地看着这一切，尽管她的身份还不允许她笑出声。“好了，我们走吧。如果迟到，松代的人可不会太高兴。””

XXXXXX

Under the cerulean sky and scattered white clouds, Shinji and Asuka hand in hand walked along the busiest pedestrian street in the middle of Tokyo-3's commercial district. Since their newly acquired relationship was already public, Asuka spent every second she could to hold his hand, seeking reassurance.  
在蔚蓝的天空和零星的白云下，真嗣和明日香手牵手走在东京-3 商业区最繁忙的人行街道上。自从他们新建立的关系已经公开，明日香尽可能每分每秒都紧握他的手，寻求安心。

After years after years of being alone, she wouldn't let this trusting and loving company away from her any more than absolutely necessary.  
经历了多年的孤独，她再也不愿让这份信任与爱的陪伴离她而去，除非绝对必要。

"Seriously Asuka, a horror movie for a date?" Shinji chuckled, his voice half-amused, half-exasperated. It wasn't that he was afraid of horror movies, but the fact that Asuka practically used him as a punching bag when jump-scare happened, considering the combat training she received, was not a pleasant experience for him.  
“说真的，明日香，约会看恐怖片？”真嗣轻笑，语气半是玩笑半是无奈。倒不是他害怕恐怖片，只是明日香在遇到惊吓场面时几乎把他当成了出气筒，考虑到她接受的战斗训练，这对他来说可不是什么愉快的体验。

And he got a few bruises on his thigh to prove it.  
他的大腿上因此多了几处瘀伤作为证明。

To Shinji, Asuka's appearance today wasn't too much different than her normal looks, save for the missing A-10 hair clips that got replaced with ordinary bead-shaped ones. She wasn't wearing heavy cosmetics – not that she wouldn't look divine even though she didn't – much to Shinji's surprise.  
对真嗣来说，今天明日香的外表与平时并无太大差别，除了那对被普通珠形发夹取代的 A-10 发夹。她没有浓妆艳抹——尽管她即便不化妆也美得令人惊叹——这让真嗣颇为意外。

Maybe their introduction to the Fourth Child interrupted their plans? Shinji shook the thoughts off. Asuka, no matter what state she was in, always looked pretty to him. The fact that you're staring at the sun in different weathers, whether sunny, cloudy, or even foggy, didn't change the fact that you're staring at the sun, the brightest thing you can look at in your life.  
也许他们对第四适格者的介绍打乱了他们的计划？真嗣摇了摇头，抛开这些念头。无论明日香处于何种状态，在他眼中总是那么美丽。就像你在不同的天气里凝视太阳，无论是晴天、阴天还是雾天，都不会改变你凝视的是生命中最明亮的存在这一事实。

The clothes she was wearing weren't new to him as well – a simple sundress with scattered patterns on it. For once he asked her why she didn't wear the green dress she used to wear for the date Hikari had set her up with, Asuka said she only wore it when she didn't care about how she looked like.  
她身上的衣服对他来说也并不陌生——一件简单的碎花太阳裙。有一次他问她，为什么不再穿那件她曾为光安排的约会而穿的绿色裙子，明日香回答说，只有在她不在乎自己外表的时候才会穿那件。

"Baka, don't tell me you were afraid of…a little tone shift, because I certainly wasn't," Asuka huffed, still being too proud to admit her…insignificant slip of composure.  
“笨蛋，别告诉我你害怕……一点点语调变化，因为我绝对不怕，”明日香哼了一声，仍然过于骄傲，不愿承认她那微不足道的失态。

"Oh well, better hurry up. It's almost one-thirty," Shinji said after taking a glance at his wristwatch. "You've got our spot reserved, right?"  
“哦，好吧，最好快点。已经快一点半了，”真嗣瞥了一眼手表后说道，“你已经帮我们预订了位置，对吧？”

"Of course," Asuka held her head high, her nose pointing up to the sky. "My planning skills are impeccable."  
"当然，" 明日香昂首挺胸，鼻尖直指天空。"我的策划能力无可挑剔。"

"Is that so?" A smirk crossed Shinji's face. "Then why did you keep losing to me in chess? Not to mention-"  
"是吗？" 真嗣的脸上掠过一丝得意的笑。"那你为什么在国际象棋上总是输给我？更别提——"

Suffering mild physical damage was something Shinji had already gotten used to while being overly cheeky in front of Asuka, so when his back was pressed against the wall, his panic vanished as quickly as it came. "Since it's my birthday, I don't particularly feel like murdering anybody today," she hissed, the beautiful grin on her face contrasting the sharp tone. "Consider yourself lucky, Third."  
轻微的身体伤害对真嗣来说已是家常便饭，尤其是在明日香面前过于放肆时。因此，当他的背紧贴着墙壁，恐慌如潮水般迅速退去。"既然今天是我的生日，我今天特别不想杀人，"她低声咆哮，美丽的笑容与尖锐的语气形成鲜明对比。"算你走运，三号。"

A long while ago, Shinji's first reaction would be to apologize, which had been proven problem-inducing and Asuka-enraging. Pushing back and friendly banters were always fun, especially when they were together. "I could never wish to be luckier, having you by my side."  
很久以前，真嗣的第一反应总是道歉，这已被证明是问题重重且让明日香暴跳如雷的。反击和友好的斗嘴总是很有趣，尤其是当他们在一起时。"有你在身边，我别无所求，已是最大的幸运。"

And yeah, sweet-talking was another skill he had mastered, though it usually wouldn't work on the torrent of pride that was Asuka.  
确实，甜言蜜语是他掌握的另一项技能，尽管这通常对骄傲如洪流的明日香不起作用。

He could swear a gleam of surprise flashed in Asuka's eyes. "Hmph, I suppose you know your place." Blushing faintly, Asuka let go of Shinji and continued heading toward their destination.  
他敢发誓，明日香的眼中闪过一丝惊讶。“哼，我想你知道自己的位置。”明日香微微脸红，松开了真嗣的手，继续朝着目的地前进。

"Say, what do you think of our new pilot?" Shinji abruptly brought up, breaking the companionable silence between them.  
“话说，你觉得我们的新驾驶员怎么样？”真嗣突然提起，打破了两人间的友好沉默。

"New…what? Oh, you mean the _Fourth Child_? I almost forgot about it, if not for you mentioning it," The designation was spoken with loathing. Asuka rubbed her forehead and continued, "he…bleh, he looks at me funny, like those perverts in school. I can't believe I have to walk in front of his eyes wearing my plugsuit! What's his name again?"  
"新……什么？哦，你是说第四适格者？要不是你提起，我差点都忘了，" 这个称呼带着厌恶的语气。惣流揉了揉额头，继续说道，"他……呸，他看我的眼神很奇怪，就像学校里那些变态一样。我真不敢相信我得穿着插入栓服在他面前晃来晃去！他叫什么来着？"

"Nathan, I think," Shinji replied, his tone unreadable.  
"我想是内森吧，" 真嗣回答，语气难以捉摸。"

"Oh? Are you afraid of him being a competition?" Asuka winked at him, switching to a full-swing tone.  
"哦？你是不是怕他成为你的竞争对手？" 惣流朝他眨了眨眼，语气变得轻松起来。"

"Not really. Just curious."  
“不太算。只是好奇。”

"You shouldn't worry about it. You know that I'm yours." Asuka took his hand and gave it a gentle squeeze, sending bolts of electricity through his body.  
“你不必担心这个。你知道我是属于你的。”明日香握住他的手，轻轻一捏，让他全身如触电般颤动。

Shinji smirked. Oh, he knew that better than anyone - maybe only except Asuka herself.  
“真嗣微微一笑。哦，他比任何人都清楚这一点——或许除了明日香自己。”

In one of his earlier cycles, when he was still completely engulfed in the guilt and self-loathing of the terrible crime he committed against her, he tried to set her up with one guy in school he thought was able to give her happiness.  
在他早期的某个循环中，当他仍深陷于对她所犯下可怕罪行的愧疚与自我厌恶之中时，他试图撮合她和学校里他认为能给她带来幸福的某个男生。

_"Well it turns out he's really a cool guy." Asuka deadpanned, drinking a bottle of milk.  
“好吧，事实证明他确实是个很酷的家伙。”明日香面无表情地说，喝着一瓶牛奶。_

_"I'm glad you found someone, Asuka," Shinji smiled, though only carried a subtle hint of sadness in it.  
“我很高兴你找到了那个人，明日香，”真嗣微笑道，尽管笑容中隐约带着一丝哀伤。_

_"Indeed I have," Asuka stood up from the chair and grabbed a defenseless Shinji into a longing kiss. After pulling away from the intense make-out session, Asuka grinned like a cat that just ate a canary, "Annnd he's well within my reach, just a bit too stupid to see by himself."  
"确实如此，" 明日香从椅子上站起来，抓住无助的 Shinji 深深地吻了下去。从激烈的亲吻中抽身后，明日香像刚吃了金丝雀的猫一样得意地笑了，"而且他完全在我掌控之中，只是他自己有点太蠢看不出来罢了。"_

Shinji chuckled at the memory. Even though he didn't think he deserved her, he could still try and make her happy. "As long as you'll have me, Asuka, I'm yours as well."  
Shinji 想起这段记忆轻声笑了。尽管他不认为自己配得上她，但他仍会努力让她开心。"只要你不嫌弃我，明日香，我也属于你。"

XXXXXX

"Let the pilot into the entry plug." Dr. Mayumi's voice came from the PA system, echoing in the testing chamber. The candidate for the Fourth Child huffed and clipped the A-10 Neural Connectors on his hair.  
"让驾驶员进入插入栓。" 真弓博士的声音从 PA 系统中传来，回荡在测试室里。第四适格者的候选人气呼呼地将自己的头发夹上了 A-10 神经连接器。

Knowing how hunky and masculine he was, he was sure he could have a bunch of girls for him to date with when he arrived in Japan. In fact, back in the US, as a candidate for the pilot of Evangelions, he was already a fantasy for girls in his school, and he throughout enjoyed the attention by switching girlfriends as fast as he was required to take sync tests.  
深知自己身材魁梧、阳刚十足，他确信抵达日本后定能吸引一众女孩与他约会。事实上，在美国时，作为 EVA 驾驶员的候选人，他已是校内女生们的梦中情人，而他乐此不疲地频繁更换女友，速度之快堪比他进行同步测试的频率。

The Fourth Child punched the wall of the entry plug in annoyance. He thought he was lucky that the female pilots were all hot and pretty, but his first attempt went much worse than he imagined. 'You're not interesting?' How dare she say it to him? And the red-haired one…she didn't so much as take a straight look at him, like he was not even there.  
第四个孩子懊恼地一拳砸在插入栓的墙壁上。他本以为自己运气不错，女驾驶员们都火辣又漂亮，但他的初次尝试却比想象中糟糕得多。“你没意思？”她怎么敢这么对他说？还有那个红发女孩……她连正眼都没瞧过他，仿佛他根本不存在似的。

Growling in frustration, the Fourth Child stepped inside the entry plug and sat on his pilot seat. His charms had never failed to get attention from girls ever before, so why did those two make a difference? And how come the normal-looking Third Child claimed the redheaded tempest? What did he do to deserve that? He was more handsome, more manly, more mature-  
第四适格者懊恼地咆哮一声，踏入插入栓，坐在驾驶座上。他的魅力从未失效，总能吸引女孩们的注意，为何那两人却与众不同？那个长相平平的第三适格者又是如何赢得红发风暴的芳心？他究竟有何德何能？他更英俊，更阳刚，更成熟——

The Fourth Child shook the thoughts off. Nevertheless, he knew he still had ample time ahead of him to make moves on the girls after this boring activation test. Even if he wouldn't have a chance with the pilots, he still had many girls from the local school that he would be attending.  
第四适格者摇摇头，抛开这些念头。尽管如此，他知道在这次乏味的启动测试之后，他还有大把时间去追求那些女孩。即便无法与驾驶员们有所发展，他还有许多即将就读的本地学校的女生可供选择。

The Fourth Child huffed and closed his eyes.  
第四适格者哼了一声，闭上了眼睛。

"Begin activation. “开始激活。”

XXXXXX

Shinji sat on the couch as the TV in front of him played some old recorded music concert, the mixture of sounds produced by hundreds of different instruments flowed like a running stream, accompanied by the soft dripping sound coming from the bathroom.  
真嗣坐在沙发上，面前的电视播放着一些旧的音乐会录像，数百种不同乐器发出的混合声音如流水般流淌，伴随着浴室里传来的轻柔滴水声。

The day was hot, and both he and Asuka were soaked with sweat when they got home, and Asuka insisted he took a shower before her, for whatever reasons. In the original plan having dinner at a romantic restaurant was the last on the to-do list, but Asuka decided since they already had lunch together, she preferred to try some of his cooking for dinner.  
那天天气炎热，他和明日香回家时都汗流浃背，明日香坚持要他先洗澡，不管出于什么原因。原本计划中在浪漫餐厅共进晚餐是最后一项，但明日香决定既然他们已经一起吃了午饭，她更想尝试他做的晚餐。

Shinji wasn't going to complain, at all.  
真嗣一点也不打算抱怨。

Kaji had not yet been home, and Misato went to Matsushiro to supervise the activation test of Unit 04. Shinji lazily stretched on the couch, yawning. Finally, he could get some rest and not deal with the whole mess with Bardiel anymore, and he felt happy about it.  
加持还没回家，美里去了松代监督零四号机的启动测试。真嗣懒洋洋地躺在沙发上，打着哈欠。终于，他可以休息一下，不再理会巴迪尔那堆破事了，这让他感到高兴。

Even though this new Fourth Child was annoying, as long as he could help in the endgame, it was still a worthy trade-off for him.  
尽管这个新来的第四适格者很烦人，但只要最终能帮上忙，对他来说还是值得的。

"Asuka? Are you finished?" Shinji asked after he could no longer hear water running. "Should I start making dinner?"  
“明日香？你洗好了吗？”真嗣在听不到水声后问道，“我可以开始做晚饭了吗？”

No reply came. A slight frown spread across his face. Shinji stood up from the couch, heading to the kitchen. Just as he turned around the corner, though, a towel-wrapped redhead came into his field of view. "Ah, Asuka," Shinji's smile faded a bit as he saw the inscrutable expression on her face. "Asuka, are you alright?"  
没有回应。他眉头微皱。真嗣从沙发上起身，走向厨房。就在他转过拐角时，一个裹着毛巾的红发女孩进入了他的视线。“啊，明日香，”真嗣的笑容稍减，因为她脸上那难以捉摸的表情。“明日香，你还好吗？”

The redhead closed her eyes. Taking a deep breath, she spoke up. "Shinji, today I've had my best birthday so far, and I'm really happy. So, I want to do this for you…" She reopened her eyes, fixing her look with Shinji's, sapphire met cobalt. Shinji's eyes went wide a little as he recognized the familiar fire inside her eyes.  
红发女孩闭上了眼睛。深吸一口气，她开口了。“真嗣，今天是我迄今为止最棒的生日，我真的很开心。所以，我想为你做这件事……”她重新睁开眼，目光坚定地与真嗣对视，蓝宝石般的眼睛与深蓝相遇。真嗣的眼睛微微睁大，他认出了她眼中熟悉的火焰。

Before he could get the first syllable out, Asuka removed her towel and let it fall to the ground.  
在他能发出第一个音节之前，明日香解开了她的毛巾，任其掉落在地。

Shinji's jaw proceeded to do the same thing.  
真嗣的下巴也跟着做了一样的动作。

**Chapter 27: A flap of a butterfly's wings…  
第 27 章：蝴蝶振翅……**

Matsushiro had always been a quiet place after the Second Impact since most of its residents fled the area, leaving the site abandoned and barren – a perfect trait for NERV to pick up and use as an advantage to build the testing facilities.  
松代在第二次冲击后一直是个安静的地方，大多数居民逃离了该地区，留下了废弃和荒凉的景象——这对 NERV 来说是一个完美的特征，可以利用并作为优势来建造测试设施。

Today the silence was broken by the roaring of engines of VTOLs and transport vehicles as the activation test of the most expensive, destructive, and technologically advanced war machine was imminent.  
今天，寂静被 VTOL 和运输车辆的引擎轰鸣声打破，因为最昂贵、最具破坏力且技术最先进的战争机器的激活测试即将开始。

"Is the pilot ready?" Dr. Mayumi, the temporary assistant technician for Ritsuko, looked over at one of the techs sitting next to her. Gendo Ikari had ordered Akagi to stay at NERV HQ for classified causes; she had no reasons to question him. "The pilot is ready." He answered with a professional calm voice.  
“驾驶员准备好了吗？”作为临时助理技术员的真由美博士，看向坐在她旁边的一位技术人员。源堂命令赤木留在了 NERV 总部，出于某些机密原因；她没有理由质疑他。“驾驶员已准备就绪。”他以专业的平静声音回答道。

"Alright." The doctor nodded, looking back at her terminal before doing one more check of Unit 04's system, ensuring that everything was ready for the activation test.  
“好的。”医生点头，回头看向她的终端，再次检查了 04 号机体的系统，确保一切就绪，准备进行激活测试。

"Begin activation." The technicians started to carry out their various tasks, monitoring the EVA Unit as it came online. Its yellow eyes lit up, and the sound of various machines in the observation room began to beep and chirp as they took in the readings from the Evangelion's performance.  
“开始激活。”技术人员们开始执行各自的任务，监控着 EVA 单位上线。它的黄色眼睛亮起，观察室内的各种机器开始发出哔哔和啾啾声，记录着福音战士的表现数据。

"Synch level is rising." The technician sitting next to Mayumi announced. "The pilot is approaching the borderline threshold."  
“同步率正在上升。”坐在真弓旁边的技术人员宣布，“驾驶员正接近临界阈值。”

Misato walked up next to Mayumi and peered over her shoulder, watching as the synchrograph began to align and the red bars indicating the pilot's synch ratio started to light up.
