It took no time for them to receive word of Unit 04's ballistic state, as well as the complete destruction of the testing facility in Matsushiro. There was no word on the casualties, but they did have a positive ID on the rogue Evangelion.  
NERV 总部在眨眼间从闲散转为全面警戒。他们很快收到了关于 04 号机弹道状态的消息，以及松代试验设施被彻底摧毁的情况。关于伤亡情况尚无消息，但他们确实确认了失控的福音战士身份。

"It's pattern orange." Hyuga spoke, looking up at the giant screen being projected in front of the Command Center's front deck, showing the black EVA Unit slowly trudging its way through the hilly countryside, making its way towards Tokyo-3. "We can't tell if it's an Angel or not."  
"这是橙色模式。" 日向说道，抬头看着指挥中心前甲板上投射的巨大屏幕，画面中黑色的 EVA 初号机正缓慢地穿越丘陵地带，向东京-3 前进。"我们无法判断它是否是使徒。"

"Eject the plug." Commander Ikari ordered. Narrowing his eyes, he couldn't help but feel confused by the occurrence. Indeed, one of the EVA Units was an Angel, but it should be Unit 03 like Shinji had told him, right?  
"弹出插入栓。" 碇司令命令道。他眯起眼睛，不禁对这一情况感到困惑。确实，其中一台 EVA 是使徒，但应该是像真嗣告诉他的，是 03 号机，对吧？

"Plug ejection failed, something blocked it from ejecting," Maya reported.  
"插入栓弹出失败，有什么东西阻止了它弹出，" 伊吹报告道。"

"Unfortunate." Gendo huffed, sitting in his office looking down the command deck. He couldn't turn back time; he had all three EVAs facing one, he was confident this would only be a minor annoyance. "Identify Unit 04 as the twelfth Angel. Destroy it at all costs." His voice cold and firm.  
“不幸。” 源渡哼了一声，坐在办公室里俯视着指挥甲板。他无法逆转时间；他让三台 EVA 面对一个敌人，自信这只会是个小麻烦。“将 04 号单位识别为第十二使徒。不惜一切代价摧毁它。”他的声音冷酷而坚定。

"But the pilots' still inside, and alive," Makoto said. "We can still pick up his vital signs, however weak. We should…"  
“但驾驶员还在里面，还活着，”真希波说。“我们仍能接收到他微弱的 vital signs。我们应该…”

"Irrelevant," Gendo snapped at him. Only the Second Child and his son had to be protected under all conditions. "Destroying the Angel is our primary concern. The pilots' life is out of consideration. That is an order."  
“无关紧要，”源渡厉声打断他。只有二号适格者和他的儿子必须在任何条件下得到保护。“摧毁使徒是我们的首要任务。驾驶员的生命不在考虑范围内。这是命令。”

Inside Unit 01, Shinji was grasping his control yokes tightly. In fact, with his strength, the yoke was begging to crack. How did this happen? Wasn't Unit 03 the one infested by the Angel? Even though he had good knowledge of how to defeat them, he had to admit that he never knew where the Angels came from.  
在初号机内部，真嗣紧紧握住操纵杆。实际上，以他的力量，操纵杆几乎要断裂。这一切是怎么发生的？不是三号机被使徒侵袭了吗？尽管他对如何击败使徒了如指掌，但他不得不承认，他从未知晓使徒的来历。

Standing beside him was Unit 02. Unit 00 stood farther away, holding a sniper rifle in its hands.  
站在他旁边的是二号机。零号机则站在更远的地方，手持狙击步枪。

"Shinji, what's going on?" Asuka opened the communication channel with Unit 01, her voice confused. "Where's the Angel we're supposed to slaughter?"  
"真嗣，发生什么事了？" 明日香打开与 01 号机的通讯频道，声音中带着困惑。"我们该消灭的那个使徒在哪里？"

"I don't have the visuals yet," Shinji replied. "Rei, any sign of the target yet?"  
"我还没看到图像，" 真嗣回答。"绫波，有目标的迹象吗？"

Rei's ghostly voice broke in. "I've found it." She spoke. "Look towards the sun."  
绫波那幽灵般的声音插了进来。"我找到了。" 她说。"看向太阳的方向。"

All pilots turned their EVAs towards the setting sun, where they could see a humanoid silhouette contrasted against the bright orange light of the sun. Its upper body was slumped forward, letting its arms dangling around its knees, and its steps were barely more than slow trudges.  
所有驾驶员都将他们的 EVA 转向落日方向，那里可以看到一个与明亮橙色阳光形成对比的人形轮廓。它的上半身前倾，手臂垂在膝盖周围，步伐几乎只是缓慢的拖行。

"Is that an Angel?" Asuka frowned. "Isn't that an EVA?"  
“那是使徒吗？”明日香皱眉。“那不是 EVA 吗？”

"It's ex-Unit 04, now possessed by an Angel," Maya's voice echoed inside their cockpits. "Your orders are to destroy it at all costs."  
“那是曾经的 04 号机，现在被使徒占据了，”玛雅的声音在他们驾驶舱内回响。“你们的命令是无论如何都要摧毁它。”

Asuka growled in irritation. "Of course the Fourth Child would fuck up!" She hissed. "And thanks to his fucking stupidity, my birthday is fucked up as well! I promise he's _not_ gonna walk away from this _whole_!"  
明日香恼怒地咆哮道：“当然，第四适格者会搞砸一切！”她低声咒骂，“都怪他的愚蠢，我的生日也泡汤了！我发誓，他别想轻易脱身！”

"How about Misato? Is she okay?" Shinji probed as he took a good look at the black EVA Unit. It had a design different from all of the EVAs he had seen before; some new technology and weapons were equipped, but he was confident that he could deal with it with grace, especially with Asuka behind him in battle.  
"那美里呢？她还好吗？" 真嗣一边仔细观察着黑色的 EVA 单位，一边试探性地问道。这个 EVA 的设计与他之前见过的所有 EVA 都不同；它装备了一些新技术和武器，但他自信能够优雅地应对，尤其是在战斗中有明日香在他身后支持。

"A medical team was sent to the explosion site."  
"一支医疗队被派往爆炸现场。"

"Well, that basically tells us nothing!" Asuka shouted into the microphone. "Shinji? Do we have a plan?"  
"好吧，这基本上什么都没告诉我们！" 明日香对着麦克风喊道。"真嗣？我们有计划吗？"

"Right," Shinji replied. "Asuka, you will flank its right side, I'll attack from the left. Ayanami, you're to provide suppressive fire, and distract the target when needed. Everyone clear?"  
"好的，" 真嗣回答。"明日香，你从右侧包抄，我从左侧进攻。绫波，你负责提供压制火力，并在需要时分散目标注意力。大家都清楚了吗？"

"Sounds like a plan!" "Roger."  
"听起来不错！" "明白。"

"Alright." Shinji gazed at the EVA intently. Saving Toji from the Unit 03 incident and let him came out intact wasn't necessarily an easy task to do, but with Asuka and Rei's help, it wasn't impossible, either. With all the experience he had, Shinji knew he could save the Fourth Child from suffering any significant damage, even though he…turned out to be a huge annoyance.  
"好吧。" 真嗣凝视着 EVA，从 03 号机事件中救出冬二并让他完好无损并非易事，但有明日香和绫波的帮助，也并非不可能。凭借他所积累的经验，真嗣知道他可以拯救第四适格者免受重大伤害，尽管他……最终变成了一个巨大的麻烦。

He wasn't afraid of him making moves on Rei or Asuka, at all. He knew who they were, and he had absolute confidence in them, and all of his former experiences only proved his idea true. What he was annoyed with was the Fourth Child could easily cause Asuka discomfort as she said, and that was unacceptable.  
他丝毫不担心他会向丽或明日香示好。他了解她们是谁，对她们有着绝对的信心，而他过去的所有经历只是证实了他的想法。让他恼火的是，第四适格者能轻易让明日香感到不适，正如她所说，这是不可接受的。

Still, he would try to save him. As long as he could help to fight against SEELE-  
尽管如此，他还是会尝试救他。只要他能帮助对抗 SEELE——

"Pilot Soryu's sync rate is spiking!"  
“惣流驾驶员的同步率正在飙升！”

His train of thoughts abruptly derailed as Asuka's video feed turned into white noise and snowflakes. He frowned. The infested EVA was still slowly walking toward them, then why? "Asuka? Asuka! Answer me!"  
他的思绪突然中断，因为明日香的视频信号变成了白噪音和雪花。他皱起眉头。被感染的 EVA 仍在缓慢向他们走来，那为什么？“明日香？明日香！回答我！”

"Unit 02 has gone silent!"  
“二号机失去联系了！”

Shinji felt his blood freeze as Makoto's panicked voice came to him from the speakers.  
真嗣感到血液仿佛凝固，从扬声器中传来了真希的惊慌声音。

"We've detected another high energy readings from within Unit 02! Pattern blue! It's an Angel!"  
"我们检测到 02 号机内部又有高能量读数！蓝色模式！是使徒！"

"Unit 02…reactivated..." "初号机…重新启动了…"

XXXXXX

AN: 'French girls' is a quote from Titanic. Special Thanks to huginho48, fonte20nit, tomdj1701, kempn200252, HeyThereMrBlue, Guest, Guest, spartanman2, somedude234, skyf0x, Iraki01, bandiras2, Author0ftent, ChaosDisposal, and SheriffJohnStone's reviews!  
AN: '法国女孩'是来自《泰坦尼克号》的引用。特别感谢 huginho48、fonte20nit、tomdj1701、kempn200252、HeyThereMrBlue、Guest、Guest、spartanman2、somedude234、skyf0x、Iraki01、bandiras2、Author0ftent、ChaosDisposal 和 SheriffJohnStone 的评论！

## *Chapter 28*: Chapter 28: storm raging  
*第 28 章*: 第 28 章：风暴肆虐

Disclaimer: I do not own Evangelion.  
免责声明：我不拥有《新世纪福音战士》。

I have decided to take the darker approach to the plot.  
我决定采用更为阴暗的剧情走向。

**Chapter 29: …generates a raging storm across time-space  
第二十九章：…在时空之间掀起狂澜**

Asuka gripped the controls of her EVA tightly as she fumed. Today was her birthday, the first real one she had ever since her mother died. Even though her father and stepmother would send her small presents on her birthday, they only did it for the sake of doing it, and Asuka didn't feel the emotional attachment from them at all.  
明日香紧握着她的 EVA 操纵杆，心中怒火中烧。今天是她的生日，自从母亲去世后，这是她第一个真正意义上的生日。尽管父亲和继母会在生日时送她一些小礼物，但他们只是出于义务，明日香丝毫感受不到他们的情感联系。

However, today was different. She spent her birthday with someone who loved her, an enjoyable and trustable company, a person she truly cared about. Even though today almost went wrong – the general feeling was still there, not to mention the end result was beyond her expectations.  
然而，今天不同。她与一个真正爱她的人共度生日，一个愉快且值得信赖的伴侣，一个她真心在乎的人。尽管今天差点出错——但那种温馨的感觉依然存在，更不用说最终结果超出了她的预期。

And it just had to be interrupted.  
而这美好时刻偏偏被打断了。

For the first time in a long while, Asuka actually felt like feasting on someone's blood. And it had a specific name.  
时隔许久，明日香第一次真正感到想要吸食某人的血液。而且这个人还有个特定的名字。

"Of course the Fourth Child would fuck up!" Asuka growled. "And thanks to his fucking stupidity, my birthday is fucked up as well! I promise he's _not_ gonna walk away from this _whole_!"  
“当然，第四适格者会搞砸一切！”明日香咆哮道，“就因为他那该死的愚蠢，连我的生日都毁了！我发誓他绝不会轻易脱身！”

"How about Misato? Is she okay?" Shinji's voice came to her from the speakers. Asuka's killing intent subsided a little as worry started creeping into her mind. As hard as for her to admit, she still cared about Misato – who was never a decent guardian nor shining example.  
“那美里呢？她还好吗？”真嗣的声音从扬声器中传来。明日香的杀意稍稍减退，忧虑开始悄悄侵入她的心头。尽管难以承认，她依然关心美里——尽管她从未是个称职的监护人，也不是什么光辉的榜样。

"A medical team was sent to the explosion site."  
"一支医疗队被派往爆炸现场。"

"Well, that basically tells us nothing!" She huffed. Still, the Angel was a more imminent threat. "Shinji? Do we have a plan?"  
"好吧，这基本上什么都没告诉我们！" 她气呼呼地说。不过，使徒的威胁更为紧迫。"真嗣？我们有什么计划吗？"

"Right," Shinji replied. "Asuka, you will flank its right side, I'll attack from the left. Ayanami, you're to provide suppressive fire, and distract the target when needed. Everyone clear?"  
"好的，" 真嗣回答。"明日香，你从右侧包抄，我从左侧进攻。绫波，你负责提供压制火力，并在需要时分散目标注意力。大家都清楚了吗？"

"Sounds like a plan!" "Roger."  
"听起来不错！" "明白。"

Asuka smiled to herself. With Shinji supporting her and fighting alongside her, she felt she could overcome every obstacle in the world. "On your mark, Shinji." She spoke, but received no response.  
明日香暗自微笑。有真嗣支持她，与她并肩作战，她觉得自己能克服世界上的一切障碍。"各就各位，真嗣。"她开口说道，但没有得到回应。

Asuka narrowed her eyes. "What the hell?"  
明日香眯起眼睛。"搞什么鬼？"

Her entry plug went dark.  
她的插入栓陷入黑暗。

"I still have power, don't I?" She mumbled to herself.  
"我还有力量，不是吗？" 她喃喃自语。

The familiar sensations when she piloted the EVA, the pilot seat underneath her, her hands on the controls, the hum of the interface in her head – all were gone in an instant. Asuka started to feel like she was losing her footing as the sensations were replaced by falling down into a bottomless pit.  
当她驾驶 EVA 时那种熟悉的感觉，驾驶座在她身下，双手放在控制器上，脑海中界面的嗡嗡声——所有这些都在一瞬间消失了。明日香开始感到自己像是在失去立足点，这些感觉被坠入无底深渊所取代。

"What the fuck? What is going on? Shinji? Wondergirl? Hello?"  
"搞什么鬼？这是怎么回事？真嗣？绫波？有人吗？"

Then a voice rang in her head, making her blood run cold.  
随后，一个声音在她脑海中响起，令她血液凝固。

_I've helped you before…now it's your turn to help me.  
我之前帮过你……现在轮到你帮我了。_

XXXXXX

Shinji's mind went blank.  
真嗣的脑海一片空白。

The black EVA Unit 04 continued to pace slowly toward them, a broken setting sun framed behind it.  
黑色 EVA 初号机 04 继续缓缓向他们走来，破碎的夕阳在其背后映衬。

_Asuka… 明日香……_

_Ireul… 伊留尔…_

The crimson EVA Unit held its head high and roared, leaping into the sky and crashed down onto a surprised Unit 00. "Ah!" Rei's short, but undoubtedly pained cry echoed in Shinji's cockpit, though it did little to help to snap him out of his transfixed state.  
那台猩红的 EVA 初号机高昂着头咆哮着，一跃而起，猛然坠落在惊愕的零号机上。“啊！”绫波的呼声虽短促，却无疑透着痛楚，在真嗣的驾驶舱内回荡，尽管这声音对他的恍惚状态并无多大帮助。

"Unit 01! Shinji! Assist Unit 00!"  
“初号机！真嗣！支援零号机！”

It didn't register in his mind. Unit 01 remained motionless as Shinji found himself unable to do anything as if he was completely frozen. He had had nightmares like this before - of Asuka piloting Angel-infested Unit 03 - being able to consciously tell his body what to do, but his body itself was unable to respond. It was like being paralyzed.  
这在他的意识中并未留下痕迹。零壹号机静止不动，真嗣发现自己完全无法动弹，仿佛被彻底冻结。他曾做过这样的噩梦——明日香驾驶着被天使侵蚀的零叁号机——他能清醒地指挥身体，但身体却无法做出反应。就像瘫痪了一样。

Unit 02 raised its gigantic metal fist and slammed it onto Unit 00, producing a large dent on the frontal armor of the blue EVA Unit. Rei Ayanami hastily rolled aside just before the second punch landed, pulling out her prog knife from the shoulder pylon of Unit 00.  
零贰号机举起巨大的金属拳头，猛击零零号机，在蓝色 EVA 机体的正面装甲上留下了一个大凹痕。绫波零在第二拳落下前急忙侧滚避开，从零零号机的肩部支架上拔出了她的程序刀。

Meanwhile, Unit 04 finally made its move as it leaped into the air in an inhumane fashion that broke several physics laws in the process. Finally, the pain caused by Unit 04's thousands of tons of metal crashing against his EVA brought Shinji back to reality.  
与此同时，04 号机终于采取了行动，它以一种违反人性的方式跃入空中，过程中打破了多条物理定律。最终，04 号机数千吨金属撞击在他 EVA 上的痛苦让真嗣回到了现实。

"Ahhh!" Shinji groaned in pain, all of the turmoil in his head temporarily flushed away. He realized even without the assist from Unit 02 and Unit 00, he alone was enough to subdue Unit 04 and save its pilot by pulling out the entry plug.  
“啊！”真嗣痛苦地呻吟着，脑海中的所有纷乱暂时被冲刷一空。他意识到，即使没有 02 号机和 00 号机的协助，他一个人也足以制服 04 号机，并通过拔出插入栓来拯救其驾驶员。

He just needed to make sure Unit 02 and Asuka were safe.  
他只需要确保 02 号机和明日香的安全。

"Rei!" He barked into the microphone as he tried to push Unit 04 off him. "Help me hold back Unit 02! I'll deal with Unit 04!" He paused for a second and added in a slightly shaking voice. "And please protect her."  
“丽！”他对着麦克风吼道，试图将 04 号机从自己身上推开。“帮我牵制住 02 号机！我来处理 04 号机！”他顿了一下，声音略带颤抖地补充道。“还有，请保护她。”

"R-roger," Ayanami's confirmation came to him not long after. One advantage she had fighting a rogue EVA was weapons. Unit 02, though being the more advanced and combat-ready production type, with only its fists as weapons, was actually more or less holding an equal ground with the prototype EVA.  
“罗杰，”绫波不久后确认道。她在与失控 EVA 战斗时的一个优势是武器。虽然 02 号机作为更先进、更适应战斗的生产型号，仅凭拳头作为武器，实际上与原型 EVA 保持着大致的均势。

With a forceful push, Shinji get rid of the body lock Unit 04 was applying on him. Taking a glance at its back, he confirmed that the Fourth Child's entry plug was indeed half-ejected, blocked by core-like substances.  
借助一股强力推力，真嗣摆脱了 04 号机对他的身体束缚。他瞥了一眼其背部，确认第四适格者的插入栓确实半伸出，被核心状物质阻塞。

He needed to defeat Unit 04 fast, since Rei's pained cries were coming increasingly more often from the comm channel. "Just hold on a little longer, Rei!"  
他需要尽快击败 04 号机，因为从通讯频道中传来的绫波痛苦的呼喊越来越频繁。“再坚持一会儿，绫波！”

"I…I will try," Rei replied, struggling against the Angel-powered production type.  
“我……我会尽力，”丽回答，与天使动力的生产型机体奋力抗衡。

Unit 04 pounced at Unit 01 again; Shinji, with all the combat experience he had, jumped aside just in time to avoid the potentially lethal attack. However, as he was trying to regain his balance, a new long arm shot out from Unit 04's ribcage and held a firm grip on Unit 01's neck before Shinji could even react.  
初号机再次扑向零号机；真嗣凭借所有的战斗经验，及时跳开，避开了这致命一击。然而，正当他试图恢复平衡时，初号机肋骨间突然伸出一条长臂，紧紧抓住了零号机的脖子，真嗣甚至来不及反应。

_That was cheating!_ The words choked in his throat. Seconds later, before he could realize what was going on, he was lying against the hillside, his back in pain, his throat painfully squeezed.  
这简直是作弊！这些话卡在他的喉咙里。几秒钟后，在他意识到发生了什么之前，他就已经躺在山坡上，背部疼痛，喉咙被紧紧挤压。

With all four arms doing damage, Shinji soon lost his upper hand. He tried to push off the two arms that Unit 04 gripped on his throat, but soon its other two arms joined, making his attempt futile.  
四臂齐下，真嗣很快失去了优势。他试图推开初号机紧抓他喉咙的两条手臂，但很快另外两条手臂也加入了，使他的努力变得徒劳。

But he would still fight. If he didn't, Asuka would be dead again, and this time because of his unrevised plan to work with his father.  
但他依然会战斗。如果不这样做，明日香又会死去，而这次是因为他未经修正的与父亲合作的计划。

"Asuka…fight it!" “明日香……振作起来！”

XXXXXX

Gendo Ikari watched the fight displayed on the big screen; cold sweat started forming on his forehead for the first time in a long while. Not that he was concerned about Angels breaching Central Dogma, but the fact that the Second Child's condition was unknown, and Shinji was still in Unit 01.  
碇源堂凝视着大屏幕上显示的战斗；久违的冷汗开始在他的额头上形成。并非因为他担心使徒入侵中央教条区，而是因为二号机的状况不明，而真嗣仍在初号机中。

He recalled what Shinji had told him just days before. Being too nervous about the whereabouts of Ireul, Shinji had found him and admitted the unexpected missing of the Angel of Terror. Even though Gendo had been tense as well, after hearing the Angel could be defeated by Dr. Akagi using only a keyboard, the tension slowly subsided.  
他回想起几天前真嗣对他说的话。因为过于紧张伊鲁尔的行踪，真嗣找到了他，坦白了恐怖天使意外失踪的情况。尽管碇源堂也同样紧张，但在得知赤木博士仅用键盘就能击败天使后，紧张气氛逐渐缓和。

Therefore, he had insisted on keeping Dr. Akagi at NERV HQ whenever possible, and that decision now turned out to be a brilliant one.  
因此，他坚持尽可能让赤木博士留在 NERV 总部，而这个决定现在看来极为明智。

"Dr. Akagi, what can you tell me about the condition of Unit 02?" Commander Ikari rose from his seat and came to the observation spot of the command deck, speaking down to the lower levels.  
“赤木博士，关于 02 号机的情况，你能告诉我些什么？”碇司令从座位上起身，走到指挥甲板的观察点，向下层说道。

"The Angel is trying to hack into the MAGI!" Ritsuko replied in a panicked voice. "It's transmitting viruses into our system through the connection between us and Unit 02!"  
“使徒正在试图入侵 MAGI 系统！”律子惊慌地回答，“它通过我们与 02 号机之间的连接，向我们的系统传输病毒！”

Gendo narrowed his eyes a bit. Just like how Shinji had told him, the Angel of Terror was an organic virus attempting to take over NERV Headquarters through MAGI. "Cut the connection, then."  
源堂微微眯起眼睛。正如真嗣告诉他的那样，恐怖天使是一种有机病毒，试图通过 MAGI 系统接管 NERV 总部。“切断连接。”

"We can't! It's already corrupted our communication system! It's also blocking us from Unit 02's side! We can't even send plug ejection signals!"  
“我们做不到！它已经破坏了我们的通信系统！还封锁了二号机的通讯！我们甚至无法发送弹射信号！”

"Condition of the pilot?"  
“驾驶员状况如何？”

"Vital signs stable. Though we don't know about the authenticity of it. The signals we receive could be false for all we know."  
“生命体征稳定。不过我们无法确定其真实性。我们所接收到的信号也可能是虚假的。”

Gendo let out a small sigh of relief. As long as the Second Child was alive, there was still hope.  
碇源堂轻轻舒了一口气。只要二号机驾驶员还活着，就还有希望。

Asuka couldn't know what was going on on the battlefield since all of her sensations didn't make sense to her. Her entry plug was flashing a kaleidoscope of colors as she tried to focus on her thoughts, recalling the emergency procedures suited for a malfunctioning EVA. None of them worked, though, as the voice kept invading her mind.  
明日香无法理解战场上的情况，因为她所有的感觉对她来说都毫无意义。她的插入栓闪烁着万花筒般的色彩，她试图集中思绪，回忆起适用于故障 EVA 的紧急程序。然而，这些程序无一奏效，因为那个声音不断侵扰着她的心智。

_Help me understand, Lilim!  
帮我理解，莉莉姆！_

The redhead frowned. She had heard this familiar phrase before…when inside the eleventh Angel, the giant 8-ball. Her college-level intelligent brain soon came to a conclusion that she was almost likely under the influence of another Angel.  
红发少女皱起了眉头。她曾听过这句熟悉的话……在第十一使徒，那个巨大的 8 号球体内。她那大学水平的聪明头脑很快得出了一个结论：她很可能受到了另一个使徒的影响。

_'I just can't catch a break, can I?'_ Asuka fumed. Why were the Angels so interested in human minds, anyway? "What do you want?!" She barked into the void. Having encountered and successfully defeated one of their kins by herself, Asuka was confident that she could handle this one just as easily.  
“我就不能有点好运吗？”明日香愤愤不平。为什么使徒对人类的心灵如此感兴趣？“你们到底想要什么？！”她对着虚空厉声喝问。独自遭遇并成功击败了同类中的一个，明日香自信能同样轻松地应对这个。

_Lilim…interesting creatures. Unfathomable.  
莉莉姆…有趣的生物。深不可测。_

Lilim? The word didn't register in her mind, but Asuka could very well guess it meant her, or at least her species – humans. "Of course, we're not single-minded like you! You'll never understand us!"  
莉莉姆？这个词在她脑海中没有留下痕迹，但明日香大致猜到它指的是她，或者至少是她的种族——人类。“当然，我们不像你们那样单一思维！你们永远无法理解我们！”

Asuka was expecting the Angel to create another illusion of herself, but soon found herself wrong as a wave of unpleasant sensations assaulted her. It was mixed with pain, itch, and growing hotness. "Ahhhh!" She screamed in agony.  
明日香本以为天使会再次制造自己的幻象，但很快发现自己错了，一波不愉快的感受袭来。伴随着疼痛、瘙痒和逐渐加剧的热感。“啊！”她痛苦地尖叫起来。

_Surrender, help me, or be annihilated.  
投降，帮我，否则就毁灭吧。_

"I will n-" Asuka stopped herself. Being headstrong when her entire body was under the Angel's control didn't sound like a good idea. She knew Shinji was just beside her when it all came crashing down, and she trusted him to save her, knowing his combat experience and skills. Therefore, mopping around and evading crucial subjects to buy time for Shinji and wondergirl became her priority. "I can't help you if I don't know what you want!"  
"我会..." 明日香突然打住。在全身被使徒控制的情况下还逞强，听起来并不明智。她知道真嗣就在她身边，当一切崩溃时，她相信他能救她，知道他的战斗经验和技能。因此，四处游荡回避关键话题，为真嗣和那个女孩争取时间成了她的首要任务。"如果你不告诉我你想要什么，我帮不了你！"

_I want to understand you.  
我想了解你。_

"How?" Asuka intentionally stretched her voice.  
"怎么了解？" 明日香故意拉长声音问道。

_Help me, or suffer! 帮我，否则后果自负！_

_'Oh? Getting impatient already?'_ Asuka thought with amusement. "Like I said, I can't help you when I have no idea what you want from me!"  
'哦？已经开始不耐烦了吗？' 明日香带着一丝戏谑想道。"就像我说的，你什么都不告诉我，我怎么帮你！"

_HELP ME UNDERSTAND! 帮我理解！_

Asuka grinned. This was perfect. Apparently, the Angel, being single-minded creatures, had just fallen into and being trapped in an endless cycle. This way, she would stall long enough for Shinji to defeat the Angels and save her like the damsel in distress.  
明日香咧嘴一笑。这简直是完美的机会。显然，天使这种单细胞生物，已经陷入了无尽的循环中。这样一来，她就能拖延足够长的时间，让真嗣击败天使，像拯救落难少女一样来救她。

Suddenly her vision of the entry plug twisted as if the Angel was struggling with something. She could feel her EVA stopped abruptly from what it was doing before and roared.  
突然间，插入栓内的视野扭曲起来，仿佛使徒在与什么东西挣扎。她能感觉到她的 EVA 突然停止了之前的行为，并发出了咆哮。

It was a bone-chilling roar that went straight into her soul.  
那是一种直击灵魂的、令人毛骨悚然的咆哮。

_Poor Lilim…your tricks won't work against me. Not good enough.  
可怜的人类……你的伎俩对我无效。还不够好。_

Even though the voice said it, Asuka could still feel…exhaustion from it, as if the Angel had just survived a lethal attack. "Not so strong now, huh?" She mocked. "Just you wait, you sick fuck! He will come and save me!"  
尽管那声音如此说道，但明日香仍能感受到……来自它的疲惫，仿佛那使徒刚从致命攻击中幸存。“现在不那么强了吧？”她嘲讽道，“等着瞧吧，你这变态！他会来救我的！”

She felt a chill ran down her spine as the voice sounded again, this time much colder and more resounding.  
当那声音再次响起时，她感到一股寒意沿着脊背直窜而下，这次更加冷酷且响亮。

_The old-fashioned way, it is.  
还是老一套，是吧。_

"Wha-" Before she could even get the word out, her vision went black.  
"什——" 她话还没说完，眼前便一片漆黑。

"Thanks, mother." Ritsuko mumbled to herself as she stormed over her keyboard. The small confined area she was sitting in was stuffed with notes and brain-like electronic routes, the core of Casper, the woman identity of MAGI supercomputer, where her mother was residing in.  
"谢谢，妈妈。" 律子喃喃自语，手指在键盘上飞快敲击。她所坐的小小空间里，堆满了笔记和脑状电子线路，这里是卡斯帕的核心，MAGI 超级计算机的人格化身，她的母亲就栖身于此。

Melchior was already taken over while Balthasar was half-hacked.  
梅尔基奥尔已被完全控制，而巴尔萨泽则被半数破解。

Gendo Ikari paced back and forth on the observation deck, contrasting the calm composure of Sub-commander Fuyutsuki standing beside him. He could only hope the method Shinji told him would work on the Angel since this time it possessed an EVA that's attacking one of theirs viciously while continuing to hack into the MAGI.  
碇源堂在观察甲板上踱来踱去，与站在他身旁冷静沉着的副司令冬月形成鲜明对比。他只能寄希望于真嗣告诉他的方法能对使徒奏效，因为这次使徒操控着一台 EVA，正凶猛地攻击他们中的一员，同时不断侵入 MAGI 系统。

Most importantly, he wanted the Second Child to be safe.  
最重要的是，他希望二号适格者能安全无恙。

"Let's see if this works. If only Balthasar is faster than the Angel." Ritsuko uploaded the code onto Balthasar – her persona as a mother – and the part of the supercomputer promptly started calculating.  
"看看这招管不管用。要是巴尔萨泽能比使徒更快就好了。" 律子将代码上传至巴尔萨泽——她作为母亲的人格——超级计算机的那部分立刻开始运算。

On the battlefield, the crimson EVA Unit jerked to a stop just before it was about to land a deadly strike on the head of Unit 00. Rei Ayanami utilized this time and rolled away from the production type and entered an offensive position.  
战场上，赤红的 EVA 初号机猛地一顿，就在即将对零号机的头部施以致命一击之际停了下来。绫波零利用这片刻，迅速滚离量产机型，进入攻击姿态。

Though it didn't last long. The red EVA held its head back and roared a bone-chilling roar once more, the high-pitched sound shattered hundreds of pieces of glasses of the buildings around the area. Unit 00 was knocked down once again as Unit 02 expanded its AT-Field in an explosive manner, ripping the surface off the earth.  
然而这并未持续太久。红色 EVA 仰头再次发出令人毛骨悚然的咆哮，那尖锐的声波震碎了周边建筑数百扇玻璃。零号机再次被击倒，二号机则以爆炸性的方式扩张其 AT 力场，撕裂了地表。

"Balthasar wasn't fast enough?!" Incredulity radiated from Ritsuko's exclamation. Showing on her terminal, Balthasar was being taken over by the virus at lightning-speed. After all, Balthasar and Melchior were only machines. Her last hope would be Casper, the only one of the three that was part human.  
"巴尔萨泽不够快吗？！" 丽素的话语中透出难以置信。她的终端上显示，巴尔萨泽正以闪电般的速度被病毒侵占。毕竟，巴尔萨泽和梅尔基奥尔只是机器。她最后的希望寄托在卡斯帕身上，他是三者中唯一拥有人类部分的。

"I'm counting on you, mother!" The blonde doctor changed the primary computer to Casper. In the meantime, Balthasar was wholly occupied by the virus.  
"全靠你了，母亲！" 金发医生将主计算机切换至卡斯帕。与此同时，巴尔萨泽已完全被病毒占据。

"The Angel's going to self-destruct NERV Headquarters!" Aoba exclaimed, his voice slightly trembling. "Balthasar and Melchior had already consented! The virus is attacking Casper right now!"  
"使徒要自毁 NERV 总部！" 青叶的声音微微颤抖，"巴尔萨泽和梅尔基奥尔已经同意了！病毒正在攻击卡斯帕！

"Use firewalls to impede its assaults! Buy me some time!"  
“用防火墙阻挡它的攻击！为我争取时间！”

"On it! But the effect is not obvious!"  
"这就来！但效果不明显！"

Ritsuko silently cursed. Time was running out. On the big screen, she could see Unit 01 was struggling against Unit 04 as the former EVA was being held against a hill, its throat strangled. Unit 00 wasn't in good shape, either.  
律子默默咒骂。时间紧迫。在大屏幕上，她看到零号机正与四号机搏斗，前者被压制在山坡上，喉咙被扼住。零号机的状况也不容乐观。

"Pilot Ikari's sync rate is unstable! His heart rate is skyrocketing!"  
"碇司令的同步率不稳定！他的心率正在飙升！"

"Lower his sync rate to forty percent," Gendo ordered.  
“将他的同步率降到百分之四十，”碇源堂命令道。

"Pilot Ayanami's vitals aren't stable, either!" Aoba continued to report. "Pilot Soryu…wait."  
“绫波零驾驶员的生命体征也不稳定！”青叶继续报告，“明日香驾驶员……等等。”

Gendo raised an eyebrow. "What's her condition?" He probed, tension injecting into his voice.  
碇源堂扬起眉毛，“她的状况如何？”他追问，声音中透出紧张。

"Her vital signs have gone flat." Maya continued from where Aoba left off. "No heartbeat, no breathing, no brainwaves. Nothing."  
“她的生命体征已经消失。”真希波接着青叶的话继续说道，“没有心跳，没有呼吸，没有脑电波。什么都没有。”

No.

Gendo felt his blood freeze.  
源堂感到血液仿佛凝固了。

"Wh-what's Asuka's status?" Shinji's struggling voice floated from the speakers. Before Gendo could get his first syllable out, Maya replied.  
“那、那明日香的情况呢？”真嗣颤抖的声音从扬声器中传来。源堂还没来得及发出第一个音节，真希波就回答了。

"Shinji… she's gone." "真嗣…她走了。"

The pilot of Unit 01 was constantly distracted by the fight that was going on between Unit 00 and Unit 02, thus being overpowered by Unit 04. He could see Unit 02 expand its AT-Field and sent Unit 00 flying away. If he continued to waste more time on Unit 04, sooner than later he would have to face the attack of both EVAs at once, and the fact that Asuka was in one of them only made the situation grimmer.  
01 号机驾驶员因 00 号机与 02 号机之间的战斗而分心，被 04 号机压制。他看到 02 号机展开 AT 力场，将 00 号机击飞。如果他继续在 04 号机上浪费时间，迟早要同时面对两台 EVA 的攻击，而明日香在其中一台上，这使得局势更加严峻。

Shinji mustered all of his strength, pushing the Angel-infested EVA away from him by a minuscule amount, though it was enough for him to catch a breath. "Wh-what's Asuka's status?" He spoke into the microphone, hoping that she would still be okay.  
真嗣用尽全力，将感染了使徒的 EVA 稍稍推开，虽然只是微不足道的距离，但足以让他喘口气。“明日香的情况怎么样？”他对着麦克风说道，希望她还能安然无恙。

"Shinji… she's gone." "真嗣…她走了。"

He couldn't believe what his brain told him what he had heard. "Gone? What the hell do you mean by 'gone?!'" He shouted. Utilizing his moment of distraction, Unit 04 tightened its grip on Unit 01's throat, effectively subduing the purple mech once again.  
他无法相信自己的大脑告诉他他所听到的话。"消失？你说的'消失'到底是什么意思？！"他大喊道。利用这一瞬间的分神，04 号机加强了对 01 号机喉咙的握力，有效地再次制服了紫色机甲。

"Her vitals are all flat… we're getting nothing."  
"她的生命体征全都没了……我们什么也检测不到。"

"She's… Asuka's…" "她是……明日香的……"

_"Shinji-kun! Unit 02…Asuka…Asuka's…"  
"真嗣君！二号机……明日香……明日香的……"_

_"But…I can't do anything…"  
"但是…我什么都做不了…"_

He didn't need to hear the last word. Maya's tone was more than familiar to him. Though this time wouldn't like to be the first time.  
他不需要听到最后一个字。真嗣的语气对他来说再熟悉不过了。尽管这次不想成为第一次。

There's nothing else in this world that mattered to him anymore.  
这个世界上再也没有什么对他来说重要了。

Rage.

Pain.

Like a giant tsunami, the towering rage flushed all of his insecurities and hesitations away in an instant. Only one thing remained in his mind – the desire to revenge and cause destruction.  
如同巨大的海啸，那高耸的愤怒瞬间冲刷掉了他所有的疑虑和犹豫。他的心中只剩下一件事——复仇和毁灭的欲望。

"Pilot Ikari…his sync rate is spiking! Bordering on two hundred percent!"  
"碇真嗣驾驶员…他的同步率正在飙升！接近两百个百分点！"

On the surface, Unit 01 roared.  
表面上，初号机咆哮着。

Asuka found herself engulfed inside complete darkness, even deeper than the time when she was absorbed inside Leliel. She tried to feel her limbs and move around, but she couldn't, as if they didn't even exist.  
明日香发现自己被完全的黑暗吞没，比她被吸入雷里尔时还要深。她试图感知自己的四肢并移动，但却动弹不得，仿佛它们根本不存在。

She couldn't see, couldn't hear, couldn't feel. Her consciousness was the only thing that remained.  
她看不见，听不到，感觉不到。唯有意识残留。

_'What is this place?'_ She tried to speak out the words, but found herself unable to since she lost control of her vocal cord – or more precisely, she simply didn't have a vocal cord anymore.  
“这是什么地方？”她试图说出这些话，却发现无法发声，因为她失去了对声带的控制——或者更确切地说，她已经没有了声带。

_'Is this the end? Where people go when they die?'_ The disturbing thoughts remained in her mind. _'Shinji…I need you…'_  
“这就是终点吗？人们死后会去的地方？”这些令人不安的想法萦绕在她心头。“真嗣……我需要你……”

Then the assaulting voice reached her once more.  
随后，那个侵扰的声音再次传入她的耳中。

_He won't come for you if he thinks you're dead.  
如果他认为你已经死了，他就不会来找你了。_

_Now...I have you all by myself.  
现在...我终于可以独自拥有你了。_

Shinji twisted the armored hands of his attacker as he forced them away while crushing with all of his might.  
真嗣扭动着攻击者的装甲手臂，竭尽全力将它们推开并碾压。

A sickening crunch of broken bones and torn tissue brought a bitter smile to his face. If this world was also doomed, he didn't need to care about collateral damage anymore. With Unit 01's hands now free, Shinji made a vicious swing at the EVA Unit in front of him. Unit 01's AT-Field shattered Unit 04's like breaking substandard glass, and tore the remained arms off without so much as struggling.  
一阵令人作呕的骨头断裂与组织撕裂声，让他脸上浮现出一抹苦涩的微笑。如果这个世界也注定毁灭，他便不再需要顾及附带损害了。随着初号机双手的解放，真嗣对眼前的 EVA 单位发起了猛烈的攻击。初号机的 AT 力场如同击碎劣质玻璃般粉碎了四号机的 AT 力场，并轻而易举地撕裂了其剩余的手臂。

A part of him refused to believe that Asuka's gone, but was overwhelmed by the yankering to destroy, the torrent of anger, and by his desire for vengeance.  
他的一部分拒绝相信明日香已经离去，但被毁灭的渴望、愤怒的洪流以及复仇的欲望所淹没。

Cracking a distorted grin, Shinji grabbed his opponent by its throat.  
真嗣扭曲地咧嘴一笑，抓住对手的喉咙。

Then came a loud sound of crack that could be heard from miles away.  
随后，一声震耳欲聋的破裂声响彻数英里之外。

Shinji threw the now-limp form of Unit 04 on the hillside, and started an absolute slaughter. The former Evangelion's ichor was spraying on Unit 01 and everything around it in the radius of hundreds of meters, leaving long streaks and abstract blotches that looked like mad performance art.  
真嗣将已经瘫软的 04 号机扔在山坡上，随即展开了一场彻底的屠杀。前使徒的血液在 01 号机及周围数百米的范围内喷洒，留下长长的痕迹和抽象的斑点，宛如疯狂的行为艺术。

He didn't care about anything anymore. Not the condition of the Fourth Child. Not how NERV people would view him after this battle. Because this would be his last performance for this world.  
他不再关心任何事。不在乎第四适格者的状况，也不在乎 NERV 的人在这场战斗后会如何看待他。因为这将是在这个世界上的最后一次表演。

Unit 04 tried to fight back using its regrown limbs, but they were torn off within seconds of their reemergence. With a forceful punch, Unit 04's head was crushed into a bloody pulp.  
04 号机试图用新生的肢体反击，但它们在重新出现后的几秒钟内就被撕裂。一记重拳，04 号机的头部被砸成了一滩血肉模糊的浆糊。

"We've lost the signal of Unit 04's entry plug and the Fourth Child…" Maya reported, shaking violently after Unit 01 delivered a vicious stomp onto the core of Unit 04, flattening its chest and everything beneath it.  
“我们已经失去了 04 号机插入栓和第四适格者的信号……” 美里报告道，颤抖不已，因为 01 号机对 04 号机的核心部位施以猛烈一踏，将其胸腔及下方一切碾压得粉碎。

In the distance, Unit 00 finally lost the fight against Unit 02. Though it didn't matter anymore.  
远处，00 号机最终在与 02 号机的战斗中败下阵来。尽管这一切已无关紧要。

Unit 01 fixed its gaze at the supervision camera so people on the command deck would look at its glowing eyes directly.  
初号机凝视着监控摄像头，让指挥舱内的人们直接对上它闪烁的目光。

"I'm sorry." "对不起。"

His tone made people in the command center shiver in dread, despite being temporarily desensitized by observing the recent brutal slaughter. It was the voice of a man who had nothing left to lose.  
他的语气让指挥中心的人们不寒而栗，尽管他们因目睹近期的残酷屠杀而暂时变得麻木。这是一个一无所有之人的声音。

Gendo felt his knees wobble. Was he apologizing to him? To people in NERV who were observing the battle?  
碇感到自己的膝盖在颤抖。他是在向他道歉吗？向 NERV 中观察战斗的人们？

To the world? 向世界？

No. His eyes went wide as the realization struck him. Shinji was only apologizing to the Second Child.  
不。他的眼睛因这一领悟而睁大。真嗣只是在向二号适格者道歉。

Gendo could see Unit 01 started to rise from the ground.  
碇源堂能看到初号机开始从地面升起。

He felt a new feeling that he had never felt before. It was a reflex of running away from something. A primal desire to flee. It was-  
他感受到了一种前所未有的感觉。那是一种逃跑的本能反应。一种原始的逃避欲望。那是——

Fear.

He didn't like the feeling. At all.  
他一点也不喜欢这种感觉。

## *Chapter 29*: Chapter 29: Depart  
*第 29 章*：第二十九章：启程

**Chapter 29: Depart 第二十九章：启程**

"I'm sorry." "对不起。"

Nothing else mattered to him anymore. Shinji's voice was cold, devoid of any feeling, empty of any emotion.  
对他来说，什么都不再重要了。真嗣的声音冰冷，毫无感情，空洞无物。

He could've just killed himself instead of starting the Third Impact, it would still send him to another cycle – however, without him and Asuka, sooner than later, the Angels would definitely defeat NERV and start Third Impact on their own.  
他本可以简单地自杀，而不是引发第三次冲击，那样他仍会进入下一个循环——然而，没有他和明日香，天使们迟早会击败 NERV 并自行引发第三次冲击。

Therefore, making it quick and painless was the last mercy he had for people in this world.  
因此，让他快速而无痛苦地结束，是他对这个世界上的人们最后的仁慈。

Unit 01 continued to roar as it rose higher and higher into the sky.  
初号机继续咆哮着，向着天空越升越高。

XXXXXX

Despite the ground beneath her started to shake, Dr. Akagi paid no mind to it and continued to punch command lines into her terminal. Casper was her last hope.  
尽管地面开始震动，赤木律子博士对此置若罔闻，继续在终端上敲击命令行。卡斯帕是她最后的希望。

"Now!" With a forceful stroke on the ENTER key, kilobytes of codes were uploaded into Casper. The virus at first accepted the codes without thinking, though soon found itself in trouble. As it followed the codes, under its supernatural computing power, within milliseconds, its path of evolution came to an abrupt end.  
“现在！”随着用力敲下 ENTER 键，数千字节的代码被上传到卡斯帕。病毒起初不假思索地接受了这些代码，但很快发现自己陷入了困境。在其超自然的计算能力下，仅用毫秒时间，它的进化路径便戛然而止。

Sensing the danger, Ireul tried to overpower the computer that dared to compete with it. Though soon it found itself wrong since Casper wasn't only computing, it was also thinking, adapting – it was always one step ahead of the virus.  
察觉到危险，伊留尔试图压倒那台胆敢与它竞争的计算机。但很快它发现自己错了，因为卡斯帕不仅在计算，它还在思考、适应——它总是比病毒领先一步。

Knowing its performance was coming to an end, Ireul quickly retreated to the last place where it had pieces of itself.  
意识到自己的表演即将结束，Ireul 迅速撤退到最后一个藏有自己碎片的地方。

"Both Pattern blue eliminated!" Maya's eyes went wide - if that was even possible after observing the brutal scene Unit 01 was making - as she saw Unit 02's readings returned to normal. "I've got a signal! It's Asuka's vitals! Pilot Soryu is still alive!"  
“两台蓝色图谱都被消灭了！”玛雅的眼睛瞪得大大的——尽管在目睹零号机制造的残酷场面后这几乎不可能——当她看到二号机的读数恢复正常时。“我收到了信号！是明日香的生理数据！飞行员惣流还活着！”

Unit 01 stopped abruptly, the joints crackling from the sudden deceleration as it fell back to the ground. Turning on the spot with a worrying squeal, Shinji raced back, dropped Unit 01 to its knees next to the limp and mildly damaged form of Unit 02.  
初号机突然停下，关节因急停而发出噼啪声，随后重重地摔回地面。在一阵令人担忧的吱嘎声中，真嗣转身疾驰，将初号机跪倒在二号机那瘫软且轻微受损的机体旁。

With a punch on the emergency eject button, the entry plug of Unit 02 popped out, spraying out its LCL through the emergency vents. Shinji lifted the pod with the utmost care, breaking into a ground-shaking sprint the second it was secure in his hands. "Wounded incoming, heading to-" he summoned the map quickly. "Retrieval point E-17."  
随着一拳砸在紧急弹射按钮上，02 号机的插入栓弹射而出，LCL 液体通过紧急通风口喷涌而出。真嗣小心翼翼地抬起舱体，一旦确认安全便立刻开始狂奔，地面为之震动。“伤员正在前往——”他迅速调出地图，“回收点 E-17。”

"Acknowledged," Makoto responded just after snapping out of his earlier transfixes state, frantically punching commands into the terminal.  
“收到，”真希波刚从之前的恍惚状态中回过神来，急忙在终端上输入指令。

"Wait! Send the entry plug down to shaft L-03! Enact Angel-level quarantine procedures! No one does anything until I arrive!" Dr. Akagi - who had just came back from the CPU chamber of MAGI - maintained a note of professionalism in her hurried voice, then hastily left the command deck, heading to the elevators.  
“等等！将插入栓送至 L-03 号井！启动天使级隔离程序！在我到达之前，任何人不得擅自行动！”赤木律子博士刚从 MAGI 的 CPU 室返回，尽管语速匆忙，仍保持着专业口吻，随即匆匆离开指挥甲板，前往电梯。

Gendo let out a long relieved sigh before falling down onto his chair on the observational deck above the command level. Professor Fuyutsuki let out a heavy sigh. "Well, look on the bright side, Ikari. We didn't lose both pilots."  
源堂长舒一口气，随后瘫坐在指挥层上方的观察甲板椅子上。冬月教授沉重地叹息道：“唉，往好处想，碇。我们至少没有失去两位驾驶员。”

"Perhaps," Gendo huffed. Kozo didn't know what he was about to lose, at all. "The scenario…is adaptable. The old men will certainly be demanding explanations." He added, though he tried to sound impassionate, dread still flew out from his voice.  
“或许吧，”源渡哼了一声。荒巻完全不知道自己即将失去什么。“这个计划……是可以调整的。那些老家伙肯定会要求解释。”他补充道，尽管试图保持冷静，但声音中仍透露出恐惧。

XXXXXX 翻译文本：XXXXXX 翻译结果：XXXXXX

"Ritsuko-san, where is Asuka?! Is she alright?" Shinji's storm of inquiries swept through the hallway of the Medical Wing. It had been several hours after the battle against the twelfth and thirteenth Angel, designated Bardiel and Ireul.  
“律子小姐，明日香在哪里？！她还好吗？” 真嗣一连串的询问在医疗翼的走廊上回荡。距离与第十二、第十三使徒，巴迪尔和伊鲁尔的战斗已经过去了几个小时。

His first destination was, no doubt, Ward 303 in the First Cranial Nerves section. He didn't know what the difference between Bardiel and Ireul in terms of influences on pilots was, but judging from the fact that her entry plug was still intact when the Angel was eliminated, his hopes were high.  
他的第一站无疑是第一脑神经区的 303 病房。他不清楚巴迪尔和伊鲁尔对驾驶员的影响有何不同，但从使徒被消灭时她的插入栓仍完好无损这一事实来看，他的希望很大。

But why Dr. Akagi kept avoiding the question?  
但为什么赤木博士一直在回避这个问题呢？

He had met the blonde doctor when he was literally ravaging across the Medical Wing when Ritsuko coincidentally came out of an elevator that led down to Central Dogma. Shinji hadn't stopped his brutal assault on the doctor yet ever since.  
他在医疗翼肆虐时，偶然遇到了那位金发医生，当时律子恰好从通往中央教条区的电梯里出来。自那以后，真嗣对医生的猛烈攻击就从未停止过。

"I'm sorry Shinji, but there's nothing I can tell you," Shrugging, Ritsuko tried again, her face deadpan.  
“对不起，真嗣，但我没什么能告诉你的，”律子耸耸肩，再次尝试，脸上毫无表情。

"What about the Fourth Child? Is he..." He trailed off.  
“那第四适格者呢？他……”他话音渐弱。

"He's K.I.A, Shinji." Came to him a collected reply.  
"他已经阵亡了，真嗣。" 传来的是冷静的回答。

Shinji's face twitched. "I...I killed him," he mumbled. "Will I...get charged?"  
真嗣的脸抽搐了一下。"我...我杀了他，" 他喃喃道，"我会...被起诉吗？"

"No, the Commander has exempted you from any criminal responsibilities."  
"不会，指挥官已经免除了你所有的刑事责任。"

Letting out a sigh of relief, Shinji tried again. "But Asuka-"  
松了一口气，真嗣再次尝试。“但明日香——”

"I'll repeat, there's nothing I can tell you."  
“我会重复，我没什么能告诉你的。”

Shinji growled in frustration. He knew Ritsuko knew where Asuka was; he was _sure_ of it. She was the third highest-ranking person in NERV, considering the first one was-  
真嗣懊恼地低吼一声。他知道律子肯定知道明日香的下落；他对此确信无疑。考虑到第一位是——，她是 NERV 中排名第三的高层。

He facepalmed as he realized his own obliviousness. "Thank you, Dr. Akagi," Shinji said with venom in his voice and headed off to his father's office.  
他捂脸自嘲，意识到自己的迟钝。“谢谢你，赤木博士，”真嗣语气中带着怨气说道，随即前往父亲的办公室。

XXXXXX

Misato's eyes fluttered open, at first being blinded by a bright light beaming down on her face, contrasting strongly against the night sky. As she came to, she was able to make out the silhouette of a man leaning over her. Even though the intense floodlight blurred his appearance, from the ponytail that blew in the wind, she already knew who it was.  
美里睁开眼睛，起初被照在脸上的强光刺得睁不开眼，与夜空形成鲜明对比。她逐渐适应后，能辨认出一个男人的轮廓俯视着她。尽管强烈的泛光灯模糊了他的面容，但从随风飘动的马尾，她已知道是谁。

"Kaji…" Major Katsuragi spoke up wearily and tried to get up, only to fall back down again as she felt a sharp pain shoot through her left arm. She silently cursed since she knew the bone was damaged, at least to some degree from the experience she had. Grimacing in pain, Misato rested on the stretcher Kaji had brought for her.  
“加持…”葛城美里少校疲惫地开口，试图起身，却因左臂一阵剧痛而再次倒下。她默默咒骂，凭经验知道骨头至少有些损伤。美里痛苦地皱眉，躺在加持带来的担架上休息。

"You hurt your arm pretty badly in the explosion." His soft voice was just the thing she needed to hear, especially since the last thing she could remember was hearing Unit 04's head-splitting roar when it went berserk and broke free of its restraints.  
"你在爆炸中手臂伤得很重。" 他柔和的声音正是她此刻需要的，尤其是她最后记得的是 04 号机暴走时那震耳欲聋的咆哮，它挣脱了束缚，疯狂失控。

Speaking of which... 说到这个...

"Oh God!" She shot up again, this time ignoring the pain in her arm. "The Fourth Child! Is he alright?!"  
"哦天哪！" 她再次猛地坐起，这次无视了手臂的疼痛。"第四适格者！他没事吧？！"

Kaji's expression darkened, and his eyes dulled. That alone was enough to make Misato's heart sink. "You probably shouldn't worry about that right now."  
加持的表情阴沉下来，眼神也变得黯淡。光是这一点就足以让美里心沉到谷底。“你现在可能不该担心这个。”

"The Hell I shouldn't!" She snapped, hissing through the pain that was shooting through the entirety of her left arm. "Where is the Fourth Child?!" Her lover's expression alone was enough to answer her question, but she was still holding onto one last strand of hope that maybe, just maybe the Fourth Child was okay.  
“我才不会不管！”她厉声说道，左臂剧痛如电击般贯穿全身，她咬牙切齿。“第四适格者在哪里？！”光是恋人的表情就足以回答她的问题，但她仍抱着最后一丝希望，或许，仅仅是或许，第四适格者安然无恙。

It nearly broke Kaji's heart to have to cut that strand.  
剪断那根线几乎让加持心碎。

"He's KIA. Unit 04 was disposed of as an Angel."  
“他阵亡了。04 号机被当作使徒处理掉了。”

"K...dead?" Misato's face dropped instantly after she saw Kaji nod. Even though she didn't have any sort of emotional attachment to the Fourth Child, it hurt her a little to hear a member of her species had just vanished.  
“死...死了？”看到加持点头，美里脸色瞬间垮了下来。尽管她对第四适格者没有任何情感上的牵绊，但听到一个同类就这样消失，还是让她感到一丝痛楚。

"Misato...and there's something else-"  
“美里……还有别的事——”

"I need to go back to NERV!" Misato, despite having a minor fracture in her forearm, sat up straight using Kaji as support, cutting him off his speech.  
"我必须回 NERV！" 尽管前臂有轻微骨折，美里还是借助加持的力量坐直了身子，打断了他正在说的话。

Kaji sighed. He knew if Misato was determined to do something, there's nothing he could do to stop her.  
加持叹了口气。他知道，一旦美里下定决心做什么事，他就无法阻止她。

XXXXXX

"Father, you know where Asuka is, right?!" Said Shinji loudly across the office, fire almost shooting out from his eyes.  
"父亲，你知道明日香在哪儿，对吧？！" 真嗣在办公室里大声问道，眼中几乎要喷出怒火。

"Indeed I do." Gendo's reply came after a momentary delay, cold and collected as always. Despite just experienced a near-Third Impact, the calm man regained his semblance of composure as soon as he was informed that the Second Child was still alive. "Though there's something I need to tell you. Something you must know." Saying, he took out something that looked like a remote controller and began walking away from his desk. "Follow me, Shinji."  
“确实如此。”源渡的回答稍稍迟疑了一瞬，依旧冷酷而镇定。尽管刚刚经历了一场近乎第三次冲击的事件，这位冷静的男人一得知第二适格者仍活着的消息，便迅速恢复了往日的沉着。“不过，有件事我必须告诉你。你得知道。”说着，他拿出一个看似遥控器的东西，开始从办公桌旁走开。“跟我来，真嗣。”

Without further questions, the said boy followed the Commander of NERV out of his office and down to the hallway. It was late at night; the entire Geofront was asleep despite the ordeal it just went through hours earlier. Only a few armed guards remained in the long silent corridor.  
没有再多问，那个男孩紧随 NERV 指挥官走出了办公室，沿着走廊下行。夜已深，整个地底都市尽管刚在几小时前经历了那场劫难，此刻却已沉睡。唯有少数武装警卫留在那条长长的寂静走廊中。

"You okay, Shinji?" Gendo probed as he saw his son tensing up for each passing second as they rode the elevator deep down into the Central Dogma. Even though his tone was still stern, Shinji could swear there was something more profound in it.  
"你还好吗，真嗣？" 碇源堂问道，他注意到儿子随着电梯深入中央教条区，每一秒都越发紧张。尽管他的语气依旧严厉，但真嗣能感觉到其中蕴含着更深层的意味。

"Where are we going?" He spoke up, trying his best to contain the tension in his voice. The only thing he could imagine to happen with his father taking him down to Central Dogma was to deal with Rei's spare copies, but that was clearly out of the question for now.  
"我们要去哪里？" 他开口问道，尽力压抑声音中的紧张。他能想象到的，父亲带他来中央教条区唯一可能的原因是处理绫波的备用复制体，但显然现在不是讨论这个的时候。

"To the truth." "去面对真相。"

With a silver sound of Dink, the elevator door opened, revealing a floor Shinji was too familiar with. Associated with dark memories. "Father…what are we doing here?" His voice, not necessarily fearful, but clearly nervous.  
随着一声清脆的“叮咚”，电梯门开启，显露出一个真嗣再熟悉不过的楼层。这里关联着阴暗的记忆。“父亲……我们来这里做什么？”他的声音并非出于恐惧，但显然带着紧张。

"You know this place?" Gendo asked as he exited the elevator, eyes still focused on the road.  
“你知道这个地方？”源堂走出电梯，目光依旧紧盯着前方问道。

"Yes…and I don't think you want to know how." Shinji closed his eyes, trying to shake off the painful memories.  
“是的……而且我觉得你不会想知道原因。”真嗣闭上眼睛，试图摆脱那些痛苦的回忆。

Without further remarks, Gendo led Shinji passed through several checkpoints that required the highest level of clearance. In front of the final door, the older Ikari padded Shinji's shoulder and spoke up. "When you know more, you have to take more responsibilities, Shinji."  
没有再多说什么，源堂带着真嗣通过了需要最高级别权限的几个检查站。在最后一扇门前，老伊卡里拍了拍真嗣的肩膀，开口说道：“当你知道得更多时，你就得承担更多的责任，真嗣。”

The door opened. 门开了。

Soft and dim lighting… 柔和而昏暗的灯光……

Sophisticated equipment was everywhere, surrounding a smaller bed that was connected with numerous larger pillars covered in red-black textures. The walls of the room were stuffed with neatly arranged boxes with 'This side toward the enemy' printed on them.  
精密的设备遍布四周，环绕着一张较小的床，床与众多覆盖着红黑色纹理的大柱子相连。房间的墙壁上堆满了整齐排列的箱子，上面印着‘此面向敌’的字样。

On the bed, a red-haired girl was asleep with her hair all over the place, wearing a white hospital gown; a red and black necklace was around her slim neck. "A…suka?" Slowly, Shinji walked closer to her. "Wha…what have you done to her?!" He raised his volume, sounding genuinely angry.  
床上，一位红发女孩正酣睡着，头发凌乱，身着白色病号服；一条红黑相间的项链环绕在她纤细的脖颈上。“A…suka？”真嗣缓缓走近她。“什…你对她做了什么？！”他提高音量，听起来真的生气了。

"Shinji…listen carefully." Gendo's voice turned soft by a fraction of a degree. "She's not Asuka anymore."  
“真嗣…仔细听好。”源渡的声音稍稍柔和了一些。“她不再是明日香了。”

"What the hell do you mean by 'she's not Asuka anymore?!'" Shinji cried. "How is she?!"  
“你说的‘她不再是明日香了’是什么意思？！”真嗣喊道，“她现在怎么样了？！”

"The Angel did something to her. She appeared as pattern blue when we retrieved her from the entry plug." Gendo replied, keeping his gaze straight ahead. "She couldn't recognize anyone or anything."  
"天使对她做了些什么。我们从插入栓里找回她时，她呈现出蓝色模式。她无法识别任何人或任何事物。" 碇源堂回答，目光始终直视前方。

_"I would never forget about the treasured memories you gave me…"  
"我永远不会忘记你给予我的珍贵记忆……"_

_"We promised, we'll stay together forever and always!"  
"我们承诺过，要永远在一起，永不分离！"_

Shinji towered over the sleeping form of the redhead with an expression mixed with remorse, guilt, and pain. "You'd probably don't want to wake her up. She's an Angel now for all we know. Instead of eliminating her right on the spot, we're keeping her artificially sedated."  
真嗣俯视着红发少女的睡颜，脸上混杂着悔恨、愧疚和痛苦。“你大概不想叫醒她。据我们所知，她现在是个天使了。我们没有当场消灭她，而是让她处于人工昏迷状态。”

Gendo walked up next to Shinji; looking down at the girl, he knew he was the only one who could understand a fraction of the feelings that Shinji was experiencing right now. "You will have this." He said, taking the remote control out of his pocket and handing it to Shinji. "This is the detonator of the high-explosive shaped-charge mines planted in this room, as well as the DSS Choker around her neck. You are the only person who should make such a choice."  
碇源堂走到真嗣身边；低头看着女孩，他知道自己是唯一能理解真嗣此刻感受的人。“这个给你。”他说着，从口袋里拿出遥控器递给真嗣。“这是这个房间里高爆炸性成型装药地雷以及她脖子上 DSS 项圈的引爆器。只有你才有资格做出这样的选择。”

After all, he might be the only one who wouldn't ever pull the trigger, and no one else knew, especially Dr. Akagi. Of course the DSS Choker would be pointless if Shinji would never activate it, but since Dr. Akagi insisted on it, he couldn't let her get more suspicious than she already was, considering installing a safety on the Second Child was the _right_ thing to do. Gendo didn't trust the head of Project E, at all.  
毕竟，他可能是唯一一个永远不会扣动扳机的人，而且没有人知道，尤其是赤木博士。当然，如果真嗣永远不会激活 DSS 项圈，那么它就毫无意义，但既然赤木博士坚持，他不能让她比现在更怀疑，考虑到为二号适格者安装安全装置是正确的事情。源堂并不信任 E 计划的首席，一点儿也不。

Shinji took the detonator from his father's hand with a slightly trembling hand. "This room…this is not designed for her, is it?!"  
真嗣微微颤抖的手从父亲手中接过引爆器。“这个房间……不是为她设计的，对吧？！”

"Of course not. None of the devices are. I suppose you should know that." Gendo fixed his gaze at a particular pattern on the wall.  
“当然不是。所有的设备都不是。我想你应该知道这一点。”源堂的目光固定在墙上的某个图案上。

Having seen the Dead Sea Scrolls, Gendo Ikari knew in advance that the Last Angel would be human-shaped. Even though he didn't know about any other detail, he preferred to be prepared for everything.  
看过死海文书后，碇源堂提前知晓了最后的使徒将是人形。尽管他对其他细节一无所知，但他更倾向于做好万全准备。

Shinji didn't make a comment. He knew what Gendo know about SEELE and their plans, including the last Angel. He put the detonator into his pocket and took Asuka's limp hand.  
真嗣没有发表评论。他知道碇源堂对 SEELE 及其计划，包括最后使徒的了解。他将起爆器放入口袋，握住了明日香无力的手。

Looking at the comatose redhead with a pained expression, Shinji spoke up softly.  
看着昏迷的红发少女，真嗣面露痛苦之色，轻声说道。

"I'm an idiot who promised to protect you, but failed to do anything…"  
"我是个承诺要保护你却什么都没做到的傻瓜…"

The tension in his voice intensifying as he continued.  
他的声音中紧张感愈发强烈，继续说道。

He knew Asuka would rather die than being a…mindless doll. He could pull the trigger, and everything would end right here and then. He would go on for another cycle, and this Asuka's sufferings would stop as well.  
他知道明日香宁愿死也不愿成为一个…没有思想的玩偶。他可以扣动扳机，一切就会在此刻结束。他会进入下一个循环，而这个明日香的痛苦也将停止。

But he couldn't. As long as she's still alive…in some way…  
但他做不到。只要她还以某种方式活着……

He had promised. 他曾许下承诺。

"Shinji…" The said boy turned his head to the Commander. "Yes?"  
"真嗣…" 被提到的男孩转向指挥官。"什么事？"

"I'm sorry." "对不起。"

Shinji raised an eyebrow. Never before had he heard him say it. Not even the moment before Instrumentality. "Are you saying it because you don't want me to put an end to all of this?" He remarked, his tone full of sadness. Receiving no reply from him after a while, Shinji returned his eyes to the redhead.  
"真嗣挑了挑眉。他从未听他说过这样的话，甚至在人类补完计划之前也没有。“你这么说是因为不想让我结束这一切吗？”他语气中满是悲伤地问道。过了一会儿，对方没有回应，真嗣又将目光转回了红发女孩。”

"I promised." “我承诺过。”

He pulled the limp girl into a loose embrace, listening to her steady yet weak breathing.  
他将虚弱的女孩轻轻拥入怀中，聆听着她虽平稳却微弱的呼吸声。

"Even if…even if you won't look at me ever again."  
"即使…即使你再也不看我一眼。"

His volume increased. 他的声音提高了。

"Even if there's no future for me…"  
"即使我的未来没有希望…"

"I will hold on to my promise."  
“我会坚守我的承诺。”

"I promised! I promised to her!" Shinji exclaimed. Gendo Ikari watched his son silently as he stood behind him. His gaze dropped as Shinji continued to hold the Second Child. Even then, he could find solace in the fact that the world was away from ending, at least for now.  
"我答应过她！我向她承诺过！" 真嗣喊道。碇源堂静静地站在儿子身后，目光随着真嗣继续抱着第二适格者而低垂。即便如此，他仍能从中找到一丝慰藉，至少世界暂时不会走向终结。

"G-Gendo?" A shocked voice came to them. Both turned their heads and saw Dr. Akagi standing at the entrance, the notepad she was holding moments ago dropped to the floor. "And…the Third Child? Is this…wise?" She asked the last question to the Commander.  
"碇、碇司令？" 一个震惊的声音传来。两人转头，看到赤木律子站在入口处，手中的笔记本已掉落在地。"还有……第三适格者？这样做……明智吗？" 她向司令提出了最后一个问题。

"Dr. Akagi. I believe he has the right to know about the truth," he wasn't going to say anything about the truth between him and Shinji, though. "Explain it to him."  
"赤木博士。我认为他有权利知道真相，" 他并未提及自己与真嗣之间的真相。"向他解释吧。"

Ritsuko sighed. "Fine…We don't have time to give her a thorough examination yet, but it's safe to say she's been contaminated by the Angel to some degree." She picked up her notepad from the ground. "When we got her out of the entry plug, she kept saying 'I am Asuka Langley Soryu, the Second Child and the pilot of Unit 02' in German, repeatedly. She wouldn't react to any outside stimulation, nor act on her own."  
律子叹了口气。“好吧……我们还没时间给她做彻底检查，但可以肯定她受到了天使某种程度的污染。”她从地上捡起笔记本。“当我们把她从插入栓里救出来时，她不停地用德语重复‘我是惣流·明日香·兰格雷，第二适格者，02 机驾驶员’。她对外界刺激毫无反应，也没有自主行动。”

"MAGI could detect a signal of pattern blue in her…we don't know how it would affect her, but we can't take the risk. Now she's a dormant Angel the best we know."  
“MAGI 在她体内检测到了蓝色模式的信号……我们不清楚这会对她产生什么影响，但不能冒险。现在她在我们看来是一个潜伏的天使。”

"Can you…can you do anything to help her?" Shinji asked, his voice almost pleading, a sharp contrast to his usual confident, even cheeky tone.  
“你能……你能做些什么帮帮她吗？”真嗣问道，声音近乎恳求，与他平时自信甚至有些俏皮的语气形成鲜明对比。

The blond doctor glanced at the Commander, who nodded in response. "Shinji…we should've eliminated her already. In fact, if it wasn't for Commander's order we'd already had. Even if we can get her rid of the Angelic influence, her mind was destroyed enough that she's never going to be the Asuka we know before."  
金发医生瞥了一眼指挥官，后者点头回应。“真嗣……我们早该除掉她了。事实上，如果不是指挥官的命令，我们早就这么做了。即使我们能消除她的天使影响，她的心智也已经被摧毁到无法再成为我们之前认识的明日香了。”

"Then do it." Shinji's voice suddenly became stony and firm, eliciting a raised eyebrow from Ritsuko. "I will try my best… she's a valuable specimen, anyway. But I can't promise anything."  
“那就这么做吧。”真嗣的声音突然变得坚定而冷硬，让律子挑了挑眉。“我会尽力的……无论如何，她是个宝贵的样本。但我不能保证什么。”

Shinji nodded slowly and returned his gaze back to Asuka. The soft beeping sound of the monitors of her vital signs remained to be the only sound in the room for a while as neither of the three occupants in the room said anything for a long time.  
真嗣缓缓点头，目光再次回到明日香身上。监护仪上她生命体征的微弱哔哔声，成了房间里唯一的声响，三人长时间沉默不语。

Suddenly a soft humming started echoing in the room as Shinji started humming in a soothing tone.  
突然间，房间里响起了柔和的哼唱声，真嗣开始用一种抚慰的语调哼唱起来。

_"Shinji, let's go and see the stars."  
“真嗣，我们去看星星吧。”_

_"I'd like that." "我很愿意。"_

_Two pairs of eyes looking up at the sky. Hands clasped together.  
两双眼睛仰望天空。双手紧握。_

_"Shinji…what do you think is on the moon?"  
"真嗣……你觉得月亮上有什么？"_

_"Let me bring you to the moon, then we can see it by ourselves."  
“那我带你去月亮上，这样我们就能亲眼看到了。”_

**Fly me to the moon  
带我飞向月球**

**Let me play among the stars  
让我在星辰间嬉戏**

**Let me see what spring is like  
让我看看春天是何模样**

**On a-Jupiter and Mars 在木星与火星之上**

**In other words, hold my hand  
换言之，握住我的手**

**In other words, baby, kiss me  
换言之，宝贝，吻我**

**Fill my heart with song  
让我的心充满歌声**

**And let me sing for ever more  
让我永远歌唱**

**You are all I long for  
你是我所有的渴望**

**All I worship and adore  
我所崇拜与敬仰的一切**

**In other words, please be true  
换言之，请保持真实**

**In other words, 换言之，**

"I love you…" “我爱你…”

Beep…Beep…Beep…Beep…Beep 哔…哔…哔…哔…哔

"?!" Ritsuko rushed to the monitors, which was showing the heartbeat of the patient was increasing. "She's having a reaction to Shinji?!"  
“？！” 律子冲向显示器，屏幕上病人的心跳正在加速。“她对真嗣有反应了？！”

The said boy blinked. "Asuka?"  
那男孩眨了眨眼。“明日香？”

Her heartbeat gradually slowed down and returned to its previous rate.  
她的心跳逐渐放缓，恢复到了之前的频率。

"She could recognize your voice…" Ritsuko mumbled in disbelief.  
“她能认出你的声音……”律子难以置信地喃喃道。

"Shinji," Gendo spoke. The said boy turned his eyes to him. "Do something for her."  
"真嗣," 源渡开口了。被提到的男孩将目光转向他。"为她做点什么吧。"

"She's having a reaction to people and things she was familiar with." Dr. Akagi concluded, hastily taking notes. "Maybe bring her stuff she could recognize, it may have a positive effect on her."  
"她对熟悉的人和事物产生了反应。" 赤木律子博士匆忙地做着笔记。"或许带些她能认得的东西来，这可能会对她产生积极的影响。"

"I see," Shinji replied, hope finally started to flow back into his heart. "I'll be back soon."  
"我明白了," 真嗣回答道，希望终于开始重新涌入他的心中。"我很快就会回来。"

XXXXXX

"Things she could recognize…" Shinji sprinted off as soon as Section 2's SUV halted on the parking lot of his apartment.  
“她能认出的东西……”第二分部的 SUV 刚在他公寓的停车场停下，真嗣便疾跑而去。

Shinji threw the door of their bedroom open, wasting no time to begin his pivotal scavenging. The first thing he had his eyes settled on was the violin he sent her as a birthday present - the object that must've carried a significant portion of Asuka's positive memories associated with him.  
真嗣猛地推开卧室的门，毫不耽搁地开始了至关重要的搜寻。他第一眼落定的是那把作为生日礼物送给她的提琴——这件物品必定承载了与她相关的许多美好记忆。

Picking the instrument up, Shinji took a deep breath to soothe the soreness in his chest. The violin had always been one of his first choices for birthday gifts to his favorite redhead - therefore, it carried happy memories for him as well. Maybe the connection could bring her back to him.  
拿起乐器，真嗣深吸一口气以缓解胸口的酸痛。小提琴一直是他送给最喜欢的红发女孩生日礼物时的首选——因此，它也承载着快乐的回忆。也许这种联系能让她回到他身边。

Then a purple-green mix-colored wristband that was starting to gather dust on the top of her wardrobe caught his attention. Even though she wasn't wearing it anymore after they got together, in retrospect, Shinji knew she was using it to get his attention. So perhaps this could help as well.  
接着，一个紫色与绿色混合的手环吸引了他的目光，它正开始在她的衣柜顶上积灰。尽管自从他们在一起后她就不再佩戴它了，但回想起来，真嗣知道她曾用它来吸引他的注意。所以也许这也能有所帮助。

Then his vision came to her spare A-10 hair slips. Shinji picked them up without hesitation as well, knowing how meaningful they were to Asuka. Piloting an EVA was her life's purpose, or at least until he came into her life.  
随后，他的视线落在了她备用的 A-10 发夹上。真嗣毫不犹豫地也拿起了它们，深知这对明日香来说意义重大。驾驶 EVA 曾是她生活的目标，或者至少在他进入她的生活之前是如此。

Finally, his eyes stopped on a roll of paper sitting peacefully on her desk. He reached out to it and picked it up, carefully and slowly opening it. It was the portrait he drew for her.  
最终，他的目光停留在了她桌上静静躺着的一卷纸上。他伸手拿起，小心翼翼地缓缓展开。那是他为她画的那幅肖像。

He immediately noticed the difference from when he finished the drawing. Two lines of crooked texts written by a marker pen stood out on the upper righthand corner.  
他立刻注意到了与完成画作时的不同。右上角用马克笔歪歪扭扭地写着两行字，格外显眼。

Shinji read the words. Over and over again.  
真嗣读着那些字，一遍又一遍。

'Asuka Langley Soryu'  '惣流·明日香·兰格雷'

'Ich Liebe Shinji' '我爱真嗣'

XXXXXX

It doesn't change the result, anyway. In my original plan the Fourth Child would be out of the roster as well, just heavily injured instead of dead.  
作者注：很高兴有人指出真嗣崩溃并不合理。尽管正如 huginho48 和 skyf0x 所说，我只是需要一个让他杀死第四适格者的方法。无论如何，这并不改变结果。在我最初的计划中，第四适格者也会退出名单，只是受重伤而非死亡。

## *Chapter 30*: Chapter 30: Identity  
*第三十章*: 第三十章：身份

Disclaimer: I do not own Evangelion.  
免责声明：我不拥有《新世纪福音战士》。

**Chapter 30: Identity 第三十章：身份**

Emptiness. 空虚。

Darkness. 黑暗。

Eternity. 永恒。

Asuka had no idea of how long she had been trapped in here, a space without anything but darkness and her own consciousness. She lost track of time long ago – if time was still a valid concept here. She could feel she was slowly being pushed to the edge of losing her mind.  
明日香不知道自己被困在这里多久了，一个除了黑暗和她自己的意识外一无所有的空间。她早已失去了对时间的感知——如果时间在这里还有意义的话。她能感觉到自己正慢慢被推向精神崩溃的边缘。

_'Who am I?' “我是谁？”_

_'I am…'_ She tried to think, but thoughts weren't reaching her. _'Something…I forgot about…'_  
'我是…' 她试图思考，但思绪无法触及。'某件…我忘记的事…'

_You are Asuka Langley Soryu, the Second Child and the pilot of Unit 02.  
你是惣流·明日香·兰格雷，第二适格者，也是 02 号机的驾驶员。_

A voice rang in her head. She didn't remember how she got here, yet it was the first 'thing' other than her own consciousness that reached out to her ever since she woke up in the endless void. _'I am Asuka Langley Soryu? The Second Child and the pilot of Unit 02?'_ None of these phrases made sense to her.  
一个声音在她脑海中响起。她不记得自己是怎么来到这里的，但这却是自她醒来后，除了自己的意识外，第一个触及她的‘事物’。'我是惣流·明日香·兰格雷？第二适格者，02 号机的驾驶员？' 这些词句对她来说毫无意义。

Though she still felt an unspoken familiarity with them, as if she had heard them a lot of times before.  
尽管她仍感到一种无言的熟悉，仿佛之前已经听过很多次。

_And your destiny is to become one with me.  
而你的命运是与我合为一体。_

_'My…destiny?'_ Asuka pondered. _'But I want to be independent, don't I? I don't believe in destiny.'_  
'我的…命运？' 明日香沉思着。'但我想要独立，不是吗？我不相信命运。'

_Your destiny is to become one with me.  
你的命运是与我合为一体。_

_'Who are you?'_ Asuka mentally asked. She didn't even know who herself was – though her brain had told her assessing the situation first would be the best choice right now.  
'你是谁？' 明日香在心里问道。她甚至不知道自己是谁——尽管她的大脑告诉她，现在最好先评估一下情况。

_My identity is irrelevant to you. All you need to know is that I want to help you.  
我的身份对你无关紧要。你只需知道，我想帮助你。_

_'Help me?'_ She paused for a moment. _'How? Can you help me to get out…wherever this place is?'_  
'帮助我？' 她停顿了一下。'怎么帮？你能帮我离开这里……无论这是什么地方吗？'

_Yes, of course I can.  
当然可以，我当然能帮你。_

_'Then please,'_ Asuka answered. _'Please help me out.'_  
'那么请，' 明日香回答道。'请帮帮我。'

_Then just surrender._ The voices in her head came to a halt as the soft, shrill voice of a young girl rang through her ears. _That's all you have to do. Give yourself up to me, and I'll help you get out of here._  
那就投降吧。她脑海中的声音戛然而止，取而代之的是一个年轻女孩柔和而尖锐的声音在她耳边响起。你只需要这么做。把自己交给我，我会帮你离开这里。

_'Please,'_ Asuka made a mental equivalent of a nod. _'Please just do i-'_  
'请，'明日香在心中点了点头。'请就这样做——'

Suddenly a new voice came to her. It was soft, tender, and familiar. Asuka couldn't make out the source of the voice, but she could recognize the song.  
突然，一个新的声音传入她的耳中。那声音柔和、温柔，且熟悉。明日香辨不清声音的来源，但她能认出那首歌。

"Fly me to the moon…"  
“带我飞向月球…”

Asuka mentally blinked as a piece of memory flashed into her mind. She was standing on the balcony of a building she didn't know, and a person stood beside her as that person sang the song to her. Unable to come up with who that person was, Asuka could only make vague associations – affection, security, love, trust, happiness – these were linked with that person.  
明日香在心中眨了眨眼，一段记忆闪现在脑海中。她站在一个不知名的建筑的阳台上，一个人站在她身边，向她唱着这首歌。她想不起那个人是谁，只能模糊地联想到——情感、安全感、爱、信任、幸福——这些都与那个人联系在一起。

_No…_ The voice sounded panicked. _No! No! No! No!_  
不…那声音听起来惊慌失措。不！不！不！不！

A loud crash echoed throughout the void space as a crack started to form in the darkness, allowing for brilliant beams of light to seep through. _Go away!_ The voice barked. _We don't want you here!_  
一声巨响在虚空中回荡，黑暗中开始出现裂缝，让耀眼的光束得以渗透进来。走开！那声音咆哮道。我们不欢迎你！

The beam of light was seducing. Asuka couldn't help but be drawn to the light. She tried to reach out her hand to the ray of light…  
那束光极具诱惑力。明日香情不自禁地被它吸引。她试图伸出双手去触摸那道光芒…

Then surprised to see her arm appeared wherever the light shined on.  
然后惊讶地发现她的手臂出现在任何光线照射到的地方。

Even though she could only see the part of her body where the light was, she could still make out the cloth she was wearing – red, black, green-  
尽管她只能看到身体被光照亮的部分，但她仍能辨认出自己所穿的布料——红色、黑色、绿色——

"I am the Second Child, the pilot of Unit 02," Asuka muttered to herself as she saw the light shined on her chest that had a big '02' imprinted on it.  
“我是二号机驾驶员，第二适格者，”明日香喃喃自语，她看到光线照在胸前，那里印着一个大大的‘02’。

As she continued to examine herself under the beam, the song continued to sound in the distance, echoing in the void.  
当她继续在光束下审视自己时，那首歌仍在远处回响，在虚空中回荡。

"I love you…" “我爱你…”

Asuka blinked. Even under her current state, this particular phrase - it was something she had always wanted to hear – and the voice…  
明日香眨了眨眼。即便在当前的状态下，这句话——她一直渴望听到的话语——以及那个声音……

It was familiar. 那声音很熟悉。

"Who…" “谁……”

Suddenly the light disappeared, leaving a confused Asuka alone in the void once again.  
突然间，光芒消失了，留下困惑的明日香再次独自处于虚空之中。

XXXXXX

"No change in her condition was detected since you went home," Dr. Akagi's voice remained professional as usual.  
“自你回家后，她的状况没有检测到变化，”赤城博士的声音一如既往地保持专业。

Being the most brilliant person in NERV, she had a real hard time comprehending the Commander's behaviors. For all she knew, the Second Child had always been the expandable one since the moment she was selected as an EVA pilot. Even if Gendo wanted to maintain a somewhat powerful EVA roster, now that she turned into an Angel, there was no reason for him to still keep the threat alive - let alone deep down in the Central Dogma.  
作为 NERV 中最聪明的人，她实在难以理解司令的行为。据她所知，从被选为 EVA 驾驶员的那一刻起，二号机驾驶员就一直是个可牺牲的角色。即使碇源堂想要维持一支强大的 EVA 队伍，现在她变成了使徒，他也没有理由继续保留这个威胁——更不用说深藏在中央教条区了。

Unless… 除非……

She could see how Gendo acted around Shinji - quiet and collected but not overwhelming nor suffocating, unlike how he made other people around him always felt. She had never seen him like this ever before; the disparity was concerning to her.  
她能看出碇源堂在真嗣周围的行为——安静、沉着，但不过分压迫也不令人窒息，与他对周围其他人总是造成的感觉截然不同。她以前从未见过他这样；这种差异让她感到不安。

Turning to look at the comatose redhead, Ritsuko let out a sigh mixed with anxiety and dread. Asuka – if the motionless mass of flesh lying there was still her – could wake up and kill everyone in the room using some Angelic powers before the DSS Choker could even take effect for all she knew.  
转向看着昏迷的红发女孩，律子叹出一口气，混杂着焦虑与恐惧。明日香——如果那躺在那里一动不动的肉体还是她的话——可能会在 DSS 项圈生效之前，用某种天使般的力量醒来并杀死房间里的每个人。

Even though this room was specifically designed for containing an Angel – or more precisely, a specific Angel – they never were sure whether the mechanism would actually work. And the fact that as soon as a blue pattern appears in this room, the mines would go off automatically didn't help soothe the dread and anxiety, only worsening it.  
尽管这个房间专为囚禁使徒——更确切地说，是某个特定的使徒——而设计，但他们始终不确定这机制是否真的有效。而一旦房间内出现蓝色图案，地雷就会自动引爆的事实，不仅没有缓解恐惧和焦虑，反而加剧了这种情绪。

Shinji, who had just come back from home with a box of gadgets, was sitting on the bed beside Asuka, preparing his cello and the bow. Objects, no matter how familiar she was to them, had no effect on her. And judging from her previous reactions to Shinji, probably only sounds were the only thing that could reach her under her current condition.  
刚刚从家里带着一箱小玩意回来的真嗣，正坐在明日香旁边的床上，准备他的大提琴和弓。无论她对这些物品多么熟悉，它们对她都没有影响。而从她之前对真嗣的反应来看，可能只有声音才能在她目前的状态下触动她。

Knowing the favorite instrument of his love, Shinji had spent some of his time with Asuka learning to play violin from her, a time both of them enjoyed immensely. But unfortunately, the pitch tuning of cellos is different from violins, or he would've performed this using the birthday gift he gave her.  
知道他心爱的人最喜欢的乐器，真嗣曾花时间与明日香一起向她学习小提琴，那是一段他们都非常享受的时光。但遗憾的是，大提琴的调音与小提琴不同，否则他会用他送给她的生日礼物来演奏。

"Your mother used to play a lot of cello," Gendo spoke up, his voice calm as usual, though carrying an unmistakable hint of sorrow in it. "And I like to play pianos. Music was one thing that brought us together."  
“你母亲过去常拉大提琴，”源渡开口道，他的声音一如既往地平静，尽管带着一丝难以掩饰的哀伤。“而我喜欢弹钢琴。音乐是我们之间为数不多的纽带之一。”

Shinji let out a breath. "I guess I really inherited your talents in music, then."  
真嗣轻叹一声。“那我大概是真的继承了你们在音乐上的天赋吧。”

Knowing how dangerous it was to expose too much in front of the intelligent doctor, Gendo decided to take a more ambiguous approach. "You have a lot in common with Yui and me. Not only the appearance."  
深知在聪明绝顶的医生面前暴露过多是危险的，源堂决定采取更为含糊的策略。“你和我们有很多共同点，不仅仅是外表。”

_'And the fact I could switch between Yui mode and Gendo mode?'_ Shinji chuckled internally. Truthfully he could be kind, gentle, and compassionate like her mother used to be. But time changes people. If a few years were enough to make Gendo into a person who cared about nothing other than the one in his life, what would dozens or even hundreds of cycles do to him?  
"我能自如切换优模式和源堂模式的事实呢？" 真嗣在内心轻笑。确实，他可以像母亲曾经那样温柔、善良、富有同情心。但时间改变人。如果几年时间就足以让源堂变成一个只在乎生命中那唯一的人，那么几十甚至几百个轮回又会对他产生怎样的影响呢？

He wanted to ask why his father abandoned him ten years ago, a decisive moment for his life - but the presence of a third person here denied that option. He hated him, not only for his crimes committed against Asuka, but also for making him stuck inside this endless cycle.  
他想问父亲十年前为何抛弃他，那是他生命中的一个决定性时刻——但这里有个第三者在场，让他无法开口。他恨他，不仅因为他对明日香犯下的罪行，还因为他让自己陷入这个无尽的循环中。

He didn't have a choice but to be thrown into the eddy of loops with EVAs.  
他别无选择，只能被卷入 EVA 的循环漩涡中。

Still, Shinji found himself no longer being able to vent all of his frustrations onto this Gendo anymore. After all, he had been nothing but helpful, perhaps in a genuine way, ever since this cycle started.  
尽管如此，真嗣发现自己再也无法将所有的不满发泄在这个碇源堂身上了。毕竟，自从这个循环开始以来，他一直都很帮忙，也许是以一种真诚的方式。

It was all his own fault that Asuka got hurt so badly. In fact, if it was not for his father, she would've died already, several times.  
这一切都是他自己的错，明日香受了这么重的伤。事实上，如果不是他的父亲，她可能已经死了好几次了。

"I know how it feels." Gendo started again, ignoring the raised eyebrows from Dr. Akagi. Knowing how similar they were, Gendo thought he could actually emphasize with his son, at least to some degree. He had no idea what the other Gendos did to him and the Second Child, but judging from his own personality, he was sure those wouldn't be soft ones.  
“我知道那是什么感觉。”碇源堂再次开口，无视了赤木律子博士挑起的眉毛。知道他们有多相似，碇源堂认为自己实际上能与儿子产生某种程度的共鸣。他不知道其他碇源堂对他和二号机驾驶员做了什么，但根据他自己的性格判断，他确信那些不会是温和的手段。

Shinji nodded, then sat down on the chair at her bedside. "I want you to know that I'm here for you, Asuka." Shinji slid the bow across the strings.  
真嗣点点头，然后在她的床边坐下。“我想让你知道，我在这里陪着你，明日香。”真嗣在弦上滑动弓子。

Slowly, he started stroking the strings on the cello with all of his gentleness.  
他缓缓地开始用所有的温柔抚摸大提琴的弦。

Bach's Cello Suite Number 1 in G Major.  
巴赫 G 大调第一大提琴组曲。

The music composition that carried so many memories. The music he played on the day of their first kiss. The piece of art he played only for the girl he loved and hurt the most.  
那承载着无数记忆的乐曲。他在他们初吻那天演奏的旋律。那件只为最爱的女孩演奏、却也伤她最深的艺术品。

If he only knew better…  
如果他当时能更明白些……

Maybe there was a chance for him to fix everything.  
或许他还有机会弥补一切。

"A reaction!" Dr. Akagi exclaimed in shock. Knowing how heavily sedated the girl was, it was beyond biological for her to have any reaction to outside stimulations. "Her heartbeat is quickening! Brain activity increasing!"  
"有反应了！" 赤城博士震惊地喊道。考虑到女孩被深度麻醉的程度，她对外界刺激产生反应是超乎生理常理的。"她的心跳在加速！脑活动也在增强！"

Shinji felt a tug at his heart, knowing she's still there with him and he could somehow reach out to her. He didn't slow down in his performance.  
真嗣感到心中一阵牵动，知道她仍在那里与他同在，他似乎能以某种方式触及她。他的表现并未因此放缓。

"Asuka…Remember that…your Shinji is always here for you."  
“明日香……记住……你的真嗣永远在这里支持你。”

"I am the Second Child, the pilot of Unit 02…" Asuka whispered the exact phrase repeatedly, trying to come up with memories associated with the words. Images and scenes flashed into her mind – EVA Unit 02, combat training, Angel battles-  
“我是第二适格者，02 机驾驶员……”明日香反复低语着这句话，试图唤起与这些词相关的记忆。图像和场景在她脑海中闪现——EVA 02 机、战斗训练、使徒战斗——

There was another EVA that was fighting beside her. But she couldn't remember what it was.  
还有另一台 EVA 在与她并肩作战。但她记不清那是什么了。

"But…who am I?" She mumbled to herself. "Who is Asuka Langley Soryu?"  
"但…我是谁？" 她喃喃自语。"惣流·明日香·兰格雷是谁？"

_You are my doll, and you will surrender!  
你是我的玩偶，你得屈服！_

"No, I am not your doll, I am myself!" Asuka shot back. "No matter who you are, I'm not giving in!"  
“不，我不是你的玩偶，我是我自己！”明日香反击道，“无论你是谁，我都不会屈服！”

_Pathetic. 可悲。_

Suddenly she was assaulted by a wave of unpleasant sensations. Pain exploded across her reidentified body, making her scream in agony.  
突然间，她被一波不愉快的感官冲击所侵袭。疼痛在她重新识别的身体上炸裂开来，使她痛苦地尖叫起来。

_Surrender, or Suffer! 投降，否则受苦！_

"I...will...never..." Asuka gritted her teeth as the pain quickly accumulated to the level of 'intolerable'. But she wouldn't give in.  
“我...绝不...屈服...” 明日香咬紧牙关，疼痛迅速累积到了‘无法忍受’的程度。但她不会屈服。

Suddenly, the beam of light shined again, this time from a crack larger and brighter. With the light, a familiar tone sounded, echoing in the endless void.  
突然，光线再次照射进来，这次是从一个更大更亮的裂缝中。随着光线，一个熟悉的声音响起，在无尽的虚空中回荡。

_Why you again!_ The voice turned irritated.  
怎么又是你！声音变得不耐烦起来。

Asuka wasted no time and bathed in the beam of light, revealing whole herself, the sensations instantly flushed away. From the crack, she could see the face of a boy, showing a loving smile at her…  
明日香毫不犹豫地沐浴在光束中，整个人完全显现，瞬间的感受一扫而空。从裂缝中，她能看到一个男孩的脸，向她展露着深情的微笑……

She couldn't recognize the face, but she felt he was someone important to her, someone who meant a lot. "Help me!"  
她认不出那张脸，但她感觉他是她生命中重要的人，一个意义非凡的人。“救救我！”

"I want you to know that I'm here for you, Asuka."  
"我想让你知道，我在这里陪着你，明日香。"

The girl found herself at a loss for words. "I am…Asuka." A new wave of images and memories rushed into her mind. She was wearing a yellow sundress and standing inside the terminal of an airport. The boy was standing in front of her.  
女孩发现自己一时语塞。“我是……明日香。”一股新的影像和记忆涌入她的脑海。她穿着一件黄色的太阳裙，站在机场航站楼内。男孩站在她面前。

_"I am Shinji Ikari, nice to meet you."  
“我是碇真嗣，很高兴见到你。”_

"Shinji…" “真嗣……”

Love.

Joy.

Happiness. 幸福。

Trust. 信任。

"Asuka…Remember that…your Shinji is always here for you."  
“明日香……记住……你的真嗣永远在这里支持你。”

CRACK

_Go away!_ The voice cried again. _She's mine! All mine! You can't have her!_  
走开！那声音再次喊道。她是我的！全都是我的！你不能拥有她！

Though it did little to stop Asuka from slowly drifting toward the crack in the void. Following the beam of light that shined on her, the girl reached out.  
尽管这并未能阻止明日香缓缓向虚空中的裂缝飘去。随着照在她身上的光束，女孩伸出了手。

"Shinji…is whom Asuka loved. And…I am Asuka."  
“真嗣……是明日香所爱的人。而……我就是明日香。”

Then she remembered. Everything she had been through, all of the pain, loneliness, and self-loathing she went through after her mother died, then the happiness, love, and trust she received and reciprocated after she met Shinji.  
然后她想起来了。她经历的一切，母亲去世后的所有痛苦、孤独和自我厌恶，以及遇到真嗣后所感受到的幸福、爱与信任，并予以回应。

A tear rolled down her face. "Idiot…even now, you're keeping your promise. I'm not alone…"  
一滴泪珠滑过她的脸颊。“傻瓜……即便到了现在，你还在坚守承诺。我并不孤单……”

_No! No! NO! 不！不！不！_

Completely ignoring the voice, Asuka looked up at the boy through the crack while he looked back down at her. His face was stationary, as if he were waiting for her to say something. Asuka raised her hand and reached out to the crack when she was close enough. "Just…a little bit more…"  
完全无视那声音，明日香透过缝隙抬头看向男孩，而他低头回望着她。他的表情静止不动，仿佛在等待她说些什么。明日香举起手，当她足够接近时，伸向缝隙。“就……再一点点……”

As soon as her finger went through the crack, the endless black void was instantly swept away. Then everything went white as it turned the world into engulfing brightness.  
她的手指一穿过缝隙，无尽的黑暗虚空瞬间被扫除。随后，一切变得雪白，将世界转变为吞噬一切的明亮。

Shinji let out a sorrowful sigh after his performance came to an end and still seeing no other significant changes in Asuka's condition. Putting his cello away, he looked at the comatose redhead with his eyelids dropped.  
真嗣在表演结束后发出一声哀伤的叹息，依然没有看到明日香状况的显著变化。他将大提琴收好，看着昏迷的红发女孩，眼睑低垂。

His mind drifted back to the portrait he drew for her. Only because it was their secret, something that could only be shared among the two of them, he didn't bring it here to the ward. Still, what she wrote on the paper…  
他的思绪飘回到了为她画的那幅肖像上。正因为那是他们之间的秘密，只能由两人共享，他没有把它带到病房来。然而，她在纸上写下的那些话……

_Ich Liebe Shinji… 我爱绫波……_

Shinji sniffed. Just how many times had he heard her say the same phrase to him? And how many times he felt he didn't deserve it from her? He wanted to earn it from her, but he couldn't. Accepting her love without the original Asuka forgiving him was never an option for him.  
绫波吸了吸鼻子。她对他说过多少次同样的话？而他又有多少次觉得自己不配得到她的爱？他想要赢得她的爱，却做不到。在没有原版明日香原谅他的情况下，接受她的爱对他来说从来都不是一个选项。

Still, every time she said it to him, it meant more to him. _She_ meant more to him, if that was even possible, that she had already been the only thing that mattered to him.  
尽管如此，每次她对他说这话时，对他来说意义都更深一层。她在他的心中分量更重了，如果这还有可能的话，她已经是他唯一在乎的人了。

"I need to try something else…" Shinji turned away from Asuka.  
“我需要尝试些别的……” 真嗣转身背对着明日香。

Then just to be stopped by Gendo putting one hand on his shoulders. "Father?" He raised his head, his expression quizzical.  
然后被源堂用一只手按住肩膀阻止了。“父亲？”他抬起头，表情带着疑惑。

Gendo gently turned Shinji back to face Asuka.  
源渡轻轻地将真嗣转过身来面对明日香。

"…?!" Shinji couldn't believe what he thought he had seen.  
“……？！”真嗣无法相信自己刚才所见。

A tear was rolling down her pale face.  
一滴泪水正顺着她苍白的脸颊滑落。

"Ritsuko-san!" Shinji shouted; the blonde doctor rushed to the bedside. "Impossible…" Dr. Akagi mumbled as she saw the fresh tear on her face. "She's so heavily sedated I doubt she could still feel anything! My money is on the Angel acting, it can't be her! Biologically, there's just no way!"  
"理津子小姐！" 真嗣喊道；金发医生冲到床边。"不可能……" 赤木博士喃喃自语，她看到她脸上新鲜的泪痕。"她被深度镇静，我怀疑她还能感觉到什么！我的赌注是使徒在作祟，不可能是她！从生物学上讲，这根本不可能！"

"It's gotta be her! Angels don't cry!" Shinji said back. Even from the most human-like Angel, Kaworu Nagisa, he'd never seen him shed one tear, even under the grimmest situations nonetheless.  
"肯定是她！使徒不会流泪！" 真嗣反驳道。即使是与人类最为相似的使徒，渚薰，他也从未见过他流下一滴眼泪，更不用说在最严峻的情况下。"

Shinji leaned over and took her right hand with both of his hands. "Asuka? Asuka!"  
真嗣俯身，双手握住她的右手。"明日香？明日香！"

The beeping sound of the machines grew increasingly faster.  
机器的哔哔声越来越快。

"Brain activity approaching threshold!" Dr. Akagi exclaimed, looking at the readings intently. "Get ready for everything! Give me a flashlight!"  
“脑活动接近阈值！”赤城博士惊呼，紧盯着读数。“准备好一切！给我手电筒！”

Slowly, Asuka's eyes cracked open.  
慢慢地，明日香的眼睑缓缓张开。

Asuka's thoughts had changed slightly, but she had yet to notice that there had been a minor brightening in her vision. It was no longer completely dark, but a soft and blurry gray light was now filtering in.  
明日香的想法稍稍改变了，但她尚未注意到视野中出现了一丝微弱的明亮。不再是完全的黑暗，而是透过了一层柔和而模糊的灰光。

Suddenly her vision was filled with brightness, only it was all foggy and cloudy for reasons she couldn't come to think of. She could see something, feel something touching her hand, and then rays of light flashed before her right eye, her left eye vision was still black for some reason.  
突然间，她的视野充满了光亮，只是这一切都朦胧且模糊，原因她一时想不明白。她能看到些什么，感觉到有什么触碰着她的手，随后光线在她右眼前闪烁，而左眼的视野依旧是一片漆黑。

Someone was holding her shoulders then and helping her sit up, and a blurry face was directly before her, someone she loved-  
有人扶着她的肩膀，帮助她坐起来，一张模糊的脸庞直接出现在她面前，是她所爱的人——

"Asuka? Come on, can you see me? Can you hear me? Who am I?"  
"明日香？拜托，你能看到我吗？能听到我吗？我是谁？"

The said girl blinked, trying to clear her still blurry vision. Again she fluttered her eyelids, and her vision cleared a little more.  
那位女孩眨了眨眼，试图清除她仍然模糊的视线。她再次眨动眼睑，视野稍微清晰了一些。

"Shinji," she croaked softly, as his face swam into focus. Her mind was still hazy, but it didn't prevent her from recognizing her love.  
"真嗣，"她轻声嘶哑地说道，当他的脸庞进入焦点时。她的思绪仍然朦胧，但这并不妨碍她认出她的爱人。

"She needs some water," Shinji said. Gendo picked up the water cup that was sitting on the cart and handed it to Shinji. The boy put the cup below her mouth and quickly offered her a straw to drink from.  
“她需要点水。” 真嗣说道。源堂拿起放在推车上的水杯递给真嗣。男孩将杯子放在她嘴边，迅速递给她一根吸管让她喝。

Asuka took the straw into her mouth and sucked weakly; the cool liquid slid into her mouth, down her parched and aching throat. Her tongue and throat felt dry, devoid of moisture, rendering her mouth challenging to talk, but there was something she needed to say-  
明日香含住吸管，虚弱地吸吮着；清凉的液体滑入她的口中，顺着干涸疼痛的喉咙流下。她的舌头和喉咙感到干燥，缺乏水分，使得说话变得困难，但她有些话必须说——

She took a deep breath and released the straw.  
她深吸一口气，放开了吸管。

"Better? How do you feel, Asuka?" Shinji asked, keeping their eyes in contact.  
“好些了吗？你感觉如何，明日香？”真嗣问道，保持着目光接触。

"I..." Asuka started again softly, just to be interrupted by a series of violent coughs.  
"我……" 明日香再次轻声开口，却又被一连串剧烈的咳嗽打断。

"Here, you need to drink more water." Said Shinji, quickly offering her the straw once again.  
"这里，你需要多喝点水。" 真嗣说着，迅速再次递给她吸管。

Asuka wrapped her lips around the pipe and took a deep sip, her muscles still sore. Though it wouldn't stop her.  
明日香将嘴唇环绕在吸管上，深深地吸了一口，她的肌肉依旧酸痛。但这并不会阻止她。

"I love you Shinji," Asuka mustered all of her strength to speak. "Please don't let me go ever again."  
"我爱你，真嗣，" 明日香用尽全力说道，"请永远不要再让我离开。"

Shinji's smile was brighter than anything she could ever remember seeing. It was so immensely bright and warm, that Asuka suspected she might as well be staring at the supernova as she melted under the look.  
真嗣的笑容比她记忆中任何事物都要灿烂。它是如此的明亮和温暖，以至于明日香怀疑自己仿佛正凝视着超新星，在这目光下融化。

"I'll never let you go, or leave you Asuka. I promise. I'll always be at your side. Alright?"  
“我永远不会让你离开，也不会离开你，明日香。我保证。我会一直在你身边。好吗？”

Asuka nodded, smiling a satisfactory smile.  
明日香点点头，露出了满意的微笑。

Dr. Akagi felt her heart sore as envy slowly crept up in her chest.  
赤木博士感到心中一阵酸楚，嫉妒之情慢慢在胸中蔓延。

Gendo Ikari watched the whole scene with his lips curled up by a minuscule amount. It reminded him of his brighter days with Yui.  
碇源堂目睹了整个场景，嘴角微微上扬。这让他想起了与唯在一起的那些光明日子。

Then the Angel alarm sounded. Shinji let go of her hand and stood up, still smiling at the redhead he loved.  
随后，使徒警报响起。真嗣松开了她的手，站起身来，依旧对着他深爱的红发女孩微笑。

"Asuka… I'll be right back."  
“明日香……我马上回来。”

The girl nodded weakly, half-losing her eyes. She was still too tired to say anything, though from the smile she was wearing on her face, Shinji could already get the answer he wanted.  
女孩虚弱地点了点头，眼神半失。她仍然太过疲惫，无法说出任何话，但从她脸上挂着的微笑，真嗣已经得到了他想要的答案。

"It's you again, huh," Shinji turned around and looked at the ceiling. "Though this time…it will be different."  
“又是你啊，”真嗣转过身，望向天花板。“不过这次……会有所不同。”

He turned to look at Commander Ikari. "Father?"  
他转向看向碇司令。“父亲？”

"I'm listening." Gendo straightened up.  
"我在听着。" 源度挺直了身子。

"I need the Lance of Longinus."  
"我需要朗基努斯之枪。"

XXXXXX
