## *Chapter 31*: Chapter 31: Revenge  
*第 31 章*: 第 31 章：复仇

Disclaimer: I do not own Evangelion  
免责声明：我不拥有《新世纪福音战士》

**Chapter 31: Revenge 第 31 章：复仇**

"Oh well, that was quick," Dr. Akagi remarked as she saw Shinji enter the containment room. Taking a glance at her watch, she continued, "it's only been three hours."  
"哦，真快啊，" 赤城博士看到真嗣进入隔离室时说道。她瞥了一眼手表，继续说，"才过了三个小时。"

Shinji smirked. "I had the Lance of Longinus, after all."  
真嗣微微一笑。"毕竟我有朗基努斯之枪。"

_"Major!" Hyuga called in a hurried voice. "The Angel has already breached 18 layers of armor! It's only a matter of time until it reaches the Geofront!"  
"少校！" 日向急促地喊道，"使徒已经突破了 18 层装甲！它很快就会到达 Geofront！"_

_"Shit." Major Katsuragi hissed, looking at the screen of Hyuga's terminal. She had just come back from the explosion site with her left arm in bandages, just to be dragged back to the frontline. What's worse, she hadn't seen Asuka yet, knowing Unit 02 was also an Angel didn't help soothe the worry in her chest. "Where's Asuka?! Is she still battle-ready?"  
"该死。" 葛城美里少校咝咝地吸了口气，盯着日向的终端屏幕。她刚从爆炸现场回来，左臂缠着绷带，却又被拖回了前线。更糟糕的是，她还没见到明日香，得知 02 号机也是使徒，这让她心中的担忧丝毫未减。"明日香在哪里？！她还能战斗吗？"_

_"Under Dr. Akagi's care!" It was a standard reply to anyone who didn't need to know about the truth.  
"在赤木博士的照顾下！" 这是对那些不需要知道真相的人的标准回答。_

_18 layers of armor had been completely destroyed so far, and only four more stood in its way before it would penetrate the Geofront. "We won't have time to get Unit 01 onto the surface in time. Send him to the Geofront. He'll have to confront the Angel in front of Headquarters!"  
18 层装甲已被完全摧毁，只剩下四层阻挡在它与第三新东京市之间。"我们没时间把 01 号机及时送上地面了。让他去第三新东京市。他必须在总部前迎战使徒！"_

_"Roger." Hyuga replied, punching in a code to set the EVA's destination. Once in, he slammed down on the red button of his terminal, shooting the Purple Evangelion along with the Lance of Longinus from the cages into a series of shafts until it finally emerged in front of the pyramid, the iconic symbol that NERV had become so closely associated with.  
“罗杰。” 日向回应道，输入代码设定 EVA 的目的地。一旦设定完成，他猛地按下终端上的红色按钮，将紫色福音连同朗基努斯之枪从笼中射入一系列通道，最终使其出现在金字塔前，这个 NERV 如此著名的标志性建筑。_

_Suddenly there was a loud rumbling sound that came from the surface, which could even be heard from the depths of Central Dogma, causing the entire Command Center to shake violently. Everyone looked around at one another, trying to find the source of the sudden tremor, only for Aoba to announce it to everyone. "The Angel has breached the Geofront!" He exclaimed, his eyes wide. "It's making its way towards Headquarters!"  
突然间，地表传来一阵巨大的轰鸣声，即便在中央教条的深处也能听到，导致整个指挥中心剧烈摇晃。众人面面相觑，试图找出震动的源头，直到青叶向大家宣布：“使徒已经突破了地底都市！”他惊呼道，双眼圆睁。“它正朝总部逼近！”_

_"Fuck!" Misato looked up at the giant holographic projection of the Geofront hovering before the entire Command Center, spotting the blue dot near the top of the hologram slowly making its way down to the red one at the bottom. "What's Rei's status? I don't want Shinji fighting that thing alone!"  
“该死！” 美里抬头望向悬浮在指挥中心上方的巨大全息投影，那是地底都市的影像，她注意到蓝色光点在全息图顶部缓缓向底部的红色光点移动。“丽的情况如何？我不希望真嗣独自对抗那东西！”_

_"She's already in Unit 00, though the EVA is still heavily damaged from the last battle!"  
"她已经进入了 00 号机，但 EVA 仍因上一场战斗而严重受损！"_

_"Shinji, what's your situation?"  
"真嗣，你的情况如何？"_

_"Locked and loaded." He answered as Unit 01 grabbed a 406 millimeter Gatling gun from the stockpiles of weapons that had been delivered to him position for this fight. "I'm about to make contact with the Angel." The boy looked up towards the breached ceiling of the Geofront, taking aim at the descending creature. Its blocky greenish frame slowly descended towards him, its bright red core shimmering as it grew closer.  
"锁定并装填完毕。" 他回答道，01 号机从为他这场战斗准备的武器库中抓起一把 406 毫米加特林枪。"我即将与使徒接触。" 少年抬头望向被破坏的地下都市天花板，瞄准了正在下降的生物。它那绿色方块状的身躯缓缓下落，随着接近，其鲜红色的核心闪烁着光芒。"_

_Shinji was able to get a good look at its head, if you could call it that. Above its core, a skeletal-like face protruded out of its body, two black holes serving as its eyes, and a black, abyssal maw for a mouth. Not wasting any more time, Shinji rose the giant multi-barreled gun and took aim at the beast before holding down the trigger. The six long metal barrels started spinning, gaining a decent speed of around six rotations per second before the bullets started flying. With an endless series of concussive bangs, Unit 01 unloaded the massive weapon into its target. Hundreds of giant AP shells hurdled their way towards the monster, each one bouncing off of its AT-Field.  
真嗣得以仔细观察它的头部，如果你能称之为头部的话。在其核心上方，一个骷髅般的面孔从它的身体中凸出，两个黑洞充当眼睛，一张漆黑无底的巨口作为嘴巴。真嗣没有浪费更多时间，他举起那把巨大的多管机枪，瞄准怪物，按下扳机。六根长长的金属枪管开始旋转，达到每秒约六转的速度后，子弹便开始呼啸而出。随着一连串震耳欲聋的巨响，初号机将这把重型武器的火力倾泻向目标。数百发巨大的穿甲弹疾驰向怪物，每一发都在其 AT 力场前弹开。_

_"No use as always." Shinji huffed and threw the gun aside. Picking up the Lance of Longinus that stood on the ground beside him, Shinji took aim at the core of the Angel, and threw it with all of his might.  
“一如既往地没用。” 真嗣哼了一声，将枪扔到一旁。他拾起身边地上的朗基努斯之枪，瞄准了使徒的核心，用尽全力投掷出去。_

_Zeruel saw the incoming object, at first unperturbed by its existence. Though as the Lance flew closer to him at sonic speed, it felt a great sense of freezing and killing intent from it, thus it uncurled its ribbon-like arms and shot them forward in a desperate attempt to intercept it.  
零号使徒看到了飞来的物体，起初并未在意其存在。然而，随着那柄长枪以音速逼近，它感受到了一股强烈的冰冷杀意，于是它展开了如同缎带般的双臂，急切地向前射出，试图拦截。_

_Then the Lance of Longinus sliced through everything on its path without even slowing down, making a huge clank noise as it collided with the Angel's AT-Field.  
随后，朗基努斯之枪毫不减速地贯穿了路径上的一切，与使徒的 AT 力场碰撞时发出巨大的铿锵声。_

_Zeruel tried to resist, then soon found itself unable to as the Lance morphed into a drill and pierced through the forcefield it held great pride in like a piece of paper, then hit its shining red core.  
零尔试图抵抗，但很快发现自己无能为力，因为长枪变形为钻头，像穿透一张纸一样刺穿了它引以为傲的力场，随后击中了它那闪耀的红核。_

_The momentum of the Lance made it continue to travel forward and pushed Zeruel along with it, finally coming to an end as the Lance made contact with the wall of the Geofront, pinning the egg-shaped body of the Angel on it.  
长枪的冲力使其继续前行，推着零尔一起，最终在接触到地底都市的墙壁时停下，将天使蛋形的身体钉在了墙上。_

_"Not so strong now, huh?" Cracking an evil grin, Shinji willed Unit 01 walk closer to the Angel, which was showing fear from its eyes. "I'll tell you now, what I'm about to do, to your stubborn, annoying existence… I'm gonna enjoy it…very very much."  
“现在不那么强了吧？”真嗣露出邪恶的笑容，命令初号机走向那眼中流露出恐惧的天使。“我现在要对你这顽固讨厌的存在做的事……我会非常非常享受的。”_

"It's a piece of cake." Then, with a nonchalant reply, Shinji walked back to Asuka's bedside, who was bandaged around her head, though from her sitting position he knew she was in a better shape than before. "Why the bandage?" Shinji asked.  
"小菜一碟。" 随后，带着一副漫不经心的回答，真嗣走回到明日香的床边，她头上缠着绷带，但从她坐着的姿势来看，他知道她比之前状态好多了。"为什么缠着绷带？" 真嗣问道。

"Well, the Angelic traces in her body mostly vanished, save for some…minuscule emission from her left eye. The bandage is here to hold the…stopgap I developed in place." Ritsuko replied, her eyes still focused on her notebook. Commander Ikari was nowhere to be seen, presumably back in his office. "It won't stay there forever, though. I have an alternative for…better appearances."  
"嗯，她体内的使徒痕迹大部分消失了，除了她左眼中的一些…微小的放射。绷带是为了固定我开发的…临时措施。" 律子回答道，她的眼睛仍然专注于她的笔记本。碇司令不见踪影，大概回到了他的办公室。"不过，它不会一直留在那里。我有一个替代方案，为了…更好的外观。"

"Did she know…" Shinji threw a glance at the redhead.  
"她知道吗…" 真嗣瞥了一眼红发的少女。

"Yeah, I know," Asuka spoke up abruptly, her voice sad, carrying an unreadable undertone. "Dr. Akagi told me about the Angelic possession in my body. Though I'm just happy that I made it out alive. You know, it could've…impregnated me, or worse."  
“嗯，我知道，”明日香突然开口，声音带着悲伤，夹杂着难以解读的深意。“赤木博士告诉我关于天使附身在我体内的事。尽管我很庆幸自己能活下来。你知道，它本可能……让我怀孕，甚至更糟。”

"Believe me, that was one of the worries," Dr. Akagi remarked, eliciting a raised eyebrow from Asuka. "Though initial examinations came out fine, there are still few things I want to make sure of. And in the meantime, she's not leaving this place."  
"相信我，那确实是我的担忧之一，" 赤城博士说道，引起了明日香挑眉的反应。"虽然初步检查结果正常，但仍有几项我需要确认的事项。与此同时，她不能离开这个地方。"

Shinji nodded in agreement. No matter how much he hated the idea of putting Asuka in an Angel-containment room that could explode and wipe out the only thing that mattered to him, Angel biology – if they had such – was something he had no knowledge in. "I…I understand." He sighed. "Does Misato…or anyone else know?"  
真嗣点头表示同意。无论他多么讨厌将明日香安置在一个可能爆炸并摧毁他唯一在乎的东西——使徒生物（如果它们有的话）——的使徒隔离室里，他对使徒生物学一无所知。"我……我明白。"他叹了口气。"美里……或者其他人知道吗？"

"No. The Commander had insisted Asuka's condition classified."  
"不，司令官坚持要将明日香的情况列为机密。"

"Wait, you can't do that," Shinji said before Asuka could protest on her own. "You can't just keep her here forever!"  
“等等，你不能那样做，”真嗣在明日香自己抗议之前说道。“你不能永远把她留在这里！”

"I know. But we need to eliminate every outside factor possible," the blonde doctor adjusted her lab coat. "I'm sorry, Shinji, but this is what we have to do, at least for now."  
"我知道。但我们需要尽可能排除所有外部因素，"金发女医生调整了一下她的实验服。"对不起，真嗣，但这是我们必须做的，至少目前如此。"

Shinji pondered for a moment. Of course he could just tell Misato Asuka's condition himself. But would it actually help? Before, the disclosure of information had always been his last attempt on fighting back against the Commander, but since now that they were more or less on the same side…  
真嗣沉思了一会儿。当然，他可以直接告诉美里明日香的情况。但这真的会有帮助吗？以前，信息的披露一直是他对付司令的最后手段，但现在他们或多或少站在同一阵线……

"Fine." He turned to Asuka with a sigh. "Asuka, do you want something to eat? I can cook you something in the kitchen just upstairs. I promise it won't take long."  
"好吧。" 他叹了口气，转向明日香。"明日香，你想吃点什么吗？我可以在楼上的厨房给你做点东西。我保证不会花太长时间。"

"Yeah." Her voice was sullen as there was clearly something else gawking at her.  
"嗯。" 她的声音显得闷闷不乐，显然有别的事情在困扰着她。"

"Alright, I'll be right back," Shinji promised before turning around and left the room, though it didn't stop him from looking back at the redhead for every ten steps he took.  
"好的，我马上回来，"真嗣承诺道，转身离开了房间，尽管他每走十步都会回头看一眼红发女孩。

XXXXXX

"Well, I must say this is quite a conundrum we have here." Kaji looked up at the black ceiling while leaning against Commander Ikari's desk. Despite Kaji's informality, Gendo showed no signs of any visible displeasure with him. "What will you tell the Commi…" Kaji stopped himself and smiled. "I mean, what will you tell SEELE?"  
"好吧，我得说这真是个棘手的难题。" 加持抬头望着黑色的天花板，背靠在碇司令的办公桌上。尽管加持的举止不拘小节，碇却丝毫没有表现出任何不悦。"你会怎么告诉委员会……" 加持顿了顿，笑了笑，"我是说，你会怎么告诉 SEELE？"

"There's nothing to tell." Gendo's tone remained void of anything other than pure neutrality. "Unit 01 is in perfect condition and they've already received an in-depth report on it." He lowered his hands and placed them on the surface of his desk. "If anything, a face-to-face meeting would accomplish nothing other than us idling the topic away and evading the subject. It's only a waste of our time."  
"没什么可说的。" 碇的语气依旧空洞，只有纯粹的中立。"初号机状态完美，他们已经收到了详细的报告。" 他放下双手，放在桌面上。"如果有什么，面对面会议除了让我们闲聊和回避主题外，毫无意义。只是浪费我们的时间。"

"Always the man of action, Commander Ikari." Kaji smirked. He knew that Ikari could see through the insincerity of his brown-nosing, but he had to keep face. "Though you and me both know I'm not here to ask about Unit 01, concerning as it is."  
"总是行动派，碇司令。" 加持轻蔑一笑。他知道碇能看穿他奉承的虚伪，但他必须保持面子。"不过你我都知道，我来这里不是为了问初号机的事，尽管它确实令人担忧。"

"You are not making any sense, Mr. Kaji," Gendo growled.  
"你这话说得毫无逻辑，加持先生，" 碇源堂低吼道。

"Let me get straight to the point." Kaji stood up straight and proper. "I want to know what happened to Asuka."  
"让我直截了当地说吧。" 加持站得笔直端正。"我想知道明日香发生了什么事。"

Gendo narrowed his eyes. "You're walking on a fine line, Mr. Kaji. You shouldn't be interested in information irrelevant to your field of work."  
碇源堂眯起眼睛。"你在走钢丝，加持先生。你不该对与你工作领域无关的信息感兴趣。"

"My field of work? I'm still useful, am I not?" Kaji grinned smugly, though putting in some effort to maintain his composure. Before Gendo could say anything, he continued. "I wonder what is room 124 being used for?"  
"我的工作领域？我还是有用的，不是吗？" 加持得意地笑了，尽管他努力保持镇定。在碇司令开口之前，他继续说道。"我想知道 124 号房间是用来做什么的？"

Commander Ikari's expression slowly turned into a frown. "Everything that you've learned about NERV since your arrival has only been obtained because we didn't care if you reported it to the old men or the Japanese Government." Gendo placed his hands on the desk and leaned forward, lurching over Kaji. "So take my word when I say that you are getting dangerously close to obtaining the type of information that people get killed over."  
碇司令的表情慢慢变成了皱眉。"自从你来到 NERV 以来，你所了解的一切都只是因为我们不在乎你是否会向那些老头子或日本政府报告。"碇司令将双手放在桌子上，身体前倾，俯视着加持。"所以请相信我的话，你正在接近那种会让人丧命的信息。"

Kaji's eyes fell. He knew perfectly well about the risks he was taking. However, it wasn't going to stop him on the path to the truth. If death was what needed for him to find the truth and thus redeem himself, then so be it. "I'm already a dead man, anyway. I intend to burn the usefulness of my remaining time as much as I can." He returned his usual nonchalant semblance. "So? May I have my answer, please?"  
加持的目光低垂。他非常清楚自己所承担的风险。然而，这并不会阻止他追寻真相的脚步。如果死亡是他找到真相并因此赎回自己的代价，那么就这样吧。"反正我已经是个死人了。我打算尽可能多地利用我剩下的时间。"他恢复了往常的漫不经心的样子。"那么？我可以得到答案了吗？"

"Room 124 is an ordinary lad used for analyzing Angelic contamination."  
"124 号房间是用于分析天使污染的普通实验室。"

"Is that so?" Kaji smirked. "See you later, then, Commander. I'm glad that we can meet face-to-face on this." Ryoji grinned, reassuming his transparent façade. "I still have my melons to water." With that, Kaji bowed a little and turned around before heading to the exit of the office.  
"原来如此？" 加持微微一笑。"那么，待会儿见，司令。很高兴我们能面对面谈这件事。" 碇真嗣重新挂上他那透明的面具，"我还有我的瓜要浇水。" 说完，加持微微鞠了一躬，转身向办公室的出口走去。

"You just let him go like that, Ikari?" Fuyutsuki probed in a slightly confused voice.  
"你就这样放他走了，碇？" 冬月略带困惑地问道。

"There's nothing to hide, anyway. If he wants to know about the condition of the Second Child, I don't see any problem with it. We can't hide the condition of the Second Child forever. In fact, letting him figure it out by himself would act as a perfect smokescreen."  
"反正也没什么可隐瞒的。如果他想了解二号机的情况，我看不出有什么问题。我们不可能永远隐瞒二号机的状况。事实上，让他自己发现真相会是一个完美的烟幕弹。"

"Smokescreen?" Fuyutsuki raised an eyebrow.  
"烟幕弹？" 冬月挑了挑眉。

"Letting him devote his effort in finding out the truth about the Second Child will inevitably impede his progress on digging into other classified information." Gendo kept his hands clasped under his chin. "Moreover, the enemy of our enemy is our ally. I still have other uses for him. He would be useful against SEELE."  
"让他把精力投入到查明二号机的真相上，自然会阻碍他对其他机密信息的挖掘。" 碇源堂双手合十抵在下巴下。"再者，敌人的敌人就是我们的盟友。我还有其他用途让他发挥。他对付 SEELE 会有用。"

The Commander of NERV stood up from his chair and came to the window, staring at the eyes of Unit 01 below his office intently. The endgame was near, and he needed every resource possible on his side. If Shinji, the most important player of the game, already knew about the condition of the Second Child – and he was with him, he didn't see any problem letting Kaji knew, as long as he didn't tell SEELE.  
NERV 的指挥官从椅子上站起身，走到窗前，专注地凝视着办公室下方初号机的双眼。终局已近，他需要尽可能调动一切资源。如果游戏中最关键的角色——真嗣，已经知晓了二号机驾驶员的状况——而且他站在自己这边，那么让加持知道也无妨，只要他不告诉 SEELE。

XXXXXX

The hallway of NERV Medical Ring was quiet as usual, only distant clattering sounds of boots of nurses and technicians stepping on the ground echoed through it. Shinji jogged along the hallway leading to the elevator, pushing a trolley full of food he cooked at Geofront's kitchen.  
NERV 医疗环廊一如既往地安静，只有远处护士和技术人员靴子踏地的咔嗒声回荡其中。真嗣推着装满在 Geofront 厨房烹饪的食物的手推车，沿着通往电梯的走廊小跑。

He wasn't a fan of the idea of putting a bomb on Asuka's neck while he had to hold the detonator by himself. Knowing there's no way he would kill her, if it really came to the time that he had to make the decision, Shinji would choose to suicide first.  
他并不喜欢在明日香脖子上装炸弹而自己必须手持引爆器的想法。明知自己绝不会杀她，如果真到了必须做决定的那一刻，真嗣会选择先自我了断。

Shinji sighed heavily before pressing the open button of Room 124 at the deepest level of Central Dogma. With a hissing sound the door slid open, the light was turned so bright to the extent he had to half cover his eyes upon entering the room.  
真嗣重重地叹了口气，按下了中央教条区最深处 124 号房间的开门按钮。随着一阵嘶嘶声，门滑开了，房间内的灯光亮得让他不得不半遮眼睛进入。

"Asuka?" Shinji said as he saw his favorite redhead sitting on her bed. Clad in a white hospital gown, Asuka was reading manga with a deadpan. She wasn't wearing the A-10 clips anymore for obvious reasons, leaving her hair to fall down freely onto the bed.  
“明日香？” 真嗣说道，他看到他最喜欢的红发女孩坐在床上。明日香穿着一件白色医院病号服，面无表情地读着漫画。由于显而易见的原因，她不再佩戴 A-10 发夹，任由头发自由垂落在床上。

Shinji heart sored as his eyes settled on the DSS Choker on her throat. NERV had been preparing everything for SEELE's little pet, as his father was fond of calling it, and the devices now were all coming in handy.  
真嗣的目光落在她喉咙上的 DSS 项圈时，心中涌起一阵喜悦。NERV 一直在为 SEELE 的小宠物——正如他父亲喜欢称呼的那样——准备一切，而现在这些设备都派上了用场。

He had to admit, though, the eyepatch that covered her left eye that was possessed by the Angel didn't have an adverse effect on her appearance. In fact it made her look cool in an odd way.  
不过，他不得不承认，遮住被天使附身的左眼的眼罩并没有对她的外貌产生负面影响。事实上，它以一种奇特的方式让她看起来很酷。

"Shinji?" The redhead raised her head and saw the guest, then immediately turned her head around, the back of her head facing him, as soon as she recognized him, her manga thrown away.  
"真嗣？" 红发女孩抬起头，看到了来客，随即一认出他，便立刻转过头去，后脑勺对着他，漫画书也被扔到了一边。

"Asuka? What's wrong?" Shinji probed, walking closer to her bedside. She had been okay not long ago, why-  
"明日香？怎么了？" 真嗣试探着走近她的床边。她不久前还好好的，为什么——

"Don't look at me, Shinji," the answer he needed came to him in a sad whisper. "I'm ugly…I don't want you to see me like this!"  
"别看我，真嗣，" 他需要的回答以悲伤的低语传来。"我很难看……我不想让你看到我这个样子！

Knowing how vital her feminine figure was to the redhead, Shinji could very well understand her issues showing him this face. If she had a problem showing Kaji her round-in-heat-resistant-plugsuit form, an eyepatch – the obstacle to block the brilliant sapphire eyes she prided herself on – would be a nuclear strike on her pride.  
深知自己的女性身姿对红发少女的重要性，真嗣完全能理解她向他展示这副面容时的困扰。如果她对向加持展示她那身耐热插头服的圆润身形都有所顾忌，那么眼罩——这个遮挡她引以为傲的明亮蓝眼睛的障碍——无疑是对她自尊心的核打击。

Shinji sighed. "Asuka, I don't mind." Speaking, he came to her bedside and leaned forward. Putting two fingers on her chin, Shinji gently turned her head back to face him. Asuka, although reluctant, even resisting at first, gave in as she knew Shinji was determined from the force he was exerting. "In fact, this only makes you look cooler, you know, like a legendary pirate who sails her battleship on some storming ocean."  
真嗣叹了口气。“明日香，我不在意。”说着，他走到她的床边，俯身向前。用两根手指轻触她的下巴，真嗣温柔地将她的头转回面对自己。明日香虽然起初不情愿甚至有些抗拒，但感受到真嗣坚定的力度后，她还是妥协了。“事实上，这让你看起来更酷了，你知道吗，就像一位驾驭战舰在狂风暴雨中航行的传奇海盗。”

He could see Asuka's remaining eye widened a little, gleaming in surprise. "Really? I'm not ugly?"  
他能看到明日香剩下的那只眼睛微微睁大，闪烁着惊讶的光芒。“真的吗？我不丑吗？”

"Asuka, you're the prettiest girl I've ever seen," Shinji smiled lovingly.  
“明日香，你是我见过的最漂亮的女孩。”真嗣温柔地笑着说。

"But now I'm a mess," Asuka sulked. Indeed she looked like a mess – her hair was haphazard, her right eye was puffy, her skin was unhealthily pale.  
“但现在我一团糟。”明日香沮丧地说。确实，她看起来狼狈不堪——头发凌乱，右眼肿胀，肤色苍白得不健康。

And yet, from the looks of him, Shinji still beheld her like she was a goddess.  
然而，从他的神情看来，真嗣依然将她视为女神。

"Am I still the prettiest girl, even under my current state?"  
"即便在现在这种状态下，我依然是最漂亮的女孩吗？"

"Even under your current state, yes." His reply came without hesitation.  
"即使在现在这种状态下，是的。" 他的回答毫不犹豫。

"But now I'm contaminated…" Asuka sulked, her fears and insecurities surging up. "I'm not even wholly human anymore!"  
“但现在我已经被污染了……”明日香闷闷不乐，内心的恐惧与不安涌上心头。“我甚至不再是一个完整的人类了！”

"Asuka, like I promised, I'll never leave you," Shinji reassured.  
“就像我承诺的那样，Asuka，我永远不会离开你，”Shinji 安慰道。

"What if I turned into an Angel completely? Shinji, you don't need to stick with me like this…I understand if you want to leave me! I don't want to be a burden!" Asuka's volume grew increasingly loud as she continued, giving an impression she's about to cry. "You deserve someone el-"  
“如果我完全变成了使徒怎么办？Shinji，你不必这样坚持和我在一起……如果你想离开我，我理解！我不想成为负担！你应该有更好的人……”Asuka 的声音越来越大，似乎快要哭出来了。

She was cut off by Shinji's abrupt motion – he leaned closer and planted a soft kiss on her eyepatch. She could feel the heat of his lips conducting through whatever Angel-resisting material the eyepatch was made of, and the pressure exerting on her still existing left eye.  
她的话被 Shinji 突然的动作打断了——他靠近了一些，轻轻地吻在了她的眼罩上。她能感觉到他的唇的热量透过眼罩上抵抗使徒的材料传导过来，以及那股压力施加在她仍然存在的左眼上。

The redhead found herself at a loss for words. She just sat there in silence, her right eye sparkling.  
红发女孩一时语塞。她只是静静地坐在那里，右眼闪烁着光芒。

Moments later Shinji pulled away. "I love you for who you are, Asuka, not just the appearance, however breathtaking it is."  
片刻后，真嗣退开一步。“我爱的是你这个人，明日香，不仅仅是外表，尽管它美得令人窒息。”

Asuka felt a huge weight lifted off her shoulders. Ever since she had the eyepatch wore, ever since she was informed about the Angelic possession, she had been worrying about Shinji's view on her, the only person she loved in the world other than her mother. She dreaded that he would deed her ugly and leave her, then she would be alone once again, hating everything, especially herself.  
明日香感到肩上的重担一下子减轻了。自从她戴上眼罩，自从得知天使附身的事，她一直担心真嗣对她的看法，这个世界上除了母亲外她唯一爱的人。她害怕他会觉得她丑陋而离开她，那样她将再次孤独，憎恨一切，尤其是自己。

Now though, she suddenly felt stupid having those doubts. He had promised, after all, and he hadn't break it yet. And she hoped he would never do.  
然而现在，她突然觉得自己之前的疑虑很愚蠢。毕竟，他确实承诺过，而且至今未曾违背。她希望他永远不会。

"I love you too, Shinji." The redhead smiled, letting out a content sigh as she rested her head on his body. No matter how hard it was for him to maintain the posture, Shinji would do it for her.  
"我也爱你，真嗣。" 红发女孩微笑着，满足地叹了口气，将头靠在他的身上。无论保持这个姿势对他来说有多困难，真嗣都会为她这么做。

Everything was right in the world, at least at the moment.  
一切都在此刻显得如此完美，至少在当下。

XXXXXX

Kaji sighed as he held his gaze at the gigantic metallic door in front of him. This place was labeled as underdeveloped and abandoned land on the map of the Geofront, without so much as legit transportation. According to the pamphlet, NERV would dispose of their broken equipment here.  
加持叹了口气，凝视着面前巨大的金属门。在第三新东京市的地图上，这个地方被标记为未开发且废弃的区域，甚至连正规的交通设施都没有。根据宣传册上的信息，NERV 会将损坏的设备丢弃于此。

Just as Kaji took out an ID card and attempted to unlock the innermost electronic lock, a sensation of metal contacting his head came to him. He naturally put up his hands in the air, the ID card he held was taken away swiftly.  
正当加持取出一张 ID 卡试图解锁最内侧的电子锁时，一种金属触碰头部的触感传来。他自然地举起双手，手中的 ID 卡被迅速夺走。

"Yo, staying up so late, the mighty Director of Operations?" Smelling the familiar body scent, Kaji said with his back facing Major Katsuragi.  
“哟，这么晚还不睡，伟大的作战部长？”闻到熟悉的体香，加持背对着葛城美里少校说道。

"Turn around!" Misato demanded.  
“转过身来！”美里命令道。

Kaji turned slowly, looking at Misato by the dim light of the hallway, his hands consciously moved forward, trying to pull her into an embrace.  
加持缓缓转身，借着走廊昏暗的灯光看向美里，他的双手不自觉地向前移动，试图将她拥入怀中。

"Don't move!" Misato growled in irritation. "Excuse me, but the gun could discharge accidentally."  
"别动！" 美里恼怒地咆哮道。"抱歉，但枪可能会意外走火。"

"Alright, alright." Kaji retracted his hands, though instead of putting them in the air, he took out a lighter and a cigarette from his pocket.  
“好了，好了。” 加持收回双手，不过并没有举起，而是从口袋里掏出一个打火机和一支香烟。

"Why won't you accept my call?" Misato questioned. "I haven't seen Shinji since the last battle ended. Or Asuka, since the incident with Unit 02 days ago." Her voice slightly shaking. "Shinji came to me after the last battle…after making sure I'm okay he just left…" Her volume rising as she spoke. "I…I just want to know if they're okay, damn it!" She cried, her gun-holding arm dropped to her side.  
“为什么你不接我电话？” 美里质问道。“自从上次战斗结束后，我就没见过真嗣。还有明日香，自从几天前 02 号机事件后也没见过。”她的声音微微颤抖。“上次战斗后，真嗣来找过我……确认我没事之后他就离开了……”她说话的声音越来越大。“我……我只是想知道他们是否安好，该死的！”她哭喊着，持枪的手臂垂到了身侧。

"I have my own mission, Katsuragi." Kaji sighed. "The incident of Unit 02 and Asuka…you shouldn't blame yourself for it."  
“我有自己的使命，葛城。”加持叹了口气，“二号机和明日香的事故……你不该为此自责。”

"The hell you're talking about!" Misato shouted, pointing her gun at her lover once again. "Where were you, the day of the activation test?!"  
“你到底在说什么鬼话！” 美里大喊，再次将枪指向她的恋人。“激活测试那天，你到底在哪里？！”

Kaji looked around and spoke up after he made sure the surroundings were clear of other people. "I was investigating…the Marduke institute. It took me a month to look into the 108 subordinate companies. Most of them were only empty shells, and the few ones that weren't…their research directions are mainly autopiloting and AIs."  
加持环顾四周，确认周围无人后才开口说道："我正在调查……马杜克研究所。我花了一个月时间调查了其下属的 108 家公司。其中大部分只是空壳，而少数真正运营的……他们的研究方向主要是自动驾驶和人工智能。"

"The whispered Dummy system?" Misato inquired.  
"低声的 Dummy 系统？" 美里询问道。

"Katsuragi, I can inquire into this myself, you shouldn't-"  
"葛城，我可以自己调查这件事，你不应该——"

"Keep. Going." Misato hissed.  
"继续。" 美里低声说道。

"Katsuragi, I-" "葛城，我-"

The Major of NERV released the safety of her pistol. "I want to know everything, Kaji. What else are you not telling me?! Where is Shinji, where is Asuka?! Tell me, dammit!"  
NERV 的指挥官松开了手枪的安全装置。“我想要知道一切，加持。你还有什么没告诉我的？！真嗣在哪里，明日香在哪里？！告诉我，该死的！”

Kaji sighed. Misato could be really persuasive when she set her mind, and he had learned it from his own experience. "Give me the ID card, I'll show you what you want."  
加持叹了口气。当美里下定决心时，她的说服力确实很强，这是他从自己的经历中学到的。“把 ID 卡给我，我会给你看你想知道的。”

Misato was sure Kaji won't run away, added that she was curious about what was behind this door. Perhaps it could be one answer to her numerous questions. Therefore, she returned the ID card to Kaji, who took it with a small smile and a bow.  
美里确信加持不会逃跑，还补充说她对这扇门背后隐藏的东西感到好奇。或许这能解答她众多疑问中的一个。因此，她将 ID 卡还给了加持，后者带着一丝微笑和鞠躬接过。

"Katsuragi, no matter what you know, or what you're about to see, promise me…you have to keep the secret, at least until the end."  
“葛城，无论你知道什么，或者你即将看到什么，答应我……你必须保守秘密，至少到最后一刻。”

"The end? What is at the 'end'?" Misato asked, looking at Kaji starting to crack the lock in a skillful way using the small device on his belt.  
“最后一刻？‘最后一刻’有什么？”美里问道，目光转向加持正熟练地用腰带上的一件小装置破解锁具。

"My disappearance, I suppose." Kaji said half-mockingly.  
"我的消失，我想是的。" 加持半带嘲讽地说道。

"…I promise." Misato compromised in a slightly trembling voice.  
"……我保证。" 美里用略微颤抖的声音妥协道。

The heavy metallic door slid open with the soft sound of Ding.  
沉重的金属门伴随着柔和的叮声缓缓滑开。

Misato stared at the LCL-drenched entry plug with a huge '02' printed on it, startled. "Unit 02's entry plug? Why is it here?"  
美里盯着那个浸泡在 LCL 中、印着巨大'02'字样的插入栓，吃了一惊。“02 号机的插入栓？它怎么会在这里？”

"Unit 02 was mostly intact when they retrieved it, save for some superficial knife wounds," Kaji explained. "However, signal of pattern blue remained after Unit 02 shut down, though it's too weak for MAGI to make any conclusions."  
“02 号机在被回收时基本完好，除了一些表面的刀伤，”加持解释道，“然而，02 号机关闭后，蓝色信号模式依然存在，只是太过微弱，MAGI 无法得出任何结论。”

"If the entry plug is fine…then it means Asuka's…"  
“如果驾驶舱没事……那就意味着明日香的……”

"Go check room 124. Ask Ritsuko about it, maybe she knows something. I suspect you will have your answer this way." Kaji narrowed his eyes. Indeed his speculations were proven right – Unit 02 didn't suffer enough physical damage to hurt the pilot. "Here, I want you to have this," Kaji took out a small capsule from his pocket. "You'll need this to find the truth."  
“去检查 124 号房间。问问赤木律子，也许她知道些什么。我猜这样你就能找到答案了。”加持眯起眼睛。确实，他的推测被证实是正确的——02 号机并未遭受足以伤害驾驶员的物理损伤。“来，这个给你，”加持从口袋里掏出一颗小胶囊，“你需要这个来查明真相。”

Misato took the capsule from him and nodded. "Be careful."  
美里从他手中接过胶囊，点了点头。“小心点。”

XXXXXX

## *Chapter 32*: Chapter 32: Interlude III  
*第 32 章*: 第 32 章：间奏 III

Disclaimer: I do not own Evangelion  
免责声明：我不拥有《新世纪福音战士》

**Chapter 32: Interlude III: Surging Undercurrents  
第 32 章：插曲 III：暗流涌动**

"Do you understand how to use it?" Ritsuko probed as she took notes on her notepad.  
"你会用吗？" 律子一边询问，一边在笔记本上做着记录。

"Of course I do." Asuka replied, her expression mixed with sadness and determination.  
“当然。”明日香回答道，脸上交织着悲伤与坚定。

"Remember, don't use it unless absolutely necessary." Dr. Akagi put down the notepad and sighed. "Not until the last moment."  
“记住，除非绝对必要，否则不要使用它。”赤城博士放下笔记本，叹了口气。“不到最后一刻不要用。”

"I know." With that, the redhead turned around and left the small office with a sad smile.  
“我知道。”说完，红发女子转过身，带着一丝苦笑离开了狭小的办公室。

Gendo let out a small sigh right before the holograms of the black monoliths showed up, surrounding him in a tight circle as if presenting him from escape. The Commander knew he had a lot of explanation to make, and he had been preparing for the interrogation ever since.  
源堂在黑色巨石的 hologram 出现之前轻轻叹了口气，这些巨石环绕着他形成了一个紧密的圆圈，仿佛是为了防止他逃脱。指挥官知道他有很多解释要做，自从那次审讯以来，他一直在准备。

"Was the Lance of Longinus necessary?" SEELE 01 inquired in a tone almost scolding. "Remember, the Lance is indispensable for the initiation of Instrumentality."  
“朗基努斯之枪是必要的吗？” SEELE 01 用几乎责备的语气问道。“记住，朗基努斯之枪对于启动人类补完计划是不可或缺的。”

"The Angel was the most powerful rejection-type. Without Unit 02 and Unit 04, and a heavily damaged Unit 00, we had no way to defeat it without risking too much."  
“天使是最强大的拒绝型使徒。没有 02 号机和 04 号机，以及严重受损的 00 号机，我们没有其他办法在不冒太大风险的情况下击败它。”

"The state of Unit 01 is…concerning," SEELE 08 spoke up. "We thought we all know what it's capable of, but do we actually?"  
"零一号机的状态……令人担忧，" SEELE 08 开口道，"我们以为都清楚它的能力，但实际上呢？"

"Unit 01 is known to have the shortest temper," Gendo replied calmly, silently blessing the fact that the Committee was still kept in the dark about the true potential of Unit 01 with Shinji in it.  
"零一号机以脾气暴躁著称，" 碇源堂平静地回答，暗自庆幸委员会仍未知晓真嗣驾驶下的零一号机的真正潜力。

"Hm." SEELE 07 huffed, still irritated by the immediate loss of Unit 04. "We'd never expected Unit 02 to be possessed by an Angel. I wonder is the guidance of the Dead Sea Scrolls still accurate?"  
“嗯。”SEELE 07 哼了一声，对初号机 04 的立即损失仍感恼火。“我们从未预料到二号机会被使徒附身。我想知道死海古卷的指引是否依然准确？”

"The Dead Sea Scrolls is no doubt our only book of direction." SEELE 01 chimed in. "The scenario is still adaptable. Speaking of which," he turned the conversation, "what is the condition of the Second Child and Unit 02? NERV has been…pretty ambiguous on the reports."  
"死海文书无疑是我们唯一的行动指南。" SEELE 01 插话道，"剧本仍有调整余地。话说回来，"他转换了话题，"二号适格者和零二号机的情况如何？NERV 在报告上一直含糊其辞。"

"The Second Child suffered significant damage in the battle, thus will be resting in NERV hospital for the foreseeable future. Unit 02 is mechanically intact. We will try to reactivate it after we cleanse the Angelic contaminations." Gendo replied, conveniently left out the part of Asuka's Angelic possessions. He had ordered Dr. Akagi to not mention this particular condition to anyone else. If he wanted to throw the smokescreen, he needed it to look as natural as possible.  
"二号适格者在战斗中遭受了重创，因此将在 NERV 医院休养一段时间。零二号机在机械结构上完好无损。我们将在清除使徒污染后尝试重新启动它。" 碇源堂回答道，巧妙地避开了明日香被使徒附身的那部分。他已命令赤木律子博士不得向任何人透露这一特殊状况。如果他想制造烟幕，就必须让它看起来尽可能自然。"

"Is the Second Child still usable on this stage?" SEELE 05 interjected. "If she's no use anymore, there's no reason to keep her in Japan."  
"二号适格者在这个阶段还能派上用场吗？" SEELE 05 打断道，"如果她已经没用了，就没有理由让她留在日本。"

"The Second Child is recovering. She's the most capable pilot we have. Now that we're short of pilots, we're not giving her up." Gendo again ignored the more important reason behind it.  
“二号适格者正在康复中。她是我们目前最出色的驾驶员。既然我们现在缺少驾驶员，我们不会放弃她。” 碇源堂再次忽略了背后更重要的原因。

"Your protectiveness of the Second Child is…abnormal," SEELE 01's gained a note of curiosity in it. "She's only an expandable tool for us. Is there something that we need to know about?"  
“你对二号适格者的保护欲……异常，” SEELE 01 的声音中带上了几分好奇。“她只是我们可消耗的工具。有什么是我们需要知道的吗？”

"Like I said, the Second Child's the best pilot we have right now." Gendo lowered his voice, trying to compensate for the panic that started to build up in his chest. Letting SEELE know about the true significance of the Second Child was the last thing he wanted to do right now.  
“就像我说的，二号适格者是目前我们最好的驾驶员。” 碇源堂压低了声音，试图掩饰胸中逐渐升起的恐慌。让 SEELE 知道二号适格者的真正重要性是他现在最不想做的事情。

"Hm." SEELE 01 pondered for a moment, taking a mental note of it. "Is NERV ready to face the next attack?"  
“嗯。”SEELE 01 沉思片刻，暗自记下。“NERV 准备好应对下一次攻击了吗？”

"That's what I am about to ask," Gendo replied, his voice calm. "I require the immediate transfer of Unit 03 to us, considering we only have Unit 01 as a working Unit right now."  
"这正是我要问的，" 碇源堂回答，语气平静。"鉴于目前我们只有 01 号机在运作，我需要立即调拨 03 号机给我们。"

"Granted." SEELE 01's reply was clean and neat, his tone made it clear that protest or negotiation was out of the question. "Arrange the transfer as soon as possible."  
"准许。" SEELE 01 的回复简洁明了，他的语气表明反对或谈判都是不可能的。"尽快安排转移。"

SEELE 05 wanted to say something, but considering the past experience of possible Angel possessions of EVAs, no matter how he didn't want to, he couldn't shake off the fear that a rogue EVA could happen in the US, and without another EVA to counter it, it would likely be the doom of American. "Understood. Prepare the arrival of Unit 03 in two weeks at most."  
SEELE 05 本想说什么，但考虑到过去 EVA 可能被使徒附身的经历，无论他多么不愿意，都无法摆脱对美国可能出现失控 EVA 的恐惧，而且没有另一台 EVA 来对抗，这很可能会成为美国的末日。"明白。准备在两周内让 03 号机抵达。"

"Should we start the search for the new pilot?" Gendo asked. "We already have usable candidates for the pilot of Unit 03."  
"我们是否应该开始寻找新的驾驶员？" 源堂问道。"我们已经有了可用于 03 号机驾驶员的候选人。"

"No need." SEELE 01 answered, his voice suddenly lighter. "We will send you the Fifth Child."  
"不需要。" SEELE 01 回答，他的声音突然变得轻快。"我们会将第五子送给你。"

"I see," Gendo replied. "Do we need to prepare the associating core?"  
“我明白了，”碇源堂回答，“我们需要准备关联的核心吗？”

"There's no need. He's trained to sync with unfamiliar cores."  
"没有必要。他已经训练到能与不熟悉的核同步。"

"Understood." Even though he had a good guess of who the Fifth Child would be and what his purpose was, Gendo kept Shinji's suggestions in mind. He wanted to face the Fifth Child by himself, and he saw no reason against it since Shinji was probably the only one who knew enough to do the Mission Impossible.  
“明白了。”尽管他对第五适格者是谁及其目的有所猜测，碇源堂仍将真嗣的建议记在心上。他想亲自面对第五适格者，既然真嗣可能是唯一了解足够多信息来执行“不可能任务”的人，他没有理由反对。

"Here, Asuka," Shinji put down a bowl of soup on the small table in front of Asuka. "This will do good to your health."  
"这里是，明日香，" 真嗣在明日香面前的小桌上放下了一碗汤。"这对你的健康有好处。"

"Thanks," Asuka accepted with a warm smile. Having just finished running dozens of laps around the room, she felt positively hungry, and Shinji's cooking was never delayed. Her body was fine physically, save for the possession in her left eye, and Dr. Akagi had suggested she move around in the room as much as she can to avoid her muscles getting weaker.  
"谢谢，" 明日香带着温暖的微笑接受了。刚刚在房间里跑了几十圈，她感到非常饿，而真嗣的烹饪从未迟到。除了左眼中的附身，她的身体在生理上并无大碍，赤木博士建议她在房间里尽可能多活动，以免肌肉变弱。

"Is there anything else you want, Asuka?" Shinji's inquiry reached her as she put down the bowl. "New manga? Game consoles?"  
"你还有什么想要的吗，明日香？" 她放下碗时，真嗣的询问传入她耳中。"新漫画？游戏机？"

"None of that," Asuka made a pouty face, standing up from her seat and extending her arms. "I demand physical contact!"  
“才不要那些，”明日香撅起嘴，从座位上站起来，伸开双臂。“我要身体接触！”

"Sure." A loving smile crossed Shinji's face as he walked forward and pulled her closer. He placed one of his hands behind her neck – on top of the black-red DSS Choker - and the other hand on her right cheek, before planting a soft kiss on her lips.  
“当然。” 真嗣脸上浮现出温柔的微笑，他走上前去，将她拉近。他一只手放在她颈后——黑红色的 DSS 项圈上方——另一只手轻抚她的右颊，然后温柔地吻上了她的唇。

Asuka was eager at first, to say the least – she put both of her arms around his waist in a strong embrace, preventing him from escape. Though suddenly her expression turned horrified before pulling away abruptly, leaving a confused Shinji on the spot. "Asuka? What's wrong?"  
至少可以说，起初明日香是急切的——她用双臂紧紧环抱住他的腰，不让他逃脱。但突然间，她的表情变得惊恐，猛地推开他，留下一脸困惑的真嗣站在原地。“明日香？怎么了？”

"I…I shouldn't have kissed you!" Asuka hastily explained. "I just had the soup and hadn't brushed my teeth yet!"  
"我…我不该吻你的！" 明日香急忙解释道，"我只是喝了汤，还没刷牙呢！"

"Well, you do have a point…" Shinji smiled a sheepish smile. Knowing people couldn't just ignore their basic needs, Dr. Akagi had installed a portable bathroom in the containment room, even though originally it seemed useless. "Though I don't mind, really."  
"嗯，你说的也有道理…" 真嗣尴尬地笑了笑。考虑到人们不能忽视基本需求，赤木律子博士甚至在原本看似无用的封锁室内安装了一个便携式卫生间。"不过我真的不介意，真的。"

"Hmph. Of course you will say that." Asuka huffed, her beautiful smile contrasting her scolding tone. "Still, I demand more hugs and kisses after I brush my teeth! You too, I suppose."  
"哼。你当然会这么说。" 明日香哼了一声，她那美丽的笑容与责备的语气形成鲜明对比。"不过，我要求刷牙后还要更多的拥抱和亲吻！你也是，我想。"

"Well, how could I refuse such-oh Hi, Dr. Akagi." Shinji turned his head to the door, hearing the hissing sound of it opening, revealing the lab-coat-wearing doctor.  
"哎呀，我怎么能拒绝这样的——哦，赤木博士，您好。" 真嗣转过头去，听到门打开的嘶嘶声，只见穿着白大褂的赤木博士出现在门口。"

"How's our patient doing today?" Asked the doctor.  
"今天我们的病人情况如何？"医生问道。

"You know, she's hardly a patient," Shinji replied. "Well, not in the traditional sense. She's not sick, or anything."  
"你知道，她根本算不上是个病人，" 真嗣回答道。"嗯，不是传统意义上的那种。她没生病，或者什么的。"

"Damn right," Asuka followed. "My body is working perfectly fine!"  
"没错，" 明日香接着说。"我的身体好得很！"

"Well, I can definitely see that from your spirit…" Ritsuko rubbed her forehead. It's been a few days since the last Angel attack, and there seemed to be no real change in Asuka's condition if excluding statistically insignificant readings. "Just remember, don't do anything indecent here. You should know that to keep good supervision on you, this room is heavily monitored."  
"嗯，从你的精神状态来看，我确实能理解…" 律子揉了揉额头。自从上次使徒袭击以来已经过去几天了，除了统计上不显著的读数外，明日香的情况似乎没有任何真正的变化。"记住，不要在这里做任何不雅的事情。你应该知道，为了对你进行良好的监督，这个房间是受到严密监控的。"

"Yeah, yeah." Asuka huffed, though her cheeks were turning the faintest shade of pink. "Say, when can I get out? I'm sick of this place!"  
"知道了，知道了。" 明日香嘟囔着，尽管她的脸颊泛起了淡淡的红晕。"话说，我什么时候能出去？我受够这个地方了！"

"Be patient. We don't want an Angel walking around in public, do we?" Dr. Akagi's half-mocking tone elicited a huff from the redhead. In fact, aside from the obvious safety reasons, she had kept her here as long as possible as personal revenge. Why would Gendo care about Shinji so much? She had given Gendo everything, her heart, her brain, her body-  
"耐心点。我们可不想让使徒在公共场合游荡，对吧？" 赤城博士半开玩笑的语气让红发女孩哼了一声。事实上，除了明显的安全原因外，她尽可能长时间地将她留在这里，作为个人的报复。为什么源堂会如此关心真嗣？她已经把一切都给了源堂，她的心，她的大脑，她的身体——

Ritsuko shook the thoughts off. "Now come here and sit in front of the camera. We're going to examine the radiation level."  
律子摇了摇头，抛开这些思绪。"现在过来坐在摄像头前。我们要检查一下辐射水平。"

"Rits!" Misato's worried voice echoed through the Pribnow Box. Conveniently, she met her target - who was giving orders to the technician around her - before even arriving at Ritsuko's office. "Do you know where Asuka is?!"  
"理子！" 美里担忧的声音在普里博箱内回荡。巧的是，她甚至在到达律子的办公室之前就找到了目标——律子正在向她周围的技师下达指令。"你知道明日香在哪里吗？！"

"Have you contacted Kaji recently?" Ritsuko threw a side-eye at the Major, her expression slightly shocked.  
"你最近联系过加持吗？" 律子斜睨了一眼美里，表情略显震惊。

Without answering her question, Misato settled her eyes on the greenish entry plug suspended on the roof. "What the hell is that thing?"  
美里没有回答她的问题，而是将目光锁定在屋顶上悬挂着的绿色插入栓上。"那东西到底是什么鬼？"

"It's the newest prototype of the Dummy Plug System. With this, perhaps we don't have to use kids as pilots anymore. We can avoid the incident with Asuka and the Fourth Child from happening ever again."  
"这是最新型的傀儡系统原型。有了它，也许我们就不必再让孩子们担任驾驶员了。我们可以避免再发生像明日香和第四适格者那样的事故。"

"Dummy? Do you mean AIs? Can they actually substitute human pilots in battles?"  
“Dummy？你是说 AI 吗？它们真的能在战斗中替代人类飞行员？”

"The system is calibrated based on the real data from the Children, a mimesis of the real existence." Ritsuko explained.  
“系统是根据孩子们的真实数据校准的，是对真实存在的模仿。”律子解释道。

"Isn't it inappropriate to introduce such a system right now?"  
“现在引入这样的系统不合适吧？”

"We're lacking pilots. No matter how underdeveloped these things are, we don't exactly have other choices." Sighing, Dr. Akagi turned her head to look at the Dummy Plug with a slightly frustrated expression. The development process of the Dummy Plugs that would be used in MP EVAs was way behind schedule, and SEELE wasn't happy about it.  
“我们缺乏驾驶员。不管这些东西多么不成熟，我们确实没有其他选择。”叹了口气，赤木博士转头看向模拟插入栓，脸上带着些许沮丧。用于 MP EVA 的模拟插入栓的开发进度严重滞后，这让 SEELE 很不满意。

"Speaking of which, I hear the Fourth Child is KIA?"  
“说到这个，我听说第四适格者已经阵亡了？”

"Indeed. His body is unrecognizable in shape."  
"确实。他的身体已经面目全非。"

Misato sighed again. Even though she didn't have any emotional attachment to the Fourth Child, she still felt terrible for a lost life. "Well, now that we only have one operating Unit, what if the next Angel attacks?"  
美里再次叹了口气。尽管她对第四适格者没有任何情感上的牵挂，但仍为一条逝去的生命感到难过。“好吧，现在我们只剩下一个运作的 EVA 单位，如果下一个使徒来袭怎么办？”

"That's none of your concern, the Director of Operations." Ritsuko said.  
“那不关你的事，作战部长。”律子说道。

"The hell it isn't!" Misato raised her volume. Suddenly her original purpose of coming here in the first place flashed back into her mind. "And let me tell you another thing I'm concerned with - where is Asuka?!"  
“这怎么不关我的事！”美里提高了音量。突然，她最初来这里的真正目的闪回脑海。“还有另一件我关心的事——明日香在哪儿？！”

"That's not what you should care about right now, Misato." Ritsuko waved her hand. "She's alive. That's as much as I can tell you."  
"你现在不该关心这个，美里。" 律子挥了挥手。"她还活着。我能告诉你的就这么多。"

"I want to know what's the deal with room 124," Misato was straight to the point, getting tired of beating around the bush.  
"我想知道 124 号房间到底怎么回事，" 美里直截了当，厌倦了拐弯抹角。"

Ritsuko raised an eyebrow. "Hey, follow the commands written on the pad." She spoke to a technician beside her and handed him her notepad before turning to Misato. "Follow me." She said in a low voice.  
律子挑了挑眉。“嘿，按照平板上的指令行事。”她对身旁的技术员说道，并将自己的记事本递给他，随后转向美里。“跟我来。”她低声说道。

Misato shrugged and followed along.  
美里耸了耸肩，跟了上去。

"Did you lose your mind? The information of that place is highly classified." Ritsuko scolded after the elevator door shut close. She wasn't expecting Misato to bring such a topic up in front of many people.  
“你疯了吗？那个地方的信息是高度机密。”电梯门关闭后，律子责备道。她没想到美里会在众人面前提起这个话题。

"Rits, what are you hiding from me?" Misato asked as she leaned against the wall.  
“律子，你在对我隐瞒什么？”美里靠在墙上问道。

Ritsuko didn't even turn her head. "Did Kaji tell you to ask?"  
律子甚至没有转头。“是加持让你来问的吗？”

"It's none of your business!" Misato was abnormally irritable today, being fed so much shocking information recently. She wasn't expecting the road to the truth to be a freeway on where you can drive 70 miles per hour, so a bit of determination was what she had been preparing herself for.  
“这不关你的事！”美里今天异常烦躁，最近被灌输了太多令人震惊的信息。她没料到通往真相的道路会是一条可以时速 70 英里飞驰的高速公路，所以她一直在为自己准备一点决心。

"Misato…I never thought Kaji could reach that place, much less open it," Ritsuko sighed. "Stop asking about room 124, alright? It's good for you."  
"美里…我从没想过加持能到达那个地方，更别说打开它了，" 律子叹息道。"别再问 124 号房间的事了，好吗？对你有好处。"

"I don't want to 'ask' anymore, I just want to know the truth!"  
"我不想再'问'了，我只想知道真相！"

The two women glared at each other in a silence full of gunpowder smell. Dr. Akagi finally gave in since she knew Misato's determination was unmovable. Even if she didn't tell her, things would only get more complicated if she let Misato go on an information-gathering crusade by herself. "Why don't you follow me and see it by yourself?"  
两位女士在充满火药味的沉默中互瞪着对方。赤木律子博士最终妥协了，因为她知道葛城美里的决心不可动摇。即使她不告诉她，如果让美里独自展开信息搜集的行动，事情只会变得更加复杂。“不如你跟我来，亲眼看看吧？”

Misato nodded and tagged along. The two arrived at Ritsuko's office; the blonde doctor opened her laptop before some data and a 3D image were mapped onto the electronic sandbox. "This is the hologram of room 124. Commander Ikari had given me all rights to deal with the incident."  
美里点头跟随。两人来到律子的办公室；金发博士打开笔记本电脑，一些数据和一个 3D 图像被映射到电子沙盘上。“这是 124 号房间的全息图。碇司令已经授予我处理此事的所有权限。”

"How is she?" Misato stared at the unmistakable silhouette of the redhead.  
“她怎么样了？”美里盯着那不容错认的红发身影。

"She was contaminated by the Angel. Though the traces are all gone, we still need to be safe. We've managed to contain the…possession within her left eye." She gestured at the eyepatch on the head of a sleeping redhead. "We've developed a new containment technology," she took out a copy of the eyepatch from the cabinet. "It's a stopgap made with Anti-L material, she will be safe as long as she keeps it on."  
"她被使徒污染了。虽然痕迹已经消失，但我们仍需谨慎。我们已经设法将……附身限制在她的左眼内。" 她指了指熟睡的红发女孩头上的眼罩。"我们开发了一项新的 containment 技术，"她从柜子里拿出一个眼罩的副本。"这是一个用 Anti-L 材料制成的临时措施，只要她一直戴着，就会安全。"

"What's that thing on her neck?" Misato probed, pointing at the DSS Choker.  
“她脖子上的那个是什么？”美里指着 DSS 项圈问道。

"It's…" Ritsuko pondered for a moment. "It's a monitor we use to supervise her vitals."  
“那是……”律子沉思片刻，“是我们用来监控她生命体征的监测器。”

"Oh." Misato sighed, though still suspicious of the object's actual use. "Does Shinji know?"  
"哦。" 美里叹了口气，尽管对这物件的实际用途仍存疑虑。"真嗣知道吗？"

"He does," Ritsuko admitted, eliciting a surprised eyebrow raise from Misato. "He didn't want to leave her side more than absolutely necessary."  
"他知道，" 律子承认道，这让美里惊讶地挑了挑眉。"他不想在绝对必要之外离开她身边。"

"Of course…" Misato smiled a sad smile. "When can we get her out?"  
"当然……" 美里苦笑着。"我们什么时候能把她救出来？"

"Not my call. When we retrieved her from the entry plug, there was a faint reaction of pattern blue. Specifically, it could be in a dormant state, just like how the Angel had been hiding in Unit 02 before. Therefore, this needs to be dealt with with discretion. Room 124 is the best place for her, with the containment technology and the Choker-" She trailed off as she realized she had just said more than necessary.  
“这不是我的决定。当我们从插入栓中救出她时，检测到了微弱的蓝色信号反应。具体来说，它可能处于休眠状态，就像之前天使隐藏在 02 号机内一样。因此，这需要谨慎处理。124 号房间是最适合她的地方，配备有封锁技术和项圈——”她突然停下，意识到自己说得太多了。

"Rits!" Misato, anyhow couldn't imagine Dr. Akagi would treat her in this way, her anger rising. "It's not a monitor, is it?! It's a fucking bomb!"  
“理子！”美里无论如何也无法想象赤城博士会这样对待她，怒火中烧。“那不是监控器，对吧？！那他妈的是个炸弹！”

"Misato, don't do anything stupid." Ritsuko could sense the impetuousness radiated from her. "The outside doesn't know about this yet, not even the Committee. This is the best treatment we could offer to the target!"  
“美里，别做傻事。”律子能感觉到她散发出的冲动。“外界还不知道这件事，甚至连委员会也不知情。这是我们能提供的最佳治疗方案！”

"Treatment? Target?" Misato glared at Ritsuko with wrath. "You call confinement' treatment?' 'Treating' her by putting a bomb on her neck?!"  
“治疗？目标？”美里怒视着律子。“你把监禁称为治疗？给她脖子上装炸弹就是治疗她？！”

Ritsuko had never seen Misato like this ever before. In fact, when she met her in the Pribnow box, she could already smell the danger carrying with her. "Misato, calm down!"  
律子从未见过美里这般模样。事实上，当她在普里博盒子里见到她时，就已经嗅到了危险的气息。“美里，冷静下来！”

Before she could do anything, though, Misato slammed her fist on her terminal without any signs of warning. The digitalized screen turned into snowflakes instantly, the data flow was cut off as well. "Calm down? You want me to calm down?!" Misato snarled. She then took a deep breath. "Alright…I will calm down…if you give me every authority of that room, including the DSS limiter…you will report it to the Commander as well about the transfer of control to Major Katsuragi."  
然而，在她能做任何事之前，美里毫无预警地一拳砸在她的终端上。数字化屏幕瞬间变成雪花状，数据流也被切断了。“冷静？你要我冷静？！”美里咆哮道。她随后深吸了一口气。“好吧……我会冷静……如果你把那个房间的所有权限，包括 DSS 限制器，都交给我……你还要向指挥官报告控制权转移给葛城美里少校。”

"As much as I don't want to deal with all of this mess, I don't have a choice." Dr. Akagi maintained her composure despite being exposed under the death glare of Misato. "Besides, I don't have the control of the DSS…choker."  
“尽管我不想处理这一切混乱，但我别无选择。”尽管处于美里死亡凝视之下，赤木律子博士依然保持镇定。“而且，我并没有 DSS……项圈的控制权。”

"Then who the hell does?!"  
“那他妈的谁有？！”

Ritsuko caught the words just before they came out of her mouth. Of course it wasn't Misato's business whether or not she knew about who had the trigger. However, recalling how Gendo had been acting around Shinji and Asuka, she couldn't help but feel soreness in her chest. She would like to see how it would end up between the fortress of determination and the torrent of will.  
律子在话即将出口前抓住了它们。当然，是否知道谁拥有触发器并不是美里的事。然而，回想起源堂在真嗣和明日香周围的行为，她不禁感到胸口一阵酸楚。她很想看看决心堡垒与意志洪流之间最终会如何收场。

"Shinji does." She said slowly.  
"真嗣知道。" 她缓缓说道。

Misato's following sharp words choked at her throat. "You…you can't be serious."  
"美里接下来的尖锐话语哽在了喉咙里。“你……你不是认真的吧。””

"Since you already know, why don't you ask him yourself?"  
“既然你已经知道了，为什么不自己去问他呢？”

Misato felt her knees wobble before she fell back onto a nearby chair. "What did he do to deserve this…" The anger in her voice was completely gone, replaced by deep sadness. "It's not the kind of responsibility you put on a fourteen years old kid! They're together, dammit! Are you seriously gonna make him…do…" She couldn't bring the words out of her mouth.  
“美里感到膝盖一软，跌坐在旁边的椅子上。“他做了什么要承受这些……”她声音中的愤怒已完全消失，取而代之的是深深的悲伤。“这不是一个十四岁孩子该承担的责任！他们在一起的，该死！你真的要让他……去做……”她无法将那些话说出口。”

"I'm sorry, but it's the Commander's decision. No compromises."  
"很抱歉，但这是指挥官的决定。不容妥协。"

Suddenly Misato shot up from her chair and strode toward the door. "Where are you going?" Ritsuko asked.  
突然，美里从椅子上站起来，大步走向门口。“你要去哪儿？”律子问道。

"I'll see what I can do. It's better than sitting here and doing nothing." Came to her a determined, yet sorrowful reply.  
"我会尽力而为。总比坐在这里无所事事要好。"她坚定而悲伤地回答道。

"Sometimes, adults throw tantrums like kids." Shaking her head, Ritsuko sighed after the office door slid close behind the Major of NERV. In fact, she doubted the Commander's decision herself. Why would he tell Shinji, of all people, about Asuka's condition? And why give him the detonator of the DSS Choker?  
"有时候，成年人也会像孩子一样发脾气。" 律子摇着头，在 NERV 的少校离开办公室后叹了口气。事实上，她自己也怀疑司令的决定。为什么他会告诉真嗣，尤其是关于明日香的情况？又为什么要给他 DSS 项圈的引爆器？

Nothing made sense to her, but she didn't want to start her own investigation. Her job was to make sure the Angel wouldn't awake, and she needed to devote every last bit of her attention to the subject.  
一切对她来说都毫无头绪，但她并不想展开自己的调查。她的职责是确保天使不会苏醒，她需要将全部注意力倾注于此。

XXXXXX 翻译文本：XXXXXX 翻译结果：XXXXXX

The darkness around Fuyutsuki was only brightened by the glowing red letters that shone through the shadows on the monolithic holograms representing SEELE's Committee. Sighing, the Sub-Commander of NERV shook his head, feeling the coldness of the handcuff around his wrist.  
四周的黑暗仅被透过阴影的红色发光字母微微照亮，这些字母闪烁在代表 SEELE 委员会的巨大全息图上。叹了口气，NERV 副司令俯首摇头，感受到手腕上手铐的冰冷。

He had little recollections of how he ended up here, though it didn't surprise him. Knowing how SEELE had always been skeptical of everything, Gendo Ikari's odd behaviors - the actions that even confused Fuyutsuki himself - would definitely raise suspicion. Therefore, it was only a matter of time before SEELE lay their hands on the only person other than Gendo who might know the plan behind the curtain.  
他对如何落得如此境地记忆模糊，但这并不令他意外。深知 SEELE 对一切持怀疑态度，碇源堂那些连自己也感到困惑的异常行为，无疑会引发疑虑。因此，SEELE 对唯一可能知晓幕后计划的除碇之外的人下手，只是时间问题。

"Greetings, Fuyutsuki." The center monolith, SEELE 01 spoke, its distorted voice echoing throughout the vast blackened room.  
"你好，冬月。"中央的巨石，SEELE 01 开口道，其扭曲的声音在广阔的漆黑房间中回荡。

"Spare the pleasantries, Keel." The Vice Commander grumbled, trying to readjust himself in his chair to get a little more comfortable. The identity of SEELE 01, the chairman of the Committee, was no secret to him. "Let's just get this over with."  
“省去客套话吧，基尔。”副指挥官咕哝着，试图在椅子上重新调整姿势以更舒适些。他对 SEELE 01，即委员会主席的身份并不陌生。“让我们尽快结束这一切。”

SEELE 01 let out a short laugh. "We didn't bring you here to kill you. In fact, it would be much easier that way."  
SEELE 01 发出了一声短促的笑声。“我们带你来这里不是为了杀你。事实上，那样做会简单得多。”

Fuyutsuki frowned. He had always thought himself expandable in the scenario. "Then what do you want?"  
冬月皱了皱眉。他一直认为自己在这个计划中是可有可无的。“那你们想要什么？”

"Simple. Gendo Ikari's behaviors...are concerning to us." SEELE 04 growled. "And we deem you hold information that can be of value to us."  
“简单。碇源堂的行为……令我们担忧。”SEELE 04 咆哮道，“我们认为你掌握着对我们有价值的信息。”

Kozo snickered under his breath. "I know valuable information? I can't imagine what I could possibly know that…"  
Kozo 低声窃笑。“我知道有价值的信息？我想不出我可能知道什么……”

"You have been with Ikari since the beginning." SEELE 02 snapped. "We want for you to tell us everything that you know. Especially things concerning the Second and the Third Child."  
“你从一开始就跟随碇源堂。”SEELE 02 厉声说道。“我们要你告诉我们你所知道的一切。特别是关于第二适格者和第三适格者的事情。”

The Sub-Commander sighed as he shook his head. He knew that any information he shared with them would just be redundant. Fuyutsuki felt he had no choice but to humor them. "Alright." He agreed. "I'll start from the beginning."  
副司令叹了口气，摇了摇头。他知道，自己分享的任何信息对他们来说都只是多余的。冬月感觉自己别无选择，只能迁就他们。“好吧。”他同意道，“我就从头说起。”

## *Chapter 33*: Chapter 33: Invisible Hand  
*第 33 章*：第 33 章：无形之手

Disclaimer: I do not own Evangelion.  
免责声明：我不拥有《新世纪福音战士》。

This is supposed to be the second half of the last chapter, but somehow it breaks the flow of the story. So I decided to split it in two.  
这本应是最后一章的后半部分，但不知何故打断了故事的连贯性。所以我决定将其一分为二。

**Chapter 33: Invisible Hand  
第三十三章：无形之手**

Shinji trotted across NERV's silent hallways, pushing a small tray full of food. It had become a routine for him to cook meals in the Geofront kitchen and bring them to room 124 so that Asuka could have food other than the cafeteria junk.  
真嗣快步穿过 NERV 寂静的走廊，推着装满食物的小托盘。他已经在地底厨房做饭并送到 124 号房间，让明日香能吃到除了食堂垃圾食品以外的食物，这已成为他的日常。

For some reasons unknown to him, Dr. Akagi had been trying to deny Asuka of eating food other than liquid food and glucose solutions, though it didn't last long - after he once secretly brought some sushi he made for her to eat and nothing really happened, no matter what Ritsuko didn't have legit reasons to deny her proper food anymore.  
出于某些他不知晓的原因，赤城博士一直试图阻止明日香食用除流质食物和葡萄糖溶液以外的食物，不过这并未持续太久——自从他偷偷带去自己为她做的寿司，而她吃完后并无任何异常反应，无论怎样，律子再也无法以正当理由拒绝给她正常食物了。

"Shinji." A familiar, yet unfamiliarly cold female voice came to him, echoing through the silent hallway. The said boy turned his head to the source of the voice with a raised eyebrow. "Yes, Misato-san?" He tried his best to maintain the calmness of his voice. He wasn't expecting to meet the Major here, though he wasn't really planning to evade her, either. Asuka simply got too much of his attention.  
“真嗣。”一个熟悉却又异常冷漠的女性声音传来，回荡在寂静的走廊中。被叫到的男孩挑起眉毛，转头望向声音的来源。“是的，美里小姐？”他尽力保持声音的平静。虽然没料到会在这里遇到美里少校，但他也并非有意回避她。明日香实在是吸引了他的太多注意力。

"Where were you these days?" A hint of concern slipped into her voice. After days of observation, Misato knew this particular time of the day Shinji would always come to the Geofront kitchen to cook food. Cooking for Asuka would be the only logical explanation she could come up with.  
"这些天你去哪儿了？"一丝关切悄然滑入她的声音。经过多日的观察，美里知道每天这个时候真嗣总会来到地底都市的厨房做饭。为明日香做饭是她能想到的唯一合理解释。

Shinji sighed. "I was taking care of Asuka. And I still am."  
真嗣叹了口气。"我在照顾明日香。现在依然如此。"

"Why didn't you tell me anything, Shinji?!" Misato raised her volume.  
"你为什么不告诉我，真嗣？！"美里提高了音量。

The accused boy raised an eyebrow. "I didn't really have time. Just…too much has been going on." In fact, he didn't want to lie to – or more like _deceive_ – Misato, whom he considered as his surrogate mother.  
被指控的男孩挑了挑眉。“我真的没时间。只是……最近发生的事情太多了。”实际上，他不想对——或者说欺骗——美里撒谎，他把美里视为自己的代理母亲。

Still, knowing how sentimental she could get, letting her know that Asuka was _injured_ was fine, but the rest? Shinji didn't feel like inflicting more damage to the emotional dam of the Major, not to mention it wasn't like she could help-  
尽管如此，知道她有多么感性，让她知道明日香受伤是可以的，但其他的呢？真嗣不想对美里少校的情感堤坝造成更多伤害，更不用说她也无法提供帮助——

"Why didn't you tell me that she's possessed by an Angel?!"  
“你为什么不告诉我她被天使附身了？！”

Damn. Shinji silently cursed before speaking up in confusion. "Misato-san, how did you-"  
该死。真嗣默默地咒骂了一声，然后困惑地开口：“美里小姐，你怎么会——”

"Shinji!" The anxious Major exclaimed, cutting him off. "What else you are not telling me?!"  
“真嗣！”焦急的少校打断了他，“你还有什么没告诉我？！”

"Misato-san…" Shinji tried.  
“美里小姐……” 真嗣尝试着开口。

"Shinji, I don't know what's going on, but please be honest with me, alright?" Misato said in an almost pleading tone. "Do you actually have the trigger of the bomb on her neck?"  
“真嗣，我不知道发生了什么，但请对我诚实，好吗？”美里几乎是用恳求的语气说道，“你真的有她脖子上的炸弹引爆器吗？”

Shinji went wide-eyed. No one else except his father, Dr. Akagi, and himself knew about it, and he was planning to tell Asuka about it as soon as possible. Maybe he underestimated Kaji's spying potentials, after all. "I do." He sighed.  
真嗣瞪大了眼睛。除了他父亲、赤木博士和他自己，没有人知道这件事，而他正打算尽快告诉明日香。也许他终究低估了加持的间谍潜力。“我知道。”他叹了口气。

"Give it to me, Shinji." Misato switched to an unquestionable tone.  
“把它给我，真嗣。”美里换上了一种不容置疑的语气。

"Excuse me, Misato-san. But I can't do that." Shinji straightened up as well, his tone shifting into a direction Misato had heard a lot, just not from him.  
“抱歉，美里小姐。但我不能这么做。”真嗣也挺直了身子，语气转向了一个美里听过很多次，却从未从他口中听到的方向。

"But it's too dangerous! Do you understand how much responsibility you're putting on your shoulders?" Misato questioned. "It's a person's life, damn it! And… she's also…your… There's no way you will make the right decision!"  
“但这也太危险了！你明白自己肩负着多大的责任吗？”美里质问道，“这可是一条人命，该死的！而且……她也是……你的……你绝不可能做出正确的决定！”

"Misato-san, I know who Asuka is to me. And that's why I am the best choice to hold the trigger," Shinji forced out. Misato didn't need to know about the whole truth – that he would end the world if it really comes to that - behind him and Asuka, it would only make things more complicated than it already was.  
"美里小姐，我知道明日香对我意味着什么。正因为如此，我才最适合握住这个扳机，" 真嗣勉强说道。美里不需要知道全部真相——如果真的到了那一步，他会结束这个世界——他和明日香之间的事，只会让事情变得更加复杂。

"But you're still a kid! This kind of responsibility comes to adults!" Misato took a few steps forward as she spoke. "Give it to me, Shinji. You'll just never make the right choice."  
"但你还是个孩子！这种责任应该由成年人来承担！" 美里一边说着，一边向前走了几步。"给我吧，真嗣。你只会做出错误的选择。"

No matter how much Shinji hated to do it, now he had no choice but to scold her. "Misato-san…the right choice? Is killing her the _right choice_, as you said?" He walked up in front of Misato, keeping their eyes in contact. "What if the right choice is to not kill her?"  
无论新治有多么不愿这么做，现在他别无选择，只能责备她。“美里小姐……正确的选择？就像你说的，杀死她是正确的选择吗？”他走到美里面前，保持目光接触。“如果正确的选择是不杀她呢？”

"But…" Misato paused for a moment as Shinji's words echoed through her mind. Was her fear of Shinji not making the right choice the only reason? Or was it even the _main_ reason? "But if she really turned into an Angel, we can't just…"  
"但是…" 美里顿了一下，真嗣的话在她脑海中回响。她害怕真嗣做出错误选择的恐惧是唯一的原因吗？还是说，这甚至不是主要原因？"但如果她真的变成了使徒，我们不能就这样…"

Shinji let out a short laugh, his expression giving an impression of 'I knew it from the beginning.' "Misato-san…you want the trigger just that you can make sure you'll have your revenge against the Angels, correct? Asuka or no Asuka, the only thing you care about is the Angel inside-"  
真嗣发出了一声短促的笑声，他的表情给人一种‘我早就知道’的印象。“美里小姐……你想要那个扳机，只是为了确保你能向使徒复仇，对吧？无论有没有明日香，你唯一关心的就是使徒内部……”

The last sentence pulled a string in Misato's heart, causing her to instinctively pull her hand back and swing it across Shinji's face, and hard. The lavender-haired woman could feel a stinging sensation in her palm as the boy bent over and held his own hand against his red cheek. "Shinji…how dare you?!"  
最后一句话触动了 Misato 的心弦，让她本能地抽回手，狠狠地甩在 Shinji 的脸上。紫发的女子能感觉到手掌传来一阵刺痛，男孩弯下腰，用手捂住发红的脸颊。“Shinji…你怎么敢？！”

She had expected many reactions from him, from crying like a boy at his age would to surrendering to her authority. Therefore when she was met with the freezing glare from him, Misato felt a chill ran down her spine.  
她本以为他会做出许多反应，从像他这个年纪的男孩那样哭泣，到屈服于她的权威。因此，当她面对他冰冷的目光时，Misato 感到一股寒意沿着脊背而下。

At that time, Misato was once again reminded how much of Gendo's son Shinji was.  
那时，Misato 再次意识到 Shinji 是多么像他的父亲 Gendo。

She wanted to say something, but found herself unable to, her mind in turmoil caused by Shinji words. Was she using the kids as a tool to avenge the Angels? How much did she actually care about them? What would be her choice between the children and killing an Angel?  
她想说些什么，却发现无法开口，真嗣的话让她的思绪陷入了混乱。她是在利用孩子们作为向使徒复仇的工具吗？她到底有多关心他们？在孩子们和杀死一个使徒之间，她会选择什么？

Shinji's glare softened as soon as it came. After all, he knew Misato still cared about him and Asuka - just like himself, he cared about Misato as well, it's just that Asuka always took his highest priority. Shinji sighed as he rubbed his red cheek. "I'm sorry, Misato-san. I shouldn't have said it. But the food is getting cold, and I really need to go now." Shinji said before promptly walking away and pushing the tray along with him, leaving the Major alone in the hallway with her blizzard of thoughts.  
真嗣的目光一出现就软化了。毕竟，他知道美里仍然关心他和明日香——就像他自己一样，他也关心美里，只是明日香始终是他最优先考虑的。真嗣叹了口气，揉了揉他发红的脸颊。“对不起，美里小姐。我不该说那些话。但食物要凉了，我真的得走了。”真嗣说完便快步离开，推着托盘，留下美里独自一人在走廊里，思绪如暴风雪般翻涌。

Shinji smiled as he enjoyed the sight of Asuka enjoying the food he made for her, not that she didn't enjoy them before. Seeing her slowly getting back to normal just brought blew all the dark clouds away from his sky. Though a frown crossed his face as he remembered he had to yet tell her a crucial piece of information.  
真嗣微笑着，欣赏着明日香享受他为她做的食物的情景，并非她以前不喜欢这些。看着她逐渐恢复正常，仿佛驱散了他天空中的所有乌云。然而，当他想起还有一件关键信息尚未告诉她时，眉头不禁皱了起来。

Shinji sighed in resignation. "Asuka…I want to tell you something."  
真嗣叹了口气，无奈地说：“明日香……我有件事想告诉你。”

"Shoot." The redhead replied after swallowing the food.  
“说吧。”红发少女咽下食物后回答道。

"I…I have the trigger…of the bomb on your neck." Shinji spoke up with visible effort, not really knowing what kind of response he should expect from her. After all, putting a DSS Choker around her neck had never happened ever before.  
“我……我控制着你脖子上的炸弹引爆器。” 真嗣费力地说道，不太确定她会有什么样的反应。毕竟，在她脖子上戴上 DSS 项圈这种事从未发生过。

"Wha-oh," Asuka let out a short laugh, touching the DSS Choker on her throat with her free hand. "I mean, it's not a big deal, is it? It's not like it will go off accidentally."  
“哇哦，” 明日香短促地笑了一声，用空着的那只手摸了摸喉咙上的 DSS 项圈。“我是说，这没什么大不了的，对吧？又不会不小心引爆。”

"You're not…afraid of me holding it?" Shinji carefully spoke up. "I mean, it's your life. I literally hold your life in my hand, Asuka. What if-"  
“你……不害怕我拿着它吗？”真嗣小心翼翼地开口，“我是说，这是你的生命。我实际上掌握着你的生命，明日香。万一……”

He was silenced as Asuka turned around and put the finger on his lips. Looking directly into his eyes, the redhead started, "Shinji, I don't mind. Hell, I was actually worried about who holds it. I trust you to make the right decisions. I don't trust Dr. Akagi, the commander, or anyone else in that sense." Her tone turned more serious as she continued. _'Besides, it's not like you would just end me and get your hands on other pretty faces, right?' w_as left unsaid. Jokes were one thing, but that question was too serious about being brought up.  
他话未说完，就被明日香转身用手指按在唇上打断了。红发少女直视着他的眼睛，开始说道：“真嗣，我不介意。其实，我反而担心谁来保管它。我相信你会做出正确的决定。我不信任赤木博士、司令，或者任何其他人。”她的语气变得更加严肃，继续说道：“再说了，你也不会就这样结束我，然后去追求其他漂亮面孔，对吧？”这句话虽未明说，但玩笑归玩笑，这个问题太过严肃，不宜提及。

She could feel Shinji's body slowly relaxed. "I-Thank you, Asuka."  
她能感觉到真嗣的身体慢慢放松。“我——谢谢你，明日香。”

"You're an idiot, alright." Asuka sighed, shaking her head, though the smile on her face remained. "Oh well, it's what had to be done. The choker, I mean. As long as the Angel is in my body, I'm a walking threat to humanity. The reason why they hadn't end me yet is probably that they still want me to pilot the EVAs." She shrugged.  
“你真是个傻瓜，没错。”明日香叹了口气，摇着头，尽管脸上的笑容依旧。“唉，这也是不得不做的。我是说那个项圈。只要天使还在我体内，我就是对人类的一大威胁。他们之所以还没结束我的生命，大概是因为他们还想让我驾驶 EVA 吧。”她耸了耸肩。

Shinji didn't need to tell her the truth, though the reality she had stated wasn't off the charts, either. In fact, if it wasn't for his father's orders, NERV would've already eliminated Asuka. "It just disturbs seeing you wearing a bomb every day. You were right. I can't trust other people to have it."  
虽然明日香所说的现实并不离谱，但真嗣无需告诉她真相。事实上，如果不是他父亲的命令，NERV 可能早已除掉了明日香。“看到你每天戴着炸弹，真是让人不安。你说得对。我不能相信别人来保管它。”

"Oh well, can't be helped, I guess." Asuka shrugged, deep in her own thoughts. Did she have a future? Not much likely. She wasn't afraid of her own death if it comes to that. What she dreaded was she didn't want to hurt Shinji. She just loved him so much he almost made her forget about her mother.  
“唉，没办法，我想也只能这样了。” 明日香耸了耸肩，陷入了沉思。她还有未来吗？可能性不大。如果真到了那一步，她并不害怕自己的死亡。她所害怕的是不想伤害真嗣。她对他的爱如此之深，几乎让她忘记了母亲。

She shook the thoughts off and returned to the meal. If the future was unpredictable, she would enjoy her life as much as possible. And she had to devise a plan for it.  
她甩开这些念头，回到餐桌上。如果未来不可预测，她会尽可能享受生活。而且，她必须为此制定一个计划。

A beam of white light shone into the darkened room, looming over grey-haired Sub-Commander of NERV and casting his shadow across the floor. His stomach growled from the lack of food, and his wrists had long since been rubbed raw by the handcuffs that bound them. Slowly, his eyes cracked open, snapping out of his drowsy state as echoic footsteps traveled across the room. "Sorry that I'm late. I had to put out the guards outside to sleep for a while." Kaji's voice came as both a surprise and a blessing to Fuyutsuki.  
一束白光照进了昏暗的房间，笼罩在 NERV 副司令灰白的头发上，将他的影子投射在地板上。由于缺乏食物，他的胃咕咕作响，手腕早已被手铐磨得血肉模糊。慢慢地，他的眼睛睁开，从昏昏欲睡的状态中惊醒，因为回响的脚步声在房间里回荡。“抱歉我来晚了。我得让外面的守卫暂时睡一会儿。” 加持的声音对冬月来说既是惊喜也是福音。

"You understand that you're not likely to get out of this alive, you know?" Though Fuyutsuki wasn't going to complain about Kaji freeing him, a friendly warning was something he could do.  
"你知道你很可能没法活着离开这里，对吧？" 虽然不打算对加持救他一事抱怨，但友善的提醒是他能做的。

"I just want to know the truth. After all this, people who want to kill me have to get in line." Even though he was loomed over by the darkness of the situation, Kaji somehow still kept his smirk on his face. "Besides, I'm already a dead man, anyway. It seems SEELE had found out that it was me who diverted the sample of Adam to Commander Ikari."  
"我只是想知道真相。经历了这一切，想杀我的人也得排队。" 尽管被局势的黑暗笼罩，加持不知怎的仍保持着他的微笑。"再说了，反正我已经是个死人了。SEELE 似乎已经发现是我将亚当样本转移给了碇司令。"

Once Kaji helped him get rid of the handcuffs, Fuyutsuki rubbed his swollen wrists, trying to get the feeling back in them. After massaging his wrists and stretching his body, he turned his head to the ponytailed man who just saved him. "Well, I'll be ever so grateful." He smiled a small smile. "It seemed like they just want to keep me locked in here and let me die."  
加持帮他解开手铐后，冬月揉搓着肿胀的手腕，试图恢复知觉。按摩手腕并伸展身体后，他转向刚刚救了他的马尾男子。"好吧，我会永远感激。" 他微微一笑。"看来他们只是想把我关在这里，让我自生自灭。"

"You're not wrong." Kaji shrugged.  
"你没错。" 加持耸了耸肩。

"Figures." He sighed, kicking his legs so blood would run into them again. "So what are you going to do now?"  
“真是的。”他叹了口气，踢了踢腿让血液重新流通。“那你现在打算怎么办？”

"Well," Kaji kept a grin on his face. "I still have one more phone call to make."  
“嗯，”加持保持着脸上的笑容。“我还有一通电话要打。”

"Phone call? You're really nonchalant about your fate, aren't you?" Fuyutsuki raised an eyebrow, his voice not necessarily sympathetic, though he tried his best to not sound cold. After all, Kaji had just saved his life. "Or you just accept it?"  
“打电话？你对自己的命运倒是挺无所谓的，不是吗？”冬月挑了挑眉，语气虽不带同情，但也尽力不显得冷漠。毕竟，加持刚刚救了他一命。“还是说你已经接受了？”

Kaji shrugged. "I guess it's not much of a difference in the end. If SEELE gets what they want, we're all going to die, anyway."  
加持耸了耸肩。“我想最终也没什么区别。如果 SEELE 得到了他们想要的，我们反正都得死。”

"Hm. I guess you're not wrong." Fuyutsuki turned his look to the exit after scanning around the interrogation room for the last time. "Well, I'm leaving. Take care."  
“嗯，我想你说的没错。”冬月将目光转向出口，最后一次扫视审讯室。“好了，我要走了。保重。”

"Go ahead." Kaji replied. "I need to make the phone call while I still can." He let out a light chuckle, though this time, it did carry a slight insincerity.  
“去吧。”加持回答道，“我得趁还能打的时候打个电话。”他轻笑一声，尽管这次，笑声中带着一丝不真诚。

The Sub-Commander met Kaji's eyes with his own, giving him a slight nod. "Thank you, Kaji." The elderly man said before passing by him, hobbling out into the white light that shone in from the doorway, his silhouette grew smaller as he walked away from the confinement room.  
副司令与加持的目光相遇，微微点头。“谢谢你，加持。”老人说道，随后从他身边走过，蹒跚地步入从门口射入的白色光芒中，他的身影随着远离禁闭室而逐渐缩小。

The ponytailed man smirked as he watched the Sub-Commander make his leave before pulling out his cell phone. Though before he could reach Misato's number, the name of another person showed up. "Well, I guess I'll have to make one more phone call." Kaji muttered to himself and dialed the number.  
马尾男子看着副司令离开后，嘴角勾起一抹微笑，随即掏出手机。然而在他拨通美里号码之前，另一个人的名字出现在屏幕上。“好吧，看来还得再打一个电话。”加持自言自语着，拨通了号码。

Shinji stared at his own image reflected on the mirror as he splashed cold water all over his face. Things that had happened recently had been quickly building up in pressure, and the fact that he had the detonator that held Asuka's life didn't help, if not making it worse. His torrent of thoughts was broken by the feeling of his phone vibrating in his pocket. With a sigh, he reached in and pulled it out to see who was calling him.  
真嗣盯着镜中自己的倒影，将冷水泼洒在脸上。最近发生的事情迅速积压成压力，而他手中握有决定明日香生死的引爆器，这无疑使情况更加糟糕。他的思绪被口袋里手机的震动打断。叹了口气，他伸手掏出手机，查看是谁打来的电话。

Raising a surprised eyebrow as he saw the name on the phone, Shinji quickly accepted the call. "Hello, Kaji-san?"  
看到手机上的名字，真嗣惊讶地挑起眉毛，迅速接听了电话。"喂，加持先生？"

"Hey Shinji-kun." His voice came through the speaker, slightly muffled through the old microphone on his phone. He had told him numerous times that he needed to get a new one, but for one reason or another, he just never did.  
"嘿，真嗣君。" 他的声音通过手机老旧的麦克风传来，略显模糊。他曾多次告诉他需要换一个新的，但由于种种原因，他始终没有这么做。

"What's wrong?" Shinji could hear him snicker before he replied.  
“怎么了？”真嗣能听到他在窃笑，随后才回答。

"Nothing's wrong Shinji-kun." He answered. "I just wanted to call and let you know that I might be leaving for a little while. They need me back in Germany, and I don't know when I'll be coming back."  
“没什么事，真嗣君。”他回答道，“我只是想打电话告诉你，我可能要离开一段时间。他们需要我回德国，我不知道什么时候能回来。”

Shinji gasped. How came he could forget about the ministrations the triple-spy was pulling off behind the scenes? Maybe the whole mess with Ireul had taken over all of his spiritual power. "Kaji-san, you're not going to Germany, are you?"  
真嗣倒吸一口凉气。他怎么忘了这个三重间谍在幕后所做的一切？也许伊留尔那档子事已经占据了他所有的精神力量。“加持先生，你不会真的要去德国吧？”

Even though separated by the speakers, he could still hear Kaji blink in surprise. "Perhaps, perhaps not." He finally replied after a long-lasting silence. "Though I want to ask…do you know anything about Asuka?" He had to know. The condition of the redhead was something that kept gawking at him. He would die with a grievance not knowing about her, and for some reason, he felt if anyone knew about her, it would be Shinji, other than the Commander.  
尽管隔着电话，他仍能感觉到加持在惊讶中眨眼。“或许会，或许不会。”长时间的沉默后，他终于回答，“不过我想问……你知道关于明日香的事吗？”他必须知道。那个红发女孩的状况一直困扰着他。如果不知道她的消息，他会带着遗憾死去，而不知为何，他觉得如果有人知道她的消息，那一定是真嗣，而不是司令。

"She's…fine and being taken care of." Shinji forced out a reply. Knowing the imminent fate of the spy, the last thing he could do was to at least let Kaji rest assured.  
“她……没事，正在被照顾。” 真嗣勉强挤出一个回答。明知间谍即将面临的命运，他至少能让加持安心。

He could hear Kaji let out a small sigh of content. Maybe asking Misato to search for the truth was unnecessary, after all. "That's good to hear." He paused for a moment. "Shinji, I need you to promise me something."  
他听到加持发出了一声小小的满足叹息。或许让美里去追查真相终究是多余的。“听到这个消息真好。”他停顿了一下。“真嗣，我需要你答应我一件事。”

"Yes, Kaji-san?" “好的，加持先生？”

"Take good care of Asuka. Please."  
"请好好照顾明日香。拜托了。"

Shinji felt soreness rise inside his chest. He had rarely heard the special inspector say such a phrase before, and when he did, it meant he knew there wasn't much time left for him. "I will." His firm response came out without hesitation.  
真嗣感到胸口一阵酸楚。他很少听到这位特别检察官说出这样的话，而一旦说了，就意味着他知道自己时日无多了。“我会的。”他坚定地回答，毫不犹豫。

"Thanks. Bye, Shinji." "谢谢。再见，真嗣。"

"Bye, Kaji-san…" Shinji sighed as he heard Kaji hang up the phone. He really wanted to help Kaji and avoid him from getting killed, but since he had an agreement with his father, that he shall not question his decisions unless it's related to Asuka, he couldn't do anything about it.  
“再见，加持先生……” 真嗣叹息着，听到加持挂断了电话。他真的很想帮助加持，避免他遭遇不测，但由于与父亲有约在先，除非事关明日香，否则不得质疑他的决定，他对此无能为力。

Maybe if he had realized Kaji's situation earlier, he could've warned him, and perhaps it would help him get out. But knowing how determined he was in finding out the truth, Shinji suspected even if he told him everything about the Second Impact and SEELE, Kaji would still continue his doomed information-gathering crusade.  
或许如果他能更早意识到加持的处境，就能提前警告他，也许能助他脱险。但考虑到加持对探寻真相的执着，真嗣怀疑即便自己将第二次冲击和 SEELE 的一切都告诉他，加持仍会继续他那注定失败的情报搜集之旅。

He had the first-hand experience, after all.  
毕竟，他有过切身的经历。

Shinji silently blessed the best of luck to the special inspector and headed back to Asuka's room.  
真嗣默默地为那位特别检察官祈求好运，然后返回了明日香的房间。

He needed to help Asuka settle down first, then find Misato as soon as possible.  
他需要先帮助明日香安定下来，然后尽快找到美里。

Kaji dropped his phone on the ground of the dull room before firmly bringing his foot down onto it and smashing the device into pieces. In hindsight, it might've been the best for Misato to not answer his call since he didn't think he would be able to stand hearing Misato cry. After making sure all the tracking devices were fried, he exited the darkened room and headed to his office.  
加治将手机丢在昏暗房间的地板上，随即坚定地一脚踩下，将设备碾成碎片。事后想来，或许美里不接他的电话才是最好的，因为他觉得自己无法忍受听到美里哭泣的声音。确认所有追踪装置都已失效后，他走出昏暗的房间，前往自己的办公室。

Once inside, he quickly shut the door behind him, opened his workstation, and started deleting everything related to his field of work. Though not long after, he deemed it more convenient to just format the whole disk drive and smash everything into pieces. Even though he was pretty sure only death awaited him, he couldn't let anyone else into trouble, especially Misato.  
一进门，他迅速关上身后的大门，打开工作站，开始删除与他工作领域相关的所有内容。但不久后，他觉得直接格式化整个磁盘驱动器并将一切砸成碎片更为便捷。尽管他确信自己难逃一死，但他不能让其他人陷入麻烦，尤其是美里。

As he made his way down the empty halls of NERV HQ, he could hear the faint sound of footsteps following in the distance behind him. At first he had hoped the person was only one of the technicians and picked up his pace, hoping to get to his car and escape from the death trap. Though he quickly realized his dream was false as the person behind him picked up the pace along with him, now he was sure the person was SEELE's sleeper agent.  
当他穿过 NERV 总部空荡荡的走廊时，能听到远处传来轻微的脚步声。起初他希望那人只是个技术人员，于是加快了步伐，希望能赶到车里逃离这个死亡陷阱。然而他很快意识到这只是幻想，因为身后的人也加快了脚步，现在他确信那人是 SEELE 的潜伏特工。

As he almost started running, though, Kaji could hear footsteps coming in front of him just around the next corner. He sighed and stopped running. With one assassin behind him and another coming from in front of him, he had no way to escape.  
就在他几乎要开始奔跑时，加持听到前方拐角处传来了脚步声。他叹了口气，停下了脚步。身后有一个刺客，前方又有人迎面而来，他无处可逃。

He looked to his right and saw a giant fan blade slowly spinning, circulating air from the Geofront into NERV Headquarters. As the blade rotated, he could feel a gust of air brush across his face while the sets of footsteps grew closer to him. Sighing, he leaned against the wall and turned his head to look at the assassin.  
他向右望去，只见一个巨大的风扇叶片缓缓旋转，将地底都市的空气循环至 NERV 总部。随着叶片转动，他能感受到一阵阵风轻拂过脸颊，而那串脚步声也愈发逼近。他叹了口气，倚墙而立，转头望向那名刺客。

"Yo, you're kinda late, aren't you?" Kaji spoke, making one last smirk.  
“哟，你有点迟到了，不是吗？”卡吉说着，最后一次咧嘴一笑。

**Chapter 34: The Unforgiven  
第三十四章：不可饶恕**

_"Misato, it's me. I'm sure you're listening to this message after I've caused you so much trouble. I'm sorry. Please tell Asuka and Shinji that I'm sorry. And there's one more thing. I've been trying to grow some watermelons. I'd appreciate it if you could water them for me. Shinji knows where they're at. And please don't dwell on the past. Just move ahead. And if somehow I can see you again, I will say the words that I couldn't say eight years ago… Goodbye."  
美里，是我。我确信你听到这条留言时，我已经给你带来了许多麻烦。对不起。请告诉明日香和真嗣，我也很抱歉。还有一件事。我一直在尝试种些西瓜。如果你能帮我浇浇水，我将感激不尽。真嗣知道它们在哪里。请不要沉溺于过去。向前看。如果我还能再见到你，我会说出八年前没能说出口的话……再见。_

Misato leaned against the hallway wall of NERV HQ; tears flowed down her face like a running stream. During the last few days, she had immersed herself into seeking the truth, so when a new message arrived on her phone, she didn't even have time to check it.  
美里靠在 NERV 总部的走廊墙上，泪水如溪流般顺着脸颊流淌。过去的几天里，她全身心投入到追寻真相中，以至于当手机上收到一条新消息时，她甚至来不及查看。

Now that she finally caught a break, Kaji's last words flushed away all of her other concerns in an instant.  
如今她终于得以喘息，但加持的最后一句话瞬间冲散了她所有的其他忧虑。

Misato knew the espionage activities Kaji was partaking in, though she didn't attempt to stop him, even though she was aware of the risks – she also wanted to know the truth herself.  
尽管知道加持参与的间谍活动，Misato 从未试图阻止他，即便她清楚其中的风险——她也渴望自己揭开真相。

Now though, only after the loss, she felt how stupid she was.  
然而，只有在失去之后，她才感到自己是多么愚蠢。

She didn't want to believe it. She didn't want to accept that her lover had been killed, and in a way she was still hanging onto that hope. A body hadn't been presented to her, and with that came a sense of misplaced optimism. However, this message all but sealed the deal. Kaji was dead, and there was nothing she could do to change that.  
她不愿相信。她不愿接受她的爱人已经遇害，内心仍紧抓着那一丝希望。没有遗体呈现在她面前，这带来了一种错位的乐观感。然而，这条留言几乎成了定局。加持已经离世，她无力改变这一事实。

Feeling closing in footsteps behind her, Misato turned around red-eyed, just to see Shinji Ikari approaching in a discreet manner. She hastily wiped out the tears away from her face in a vain attempt to hide them, but it was too late.  
感觉到身后逼近的脚步声，美里红着眼眶转过身，只见真嗣小心翼翼地走近。她匆忙擦去脸上的泪水，试图掩饰，但为时已晚。

"Misato-san…are you alright?"  
"美里小姐…你还好吗？"

"Shinji…" Misato tried to regain a semblance of order, straightening up her clothes. She had numerous questions she wanted to ask him, but now she was not in the mood. "If you don't mind, I'd like to just be left alone right now."  
"真嗣…" 美里试图恢复些许镇定，整理了一下衣服。她有许多问题想问他，但此刻她没有心情。"如果你不介意，我现在只想一个人待着。"

Shinji let out a silent sigh, knowing how hard it had always been for Misato to accept Kaji's decease. "Misato-san…" He needed a way to cheer her up. "Erm, I want you to know that…Asuka is getting better right now; maybe they'll let her go home in a few days."  
真嗣无声地叹了口气，深知美里一直难以接受加持的离世。“美里小姐……”他需要想办法让她振作起来。“呃，我想让你知道……明日香现在正在好转；也许过几天他们就会让她回家了。”

Misato let out a chukle. Just days ago they had a big fight about this topic. She had been doubting herself ever since. Did she care about the children as much as she cared about defeating the Angels? What if Shinji was actually right?  
美里轻声笑了出来。就在几天前，他们还为此大吵了一架。自那以后，她一直在怀疑自己。她对孩子们的关心是否与击败使徒的决心一样强烈？如果真嗣实际上是对的，那该怎么办？

She had thought Shinji and Asuka's relationship was nothing more than puppy love that could be broken in need of the greater good. It was only after she lost Kaji she started to realize how much of an impossibility it was to ask Shinji to give Asuka's life to another person.  
她曾以为真嗣和明日香的关系不过是青春期的小打小闹，为了更大的利益可以轻易打破。直到她失去了加持，才开始意识到要求真嗣为了他人牺牲明日香的生命是多么不可能的事。

After all, she would never want to give Kaji's life to others.  
毕竟，她绝不会愿意将加持的生命交给别人。

"I'm...glad to hear that." Misato brought up the best smile she could. "And...sorry about earlier. I thought I knew what she meant to you, but I was wrong."  
“我……很高兴听到你这么说。”美里尽力挤出了一个最好的笑容，“还有……之前的事，对不起。我以为我知道她对你意味着什么，但我错了。”

Shinji smiled warmly. "Apology accepted, Misato-san. Do you need...tissue?"  
真嗣温暖地笑了。“道歉接受，美里小姐。你需要……纸巾吗？”

"Nah. I'll be fine." She lied. "If Asuka's being released pretty soon, I'm looking forward to have our little family back! Pen-Pen's missing you guys."  
“不用了。我会没事的。”她撒了个谎。“如果明日香很快就能出院，我期待着我们的小家庭重新团聚！Pen-Pen 也很想念你们。”

"Figures..." Shinji chuckled. "I didn't know penguins could bark until I saw him eating your cooking."  
“果然……”真嗣轻声笑道。“我以前不知道企鹅会叫，直到我看到他吃你做的饭。”

"My cooking isn't _that_ bad!" Misato's laughter broke out from her tears, even though it was only temporary. "I really should-"  
"我的厨艺没那么糟糕吧！" 美里含泪笑出声来，尽管这笑声只是暂时的。"我真的应该——"

She was cut off as every alarm in the Geofront blared. It was the Angel alarm.  
她的话被地底都市所有警报的轰鸣声打断。那是天使警报。
