"Oh my God!" Major Katsuragi gasped at the sight presented on the monitor. Through the HD imagery filmed by the cameras on the satellites, people on the command deck could see a rather large double-winged creature that glowed in a holy way, staying stationary in the upper atmosphere.  
“哦，我的天哪！”葛城美里少校在监视器上看到的景象让她倒吸一口凉气。通过卫星上的高清摄像头拍摄的图像，指挥甲板上的人们可以看到一个相当巨大的双翼生物，以一种神圣的方式发光，静止在大气层上方。

"It's been circling Earth's orbit for a while, though I can't understand how it's able to change its speed without apparent acceleration or deceleration. Our satellites are only able to pick it up after it stopped there." Maya explained as she made a few more keystrokes. "It's also been flying far out of range for standard weapons, so we have already prepared the positron sniper rifle for Unit 00, and the proton cannon for Unit 01. Unit 02 will be on standby."  
“它已经在地球轨道上盘旋了一段时间，尽管我不明白它是如何在没有明显加速或减速的情况下改变速度的。我们的卫星只有在它停在那里后才能捕捉到它。”玛雅解释道，同时又敲了几下键盘。“它也一直飞得远远超出常规武器的射程，所以我们已经为零号机准备了阳电子狙击步枪，为初号机准备了质子加农炮。二号机将处于待命状态。”

"Asuka's not being deployed?" Misato asked.  
"明日香不会被部署吗？" 美里问道。

"Pilot Soryu's still recovering."  
"丽仍然在恢复中。"

"Right." Misato took a deep breath. "EVAs launch!"  
"明白了。" 美里深吸一口气。"EVA，出击！"

Unit 01 and Unit 00 shot up from the base. Topside, the purple Evangelion sprung out of the elevator, taking position atop a large hill overlooking Tokyo-3. The overcast stretched out as far as he could see, and the rain was pouring. Flipping through his monitors, Shinji switched to lowlight vision. This way he could see through the sick clouds.  
初号机和零号机从基地一跃而出。地面上，紫色的福音战士从电梯中弹射出来，占据了一座俯瞰第三新东京市的大山丘。乌云密布，视野所及之处尽是阴霾，大雨倾盆而下。真嗣翻阅着监视器，切换到低光视觉模式。这样他就能透过病态的云层看清一切。

The purple Unit 01 crouched behind another hill, gripping on the proton cannon tightly. Rising its proton cannon and taking aim on the Angel, Shinji focused on the blue crosshair danced around the screen, circling closer and closer to the glowing beast that soared thousand of miles above him.  
紫色的初号机蹲伏在另一座山丘后，紧紧握住质子炮。真嗣举起质子炮，瞄准使徒，专注地盯着屏幕上跳动的蓝色十字准星，它越来越接近那只在他上方数千英里处翱翔的闪光巨兽。

"I have locked on the target," Shinji held his breath as the crosshair made one more loop around the target before locking onto the core of the Angel, turning from blue to red. He had been tortured by the Angel of Birds before, nonetheless, if there's a possibility, he would never let Asuka go through it ever again.  
“我已经锁定目标了，”真嗣屏住呼吸，十字准星在目标周围再绕一圈后，终于锁定了使徒的核心，从蓝色变为红色。他曾被鸟天使折磨过，尽管如此，如果有任何可能，他绝不会再让明日香经历这一切。

But it didn't help with the fact it was excruciatingly painful, and the fact that he didn't have any solution other than using the Lance of Longinus didn't help things.  
但这并没有减轻那极度痛苦的感受，而且除了使用朗基努斯之枪外，他别无他法，这更让情况雪上加霜。

"Firing." Just as Unit 01 begun to squeeze its finger on the trigger, his screen was filled with a brilliantly blinding light as the Angel started to glow even brighter. From it, a beam of light shot down from the Angel and pierced through the clouds as it shone down onto the purple Evangelion.  
"发射。" 就在 01 号机开始扣动扳机的那一刻，他的屏幕被一道耀眼至极的光芒填满，天使开始发出更加明亮的光辉。从天使身上，一道光束射出，穿透云层，照耀在紫色的福音战士上。

Shinji started to scream.  
真嗣开始尖叫。

"Oh God…" Misato felt a tug at her heart. She couldn't believe this was happening. "Shinji, retreat! Get the hell out of there!"

“真嗣。”赤木博士结束了发言。“它试图读取真嗣的思维……它试图通过深入他的内心来理解他的心理。”她听起来几乎像是无言以对。惊讶这个词并不恰当，但难以置信的恐惧却恰如其分。

"收到。" 零号机从现已完全充能的阳电子步枪中射出一发巨型高斯动力子弹，子弹划过天际，绕过地球的曲率。她的瞄准完美无缺，子弹正中使徒核心。然而，其 AT 力场阻止了子弹的穿透，将其碎裂成四块。

"Its AT-Field is too powerful!" Aoba exclaimed. "We can't hit it from this range!"  
"它的 AT 力场太强了！" 青叶惊呼。"我们在这个距离无法击中它！"

"Shinji!" “真嗣！”

Shinji's eyes fluttered open grudgingly, just to see a starry sky flashing above him. He could see a white moon hanging in the sky and hear the soft sound of water slapping the beach. Grumbling as he tried to get up, he turned his head to his side, gasping as he settled his eyes on the person lying beside him.  
真嗣不情愿地眨开眼睛，只见繁星点点的夜空在他上方闪烁。他能看到天空中悬挂着一轮皎洁的月亮，听见海水轻拍沙滩的柔和声响。他一边嘟囔着试图起身，一边转头向旁边看去，当他看清躺在身旁的人时，不禁倒吸了一口气。

Red plug suit. Bandages on her right arm and left eye.  
红色插入栓服。右臂和左眼缠着绷带。

"No…no no no no…" Shinji muttered, instinctively trying to get away from the scene. Though he couldn't seem to control his own body. "Don't make me remember this…"  
“不…不不不不…” 真嗣喃喃自语，本能地试图逃离这一幕。尽管他似乎无法控制自己的身体。“别让我回忆这个…”

He summoned all of his willpower in a futile attempt just to move his body away, just to hopelessly watch his hands clasped around the redhead's slender neck.  
他竭尽全力试图只是移动身体远离，只是绝望地看着自己的双手紧扣在红发少女纤细的脖颈上。

"No!" Although he couldn't remember his emotions at that time, the pressure was weighing on him like a mountain, making him suffocate as the scene continued to play out in front of his eyes.  
“不！”尽管他无法回忆起当时的情绪，但那股压力如山般压在他身上，随着眼前的场景不断上演，他感到窒息。

He desperately wanted to pull his hands away from her neck, but they started to apply more force nonetheless. "No! I didn't want to do this! Don't make me do this!"  
他拼命想从她的脖子上抽回双手，但它们却开始施加更多的力量。“不！我不想这么做！别逼我这么做！”

He could see Asuka's lips twisted as he exerted more power strangling her. Slowly, her right bandaged hand lifted up from the beach and reached his left cheek.  
他能看到明日香的双唇因窒息而扭曲，随着他加大力道。慢慢地，她那只缠着绷带的右手从沙滩上抬起，触碰到了他的左脸颊。

It was the warm sensation again. The caress.  
又是那种温暖的感觉。那轻抚。

Shinji hesitated. 真嗣犹豫了。

Looking directly into her blue eyes, he could see life was slowly slipping away from her body. Though his hands were still around her neck.  
他直视着她蓝色的眼睛，能看到生命正慢慢从她体内流逝。尽管他的双手仍环绕在她的脖子上。

A tear rolled down her face.  
一滴泪珠从她的脸颊滑落。

Her hands fell. 她的双手垂落。

Shinji saw himself retract his hands as if shocked by electricity.  
真嗣看到自己仿佛被电击般缩回了双手。

"Asuka…?" “明日香…？”

Silence. 沉默。

Her eyes went unfocused. 她的眼神变得迷离。

With a trembling hand, Shinji reached out to her nose.  
颤抖着手，真嗣伸向她的鼻尖。

Nothing. 什么都没有。

Though he could still feel her remaining body heat slipping through her plugsuit.  
尽管他仍能感受到她插装服下残留的体温逐渐消散。

"NOOOOO!" Shinji screamed. He saw himself stumbling away from the spot with an utterly horrified expression. "I don't want to remember this! Please don't make me remember!"  
"不！！！" 真嗣尖叫道。他看到自己踉踉跄跄地逃离那个地方，脸上满是极度惊恐的表情。"我不想记起这些！请不要让我记起来！"

_What did you do? 你做了什么？_

"Noooo! I didn't want to!"  
“不！我不想这样！”

_It's what you have done. You are a monster.  
这就是你所做的。你是个怪物。_

Shinji saw himself slowly walking back to the side of Asuka's lifeless body with shaking legs. He knelt down beside her, and sobbed.  
真嗣看到自己颤抖着双腿，缓缓走回明日香毫无生气的身体旁。他跪在她身边，啜泣起来。

_Murderer! “杀人犯！”_

Shinji buried his face in the Asuka's stomach, letting tears flow out freely from his eyes.  
“真嗣将脸埋在明日香的腹部，任由泪水从眼中自由流淌。”

_You'll never be forgiven…because she's dead.  
你永远不会被原谅……因为她已经死了。_

_You killed her. 你杀了她。_

"I didn't want to! I didn't want to…"  
“我不想的！我不想……”

Slowly, Shinji watched himself stood up after no one knew how long, and carried her body with both of his arms. With heavy steps, the brown-haired boy paced toward the red sea.  
慢慢地，真嗣看着自己不知过了多久后站起身来，用双臂抱起她的身体。棕色头发的男孩步履沉重地向着红海走去。

The only thing he could do, except being overwhelmed by guilt and remorse, was to watch.  
除了被愧疚和悔恨淹没，他唯一能做的就是看着。

Gradually, the sea swallowed his legs. Then his waist. Then his chest, along with Asuka's body.  
渐渐地，海水吞没了他的双腿。接着是他的腰。然后是他的胸膛，连同明日香的身体一起。

Finally, the top of his head disappeared under the calm sea.  
终于，他的头顶消失在平静的海面之下。

_You thought this would've ended your pain? Look at you know.  
你以为这就能结束你的痛苦吗？看看你现在。_

_Pathetic. 可悲。_

"I'm sorry…Asuka… I'm sorry…"  
"对不起…明日香…对不起…"

Shinji alone knelt on the flight deck of _Over the Rainbow,_ hyperventilating, the deeply-buried memories still gnawing at him. He didn't want to remember, but he just couldn't forget. The sins, the horrific crimes he had committed against her.  
真嗣独自跪在“跨越彩虹”的飞行甲板上，呼吸急促，深埋的记忆仍在啃噬着他。他不想回忆，却无法忘却。那些罪行，他对她犯下的可怕罪行。

He thought that killing himself would redeem him, but it was only another way of escaping. And he had been paying his debts for God knew how long.  
他以为自杀能赎罪，殊不知这只是另一种逃避。而且他已经为上帝知道多久的时间偿还债务了。

He took everything life threw at him as well-deserved. Still, it wasn't enough.  
他将生活中遭遇的一切都视为理所应当。然而，这还不够。

Suddenly he could feel another presence before him. Slowly raising his head, Shinji saw Asuka in a yellow sundress, her hands on her hips, smirking proudly at him. "Asuka!" He shot up from the deck and dashed forward, extending his arms.  
突然，他感觉到前方有另一个存在。他缓缓抬起头，看到明日香穿着一件黄色太阳裙，双手叉腰，得意地对他冷笑。“明日香！”他从甲板上猛地站起，向前冲去，伸出了双臂。

And then went through her without resistance.  
然后毫无阻碍地穿过了她。

Bewildered, Shinji turned his head back, just to see Asuka turned around as well, still smirking at him. "I am only an image of Asuka in your mind." She spoke.  
困惑中，真嗣转过头，只见明日香也转过身来，依旧对他得意地笑着。“我只是你脑海中明日香的形象。”她开口说道。

"Wha-" Shinji gasped as Asuka snapped her fingers, the empty flight deck suddenly was filled with countless Asukas.  
“什-” 真嗣倒抽一口气，明日香打了个响指，空旷的飞行甲板上突然出现了无数个明日香。

Asuka in a plugsuit. 穿着插入栓服的明日香。

Asuka wearing school uniform.  
穿着校服的明日香。

Asuka with high-heels and black dress.  
穿着高跟鞋和黑色连衣裙的明日香。

A ski suit wearing Asuka.  
穿着滑雪服的明日香。

An eyepatch wearing Asuka.  
戴着眼罩的明日香。

Wearing headsets, holding head low Asuka.  
戴着耳机，低着头的明日香。

Different outfits, slightly different ages.  
不同的服装，略微不同的年龄。

All same identity… 所有人的身份都一样……

"These are us; these are Asuka." The yellow-sundress-wearing Asuka spoke up again. "All Asukas you've met before. And…" Her smirk morphed into a distorted grin. "You've failed every single of us."  
“这些是我们；这些是明日香。”穿着黄色太阳裙的明日香再次开口。“所有你之前遇到的明日香。而且……”她的讥笑扭曲成一个怪异的笑容。“你对我们每一个都失败了。”

"No…" Shinji stumbled back, falling butt-first on the flight deck. "I tried! I did my best!"  
“不……” 真嗣踉跄后退，一屁股跌坐在飞行甲板上。“我试过了！我已经尽力了！”

Every Asuka turned their heads to look at Shinji. "We're merely replacements for you. You never loved us. We're only your tools to reach your so-called pathetic redemption."  
每个明日香都转过头来看着真嗣。“我们只是你的替代品。你从未爱过我们。我们只是你用来达成所谓可悲救赎的工具。”

"Is not! I love you!" Shinji screamed. "You're no different to me!"  
“不是的！我爱你！”真嗣尖叫道。“对我来说你们没有什么不同！”

"Liar." Asuka hissed. "Through the imagery of Asuka…you already know whom your true feelings are for. And… she's dead."  
“骗子。”明日香低声怒斥，“通过明日香的影像……你已经知道你真正的心意指向谁了。而且……她已经死了。”

"Noooo! I can't take this anymore! Please, somebody help me!" Shinji tried to run backward, but he felt his feet out of control as he was dragged forward by an invisible force.  
“不！我再也受不了了！谁来帮帮我！”真嗣试图向后跑，却感到双脚失控，被一股无形的力量拖拽着向前。

_You never loved me. 你从未爱过我。_

_We're only your replacements.  
我们只是你的替代品。_

_I'm not your doll! 我不是你的玩偶！_

_I hate you! 我恨你！_

Shinji screamed. It was a horrifying, twisted, and desperate scream.  
真嗣尖叫起来。那是一种恐怖、扭曲且绝望的尖叫。

And suddenly, everything went dark.  
突然间，一切陷入了黑暗。

"Oh well, that was totally unexpected." A silver-haired boy smirked, standing on a nearby hill and observing the battle intently. Grinning as he saw the Lance of Longinus flew across the ionosphere before piercing the Angel's core without a problem. "The scenario is off the track, though it's still…adaptable. I'm looking forward to meet you…Ikari Shinji-kun."  
"哦，这真是完全出乎意料。" 一个银发少年站在附近的山丘上，嘴角微扬，专注地观察着战斗。当他看到朗基努斯之枪穿越电离层，毫无阻碍地刺穿了使徒的核心时，他露出了笑容。"虽然剧情偏离了轨道，但仍然……可调整。我期待着与你见面……碇真嗣君。"

XXXXXX

"How did the fight go? Is Shinji okay?" Dr. Akagi was assaulted by Asuka's storm of inquiries as she came entered room 124. The Angel alarm covered the whole base, even in the deepest part of Central Dogma, the redhead could still make out the familiar dreading yet exciting sound.  
"战斗怎么样了？真嗣还好吗？" 赤木律子博士一进入 124 号房间，就被明日香连珠炮似的问题包围了。使徒警报响彻整个基地，即使在中央教条的最深处，红发少女仍能听到那熟悉却又令人既恐惧又兴奋的声音。

She wasn't allowed to leave the room for obvious reasons, and the fact that Shinji hadn't come back to her for hours - unlike he had promised - only made her more anxious.  
由于显而易见的原因，她不被允许离开房间，而真嗣已经几个小时没有回来找她了——这与他承诺的不同——这让她更加焦虑。

"The Angel was defeated. Shinji…he suffered some damage," Asuka's heart sunk as the words came to her. "There should be nothing for you to worry about, though. He just needs some rest. There weren't any traces of contamination, or anything." Ritsuko's explanations only reminded her of the harsh reality – that she had possession in her precious body.  
“使徒已经被击败了。真嗣……他受了些伤，”听到这些话，明日香的心沉了下去。“不过，你应该不用担心。他只需要休息一下。没有发现任何污染的痕迹。”律子的解释只是让她更加意识到残酷的现实——她的宝贵身体里有着那个存在。

"I want to see him!" Asuka exclaimed, though her tone almost pleading, a stark contrast to her usual haughtiness. "I _need_ to see him!"  
"我想见他！" 明日香喊道，尽管她的语气近乎恳求，与她平时的傲慢形成鲜明对比。"我必须见他！"

"No, we don't know what will happen to your left eye if you leave this room, equipped with Anti-L barrier." Dr. Akagi replied without thinking. "In theory, the…collar and the eyepatch should be enough, but we aren't taking any risks here. Not after I've done necessary tests."  
"不行，我们不知道如果你离开这个配备反 L 屏障的房间，你的左眼会发生什么。" 赤城博士不假思索地回答。"理论上，项圈和眼罩应该足够了，但我们不在这里冒任何风险。尤其是在我进行了必要的测试之后。"

"You can't just keep me here forever! It's already maddening as it is, even with Shinji around!" Asuka barked. "I'd lost my mind if you keep me in here any longer!" As she said, the dim light emitting from her left eye seemed to intensify.  
"你不能永远把我关在这里！即使有真嗣在，这已经够让人发疯了！" 明日香咆哮道。"如果你们再把我关在这里，我会疯掉的！" 正如她所说，从她左眼发出的微弱光芒似乎增强了。

"Calm down Asuka." Ritsuko hastily said, afraid of things going wrong. "You being moody only do bad to your condition."  
"冷静点，明日香。" 律子急忙说道，生怕事情恶化。"你情绪不稳定只会对你的状况不利。"

"But-" She was cut off as another husky older voice started up.  
"但是——" 她话未说完，就被另一个沙哑的成熟声音打断了。

"Let her go, Dr. Akagi."  
"让她去吧，赤城博士。"

Both occupants of the room turned their heads to the direction of the voice, just to see Commander Ikari standing at the entrance of the room, his hands clasped behind his rear as usual.  
房间里的两人同时转向声音的方向，只见碇司令一如既往地双手背在身后，站在门口。

"Do you know what you are talking about, Gendo?" Ritsuko doubted, confused by his behavior. She didn't know where her courage to raise her volume against him came from. Why did he care- or was it care, or something else? – about the Second Child so much?  
“你知道你在说什么吗，碇？”律子怀疑地问道，对他的行为感到困惑。她不知道自己哪来的勇气提高音量对他讲话。他为什么这么关心——或者那真的是关心，还是别的什么？——二号机驾驶员？

She went wide-eyed as her high IQ brain kicked in. He wasn't doing it for the Second Child, but for Shinji.  
她瞪大了眼睛，高智商的大脑开始运转。他不是为了二号机驾驶员，而是为了真嗣。

"We still don't know what will happen if she gets out the Anti-L barrier!" Still, she tried.  
“我们仍然不知道如果她突破反 L 屏障会发生什么！”尽管如此，她还是尝试了。

"That's before you put the stopgap and the DSS Choker on her." Gendo's voice was calm and collected as usual. Shinji hadn't wake up ever since the battle ended, and he was constantly mumbling something. Even though most of the phrases weren't recognizable, 'Asuka' was undoubtedly one of them.  
“那是你给她戴上临时阻断器和 DSS 项圈之前的事了。”源渡的声音一如既往地平静而沉着。真嗣自战斗结束后就一直没有醒来，嘴里不停地念叨着什么。虽然大部分话语都无法辨认，但‘明日香’无疑是其中之一。

He didn't know what he was doing. Taking the Second Child out was indeed risky, but he just couldn't see Shinji – no, he just couldn't lose him, that's all – Gendo tried to convince himself. "Is there more we can do?"  
他不知道自己在做什么。带出二号机驾驶员确实风险很大，但他就是无法看着真嗣——不，他就是不能失去他，仅此而已——源渡试图说服自己。“我们还能做些什么吗？”

"Not really. Except for further tests." Dr. Akagi admitted.  
“其实没有了。除了进一步的测试。”赤木博士承认道。

"Then you have my order. Release the Second Child."  
“那么，我命令你。释放第二适格者。”

Ritsuko sighed. In truth, one of the primary reasons she had kept Asuka in room 124 was to fulfill some of her own curiosities, for example, how Angels interact with human bodies - not to mention her own twisted little revenge. There was a risk, for sure, but sooner than later, she _will_ have to let her go. Not to mention the risk wasn't exactly larger than facing an Angel, anyway.  
律子叹了口气。事实上，她将明日香留在 124 号房间的主要原因之一，是为了满足自己的一些好奇心，比如天使如何与人体互动——更不用说她那扭曲的小小复仇了。当然，这存在风险，但迟早她得放她走。更别提这风险并不比直面使徒大多少。

"Fine. But remember-" “好吧。但记住——”

"I know, I know." Asuka waved her hand, almost losing control of herself to jump in exuberance. "Where is he? I can go there by myself!"  
"我知道，我知道。" 明日香挥了挥手，差点控制不住自己跳起来欢呼。"他在哪儿？我自己能过去！"

"Room 303. Remember, not a word to other people!"  
"303 号房。记住，别跟其他人说！"

"Young people…" Gendo shook his head and sighed as he watched the Second Child burst out of the room.  
"年轻人啊……" 碇源堂摇了摇头，叹息着看向第二适格者冲出房间。

XXXXXX

"Shinji!" The electronic door of ward 303 suffered more mild mechanical damage as it was thrown open by the impatient redhead against its designs. "Shinji are you-"  
"真嗣！" 303 病房那扇电子门因被急躁的红发女孩猛地推开，而遭受了轻微的机械损伤，这显然超出了它的设计承受范围。"真嗣，你还好吗——"

Asuka stopped yelling as she saw Misato standing in the room and put one finger on her lips, gesturing her to keep quiet. Though her expression turned utterly surprised after she recognized the new intruder. "Asuka?!" She managed to shout in a whisper, running to the clueless redhead and pulled her into a bear hug. "I'm so glad you're okay!"  
"明日香看到美里站在房间里，便停止了喊叫，用手指轻触嘴唇，示意她保持安静。然而，当她认出这位新闯入者时，表情变得极为惊讶。“明日香？！”她低声惊呼，跑到一脸茫然的红发少女身边，将她紧紧拥入怀中。“我真高兴你没事！””

Misato tensed up, though, as the red-black choker on Asuka's neck came into her field of view. "Asuka…" She started, sadness poured out from her voice.  
"然而，当美里注意到明日香脖子上那条红黑相间的项圈时，她紧张起来。“明日香……”她开口道，声音中流露出深深的悲伤。”

"What's wrong, Misato?" Asuka inquired, slowly stepping back to a talking distance.  
"“怎么了，美里？”明日香问道，缓缓后退到合适的交谈距离。”

Misato shook her head. She wanted to ask was she allowed to be out of room 124, but since she's already here, then it must mean NERV, or at least Dr. Akagi had decided to release her; it would be like asking a waking person if she's awake.  
美里摇了摇头。她本想问自己是否被允许离开 124 号房间，但既然她已经在这里了，那就意味着 NERV，或者至少是赤木博士已经决定让她出来了；这就像问一个醒着的人她是否醒着一样。

"You came here for Shinji, right?" She brought up a smile, but it faded as quickly as it came. "You really came in time. He has been calling your name nonstop. Maybe you can do something about it."  
“你是来找真嗣的，对吧？”她努力挤出一个微笑，但很快就消失了。“你来得真是时候。他一直在不停地喊你的名字。也许你能做点什么。”

With a faint blush, Asuka walked closer to his bedside and sat on the spare chair. Staring at his sleeping form, she could identify the _fear_ that was obviously showed on his face.  
带着一丝微红，明日香走近他的床边，坐在了备用椅子上。凝视着他沉睡的模样，她能清晰地辨认出他脸上明显流露出的恐惧。

Asuka frowned. From her impression, Shinji never feared anything. He was always so headstrong and confident. She leaned closer to his quivering lips.  
明日香皱起了眉头。在她印象中，真嗣从不畏惧任何事。他总是那么固执和自信。她更靠近了他颤抖的嘴唇。

"'m s'ry…' suka…" "'对不起…' 明日香…"

With her eyebrow raised, the redhead started another storm of thoughts in her mind. Why was he apologizing? It was a very uncharacteristic thing for him to do. Not to mention he didn't really do anything to her that would require an apology, right?  
红发少女挑起眉毛，脑海中又掀起了一阵思绪的风暴。他为何要道歉？这完全不像他的作风。更别说他并没有对她做过什么需要道歉的事，对吧？

"… d'nt h'te me…" "… 别讨厌我…"

Asuka blinked. Why would he think that she hated him? Dr. Akagi had said the Angel somehow attacked his mind...Asuka shook it off. As confused as she was, she took the only approach that might work. She took his right hand with both of hers and came close to his right ear. "I don't hate you, Shinji. I love you."  
明日香眨了眨眼。他怎么会觉得她讨厌他呢？赤木博士说过，那个使徒不知怎的攻击了他的心灵...明日香摇了摇头，抛开这些疑惑。尽管她感到困惑，但她采取了唯一可能奏效的方法。她用双手握住他的右手，靠近他的右耳轻声说道：“我不讨厌你，真嗣。我爱你。”

Predictably Shinji slowly calmed down, his expression turned more peaceful with each passing moment. Misato looked at the scene with a slight smile on her face. Maybe their bond was much deeper than she thought – though her smile faded as reality struck her again.  
不出所料，真嗣渐渐平静下来，他的表情随着时间的推移变得更加平和。美里看着这一幕，脸上露出一丝微笑。也许他们的关系比她想象的要深得多——尽管当现实再次击中她时，她的微笑消失了。

Misato felt her chest sored as the image of another man crept up her mind, and the adorable scene in front of her didn't help soothe it by much. There was only one course of action before her to follow – pick up where Kaji left behind to let him rest in peace.  
美里感到胸口一阵刺痛，另一个男人的形象悄然浮现在她的脑海中，眼前这可爱的场景并没有多大帮助缓解这种感觉。她面前只有一个行动方案——继续卡吉留下的工作，让他安息。

## *Chapter 35*: Chapter 35: Introspection  
*第 35 章*: 第 35 章：内省

Disclaimer: I do not own Evangelion.  
免责声明：我不拥有《新世纪福音战士》。

Warning: This chapter might have to be rated **M** as well, for safety purposes.  
警告：出于安全考虑，本章可能也需要评为 M 级。

**Chapter 35: Introspection  
第 35 章：内省**

"Well, nothing's changed during the period you were outside of the Anti-L barrier. You can go home if you want." Ritsuko's final decision sounded like a pleasant melody to Asuka, who squeaked like a schoolgirl and jumped from her spot.  
“嗯，你离开反 L 屏障期间，一切都没有变化。如果你想的话，可以回家。”律子的最终决定对明日香来说犹如悦耳的旋律，她像个小女生一样尖叫着从原地跳了起来。

The past few days had been depressing, to say the least. Shinji woke up not long after her comforting him, though he was surprised to see her there at his bedside at first. After some quick explanations, he accepted the arrangement with delight – he wanted her out of there as soon as possible himself, after all.  
过去几天，至少可以说，是压抑的。真嗣在她安慰他后不久就醒了，起初他对她在床边感到惊讶。经过一些快速的解释，他高兴地接受了安排——毕竟，他自己也希望她尽快离开那里。

Now her observation period was finally over; she was looking forward to having normal – or rather, relatively normal – life once again, and meet her friends – however slowly becoming increasingly unimportant to her - at school.  
现在她的观察期终于结束了；她期待着再次过上正常——或者说相对正常——的生活，并在学校与她的朋友们见面——尽管她们对她来说越来越不重要。

"Is there anything that I should be careful with?" Asuka probed, still worrying about the Angelic possession.  
“有什么我需要注意的吗？”明日香试探地问，仍然担心天使的附身。

"As long as you don't take the eyepatch off, you'll be fine." Dr. Akagi replied.  
“只要你别摘下眼罩，就不会有事。”赤木律子博士回答道。

"What if I do?" Seeing the incredulous glare from Ritsuko, Asuka hastily reiterated, "I mean, what if it falls off? Or some random morons snatch it off?"  
“如果我摘了呢？”看到律子难以置信的目光，惣流急忙补充道，“我是说，万一它自己掉了呢？或者一些无聊的家伙把它抢走怎么办？”

"Then we'd have to explain how we got a whole school of kids killed to their parents and the UN." An unreadable expression crossed the blonde doctor's face, though Asuka could clearly see a hint of amusement in it.  
“那我们就得向孩子们的父母和联合国解释，我们是怎么让整个学校的孩子丧命的。”金发女博士脸上掠过一丝难以捉摸的表情，但惣流清楚地捕捉到了其中的戏谑之意。

"Doctor?" Asuka questioned, her tone nervous.  
"医生？" 明日香问道，语气中带着紧张。

"Relax." Dr. Akagi smirked. "It's not like you will turn into an Angel _immediately_ after it falls off. You'll have time to fix it. We'll also strengthen Section 2 coverage around you guys. With your hand-to-hand combat training, it's not like people can just _come and get to you,_ right?"  
"放松。" 赤城博士微微一笑。"它掉下来也不会让你立刻变成使徒。你有时间修复它。我们还会加强你们周围的第二区域覆盖。以你的近战训练，别人不可能轻易接近你，对吧？"

"Of course." Asuka held her head up, feeling a note of pride for the first time in a long while.  
"当然。" 明日香抬起头，久违地感到一丝自豪。

"And you still have…the last resort." Ritsuko's tone suddenly turned dead serious.  
"而且你还有…最后的手段。" 律子的语气突然变得极其严肃。

The redhead's expression darkened in an eyeblink. "Yeah…" She sulked. Even though she didn't want to admit it, the ultimate decision was still held in her hands. She wasn't afraid of death herself, but she was dreading how much of a pain she would inflict on Shinji if she did.

“他看你的眼神很奇怪，你没注意到吗？”明日香哼了一声。真嗣发誓他能看到她眼罩下微弱的蓝光在增强。“还有他的特征……他看起来很像那个奇迹女孩。红眼睛，苍白的皮肤。真让人毛骨悚然。”

"Oh?" Shinji smirked; his voice switched into a playful tone. "Are you jealous?"  
“哦？”真嗣微微一笑；他的声音转为了调皮的语调。“你吃醋了吗？”

"As if!" Asuka barked, though contrasted by her forceful chewing on the food.  
“才怪！”明日香厉声说道，尽管她用力咀嚼食物的样子与之形成鲜明对比。

"Maybe he's just-" He trailed off as both of them could see a human shadow approaching them from behind. Asuka tensed up, ready to enter combat stance. Shinji, on the other hand, simply smiled and turned his head back, as if knowing who the intruder was.  
“也许他只是——”他话音未落，两人都能看到一个人影从背后向他们靠近。明日香紧张起来，准备进入战斗姿态。而真嗣则只是微笑着转过头，仿佛知道来者是谁。

"Kaworu Nagisa, right?" Shinji's inquisitive voice came to her.  
“渚薰，对吧？”真嗣好奇的声音传到她耳中。

"Correct. I suppose you are the Third Child, Shinji Ikari?" Kaworu's friendly tone started making Asuka's skin crawl.  
“没错。我想你就是第三适格者，碇真嗣？”薰友好的语气开始让明日香感到不安。

"Yep. Nice to meet you, Nagisa-san." Asuka gritted her teeth.  
“嗯哼。很高兴见到你，渚君。”明日香咬紧牙关。

She could hear Kaworu chuckle. "No need. Just call me Kaworu. I'll call you Shinji in return."  
她能听到渚薰轻笑的声音。“不用客气。叫我渚薰就好，我也会称呼你为真嗣。”

"Ahem!" Asuka shot up from her spot, snapping both heads in her direction. "Shinji, let's leave this place, alright? We have some private business to attend to."  
"咳咳！" 明日香从她的位置上猛地站起，将两人的目光都吸引过来。"真嗣，我们离开这里吧，好吗？我们有些私事要处理。"

Kaworu narrowed his eyes at her. "Excuse me, lady… isn't that should be his decision?"  
渚薰眯起眼睛看着她。“不好意思，女士……这难道不该由他自己决定吗？”

"Well, listen up." Asuka shot him a venomous glare. "I'm his girlfriend. I'm afraid I have a better claim on him than you do."  
“好吧，听好了。”明日香朝他投去一个恶狠狠的眼神。“我是他的女朋友。恐怕我对他的权利比你更大。”

If it wasn't sanity telling her otherwise, Asuka would swear a hint of sadness crossed Kaworu's face. "I see." His tone dropped. "I'll leave it to you, then."  
如果不是理智在提醒她，明日香几乎要发誓渚薰的脸上闪过一丝悲伤。“我明白了。”他的语气低沉下来。“那就交给你了。”

Asuka smirked in triumph as she watched Kaworu leave the rooftop with his light steps, not noticing the amused expression on her boyfriend's face.  
明日香得意地笑了，看着渚薰轻快地离开屋顶，没有注意到她男朋友脸上那饶有兴味的表情。

From atop a cliff overlooking one of the more desolate areas of Tokyo-3, Misato stood next to her car while she looked through her high-powered binoculars, zooming in on the enigma of a boy that was Kaworu Nagisa. On her own accord, she had been trailing him from a distance over the course of the few days since he had arrived, after seeing his suspicion-raising file that basically told her nothing.  
站在俯瞰东京-3 较为荒凉地区的一处悬崖上，美里站在她的车旁，透过高倍望远镜凝视着那个谜一般的男孩——渚薰。自从他到来后的几天里，她出于自己的意愿一直在远处跟踪他，这一切都源于那份几乎什么都没告诉她的可疑档案。

Ritsuko had been avoiding the topic of the Fifth Child for unspoken reasons, only showed her his files. Though it was enough of a motive for her to track down the new boy. From behind him, Misato couldn't make out the movement of his lips accurately, but she was sure he was talking to someone.  
律子一直避而不谈第五适格者的话题，只是给她看了他的档案。尽管这足以成为她追踪这个新男孩的动机。从他背后看去，美里无法准确分辨出他嘴唇的动作，但她确信他在和某人说话。

Down in the middle of the devastated street, Kaworu looked up as twelve black monoliths surrounded him. Though he was in an open area, he knew that only he could see and hear them.  
在毁坏的街道中央，碇真嗣抬头望去，十二座黑色巨碑环绕着他。尽管身处开阔地带，他知道只有自己能看见和听见它们。

"Are you alone?" The one floating directly before him spoke. SEELE 01, Chairman Keel Lorenz.  
“你独自一人吗？”悬浮在他正前方的那个声音问道。Seele 01，主席基尔·洛伦兹。

"Does it matter?" He shrugged, scanning up and down the desolate area around them.  
“这重要吗？”他耸耸肩，环视四周荒凉的景象。

"Watch your tone, boy." SEELE 06 snapped.  
"注意你的语气，小子。" SEELE 06 厉声喝道。

"Is there anything noteworthy of the Second and the Third Child?" SEELE 01 spoke up. "I hope you've collected some information as I told you so."  
"第二适格者和第三适格者有什么值得注意的地方吗？" SEELE 01 开口问道。"我希望你已经按照我说的收集了一些信息。"

"The Second and Third Children are in a…stable relationship," Kaworu smiled a sad smile. "None of them seem like the person I was told to expect."  
"第二适格者和第三适格者正处于一种……稳定的关系，" 渚薰带着一丝哀伤的微笑说道。"他们似乎都不是我所被告知要面对的那种人。"

"Hm." SEELE 01 pondered for a moment. Now he knew why Gendo was overly protective of the Second Child. He had never thought such a guy would care about his son so much. "Gendo Ikari's protectiveness of the Second and the Third Child is abnormal."  
“嗯。”SEELE 01 沉思片刻。现在他明白了为什么源堂对二号适格者过度保护。他从未想过这样一个男人会如此关心自己的儿子。“源堂对二号和三号适格者的保护欲异常。”

"It seems like the information we got from Fuyutsuki is correct." SEELE 07 intoned. "Now that NERV is still operating under full capacity, with our subpar MP EVAs we stand little chance."  
“看来我们从冬月那里得到的信息是正确的。”SEELE 07 低沉地说道，“既然 NERV 仍在满负荷运转，以我们那些劣质的 MP EVA，我们几乎没有胜算。”

"Regardless," SEELE 01 spoke up again. He had been preparing for everything. "It only makes things easier. You know what to do. You have the plans we've developed for you."  
“无论如何，” SEELE 01 再次开口。他一直在为一切做准备。“这只会让事情变得更容易。你知道该怎么做。你有我们为你制定的计划。”

"As you wish." Kaworu bowed a little. With that, the monoliths vanished, and the fair-skinned boy was left to stand amongst the wreckage and debris-filled street alone. Or at least, so a certain someone would like for him to think.  
“如你所愿。” 渚薰微微鞠了一躬。话音刚落，那些巨石碑便消失了，留下那位皮肤白皙的少年独自站在满是残骸和碎片的街道上。至少，某个特定的人希望他这么认为。

Letting out a small sigh, Kaworu turned around and gave a slight nod to Misato, who was still watching him from off in the distance. The plan SEELE gave him had laid out how to 'approach' the Third Child and how to get the Second Child 'by their side,' or to eliminate her 'if nothing else works.'  
渚薰轻轻叹了口气，转身向远处仍在注视他的美里微微点头。SEELE 给他的计划详细说明了如何‘接近’第三适格者，以及如何让第二适格者‘站在他们一边’，或者如果其他方法都不奏效，就‘除掉她’。

Of course, he couldn't just expose himself. Not before the sixteenth Angel appeared.  
当然，他不能就这样暴露自己。至少得等到第十六使徒出现之前。

The Major let out a gasp as she dropped her binoculars. She knew for a fact that it was impossible for anyone to notice her from that distance with the naked eye.  
少校惊呼一声，手中的望远镜滑落。她确信，任何人都不可能仅凭肉眼从那么远的距离注意到她。

"What the hell? Who is he?" Misato murmured, taking a step back towards her car. Whoever he was, Misato knew his purpose couldn't be good.  
“搞什么鬼？他是谁？”美里喃喃自语，向后退向她的车。无论他是谁，美里知道他的目的绝非善事。

## *Chapter 36*: Chapter 36: Attempt  
*第 36 章*: 第 36 章：尝试

Disclaimer: I do not own Evangelion. I adopted one Kaworu scene (with different dialogues) from Sincerely Yours cuz, again, I'm lazy. :/  
免责声明：我不拥有《新世纪福音战士》。我借用了《Sincerely Yours》中的一幕（对话有所不同），再次声明，我有点懒。:/

**Chapter 36: Attempt 第三十六章：尝试**

Rei Ayanami stood silently atop the catwalk before the blue EVA Unit 00, her plugsuit wrapping tightly around her slender body. The more she thought about the recent events, the more she found herself unable to understand.  
绫波零静静地站在蓝色 EVA 初号机前的检修通道上，紧身驾驶服紧紧包裹着她纤瘦的身躯。她越是思考最近发生的事情，越是发现自己无法理解。

Turning her head as she felt another presence coming closer to her, Rei fixed her crimson eyes on the intruder of her small peaceful moment before her sync test.  
感觉到另一个身影逐渐靠近，绫波零转过头，用她那深红色的眼睛凝视着这个闯入她短暂宁静时刻的不速之客，就在她的同步测试之前。

"Rei Ayanami, correct?" Kaworu started, keeping his smirk on the face. "The First Child, and the pilot of Evangelion Unit 00."  
"绫波零，对吧？" 渚薰开口道，脸上依旧挂着微笑。"第一适格者，也是 EVA 零号机的驾驶员。"

"Yes," Rei replied concisely.  
"是的，" 绫波简洁地回答。

"You're the same as me..." Kaworu narrowed his eyes at her, sensing the subtle shift of her AT-Field. "So, both of us ended up in the same form as Lilim while we inhabit this planet."  
"你和我一样..." 渚薰眯起眼睛注视着她，察觉到她 AT 力场的微妙变化。"所以，我们俩都以莉莉姆的形态存在于这个星球上。"

"Who are you?" “你是谁？”

"I am the Fifth Child, Kaworu Nagisa." Kaworu bowed slightly.  
"我是第五适格者，渚薰。" 渚薰微微鞠躬。

"But I do not see any similarities between us." Rei's ghostly voice came to him, eliciting a chuckle from the silver-haired boy.  
“但我看不出我们之间有什么相似之处。”丽那幽灵般的声音传到他耳中，引得银发少年轻笑出声。

"I see that you're still unaware of your true nature." His voice gained an impression of smugness in it. "While you chose the vessel that's in the form of Lilim, your soul continues to be that of Lilith's."  
“看来你仍未意识到自己的真实本质。”他的声音中带上了一丝自得。“尽管你选择了以莉莉姆形态的容器，你的灵魂依旧是莉莉丝的。”

"I do not understand."  
“我不明白。”

Kaworu waved his hand dismissively. "All that was born from Lilith is bond to return to Lilith." Smirking, he walked away from the catwalk and headed to his own EVA Unit 03. "It is your destiny to do so."  
渚薰不以为意地挥了挥手。“所有由莉莉丝诞生的存在，注定要回归莉莉丝。”他带着一丝讥讽的微笑，从天桥上走开，朝着自己的 EVA 初号机 03 走去。“这是你的宿命。”

Rei Ayanami kept her intensifying gaze at him until he disappeared around the corner. "I don't like him," she mumbled to herself before climbing into her own entry plug.  
绫波零一直用她愈发强烈的目光注视着他，直到他消失在转角处。“我不喜欢他。”她喃喃自语，随后爬进了自己的插入栓。

XXXXXX

"Major Katsuragi," Maya called in an odd voice, looking away from her terminal. "You might want to take a look at this."  
"葛城少校，"摩耶用一种奇怪的语气喊道，目光从终端上移开。"你可能需要看看这个。"

Misato moved from the observation window of the testing chamber and began making her way towards Maya. Her nervousness grew for every step she took – it was the Fifth Child's first sync test with the newly arrived Unit 03, as well as Asuka's first one after Unit 02 was cleansed entirely, and she was sure Maya wouldn't call her if everything was normal.  
美里从测试室的观察窗前移开，开始向真希波走去。每走一步，她的紧张感就增加一分——这是第五适格者与新抵达的三号机首次同步测试，也是明日香在二号机完全净化后的首次测试，她确信真希波不会在一切正常的情况下叫她过来。

"What is it, Maya?" She asked, leaning over the brunette's chair.  
“怎么了，玛雅？”她问道，俯身靠近那位棕发女子的椅子。

"Shinji's sync rate is high as usual, and Asuka's taking a mild dive from her last sync test before the thirteenth Angel. Rei is doing just fine, around the mid-fifties, and the Fifth Child's score is just sitting at eighty percent."  
"真嗣的同步率一如既往地高，而明日香在第十三使徒前的最后一次同步测试中略有下降。绫波表现正常，大约在五十几左右，而第五适格者的分数则稳定在百分之八十。"

Misato squinted her eyes as she looked at the live feed from the inside of the test plugs. Kaworu Nagisa, unlike all other pilots who had their eyes closed with peaceful expressions, also wore a rather noticeable smirk on his face, as if he wasn't even trying his best to concentrate.  
美里眯起眼睛看着测试插头内部的实时画面。与其他所有闭着眼睛、表情平和的驾驶员不同，渚薰的脸上带着相当明显的微笑，仿佛他并没有全力以赴地集中注意力。

"So what's the big deal?" Misato remarked. As far as she was concerned, maintaining a steady sync rate wasn't exactly outlandish to her.  
"那又有什么大不了的呢？" 美里说道。在她看来，保持稳定的同步率并不算什么特别的事情。

"The big deal is we haven't even configured the core for him yet," Maya replied.  
“关键是我们还没为他配置核心呢，”玛雅回答道。

The Major of NERV gave her a perplexed look that screamed the words 'please elaborate.'  
NERV 的总指挥给了她一个困惑的眼神，仿佛在大声说‘请详细说明’。

"Major, you do know that the pilots are able to sync with their EVAs because the respective cores are specifically configured for them, right?" Maya probed.  
“少校，您应该知道驾驶员能够与他们的 EVA 同步，是因为各自的核是专门为他们配置的，对吧？”玛雅问道。

"Yeah." Misato nodded, feeling a bit annoyed that her college friend, Dr. Akagi, had never taken so much time explaining anything to her in detail, except the time when she was interrogating her about Asuka's condition.  
“嗯。”美里点头道，心中有些不悦，她的大学好友赤城博士从未如此详细地向她解释过任何事情，除了那次她盘问她关于明日香状况的时候。

Typically, she would say 'you don't need to know' at worst or put everything in laymen's terms at best – while Maya, on the other hand, actually spent time explaining technical details. "When we did the cross-sync test between the pilots..." Maya made a few keystrokes, pulling up a chart to the screen. "Shinji, Asuka, and Rei were able to pass the absolute borderline, yes. But their sync rates in unfamiliar EVAs were atrocious, much lower than that in their own EVAs. But the Fifth Child...he's born different."  
通常情况下，她会说‘你不需要知道’，或者最多用通俗易懂的话解释一切——而玛雅则不同，她实际上花时间解释技术细节。“当我们对驾驶员进行交叉同步测试时……”玛雅敲了几下键盘，调出一张图表显示在屏幕上。“真嗣、明日香和绫波能够通过绝对界限，是的。但他们在不熟悉的 EVA 中的同步率非常糟糕，远低于他们自己的 EVA。但第五个孩子……他天生与众不同。”

"Could it be a…"  
"这会不会是……"

"The MAGI doesn't glitch. The equipment we use is in perfect condition as well." Maya cut her off, though she quickly realized her rudeness. "Sorry about that, Major."  
"MAGI 系统没有出现故障。我们使用的设备也处于完美状态。" 玛雅打断了她，但很快意识到自己的无礼。"抱歉，少校。"

"Nah, you're fine." Misato waved her hand. "So…what could this possibly imply?"  
"没事，你做得对。" 美里挥了挥手。"那么……这可能意味着什么呢？"

"If I didn't know any better, I'd say that he isn't human."  
“如果我不了解情况，我会说他不是人类。”

Misato felt her heart sink into her stomach as the answer reached her - it was the most dreaded answer she could've got. The recollections of the boy's strangeness didn't help things, at all.  
当这个答案传到她耳中时，美里感到心沉到了胃里——这是她最不愿听到的答案。那个男孩的种种怪异行为更是让事情雪上加霜。

The sound of machines beeping and buzzing flowed through Shinji's ears while he sat on a bench, waiting for Asuka to come back from her physical examination in NERV's medical wing. Ever since the thirteenth Angel burrowed itself inside of her left eye, the Second Child had to go through regular exams and checkups to ensure that the possession's state wasn't faltering any farther than it already had.  
真嗣坐在长椅上，耳边传来机器的哔哔声和嗡嗡声，等待着明日香从 NERV 医疗翼的体检中回来。自从第十三使徒钻入她的左眼后，这位二号适格者不得不接受定期检查，以确保附身状态没有进一步恶化。

Fortunately, it seemed that nothing – such as emissions - really changed since then. Her appointments were becoming much less frequent and overall, she seemed to be coming back from them less and less pissed off about them than she had in the past.  
幸运的是，自那以后，似乎没有什么——比如排放——真正改变过。她的预约变得越来越少，总体来看，她从这些预约中回来的情绪也比过去少了很多愤怒。

"Shinji-kun." A voice called out to him, catching his attention. Shinji looked up as a familiar silver-haired pilot approached him, a smirk on his face.  
“真嗣君。”一个声音叫住了他，吸引了他的注意。真嗣抬头一看，一个熟悉的银发驾驶员正向他走来，脸上带着一丝戏谑的微笑。

Kaworu Nagisa. Shinji let out a silent sigh. He knew sooner or later, he would have to confront the Angel-human mixture by himself. At first, Shinji wanted to treat him as his friend after the ordeal in the first cycle, and it had partially worked – though it didn't help when he had to kill him in the end.  
渚薰。真嗣无声地叹了口气。他知道迟早，他必须独自面对这个天使与人类的混合体。起初，真嗣想在第一轮的磨难后把他当作朋友，这在某种程度上奏效了——尽管最后他不得不杀了他，这并没有什么帮助。

There was simply no way he could avoid Third Impact and let the world be safe with an Angel walking around.  
他根本无法避免第三次冲击，只要还有使徒在四处游荡，世界就不可能安全。

He thought Kaworu loved him for who he was, that was one reason he wanted to treat him as a friend. Until that time…  
他曾以为渚薰爱他是因为他本身，这也是他想把他当作朋友的原因之一。直到那一刻…

_"You're really arrogant and selfish…you know that this is no redemption for the people here, don't you?"  
“你真是傲慢又自私……你知道这并不能为这里的人赎罪，对吧？”_

_"So…this is the answer you got, Ikari Shinji-kun? Your soul…is both twisted, and evil…enough for me to despise you."  
“所以……这就是你得出的答案吗，碇真嗣君？你的灵魂……既扭曲又邪恶……足以让我鄙视你。”_

_"…So pure…" “…如此纯净…”_

It was then he also realized that, every cycle he went on was a new world with everything reset, including Kaworu's status.  
那时他也意识到，每一次循环都是一个全新的世界，一切都重置了，包括渚薰的状态。

After all, he was just another Angel that had to be defeated.  
毕竟，他不过是又一个必须被打败的天使。

Shinji shook the thoughts off. "Oh, hey Kaworu." He returned with a smile. "What're you doing here?" Knowing how heavily surveilled NERV Medical Ring was, Shinji knew he had to take a more subtle approach. He only had one ultimate goal in mind – the last Angel was to be defeated, so he might need Asuka and Rei to keep an eye on him during the battles.  
真嗣甩开这些念头。“哦，嘿，渚薰。”他笑着回应。“你在这里做什么？”深知 NERV 医疗环的严密监控，真嗣明白他必须采取更隐晦的方式。他心中只有一个终极目标——最后的使徒必须被击败，因此他可能需要明日香和绫波在战斗中监视他。

Kaworu's sharp crimson eyes softened a little, along with the rest of his features. "I saw you are here, since I'm new here I want to stop by and say hi." He answered before looking towards the empty seat next to the pilot of Unit 01. "Mind if I take a seat?"  
渚薰锐利的深红色眼眸柔和了几分，连带他的其他表情也缓和下来。“我看到你在这里，因为我是新来的，所以想过来打个招呼。”他回答后，目光转向了初号机驾驶员旁边的空座位。“介意我坐这里吗？”

"Of course not," Shinji said, scooting over to the side to allow some more room for him to sit. "Go ahead." Being confrontational wouldn't help things, Shinji needed to - no matter how much he hated the word - manipulate the last Angel to make sure the last fight would go easier for both of them.  
“当然不是，”真嗣说着，挪到一旁给他腾出更多空间坐下。“请便。”对抗无济于事，真嗣需要——无论多么讨厌这个词——操纵最后一个使徒，确保最后一战对他们双方都更轻松。

Slowly, the silver-haired pilot turned around and lowered himself onto the cushioned bench, leaning his back against the wall. "So how are you, Shinji?" He asked, his tone a little more mellow than normal.  
慢慢地，银发驾驶员转过身，坐到软垫长椅上，背靠墙壁。“那么，你怎么样，真嗣？”他问道，语气比平时稍微柔和些。

"I'm good, thanks for asking," Shinji replied.  
“我很好，谢谢关心，”真嗣回答道。

A faint grin emerged on Kaworu's features, just barely exposing some of the white in his teeth. "I wonder what is your plan after the Angel wars?"  
加沃鲁的脸上浮现出一抹淡淡的微笑，仅微微露出了些许牙齿的白色。“我想知道，天使战争之后你有什么计划？”

Shinji took a deep breath, both preventing himself from letting out a sarcastic laugh and preparing his answer. "If we do have a future after the Angel Wars...I wish I could just live my life somewhere with Asuka." It was indeed the wildest, yet one simple wish he had ever since the cycles started.  
真嗣深吸了一口气，既是为了阻止自己发出讽刺的笑声，也是为了准备他的回答。“如果天使战争之后我们真的还有未来...我希望我能和明日香一起在某处过上平凡的生活。”这确实是他自循环开始以来最狂野却又最简单的愿望。

"I see." Kaworu chuckled; Shinji could swear he caught a hint of surprise from it. "You have my regards for it. Though do you not have other dreams? Like conquering and manipulating the world from behind the curtain, for instance?"  
“我明白了。”渚薰轻笑出声；真嗣发誓他从中捕捉到了一丝惊讶。“你值得我敬佩。不过，难道你没有其他梦想吗？比如在幕后征服和操控世界之类的？”

Shinji let out a sad short laugh. Granted, there were many times he had the opportunity to do it at his position. "No, not really. I mean, what's the point of conquering the world without someone who cares about you at your side? Besides, Asuka is already my whole world, anyway." He replied, happy that all of his statements were as truthful as they could get.  
真嗣发出了一声悲伤的短笑。确实，他有很多次机会可以这样做。“不，并不是。我是说，如果没有一个关心你的人在你身边，征服世界又有什么意义呢？再说，明日香已经是我的整个世界了，无论如何。”他回答道，很高兴他的所有陈述都尽可能地真实。

"You truly feel that way, don't you?" Kaworu's voice was hushed and serious, a strong contrast to how it was before.  
“你真的这么认为，对吧？”渚薰的声音低沉而严肃，与之前截然不同。

"Of course." Shinji nodded.  
“当然。”真嗣点头道。

"That's...truly beautiful, Shinji." Taking in a deep breath, Kaworu turned away from Shinji and gazed blankly ahead. Never before had he met someone with so much selflessness.  
“那真是……非常美丽，真嗣。” 深吸一口气，渚薰转过身去，目光空洞地望向前方。他从未遇见过如此无私的人。

The people he had encountered before, namely SEELE members and some technicians at NERV German Branch, would manipulate others without so much as second thoughts, and that's why he in turn manipulated them.  
他之前遇到的人，即 SEELE 成员和 NERV 德国分部的一些技术人员，会毫不犹豫地操纵他人，这就是为什么他反过来操纵他们。

His ultimate goal was to return to Adam; even though he didn't need to listen to SEELE and help them do what they wanted, the plans they developed for him would make it easier for him to achieve his own goal, anyway.  
他的最终目标是回到亚当；尽管他不需要听从 SEELE 的命令并帮助他们实现他们的愿望，但他们为他制定的计划无论如何都会让他更容易实现自己的目标。

"Shinji, could you please tell me why does the Second Child means so much to you?"  
“真嗣，你能告诉我为什么二号对你来说意义如此重大吗？”

"Because..." He let a moment of silence hang between them. Why did Asuka mean so much to him, to the extent that she became the only thing that mattered to him in the whole world? Was it because of the guilt of the crime he had committed against her? Or was it because after so long, he had already lost his mind, that she was the only one who could anchor him to reality?  
“因为……”他让片刻的沉默悬在他们之间。为什么明日香对他来说意义如此重大，以至于她成了他在整个世界上唯一在乎的人？是因为他对她犯下的罪行感到愧疚吗？还是因为经历了这么久，他已经失去了理智，而她是唯一能将他固定在现实的人？

"Because I love her," Shinji spoke, lowering his head and letting his bangs fall partly over his eyes. "She means everything to me. If I lost her, then I wouldn't have anything left really. I mean, what's the point of living your life if there is nobody who makes it worthwhile?"  
“因为我爱她，”真嗣说道，低下头让刘海部分遮住了眼睛。“她对我来说意味着一切。如果我失去了她，那么我真的就一无所有了。我是说，如果生活中没有人让你觉得它值得活下去，那活着还有什么意义呢？”

"You love her?" Kaworu rubbed his chin as he pondered. "What is this 'love'? How do you even describe it?"  
“你爱她？”渚薰摸着下巴沉思。“这个‘爱’是什么？你又是如何描述它的呢？”

"It's hard to explain in words." Shinji shrugged. "It's just that...when she gets hurt, or if she turns away from me...it hurts me so much that I can't stand it. And I want to make her happy."  
“很难用言语解释。”真嗣耸了耸肩。“只是……当她受伤，或是她转身背对我时……我心痛得无法忍受。而我想要让她快乐。”

"But do you think that she feels the same way about you?"  
“但你觉得她对你也有同样的感觉吗？”

"Of course I do!" Shinji didn't even find himself surprised that his answer came so quickly and with such passion.  
“当然有！”真嗣甚至没有发现自己回答得如此迅速且充满激情。

"Lil-I mean humans are such interesting creatures." Kaworu bit down on his upper lip and averted his eyes from Shinji, looking straight forward. "You truly have a pure and tender heart, Shinji." He smirked, standing up from the chair. Looking directly into Shinji's eyes, Kaworu leaned his face closer to Shinji's, his smile growing wider for each passing moment.  
“人类真是些有趣的生物。” 渚薰咬了咬上唇，避开真嗣的目光，直视前方。“你确实有一颗纯净温柔的心，真嗣。” 他微微一笑，从椅子上站起身来。直视着真嗣的眼睛，渚薰的脸渐渐靠近，笑容随着时间的推移愈发灿烂。

Before Shinji could draw back, though, Kaworu stopped dead in tracks as if sensing some kind of incoming danger. "Goodbye, Shinji." Kaworu stepped backward. Without so much as another word, the silver-haired boy turned around and swiftly made his way down the hall towards the elevator.  
然而，在真嗣来得及退缩之前，渚突然停下脚步，仿佛感应到了某种迫近的危险。“再见，真嗣。”渚向后退了一步。没有再多说一句话，银发少年转身迅速沿着走廊向电梯走去。

Shinji felt a cold chill over his shoulder as he turned around and saw Asuka standing firmly with her hands on her hips and a vicious scowl on her face while her ice blue eyes pierced like daggers as she glared past him, towards the pilot of Unit 03, who was making his exit in the elevator.  
真嗣感到一阵寒意掠过肩头，他转过身，看到明日香双手叉腰，面带凶狠的怒容，冰蓝色的眼睛如同利刃般穿透他的视线，直瞪着正走进电梯的 03 号机驾驶员。

"I'm going to have a few _warm_ words with him." The redhead hissed as she began storming down the hall.  
“我要跟他好好谈谈。”红发女子低声说着，开始怒气冲冲地沿着走廊走去。

"Asuka, wait!" Shinji tried to stop her, but found her quickly pushing him to the side.  
“明日香，等等！” 真嗣试图阻止她，却发现她迅速将他推到一边。

"Back off, Shinji." She growled, stomping down the hall. It was only then Shinji had realized that any attempt to stop her would be in vain. Asuka hastily made her way to the elevators as well, entering a different one other than Kaworu's.  
“滚开，真嗣。” 她咆哮着，大步走过走廊。直到这时，真嗣才意识到任何试图阻止她的尝试都是徒劳的。明日香匆忙走向电梯，进入了一个不同于渚薰所在的电梯。

Shinji tried to catch up to her and stop her, but the moment she saw him trying to catch up to her, Asuka pressed the button, causing the elevator door to close before Shinji could get inside.  
真嗣试图追上她并阻止她，但就在她看到他试图追上来的一瞬间，明日香按下了按钮，电梯门在真嗣进入之前关闭了。

"Asuka!" Shinji banged on the door, trying to get through to her. "Don't do this!"  
"明日香！" 真嗣用力敲打着门，试图让她听见。"别这样做！"

"You're just too innocent to see his bad intentions!" She raised her volume. "So let me deal with it!"  
"你太天真了，看不出他的坏心思！" 她提高了音量。"让我来处理吧！"

"But Asuka, you really shouldn't…" Before he could get his words out, he could hear the sound of the elevator beginning to move, leaving him behind while the Second Child continued on her pursuit of the Fifth. "Damn it!" Shinji growled as he continued banging his fist against the door.  
“但是明日香，你真的不应该……”他还没来得及说完，就听到电梯开始移动的声音，把他留在原地，而二号机驾驶员继续追赶着五号机。“该死！”真嗣一边咒骂，一边继续用拳头猛击门。

The solid black face of Evangelion Unit 03 stared vacantly at Kaworu as he made his way across the catwalk. Each step he took echoed throughout the cages until he finally came to a stop before the EVA.  
福音战士三号机那漆黑的面孔空洞地凝视着卡洛，当他穿过天桥时。他每走一步，回声就在笼子里回荡，直到他终于在 EVA 前停下。

"What's up, rookie!" A shrill voice caught his attention, causing him to turn around to see Asuka storming her way across the catwalk, quickly closing the distance between them.  
"怎么了，菜鸟！"一个尖锐的声音吸引了他的注意，让他转身看到明日香正气势汹汹地穿过天桥，迅速拉近他们之间的距离。

"Oh." He smiled. "Hello, Second Chil-" Before he could finish his sentence, though, he felt the firm grasp of Asuka's hands around his collar as she jerked him closer to her.  
“哦。”他微笑着说，“你好，二号千——”然而，他话还没说完，就感觉到明日香双手紧紧抓住他的衣领，将他猛地拉近自己。

"I want you to leave him alone, get it?!" Her vicious snarl reverberated throughout the room, traveling all the way down the adjoining hallways. "Or I will break your goddamned jaw so you'll never be able to talk to him ever again!"  
“我要你离他远点，明白吗？！”她恶狠狠的咆哮在房间里回荡，甚至传到了相连的走廊尽头。“否则我会打碎你那该死的下巴，让你永远无法再和他说话！”

"I'm sorry, Pilot Soryu, but I don't understand the reason behind your anger." His tone remained easy and calm, wearing a smirk that Asuka wanted to instantly slap off his face.  
“抱歉，碇司令，我不明白你发怒的原因。”他的语气依旧轻松平静，嘴角挂着一丝让明日香恨不得立刻扇掉的讥笑。

With another firm jerk of his collar, she pulled Kaworu closer until his face was merely inches away from her own. "I don't ever want to see you around Stupid Shinji ever again. Got it!"  
她再次用力拽了一下他的衣领，将 Kaworu 拉近，直到他的脸离她仅几英寸之遥。“我再也不想看到你出现在笨蛋真嗣周围。明白了吗！”

"Again, isn't that his decision to make?" If anything, his nonchalant manner only further infuriated her.  
“再说，那不是他自己的决定吗？” 他的若无其事的态度反而更加激怒了她。

"Listen carefully you moron!" Asuka barked. "He's mine! Even if he has to choose, he will choose me, not you!"  
"听好了，你这个笨蛋！" 明日香厉声道，"他是我的！就算他得做选择，他也会选我，不会选你！"

He scratched his chin in wonderment, curious as to what had angered her so much. Though he knew that first impressions weren't much to go by, he had to admit that the SEELE Committee's description of her as an abrasive and unstable individual seemed to be spot on so far.  
他好奇地挠了挠下巴，想知道是什么让她如此生气。虽然他明白第一印象并不足以作为判断依据，但他不得不承认，SEELE 委员会形容她是个尖锐且不稳定的人，到目前为止似乎非常准确。

Kaworu narrowed his eyes as he saw a dim clue light piercing through the eyepatch covering Asuka's left eye. He tried to probe her AT-Field, but to no avail. Her light of soul was slightly different from other Lilim he had met before.  
渚薰眯起眼睛，他看到一道微弱的线索光透过明日香左眼上的眼罩。他试图探查她的 AT 力场，却徒劳无功。她的灵魂之光与其他他所遇过的李林略有不同。

"You are definitely not the Second Child I expected to meet, Pilot Soryu." Kaworu spoke up, a slight frown crossing his pale face.  
“你绝对不是我所预料的第二适格者，飞行员惣流。”渚薰开口说道，苍白的脸上掠过一丝皱眉。

"Oh?" A note of curiosity slipped into Asuka's voice. "Were you expecting to meet me?"  
"哦？" 明日香的声音中流露出一丝好奇。"你以为会遇到我吗？"

"Of course. You are famous in our business." Kaworu smirked. "You and the Thi-I mean Shinji had saved the world multiple times."  
"当然。你在我们这一行可是赫赫有名。" 渚薰微微一笑，"你和 Thi——我是说真嗣，已经多次拯救了世界。"

Asuka huffed, her expression leaving no doubt about how she felt about his remark. "Of course. We are elite EVA pilots. Killing Angels are what we do best."  
明日香哼了一声，她的表情清楚地表明了她对这句话的感受。"当然。我们是精英 EVA 驾驶员。消灭使徒是我们最擅长的。"

"I wonder though...what's so special about you? Why it's you who's the one he loves?"  
"不过我倒是好奇...你有什么特别的？为什么是他爱上的那个人？"

Asuka's eyes went wide, taken aback by the abruptness of the question. "It's none of your business!"  
明日香的眼眸瞪大，被这突如其来的问题吓了一跳。“这关你什么事！”

"Do you love him as much as he loves you?" Kaworu asked. "Do you even know how much he loves you?"  
“你爱他像他爱你一样深吗？”渚薰问道，“你甚至知道他有多爱你吗？”

"Of course I do! He'll never leave me, and I'll never leave him!" Asuka's reply came out without hesitation. "And you, stay the fuck away from our business!"  
“当然知道！他永远不会离开我，我也永远不会离开他！”明日香毫不犹豫地回答，“而你，离我们的私事远点！”

"Your business? Does piloting the EVA count?" Kaworu kept his hands in his pocket while he spoke. Before she could talk, though, he continued. "It doesn't really matter. I'm stuck with you, this or the other way."  
"你的事？驾驶 EVA 算不算？" 渚薰说话时双手插在口袋里。没等她开口，他又继续说道："其实无所谓。我注定要和你在一起，无论哪种方式。"

"You know what doesn't matter? The fact that you're a pilot here with us." Asuka scolded. She really didn't know why she was still here arguing with him. Maybe she should've left long ago after making sure her point was delivered. "I don't know why, or how that they chose the likes of you to pilot!"  
"你知道什么不重要吗？你作为飞行员和我们在一起的事实。" 明日香责备道。她真的不知道为什么还在这里和他争论。也许她早就该在确保自己的观点传达后离开。"我不知道为什么，也不知道他们是怎么选上你这样的人来驾驶的！"

"Say, Pilot Soryu, have you ever thought about how _you_ were chosen as a pilot?" Kaworu improvised, recalling the guidance SEELE had given him.  
"我说，惣流·明日香·兰格雷，你有没有想过自己为何被选为驾驶员？" 渚薰即兴发挥，回想起 SEELE 给他的指导。"

"What the hell kind of question is that?! I'm chosen as a pilot because I'm talented, of course!" Replied Asuka truthfully. In fact, it was what she had been telling herself the moment she was elected. Though she had been starting to have doubts, especially after meeting the Fourth Child. "What the hell do you want?!" She switched to a defensive tone.  
“这算什么鬼问题？！我被选为驾驶员当然是因为我有天赋！”明日香如实回答。事实上，这是她被选中的那一刻起就一直对自己说的话。尽管她开始产生怀疑，尤其是在遇到第四适格者之后。“你到底想干什么？！”她切换到了防御性的语气。

"I came with an offer," Kaworu fixed his piercing gaze on Asuka's right eye, making the redhead shiver. "An opportunity for you to learn about the truth."  
"我带来了一个提议，" 渚薰将他锐利的目光锁定在明日香的右眼上，让这位红发少女不禁打了个寒颤。"一个让你了解真相的机会。"

"The truth? What the hell do you mean by 'truth'?!" Asuka narrowed her eye dangerously. "Are you telling me that I'm chosen for some…unpresentable reasons?"  
"真相？你说的'真相'到底是什么鬼？！" 明日香危险地眯起了眼睛。"你是说，我被选中有某些……见不得人的理由？"

"No no, don't get me wrong." Kaworu shook his head, still keeping his smirk. "Have you ever wondered what actually happened to your mother, Pilot Soryu?"  
"不不，别误会。" 渚薰摇了摇头，依旧保持着微笑。"你有没有想过，你的母亲究竟发生了什么，Soryu 驾驶员？"

Asuka's first instinct was to raise hell and apply direct and merciless physical violence – in fact, she would've already had if she was still the Asuka several months ago. Now though, after the talk with Shinji about their parents, she was more open about this particular topic – therefore, her logical part of brain successfully reduced movements that would likely cause a few bone fractures to a simple clenched fist and a death glare.  
明日香的第一反应是发飙并施以直接而毫不留情的身体暴力——事实上，如果是几个月前的她，可能已经动手了。但现在，在与真嗣谈论过他们的父母之后，她对这个问题更加开放了——因此，她理智的那部分大脑成功地将可能导致几处骨折的动作减少到了仅仅紧握拳头和一道死亡凝视。

"Speak. I promise to listen before I kill you."  
"说吧。我保证在杀你之前先听你说。"

"Like I said, I came here with an offer, a chance for you to meet your mother again," Kaworu said, his smirk widened by a minuscule amount. "As a trade-off, I need something from you as well."  
"就像我说的，我来这里是为了给你一个提议，一个让你再次见到你母亲的机会，"" 渚薰说道，他的微笑微微扩大了一些。""作为交换，我也需要从你那里得到一些东西。"

Asuka raised an eyebrow, then her face dropped lower – if that was still possible – as a disgusting realization struck her. "If this is some perverted-"  
明日香挑了挑眉，随即脸色更加阴沉——如果这还有可能的话——一股令人作呕的领悟击中了她。“如果这是什么变态的——”

Kaworu tilted his head. "What is 'perverted'?"  
渚薰歪了歪头。""'变态'是什么意思？""

A frown crossed her face. Was he seriously that innocent? It didn't matter, though. "Why should I trust you?" Asuka's voice turned freezingly cold.  
她的眉头紧锁。他真的那么天真吗？不过这并不重要。“我为什么要相信你？”明日香的声音变得冰冷刺骨。

"You don't need to trust me. What I need you to do is very simple."  
“你不需要信任我。我需要你做的事情非常简单。”

"That is?" “那是？”

"I can't tell you now. Maybe we can talk later after the next Angel attack." Kaworu replied with a shrug. He knew even people as oblivious as the Second Child shouldn't know about his need to go down to Central Dogma. "You have time to think about it. We have plenty of time."  
"我现在不能告诉你。或许下次使徒袭击后我们可以再谈。" 渚薰耸了耸肩回答。他知道即使是像二号机驾驶员这样迟钝的人，也不应该知道他需要前往中央教条区的需求。"你有时间考虑。我们还有很多时间。"

Asuka kept her right eye in contact with Kaworu's red ones in a silent glaring battle. She knew there was something wrong with the Fifth Child from the beginning. Though the offer, another chance for her to meet her mother, was in fact appealing. It was her fundamental reason to pilot the EVA in the first place, after all.  
明日香保持着右眼与渚薰的红色眼眸对视，进行着无声的瞪视较量。她从一开始就察觉到第五适格者有些不对劲。尽管那个提议，让她再次见到母亲的另一个机会，确实很诱人。毕竟，这正是她最初驾驶 EVA 的根本原因。

Then just maybe... 那么或许……

"No need. There's just no way I'm…partaking in some conspiracy with someone I don't even trust!" With that, Asuka quickly turned around and began making her leave.  
“不必了。我绝不可能……参与一个连我都无法信任的人的阴谋！”说完，明日香迅速转身，开始离开。

Kaworu Nagisa shook his head after the slender form of the Second Child disappeared around the corner. "Does Lilim differentiate from each other so much?" He asked, half to himself. Smirking as he felt another powerful existence making its way toward him. "The Angel of Womb…I wonder what will you bring?"  
渚薰在第二适格者的纤细身影消失在转角后摇了摇头。“人类之间的差异真的如此之大吗？”他自言自语道，嘴角微微上扬，感受到另一个强大存在的接近。“子宫天使……你会带来什么呢？”

"I hope this time, we can work together." If the Second Child wouldn't take the carrot, only the stick was left for him. Looking at the white ceiling of NERV's hallway, Kaworu started walking toward his assigned living quarters in the Geofront.  
"希望这次，我们能携手合作。" 如果二号机驾驶员不吃这一套，留给他的便只有棍棒了。望着 NERV 走廊上洁白的天花板，渚薰开始走向他在地底都市分配的住处。

## *Chapter 37*: Chapter 37: Freewill  
*第三十七章*: 第三十七章：自由意志

Disclaimer: I do not own Evangelion.  
免责声明：我不拥有《新世纪福音战士》。

**Chapter 37: Freewill 第三十七章：自由意志**

"…trust me, I will explain everything…the next time I see you. Goodbye."  
“……相信我，我会解释一切……下次见面时。再见。”

With a sorrowful sigh, Shinji removed the headphone from his head, putting them on the table before him. A tape recording machine was sitting on the table, Shinji picked it up and pressed the eject button, then a cassette tape that perfectly fitted his SDAT popped out.  
带着一声哀伤的叹息，真嗣摘下了耳机，将其放在面前的桌上。一台磁带录音机摆在桌上，真嗣拿起它，按下弹出键，随即一盘完美适配他 SDAT 的磁带弹了出来。

After placing the tape into the dusty SDAT, Shinji put his former escape port on a relatively obvious spot on the table in his closet, but not noticeable unless after some searching effort.  
将磁带放入积满灰尘的 SDAT 后，真嗣把他曾经的逃生口放在衣柜桌子上一个相对显眼的位置，但除非经过一番搜寻，否则并不容易注意到。

It was almost like a ritual for him to do at this point. In almost every single one of his former loops, Shinji would record this speech as soon as Kaworu showed up. Even though the SDAT, the barrier that isolated him from the rest of the world, hadn't been used for a long time because escaping wasn't a word in his dictionary anymore – it could still be used as a last resort.  
对他来说，这几乎成了一种仪式。在他曾经的每一个循环中，真嗣都会在渚薰出现后立即录制这段演讲。尽管 SDAT 这个将他与世界隔绝的屏障已经很久没有使用，因为“逃避”这个词已不再出现在他的字典里——但它仍可作为最后的手段。

Though he didn't really know the point of doing it. Only under the condition that he's dead would the recording gain its use. But if without him piloting Unit 01, the world would be doomed anyway – from the Angels, or SEELE.  
虽然他并不真正明白这么做的意义何在。只有在他死去的情况下，这段录音才会派上用场。但若没有他驾驶初号机，世界无论如何都将面临毁灭——无论是来自使徒，还是 SEELE。

But as long as there's a little bit of hope…  
但只要还有一丝希望……

"Stupid Shinji! What's for today's breakfast, and why aren't you holding me when I woke up?" A familiar loud voice floated from the corridor, breaking him out of his train of thought. "Now come to me and fulfill your seriously neglected boyfriend duties!"  
"笨蛋真嗣！今天早餐吃什么，为什么我醒来的时候你不抱着我？" 一个熟悉的大嗓门从走廊飘来，打断了他的思绪。"现在过来履行你严重忽视的男朋友职责！"

"Coming, Asuka!" Shinji brought a warm smile to his face despite the sullen mood after finishing the recording, exiting the closet to see a pouting Asuka wearing the flimsy nightgown - basically showing every curve of her body - she wore last night when they fell asleep. He planted a quick kiss on her lips while holding her by her waist, to which Asuka reciprocated with equal passion. "The breakfast is ready on the table. Your favorite _Breakfast Combo Number One._" Said Shinji after they pulled away from the kiss.  
"来了，明日香！" 尽管录完音后心情有些阴郁，但真嗣还是露出了温暖的笑容，走出衣橱，看到明日香正穿着那件薄薄的睡裙——几乎勾勒出她身体的每一道曲线——那是昨晚他们入睡时她穿的。他迅速在她唇上印下一吻，同时搂住她的腰，明日香也以同样的热情回应了他。"早餐已经准备好了，是你最喜欢的早餐组合一号。" 真嗣在他们分开后说道。

"Wunderbar." Smiling an excited smile with a note of appreciation, Asuka walked over to the dining table barefoot and sat down on one of the chairs, kicking her slender legs as she stuffed the food into her mouth. "Say, where is Misato? She's not in her room."  
"太棒了。" 阿斯卡带着一丝感激的兴奋笑容，赤脚走到餐桌旁，坐在一把椅子上，一边踢着她纤细的双腿，一边把食物塞进嘴里。"话说，美里在哪里？她不在房间里。"

"She left a message. It seems she's got something to work on at NERV." Shinji shrugged.  
"她留了条信息。好像是有什么事要去 NERV 处理。" 真嗣耸了耸肩。"

"Oh well, she just left two horny teenagers who have the permission to have sex alone in the apartment." A mischievous look crossed her face. "You know what that means, right, Shinji?"  
"哦，她把两个得到允许可以做爱的青春期少男少女单独留在了公寓里。" 她脸上掠过一丝调皮的神情。"你知道这意味着什么，对吧，真嗣？"

"Asuka…we still have school today," Shinji said in exasperation. "I don't think either of us wants to get into the mood right now."  
"明日香…我们今天还有学校的事呢，" 真嗣无奈地说道。"我觉得我们现在都没心情做那事。"

"Hmph, you're no fun." Asuka pouted. "Still, what a responsible guardian Misato is."  
“哼，真没意思。”明日香撅嘴道，“不过，美里还真是个负责任的监护人呢。”

"I think she does care about us. She's just bad at showing it." Shinji sat down across the table from Asuka. It was the topic he didn't want to discuss right now. Asuka still hadn't learned about Kaji yet; he couldn't hide it from her forever, but the timing was a great concern for him.  
"我觉得她确实关心我们。只是她不擅长表达。" 真嗣坐在明日香对面的桌前。这是他现在不想讨论的话题。明日香还不知道关于加持的事；他不能永远瞒着她，但时机对他来说是个大问题。

"Yeah, yeah. Surrogate mothers and all that." Asuka remarked offhandedly. Her face dropped as the recollections of her conversation with Kaworu yesterday resurfaced. "Say, Shinji…do you miss your mother?"  
“是啊，是啊。代孕母亲什么的。”明日香随口说道。她的脸色一沉，昨天的对话在脑海中重现。“我说，真嗣……你会想念你妈妈吗？”

Shinji raised an eyebrow. "Not really." He replied truthfully, eliciting a surprised look from the redhead. "I mean, mothers are there to look after us, right? But we can still be independent without them. Even if…they aren't…gone, we still can't rely on them forever." His tone became firmer as he continued. "Asuka, I think I can live without constantly needing…people mothering me. It also means growing up, at least that's what I think."  
真嗣挑了挑眉。“并不完全是。”他如实回答，让红发女孩露出了惊讶的表情。“我是说，母亲的存在是为了照顾我们，对吧？但我们仍然可以在没有她们的情况下独立。即使……她们没有……离开，我们也不能永远依赖她们。”他继续说道，语气变得更加坚定。“明日香，我想我可以不总是需要……别人像母亲一样照顾我。这也意味着成长，至少我是这么认为的。”

"Growing up…" The phrase echoed inside her head. Truthfully if Kaworu's brought his proposal when she was still solely relying on the EVA, she probably would've jumped at the opportunity. But through Shinji she had came to learn a lot, especially that what she really needed and what she didn't.  
“成长……”这个词在她脑海中回响。说实话，如果渚薰在她还完全依赖 EVA 时提出他的提议，她可能会立刻抓住这个机会。但通过真嗣，她学到了很多，尤其是她真正需要什么，以及她不需要什么。

Learning to love another person indeed made her drop a few things in the past. In retrospect, she didn't regret it, at all. And growing up was what she had always wanted, wasn't it?  
学会爱另一个人确实让她放下了过去的一些东西。回想起来，她一点也不后悔。而成长正是她一直渴望的，不是吗？

"Shinji, do you know what's up with the Fifth Child?" After a mild battle with herself, Asuka finally reached liberation.  
"真嗣，你知道第五适格者是怎么回事吗？" 经过一番轻微的内心挣扎，明日香终于得到了解脱。

"What's wrong? Did he…upset you?" Shinji inquired, his voice carried a subtle hint of amusement if mapped out using audio analysis software. Kaworu's innate ability to piss off Asuka was another mystery that he had yet to solve.  
"怎么了？他……惹你生气了吗？" 真嗣询问道，如果用音频分析软件来解析，他的声音中隐约带着一丝笑意。渚薰惹恼明日香的天赋，是他至今未解的另一个谜。

"I guess you could say that. Aside from that, he tried to…seduce you, he's…just not right." Asuka shrugged. "Say, is he gay or something?"  
"可以这么说吧。除此之外，他还试图……诱惑你，他……就是不太对劲。" 明日香耸了耸肩。"话说，他是不是同性恋什么的？"

Shinji made a short mental laugh. Perhaps it was because of her woman sixth sense, Asuka had always been one of the first few people to smell the fishiness of Kaworu, excluding his father and other few people who knew the real identity of the Angel of free will. "Perhaps, perhaps not." He gave a non-committal answer.  
碇真嗣在心里轻笑了一声。或许是因为她那女性特有的第六感，明日香总是最先察觉到渚薰身上异样气息的几个人之一，除了他的父亲和其他少数知晓这位自由意志天使真实身份的人。“或许吧，或许也不是。”他给出了一个模棱两可的回答。

"Whatever. Just stay away from him, Shinji." Asuka bit down on her food. "Also, I have a plan for you after school today." She smirked.  
“随你便。离他远点，真嗣。”明日香咬了一口食物，“还有，今天放学后我有个计划要你执行。”她得意地笑了笑。

"That is?" “那是？”

"You'll see when we get there."  
“到了你就知道了。”

Inside the server room of the MAGI supercomputer system, Misato unfolded her laptop and placed it on her lap while she dug through the deepest depths of the monstrous computer's data. The room was at a chilling temperature of about three degrees Celsius maintained by liquid nitrogen and powerful ventilation systems, to keep the colossal machine that was generating a massive amount of heat at acceptable working temperatures.  
在 MAGI 超级计算机系统的服务器室内，美里展开她的笔记本电脑，放在膝上，深入挖掘这台巨型计算机最深处的数据。房间维持在约三摄氏度的低温，由液氮和强大的通风系统维持，以确保这台产生大量热量的庞大机器保持在可接受的运行温度。

Though it didn't help stop Misato's sweat from dripping down her forehead as she hacked into the supercomputer. Espionage wasn't exactly the job she was paid for, nor was she skilled in the subject of matter. However, with the small flash drive that contained strings of code that Kaji provided her with, it made getting through the system much easier. Still, her ministrations were flawed if seen by experts.  
尽管如此，这并未阻止美里的汗水从额头滴落，因为她正在入侵超级计算机。间谍活动并非她的本职工作，也不是她的专长。然而，有了加持提供给她的那个装有代码串的小闪存盘，穿越系统变得容易多了。不过，若被专家看到，她的操作仍有不少缺陷。

After what felt like hours upon hours of getting nowhere, a new page finally opened up. One that she hadn't seen before. "The recorded data of Unit 01 during the battle against the twelfth and the thirteenth?" The lavender-haired woman's eyes lit up at the sight, and she quickly scanned her eyes up and down the page. Though she could only access the information since it wasn't classified at the highest level, or the safety protocols developed by Dr. Akagi would've already reported her to the central system.  
在经历了仿佛无尽的徒劳之后，终于翻开了一页新的篇章。一页她之前未曾见过的内容。“初号机在与第十二使徒和第十三使徒战斗中的记录数据？”这位紫发女子的眼睛因这一发现而亮了起来，她迅速上下扫视着页面。虽然她只能访问这些信息，因为它们并未被归类为最高机密，否则赤木博士开发的安全协议早已将她上报给中央系统。

"How?" She frowned. No matter how hard it was for her to believe, the data was disturbingly similar to the recorded readings when the Second Impact happened, at least at parts where Unit 01 went into a near-berserk state. "Was…Unit 01 starting another impact by itself?"  
“怎么会？”她皱眉。无论多么难以置信，这些数据与第二次冲击发生时的记录读数惊人地相似，至少在初号机近乎狂暴状态的部分是如此。“难道……初号机正在自行引发另一次冲击？”

Misato shook her head. She knew the EVAs were a copy of the first Angel which initiated the Second Impact. Perhaps it was only a biological similarity; the readings didn't make sense to her, anyway. "Thank you, Kaji." Pulling out the memory card he had given her out of her pocket, she placed a kiss onto it before plugging it into her laptop and copying over all the information.  
美里摇了摇头。她知道 EVA 是复制了引发第二次冲击的首个使徒。或许这只是生物学上的相似性；无论如何，这些读数对她来说毫无意义。“谢谢你，加持。”她从口袋里掏出他给她的记忆卡，轻轻一吻后将其插入笔记本电脑，开始复制所有信息。

Misato tapped her foot impatiently as she watched the bar fill up on the screen as the information was copied over into the memory card. Though she was confident that no one would come into this long-forgotten section of Central Dogma, the fear of something happening before the download could finish resonated within her.  
美里不耐烦地用脚敲打着地面，目光紧盯着屏幕上逐渐填满的进度条，数据正被复制到记忆卡中。尽管她自信无人会闯入这早已被遗忘的中央教条区一角，但下载完成前可能发生的意外仍让她心存忧虑。

Suddenly she could hear footsteps getting closer to the room she was sitting in. "Just a little bit more…" Misato loaded her pistol and released the safety, holding it with her right hand, while her left hand was placed at the edge of her laptop's screen. This way, as soon as the download was finished, she could shut it off and assume a defensive position.  
突然，她听到脚步声越来越接近她所在的房间。“再快一点……”美里迅速装填好手枪，解除保险，右手持枪，左手则放在笔记本电脑屏幕边缘。这样一来，下载一完成，她就能立即关闭电脑并进入防御状态。

At first she had thought people outside were there to arrest her that they've found out about her espionage, however she soon realized herself wrong since the footsteps weren't in a hurry at all. If they were to take her into custody, they wouldn't come at a pacing rate.  
起初，她以为门外的人是来逮捕她的，因为他们发现了她的间谍行为，然而她很快意识到自己错了，因为那些脚步声一点也不急促。如果他们要拘留她，不会以这种悠闲的步伐前来。

Nonetheless, the footsteps were coming louder and clearer as time passed. Misato took a deep breath after the download was completed and shut off the laptop, hiding behind the door. The room was at the end of the hallway without alternate routes, so sooner or later, she would be discovered.  
然而，随着时间的推移，脚步声愈发响亮清晰。下载完成后，美里深吸一口气，关闭了笔记本电脑，躲在门后。房间位于走廊尽头，没有其他出口，因此迟早会被发现。

Just as the footstep came to a peak, another blaring sound swept across the whole building; the person outside the door ran away at a hurried pace, judging from the increased rate of the tapping sound.  
就在脚步声达到顶峰时，另一阵刺耳的声响横扫了整个建筑；门外的人似乎急匆匆地跑开了，从那越来越快的脚步声可以判断出来。

Though it didn't help Misato to relax. It was the Angel alarm.  
尽管这并未让美里放松下来。那是天使警报。
