"Asuka…what are we doing here?" Shinji's voice became increasingly nervous as he and Asuka walked along the pedestrian street of Tokyo-3 commercial district. The place could be considered a fine place for dating, but judging from her expression, it definitely wasn't on her mind today. Moreover, as they walked, a specific place that Shinji dreaded to go was getting closer and closer to them.  
“明日香…我们在这里做什么？”真嗣的声音越来越紧张，他和明日香走在第三新东京市商业区的步行街上。这个地方可以说是约会的绝佳场所，但从她的表情来看，今天她显然没有这个念头。而且，随着他们前行，真嗣最不愿去的一个地方正越来越近。

"Just wait and see," Asuka replied, looking left and right as if trying to locate the destination she was heading to. People were giving her strange looks directed at her eyepatch, though it did little to piss her off as she had already accepted her new appearance.  
“等着瞧吧，”明日香回答道，左右张望着，仿佛在寻找她要前往的目的地。人们向她投来奇怪的目光，集中在她的眼罩上，但这几乎不会惹恼她，因为她已经接受了新的外貌。

Unfortunately, Shinji's nightmare came true as Asuka stopped in front of the shop.  
不幸的是，真嗣的噩梦成真了，因为明日香在商店前停下了脚步。

_MIKIMOTO Tokyo-3 Main Store  
MIKIMOTO 东京-3 总店_

"What are you waiting for, Shinji?" Asuka gave him a puzzled expression, taking a grip on his wrist. "Let's get in."  
“你在等什么，真嗣？”明日香带着困惑的表情，抓住了他的手腕。“我们进去吧。”

"But… isn't this place for…buying jewelry?" The face he was making left no question of how he felt about this place. "Do you have something on your mind?"  
“但…这不是买珠宝的地方吗？”他脸上的表情清楚地表明了他对这个地方的感受。“你有什么心事吗？”

"Of course. We are gonna buy rings." Said Asuka nonchalantly, seemed to be completely ignoring the heavy implications of her statement. "I mean, what else could I buy in a jewelry store?"  
“当然。我们要去买戒指。”明日香漫不经心地说道，似乎完全忽略了这句话的沉重含义。“我是说，在珠宝店里还能买什么别的呢？”

"Rings? What rings?" Shinji tried to maintain a steady voice, offering only mild resistance as Asuka dragged him into the store.  
"戒指？什么戒指？" 真嗣试图保持平稳的语调，在被明日香拽进店里时只表现出轻微的抗拒。

"Promise rings, of course." Even though she tried to hide it, sadness still slipped out of her voice. "To signify our commitment to each other."  
“当然是承诺戒指。”尽管她试图掩饰，但悲伤还是从她的声音中流露出来。“象征我们对彼此的承诺。”

Shinji let out a silent sigh of relief. The last time he came to this place Asuka proposed to him with the wedding ring she bought – well, not exactly a proper proposal, but it was the end result. The reason why he was against the idea was simple – there was no future for them, and it would only hurt her more if she committed more.  
真嗣无声地松了一口气。上次他来到这个地方时，明日香拿着她买的婚戒向他求婚——好吧，并不是正式的求婚，但结果就是那样。他反对这个想法的原因很简单——他们没有未来，如果她投入更多，只会让她更加受伤。

This time though, a promise ring was a reasonable compromise between a verbal statement and a wedding proposition. Still, he really didn't want Asuka to commit more than she already had, at least not until the whole world was saved from Angels and SEELE. In fact, under that scenario, he would be the one making the proposal instead of Asuka. "Sure, I guess we can finally put our pilot wages into good use, then."  
不过这一次，承诺戒指成了口头声明与求婚之间合理的折中。尽管如此，他真的不希望明日香承诺更多，至少在全世界从使徒和 SEELE 手中获救之前。事实上，在那种情况下，他会是提出求婚的那个人，而不是明日香。“当然，我想我们终于可以把驾驶员的薪水派上用场了。”

"Emm, you bet." Asuka chirped, walking to the closest counter. She forced a smile to her face as she made eye contact with the salesperson. It wasn't like she only wanted a promise ring. Even though she was still scared about marriage – something so distant to her – she knew Shinji would be the one in her life.  
“嗯，当然。”明日香轻快地说道，走向最近的柜台。她努力在脸上挤出微笑，与售货员对上了目光。并非她只想要一枚承诺戒指。尽管她对婚姻仍心存恐惧——那对她来说如此遥远——但她知道，真嗣将是她生命中的那个人。

However, she couldn't bring herself to propose – she was still possessed by the Angel, and the future still seemed to be dark to her. No matter how much she wanted to propose right now and there, only after she made sure that she could hold on to her own promise – that she would never leave him – then it would be a valid option. She just couldn't propose to him while wearing a bomb on her neck and having an Angel in her body.  
然而，她无法鼓起勇气求婚——她仍被天使附身，未来对她来说依旧黯淡。无论她多么想立刻求婚，只有在她确保自己能坚守承诺——永不离开他——之后，这才会是一个可行的选择。她不能在脖子上戴着炸弹、体内有天使的情况下向他求婚。

"How can I help you, young lady?" The salesperson said in a professional voice.  
“有什么能帮到您的吗，小姐？”售货员以专业的口吻说道。

"I want a pair of promise rings for me and that idiot over there." She pointed at Shinji, who was wearing a sad smile of his own.  
“我要一对情侣戒指，给我和那边那个傻瓜。”她指着真嗣，他正挂着一抹苦笑。

"What material do you want?"  
“你想要什么材料？”

"Silver rings with diamonds."  
"镶钻的银戒指。"

"Sure. Weight of the diamonds?"  
当然。钻石的重量是多少？

"One carat should be enough."  
"一克拉应该足够了。"

"Of course. Do you want your names imprinted on the rings?" The female salesperson took out a sheet of paper and a ballpen from the cabinet.  
"当然可以。您希望戒指上刻上名字吗？" 女销售员从柜子里拿出一张纸和一支笔。

"Yes." Asuka took the paper and the pen from her, writing down her and Shinji's names.  
“好的。” 明日香从她手中接过纸和笔，写下了她和真嗣的名字。

"Here, let me measure your finger sizes." After taking care of it, the salesperson handed Asuka a piece of paper. "Alright. Here's your voucher." The salesperson smiled a professional smile. "Come and pick up your rings in three days."  
“来，让我量一下你们的指围。” 处理完之后，销售员递给明日香一张纸。“好了。这是您的凭证。” 销售员露出职业性的微笑。“三天后来取你们的戒指。”

"Thank you." Asuka smiled back, turning to look at Shinji with a smirk, who smiled a warm smile in response. "Now let's get something to eat. I'm starv-"  
“谢谢。” 明日香回以微笑，转头看向真嗣，带着一丝戏谑，真嗣则回以温暖的笑容。“现在我们去吃点东西吧。我快饿——”

Her speech was interrupted by the simultaneous vibration of her and Shinji's phones. Both pilots took out their devices and looked at each other with determined expressions before hurrying out of the store, leaving a slightly confused salesperson alone in the room.  
她的演讲被她和真嗣手机同时的震动打断了。两位驾驶员取出设备，相互交换了一个坚定的眼神，随即匆匆离开了店铺，留下一位略感困惑的店员独自在房间里。

XXXXXX 翻译文本：XXXXXX 翻译结果：XXXXXX

Misato looked up at the monitor of the Command Center, staring at the strange creature hovering over the open fields of Tokyo-3. To call it a creature felt wrong, as unlike any of the previous Angels, it showed no forms of anatomy similar to that of the creatures of Earth. It had no arms, legs, eyes, or even a face to speak of. The Angel could only be described as a glowing halo formed by a double helix.  
美里抬头看着指挥中心的监视器，盯着那只悬浮在东京-3 开阔田野上的奇怪生物。称之为生物似乎不妥，因为它与之前的使徒不同，没有显示出任何与地球生物相似的解剖结构。它没有手臂、腿、眼睛，甚至没有脸。这个使徒只能被描述为一个由双螺旋构成的发光光环。

"This Angel looks creepy. I've never seen anything even close to this ever before." Major Katsuragi remarked, staring in awe at the being.  
“这个使徒看起来真诡异。我从未见过任何与之相近的东西。”葛城美里少校惊叹道，凝视着那个存在。

"Neither have the MAGI, apparently." Ritsuko replied, looking over Maya's shoulder and glancing over the readings on her monitor. "The constant shift in its molecular structures is making MAGI confused, it keeps switching between pattern orange and blue. We don't even know if its an Angel or not."  
“显然，MAGI 系统也搞不清楚。”律子回答道，目光越过玛雅的肩膀，扫视着她显示器上的读数。“其分子结构的持续变化让 MAGI 系统混乱，不断在橙色和蓝色模式间切换。我们甚至不确定它是不是使徒。”

"It can't be anything else." Misato shrugged as she approached the microphone, letting out a sigh before speaking up. "Are the pilots of our EVAs prepped and ready?"  
"不可能有别的解释了。" 美里耸了耸肩，走向麦克风，叹了口气后开口问道，"我们的 EVA 驾驶员都准备好了吗？"

"The pilots are all inside their respective entry plugs. Preparing the EVAs onto the launch shafts." Aoba reported.  
“驾驶员们都已进入各自的插入栓内。正在将 EVA 准备到发射井中。”青叶报告道。

"Right." Misato returned her gaze at the big screen. Now they had four operational EVAs at hand – all remaining EVAs in the whole world. They could literally conquer the planet if they had enough power. Though the thought did little to soothe her nervousness as the Angel hovered stationary above Tokyo-3.  
“好的。”美里将目光转回大屏幕。现在他们手头有四台可操作的 EVA——全世界仅存的 EVA。如果拥有足够的能量，他们几乎可以征服整个星球。然而，这个想法并未能缓解她因天使静止在第三新东京市上空而产生的紧张情绪。

XXXXXX

Shinji took a deep breath of the LCL around him as he braced for the overweight sensation of EVA shooting up the surface. Armisale had always been a formidable enemy to deal with, at least in the beginning. It was until he found out that the Angel would only go after activated AT-Fields he finally found a consistent way to deal with the Angel that would always take one with it.  
真嗣深吸了一口周围的 LCL，准备迎接 EVA 冲出水面时那超重的感受。阿米萨尔一直是个难以对付的敌人，至少在最初是这样。直到他发现这只使徒只会攻击激活的 AT 力场，他才终于找到了一种始终如一的对付这只总是带走一个使徒的方法。

Putting the sense of achievement aside, Shinji opened an encrypted voice channel to EVA Unit 02. "Asuka, can you hear me?"  
暂且放下成就感，真嗣打开了一个加密的语音频道，连接到 EVA 二号机。“明日香，你能听到我吗？”

"Loud and clear. What's on your mind, Shinji? Using an encrypted channel?" Asuka replied, her voice carrying a note of curiosity.  
"“响亮又清晰。你在想什么呢，真嗣？用加密频道联系我？”明日香回答道，声音中带着一丝好奇。”

"No matter what you do… don't activate your AT-Field, alright?"  
"“无论你做什么……别激活你的 AT 力场，好吗？””

"Why? AT-Fields are our most powerful weapon." She gave a clearly confused response.  
"“为什么？AT 力场是我们最强大的武器。”她明显困惑地回应道。”

"Just do it." Shinji's voice turned stern and cold, eliciting a chill ran down Asuka's spine. She had never heard him using such a tone to her ever before.  
"就这么做。" 真嗣的声音变得严厉而冷漠，让明日香感到一阵寒意窜上脊背。她从未听他用这种语气对她说过话。

"Alright." Asuka nodded.  
"好的。" 明日香点头道。

"Keep an eye on Kaworu. Stay behind his EVA if possible." Shinji stated. "He might do something for all I know."  
“盯着一点儿渚薰。如果可能的话，跟在他的 EVA 后面。”真嗣说道，“据我所知，他可能会做出些什么。”

"Shinji, what's going on?" Asuka inquired, her voice growing increasingly nervous. "What do you know?"  
“真嗣，发生什么事了？”明日香问道，她的声音越来越紧张。“你知道些什么？”

"I'll explain…later. For now, just trust me. Do you trust me, Asuka?"  
“我稍后解释……现在，请相信我。你相信我吗，明日香？”

"Yes, I do." "是的，我相信。"

Asuka shook the thoughts out of her head. Now it's not the time to think about something like that. Her trust in Shinji was absolute; so if he had something in mind, no matter how strange it sounded to her, since he had promised to explain later, she had no problems following him. "Misato, I'm ready!"  
明日香甩开这些念头。现在不是考虑这种事的时候。她对真嗣的信任是绝对的；所以如果他有什么打算，无论听起来多么奇怪，既然他承诺稍后解释，她就没有问题跟随他。“美里，我准备好了！”

"I'm ready as well!" Finally, Shinji's voice came into the channel as well.  
“我也准备好了！”终于，真嗣的声音也在频道中响起。

"Right. EVAs launch!" Misato ordered. After Unit 00, Unit 01, Unit 02, and Unit 03 went up to the surface, she then said, "Unit 00 will use the sniper rifle, and the remaining Units will engage in close-quarters combat. Understood?"  
“好。EVA 启动！”美里命令道。在零号机、初号机、二号机和三号机升至地面后，她接着说：“零号机使用狙击步枪，其余机体进行近战。明白了吗？”

All of the pilots gave verbal confirmations. On the battlefield, Unit 00 already remained in position, totting its sniper rifle in hand. Crouching down behind a series of trees, Shinji looked on at the Angel as it spiraled around in its fixed position. He scanned up and down it for its core, but was unable to find it, just like every time.  
所有驾驶员都口头确认了。战场上，零号机已经就位，手持狙击步枪。真嗣蹲在一排树后，注视着天使在其固定位置上盘旋。他上下扫描寻找其核心，但和每次一样，未能找到。

"Shinji," Misato's voice came through, filling the cockpit. "Just hold back and let us study it for a bit. We don't have a good idea on how to approach it yet." Almost as soon as the words came through, the spiraling double helix slowly ceased its spiraling, coming to a complete stop. "No." The brown-haired pilot spoke, his cobalt eyes narrowing on the Angel. "It's coming!"  
“真嗣，”美里通过通讯器传来声音，充满了驾驶舱。“先克制一下，让我们研究一会儿。我们还不清楚该如何应对它。”话音刚落，那螺旋状的双螺旋结构缓缓停止了旋转，完全静止下来。“不。”棕发驾驶员说道，他那蔚蓝的眼睛紧盯着使徒。“它要来了！”

Shinji wasted no time and expanded his AT-Field. The Angel sensed the presence of the rather strong light of the soul, and within a matter of seconds, the double helix that made up the Angel started to morph together, bonding it into one single form. Then with a shriek, the halo split in two, morphing it into a long, thread-like shape. With blinding speed, one of its ends shot forward as its tip formed into a fine point, lunging at Unit 01 like a spear.  
真嗣毫不犹豫地展开了自己的 AT 力场。使徒感知到了那强烈的灵魂之光，几秒钟内，构成使徒的双螺旋结构开始变形融合，凝聚成单一形态。随后，伴随着一声尖啸，光环一分为二，变形为细长的线状。以惊人的速度，其一端向前猛射，尖端化作锋利的矛头，如长矛般直刺 01 号机。

Kaworu narrowed his red eyes on the Angel as he tried to reach out to the Angel of Womb. The surroundings seemed to slow down with time as he focused.  
薰的红眸紧盯着使徒，试图与子宫天使建立联系。随着他的专注，周围的一切似乎都随着时间放缓了。

_Tabris. 塔布里斯。_

Kaworu smirked. 渚薰微微一笑。

_Armisael. I see you have chosen your target.  
阿米沙尔。看来你已经选定了目标。_

_This is the only way. The light of soul leads me.  
这是唯一的路。灵魂之光指引着我。_

Kaworu shook his head. As much as was interested in the Third Child, the call from Adam was growing increasingly irresistible. The best and most efficient way was to attack with Armisael in unison, however, with three working EVAs on the field, the chance felt remote.  
渚薰摇了摇头。尽管他对第三适格者颇感兴趣，但来自亚当的召唤却愈发难以抗拒。最有效的方法是与亚尔玛赛尔协同攻击，然而，场上有三台运作中的 EVA，这种机会显得渺茫。

Not to mention the crimson EVA Unit seemed to be keeping an eye on him, which only lowered his chance. He silently cursed at SEELE's plan developed for him to follow – they thought they had the Second Child all figured out psychologically, but after yesterday's interaction, Kaworu felt it only raised more suspicion.  
更别提那台猩红的 EVA 机体似乎一直在监视他，这只会降低他的机会。他默默地咒骂 SEELE 为他制定的计划——他们自以为完全摸透了二号机驾驶员的心理，但经过昨天的互动，渚薰觉得这反而增加了更多的疑虑。

Fixing a gaze at the Angel of Womb, Kaworu knew there was only one way to make it easier for him to achieve his ultimate goal. Though he felt bad sacrificing Armisael, it was for the greater good.  
凝视着子宫天使，渚薰知道只有一种方法能让实现他的最终目标变得更容易。虽然牺牲亚米沙让他感到内疚，但这是为了更大的利益。

_I will guide your attacks. Follow my directions.  
我将引导你的攻击。请遵循我的指示。_

On the battlefield, Shinji's eyes went wide as the Angel turned 180 degrees just in front of him and stabbed toward the black Unit 03 – or more precisely, the crimson EVA Unit 02 behind it.  
战场上，真嗣的眼睛瞪得大大的，只见使徒在他面前旋转了 180 度，直刺向黑色的初号机——更确切地说，是它身后的赤红二号机。

"No!"

Asuka shrieked in surprise and tried to dodge the sudden attack, though the Angel was faster than it had been. The white strand-like substance slammed directly into the chest of Unit 02, forcing itself through the armor plating as Asuka's screams filled out the communication channel.  
明日香惊叫一声，试图躲避这突如其来的攻击，但使徒的速度比之前更快。那白色的丝状物质直接撞击在二号机的胸前，强行穿透了装甲板，明日香的尖叫声充斥着通讯频道。

On the observation deck, Gendo Ikari narrowed his eyes.  
在观测台上，碇源堂眯起了眼睛。

"Oh my God!" Ritsuko's eyes went wide as she watched the battle unfold before her. "The Angel is trying to make first-level contact with Unit 02."  
"哦，天哪！" 律子的眼睛瞪得大大的，她目睹着战斗在她眼前展开。"使徒正试图与零二号机进行一级接触。"

"All remaining EVAs!" Misato shouted into the microphone. "Assist Unit 02! Help out Asuka!"  
“所有剩余的 EVA！”美里对着麦克风大喊，“支援二号机！帮助明日香！”

She hardly needed to tell him. Shinji was already dashing on his feet, rushing toward the struggling Unit 02. He didn't have time to think about why the Angel would behave abnormally – saving Asuka was his primary concern.  
她几乎不需要告诉他。真嗣已经在奔跑，冲向挣扎中的二号机。他没有时间去思考使徒为何会表现出异常行为——救明日香是他首要的关切。

Kaworu watched the purple EVA Unit running toward him with a sad smile. He expanded Unit 03's AT-Field and combined it with the Angel's, empowering its strength by an exponent.  
渚薰看着紫色 EVA 单位朝他跑来，带着悲伤的微笑。他展开三号机的 AT 力场，并与使徒的力场结合，使其力量倍增。

"It's… It's trying to get inside of me! Ugh! So disgusting!"  
"它……它想钻进我身体里！呃！太恶心了！"

Unit 01 slammed into a powerful AT-Field just as it was about to reach Unit 02, unable to move forward by an inch.  
初号机刚要触及二号机时，猛地撞上了一道强大的 AT 力场，寸步难行。

"Damn it! Why won't you go through!" Shinji cried, unable to think clearly about why he couldn't go through the AT-Field as his mind was in a swirl produced by Asuka's pained screams. "Rei! Kaworu! Help me neutralize the AT-Field!"  
"该死！为什么穿不过去！"" 真嗣喊道，由于明日香痛苦的尖叫声让他的思绪一片混乱，无法清晰思考为何无法突破 AT 力场。""绫波！渚薰！帮我中和 AT 力场！"

"Roger." "On my way." "罗杰。" "在路上。"

From his sideways vision, Shinji could see Unit 00 soon joining him to help push through the AT-Field, while Unit 03 was trying to cut through it with a small knife. Though to no avail as they still weren't making any progress.  
从他的侧视中，真嗣可以看到零零号机很快就会加入他，帮助突破 AT 力场，而零三号机正试图用一把小刀切开它。尽管这一切都徒劳无功，他们仍然没有取得任何进展。

"Asuka! Don't do anything stupid! I promise we'll save you, just hold on for a little longer!"  
"明日香！别做傻事！我保证我们会救你的，再坚持一会儿！"

Letting out a roar, Shinji pushed forward with his EVA one more time. He had to push through this field, even if he had to call for his mother's help. No matter how much it would cost him, he had to save her, just like what he had always been doing ever before.  
发出一声怒吼，真嗣再次推动他的 EVA 前进。他必须穿越这片战场，哪怕这意味着要呼唤母亲的援助。无论代价多大，他都必须救她，就像他一直以来所做的那样。

Though to no avail as he saw the Angel suddenly grow rigid and then fully enters Unit 02 in mere seconds.  
然而无济于事，因为他看到使徒突然僵硬，然后在几秒钟内完全进入了 02 号机。

"ASUKA!" “明日香！”

"What is she doing? Oh my god she's inverting her AT-Field!" Misato's panicked voice came to him over the speakers, making Shinji's blood run cold.  
“她在做什么？天哪，她在反转 AT 力场！”美里通过扬声器传来的惊慌声音，让真嗣感到血液凝固。

"Mode D activated! Thirty seconds till self-destruct!"  
"模式 D 启动！三十秒后自毁！"

"Pilot Ikari's sync rate is rising fast! Two hundred, three hundred percent! Still hasn't stopped!"  
"碇司令的同步率正在急速上升！两百，三百百分比！还在继续！"

"So I guess this is the end huh…" Asuka's voice echoed through Shinji's cockpit as Unit 02 continued to move over to the edge of the city. "Damn…I still have a lot of things to say…"  
"看来这就是终点了啊…" 明日香的声音在真嗣的驾驶舱中回响，二号机继续向城市的边缘移动。"该死…我还有很多话想说…"

"NOOOO!" Shinji screamed a twisted scream. _MOTHER! PLEASE!_  
“不！！！” 真嗣发出一声扭曲的尖叫。“妈妈！求你了！”

_SNAP_

On the command deck, Gendo Ikari slammed his palms on the table and shot up from his seat.  
在指挥甲板上，碇源堂猛地双手拍在桌子上，从座位上站了起来。

## *Chapter 38*: Chapter 38: The Way  
*第 38 章*: 第 38 章：道路

**Chapter 38: The Way 第 38 章：道路**

At the outer perimeter of Tokyo-3, a lone figure stood beside a large crater created by a powerful explosion with her single eye filled with sadness.  
在第三东京市的外围，一个孤独的身影站在一个由强力爆炸造成的大坑旁，她的独眼中充满了悲伤。

_Gendo Ikari shot up from his seat and shouted down to the command deck, "raise the concentration of the LCL of Unit 02's entry plug to maximum! Override the systems from our side!"  
碇源堂猛地从座位上站起来，对着指挥台大喊：“将二号机插入栓内的 LCL 浓度调至最大！从我们这边强行接管系统！”_

_"But…" Maya hesitated. “但是……” 美里犹豫道。_

_"That's a damn ORDER! Do it, NOW!"  
“这是命令，给我立刻执行！”_

_"Roger!" Maya raised her eyebrows. In her impression, Gendo Ikari had always been a calm and collected man, sometimes even eerily cold. She had never seen, or rather, never expected to see him so agitated to the extent of swearing.  
“收到！” 美里挑了挑眉。在她印象中，碇源堂一直是个冷静沉着的人，有时甚至冷得让人毛骨悚然。她从未见过，或者说，从未预料到会看到他如此激动，甚至到了咒骂的地步。_

_"Unit 02 has shut down! The pilot is unconscious! Plug ejection successful!" Maya reported.

一台无人驾驶的静止 EVA 对亚尔玛赛尔而言已无价值可继续侵蚀，天使放开了受损的 02 号机，升入空中。_

_"Pilot Ikari's sync rate is spiking! It had already surpassed four hundred percent!"

_The Angel soon chose its next target as it lunged at Unit 01, though it soon found the idea deadly. Unit 01 took a firm hold of the Angel with both of its hands, preventing it from escaping. Armisael tried to contaminate the EVA, but it couldn't even get through its AT-Field.  
天使很快锁定了下一个目标，向初号机猛扑过去，却很快意识到这是个致命的错误。初号机用双手牢牢抓住天使，使其无法逃脱。阿米沙耶试图污染 EVA，但连其 AT 力场都无法突破。_

_Unit 01's jaw joint cracked open, revealing its terrifying teeth.  
初号机的下颌关节猛地裂开，露出了其骇人的利齿。_

"正在发生。" 律子听起来完全吓坏了。"它已经觉醒了。"_

一旦牢牢抓住了使徒，EVA 便将头埋进那白色丝带中，开始吞噬那怪物的内脏。_

_Misato stared at the incredulous scene with a horrified expression, unable to believe what was going on with Unit 01 and the Angel, but her eyes couldn't lie to her.  
美里目瞪口呆地盯着这难以置信的场景，脸上露出惊恐的表情，无法相信零一号机和使徒之间发生的事情，但她的眼睛无法欺骗她。_

初号机正在吞噬使徒。_

_The Evangelion viciously took another bite on the Angel's flesh, ripping off a large chunk of its white body, swallowing it whole. As Ritsuko watched on, she gasped at what it had just done.  
福音战士凶猛地又咬了一口使徒的肉体，撕下一大块白色的躯体，整个吞下。丽看着这一幕，不禁倒吸一口凉气。_

_"Wait...I think the EVA is trying to devour the S2 organ!" Her eyes went wide as the dreaded realization struck her._ _"Unit 01 has become completely self-aware and is now devouring it for its own personal gains!"_

_"The armor plates we put on them weren't only for defense, but to restrain the EVA's power." Dr. Akagi explained, her voice in a whisper. "Now that it has broke out of the restraints, it has gained its own free will. There's nothing we can do to stop it now.__"_

_"Oh God." Misato looked back at the EVA, watching it devouring the Angel chunk by chunk.

_With its restraints all but gone, the EVA returned to its meal, feasting on the flesh of its enemy. As it finished devouring its foe, Misato shook her head in complete disbelief. That would be the irony of the century - the tool they had used to fight off the Angels was now turning against them.  
束缚几乎完全解除，EVA 重新开始享用它的餐食，大口吞噬着敌人的血肉。当它终于将对手吞噬殆尽，美里难以置信地摇了摇头。她知道 EVA 的构造，但从未料想过会目睹这样的情景。难道 EVA 也在变成使徒吗？那将是本世纪最大的讽刺——他们用来对抗使徒的工具如今却转而对抗他们。_

_The group continued watching on in horror while Unit 01 rose from its feast and roared a blood-boiling roar.  
小队成员继续惊恐地注视着，零号机从盛宴中站起，发出一声令人血脉贲张的咆哮。_

_Kaworu Nagisa watched the EVA roar with a stern expression. When Unit 01's eyes made contact with him through Unit 03's monitors, he felt a bone-chilling shiver ran down his spine. Maybe his reunion with Adam could still wait.  
渚薰凝视着 EVA 的咆哮，神情严峻。当零号机 1 型的目光透过 3 号机的监视器与他交汇时，他感到一股寒意直透脊背。或许他与亚当的重逢仍可稍待片刻。_

"Stupid Shinji!" Asuka cried a final scream, then headed to the place where she had been dreading to go for days.  
“笨蛋真嗣！”明日香发出最后的尖叫，然后朝那个她多日来一直害怕去的地方走去。

"Welcome back, young lady." The salesperson kept her professional smile as Asuka walked closer to the counter. "Your rings are ready waiting for you. Your voucher, please?"  
"欢迎回来，小姑娘。" 销售员保持着职业微笑，当明日香走近柜台时。"您的戒指已经准备好了，请出示您的凭证。"

Asuka sighed and handed the ticket to the salesperson, her expression pained.  
明日香叹了口气，将票递给售票员，脸上露出痛苦的表情。

The salesperson's face dropped immediately as she felt the pain that radiated from the redhead. As a person who had met a lot of couples before, she could confidently label Asuka's expression as _extremely hurt_, and only one reason made sense to her. "Where is your boyfriend? I hope…you didn't break up?" She spoke up cautiously.  
销售员的脸色立刻沉了下来，她感受到了红发女子身上散发出的痛苦。作为一个见过许多情侣的人，她自信地判断出明日香的神情极度受伤，而唯一合理的解释浮现在她脑海。“你的男朋友呢？希望……你们没有分手吧？”她小心翼翼地问道。

"No. I wouldn't have come here if we did." Asuka forced herself to bring up a small smile to her face. "He's just…well…I don't know. He's there, I guess. But…"  
“不，如果我们真那样做了，我就不会来这儿了。”明日香努力挤出一个微笑。“他只是……嗯……我不知道。他就在那儿，我想。但是……”

"I'm…sorry to hear that," the salesperson said, although not really knowing what the redhead was talking about. Nonetheless, she knew the girl needed some kind of support right now. "I hope to see both of you again." _For the wedding rings._ The salesperson handed the promise rings to Asuka, who accepted with a smile.  
“听到这个我很难过，”销售员说道，尽管并不清楚红发女孩在说什么。然而，她知道此刻女孩需要某种支持。“希望还能再见到你们。”指的是婚礼戒指。销售员将承诺戒指递给明日香，她微笑着接过。

"Thanks." “谢谢。”

Misato shook her head, looking up staring at the dim yellow eyes of the giant humanoid that stood before her, which remained bolted down by massive restraints. "I…I don't believe it." The Major had to stifle a tear. After hours and hours of trying and failing, had finally managed to open up a video link to the inside of Unit 01's entry plug. She didn't even know what she wanted to see from it, however what she actually saw was beyond every single of her wildest expectations.  
Misato 摇了摇头，抬头凝视着眼前巨型人形生物昏黄的眼睛，它被巨大的束缚装置牢牢固定。"我……我不敢相信。"少校强忍住泪水。经过无数次尝试和失败，她终于成功打开了与零一单元驾驶舱内的视频链接。她甚至不知道自己想从里面看到什么，然而实际所见却超出了她最疯狂的想象。

What she saw was nothing.  
她所见之物，空无一物。

The only thing that remained of Shinji was his white and blue plugsuit, which steadily floated in the pool of LCL. Nothing else was visible, not even a mild increase of turbidity. The only assumption Dr. Akagi was able to bring up was that Shinji's sync rate had gone up so high that he became one with the EVA, and whether he could be recovered was still up in the air.  
唯一留下的只有真嗣的白色和蓝色插入栓服，它稳定地漂浮在 LCL 池中。其他什么也看不见，甚至连轻微的混浊都没有。赤木博士唯一能提出的假设是，真嗣的同步率已经上升到如此之高，以至于他与 EVA 合为一体，至于他是否能被救回，仍是未知数。

The above hypothesis did little to help soothe Asuka's anxiousness and agitation. Sitting on the floor next to the Major, the redhead sighed as she hugged her knees closer to her chest. She had been wondering what she would do once she was standing before Unit 01. It wasn't like Shinji was going to be there to hear what she had to say, but it was the closest she'd ever get at this point. Somehow she felt the concept of Shinji's soul being trapped in the core sounded strange to her, though she couldn't really come up with anything else.  
上述假设对缓解明日香的焦虑和烦躁几乎毫无帮助。坐在少校旁边的地板上，红发女孩叹了口气，将膝盖抱得更紧。她一直在想，一旦站在 01 号机前，她会做什么。真嗣不会在那里听她说话，但这是她目前能做的最接近的事。不知为何，她觉得真嗣的灵魂被困在核心中的概念听起来很奇怪，尽管她想不出别的解释。

The redhead exhaled through her mouth, slouching forward a bit. She found herself unable to figure out what she wanted to do. Did she want to simply stare in silence at the EVA, or did she want to talk to the boy inside of it? Did it really matter?  
红发女孩用嘴呼出一口气，稍微向前倾。她发现自己无法弄清楚自己想做什么。她只想默默地盯着 EVA，还是想和里面的男孩说话？这真的重要吗？

"Shinji…if you can hear me, I want you to know that I'm still keeping my promise." Asuka said, her volume becoming louder as she continued. "You were there for me, now it's my turn to be here for you."  
"真嗣…如果你能听到我的话，我想让你知道，我依然在坚守我的承诺。" 明日香说道，随着她继续说下去，声音变得越来越大。"你曾在我身边支持我，现在轮到我来支持你了。"

If he could pull her out of the influence by the Angel, then she was sure she could pull him out of…whatever it was as well.  
如果他能将她从使徒的影响中拉出来，那么她确信自己也能将他从…无论是什么东西中拉出来。

"Pilot Soryu, you're staying up really late." A stony, yet subtly strangely unfamiliar voice echoed from above her. Asuka quickly turned around and looked up at the observation spot overlooking the cages. She made out a broad silhouette leaning against the railing, his white gloves clasped onto the metal bar and his eyes hidden behind the shimmering of his glasses.  
"惣流飞行员，你熬夜太晚了。"一个沉稳但略显陌生的声音从上方传来。明日香迅速转身，抬头望向俯瞰笼子的观察点。她看到一个宽阔的身影倚靠在栏杆上，白色的手套紧握着金属杆，眼睛隐藏在闪烁的眼镜后面。

"Commander?" Asuka asked in surprise. "Excuse me…but what are you doing here?" In her impression, she had always found the Commander eerily collected, as if nothing happening around him could make him so much as raising an eyebrow.  
"指挥官？" 明日香惊讶地问道，"不好意思……但您在这里做什么？" 在她印象中，她总是发现指挥官异常镇定，仿佛周围发生的一切都无法让他动容。

"I am quite sure we both have the same idea." He replied in a calm voice, keeping his stare at Unit 01's dormant face. Though he couldn't help but feel warmth grow inside his chest – for all he knew, the Second Child should be a childish brat who cared about no one but herself. At first, he really had no idea of why Shinji was infatuated with her; he had thought it was only because of her face, but now he seemed to get more and more insight as he observed.  
"我确信我们有着相同的想法。" 他用平静的声音回答，目光始终停留在初号机沉睡的面容上。尽管他不禁感到胸中涌起一股暖意——据他所知，二号驾驶员本应是个只关心自己的幼稚小鬼。起初，他真的不明白为什么真嗣会迷恋她；他曾以为只是因为她的外表，但现在随着观察的深入，他似乎越来越明白了。

"Well, yeah, but…" Asuka sighed again, turning her head back at Unit 01. The same idea? Did Shinji's father love him as well or what? Shaking the thoughts off, Asuka continued. "I just don't know what to expect anymore."  
"嗯，是啊，但是……" 明日香再次叹息，回头望向初号机。相同的想法？难道真嗣的父亲也爱他吗？甩开这些念头，明日香继续说道，"我只是不知道还能期待什么了。"

"He will come back." Gendo Ikari rose his head to stare at the ceiling. "If anything, I believe that he will come back for you." With that, the Commander of NERV turned around and left Asuka's field of view.  
“他会回来的。”碇源堂抬起头，凝视着天花板。“如果有谁会回来，我相信他会为了你而回来。”说完，NERV 的指挥官转过身，离开了明日香的视线。

The redhead found herself at a loss for words. No matter how strange it felt to hear those words coming out of the person she least expected to hear from, they still told the truth. "Of course he will come back for me," Asuka muttered to herself. "He promised. If he ever dares to break that promise, I'll destroy Unit 01 myself."  
红发少女发现自己无言以对。无论从她最意想不到的人口中听到这些话有多奇怪，它们依然道出了真相。“他当然会回来找我，”明日香喃喃自语，“他承诺过。如果他胆敢违背那个承诺，我会亲自毁掉初号机。”

Sighing again as she saw no reactions whatsoever from the EVA, Asuka took out the promise ring she brought back from the store. "Shinji, here's the deal." Slowly, she raised her hand with a sad smile, the ring that had her name on it on her ring finger. "It looks beautiful, really. But I want you to see it by yourself. After all, it's you who made this meaningful."  
再次叹息，因为她没有从 EVA 那里得到任何反应，明日香拿出了从店里带回的承诺戒指。“真嗣，听好了。”她缓缓举起手，带着悲伤的微笑，那枚刻有她名字的戒指戴在她的无名指上。“它看起来很美，真的。但我想让你亲眼看到。毕竟，是你的存在赋予了它意义。”

Suddenly another idea flashed into her mind. She took out a silk string and put it through the ring that had Shinji's name on it before wrapping the string around her neck and putting the ring between her breasts. "I don't think this ring is coming out of here. The only way to take it out is by your own hands." She took a deep breath and closed her single eye. "If, I mean if, you aren't coming out ever again, I'll keep this here forever. If people ask questions about it, they'll just have to deal with it. It's not like I care about their opinions anymore."  
突然，另一个念头闪过她的脑海。她拿出一条丝线，穿过刻有真嗣名字的戒指，然后将丝线绕在脖子上，把戒指放在胸前。“我想这枚戒指是不会从这里取出来的。唯一能取下它的方式，只能是你亲手。”她深吸一口气，闭上了那只眼睛。“如果，我是说如果，你再也不出来了，我会永远把它留在这里。如果有人问起，他们只能接受。我不再在乎他们的看法了。”

"You hear that, Stupid Shinji?" Asuka had to hold back a sob. "You can't just leave me alone. I'll never forgive you."  
“你听到了吗，笨蛋真嗣？”明日香强忍着哽咽。“你不能就这样丢下我一个人。我永远不会原谅你。”

Misato watched the whole scene in silence since she wanted to give the lonely girl some space. Though it was getting real late, and apparently, Asuka hadn't slept for a long time. Letting out a sigh, she came up next to her and put a hand on her shoulder. "We're doing our best, Asuka." Her voice was tender and soothing. "I know what he means to you."  
美里默默地看着这一切，她想给这个孤独的女孩一些空间。虽然时间已经很晚了，显然，明日香已经很久没有睡觉了。她叹了口气，走到她身边，把手放在她的肩膀上。“我们正在尽全力，明日香。”她的声音温柔而抚慰。“我知道他对你意味着什么。”

"Do you, really?" Asuka spoke up with an unusual sharpness in her tone. "You don't even know one percent of how much…how much I love him."  
"你，真的吗？" 明日香语气中带着不寻常的尖锐说道，"你连我有多爱他的一百分之一都不了解。"

Misato sighed again. Perhaps Asuka was right. She wasn't really paying attention to them lately; in her eyes, Asuka and Shinji were girlfriend and boyfriends and combat partners, and that's it. Was there something deeper between the two? "I promise we're going to get him out. But it's late, and you need some rest. It's been twenty hours since your last sleep."  
美里再次叹了口气。或许明日香是对的。她最近确实没怎么关注他们；在她眼里，明日香和真嗣只是男女朋友和战斗伙伴，仅此而已。他们之间是否还有更深的情感？"我保证我们会把他救出来的。但现在已经很晚了，你需要休息。你已经二十个小时没睡觉了。"

"I…" Asuka smiled a sad smile. "Misato…maybe this sounds hilarious…but I don't think I can fall asleep without him anymore."  
"我…" 明日香苦笑了一下，"美里…这听起来可能很可笑…但我现在觉得没有他在身边，我无法入睡了。"

Misato raised her eyebrows. "Still… it's getting cold down here. You really need to go home and get some rest. I'll tell you when we are going to make another attempt, okay?"  
美里挑了挑眉。“还是……这里越来越冷了。你真的需要回家好好休息。我们什么时候再尝试，我会告诉你的，好吗？”

"But…" "但是…"

"Asuka, it's not like you can do anything here." Misato's voice gained a note of firmness. "And if Shinji could see you right now, I don't think he would be happy to see you like this."  
“明日香，你在这里也做不了什么。”美里的声音变得坚定。“如果真嗣现在能看到你，我想他不会高兴看到你这样的。”

Asuka sighed in defeat. "Fine…but you have to promise you'll tell me as soon as the time is set!"  
明日香无奈地叹了口气。“好吧……但你得答应我，一确定时间就马上告诉我！”

Misato nodded. "I promise."  
美里点头。“我保证。”

Asuka buried her face in her pillow as she continued to sulk. No progress had been made for the past few days in retrieving Shinji from the LCL in his entry plug. She wasn't aware of the technical details, but the fact that he still hadn't come back to her was ripping her heart apart.  
明日香把脸埋在枕头里，继续生闷气。过去几天里，从插入栓的 LCL 中找回真嗣的进展毫无起色。她并不了解技术细节，但真嗣仍未回到她身边这一事实，正撕裂着她的心。

Everything had been shit ever since Shinji disappeared into the LCL. No one was there to hold her during the days and the nights. Nightmares were starting to resurface, and instead of the usual mother and doll, the contents were replaced by seeing Shinji die in various ways, destroying her already fragile mind.  
自从真嗣消失在 LCL 中后，一切都变得糟糕透顶。白天和夜晚再也没有人抱着她。噩梦开始重现，不再是通常的母亲和玩偶，内容变成了目睹真嗣以各种方式死去，摧毁了她本已脆弱的心灵。

Slowly, Asuka raised her head from the pillow. Her right eye was puffy, her chin was a bit swollen, not to mention her messy hair, still somewhat holding in place only because of the eyepatch. "The bed… it's so cold…" She mumbled to herself.  
慢慢地，明日香从枕头上抬起头。她的右眼肿胀，下巴有些肿起，更不用说她那凌乱的头发，还勉强固定在原位只是因为眼罩。“床……好冷……”她喃喃自语。

Asuka got up from the bed, her attention immediately caught by the portrait Shinji drew for her. Chuckling, she picked it up with utmost care and rolled it up, putting the paint into the safest level of her wardrobe. It was the testimony of their love, the epitome of their bond.  
明日香从床上起身，立刻被真嗣为她画的肖像吸引。她轻笑一声，小心翼翼地拿起画卷，将其卷好，放入衣柜中最安全的隔层。这是他们爱情的见证，是他们情感纽带的缩影。

Misato hadn't come home yet, apparently engulfed in the sea of paper works. Asuka had to order take-outs or cook by herself. It was then she again confirmed how much she had missed Shinji's cooking.  
美里还没回家，显然是被文件的海洋吞没了。明日香不得不点外卖或自己做饭。这时她再次确认了自己有多么怀念真嗣的厨艺。

_Beep_

Hearing the notification sound, Asuka took out her phone and pulled the new message up. It was Misato telling her that NERV would try to bring Shinji out of there again today, with the scheduled time at the bottom.  
听到提示音，明日香掏出手机，打开了新消息。是美里发来的，告诉她 NERV 今天将再次尝试将真嗣带出来，预定时间附在消息底部。

Asuka let out a long sorrowful sigh as she shoved the phone in her pocket. Suddenly her face lit up a bit as she recalled the methods Shinji used to bring her back from the influence of the Angel. Maybe she could bring some stuff he was familiar with and see if they could work.  
明日香叹了口气，将手机塞回口袋。突然，她的脸上闪过一丝希望，想起了真嗣曾用过的方法，将她从使徒的影响中拉回。或许她可以带些他熟悉的东西，看看是否能奏效。

Asuka rushed into Shinji's closet and started searching around. After picking up several objects she didn't even know he possessed, her eye finally rested on the small black box placed on the table.  
明日香冲进真嗣的衣柜，开始四处翻找。在拿起几件她甚至不知道他拥有的物品后，她的目光最终落在了桌上的那个小黑盒上。

Frowning, Asuka walked closer to the table and picked up the small box. After a careful examination, she could recognize it as an SDAT player, an old version on top of all.  
皱着眉头，明日香走近桌子，拿起那个小盒子。经过仔细检查，她认出这是一个 SDAT 播放器，而且还是个旧版本。

What intrigued her was the fact that she had never seen him listening to it ever before, however, from the looks of it – cleaned and dustless – someone had used it just recently. The only possibility was Shinji since no one had even entered the small closet other than she and Shinji.  
让她感到好奇的是，她从未见过他之前听过这个，但从外观上看——干净无尘——显然最近有人使用过。唯一的可能性就是真嗣，因为除了她和真嗣，没有人进过那个小储藏室。

Curiosity suddenly crept up in her chest, temporarily flushing away some of her anxiety and loneliness. She was curious to listen to what kind of songs Shinji would listen to. Asuka picked up the earbuds and inserted them in her ears, and pressed the PLAY button.  
好奇心突然涌上心头，暂时冲淡了她的焦虑和孤独感。她很好奇真嗣会听什么样的歌曲。明日香拿起耳机，塞进耳朵，按下了播放键。

XXXXXX

The black face of Evangelion Unit 03 stared vacantly at Kaworu as he made his way across the catwalk. Each step he took echoed throughout the cages until he finally came to a stop in front of the EVA. Letting out a sigh, Kaworu knew that this had to be done. It was something he had been postponing for a long time now, and couldn't ignore for any longer. Now that Unit 01 was inoperational, this would be his best chance.  
福音战士 03 号机的黑色面孔空洞地盯着卡洛一步步穿过天桥。他的每一步都回荡在笼子里，直到他终于在 EVA 前停下。卡洛叹了口气，他知道这必须完成。这是他长期以来一直在拖延的事情，不能再忽视了。既然 01 号机无法操作，这将是他最好的机会。

"Come on, Let's go," Kaworu said, looking directly at the EVA. "Come with me, Adam's alter ego, servant of the Lil-"  
“来吧，我们走，”卡洛直视着 EVA 说道，“跟我来，亚当的化身，莉莉丝的仆从……”

"Hey! Pretty boy!" “嘿！帅哥！”

Kaworu retracted his left foot, which was already half in the air, and turned his head to the direction of the voice with a puzzled expression. Seconds later, a redhead came into his line of sight, walking toward him in delicate steps. "Yes, Pilot Soryu?"  
渚薰收回了他悬在半空的左脚，带着困惑的表情转向声音的方向。几秒钟后，一位红发少女映入他的视线，她优雅地向他走来。“是的，绫波零驾驶员？”

"I have a few things to discuss with you. This place ain't safe." Asuka said with an unreadable expression even to Kaworu. "Come with me."  
“我有几件事要和你讨论。这里不安全。”明日香带着连渚薰都无法解读的表情说道，“跟我来。”

Kaworu only hesitated for a short moment before sighing in resignation. It wasn't like a human like the Second Child could post any threat to him, and he could wait for a little longer, just to see what she had on her mind.  
渚薰只犹豫了片刻，便叹了口气表示妥协。像二号机驾驶员这样的人类对他构不成任何威胁，他可以再等一会儿，看看她到底有什么想法。

Following the Second Child into a small office, Kaworu shut the door close after they both entered the room. "Okay, we don't have bugs here." Asuka checked. "You said you can bring me to my mother if I help you, right?"  
"跟着第二适任者走进一间小办公室，渚薰在他们两人进入房间后关上了门。“好了，这里没有窃听器。”明日香检查了一番。“你说如果我帮你，就能带我去见我母亲，对吧？””

Kaworu raised an eyebrow. It was merely a lie developed to attack from the Second Child's weak point, nothing more. Though it didn't really matter at the moment. "Of course. Did you change your mind?"  
"渚薰挑了挑眉。那不过是为了从第二适任者的弱点入手而编造的谎言，仅此而已。不过眼下这并不重要。“当然。你改变主意了吗？””

"Yeah, actually…" Asuka pondered for a moment. "I need to wait until my EVA gets repaired, like in five days at most. Can you come and see my next sync test? We can discuss the details after that, alright?"  
““嗯，实际上……”明日香沉思片刻。“我需要等到我的 EVA 修好，最多五天。你能来看我下次的同步测试吗？之后我们可以讨论细节，好吗？””

Kaworu forced down a surprised expression, still maintaining his usual nonchalant smirk. Such change of plans would indeed postpone his reunion with Adam, but if he could have Unit 02 and the Second Child at his side, at least he could fight off Unit 00 easily.  
渚薰强压下惊讶的表情，依旧保持着他惯有的漫不经心的微笑。这样的计划变动确实会推迟他与亚当的会面，但如果他能拥有零二号机和第二适格者在他身边，至少他可以轻易击退零号机。

It was a worthy trade for him.  
对他来说，这是一笔值得的交易。

"Of course. Anything you like."  
“当然，你喜欢什么都行。”

"Good." Asuka brought up the sweetest smile she could at the moment. "Wait for me. We can have a lot of _fun_ after my sync test."  
"好。" 明日香尽力展露出此刻最甜美的笑容。"等我一下。同步测试后我们可以好好玩一玩。"

"I'm looking forward to it, Pilot Soryu." Kaworu's smirk grew wider.  
"我很期待，惣流·兰格雷驾驶员。" 渚薰的微笑更深了。

"Just…call me Asuka, alright?"  
"就…叫我明日香，好吗？"

"Sure, then I guess you can just call me Kaworu, then."  
“当然，那我想你可以直接叫我薰。”

Asuka nodded. "See you later…Kaworu." With that, she turned around and left the small office.  
明日香点点头。“再见……薰。”说完，她转身离开了小办公室。

Kaworu kept his gaze at her backside until she disappeared behind the closing door. He couldn't help but make his smirk into a grin.  
薰一直注视着她的背影，直到她消失在缓缓关闭的门后。他忍不住将微笑扩大成一个咧嘴笑。

After all, Lilim are easy to manipulate.  
毕竟，莉莉姆很容易操控。

XXXXXX

## *Chapter 39*: Chapter 39: What I Wanted  
*第三十九章*: 第三十九章：我所渴望的

Disclaimer: I do not own Evangelion.  
免责声明：我不拥有《新世纪福音战士》。

This chapter is going to be rated **M** as well, just so that you know.  
这一章也将被评定为 M 级，特此告知。

**Chapter 38: Interlude IV: What I Wanted  
第 38 章：间奏 IV：我所渴望的**

Slowly my eyes fluttered open, just to see strands of red hair that threatened to get into my face, tickling my nose as I breathed. How did I end up like this? I felt like I was used to waking up like this, but somehow everything felt off by a notch.  
慢慢地，我的眼睛微微睁开，只见到几缕红发似乎要侵入我的脸庞，随着呼吸轻轻挠着我的鼻子。我是怎么变成这样的？我感觉自己已经习惯了这样醒来，但不知为何，一切都感觉差了一点点。

"Rise and shine…darling." A familiar, yet unfamiliar voice came to me. The person lying beside me yawned and stretched her limbs, rubbing her eyes. "Gott, last night you were amazing."  
“起床了……亲爱的。”一个熟悉又陌生的声音传来。躺在我身旁的人打了个哈欠，伸了伸懒腰，揉着眼睛。“天啊，昨晚你真是太棒了。”

Last night? I tried to recall what had happened last night, but everything I remember was a blur. All I knew was that the possessor of the red hair was called Asuka Langley Soryu, someone I loved. "Anything for you, Asuka-dear."  
昨晚？我试图回忆昨晚发生了什么，但能记起的只是一片模糊。我只知道那个红发女孩名叫惣流·明日香·兰格雷，是我深爱的人。“为了你，明日香，我什么都愿意。”

"Now get up and make me breakfast." I heard her mumble as she rose from the bed. "Or I could eat something else, you know." A mischievous grin crossed her beautiful face.  
“现在起床给我做早餐。”我听到她嘟囔着从床上起身。“或者我可以吃点别的，你知道的。”一个调皮的笑容在她美丽的脸上绽放。

Wait. Her face didn't exactly feel right to me. Don't get me wrong, she's still divine, breathtaking as she always was. Though…she looked older? More mature?  
等等。她的脸给我的感觉不太对劲。别误会，她依然美丽动人，一如既往地令人屏息。不过……她看起来更成熟了？更有韵味了？

I didn't know how those words reached me. Shaking the thoughts off, I got up from the bed as well. "I think you really drained me last night," I said as I felt my body sore. "Now, if you excuse me… I'll go start cooking."  
我不知道那些话是如何传到我耳中的。甩开这些思绪，我也从床上起身。“我想你昨晚真的把我累坏了，”我感到身体酸痛地说道，“现在，如果你不介意的话……我要去开始做饭了。”

"Hmph, no fun," Asuka grumbled. "Stupid Shinji, stupid as always."  
“哼，真没意思，”明日香嘟囔着，“笨蛋真嗣，一如既往的笨。”

I chuckled and stood up, feeling the coldness of the floor under my feet. I left the bedroom and entered the bathroom to take a look at myself. Unsurprisingly, the words reached my head again as I took a careful examination of my appearance. Something felt off, but I couldn't put my fingers on it.  
我轻笑一声，站起身来，感受到脚下地板的冰凉。我离开卧室，走进浴室，仔细打量自己。不出所料，那些话再次在我脑海中响起。有些不对劲，但我又说不上来具体是什么。

Speaking of my fingers… there's something around my ring finger…  
说到我的手指……我的无名指上似乎有什么东西……

A wedding ring. 一枚婚戒。

My eyes went wide as the realization dawned on me. I tried to take it off and see who I was married with, but I couldn't since it stuck rather firmly on my finger. Though I let panic go soon, since I could very well guess who my wife was.  
我瞪大了眼睛，意识到这一点时心中一惊。我试图摘下戒指看看我与谁结了婚，但戒指牢牢地卡在手指上，无法取下。不过我很快平复了慌乱，因为我大致能猜到我的妻子是谁。

I shook my head and started my morning routine. This wasn't so bad. In fact, this was what I've always wanted, wasn't it? To be together with Asuka. I finally got rid of the curse, didn't I? No EVAs anymore. The world was saved, and I could spend the rest of my life with the person I loved. Even though I didn't even remember how I got here.  
我摇了摇头，开始了早晨的例行公事。这并不算糟糕。事实上，这正是我一直渴望的，不是吗？与明日香在一起。我终于摆脱了诅咒，不是吗？不再有 EVA 了。世界得救了，我可以与我爱的人共度余生。尽管我甚至不记得我是怎么来到这里的。

Was it all a dream? For some reason, the EVAs, the Angels…they all seemed somewhat distant to me, as if they'd never existed in the first place.  
这一切都是梦吗？不知为何，EVA、使徒……它们对我来说都显得有些遥远，仿佛它们从未存在过一样。

_**"…ji!" ……酱！**_

I snapped my head around, but saw nothing, save for the white patterned bathroom wall. Great. Now I am hearing things. The Angel Wars really did a number on my mind.  
我猛地转过头，却只看到那白色图案的浴室墙。太好了，现在我居然开始幻听了。天使战争真是把我的脑子搞得一团糟。

After finishing washing myself, I walked into the kitchen area and prepared to start making breakfast, just to see Asuka, who was basically wearing nothing but underwear and an apron, standing in front of the stove, her hands working on the pots and pans.  
洗漱完毕后，我走进厨房准备做早餐，却看到明日香，几乎只穿着内衣和围裙，站在炉子前，双手忙碌地摆弄着锅碗瓢盆。

Her body was different from what I remembered as well, though in a good way. I couldn't take off my eyes on her well-sculptured body.  
她的身材也与我记忆中的不同，不过是以一种好的方式。我无法将目光从她那雕塑般完美的身体上移开。

She must've noticed my presence as she turned around with a smile. "Shinji, what do you want for breakfast?" She chuckled as she received no response from me after a few seconds. "Idiot, you're staring again. I know I'm attractive, but after so many times we've had sex, you still couldn't resist me."  
她一定察觉到了我的存在，转过身来微笑着问：“真嗣，早餐想吃什么？”她轻笑一声，几秒钟后我仍未回应，她便打趣道：“傻瓜，又在发呆了。我知道我很迷人，但我们都那么多次了，你还抵挡不住我吗？”

"I just like to behold perfection." I blinked, quickly picking up a line suitable to say under such a situation and feeling my cheeks start to heat up.  
“我只是喜欢欣赏完美。”我眨了眨眼，迅速找到一句适合在这种场合说的话，同时感到脸颊开始发热。

"Yeah, I know." Asuka shoved her hair behind her ears. "You still haven't answered my question. What do you want for breakfast?"  
“是啊，我知道。”明日香将头发撩到耳后，“你还没回答我的问题呢。早餐想吃什么？”

"Toasts and bacon," I replied without thinking. "I thought you said I was the one making breakfast?"  
"吐司和培根，" 我不假思索地回答，"我以为你说是我来做早餐？"

"You were taking so long in the bathroom," Asuka replied. "You weren't getting off in there, were you? While having me available at your hand?" She pouted.  
"你在浴室里待那么久，" 明日香回答道，"你不会是在里面自娱自乐吧？明明我就在你手边？" 她噘起了嘴。

"No, of course not." I raised an eyebrow. From what I could remember, Asuka never _actively_ made breakfast for me. Something wasn't right. "Need a hand?"  
"当然没有。" 我挑了挑眉。就我所记得的，明日香从未主动为我做过早餐。有些不对劲。"需要帮忙吗？"

"I'll be fine. Though if you want to help, you can bring me some milk from the fridge."  
"我会没事的。不过如果你想帮忙，可以帮我从冰箱里拿些牛奶。"

"I'm on it," I said as I walked to the refrigerator, shaking my head as I tried to clear my mind. What's up with me this morning? It felt like I had a hungover last night and forgot some important stuff.  
"我这就去，" 我说着走向冰箱，摇着头试图理清思绪。今天早上我这是怎么了？感觉像是昨晚宿醉了，还忘了些重要的事情。

"We're going to Suzuhara's place today. So we may have to buy some gifts." I heard Asuka say as I walked back to the dining table.  
"我们今天要去铃原家。所以可能得买些礼物。" 我听到明日香说，同时我走回餐桌。

"Suzuhara? Toji?" I inquired. "What for?"  
"铃原？冬二？" 我问道，"为什么？"

I saw Asuka's palm mt her face. "Stupid Shinji. You couldn't seriously forget about Miya's first birthday, can you?"  
我看到明日香用手掌拍了拍额头。"笨蛋真嗣。你不会真的忘了美也的第一个生日吧？"

Miya…Suzuhara, I blinked as the name registered in my mind out of nowhere. "Oh, right. Hikari and Toji's daughter."  
美也……铃原，我眨了眨眼，这个名字突然在脑海中浮现。"哦，对了。光和冬二的女儿。"

"Damn right." Asuka huffed. "Say, when do you want a kid, Shinji? Should we plan it? I mean…I never thought about it when I was young, but now we're in our twenties, maybe we should…"  
“当然没错。”明日香哼了一声，“话说回来，真嗣，你什么时候想要孩子？我们要不要计划一下？我是说……年轻时我从没想过这些，但现在我们都二十多岁了，或许应该……”

My eyes went wide. It didn't feel like something Asuka would bring up herself. And…twenties? "I'm still thinking about it." Giving a non-committal answer, I rushed to look at the calendar.  
我瞪大了眼睛。这不像明日香会自己提出来的话题。而且……二十多岁？“我还在考虑。”我含糊其辞地回答，急忙看向日历。

_2024. 12. 20_

Alright, something was definitely wrong. How come 9 years of memory just gone I had no idea. But I didn't want to find out, did I? I'm living the life I wanted with the person I loved, and I intend to live this life as long as possible.  
好吧，肯定有什么地方不对劲。九年的记忆怎么就消失了，我毫无头绪。但我不想去探究，不是吗？我和我爱的人过着想要的生活，我打算尽可能长久地过这样的生活。

It's not like I'm leaving anyone behind, right?  
我又不是要抛下谁，对吧？

After finishing having breakfast, Asuka and I left the apartment. I took a look at the city with my eyes gleamed in surprise. The apartment complex we were residing in was 20-floor high, surrounded by several other buildings about the same height as well as hordes of villas. In the distance, I could see a crowd of skyscrapers standing out from the ground, the glass walls glowed under the blazing sunshine.  
吃完早餐后，我和明日香离开了公寓。我惊讶地睁大了眼睛，环顾这座城市。我们居住的公寓楼有 20 层高，周围环绕着几座同样高度的建筑以及成群的别墅。远处，一排排摩天大楼拔地而起，在炽热的阳光下，玻璃幕墙闪闪发光。

Everything was lively and energetic without a slight trace of disaster.  
一切都是那么生机勃勃，没有丝毫灾难的痕迹。

We walked to the train station just near our home hand in hand. A glance at the timetable told me we were living in Hakone, a name I've heard of numerous times before but couldn't really remember the significance of it.  
我们手牵手走到离家不远的火车站。看了一眼时刻表，我意识到我们住在箱根，这个名字我之前听过无数次，但具体意义却记不清了。

"What's gotten into you today?" Asuka's quizzical voice snapped me back to reality. "You're spacing out a lot. Is there something wrong?"  
"你今天怎么了？" 明日香疑惑的声音将我拉回现实。"你一直在走神。是不是有什么事？"

"No, nothing is wrong." I lied, still trying to figure out things by myself. "Maybe the hungover is just bad, that's all."  
"没有，没什么事。" 我撒了个谎，仍在试图自己理清思绪。"可能只是宿醉太严重了，仅此而已。"

"Right. You did drink a lot last night." Asuka chuckled. "You fell asleep when I asked you to do a second round. Hmph."  
“对。你昨晚确实喝了不少。” 明日香轻笑道，“我让你再来一轮时，你就睡着了。哼。”

"Well, I'm surely gonna make it up to you tonight," I replied with a smile, eliciting a smirk from her. Though it was like I knew what I was going to say, almost like on autopilot. My brain was still adjusting…as if trying to make me forget about some things.  
“好吧，今晚我一定会补偿你的，”我笑着回答，引得她嘴角上扬。虽然这话说得像是条件反射，我的大脑仍在适应……仿佛试图让我忘记某些事情。

What did I forget about?  
我忘了什么？

For some unspoken reason, I felt everything around me was getting increasingly more normal to me, as if things were just like how they should be. It was, wasn't it? Angels, EVAs, NERV, SEELE…they all seemed distant, surreal to me. Perhaps I just had a horrible dream?  
出于某种未言明的原因，我感到周围的一切对我来说变得越来越正常，仿佛事情本该如此。难道不是吗？天使、EVA、NERV、SEELE……它们对我来说都显得遥远而不真实。或许我只是做了一个可怕的梦？

Looking at the smiling redhead sitting beside me, I smiled back and leaned in for a kiss.  
看着坐在我身边微笑的红发女孩，我也回以微笑，并倾身过去亲吻她。

_**"…promised!" “……承诺了！”**_

I instinctively drew back before our lips even made contact, eliciting a confused look from Asuka. What was that voice? It sounded concerningly familiar…  
我本能地退缩，甚至在我们的嘴唇接触之前，这让明日香露出了困惑的表情。那个声音是什么？听起来令人不安地熟悉……

"What's wrong Shinji?" Asuka inquired, her voice hurt. "You…you are very different today." She pulled away from me. "Is…is there someone else? Please tell me, Shinji!"  
“怎么了，真嗣？”明日香问道，她的声音带着受伤。“你……你今天很不一样。”她从我身边拉开距离。“是……是不是有别人了？请告诉我，真嗣！”

Someone else? Of course not. People say your heart grows more distant when you stay with one person for too long, but it's not the case for me at all. After everything I've been through…after everything _we've_ been through, I don't think I can even _imagine_ being anyone else now. "No Asuka, there's no other person. Remember, I'm always yours."  
别人？当然没有。人们说当你和一个人在一起太久，心会变得疏远，但这对我来说完全不是这样。经历了这么多……经历了我们共同经历的一切，我想我现在甚至无法想象成为别人。“不，明日香，没有其他人。记住，我永远属于你。”

"…Alright. Stay together with me, Shinji." I heard her let out a small sigh of relief and leaned her head on my shoulder as I relished in her mesmerizing body scent and intoxicating warmth. I wanted to stay there forever and forget about everything-  
“……好吧。和我待在一起，真嗣。” 我听到她松了一口气，轻轻叹息，然后将头靠在我的肩上。我沉醉在她迷人的体香和令人陶醉的温暖中，希望能永远留在那里，忘却一切——

I violently shook my head. The last line of thought didn't come from myself. "Are you okay Shinji?" Asuka asked again, her voice concerned.  
我猛烈地摇了摇头。最后的念头并非出自我自己。“你还好吗，真嗣？” 明日香再次问道，声音中带着关切。

"Just a mild headache," I replied. It was technically the truth – ever since I woke up today, my mind was struggling with something. Like it was trying to inject a lot of things, while at the same time taking away more.  
“只是有点轻微的头痛，”我回答道。这确实是事实——自从今天醒来后，我的头脑一直在努力应对某些事情。就像是在试图注入许多东西，同时又夺走更多。

"Dear passengers, we're approaching station…"  
“亲爱的乘客们，我们即将到达……”

"We're here. Let's go." Asuka stood up from her seat and dragged me along. Well, at least some things never change…  
“我们到了。走吧。”明日香从座位上站起来，拉着我一起走。好吧，至少有些事情永远不会改变……

The outside was sunny but cold, just a typical day in winter Japan. Both of our wedding rings shined as we walked together holding hands. Somehow the sight of leafless trees and people wearing thick coats looked odd to me as if I'd never seen it before, but the logical part of my brain was telling me nothing wrong. The sense of conflict was driving me nuts.  
外面阳光明媚却寒冷，正是日本冬日的典型天气。我们手牵手一起走，两人的结婚戒指闪闪发光。不知为何，光秃秃的树木和穿着厚外套的人们在我看来显得很奇怪，仿佛我从未见过这样的景象，但理智告诉我一切正常。这种矛盾的感觉让我快要疯了。

We came to a stop in front of a gift shop for newborns. The various infant products dazzled me. Come to think of it, I wasn't really prepared for having kids, but if Asuka wanted it, I would definitely do my best.  
我们在一家新生儿礼品店前停下。各式各样的婴儿用品让我眼花缭乱。仔细想想，我其实并没有为育儿做好准备，但如果明日香想要，我一定会尽全力。

Not long after Asuka finished choosing the presents. She bought a pair of golden locks, though I doubt they were solid. Where did we get so much money from, anyway? If we had never been EVA pilots, we shouldn't have so much money. Though it wasn't my place to question it, was it? Everything around me was perfect.  
明日香不久就选好了礼物。她买了一对金锁，虽然我怀疑它们是否纯金。我们哪来这么多钱呢？如果不是因为曾是 EVA 驾驶员，我们不应该有这么多钱。虽然这不是我该质疑的，对吧？我周围的一切都完美无缺。

"Hello, Shinji, Asuka! Welcome!" Hikari appeared from behind the electronic door after three times of bell ringing. After exchanging greetings, we entered the Suzuhara residence. A peek inside the bedroom nearly brought a wave of uncontrollable laughter from me. Toji was clearly struggling to handle his kid as the baby thrashed and turned in his arms, while he was trying his best to make the baby stop crying.  
“你好，真嗣，明日香！欢迎！”电子门铃响了三次后，光从门后出现。互相问候后，我们进入了铃原家。瞥了一眼卧室，差点让我忍不住大笑。铃原显然在努力应对他的孩子，婴儿在他怀里扭动翻腾，而他正尽力让婴儿停止哭泣。

A smile crossed my face. Even my friends were having their lives. This was what I've always wanted, aside from making Asuka happy. I could stay here forever-  
一丝微笑掠过我的脸庞。即使我的朋友们也在过着自己的生活。这正是我一直想要的，除了让明日香开心之外。我可以永远留在这里——

_**"…back!" “……回来！”**_

I blinked. The world seemed to distort for a short moment. Damn, what's wrong with me today? I started worrying about myself. I'm hearing things and having horrible hallucinations. I watched Asuka and Hikari laughing together as they talked about how to raise a child properly. Though their conversation became blurred as time seemed to speed up.  
我眨了眨眼。世界似乎在那一刻扭曲了一瞬。该死，今天我到底怎么了？我开始担心起自己来。我听到声音，还出现了可怕的幻觉。我看着明日香和光一起笑着讨论如何正确抚养孩子。尽管她们的对话随着时间似乎加速而变得模糊。

I closed my eyes and shook my head violently again.  
我闭上眼睛，再次猛烈地摇了摇头。

Suddenly Asuka's voice reached me. "Hey Shinji, do you want kids? I don't know about this either... it's confusing at this point what we want to do. But I'm happy when I'm with you. We've always been happy together. So...if having a kid would make us even happier, I think we should."  
突然，明日香的声音传入我耳中。“嘿，真嗣，你想要孩子吗？我也不太清楚……现在我们想要做什么都变得很混乱。但和你在一起时我很快乐。我们一直都很快乐。所以……如果有个孩子能让我们更幸福，我想我们应该要。”

Asuka smiled slightly at that, while I grinned back, holding her close to me.  
明日香听到这话微微一笑，而我则咧嘴笑着，紧紧抱住她。

"Hey Shinji," said Asuka.  
"嘿，真嗣，" 明日香说道。

"Yes?" I looked into her eyes.  
“是吗？”我凝视着她的眼睛。

"I love you..." "我爱你..."

My reply came immediately. "Asuka...I too, I-"  
我的回答立刻脱口而出。“明日香……我也，我——”

...I what? ...我什么？

I love her, of course. But there was something off…  
我当然爱她。但总感觉有些不对劲……

"Shinji?" asked Asuka as she looked up at me.  
"真嗣？" 明日香抬头看着我问道。

I took a deep breath. "Sorry, Asuka, I-"  
我深吸了一口气。"对不起，明日香，我——"

"Jeez, you're supposed to say I love you too." Asuka pouted.  
"真是的，你应该说我也爱你。" 明日香噘嘴道。

"Sorry..." “对不起……”

"You're apologizing too much today. I've never seen you say sorry so much." Asuka giggled, putting her chin on my shoulder.  
"你今天道歉太多了。我从没见过你说对不起这么多次。" 明日香咯咯笑着，把下巴搁在我的肩膀上。

I was bewildered by her actions. The Asuka I knew would be angry to hear me apologize, but why did she just take it and act as if nothing happened?  
我对她的举动感到困惑。我认识的明日香听到我道歉会生气，但她为什么就这样接受了，好像什么都没发生过一样？

XXXXXX

We went home together after a long shopping trip, which Asuka took full advantage of and brought a lot of stuff home, including strawberry-scented condoms. She always preferred strawberry-flavored everything, such as shampoo. One thing I liked about her is the smell she carried, along with all the other amazing qualities.  
长时间的购物之旅后，我们一起回家，明日香充分利用了这次机会，带回了很多东西，包括草莓味的避孕套。她总是偏爱草莓味的一切，比如洗发水。我喜欢她的一点是她身上散发出的香味，以及其他所有令人赞叹的品质。

After both of us had taken the shower, from her behaviors I knew she was ready for more intimate things. Asuka never beat around the bush when it comes to having sex with me. After all, she knows I love her, and she loves me as well. Only in this way, she didn't need to hold back or be shy anymore. Not long after we were running our hands through each other's bodies. We looked into each other's eyes, her sapphire orbs sparkled as always.  
两人都洗完澡后，从她的举止中我知道她已准备好更亲密的事。对于和我发生关系，明日香从不拐弯抹角。毕竟，她知道我爱她，她也爱我。正因如此，她无需再克制或害羞。不久后，我们便开始在彼此的身体上游走。我们凝视着对方的眼睛，她那蓝宝石般的眼眸一如既往地闪烁着光芒。

"What are you waiting for? Kiss me," Asuka pouted.  
“你还在等什么？吻我。”明日香噘嘴道。

Why would I deny such an innocent request from her? I chuckled internally and shook the thoughts off. Smiling, I leaned closer and puckered my lips.  
我怎会拒绝她如此纯真的请求？我暗自发笑，甩开杂念。微笑着，我倾身向前，撅起了嘴唇。

**_"...love him!" "...爱他！"_**

I blinked and instantly drew back.  
我眨了眨眼，立刻退缩了。

Blinking again, I seemed to...remember something...from long ago?  
再次眨眼，我似乎...记起了什么...很久以前的事？

No, it had always been happening, repeating...it happened recently, and that's precisely why I couldn't remember it. But do I really have to remember it? After all, Asuka's here with me, living the life I've always wanted. Do I really need to think about anything else?  
不，这一切一直在发生，重复着...最近又发生了，而这正是我记不起来的原因。但我真的需要记住吗？毕竟，明日香在这里和我在一起，过着我一直向往的生活。我真的还需要考虑其他事情吗？

But is this _my_ Asuka?  
但这是我的明日香吗？

"Asuka?" I wondered out loud. "What is this?"  
“明日香？”我大声疑惑道，“这是怎么回事？”

"Shinji, what's wrong?" Asked Asuka in front of me. "Shinji? What's going on? Shinji!"  
"真嗣，怎么了？" 在我面前的明日香问道。"真嗣？发生了什么？真嗣！"

I looked down at Asuka in front of me with a strange expression, which was mirrored by her. "Who are you?"  
我带着奇怪的表情低头看着我面前的明日香，她的脸上也映出了同样的表情。"你是谁？"

"I'm Asuka!" She yelled out loud, looking at me with a pained face. "Your partner, lover, and wife! Shinji, what's going on?"  
"我是明日香！" 她大声喊道，痛苦地看着我。"你的搭档、爱人和妻子！真嗣，到底怎么了？"

Perhaps she was right... 也许她是对的……

But I need to make sure of it first.  
但我得先确认一下。

I turned around and began walking away from her.  
我转过身，开始远离她走去。

"Where are you going?" I could hear Asuka shouting behind me. "You promised to never leave me!"  
"你要去哪儿？" 我听到背后明日香在喊，"你答应过永远不会离开我的！"

I turned around and saw that she was crying.  
我转过身，看到她在哭泣。

"I'm sorry," I mumbled. "But I didn't make the promise to you. You're not my Asuka. I need to…I need to remember."  
"对不起，" 我咕哝着，"但我不是对你许下的承诺。你不是我的明日香。我需要……我需要记起来。"

But could I…I can't… 但我能...我不能...

"Don't leave me Shinji!" I saw Asuka fell down to the ground with her face covered in tears. "I love you! Don't go! Please!"  
"别离开我，真嗣！" 我看到明日香跌坐在地上，泪流满面。"我爱你！别走！求你了！"

I felt my heart being ripped apart as I saw her like this. After all, she was Asuka.  
看到她这副模样，我感到心如刀割。毕竟，她是明日香。

Or was she? 还是说她并非如此？

Though it didn't help me stop hesitating. I just couldn't see her cry. I knew she would stop crying as soon as I go back to her and hold her. I knew what to do. But was it the right thing to do?  
尽管这并未让我停止犹豫。我就是无法看到她哭泣。我知道只要我回到她身边抱住她，她就会停止哭泣。我知道该怎么做。但这真的是正确的做法吗？

Slowly I dragged my feet toward her again. I saw a smile broke out from her tears. I smiled back. As long as she would stop crying, I could still-  
我慢慢地再次拖着脚步向她走去。我看到她的泪水间绽开了笑容。我也回以微笑。只要她能停止哭泣，我还能继续——

_**"STUPID-SHINJI! DO SOMETHING! ANYTHING!"  
"笨蛋真嗣！做点什么！什么都行！"**_

## *Chapter 40*: Chapter 40: Soul and Heart  
*第四十章*：第四十章：灵魂与心灵

Disclaimer: I do not own Evangelion.  
免责声明：我不拥有《新世纪福音战士》。

**Chapter 40: Soul and Heart  
第四十章：灵魂与心灵**

The EVA testing chamber was unusually hushed, considering the significance of the sync test that was taking place that day – Unit 02 had been mostly repaired, save for parts of its frontal chest armor plates where the last Angel hit the hardest.  
EVA 测试舱内异常安静，考虑到当天进行的同步测试的重要性——02 号机大部分已修复，除了正面胸甲板的部分，那里是最后一个使徒攻击最猛烈的地方。

"Alright. Begin the test." Dr. Akagi ordered. Maya started to type the series of commands into the terminal with a steady and no hurry pace, as if the test was nothing more than a normal scheduled sync test.  
“好的，开始测试。”赤木博士命令道。真希开始稳稳地、不慌不忙地在终端上输入一系列指令，仿佛这只是一次普通的同步测试。

"…A-10 connections established," Maya reported. "Pilot Soryu's sync rate is stabilizing."  
“……A-10 连接已建立，”真希报告道，“碇唯的同步率正在稳定。”

Dr. Ritsuko Akagi walked over next to Maya and looked at the screen showing Asuka's sync rate. "Whoa. A whole twenty percent dive from the last sync test."  
赤木律子博士走到真嗣身边，看着屏幕上显示的明日香同步率。“哇，比上次同步测试整整下降了二十个百分点。”

"It's understandable." Misato, who was standing at the far corner of the observation room, spoke up. "I mean, she's been through a lot recently, not to mention that Shinji's…Damn it, we still can't get Shinji back!" Misato growled in frustration. The last few days' rescue attempts were futile while Asuka's mentality continued to deteriorate to the extent Misato was seriously considering ordering a suicide watch on her. "If he's here, he will know what to do. They are practically glued together."  
“这可以理解。”站在观察室远角的美里开口说道，“我是说，她最近经历了很多，更别提真嗣他……该死，我们还是无法找回真嗣！”美里懊恼地咆哮着。过去几天的救援尝试都徒劳无功，而明日香的心理状态持续恶化，以至于美里认真考虑要对她进行自杀监视。“如果他在这里，他会知道该怎么做。他们几乎形影不离。”

Dr. Akagi shrugged. In fact, she wasn't really trying her best to get him out, instead she put collecting data and testing theories on the top of her priority list. The smack in the face by seeing the Commander caring about Shinji still stung. "But if her sync rate keeps dropping, in two weeks she won't be able to activate her EVA."  
律子博士耸了耸肩。事实上，她并没有尽全力去救他，而是把收集数据和测试理论放在了优先级列表的首位。看到司令关心真嗣的那一巴掌，至今仍让她感到刺痛。“但如果她的同步率继续下降，两周后她将无法启动她的 EVA。”

"Just like the old times, eh?" Misato let out a short laugh, opening a comm channel to Unit 02's entry plug. "Asuka, try focus harder." However, she didn't really get a reply from her. Frowning, Misato pulled up the video feed to inside the entry plug.  
“就像往常一样，是吧？” 美里轻笑一声，打开与二号机插入栓的通讯频道。“明日香，试着更专注些。”然而，她并未得到她的回应。美里皱起眉头，调出了插入栓内的视频画面。

From the screen, she could see the Second Child glaring at something at her front left intently, her expression unreadable. Following her gaze, Misato walked to the windows and looked at the front left side of Unit 02 – on the catwalk, the silver-haired Fifth Child stood there with a smirk on his face.  
从屏幕上，她能看到二号机驾驶员正紧盯着前方左侧的某物，表情难以捉摸。顺着她的视线，美里走到窗边，望向二号机的前方左侧——在走道上，银发的五号机驾驶员正站在那里，脸上带着一丝嘲讽的笑意。

Misato shook her head, unable to make sense of his actions. "Asuka, do you think we need to stop the test for today?"  
美里摇了摇头，无法理解他的行为。“明日香，你觉得我们今天需要停止测试吗？”

"No." This time she replied instantly, though her voice was hollow enough to make Misato shiver.  
"不。" 这次她立刻回答，尽管她的声音空洞到让美里都感到一阵寒意。

Inside Unit 02's entry plug, Asuka narrowed her eyes on the Fifth Child as he kept his smile at her. It should be impossible for people outside of the EVA to see what's going on inside, however she still felt Kaworu's gaze was directed at her soul, not just the general direction.  
在二号机的插入栓内，明日香眯起眼睛盯着第五适格者，他保持着对她的微笑。按理说，外面的人不可能看到 EVA 内部的情况，但她仍然感觉渚薰的目光是直指她的灵魂，而非仅仅是方向。

Though it wouldn't matter for long.  
尽管这不会持续太久。

Asuka closed her right eye and focused.  
明日香闭上她的右眼，集中精神。

XXXXXX

"…alright, that's enough for today. End the test." Dr. Akagi put down the notepad.  
“……好了，今天到此为止。结束测试。”赤城博士放下笔记本。

"Roger," Maya replied. "Shut-" She trailed off, her eyes went wide as the readings went crazy. "Wait! Pilot Soryu's sync rate! It's spiking! Eighty, nighty, still hasn't stopped!"  
“收到，”真希波回答。“关闭——”她话音未落，眼睛瞪大，因为读数开始疯狂跳动。“等等！惣流驾驶员的同步率！它在飙升！八十，九十，还在上升！”

"What the hell is happening?!" Ritsuko rushed over to the terminal. "Send force shut down code!"  
"到底发生了什么？！" 律子冲向终端。"发送强制关闭代码！"

"I can't!" Maya shouted. "The signal won't receive!"  
"我做不到！" 真嗣喊道。"信号无法接收！"

"Is it the Angel?!" Misato asked with a dreading voice.  
"是使徒吗？！" 美里用颤抖的声音问道。

"No! There's no pattern blue! It's the pilot!"  
"不！没有蓝色模式！是驾驶员！"

"Asuka!" “明日香！”

The whole observation room shook, windows shattered as Unit 02 let out a bone-chilling roar, breaking away from the restraints without so much as struggle. With a forceful punch on the separation wall, the heavy metal armor broke apart, leaving a huge hole on the wall.  
整个观察室都在震动，窗户碎裂，02 号机发出令人毛骨悚然的咆哮，毫无挣扎地挣脱了束缚。它一拳猛击分离墙，厚重的金属装甲破裂开来，墙上留下了一个巨大的洞。

_"…Hello Asuka, this is Shinji speaking. If you're listening to this recording, it most likely means I'm gone. (Sigh) Well, perhaps not dead, but definitely not available. Well, first and foremost I'd like to say sorry. I'm sorry for bringing you so much trouble and pain…"  
"…你好，明日香，我是真嗣。如果你听到这段录音，很可能意味着我已经不在了。（叹气）嗯，也许不是死了，但肯定是不在了。首先，我想说对不起。我很抱歉给你带来了这么多麻烦和痛苦…"_

_Asuka went mouth agape as the words of her lover flowed into her ears. Trouble? Pain? What the hell was Shinji talking about? And the voice he used…so sad and lonely, she'd never heard him speaking in that tone ever before.  
明日香听到恋人的话语流入耳中，嘴巴不由自主地张开。麻烦？痛苦？真嗣到底在说什么鬼话？而且他的声音……如此悲伤和孤独，她从未听过他用这种语调说话。_

_"…And I'd like to thank you for the ray of light you brought into my life. (Chuckle) Really, I don't know how I am going to even live without you anymore…"  
“……我想感谢你为我生命带来的那一束光。（轻笑）真的，我不知道没有你我该怎么活下去……”_

_Asuka's grip on the SDAT tightened. Fighting back the tears, Asuka smiled a sad smile and listened in.  
明日香紧紧握住 SDAT，强忍泪水，苦笑着继续聆听。_

_"…Though there's something I need to tell you right now. You need to be prepared for what I'm about to say. Do you trust me, Asuka?"  
“……不过，有件事我现在必须告诉你。你得做好心理准备，听我说接下来的话。你相信我吗，明日香？”_

_"Yes, I do. Absolutely." Her reply came without the slightest amount of delay.  
“是的，我愿意。绝对愿意。”她的回答没有丝毫迟疑。_

_As if Shinji had been expecting her saying this when he did the recording, his voice continued right after Asuka's response.  
仿佛真嗣在录音时就预料到她会如此回应，他的声音紧随在明日香的话音之后继续响起。_

_"…The Fifth Child, Kaworu Nagisa, is the last Angel…"  
“……第五适格者，渚薰，是最后的使徒……”_

_Under normal circumstances, she would've jumped in exuberance that her suspicion was correct, though right now, the mood was so heavy she only took the information.  
在正常情况下，她本会因自己的猜疑得到证实而欢欣雀跃，但此刻气氛沉重，她只是默默接受了这一信息。_

_"… Don't think after the last Angel is defeated, everything will go back to normal. SEELE…well, the evil people behind NERV, are planning to end the world with their scenario. I know you must have so many questions, but just trust me right now. They will launch an invasion against NERV, so stay at HQ and maintain combat readiness…"  
"…别以为最后一个使徒被击败后，一切都会恢复正常。SEELE…嗯，NERV 背后的邪恶势力，正计划用他们的剧本终结世界。我知道你一定有很多疑问，但眼下请相信我。他们将对 NERV 发动入侵，所以留在总部并保持战斗准备…"_

_"…The capabilities of the MP EVAs…"  
"…MP EVAs 的能力…"_

_Asuka, though under shell shock, still managed to take some notes of the information.  
尽管处于震惊之中，明日香还是设法记下了一些信息。_

_"…After everything settles…if I'm still not back, open track 27. You will have all of your answers on that track. Again, I'm sorry Asuka. I love you. If we can meet again…trust me, I will explain everything…the next time I see you. Goodbye."  
“…一切尘埃落定后…如果我仍未归来，请播放第 27 轨。你会在那轨中找到所有答案。再次，对不起，明日香。我爱你。如果我们能再次相见…请相信我，我会解释一切…下次见面时。再见。”_

_Beep._

_It was only after 3 minutes of utter silence Asuka remembered that she was still gripping on the SDAT so hard that her hand started to turn purple. "Stupid Shinji…" Slowly, she rose from Shinji's futon and put the SDAT back on the table.  
整整三分钟的绝对沉默后，明日香才意识到自己还紧紧抓着 SDAT，手都开始发紫了。“笨蛋真嗣…”她缓缓从真嗣的被褥上起身，将 SDAT 放回桌上。_

_She had a lot of questions. But for now, she knew she needed to trust him.  
她有许多疑问。但此刻，她知道她需要信任他。_

On the catwalk, standing in front of the giant fist that punched toward him, Kaworu Nagisa let a sorrowful smile cross his face.  
在 T 台上，站在那只向他挥来的巨大拳头前，渚薰的脸上掠过一丝哀伤的微笑。

Asuka shrieked as Unit 02's left fist punched through the wall and reached Kaworu's position. Having a firm grip on the boy, Unit 02 brought him into the air, close to its ferocious face.  
明日香尖叫着，02 号机左拳穿透墙壁，直抵薰的位置。牢牢抓住少年后，02 号机将他举至空中，靠近那张凶猛的面孔。

"Asuka! What the heck are you doing?!" Misato shouted into the microphone, her ears still hurting from the rumbling roar. "Put him down!"  
“明日香！你到底在干什么？！”美里对着麦克风大喊，耳边仍回荡着轰鸣的巨响。“把他放下！”

"Your words aren't gonna work, Major." It was a miracle that Dr. Akagi still maintained a somewhat calm semblance of composure under the situation. "I think… she's finally lost it."  
"你的话不管用，少校。" 在这种情形下，赤木律子博士还能保持某种程度的镇定，简直是个奇迹。"我想……她终于崩溃了。"

"Got any last words, Angel boy?!" A distorted cry echoed from the testing chamber to the observation room, eliciting raised eyebrows from nearly everyone, Gendo Ikari not excluding.  
"有什么遗言吗，天使小子？！" 扭曲的喊声从测试室传到观察室，几乎让每个人都挑起了眉毛，碇源堂也不例外。

"What are you talking about, Asuka?!" Despite the sharp tone she was using, Misato didn't try to do anything to stop her. For all she knew there was undoubtedly some fishiness around the Fifth Child – though being an Angel wasn't exactly the first thing she would've guessed, it was close enough.  
"你在说什么，明日香？！" 尽管语气尖锐，美里并没有试图阻止她。她知道，第五适格者周围无疑有些可疑之处——虽然成为使徒并不是她首先会猜到的，但也差不多了。

"So I see this is the answer you've got, Asu-_Pilot Soryu,_" Kaworu shook his head slightly, keeping the smirk on his face and seemingly not perturbed by the fact he was held by a giant metallic hand that could end his life in an instant. "I'm sorry, but I don't have time for this right now."  
"看来这就是你得到的答案了，明日香·驾驶员·绫波，" 渚薰微微摇头，脸上保持着一丝戏谑的笑容，似乎并不在意自己被一只巨大的金属手掌握住，那只手随时可以结束他的生命。"抱歉，我现在没时间陪你玩。"

"Aren't you missing something here?" Asuka sneered. "Time is at my side. Not yours." With that, the cold-blooded Second Child willed her EVA to squeeze its hand.  
"你是不是忽略了什么？" 明日香冷笑道。"时间在我这边，不在你那儿。" 说完，这位冷酷的第二适格者命令她的 EVA 收紧手掌。

Though she soon found herself unable to squeeze tighter as if she was crushing a solid stone instead of a piece of flesh. "What the fuck?"  
然而她很快发现自己无法再用力，仿佛握住的是一块坚硬的石头而非血肉之躯。"搞什么鬼？"

"Pattern Blue! It's an Angel!" Makoto's sudden announcement drew everyone's attention. People in the observation room watched in horror as an orange octangular box appeared around the Fifth Child and expanded, quickly helping the boy get rid of Unit 02's grasp. The seventeenth Angel floated in the air, smirking at the camera that connected with the main screen of the observation room.  
"蓝色模式！是使徒！" 真嗣的突然宣告吸引了所有人的注意。观测室里的人们惊恐地看着一个橙色的八角形盒子出现在第五适格者周围并扩大，迅速帮助少年摆脱了 02 号机的抓握。第十七使徒悬浮在空中，对着连接观测室主屏幕的摄像头冷笑。

"Damn it… he's actually an Angel!"  
"该死……他竟然真的是使徒！"

"What? No!" “什么？不！”

With an explosive uncurl, Kaworu's AT-Field crushed and tumbled the metal wall separating Unit 02 and Unit 03 while sending a shocked Unit 02 stumble back and crashed against the wall. "Let's go, Unit 03. The alter ego of Adam, servant of the Lilim. Now it's your time to awaken!"  
随着一声爆炸般的展开，渚薰的 AT 力场粉碎并掀翻了分隔二号机与三号机的金属墙，同时令震惊的二号机踉跄后退，撞上了墙壁。“走吧，三号机。亚当的半身，莉莉姆的仆从。现在是你觉醒的时刻了！”

The black slits around Unit 03's eyes began to glow with a brilliant red light that forced people in the observation room to cover their eyes as it let out a bellowing roar that shook the entire testing chamber.  
零三号机眼周的黑色裂缝开始发出耀眼的红光，迫使观察室里的人们不得不遮住眼睛，随后它发出一声震耳欲聋的咆哮，整个测试室都为之震动。

Closing her eyes and covering her ears, Asuka tried to endure the incredible noise, but found it rumbling her entire body as if she was right next to an explosion despite the cushion provided by her EVA. The roar continued for another few seconds before beginning to fade away, allowing for the redhead was able to open her eyes and move her hands from over her ears. She quickly looked up and down the cages, but found that Kaworu and Unit 03 were gone, leaving only her with Unit 02 and the sleeping Units 01 and Unit 00.  
明日香闭上眼睛，捂住耳朵，试图忍受这惊人的噪音，却发现它如同爆炸般震撼着她的全身，尽管有 EVA 的缓冲。咆哮持续了几秒钟才开始减弱，让红发少女得以睁开眼睛，放下捂住耳朵的双手。她迅速环顾四周的笼子，却发现真嗣和零三号机已经消失，只剩下她和零二号机以及沉睡中的零一号机和零零号机。

Being the most militarily experienced person in the whole room, Major Katsuragi was the first one to recover from the ordeal. "Asuka! Go after him!" She shouted before turning to Maya. "Where is Rei? I don't want Asuka fighting him and Unit 03 alone!"  
作为整个房间里军事经验最丰富的人，葛城美里少校是第一个从这场混乱中恢复过来的人。“明日香！追上去！”她喊道，然后转向伊吹摩耶，“绫波在哪里？我不希望明日香独自对抗他和零三号机！”

"The equipment in the room is all broken! We need to go back to the command deck!" Maya reported, ignoring the cut on her hands produced by shattered glass.  
“房间里的设备全坏了！我们得回指挥舱！”真希波报告道，无视了手上因碎玻璃造成的伤口。

Asuka shook her head, trying to clear her foggy brain. "I'm on it." She said, controlling Unit 02 jump down into the hole Unit 03 had just disappeared into.  
明日香摇了摇头，试图驱散脑中的迷雾。“我来处理。”她说着，操控二号机跳进了三号机刚刚消失的洞口。

As Kaworu and the black EVA Unit 03 continued their descent toward the deepest level of Central Dogma, the boy made a smirk as he thought about what awaited him at the end of his journey.  
当渚薰和黑色 EVA 三号机继续向中央教条最深层下降时，少年微微一笑，心中想着旅程尽头等待他的会是什么。

Once he was again one with Adam, the disgusting race that was Lilim would be no more, and he was more than happy to help. He had thought that the Lilim species was redeemable after his talk with Shinji, the person who he thought could represent the whole race. Though he soon found out that he was just too naïve after the scene that the Second Child had just pulled up against him.  
一旦他再次与亚当合为一体，那令人作呕的莉莉姆种族将不复存在，而他非常乐意助一臂之力。在与他认为能代表整个种族的人——真嗣交谈后，他曾以为莉莉姆是有救赎可能的。然而，当二号机驾驶员刚刚对他施展的那一幕发生后，他很快意识到自己太过天真了。

After all, Lilim was mainly manipulative and untrustworthy.  
毕竟，莉莉姆主要以操纵和不可信赖著称。

Perhaps that was why he felt a tinge of anger in his chest when he heard the blood lusted screams of Unit 02's pilot as the crimson Evangelion shot downwards towards him and Unit 03, its progressive knife in hand.  
也许这就是为什么当他听到零二号机驾驶员充满杀意的尖叫声时，心中会涌起一丝愤怒，那台红色的福音战士手持推进刀，朝他和零三号机俯冲下来。

"Angel boy, you bastard!" Asuka screamed, lurching her EVA forward to reach out to the black EVA, holding the progressive knife at hand. The black Unit 03 quickly came in front of Kaworu in a position to defend him.  
"天使少年，你这个混蛋！" 明日香尖叫着，操控她的 EVA 向前冲去，手中紧握着高频刀。黑色 EVA-03 迅速挡在渚薰面前，摆出防御姿态。

"Pilot Soryu, this isn't going to work." The Angel spoke, hovering off to the side of the two EVAs as not to get in their way of fighting.  
"惣流驾驶员，这招行不通的。" 天使说道，悬浮在两台 EVA 旁边，以免妨碍他们的战斗。

With a roar of rage, Asuka lunged her knife forward to pierce through his small and frail body. She cursed as the tip of the blade was blocked by a semi-transparent octangular wall just before it was about to make contact. "Damn it, why is this stupid AT-Field so hard to breach!"  
伴随着一声怒吼，明日香猛地将刀刺向前，试图穿透他那瘦小的身躯。刀尖在即将接触的瞬间被一道半透明的八角形力场阻挡，她咒骂道："该死，为什么这个愚蠢的 AT 力场这么难突破！"

"Is that what you Lilim call it?" Kaworu smirked, looking up at the red EVA that towered over him. "An AT-Field...is the light of your soul. All living creatures have one, though only the Angels and Evangelions are able to generate ones so strong."  
"这就是你们莉莉姆所谓的吗？" 渚薰微微一笑，抬头望向那红色的 EVA，它在他上方巍然耸立。"AT 力场...是你们灵魂的光芒。所有生物都有，但只有使徒和 EVA 能产生如此强大的力场。"

"I don't know what you're talking about, but I know I'm gonna kill you!" Screaming, Asuka brought the prog knife down again, just to be blocked by Unit 03 again with its own knife.  
"我不知道你在说什么，但我知道我要杀了你！" 明日香尖叫着，再次挥下高频刀，却又被 03 号机用其自身的刀挡住了。"

"Why are you so persistent?" Kaworu said. "What is it that you want, Pilot Soryu? My offer should be more than enough for you."  
"你为何如此执着？" 渚薰说道。"你究竟想要什么，惣流·明日香·兰格雷？我的提议对你来说应该足够了。"

"I. Want. Shinji. BACK!" Asuka screamed as she willed Unit 02 sprang off the wall using its legs and leap towards the enemy. However, Unit 03 seemed to be calmer than Asuka who was in an agitated state. The black EVA Unit delivered a sidekick just at the right time, sending Unit 02 to the side and smacked on the wall.  
"我要. 真嗣. 回来！" 明日香尖叫着，她操控零二号机用双腿从墙上弹开，向敌人跃去。然而，零三号机似乎比处于激动状态的明日香更为冷静。黑色 EVA 单位恰到好处地侧踢一脚，将零二号机踢到一边，重重地撞在墙上。

"Is that all you want? Lilim are indeed unfathomable." He shook his head. "Such a fragile, yet strong heart…"  
"你就只想要这些吗？人类确实难以捉摸。" 他摇了摇头。"如此脆弱，却又坚强的心……"

Kaworu exhaled as he watched the fight continue. As they approached lower levels of Central Dogma, the feeling of the presence of his kin grew stronger as well.  
渚薰呼出一口气，注视着战斗的继续。随着他们接近中央教条的较低层，他感受到同类的存在感也越发强烈。

As the two EVAs reached the end of their descent, Kaworu looked around to see that the Central Dogma was covered in a strange white substance that he could very well recognize as the condensation of LCL. This likely meant that he was getting very close to his kin.  
当两台 EVA 降落至终点时，渚薰环顾四周，发现中央教条区被一种奇特的白色物质覆盖，他立刻认出这是 LCL 的凝结物。这很可能意味着他离自己的同类越来越近了。

Smashing hard into the bottom level of Central Dogma, Unit 02 and 03 forced themselves back to their feet from their imbalanced state. Through the monitors, Asuka could see that she was still hanging onto her prog knife. Unfortunately, Unit 03 still had its own knife as well. As she lifted the crimson EVA onto its feet, she could see the Angel floating away from the EVAs and making his way further into Central Dogma.  
两台 EVA——02 号和 03 号——重重地撞击在中央教条区的底层，随即从失衡状态中挣扎起身。通过监视器，明日香看到自己仍紧握着那把进度之刃。不幸的是，03 号 EVA 也还保留着它的刀。当她将红色 EVA 扶起时，可以看到使徒正从 EVA 们身边飘离，向中央教条区深处移动。

Asuka cried a battle cry and willed her EVA dash forward, just to be toppled over by the black Unit 03. Utilizing the moment of its imbalance state, Unit 03 brought both of its knives down onto the back of the crimson EVA.  
明日香发出战斗的呐喊，指挥她的 EVA 向前冲刺，却被黑色的 03 号 EVA 撞倒。利用这一失衡瞬间，03 号 EVA 将双刀猛地劈向红色 EVA 的背部。

Utilizing her moment of distraction, Unit 03 lunged at Unit 02 and tackled it down to the ground.  
利用这一瞬间的分神，三号机猛扑向二号机，将其扑倒在地。

"Ahhh!" Asuka screamed in pain, her sync rate was too high to mediate the sensations. Unit 03 wasted no time and began a series of vicious attacks. Asuka tried her best to dodge the potentially lethal attacks, though she knew she couldn't last longer – not to mention Kaworu was getting away from her as well.  
“啊！”明日香痛苦地尖叫，她的同步率过高，无法调节这些感觉。三号机毫不迟疑地展开了一系列猛烈攻击。明日香竭尽全力躲避这些可能致命的攻击，尽管她知道自己撑不了多久——更不用说，渚薰也在从她身边逃走。

Muttering all of her strength, Asuka screamed in desperation.  
明日香用尽全身力气，绝望地尖叫起来。

"STUPID-SHINJI! DO SOMETHING! ANYTHING!"  
"笨蛋真嗣！做点什么！什么都行！"

Inside the Evangelion chamber, Unit 01's eyes glowed.  
在 EVA 驾驶舱内，零一机的眼睛闪烁着光芒。
