Farther into the depths of Central Dogma, Kaworu approached the final gate separating him from Adam. "Hello, Adam." He said as he came close to the giant white, masked humanoid before him. "I have finally retur-" He stopped in his tracks as he carefully examined the giant creature. The field of presence that the creature was radiating was indeed Angelic, however, it was different from Adam - in fact, it could be said as polar opposite. "Lilith?"  
在中央教条更深处，渚薰接近了将他与亚当隔开的最后一道门。“你好，亚当。”他走近面前巨大的白色面具人形生物说道，“我终于回来了——”他突然停下脚步，仔细打量着这个巨型生物。它散发出的存在场确实是天使般的，然而，这与亚当不同——事实上，可以说是截然相反。“莉莉丝？”

Suddenly it all came together as he gazed at the giant figure mounted to the blood-red cross. He had thought that he was the one manipulating SEELE by agreeing to their plans and so on, so that ultimately he could reunite with Adam with minimum resistance. Now it seemed like he was actually the one being manipulated this entire time, and sent into a deathtrap for whatever reasons SEELE had.  
突然间，一切在他凝视着那巨大身影被钉在血红色的十字架上时汇聚起来。他原以为自己通过同意 SEELE 的计划等手段在操纵 SEELE，以便最终能以最小的阻力与亚当重聚。现在看来，他才是那个一直被操纵的人，被送入了一个死亡陷阱，无论 SEELE 出于何种原因。

He had thought the Lilim were easy to manipulate. Now it seemed like nearly everyone he had met was manipulating him.  
他曾以为莉莉姆们容易操纵。现在看来，几乎每个他遇到的人都在操纵他。

The smirk on his face faded, replaced by a distorted scowl.  
他脸上的讥笑消失了，取而代之的是扭曲的怒容。

Slowly, Kaworu floated back to the battlefield of Unit 02 and Unit 03. Looking down at the severely damaged form of Unit 02, the Angel of Free Will cracked an evil grin. "Hello, Second Child." Speaking, Kaworu made Unit 03 stopped its attacks with a snap of fingers. Seeing the odd scene, Asuka hastily stood back to her feet and entered a combat stance. "I think I've finally reached a conclusion about you Lilim."  
缓缓地，渚薰飘回了初号机和零号机的战场。俯视着严重受损的零号机，自由意志的天使露出了邪恶的笑容。“你好，第二适格者。”说着，渚薰打了个响指，让零号机停止了攻击。看到这奇怪的场景，明日香匆忙站起身来，进入战斗姿态。“我想我终于对你这人类得出了结论。”

"I want you to shut up!" Asuka cried, lurching at the floating boy again with the knife in her hand. Though to no avail as she still couldn't neutralize his AT-Field.  
“给我闭嘴！”明日香喊道，再次手持刀具冲向飘浮的少年。然而，她依旧无法突破他的 AT 力场。

"Save your breaths, Second Child. I just want you to know that…" His grin widened. "That you Lilim are irredeemable, ugly creatures. I shall purge your kind from the face of the planet."  
“省省你的力气吧，第二适格者。我只是想让你知道……”他的笑容扩大了。“你们人类是无可救药、丑陋的生物。我将把你们这一族从地球上彻底清除。”

"Over my dead body!" Asuka shrieked.  
“除非我死了！”明日香尖叫道。

"Your suggestion is accepted." Kaworu replied. Asuka raised an eyebrow in surprise – perhaps it was because of the matter-of-fact tone he was using, or maybe it was his intensely glowing red eyes.  
“你的建议被采纳了。”渚薰回答。明日香惊讶地挑了挑眉——或许是因为他用了一种公事公办的语气，又或许是因为他那双炽烈的红眸。

Scowling slightly, Kaworu mustered all of the strength to expand his AT-Field. The entire chamber shook as a brilliant white light exploded, after that, everything went dark.  
渚薰微微皱眉，竭尽全力扩展自己的 AT 力场。整个房间在一片耀眼的白光爆炸后，陷入了一片黑暗。

"Major Katsuragi!" Makoto called out in a panicked voice as his screen turned completely black. "The Angel has just generated the strongest AT-Field I've ever seen! It has blocked out everything and shut down our facilities!"  
“葛城少校！”真嗣惊慌失措地喊道，他的屏幕完全变黑了。“使徒刚刚生成了我所见过的最强的 AT 力场！它屏蔽了一切，并关闭了我们的设施！”

"Damn it!" Misato stomped her boot onto the ground, gritting her teeth. "Initiate self-destruct sequence! There's nothing we can do right now!"  
“该死！”美里用力跺了跺脚，咬紧牙关。“启动自毁程序！我们现在无计可施！”

"I can't!" The technician replied frantically. "The electricity is out as well!"  
“我做不到！”技术员慌乱地回答。“电力也中断了！”

Misato let out a gasp, feeling her heart had just skipped a beat. "Then that means it's all up to Asuka now. There's nothing we can do."  
美里倒抽一口凉气，感觉心跳仿佛漏了一拍。“那就意味着现在全靠明日香了。我们无能为力。”

Soon the redhead found herself restraint on the ground with her back downward, unable to move an inch despite the incredible power the Evangelions possessed. Looking up at the last Angel, Asuka gritted her teeth. No matter how hard it was for her to admit, she stood no chance of winning against him, not to mention the motionless Unit 03 standing beside her could reactivate at any time.  
很快，红发少女发现自己被压制在地，背部朝下，尽管拥有使徒的惊人力量，却动弹不得。抬头望着最后的使徒，明日香咬紧牙关。无论多么难以承认，她知道自己毫无胜算，更不用说一旁静止不动的零三号机随时可能重新启动。

"Now, I'll start from you…" Kaworu raised his hand and started applying more pressure. Asuka felt her whole body being crushed to a thin sheet as Unit 02 struggled against the powerful AT-Filed, its armor denting and creaking.  
“现在，从你开始……”薰抬起手，开始施加更多压力。明日香感到全身被压成薄片，零二号机在与强大的 AT 力场抗争中，装甲凹陷，发出吱嘎声。

Asuka closed her eyes. 明日香闭上了眼睛。

"Kaworu!" A voice echoed from above. Wide-eyed, the Angel rose his eyes up and watched as another Evangelion dove towards him, releasing the pressure on the AT-Field. "Shinji?"  
“薰！”一个声音从上方传来。天使睁大了眼睛，抬头望去，只见另一台 EVA 向他俯冲而来，释放了 AT 力场的压力。“真嗣？”

"Get your damned hands off her!" Shinji intervened as Unit 01 made an impactful landing on the ground. "Let her go!"  
“放开她，该死！”真嗣介入，初号机重重地落在地上。“让她走！”

Kaworu narrowed his eyes; with a wave of the hand, Unit 03 was reactivated. "I'm sorry, Shinji. But all born from Adam must return to Adam. If the only way to achieve so is to wipe out the entire humanity, I have no choice but to proceed."  
渚薰眯起了眼睛；他一挥手，初号机 03 重新启动。“对不起，真嗣。但所有源自亚当的必须回归亚当。如果唯一的办法是消灭全人类，我别无选择，只能继续前进。”

Shinji didn't even try to argue. He knew anything would be in vain at this stage. "Asuka? Asuka are you alright?!"  
真嗣甚至没有试图争辩。他知道在这个阶段任何努力都是徒劳的。“明日香？明日香你还好吗？！”

"Why does she mean so much to you? Are all Lilim so-"  
“为什么她对你如此重要？难道所有人类都是这样-”

He was cut off as Unit 02's fist sent him flying away across the Central Dogma.  
他的话音未落，就被二号机的拳头击飞，横穿中央教条区。

"Ouch." “哎哟。”

"Ha! Eat THAT!" Came the excited redheaded exclaim. "I'm fine, Shinji! Let's just get this over with!" Even though she thought she should be jumping in exuberance that Shinji somehow came back, Asuka knew the priority was to take out the Angel right now.  
“哈！吃我一拳！”红发的她兴奋地喊道，“我没事，真嗣！赶紧解决掉这家伙！”尽管她内心无比激动，因为真嗣竟然奇迹般地回来了，但明日香明白，眼下首要任务是消灭使徒。

"I'm tired of these games," Kaworu growled, expanding his AT-Field again. Unit 01 uncurled its own field as well, clashing against Kaworu's and Unit 03's.  
"我已经厌倦了这些游戏，" 渚薰咆哮着，再次展开了他的 AT 力场。初号机也展开了自己的力场，与渚薰和三号机的力场相撞。

"Asuka! Can you hold off Unit 03?" Shinji shouted into the microphone. "I'll deal with Kaworu!"  
"明日香！你能牵制住三号机吗？" 真嗣对着麦克风大喊，"我来对付渚薰！"

"I'll do my best!" "我会尽力的！"

"Stop wasting your time and accept fate." Kaworu returned floating in the air. "I'll just-Huh?" He trailed off as he felt another powerful AT-Field clashing against him. Following the direction of the source and raising his head to look at the ceiling, Kaworu's grin disappeared as he recognized the source of the invader. "First Child."  
“别再浪费时间，接受命运吧。”渚薰在空中飘浮着回来。“我只是——嗯？”他话音未落，便感受到另一股强大的 AT 力场与他相撞。顺着源头方向抬头望向天花板，渚薰的笑容消失了，因为他认出了入侵者的身份。“第一适格者。”

Though the presence of Rei Ayanami went unnoticed by the Second Child; Shinji stopped himself from calling out her name, seeing that Asuka wasn't aware of her as she focused on fighting Unit 03.  
尽管绫波零的存在未被第二适格者察觉；真嗣见状，忍住了呼唤她名字的冲动，因为明日香正专注于与 03 号机战斗，并未注意到她。

With Kaworu distracted, Unit 03's attacks went powerless and its speed slowed down. Asuka took the chance and delivered a lethal attack on its shining core, shattering it with all of her might.  
趁着渚薰分心，03 号机的攻击变得无力，速度也减缓下来。明日香抓住机会，对准其闪耀的核心发动致命一击，倾尽全力将其粉碎。

"Congratulations, Second and the Third Child." The Angel's voice muttered from the speakers, coming out in static as they started to short circuit. "You've beaten me."  
"恭喜，第二适格者和第三适格者。" 天使的声音从扬声器中低语，随着开始短路而发出静电声。"你们打败了我。"

Asuka willed her EVA rushing forward and coming up in front of the final Angel. "Now I've got you!" She exclaimed, grabbing the Angel with her hand again.  
明日香操控她的 EVA 向前冲去，来到最后的使徒面前。"现在你逃不掉了！"她大喊着，再次用手抓住使徒。

Kaworu let out a resigned sigh. He still had something to say. Maybe he could play a mind game with her, considering-  
渚薰发出一声无奈的叹息。他还有话要说。也许他可以对她玩一场心理游戏，考虑到——

_CRUSH_

"The seventeenth Angel is neutralized," Asuka watched the bloody pulp on her EVA's hand with loath, feeling the fleshy sensation through the neural connections.  
“第十七使徒已被消灭，”明日香厌恶地看着 EVA 手上血肉模糊的一团，通过神经连接感受到那肉感的触觉。

"…Asuka! Thank God! The communication system was jammed, and Unit 01 suddenly went berserk. Shinji came out of nowhere as well. we thought…" Misato's worried voice came through the speakers. "…Anyway, I'm just glad that both of you are okay. Now, can you head back to the EVA cages by yourselves?"  
“……明日香！谢天谢地！通讯系统被堵塞了，零号机突然发狂。真嗣也不知从哪儿冒出来的。我们以为……”美里焦急的声音从扬声器中传来。“……总之，我很高兴你们俩都没事。现在，你们能自己回到 EVA 格纳库吗？”

"Yeah, we'll be there in a minute," Asuka said before shutting off the comm channel to the command deck and opening an encrypted channel to Unit 01. "Shinji."  
“嗯，我们马上就到，”明日香说完便关闭了与指挥室的通讯频道，转而向零号机开启了加密频道。“真嗣。”

"Asuka…" "明日香…"

"Shinji…I'm so happy that you came back to me. I don't know what happened to you when you're inside Unit 01, but it's your presence that matters. But...I need an answer. I really do. Please be honest with me, alright?"  
"真嗣…你回来了，我真高兴。我不知道你在初号机里经历了什么，但重要的是你的存在。可是...我需要一个答案。真的需要。请诚实地告诉我，好吗？"

"Okay," Shinji replied. "Let's go home first, alright?"  
"好的，"真嗣回答。"我们先回家吧，好吗？"

…

Several hours later, a loud BANG of door slamming could be heard from hundreds of yards of distance away from the Katsuragi residence.  
几个小时后，从距离葛城家数百码远的地方传来了门被猛力关上的巨大声响。

XXXXXX

## *Chapter 41*: Chapter 41: Love is Destructive  
*第 41 章*: 第 41 章：爱是毁灭性的

Disclaimer: I do not own Evangelion.  
免责声明：我不拥有《新世纪福音战士》。

**Chapter 41: Love is Destructive  
第四十一章：爱是毁灭性的**

"Ahhh…" Lying on the floor and clutching his crotch tightly as he tried to soothe the pain, Shinji groaned in excruciating agony. It wasn't the first time that Asuka delivered a groin kicked at him, though, and every time she was angry at him enough for her to do it, he would doubt he would be having any children. That's why he had always been sympathetic to some boys in school who pushed too far in their advancements when they got kicked by her.  
“啊……” 躺在地上紧紧捂住下体试图缓解疼痛，真嗣痛苦地呻吟着。这已经不是第一次被明日香踢中下体了，每次她对他发怒到足以这么做时，他都会怀疑自己是否还能有孩子。正因如此，他总是对学校里那些因追求过度而被她踢中的男生抱有同情。

Though it wasn't his concern right now. He had tried to stop her when she cried and ran away, and he had yet to recover from the consequence of it. He also knew from his experience that his presence would only worsen the situation.  
尽管这并非他当前的关切所在。他曾试图在她哭泣跑开时阻止她，而至今仍未从那后果中恢复过来。他也从经验中知道，自己的出现只会让情况更糟。

Nonetheless, Asuka's safety, especially under her current emotional state, had to be ensured at all costs. Fortunately, this time he had a trusting person to do it for him.  
尽管如此，明日香的安全，尤其是在她当前的情绪状态下，必须不惜一切代价确保。幸运的是，这次他有一个值得信赖的人来替他完成这件事。

Shinji picked up his phone with shaking hands and tapped open the contact list.  
真嗣颤抖着手拿起手机，轻触打开了联系人列表。

"F-father…I need your help."  
“父、父亲……我需要你的帮助。”

XXXXXX

Yamada had always thought of himself as a simple man, that was until he enrolled in Section 2 of NERV. At first, he had felt protecting the pilots of EVAs would be a challenging job to do, such as constantly dealing with assassins and other foes. However, he had quickly found the work rather boring since all the agents needed to do was to establish a loose perimeter around the pilots and a tighter one around the apartments.  
山田一直认为自己是个简单的人，直到他加入了 NERV 第二分部。起初，他觉得保护 EVA 驾驶员会是一项极具挑战的工作，比如要不断应对刺客和其他敌人。然而，他很快发现这份工作相当乏味，因为特工们只需在驾驶员周围建立一个松散的警戒圈，以及在公寓周围建立一个更严密的警戒圈。

They weren't allowed to interact with the pilots actively, nor to overly interfere with their daily lives by shooing away too many people from the pilot's routes. But, of course, no call from the Children was to be ignored under any circumstance. However, after seeing how well-trained the Second and the Third Child were in terms of hand-to-hand combat, he doubted his assistance would be ever needed.  
他们不被允许与驾驶员主动互动，也不能过度干扰他们的日常生活，比如驱赶太多人离开驾驶员的路线。但当然，任何来自孩子们的召唤在任何情况下都不容忽视。然而，在目睹了二号和三号机驾驶员在近身格斗方面的出色训练后，他怀疑自己是否还会有被需要的时候。

Today though, the strange – to the level of _arousing attention_ – the behavior of the Second Child had attracted his awareness instantly after she ran out of the apartment. If he knew better, he would say she was crying – and the Third Child didn't come out with her.  
然而今天，二号机驾驶员异常——甚至到了引人注意的程度——的行为，在她跑出公寓后立刻引起了他的注意。如果他了解得更清楚，他会说她是在哭泣——而三号机驾驶员并没有和她一起出来。

Just as he was about to report the odd sight to NERV HQ, a new mission briefing message popped up on his cellphone.  
正当他准备将这奇怪的景象报告给 NERV 总部时，手机上弹出了一条新的任务简报消息。

_Agent Yamada 山田特工_

_Mission Update: 任务更新：_

_New Mission: Enact A-100 Level of Security Protocols on the Second Child  
新任务：对第二子实施 A-100 级安全协议_

_Effective Time: Immediately  
生效时间：立即_

Yamada blinked. A-100 was Suicide Watch. Now the Second Child's behavior clicked in his head. Without any more delay, he slammed his foot on the gas pedal of his SUV and drove along the way where he saw her ran down while keeping searching for the Second Child.  
山田眨了眨眼。A-100 是自杀监视级别。现在，第二适格者的行为在他脑海中清晰起来。他没有再耽搁，猛踩 SUV 的油门，沿着她逃跑的方向疾驰，同时继续搜寻第二适格者的身影。

He was sure every other agent around the area received the message as he could see another Section 2 SUV for every block he went through. No one had found her yet? Cold sweat started forming on his forehead. If NERV required them to enact suicide watch, then it must mean the Second Child would very likely to-  
他确信该区域的每个特工都收到了消息，因为他每经过一个街区都能看到另一辆第二分部的 SUV。还没人找到她吗？冷汗开始在他的额头上形成。如果 NERV 要求他们实施自杀监视，那么这意味着第二适格者极有可能——

"Thank god," Yamada let out a long sigh of relief as he spotted the unmistakable slender silhouette of the Second Child on the bridge above a small river. Acting perfectly based on the procedure, he quickly parked his SUV two hundred meters away from her and got off the car. He then hurried to the backside and opened the trunk, taking out a sniper rifle and a black ammo box from it.  
"谢天谢地，"山田长舒一口气，目光锁定在小河上方桥上那道辨识度极高的纤细身影——二号适格者。他严格按照程序行事，迅速将 SUV 停在距她两百米远的地方，下车后疾步绕到车尾，打开后备箱，从中取出一把狙击步枪和一个黑色弹药箱。

Yamada silently walked closer to her and stopped fifty meters from her, hiding on a nearby bush. It was a safe distance, considering the traveling time of the anesthetic dart was relatively slow compared to regular bullets.  
山田默默地向她靠近，停在离她五十米远的地方，藏身于附近的灌木丛中。考虑到麻醉飞镖的飞行时间相对普通子弹较慢，这个距离算是安全的。

He set up the sniper rifle and took aim. In his peripheral version, he could see several other Section 2 agents doing the same, and a few others shooing away people who for whatever reasons entered the perimeter. He shook his head and returned his eyes to the scope.  
他架好狙击步枪，瞄准目标。眼角余光中，他瞥见几名第二分部的特工也在做同样的事，还有几人则在驱赶那些不知为何闯入警戒区的人们。他摇了摇头，将视线重新移回瞄准镜。

He couldn't see the Second Child's face since she was facing away from him, but from the way her body jerked and relating to his previous observations, he could very well guess that she was crying hard. A slight frown crossed his face as the thought reached him. The Second and the Third Children were basically inseparable lately, save for the days when Shinji got trapped in Unit 01. His only logical conclusion would be a bad fight between the two of the young couple.  
他看不到二号子的脸，因为她背对着他，但从她身体的抽动以及之前的观察来看，他完全可以猜到她在痛哭。这个念头让他微微皱起了眉头。最近，二号子和三号子几乎形影不离，除了真嗣被困在初号机里的那些日子。他唯一合理的结论是这对年轻情侣之间发生了激烈的争吵。

Singing, Yamada released the safety of the rifle. Being in the military ever since he was eighteen, he was well aware of how dangerous it could be when it comes to office relationships, especially in the army.  
山田松开了步枪的保险。自从十八岁参军以来，他非常清楚办公室恋情，尤其是在军队中，可能带来的危险。

From the scope, he could see the Second Child sitting on the bridge and hugging her knees, her poor silhouette trembled in the cool breeze. Suddenly Yamada felt a wave of uncontrollable anger surge up his chest. What did the boy do to her to hurt her so much? And he didn't even bother to follow her and make sure she was alright? If anything, he was-  
通过瞄准镜，他看到二号子坐在桥上，抱着膝盖，她那可怜的身影在凉风中颤抖。突然，山田感到一股无法控制的愤怒涌上心头。那个男孩对她做了什么，让她如此伤心？他甚至没有跟上去确保她没事？如果有什么的话，他——

Yamada tensed up, putting his index finger on the trigger as he saw the Second Child stand up and walk over to the edge of the bridge. The structure wasn't high from the water surface by any means, and they've already got several medical teams on stand-by around the area.  
山田紧张起来，将食指放在扳机上，因为他看到第二适格者站起身，走向桥边。这座桥离水面并不高，而且他们已经在周围安排了多支医疗队伍待命。

The anesthetic shot they used for suicide watches would put down a healthy adult male within a matter of seconds, biologically it would harm her body for all they know. However, it was still better than being dead, right?  
他们用于自杀监视的麻醉针能在几秒钟内让一个健康的成年男性倒下，从生物学角度来看，这对她的身体可能有害。然而，这总比死亡要好，对吧？

Just as he was about to squeeze the trigger, he saw the Second Child stopped abruptly just before the railings, looking down at the water surface intently. From the high magnification scope, he could see the clear tear streaks on her pale face. "What do we do?" He whispered into the walkie-talkie.  
正当他准备扣动扳机时，他看到第二适格者在栏杆前突然停下，专注地看着水面。通过高倍率瞄准镜，他能看到她苍白脸颊上清晰的泪痕。“我们该怎么办？”他对着对讲机低声说道。

"Observe." Came a calm reply from the speakers moments later.  
"观察。" 片刻后，扬声器中传来平静的回应。

It proved to be the better choice after the Second Child walked away from the edge and began pacing back in the general direction of the apartment. "Follow the target closely. Report any anomalies as soon as possible. You have permission to fire at will."  
事实证明，这是一个更好的选择，因为第二适格者从边缘走开，开始向公寓的大致方向踱步。"紧跟目标，密切监视。一旦发现异常，立即报告。你们有权随时开火。"

"Roger," Yamada confirmed, picking up his sniper rifle and started trailing behind the Second Child.  
"收到，" 山田确认道，拿起狙击步枪，开始尾随第二适格者。

XXXXXX

Asuka stumbled forward like a lifeless zombie on the side of the street, her mind still replaying Shinji's confessions over and over again.  
明日香像一具无生命的僵尸般踉跄前行在街边，脑海中仍一遍遍回放着真嗣的告白。

_"…Would you believe me if I tell you I come from the future?"  
“……如果我说我来自未来，你会相信吗？”_

_Even though it sounded as unreal as saying the earth was flat to her, Asuka knew it was possibly the only logical explanation. Shoving her doubts aside, she decided to listen in.  
尽管这听起来如同告诉她地球是平的一样不真实，但明日香知道这可能是唯一合理的解释。她压下疑虑，决定仔细聆听。_

_"…SEELE, the people behind NERV…The third Impact happened…Human Instrumentality Project…Second Impact…Adam…Angels…"  
"…SEELE，操纵 NERV 的背后势力…第三次冲击发生了…人类补完计划…第二次冲击…亚当…使徒…"_

_As shocking as the information was, Asuka did her best not to show surprise. If anything, she only felt a deep sadness that, piloting the EVA, her life's purpose, was only to help the evil people commence their plan to end the world.  
尽管这些信息令人震惊，但明日香尽力不表现出惊讶。如果说有什么感觉的话，她只感到一种深深的悲哀，驾驶 EVA，她生命的意义，竟然只是帮助那些邪恶的人启动他们毁灭世界的计划。_

_"…I was somehow sent back in time after instrumentality…"  
"…在补完之后，我不知怎么地回到了过去…"_

_Asuka raised an eyebrow. If he had been through the Angel Wars before, then it must mean he had met other Asukas. She felt a seed of fear planted into her heart.  
明日香挑了挑眉。如果他经历过天使战争，那么他一定遇到过其他明日香。她感到心中种下了一颗恐惧的种子。_

_"Shinji…" She started, her voice dreary. "Did…did you…If you have been through all this…what happened to the other me?" She forced out as her body started to tremble slightly.  
“真嗣…”她开口，声音沉闷。“你…你…如果你经历了这一切…另一个我怎么样了？”她强忍着颤抖的身体问道。_

_She could hear Shinji let out a sigh. "Asuka…Remember the other girl I mentioned before?" Asuka nodded, before the dawning horror could strike her, though, Shinji spoke up.  
她能听到真嗣叹了口气。“明日香…记得我之前提到的那个女孩吗？”明日香点了点头，但就在惊恐袭来之前，真嗣开口了。_

_"She's you, Asuka." “她就是你，明日香。”_

_"And I failed her." "我辜负了她。"_

_As much as she had been expecting this, it didn't help her from feeling hurt. There was still another more vital question, though.  
尽管她对此早有预料，但这并未减轻她的伤痛。然而，还有一个更为关键的问题。_

_"Did...did you love her?"  
"你...你爱过她吗？"_

_Shinji fell silent. He knew what the consequences of telling her the truth would be, but he couldn't bring himself to lie to her, not after everything.  
真嗣沉默了。他知道告诉她真相的后果，但他无法在经历了这一切之后还对她撒谎。_

_"...Yes." "...是的。"_

_"That day...at the graveyard. You weren't talking about me, were you?"  
"那天...在墓地。你说的不是我，对吧？"_

_Silence. 沉默。_

_At that moment, Asuka felt something in her heart shattered.  
那一刻，明日香感到心中有什么东西破碎了。_

She had to hold back another wave of tears that suddenly threatened to spill out of her eyes. After all, Shinji, the boy she loved the most in the world, wasn't completely hers.  
她不得不强忍住又一波突然涌上眼眶的泪水。毕竟，真嗣，这个她全世界最爱的男孩，并不完全属于她。

Now that Shinji's strange behaviors made sense to her. He loved _her_ from the beginning.  
现在，真嗣那些奇怪的行为对她来说有了合理的解释。他从一开始就爱着她。

But was it acceptable? Now that Asuka knew Shinji didn't develop his love for her on _her_, but on other girls.  
但这是可以接受的吗？如今，明日香知道真嗣对她的爱并非源于她，而是源于其他女孩。

_"Whom you love is HER! Not me!"  
“你爱的那个人是她！不是我！”_

That day...when she heard him confess at the graveyard...the girl he loved more than anything else in the world...he didn't mean her, but _her._  
那天……当她在墓地听到他告白时……他深爱着这世上的一切……他指的并非是她，而是她。

A lie. 一个谎言。

One lie, the trust was broken.  
一个谎言，信任便已破碎。

Even though she knew that maybe, just maybe, Shinji didn't see her and the other Asukas differently, what she wanted was Shinji completely hers. She gave him all of her, her heart, her body, her soul.  
尽管她知道或许，仅仅是或许，真嗣并没有将她和另一个明日香区别对待，但她渴望的是真嗣完全属于她。她将她的全部，她的心，她的身体，她的灵魂，都给了他。

She chose him over her mother.  
她选择了他，而非她的母亲。

And it was a lie.  
而这，是个谎言。

That was only the best-case scenario she could come up with, though. What if he was only using her as a replacement, that he only saw her as his other chance to do everything right? What if…he only used her as a tool to achieve his own redemption?  
尽管那只是她能设想的最佳情况。如果他只是把她当作替代品，只把她视为他重新做对一切的另一次机会呢？如果……他只是利用她作为实现自我救赎的工具呢？

Even though there was a subtle part of her mind, telling her that Shinji didn't go for other girls than her, she couldn't shake off the feeling that she was betrayed.  
尽管她内心深处有个细微的声音告诉她，真嗣除了她不会对其他女孩动心，但她就是无法摆脱被背叛的感觉。

"A-Asuka…" She could hear Shinji muttering her name and see him standing in the doorway as she entered the apartment. Without acknowledging his presence whatsoever, Asuka walked straight into her room.  
“A-明日香……”她能听到真嗣喃喃念着她的名字，看见他站在门口，而她走进了公寓。明日香丝毫没有理会他的存在，径直走向自己的房间。

After entering her bedroom and shut the door close behind her, she immediately pulled the promising ring off her finger and threw it on the wall with all of her might. Screaming a distorted scream, Asuka lunched at her drawer before finding and smashing everything Shinji related.  
一进卧室并关上门后，她立刻摘下那枚象征希望的戒指，用尽全力扔向墙壁。明日香尖叫着扑向抽屉，找到所有与真嗣相关的东西，然后一一砸碎。

"I hate you! I hate you!" Asuka continued to scream as she tore the wristband apart. She felt so stupid that she even needed it to get his attention. Looking back, the idiot was no other than herself.  
"我恨你！我恨你！" 明日香继续尖叫着，撕裂了手腕带。她觉得自己太愚蠢了，竟然需要它来引起他的注意。回想起来，那个傻瓜不是别人，正是她自己。

Shinji sat on the floor just outside, his back leaning against the wall, his expression mixed with remorse and pain as he heard the smashing noises and her distorted screams. Not because that Asuka was mad at him or anything; he just couldn't stand seeing her hurt so much, and hurt by him, no less.  
真嗣坐在门外地板上，背靠墙壁，表情混合着悔恨和痛苦，听着破碎声和她扭曲的尖叫。不是因为明日香生他的气或别的什么；他只是无法忍受看到她如此受伤，而且还是被他伤害。

"I hate you! I ha-" Asuka trailed off as she settled her eyes on the roll of paper she had carefully put into the deepest part of the drawer. With trembling hands, she rolled the paper open.  
"我恨你！我恨——" 明日香的声音渐渐消失，当她的目光落在她小心翼翼放入抽屉最深处的那卷纸上。她颤抖着手，展开了那张纸。

_Asuka Langley Soryu 惣流·明日香·兰格雷_

_Ich Liebe Shinji 我爱真嗣_

Asuka felt her knees wobble as she promptly fell back onto her bed. Burying her face in the pillow, she wept.  
明日香感到膝盖发软，随即跌坐在床上。她把脸埋进枕头里，哭泣起来。

"It's unfair! It's unfair…"  
“这不公平！这不公平……”

She still loved him. 她依然爱着他。

In fact, she loved him so much…  
事实上，她爱他爱得如此深…

And it only hurt more.  
而这只会让痛苦更甚。

Slowly, Asuka rose from the bed and headed to the door. Sliding the door open, Asuka could see Shinji sitting on the floor leaning against the wall. He snapped his head in her direction as he heard the noise. "Asuka…" He started, not sure what to say.  
慢慢地，明日香从床上起身，走向门口。她拉开房门，看到真嗣正坐在地板上，背靠着墙。听到声响，他猛地转头看向她。“明日香……”他开口道，却不知该说什么。

"Shinji, listen carefully…" Asuka spoke up, taking a deep breath and closing her eyes. "I…I will help you to fight SEELE…but after the battle, assuming that we'll win, of course, we're going on our separate ways." It ripped her heart apart to say this, but, she just had to think about things by herself before making other decisions.  
“真嗣，仔细听好……”明日香提高了声音，深吸一口气，闭上了眼睛。“我……我会帮你对抗 SEELE……但战斗结束后，如果我们赢了，当然，我们会各走各的路。”说出这话让她心如刀割，但她必须先独自思考，再做其他决定。

"Asuka…" Shinji stood up. As much as Asuka leaving him hurt him, as long as she felt it necessary, he was okay with that. No, he _had to_ be okay with it. "I'm sorry. I-" He instinctively reached out his hand to her.  
“明日香……”真嗣站了起来。尽管明日香离开他让他心痛，但只要她觉得有必要，他愿意接受。不，他必须接受。“对不起。我——”他本能地向她伸出手。

Just to be slapped away. "Don't touch me!" Asuka cried. "I… I'm going to the Geofront. I don't want to see you right now." With that, the redhead turned away and headed to the front door without looking back.  
只是被一把推开。“别碰我！”明日香哭喊道，“我……我要去地底都市。现在不想见到你。”说完，红发女孩转身离开，头也不回地走向前门。

XXXXXX

Gendo Ikari stood in front of the gigantic tank in utter silence, holding a remote controller in his hand. Aside from the lights inside of the empty cylindrical tube in the center of the room, the only illumination to be found was the glowing green light from the screen of the remote control.  
碇源堂站在巨大的水槽前，一言不发，手中握着遥控器。除了房间中央空心圆柱管内的灯光外，唯一的光源便是遥控器屏幕发出的绿色光芒。

"I knew you'd come down here sooner than later." Gendo Ikari spoke as he heard faint footsteps coming close to him from behind. He knew there was something wrong when Shinji asked him to enact suicide watch on the Second Child, and when Section 2 reported that Pilot Soryu entered the Geofront alone in an agitated state only confirmed his assumptions. "What happened, Shinji? Between you and the Second Child?"  
“我知道你会比预期更早下来。”碇源堂听到身后传来轻微的脚步声，开口说道。当真嗣请求他对二号机驾驶员实施自杀监控时，他就察觉到不对劲，而第二课报告说惣流驾驶员独自情绪激动地进入地底都市，更证实了他的猜想。“发生了什么，真嗣？你和二号机驾驶员之间？”

"We had a fight." Shinji's sullen voice reached him. "Don't worry, we did this many times before." He let out a sad chuckle. In retrospect, of course, he could tell her everything right from the beginning. He did, several times, but they only turned out worse. It's just an inevitable doom for him. And even after so many times, he still found himself unable to find a perfect solution.  
“我们吵架了。” 真嗣闷闷不乐的声音传到他耳中。“别担心，我们以前也这样过很多次。”他苦笑了一下。回想起来，当然，他本可以从一开始就把一切都告诉她。他确实试过几次，但结果总是更糟。对他来说，这似乎是不可避免的命运。即便经历了这么多次，他发现自己仍然无法找到一个完美的解决办法。

"The end is near, anyway." Gendo's voice remained calm. "I can only wish you good luck with her in the future."  
“反正结局已经近在眼前了。” 碇源堂的声音依旧平静。“我只能祝愿你未来和她在一起时好运。”

Even though he didn't make it clear, Shinji could still get the meaning behind the curtain. After all, his father still wanted his own version of Instrumentality, which he implied would be 'good luck in your next cycle'.  
尽管他没有明说，真嗣还是能领会到幕后的含义。毕竟，他的父亲依然想要实现他自己版本的“人类补完计划”，这暗示着“祝你在下一个轮回中好运”。

It wasn't necessarily a bad ending, though. Dead by Instrumentality wasn't the worst way to die for Asuka – in fact, it would probably be the best way. It was quick and painless, and she could see her mother in the end.  
这并不一定是个糟糕的结局。对于明日香来说，通过人类补完计划而死并非最坏的死法——事实上，这可能是最好的方式。它迅速而无痛苦，最终她还能见到母亲。

What more could he wish for? He should be grateful that he didn't get her killed during the Angel Wars, right? And making sure she wouldn't die fighting the MP EVAs was the final thing he needed to do.  
他还能奢望什么呢？他应该庆幸在使徒战争中没有让她丧命，对吧？确保她不会在与 MP EVA 的战斗中死去，是他最后需要做的事情。

"What are you doing here, father?" Shinji started after a moment of silence between them. "It took me some time to find you."  
“你在这里做什么，父亲？”沉默片刻后，真嗣开口问道，“我花了一些时间才找到你。”

"It's about Yui," Gendo spoke, his one hand behind his rear, the other gripping the remote control tightly. "How many times have you met a new Second Child?"  
"是关于 Yui 的，" Gendo 说道，一只手背在身后，另一只手紧紧握着遥控器。"你见过几次新的二号适格者？"

Shinji's eyebrows raised. He wasn't expecting him to ask him about that. Though after seeing that his father could actually show care, nothing else was odder coming from him. "Not gonna lie, I can't remember it myself."  
Shinji 的眉毛扬了起来。他没想到父亲会问这个。尽管看到父亲竟然能表现出关心，其他任何事情从他嘴里说出来都不再奇怪了。"说实话，我自己也记不清了。"

"What do you think of her every time?"  
"每次见到她，你有什么感觉？"

"I…I don't see them differently." Shinji replied, walking up next to his father. "They are all Asuka to me. I want to be together with her, yes. But I also need her help every time. Even though I try my best to make her happy every time…it still feels like I'm using her as a tool."  
"我……我对她们没有不同的看法。" 真嗣回答道，走到父亲身边。"她们对我来说都是明日香。我想和她在一起，是的。但每次我也需要她的帮助。尽管我尽力每次都让她开心……但感觉上我还是把她当作工具在使用。"

"Hm." Gendo pondered for a moment before putting his fingers on the black remote. With the press of the button, orange lights illuminated the borders of the dark, circular room. Around the perimeter of the room was a gigantic tank that held tons of LCL. Inside it were numerous human silhouettes that floated lifelessly around the orange liquid.  
"嗯。" 碇源堂沉思片刻后，将手指放在黑色遥控器上。按下按钮，橙色的灯光照亮了黑暗圆形房间的边缘。房间的四周是一个巨大的水槽，里面装满了 LCL。在橙色的液体中，无数的人形轮廓无生气地漂浮着。

The clones of Rei Ayanami.  
绫波零的克隆体。

The only thing that differentiated the vessels from the actual Rei Ayanami was that the wide, crimson eyes remained void of any spark, any sign of a soul behind them. They just idly floated inside of the LCL, staring into the center of the room as though it was their only purpose in existence.  
这些容器与真正的绫波零唯一的区别在于，那双宽大的深红色眼睛依旧空洞无光，没有任何灵魂的迹象。它们只是懒洋洋地漂浮在 LCL 中，凝视着房间的中心，仿佛这就是它们存在的唯一目的。

"I created them in an attempt to get Yui back as you should've known." Gendo narrowed his eyes at the lifeless vessels. "Are you making all of this effort to just…get the Second Child back? Or to be with her? Even if you keep failing?"  
“我创造它们是为了试图找回唯，你应该知道这一点。”碇源堂对那些无生命的容器眯起了眼睛。“你这么努力，只是为了……找回二号机驾驶员？还是为了和她在一起？即使你一再失败？”

Shinji chuckled. "I don't exactly have a choice. All I can do is to make her happy, at least before it all ends."  
真嗣轻笑道：“我没有选择。我所能做的，就是在一切结束之前，至少让她快乐。”

"You're right. You don't have a choice, but I do." Gendo said as he pressed another button, causing the pool of LCL to bubble. Turning around to see what was going on, Shinji watched as the numerous Rei clones began to breakdown before his very eyes, dissolving into the LCL.  
"你说得对。你别无选择，但我有。" 源堂说着又按下一个按钮，让 LCL 池开始冒泡。真嗣转过身来，目睹着众多绫波零的克隆体在他眼前开始分解，溶解进 LCL 中。

"Father…why? Wouldn't this introduce risk to your scenario?" The frown on his face said louder than any words about how he felt about his father's actions.  
"父亲……为什么？这样做不会给你的计划带来风险吗？" 他脸上的皱眉比任何言语都更强烈地表达了他对父亲行为的不满。

"They are never going to be Yui."  
"她们永远不可能成为唯。"

Shinji's eyes went wide. 真嗣的眼睛瞪大了。

_I'm not her! 我不是她！_

"The Angels are all dead, anyway. Keeping the tools I made from Yui serves no purpose." Gendo began walking away from the tanks. "Come one, Shinji. Back to my office."  
“反正天使们都死了，留着我为 Yui 制作的工具也没什么意义。” 碇源堂开始从水槽旁走开。“走吧，真嗣。回我办公室。”

The said boy followed closely behind his father as the duo made their way back to the upper level of NERV HQ. Shinji deemed they still had a lot of time before the start of the invasion – SEELE would have their final meeting with his father, and then it would be the hacking attempt of the MAGI.  
那个男孩紧跟在他父亲身后，两人一起返回 NERV 总部的高层。真嗣认为他们还有足够的时间，直到入侵开始——SEELE 会与他的父亲进行最后的会议，然后就是 MAGI 系统的黑客攻击。

"I've done my best to impede the development process of the Dummy Plug System." Gendo started as they rode the elevator upward. "Now it's all up to you."  
"我已经尽力阻碍 Dummy Plug 系统的开发进程了。" 碇源堂在他们乘坐电梯上升时开口说道，"现在一切都取决于你了。"

"I know." Shinji sighed. Was he actually going to fight off SEELE as long as possible to let his father initiate the Third Impact of his own version? It might be the best, though, since if they couldn't defeat the MP EVAs, Asuka would likely suffer a more brutal death. For now, he just needed to let everything flow naturally. "I'll do my best. I have an active S2 engine in Unit 01, maybe I can pull this off."  
"我知道。" 真嗣叹了口气。他真的要尽可能长时间地抵抗 SEELE，让父亲启动他自己的第三次冲击版本吗？这可能是最好的选择，因为如果他们不能击败 MP EVA，明日香很可能会遭受更残酷的死亡。目前，他只需要让一切自然发展。"我会尽力的。初号机里有活跃的 S2 引擎，也许我能成功。"

"I'm sure you will-" Gendo trailed off as every alarm inside the Geofront started to blare all at once.  
"我相信你一定能——" 碇源堂话音未落，地底都市内的所有警报突然同时响起。

_"Every personnel report to your positions! Level one battle stations! I repeat, this is not a drill!"  
"全体人员立即就位！一级战斗准备！重复，这不是演习！"_

Both of Gendo and Shinji's eyes went wide. The elevator ride to their destination level would still take a few minutes at least. Gendo reacted first as he punched the button to a new level.  
碇源堂和真嗣的眼睛都瞪大了。到达目的地的电梯还需要几分钟。碇源堂最先反应过来，他按下了前往新楼层的按钮。

"Father?" Shinji raised his eyebrow as he saw the level to the EVA cages lit up. "Aren't you going to-"  
"父亲？" 真嗣扬起眉毛，看到前往 EVA 格纳库的楼层亮起。"你不打算去-"

Gendo cut him off. "Let's get you into Unit 01 first."  
源堂打断了他。“先让你进入初号机再说。”

## *Chapter 42*: Chapter 42: Requests  
*第 42 章*: 第 42 章：请求

**Chapter 42: Requests 第 42 章：请求**

Inside the darkened room of Chairman Keel's office, the elderly man looked up at the eleven monoliths circled out before him. They had been discussing their plans to commence the Human Instrumentality Project by overthrowing NERV HQ since the defeat of the Seventeenth Angel. While they had been planning to have a last talk with Gendo, truly hoping that he would give up the EVAs himself, the information obtained by the last Angel had reduced all of their hopes into dust.  
在基尔议长办公室的昏暗房间内，这位老人抬头看着面前环绕的十一座巨碑。自从第十七使徒战败以来，他们一直在讨论通过推翻 NERV 总部来启动人类补完计划的计划。尽管他们曾计划与碇源堂进行最后一次谈话，真心希望他能主动放弃 EVA，但最后一使徒获得的信息将他们所有的希望化为了泡影。

Even though Keel had been constantly frustrated with Commander Ikari - especially the development of the dummy plug system - he actually carried a note of respect toward him. He never thought Gendo would dare, and did pull off the stunt, deceiving the entire SEELE committee until the last moment.  
尽管基尔一直对碇司令感到沮丧——尤其是傀儡系统的开发——他实际上对他抱有一丝敬意。他从没想到碇源堂敢这么做，并且确实在最后一刻欺骗了整个 SEELE 委员会。

"Commander Ikari has left us with no choice." SEELE 01 let out, looking up at the monoliths of his fellow SEELE members. "We have failed to weaken the capabilities of NERV through the last Angel, though the intelligence he sent us is valuable."  
"司令碇源堂已迫使我們別無選擇。" SEELE 01 說道，抬頭望向其他 SEELE 成員的巨大石碑。"我們未能通過最後的使徒削弱 NERV 的能力，儘管他傳遞給我們的情報極具價值。"

"Indeed. It seems like force is the only way to achieve our goal." SEELE 03 spoke.  
"確實。看來武力是達成我們目標的唯一途徑。" SEELE 03 說道。"

"The evacuation of Tokyo-3 is already completed. Our troops will be able to travel through the area freely, and fire without restraint." SEELE 05 added. It wasn't like they cared about the lives of the civilians; they would all die in the end, anyway.  
"東京-3 的疏散已經完成。我們的部隊將能自由穿越該區域，並無所顧忌地開火。" SEELE 05 補充道。他們並不在乎平民的性命；反正他們最終都會死去。"

"The MP EVAs are still in subpar states. The S2 engines are still underdeveloped." SEELE 07 grumbled. "If Ikari would give us the sample of the S2 engine from the Fourth Angel, everything wouldn't be so bad."  
“MP 型 EVA 状态依旧不佳，S2 引擎也尚未成熟。”SEELE 07 抱怨道，“如果碇能交出第四使徒的 S2 引擎样本，一切就不会这么糟糕了。”

"That's why we built twelve of them, and we need to begin the invasion as a surprise." Keel continued. "Inform the JSSDF to begin their assault on NERV Headquarters." He took a deep breath then let out a sigh. "Kill every moving object on sight, including the pilots. Leave none alive."  
“这就是我们建造了十二台的原因，我们需要以突袭的方式开始入侵。”基尔继续说道，“通知日本自卫队，对 NERV 总部发起攻击。”他深吸一口气，然后叹息道，“见活动之物，格杀勿论，包括驾驶员，一个不留。”

Asuka looked down at the controls of Unit 02 with her single eye, taking deep breaths, trying to clear the emotional turmoil in her. Even though the briefing of the situation was rather general, she had already obtained a more detailed version through Shinji, disturbing as it was. If she didn't kill the attackers first, the world would end. Asuka tried to tell herself that she was only doing it for herself so that she could live through the end, but not for the sake of the person who dared to betray her.  
明日香单眼凝视着二号机的控制面板，深呼吸试图平复内心的波澜。尽管情况简报相当笼统，但她已从真嗣那里得知了更详细的版本，令人不安。如果不先消灭攻击者，世界将走向终结。明日香试图说服自己，她这么做只是为了自己能在这场末日中存活，而非为了那个胆敢背叛她的人。

She had to hold back another sudden urge of crying as she thought about him. Shinji hadn't come to the EVA cages yet, though she tried to not care about it. She was Asuka Langley Soryu in the first place, she can prove that she could do this all by herself. So what if Shinji wouldn't help her? She bet since she broke up with him, Shinji wanted nothing to do with her anymore as well. If anything, he would definitely want this world to end as fast as possible so he could quickly lay his evil hands on another Asuka.  
每当想起他，她都不得不强忍住再次涌上心头的哭泣冲动。真嗣还没有来到 EVA 笼前，尽管她试图不去在意。毕竟，她是惣流·明日香·兰格雷，她能证明自己完全可以独自完成这一切。就算真嗣不帮忙又怎样？她敢打赌，自从分手后，真嗣也巴不得与她撇清关系。如果有什么的话，他肯定巴不得这个世界尽快结束，好让他那双邪恶的手迅速伸向另一个明日香。

And it only infuriated her even more.  
这只会让她更加愤怒。

"I'll show you, Ikari." Asuka snarled. "I'll show you that I don't need you!"  
“我会证明给你看，碇。”明日香咆哮道，“我会证明我不需要你！”

Despite the gravity of the situation, she found herself oddly calm, save for the emotional hurricane caused by Shinji. She had been through so much up to this point that a few men in army tanks were nothing to her. She had killed extraterrestrial creatures that could endure a whole N2 blast and continued walking like it was nothing. A few tanks and LFVs were nothing compared to them.  
尽管情况严峻，她却发现自己异常平静，除了因真嗣而引发的情绪风暴。她经历了如此之多，以至于几辆坦克对她来说根本不算什么。她曾杀死过能承受整个 N2 爆炸并继续行走的外星生物。与它们相比，几辆坦克和 LFV 根本不值一提。

Taking in a deep breath before the pool of LCL started to flood her entry plug, she danced her fingers across the control panel and began the activation process.  
在 LCL 开始淹没她的插入栓之前，她深吸一口气，手指在控制面板上舞动，启动了激活程序。

"...A-10 connections established."  
“...A-10 连接已建立。”

With a loud hum, the crimson Evangelion came to life as its four green eyes lit up. Over the comm channel, she could hear Maya's voice as she checked off all of Unit 02's readings before giving the go-ahead for launch. "Asuka, please be careful out there. Okay?" The timid woman's already soft tone was even smaller and quieter than usual.  
随着一声响亮的嗡鸣，赤红的福音战士启动了，四只绿色的眼睛随之亮起。通讯频道中，她能听到玛雅的声音，她正在逐一确认 02 号机的各项读数，然后给出启动的许可。“明日香，请在外面小心点。好吗？”这位本就胆怯的女性，声音比平时更加细小和轻柔。

"I'll be fine." She deadpanned. "In fact, I think you guys should make sure to stay safe yourself." If Shinji was correct, the JSSDF troops would make sure there were no survivors.  
“我会没事的。”她面无表情地说道。“事实上，我觉得你们自己也要确保安全。”如果真嗣的判断没错，JSSDF 的部队会确保不留活口。

"No worries." This time, though, Maya's voice gained a note of determination in it. "EVA launch!"  
“不用担心。”这一次，玛雅的声音中多了一丝坚定。“EVA 启动！”

Asuka looked up at the series of tunnels as she and Unit 02 was shot up to the surface of the Geofront. "I'll show you, bastard Shinji!" She growled, waiting for the darkness to turn to light as she was quickly lifted to the surface.  
明日香抬头望着一系列隧道，她和二号机被射向地表。“我会让你见识到的，混蛋真嗣！”她咆哮着，等待黑暗转为光明，迅速被提升到地面。

The second Unit 02 emerged onto the surface, all of the JSSDF's forces quickly locked onto the crimson EVA and opened fire onto it before it could even move. Asuka flinched as the rain of shells and missiles smashed into the mech, but did little more than that. Conventional weapons were barely able to make a small scratch on the fortified armor on the Evangelions, let alone piercing its AT-Field.  
二号机一出现在地表，JSSDF 的所有部队迅速锁定这架红色 EVA 并开火，使其几乎无法移动。明日香在炮弹和导弹的暴雨中畏缩了一下，但这仅此而已。常规武器几乎无法在强化装甲的福音战士上留下划痕，更不用说穿透其 AT 力场了。

And all they did to Asuka was to piss her off even more.  
而这一切只是让明日香更加愤怒。

"What the hell was that supposed to be?! It's itchy!" She laughed maniacally as she willed for Unit 02 to begin moving. Leaping into the air, the colossal EVA Unit smashed its metal feet onto a series of tanks, howitzers, and rocket launchers, flattening them into piles of scorched metal junk.  
"这到底是什么鬼东西？！痒死了！" 她狂笑着，催动二号机开始行动。巨大的 EVA 单位一跃而起，用金属脚掌猛击一连串的坦克、榴弹炮和火箭发射器，将它们压成一堆堆烧焦的金属废料。

After regaining her balance and destroying another squadron of military vehicles, Asuka caught sight of a barrage of missiles heading her way. Grinning a twisted grin, Asuka swiped her hand with all of her might; with a loud sonic boom the EVA's hand swiped across the air, the shockwave knocking every missile off course.  
在恢复平衡并摧毁另一支军队车队后，明日香瞥见一排导弹向她袭来。她扭曲地咧嘴一笑，用尽全力挥动手臂；随着一声巨响，EVA 的手在空中划过，冲击波将所有导弹偏离了轨道。

"Don't sass me!" She cackled as she saw the missiles exploded upon contacting the gourd around her, the fireballs engulfed numerous fighter vehicles.  
"别跟我顶嘴！" 她咯咯笑着，看到导弹在接触到她周围的葫芦时爆炸，火球吞噬了众多战斗机车。

"Now you've got my attention!" Sprinting towards the rocket launchers and missile trucks that dared to open fire onto her, Asuka's blood-thirsty grin grew wider as she saw the looks of fear on the soldier's faces. It wasn't like she enjoyed killing humans, but she _did_ enjoy making her enemy fear her as they should.  
"现在你引起了我的注意！" 阿斯卡朝着那些胆敢向她开火的火箭发射器和导弹卡车疾驰而去，她嗜血的笑容在看到士兵们脸上的恐惧时愈发扩大。她并不喜欢杀戮人类，但她确实享受让敌人像他们应该的那样惧怕她。

"General!" A soldier screamed at the man beside him while they both ducked behind a tank, hoping the war machine could provide cover to the rain of flaming debris. "What are we going to do?!"  
"将军！" 一名士兵对着他身旁的人尖叫，两人都躲在一辆坦克后，希望这台战争机器能提供掩护，抵挡那如雨般燃烧的碎片。"我们该怎么办？！"

Narrowing his eyes, the General glared at the crimson death machine as it jumped down from the air, flattening another squadron of tanks and LFVs. He caught sight of a long cable-like appendage sprouting from its back, leading to the elevator from which it came. "The cable." He spoke into the walkie-talkie, looking at the thick wire protruding from its back. "Sever the cable!"  
将军眯起眼睛，瞪着那台从空中跃下、碾平另一支坦克和 LFV 中队的猩红死神。他注意到一条长长的电缆状附属物从它的背部伸出，通向它来的电梯。"电缆。" 他对着对讲机说道，目光锁定在那根从它背部突出的粗电线。"切断电缆！"

"Roger." The soldier nodded, raising the microphone up to his mouth. "All forces, target the umbilical cable!"  
“罗杰。”士兵点头，将麦克风举到嘴边。“所有单位，瞄准脐带电缆！”

As much as the JSSDF was no match against the Evangelions, their military training was still strict and professional. Without any delay between the command and the action, every single tank that was still operational turned their turrets towards the exposed cord and unanimously opened fire onto it, severing her connection to the infinite power source NERV provided her with.  
尽管日本自卫队无法与使徒抗衡，但他们的军事训练依然严格而专业。命令与行动之间毫无延迟，所有仍在运作的坦克立即将炮塔转向暴露的电缆，一致开火，切断了她与 NERV 提供的无限能源的连接。

"Tch." Asuka huffed as she saw the five-minute timer started counting down. "It doesn't matter. Five minutes is more than enough time to kill all of you!" She screamed, punting a truck across the Geofront and sending it crashing into the wall, bursting into a ball of fire.  
“啧。”明日香看到五分钟倒计时开始，不屑地哼了一声。“没关系。五分钟足够杀光你们所有人！”她尖叫着，一脚将一辆卡车踢飞，撞向地下城的墙壁，引发了一场大火球。

The General shook his head as he watched the Evangelion continue on its vicious thrashing of the JSSDF forces. He had thought severing the cable would put the EVA to a stop immediately, but now it seemed like it was a miscalculation on his side.  
将军摇了摇头，看着福音战士继续对自卫队进行猛烈的攻击。他原以为切断电缆会立即让 EVA 停止行动，但现在看来这是他的一个误判。

Letting out a sigh, the General pulled out his intercom and spoke into the microphone. "Call the bombers. Commence Operation Silent Spring."  
将军叹了口气，拿出对讲机对着麦克风说道：“呼叫轰炸机。开始执行‘无声春天’行动。”

Within a matter of seconds, all fire came to a halt, and the JSSDF troops quickly retreated from the battlefield. Asuka took no time to realize what this meant, recalling Shinji's description of the direction of the battle. "Shit!" She hissed before quickly ducking down her EVA and raised her AT-Field.  
短短几秒钟内，所有火力都停止了，自卫队士兵迅速从战场上撤退。明日香立刻意识到这意味着什么，回想起真嗣对战斗方向的描述。“该死！”她低声咒骂，随即迅速蹲下 EVA 并展开了 AT 力场。

A violent jarring rumble shook her entire EVA Unit, knocking it off of its feet and onto the ground as a brilliant white light shone above her. Even from behind the protection provided by her AT-Field, Asuka could still feel the searing heat that threatened to cook her alive. As the light and heat dissipated, Asuka reopened her eye and saw a gigantic hole on the roof of the Geofront.  
一阵剧烈的震动猛烈摇撼了她的 EVA 机体，使其失去平衡摔倒在地，同时一道耀眼的白光在她上方闪耀。即便有 AT 力场的保护，明日香仍能感受到那股足以将她活活烤熟的灼热。当光芒和热浪散去，明日香重新睁开眼，看到地底都市的屋顶上出现了一个巨大的洞口。

"Asuka," Maya's voice rang through her ears once again. "They just dropped an N2 mine on us!"  
“明日香，”玛雅的声音再次在她耳边响起，“他们刚刚向我们投下了一枚 N2 地雷！”

"I saw it." Asuka huffed before the beeping sound of her radar caught her attention. "And there's more behind it!"  
“我看到了。”明日香喘息着，随即雷达的哔哔声引起了她的注意，“而且后面还有更多！”

Asuka glared at the sky as the sound of roaring jet engines boomed across the air while twelve large V-shaped aircraft soared over the Geofront, each craft carrying some sort of strange figure on its belly.  
明日香瞪着天空，随着轰鸣的喷气发动机声响彻空中，十二架巨大的 V 形飞行器在第三新东京市上空翱翔，每架飞行器的腹部都载有一个奇怪的图案。

"Why are there twelve of them?!" Asuka exclaimed in surprise. Shinji had told her there would be nine.  
“为什么有十二架？！”明日香惊呼道。真嗣告诉她会有九架的。

It didn't really matter, though. She knew she had to destroy every single of them, and from Shinji, she knew that these EVA Units weren't easy to deal with as they all carried an S2 engine that basically provided them infinite power. They weren't entirely invincible, though. All she needed to do was to make sure the cores were destroyed.  
不过，这并不重要。她知道她必须摧毁它们每一个，而且从真嗣那里她了解到，这些 EVA 单位并不容易对付，因为它们都装备了 S2 引擎，基本上提供了无限动力。尽管如此，它们并非完全无敌。她只需要确保核心被摧毁即可。

Inside of the Command Center, Fuyutsuki narrowed his eyes. "They're sending the MP EVAs here?" He murmured to himself. "They couldn't possibly be planning to…" Leaning forward into the microphone, the Sub-Commander called out to the pilot of Unit 02. "Pilot Soryu, retreat now. Wait until Pilot Ikari gets to Unit 01 before engaging."  
在指挥中心内部，冬月眯起了眼睛。“他们要把 MP EVA 派到这里来？”他喃喃自语，“他们不可能打算……”副司令向前倾身，对着麦克风向 02 号机驾驶员喊话。“绫波零，立即撤退。等待碇真嗣到达 01 号机后再进行交战。”

"Why would I do that?!" She snapped, not really caring about etiquettes anymore. "Three and a half minutes are more than enough to kill all of them!"  
“我为什么要这么做？！”她厉声反问，不再顾及礼仪。“三分钟半足够我干掉他们所有人了！”

And most importantly, she didn't want to need him. Not anymore.  
最重要的是，她不想再需要他了。不再需要。

"Fine." Fuyutsuki nodded in reluctant agreement.  
“好吧。”冬月不情愿地点头同意。

"I'll try not to have too much fun." The redhead smirked, tightening the grip on her controls as the winged beasts lowered themselves onto the ground, pulling their wings inside of their bodies and brandishing their large, dual-bladed swords.  
“我会尽量不玩得太开心。”红发女孩微微一笑，握紧操纵杆，那些长着翅膀的怪兽降落在地面上，收起翅膀，挥舞着它们巨大的双刃剑。

Asuka made a twisted smile as she locked her sights onto the EVA Unit that made the first landing of the group. All twelve MP EVA Units made a sick grin, exposing their white teeth under their fire lips.  
明日香露出了扭曲的笑容，将目光锁定在第一个着陆的 EVA 单位上。所有十二台 MP EVA 单位都露出了病态的笑容，在火焰般的嘴唇下露出洁白的牙齿。

Without giving them any time to prepare, Asuka controlled Unit 02 to lunge forward and smashed its gigantic fists directly into the metal skull of the leader of the group, shattering the top of its cranium before tons of LCL burst out of the EVA's head, its body fell limp instantly.  
不给对方任何准备时间，明日香操控着二号机猛地前冲，巨大的拳头直接砸向领头者的金属头骨，将其颅顶击碎，随即大量 LCL 从 EVA 头部喷涌而出，其身体瞬间瘫软。

It wasn't the end, though. Remembering what Shinji had told her about their capabilities, Asuka robbed its dual-edged blade and threw it at the core of the white EVA. Just as she had expected, the blade morphed into the shape of Lance of Longinus before impacting, piercing through the core without resistance.  
但这并未结束。想起真嗣曾告诉她的关于它们的能力，明日香夺过其双刃剑，朝着白色 EVA 的核心投掷过去。正如她所料，剑在空中变形为朗基努斯之枪的形状，毫无阻碍地贯穿了核心。

One down, eleven to go.  
一个倒下，还有十一个。

XXXXXX

"We're here." Gendo Ikari stood in front of two elevators alongside Shinji, his expression determined. "You will go to the EVA cages using the elevator on the right side. I will go down Central Dogma with the left."  
"我们到了。" 碇源堂站在两部电梯前，与真嗣并肩，神情坚定。"你将使用右侧的电梯前往 EVA 格纳库。我将通过左侧的电梯前往中央教条。"

Letting out a sigh, Gendo started walking slowly toward the elevator. A small part of him was screaming at him to not do this, that he should help his son and give him a brighter future, preferably with the Second Child. However, this small voice was overwhelmed by the torrent of anticipation and desire to reunite with Yui.  
叹了口气，碇源堂缓缓走向电梯。内心有一小部分在尖叫，告诉他不要这么做，他应该帮助他的儿子，给他一个更光明的未来，最好是有第二适格者相伴。然而，这微弱的声音被渴望与唯重逢的期待和欲望的洪流所淹没。

"You should start moving. She's fighting there outside alone." Gendo said with a slightly confused expression as he didn't notice Shinji moving. Turning his head back, his eyes widened a bit as he saw two JSSDF soldiers just cut the corner, raising their rifles at them as they came into their field of view.  
"你应该开始行动了。她在外面独自战斗。" 碇源堂带着一丝困惑的表情说道，因为他没注意到真嗣在动。当他回头时，他的眼睛微微睁大，因为他看到两名 JSSDF 士兵刚刚转过拐角，举起他们的步枪对准他们，进入了他们的视野。

_BANG BANG BANG 砰砰砰_

One absolute advantage of being professionally trained was that Gendo could fire his own pistol at the soldiers before they pulled the trigger. The two JSSDF soldiers promptly fell to the ground under Gendo's sharpshooting skills, blood starting to spread on the floor.  
作为一名受过专业训练的人，Gendo 的一个绝对优势是他能在士兵们扣动扳机之前先开枪射击。两名 JSSDF 士兵随即在 Gendo 的精准射击下倒地，鲜血开始在地板上蔓延。

"Let's go," Gendo said. “我们走，”Gendo 说道。

"Father…" Shinji's voice turned horrified as he settled his eyes on him. Following the direction of his fingers, Gendo looked down at himself.  
"父亲……" 真嗣的声音变得惊恐，当他将目光投向他时。顺着他的手指方向，源渡低头看向自己。

Just saw a medium-sized bullet wound on his right chest, blood dripping out like a running stream.  
只见右胸上有一个中等大小的枪伤，鲜血如溪流般滴落。

Suddenly he felt his knees wobble as he fell back-first to the floor, unable to move his muscles again. Feeling his breaths were becoming increasingly difficult, Gendo knew there wasn't much time left him.  
突然间，他感到膝盖发软，仰面倒在地上，肌肉再也无法动弹。感觉到呼吸越来越困难，源渡知道留给他的时间不多了。

"Sh-Shinji," He called out in a weak voice. The said boy turned to him and knelt down, his expression an unreadable mixture.  
"真-真嗣," 他用微弱的声音呼唤道。那男孩转过身来，跪下，表情难以捉摸。

Shinji didn't make any remark. Instead, he just looked at him in silence.  
真嗣没有发表任何评论。他只是默默地看着他。

"Perhaps this sounds absurd…but I abandoned you because I didn't want to hurt you. All I do is cause you pain."  
"也许这听起来很荒谬……但我离开你是因为我不想伤害你。我所做的只会给你带来痛苦。"

Maybe it was the truth, but this time…  
或许那是真相，但这一次……

"I'm sorry, Shinji." “对不起，真嗣。”

He knew it was the end for him. He still had a lot of things to say to Shinji, but time wasn't in favor of him.  
他明白自己已到尽头。他还有许多话想对真嗣说，但时间已不再眷顾他。

"Can you forgive me, Shinji?"  
"你能原谅我吗，真嗣？"

Shinji's lips twitched. "Father…I cannot, and will never forgive Gendo Ikari." He let a moment of silence hung between them before speaking up again. "But…I think I can forgive _you._"  
真嗣的嘴唇微微抽动。"父亲……我无法，也永远不会原谅碇源堂。"他让沉默在他们之间停留了一会儿，然后再次开口。"但是……我想我可以原谅你。"

Gendo Ikari closed his eyes, for the first time since Yui died, a genuine smile grew on his face. "Now…go to her…before it's too late…" Before Shinji could answer, though, he added. "And please…bring me to Yui…" With a trembling arm, Gendo raised his hand with all of his remaining strength and handed Shinji the embryo of Adam.  
碇源堂闭上了眼睛，自唯去世以来，他的脸上第一次绽放出真心的微笑。"现在……去她那里吧……趁还来得及……"在真嗣回答之前，他又补充道。"还有……请带我去见唯……"碇源堂颤抖着，用尽他仅存的力量举起手，将亚当的胚胎递给了真嗣。

Shinji nodded and took the embryo from him. Even though the promise was fake, he felt it was the last thing he could do for him. "See you on the other side…"  
真嗣点点头，从他手中接过胚胎。尽管这个承诺是假的，但他觉得这是自己能为对方做的最后一件事。“在那边见…”

With that, he quickly stood up and turned to the elevator. The door opened with a soft sliding sound, and Shinji entered the box without looking back.  
说完，他迅速站起身，转向电梯。门轻轻滑开，真嗣没有回头，径直走进了电梯。

"Yui…will we meet again?"  
“唯…我们还会再见吗？”

XXXXXX

"Die, you bastard!" Asuka shrieked, tackling one of the EVAs into the giant artificial lake, strangling it while she held it underwater. Then, opening her right shoulder pylon, she grabbed her progressive knife and struck down onto the Evangelion's grotesque face. After the white EVA's body fell limp, she then pulled the knife out of its skull, and stabbed it right into its core. The core cracked, but her knife also broke. Discarding the handle of the broken blade, Asuka raised her fist and slammed it into the core. It finally shattered after a dozen of ground-breaking punches.  
"去死吧，混蛋！" 明日香尖叫着，将一台 EVA 扑入巨大的人工湖中，将其按在水下窒息。随后，她打开右肩的炮塔，取出高频粒子刀，猛地刺向那台 EVA 丑陋的面孔。待白色 EVA 的身体瘫软后，她拔出刀刃，直插其核心。核心裂开，但她的刀也断了。丢弃断刃的刀柄，明日香挥拳猛击核心，经过十几记重拳，核心终于破碎。

Turning around, Asuka caught sight of two of the MP EVAs closing in on her, their dual-bladed weapons ready. The first went for a low swing, which Unit 02 was easily able to leap over and counter by slamming its foot down onto the blade, knocking it out of her opponent's hand. She then used the dropped blade to counter the attack from the second one; shockwaves exploded as the blade collided with each other.  
转身之际，明日香瞥见两台量产型 EVA 正逼近，双刃武器蓄势待发。第一台 EVA 低扫而来，02 号机轻松跃起避开，并一脚踩在刀刃上，将其踢飞出对手的手中。接着，她利用掉落的刀刃反击第二台 EVA 的攻击；刀刃相撞，激起阵阵冲击波。

Screaming, Asuka made a giant horizontal cleave with the blade, cutting through both of the EVA's standing before them, bisecting them at the waist, drenching the surrounding area with blood-red LCL. After making sure that their cores were broken, Asuka counted, "Four down, eight to go."  
尖叫着，明日香挥动刀刃，进行了一次巨大的横向斩击，将面前两台 EVA 齐腰斩断，鲜红的 LCL 浸透了周围区域。确认了它们的核心被破坏后，明日香数道：“四个解决了，还有八个。”

XXXXXX

The young Rei Ayanami gazed up at the great, white, masked creature that was Lilith. Or so she thought. Was she a part of Lilith, a creation of Lilith, or something else? The Fifth Child's words still rang in her ears.  
年轻的绫波零抬头凝视着那巨大的、白色的、戴着面具的生物——莉莉丝。或者她以为是这样。她是莉莉丝的一部分，莉莉丝的创造物，还是别的什么？第五适格者的话语仍在她耳边回响。

Was she destined to return to Lilith, like the spawn of Adam was destined to return to Adam?  
她是否注定要回到莉莉丝身边，就像亚当的子嗣注定要回到亚当那里一样？

Truthfully, she didn't know.  
老实说，她不知道。

"I've been waiting here for a while." A familiar female voice echoed throughout the chamber, prompting Rei to turn around to the source of the voice. Before her stood the faux blonde on the platform they shared. "I was wondering what was taking you so long."  
"我在这里等了一会儿了。"一个熟悉的女声在大厅中回荡，促使丽转身寻找声音的来源。站在她面前的是与她共享平台的假金发女子。"我在想你为什么这么久还没到。"

"Dr. Akagi, I do not understand." Rei's ghostly voice joined. "What are you waiting for?"  
"赤城博士，我不明白。"丽那幽灵般的声音加入。"你在等什么？"

The blonde doctor turned around, her eyes went wide as she set her eyes on Rei." Wait, where's Gendo?"  
金发女医生转过身来，一看到丽，她的眼睛就瞪大了。“等等，碇司令呢？”

"I cannot sense Commander Ikari's light of soul as of now. Therefore, I conclude he is likely dead." Her reply came out calmly.  
“我现在无法感知到碇司令的灵魂之光。因此，我得出结论，他很可能已经死亡。”她的回答平静如水。

Dr. Akagi found herself at a loss for words. She had been preparing for this moment for so long – the reprogramming of the MAGI system, getting down here undiscovered. And in the end, it was all futile.  
赤木律子博士发现自己无言以对。她为这一刻准备了太久——重编程 MAGI 系统，秘密潜入这里。而最终，这一切都变得毫无意义。

Though she wasn't going to complain.  
虽然她并不打算抱怨。

"What will happen if I return to Lilith?" Suddenly Rei spoke up, her voice slightly curious.  
“如果我回到莉莉丝身边会发生什么？”突然，丽突然开口，声音中带着一丝好奇。

"There's no Adam, nothing will happen." Ritsuko shrugged.  
“没有亚当，什么都不会发生。”律子耸了耸肩。

"I see. I shall leave, then." Rei said before turning around and heading to the exit. "Shinji and Asuka need help, I will go help them."  
"我明白了。那我就告辞了。" 丽说完，转身向出口走去。"真嗣和明日香需要帮助，我去帮他们。"

With that, the young Rei Ayanami promptly left the chamber in delicate footsteps. The head scientist of NERV smiled sadly, pulling out a remote controller from her lab coat pocket.  
话音刚落，年轻的绫波丽便轻盈地离开了房间。NERV 的首席科学家苦笑着从白大褂口袋里掏出一个遥控器。

She had long accepted her own doom, though she had to make NERV, or at least the Commander would go down along with her. She was tired of being used as a tool. Knowing the scenario would never work without Lilith, this would be the perfect way to put an end to all.  
她早已接受了自己的命运，尽管她要让 NERV，至少是司令，与她一同坠入深渊。她厌倦了被当作工具。明知没有莉莉丝，计划永远不会成功，这将是终结一切的完美方式。

However, now that Gendo was no more, was her actions necessary anymore? The only person she hated was Gendo.  
然而，如今碇源堂已不复存在，她的行动还有必要吗？她唯一憎恨的人就是碇源堂。

Still, she had already come so far down the road. Even if she didn't destroy Lilith, there would be no place for her to stay in the world anymore, anyway.  
尽管如此，她已经走到了这一步。即使她不摧毁莉莉丝，这个世界也再无她的容身之地了。

Ritsuko made a sad smile as she thought about the pilots. They took all of Gendo's care and attention from her, but was it really their fault? They were only children, tools for them to achieve Godhood.  
律子苦笑着思考着那些驾驶员。他们夺走了碇源堂所有的关心和注意，但这真的是他们的错吗？他们只是孩子，是他们实现神性的工具。

Just like herself. 就像她自己一样。

Was it empathy that she felt?  
她感受到的是共情吗？

"I'm such a fool..." The blonde doctor knelt on the ground and cried.  
“我真是个傻瓜……”金发女医生跪在地上，泪流满面。

She didn't notice how long it had been until she had stopped crying, but when she did the silhouette of Rei Ayanami was long gone by then.  
她并未察觉自己哭了多久，直到停止哭泣时，才发现绫波零的身影早已消失无踪。

Dr. Akagi finally made her decision and pressed the red button on the center of the screen, anticipating an eruption of flames to overtake her in death's sweet embrace.  
赤木律子博士终于下定决心，按下了屏幕中央的红色按钮，期待着烈焰爆发，将自己吞噬在死亡的甜蜜怀抱中。

"Mother…" "母亲…"

_BOOM_

XXXXXX

Shinji took a deep breath inside the LCL around him, gripping the controls tightly as he focused. He had thought turning against his father in the last moment would be an easy task to do, at least emotionally, though he had never thought it would bring such a mood turmoil to him.  
真嗣在周围的 LCL 中深吸了一口气，紧紧抓住操纵杆集中精神。他原以为在最后一刻反抗父亲在情感上会相对容易，尽管他从未想过这会给他带来如此剧烈的情绪波动。

Suddenly the whole EVA cage shook violently, glasses breaking into pieces. "What's going on?!" He shouted into the microphone.  
突然间，整个 EVA 笼子剧烈摇晃，玻璃碎裂成片。"发生什么事了？！"他对着麦克风大喊。

"There's an explosion in Central Dogma!" Maya's voice echoed in his cockpit. "We've set the absorbers to maximum! It should withstand the physical impact!"  
"中央 dogma 发生了爆炸！" 真嗣的驾驶舱内回荡着绫波的声音。"我们已经将吸收器调至最大！应该能承受住物理冲击！"

Shinji's eyes went wide. Did Dr. Akagi successfully destroy Lilith? He took a look at Adam in his hand before shaking his head. "Activate Unit 01!"  
真嗣的眼睛瞪大了。赤木博士成功摧毁了莉莉丝吗？他看了一眼手中的亚当，然后摇了摇头。"启动 01 号机！"

"…Establishing A-10 connections…"  
"…建立 A-10 连接…"

He shook his head again, clearing his mind a little. Asuka was still fighting alone on the surface, and she needed his help as soon as possible. From the PA system, he could hear her maniac battle cries mixed with pained yelps, making him increasingly anxious for each passing moment.  
他再次摇了摇头，稍微清空了思绪。明日香仍在地面上孤军奋战，她急需他的援助。从扩音系统中，他听到她狂热的战斗呼喊混杂着痛苦的叫声，每一刻都让他愈发焦虑。

"Ibuki-san? Why I'm still not activating?" Shinji opened his eyes with a confused expression. The entry plug still felt cold and dark.  
“伊吹小姐？为什么我还未启动？” 真嗣睁开眼睛，脸上带着困惑的表情。插入栓依旧感觉冰冷而黑暗。

"You aren't even passing the absolute borderline…the EVA won't activate!"  
“你甚至没有越过绝对界限……EVA 无法启动！”

Shinji felt a chill ran down his spine. "How? How possible?!" He exclaimed. "Make it move! Now!"  
真嗣感到一股寒意沿着脊背直窜而下。“怎么可能？怎么可能？！”他惊呼道，“让它动起来！现在！”

"I can't!" Maya's panicked voice came through the speakers, hitting him like a meteor.  
“我做不到！”摩耶惊慌失措的声音通过扬声器传来，如同流星般击中了他。

A dawning horror washed over Shinji's face as realization struck him. When he was absorbed by Unit 01, his mother saw everything. She knew what he had planned – to prevent the Third Impact from happening, which was contrasting her ultimate goal.  
当意识到这一点时，真嗣的脸上浮现出一种逐渐升起的恐惧。当他被初号机吸收时，他的母亲看到了一切。她知道他的计划——阻止第三次冲击的发生，这与她的最终目标截然相反。

Then why would she help him?  
那她为什么要帮他呢？

"No no no no…" Shinji muttered. "No! Mother, you can't do this! Move! Please move!" He thrashed the controls violently, punching the buttons in a random manner.  
"不不不不……" 真嗣喃喃自语。"不！妈妈，你不能这么做！动啊！求你动一下！" 他猛烈地操纵着控制器，胡乱地敲打着按钮。

EVA Unit 01 continued to remain in dead silence.  
EVA 初号机依旧保持着死寂。

XXXXXX

"You sick bastards!" Asuka shrieked, willing Unit 02 to dodge another potentially lethal attack from the joint-attack by two MP EVAs. "I'm getting really sick and tired of this shit!" Putting all of its power forth, Unit 02 shoved both EVAs back, forcing them to stumble and give her some breathing room.  
"你们这些变态！" 明日香尖叫着，操控零二号机躲避来自两台 MP EVA 联合攻击的又一次致命打击。"我真是受够了这种烂事！" 零二号机全力出击，将两台 EVA 推开，迫使它们踉跄后退，为自己争取了一些喘息的空间。

"Asuka!" Maya's voice filled the entry plug. "You've only got one minute left!"  
"明日香！" 真希波的声音在插入栓内响起。"你只剩下最后一分钟了！"

"I know that already!" She hissed, looking up at the counter as the timer reached closer and closer to zero by the second. Before she could take much time to assess how much time she had left, the third and fourth MP EVAs bum-rushed her whilst swinging their great blades.  
"我早就知道了！" 她低声咆哮，抬头看着计时器一秒秒逼近零。还没等她仔细评估剩余时间，第三和第四台 MP EVA 便猛冲过来，挥舞着巨大的刀刃。

Now that she was facing multiple MP EVAs at the same time, Asuka started to realize why she had been gaining the upper hand till now. Before, the MP EVAs would always attack in line, making it rather easy for her to deal with.  
现在她同时面对多台 MP EVA，明日香开始意识到为何自己至今一直占据上风。之前，MP EVA 总是排成一线攻击，让她处理起来相当轻松。

Therefore, when the eight remaining MP EVAs lunged at her almost simultaneously from different directions, Asuka soon found herself lose track of what to do.  
因此，当剩下的八台 MP EVA 几乎同时从不同方向扑向她时，明日香很快发现自己不知所措。

It wasn't going to stop her, though. The MP EVAs' movements were abnormally slow, as if operating under insufficient power. With a copy of the Lance at hand, Asuka leaped into the air, aiming the spear at the most intact EVA and threw with all of her might.  
但这并不能阻止她。MP EVA 的动作异常缓慢，仿佛电力不足。明日香手持复制的长枪，一跃而起，瞄准最完好的 EVA，全力投掷出去。

The Lance clone shattered its core like bullet piercing glass, the EVA fell down to the ground in an eyeblink. "Ha! Take that! Only four to-Ahh!" Driven to distraction, Asuka let out a yelp as another MP EVA successfully landed a swing of its blade at Unit 02's back, leaving a mild cut on it.  
蓝斯复制体如同子弹穿透玻璃般粉碎了核心，EVA 随即眨眼间坠落地面。“哈！尝尝这个！只剩四个了——啊！”分心的明日香惊叫一声，另一台 MP EVA 成功挥刀击中了 02 机的背部，留下一道轻微的划痕。

Just as she turned around and wanted to see which one of those bastards dared to sneak stack her, Asuka was welcomed with the sight of seven MP EVAs lunging at her at high speeds. Acting on reflex, she tried to control her EVA to jump away from the spot.  
正当她转身想要看看是哪个混蛋胆敢偷袭她时，明日香迎面撞上了七台高速扑来的 MP EVA。出于本能，她试图操控自己的 EVA 跳离原地。

Though nothing happened. 然而，什么也没发生。

Unit 02 fell limp as the timer ticked to zero.  
02 号机随着计时器归零而瘫软下来。

"NO!" Asuka barked, pushing and pulling the controls of her EVA. But it won't move, not without power anymore.  
“不！”明日香咆哮着，推拉她的 EVA 控制器。但它动不了，没有电力就无法行动。

Even though she couldn't see what was going on outside, from the sudden jarring acceleration, she knew her EVA was being thrown around, most likely by the remaining active MP EVAs. Somehow even without power, she could still feel what her EVA felt; she yelped in pain as one of the remaining MP EVAs cut off one arm of Unit 02 with its blade.  
尽管她看不见外面的情况，但从突然的剧烈加速中，她知道自己的 EVA 正在被抛来抛去，很可能是被剩余的活动 MP EVA 所为。不知为何，即使没有电力，她仍能感受到 EVA 的感受；当一台剩余的 MP EVA 用刀切断 02 号机的一只手臂时，她痛得叫出声来。

"Urgh…AHH!" With a vicious kick to the side, EVA Unit 08 sent the crimson Unit into the air. Unit 02 crashed on a nearby hill, smoke started to rise from underneath.  
“呃啊…啊！”随着对侧面的一记猛踢，EVA 八号机将红色机体踢向空中。二号机坠落在附近的山丘上，烟雾开始从下方升起。

No matter how hard it was for her to admit, she didn't stand a chance against them alone.  
无论她多么不愿承认，独自一人面对他们，她毫无胜算。

She needed Shinji. 她需要真嗣。

Or did she? 还是她没有？

"I'll show you!" If the seventeenth Angel could control an EVA without power, she could as well.  
"我会证明给你看！" 既然第十七使徒能在无电源的情况下操控 EVA，她也能做到。

With a determined expression, Asuka took off her eyepatch.  
带着坚定的表情，明日香摘下了眼罩。

"AHHH!" The moment the Anti-L material came off, Asuka felt an alien sensation surge through her entire body. The agony was excruciating; she arched her back, screaming as the Seal Pillar came out of her left eye, glowing as the Angel quickly took over.  
"啊——！" 当反 L 物质被移除的那一刻，明日香感到一种异样的感觉涌遍全身。剧痛难以忍受；她弓起背，尖叫着，封印柱从她的左眼中脱离，随着使徒迅速接管，光芒闪烁。

"What the hell is she doing?!" Misato exclaimed, her voice horrified.  
"她到底在干什么？！" 美里惊呼，声音中充满了恐惧。

"We've detected new patten blue on the battlefield! Inside Unit 02!" Aobo reported.  
"战场检测到新的蓝色模式！在二号机内部！" 青叶报告道。

"She's using herself as the power source…" Maya's impression, as timid as she usually was, didn't look any better. "The S2 engine… she's using the S2 engine inside her!"  
"她把自己当作电源了……" 玛雅的印象，一如既往地胆怯，看起来并不乐观。"S2 机关……她正在使用她体内的 S2 机关！"

"Urghhh…" Hyperventilating, Asuka clenched her fists tightly, the rubbery material of her plugsuit creaking as she did. Feeling infinite power course through her, Asuka was positively surprised that she was still conscious.  
"呃啊……" 阿斯卡喘着粗气，紧紧握拳，紧身战斗服的橡胶材质在她动作时发出吱吱声。感受到无穷的力量涌入体内，阿斯卡惊喜地发现自己仍然清醒。

"Unit 02 reactivated!" "二号机重新启动！"

Everything around her turned back to life. Asuka smiled a weak smile as she saw the main panel of her EVA.  
她周围的一切恢复了生机。明日香看到她的 EVA 主面板时，露出了一个虚弱的微笑。
