## *Chapter 43*: Chapter 43: Cost  
*第 43 章*: 第 43 章：代价

Disclaimer: I do not own Evangelion.  
免责声明：我不拥有《新世纪福音战士》。

**Chapter 43: Cost 第四十三章：代价**

"It's really good for you to show up right now, wondergirl!" Asuka exclaimed as she shoved away another one of the MP EVAs and stabbed the blade into its core.  
“你来得真是时候，奇迹女孩！”明日香喊道，她推开另一台量产 EVA，将刀刃刺入其核心。

"I shall help my friends," Rei replied calmly, blocking the attack from the MP EVA and forcing it away from her. As much as she wanted to help to fight, Unit 00 wasn't exactly built for combat. For the remaining eight MP EVAs, they split the work by half for each person to reach maximum efficiency.  
“我必须帮助我的朋友们，”绫波平静地回应，挡下了量产 EVA 的攻击并将其逼退。尽管她渴望参与战斗，但零号机并非专为战斗设计。剩下的八台量产 EVA，她们两人各分担一半，以达到最高效率。

Still, Rei's contribution to the battle was indispensable - she was able to demolish one of the four MP EVAs, and made sure it wouldn't regenerate by shattering its core.  
尽管如此，绫波在战斗中的贡献不可或缺——她成功摧毁了四台量产 EVA 中的一台，并通过粉碎其核心确保它无法再生。

"Die!" Asuka shrieked as she claimed another kill.  
“去死吧！”明日香尖叫着，又夺走了一个生命。

Shinji still hadn't shown up yet. There was still a part of her, that refused to believe Shinji would leave her for the next innocent Asuka, that he would go out and help her, but as time passed, the hope was slowly being crushed into dust.  
真嗣仍然没有出现。她心中仍有一部分不愿相信真嗣会为了下一个无辜的明日香而离开她，会去帮助她，但随着时间的流逝，这份希望正慢慢被碾成尘埃。

"Go to hell!" With a distorted scream, Asuka sliced another MP EVA Unit into halves along with its core.  
“下地狱去吧！”明日香扭曲着尖叫，将另一台 MP EVA 单位连同其核心一起劈成两半。

XXXXXX

"Mother, please." “妈妈，求你了。”

He didn't know how long he had been staying inside the completely dark and cold entry plug of EVA Unit 01 trying to activate the mech. Nothing really happened, except for the constant battle cries from the blood-boiling redhead that echoed through the EVA cages. Even though Shinji knew he had to put all of his attention into activating the EVA, but he found himself unable to ignore Asuka's cries, pained or excited.  
他不知道自己在 EVA 初号机的完全黑暗且冰冷的插入栓里待了多久，试图启动这台机甲。除了从热血沸腾的红发少女那里不断传来的战斗呼喊声在 EVA 笼中回荡外，什么也没发生。尽管真嗣知道他必须全神贯注地激活 EVA，但他发现自己无法忽视明日香的呼喊，无论是痛苦的，还是兴奋的。

"Please, wake up." “求求你，醒过来。”

Maya had told him that nothing was wrong on their side; or rather, they had no idea of how to fix it. Shinji knew what was wrong, though. His mother must've seen everything during the period when he was trapped inside Unit 01's core. She wouldn't let him ruin her plan for humanity's future just for some girl, would she?  
玛雅曾告诉他，他们那边一切正常；或者更确切地说，他们不知道如何解决这个问题。但真嗣知道问题所在。他的母亲一定在他被困在初号机核心期间看到了一切。她不会为了一个女孩就让他破坏她为人类未来制定的计划，对吧？

"Mother, why do you have to be like this?!" Shinji shouted, banging his fist on the controls. "Why wouldn't you just let me help her!"  
“妈妈，你为什么要这样？！”真嗣喊道，拳头重重地敲在控制台上。“为什么不让我帮她！”

The entry plug continued to remain cold and silent despite Shinji's almost desperate calls. "Why, mother?!" He screamed. "Is this what you really want?! Talk to me, I'm your son!"  
尽管真嗣近乎绝望地呼唤，插入栓依旧保持着冰冷和沉默。“为什么，妈妈？！”他尖叫道。“这就是你真正想要的吗？！跟我说话，我是你的儿子！”

This time, though, suddenly Shinji felt a familiar, yet subtly unfamiliar sensation surging through his body as his vision was blurred by a kaleidoscope of colors before Yui Ikari's unmistakable silhouette emerged from the endless space. "Shinji…" The said boy saw her and heard her voice, but he didn't feel relieved. He knew that voice all too well.  
"然而这一次，突然间，一种熟悉却又微妙地陌生的感觉在真嗣体内涌动，他的视野被万花筒般的色彩模糊，随后从无尽的空间中浮现出碇唯那不容错认的轮廓。“真嗣……”少年看见了她，听到了她的声音，却并未感到宽慰。他太熟悉这个声音了。”

"Mother…" Shinji replied, mentally preparing himself for the imminent storm. Whatever it takes, he would do it for Asuka.  
"“妈妈……”真嗣回应道，在心中为即将到来的风暴做好准备。无论付出什么代价，他都会为了明日香去做。”

He didn't know exactly what to say to move her mother's mind, though. He had rarely gotten this far – during most of his previous cycles, they would fail against the MP EVAs, or his father successfully initiated Third Impact of his own. Not to mention his mother had always wanted the Human Instrumentality Project to happen as well, so that she could leave evidence that humanity existed.  
"他并不确切知道该如何说服母亲改变心意。他很少能走到这一步——在之前的循环中，他们大多会败给量产型 EVA，或是他的父亲成功引发了第三次冲击。更不用说，他的母亲一直也希望人类补完计划能够实现，以便留下人类存在的证据。”

"Shinji…who are you?" "真嗣…你是谁？"

Shinji blinked. "I am Shinji Ikari, the Third Child and the pilot of Unit 01," his voice turned confused as he spoke. "And…your son, mother."  
真嗣眨了眨眼。“我是碇真嗣，第三适格者，也是 01 机体的驾驶员，”他开口时声音变得困惑。“而且…是你的儿子，妈妈。”

"My Shinji…" Yui stared at the boy with an incredulous expression. "You are not the Shinji I remember. The moment you stepped into the EVA I sensed there was something wrong with you. I thought it was just it's been so long…" She seemed to take a deep breath before she continued. "Who…are you?"  
"我的真嗣…" 唯难以置信地盯着男孩。“你不是我记忆中的真嗣。你一进入 EVA，我就感觉到你有些不对劲。我以为只是时间太久了…”她似乎深吸了一口气，然后继续说道。“你…到底是谁？”

Shinji chuckled, ignoring the inappropriacy of such behavior under a grim situation like this. "You must've seen it…what I've been through. What _you_ put me through, made me turn into who I am right now."  
真嗣轻声笑了出来，尽管在这种严峻的情况下，这样的行为显得不合时宜。“你一定看到了……我所经历的一切。你让我经历的那些，让我变成了现在的我。”

Yui frowned, unable to understand anything. Even though she had got glimpses of Shinji's past memories, to which some of them were quite disturbing and, not to mention, concerning herself, she never knew the logic behind it. "But that wasn't my intent-"  
唯皱起眉头，完全无法理解。尽管她曾瞥见过真嗣过去的记忆，其中一些相当令人不安，更不用说还牵扯到她自己，但她从未明白其中的逻辑。“但那并非我的本意——”

"Mother," Shinji cut her off in a firm voice. Asuka was still fighting outside, which wasn't making this any easier for him. "The Human Instrumentality Project isn't what you think it will be…" His eyes turned sad. "Look at me…do you have any idea of what I was thrown into? Is this what you expect to happen?"  
“母亲，”真嗣坚定地打断了她。明日香还在外面战斗，这让他更加难以承受。“人类补完计划并不是你所想象的那样……”他的眼神变得悲伤。“看看我……你知道我被卷入了什么吗？这就是你所期望发生的吗？”

Yui's eyelids fell, unable to counter with anything.  
优的眼睛闭上了，无法反驳任何话。

"Future for humanity…" Shinji let out a short laugh. "Now I remembered, what you said on the day of the activation test of Unit 01. I can tell you now, mother, that humanity will only have its own future without Human Instrumentality Project."  
"人类的未来…" 真嗣发出了一声短促的笑声。"现在我想起来了，你在零号机启动测试那天说的话。我现在可以告诉你，妈妈，人类只会拥有自己的未来，不需要人类补完计划。"

"Is it all because of Kyoko's daughter?" Yui suddenly spoke up, eliciting a raised eyebrow from Shinji, who chuckled at that question.  
"这一切都是因为绫波的女儿吗？" 优突然开口，让真嗣挑了挑眉，对这个问题的反应是轻笑。

"Does it matter? My future should be in my own hands. I don't need you, mother, to plan anything for me." He replied.  
"这有什么关系？我的未来应该掌握在自己手中。我不需要你，妈妈，为我计划任何事情。" 他回答道。

"You're delusional, Shinji," Yui replied with an uncharacteristically cold face. "The moment the Second Impact happens, the future for humanity is set in stone. EVAs are a must, or we'll be eliminated by the Angels. But if we don't start the Instrumentality Project after the last Angel is defeated, what do you think the humans will do with Lilith and Adam?"  
"你真是妄想，真嗣，" 绫波零以一种异常冷漠的表情回答，"第二次冲击发生的那一刻，人类的未来就已经注定。EVA 是必须的，否则我们会被使徒消灭。但如果我们在击败最后一个使徒后不启动人类补完计划，你认为人类会如何对待莉莉丝和亚当？"

"Enlighten me," Shinji shrugged.  
"请赐教，" 真嗣耸了耸肩。

"War." Yui spit. "They could build as many EVAs as they want with Lilith and Adam. And what do you think will happen to Asuka, who's an EVA pilot, if a war breaks out? If you really love her so much, you should know that the Human Instrumentality Project is the best result she can ever get."  
“战争。”唯啐道，“他们可以用莉莉丝和亚当造出他们想要的任何 EVA。而你想想，一旦战争爆发，身为 EVA 驾驶员的明日香会怎样？如果你真的那么爱她，你就该明白，人类补完计划是她能得到的最好结局。”

This time though, Shinji did fall silent. He had never really given a serious thought about the future after the Angel Wars since it had always seemed rather far away from him. Now that his mother mentioned it, he suddenly found the question hard to answer.  
然而这一次，真嗣确实陷入了沉默。他从未真正认真思考过天使战争之后的未来，因为那似乎总是离他很遥远。如今母亲提及此事，他突然发现这个问题难以回答。

Maybe his mother was right? That because the Second Impact can't be reversed, the best outcome for humanity was to all turn into a primordial soup?  
或许他母亲是对的？因为第二次冲击无法逆转，人类最好的结局就是全部化为原始汤？

On second thought, Lilith was likely already destroyed by Ritsuko. He had Adam at hand, he had to think of a way to destroy it as well, then it would be all good, right?  
再一想，莉莉丝很可能已经被律子摧毁了。他手中有亚当，他必须想办法也摧毁它，这样一切就都好了，对吧？

Perhaps his mother heard his thoughts, perhaps not. "I never thought you could escape from the dream I created for you. You could've lived in there forever and be together with her. It was really, really the world you deserved. Why did you wake up?"  
也许他母亲听到了他的想法，也许没有。“我从没想过你能逃出我为你编织的梦境。你本可以在那里永远生活，与她在一起。那真的是，真的是你应得的世界。你为何要醒来？”

"Because Asuka would've been left alone." Shinji's response came out instantly despite his musing about the future. "I made her a promise. And I'll keep it forever."  
"因为明日香会孤单一人。" 尽管沉思着未来，真嗣的回答立刻脱口而出。"我向她许下了承诺。我会永远遵守它。"

"Stubborn, just like your father…" Yui chuckled. "What is it that you really want from this, Shinji?"  
"固执，和你父亲一模一样……" 绫波笑了笑。"你真正想要的是什么，真嗣？"

"I…I just…" Shinji almost sobbed. Her mother's insight about the future really struck him hard. Was he-no, was Asuka doomed to never live a normal and happy life? Then what good he was? "I just want her to be happy. I want her not to pilot the EVA ever again, even if at the cost of…" Shinji pondered for a moment, his eyes turned sad before he continued. "Even if, without the EVA, she'll never know me."  
"我……我只是……" 真嗣几乎哽咽。母亲对未来的洞察真的击中了他。难道他——不，是明日香注定无法过上正常而幸福的生活吗？那么他还有什么用呢？"我只是希望她能幸福。我希望她再也不要驾驶 EVA，即使这意味着……" 真嗣沉思片刻，眼神变得悲伤，然后继续说道。"即使没有 EVA，她永远不会认识我。"

"I don't care whether we get together or not. I'm really, really getting tired of all this, of seeing her get hurt, seeing her die and unable to do anything…just to repeat the process again."  
"我不在乎我们是否能在一起。我真的，真的厌倦了这一切，看着她受伤，看着她死去却无能为力……只是又一次重复这个过程。"

"I just want her to live her own happy life, even if it's a life without me."  
"我只希望她能过上她自己的幸福生活，即使那是一个没有我的生活。"

"Mother…will you help me?"  
"母亲…你能帮我吗？"

XXXXXX

"Die!" Asuka shrieked as she tackled one of the four remaining MP EVAs down to the ground and began a vicious slaughter. "Rei, help me fend them off!"  
“去死吧！”明日香尖叫着扑倒了一台剩余的四台 MP EVA 之一，开始了一场残忍的屠杀。“丽，帮我挡住它们！”

"Roger," Rei's reply came out quick and clean. The blue Unit 00 faced the three MP EVAs on her own without so much as a usable weapon. Rei soon found herself surrounded by the white monsters, unable to move as her EVA was tackled to the ground face-down.  
“收到，”丽的回应迅速而干脆。蓝色零号机独自面对着三台 MP EVA，没有任何可用武器。丽很快发现自己被白色的怪物包围，无法动弹，她的 EVA 被扑倒在地，面朝下。

There was still one thing she could do, though.  
不过，她还有一件事可以做。

"This is my last assistance, Pilot Soryu," Rei spoke into the microphones before punching the plug ejection button and turning the self-destruct handle.  
“这是我的最后一次援助，飞行员碇ソリュ，” 绫波对着麦克风说道，随即按下插入栓弹射按钮并转动自毁手柄。

Before Asuka could realize what was going on, flames and smoke shot out from the back of Unit 00 as the entry plug shot into the air above the hole on the Geofront top and flew across the sky atop the entire city wreckage of Tokyo-3.  
在明日香意识到发生了什么之前，火焰和浓烟从零号机的背部喷涌而出，插入栓冲天而起，穿过地底都市顶部的洞口，飞越整个被毁的第三新东京市上空。

Then, like a supernova explosion, a massive fireball engulfed the three MP EVAs that once had Unit 00 encircled and damaged.  
紧接着，如同超新星爆发一般，一个巨大的火球吞噬了曾经包围并损伤零号机的三台 MP EVA。

"Thank you, Rei," Asuka whispered to herself, dealing the final killer blow to the MP EVA on the ground in front of her with the gigantic blade. With a vicious stab, the blade cut through the MP EVA's substandard S2 engine along with the dummy plug system behind it like a knife cutting through cheese.  
"谢谢你，丽，" 明日香自言自语道，用那巨大的刀刃对准地上的量产型 EVA 发出了致命一击。猛力一刺，刀刃如同切开奶酪般贯穿了量产型 EVA 劣质的 S2 引擎及其背后的模拟插入栓系统。

"I did it." At first, it was only a mumble to herself. "I did it!" Now it was an excited cry. Had she actually done it, defeating the invasion forces and the MP EVAs and saving the world by herself? Well, she had some help from Rei, sure, but she was undoubtedly the major contributing factor.  
"我做到了。" 起初，这只是她对自己低声的呢喃。"我做到了！" 现在，这变成了兴奋的呼喊。难道她真的做到了吗？独自击败了入侵部队和量产型 EVA，拯救了世界？当然，她确实得到了丽的帮助，但她无疑是主要的贡献者。

On top of that, she didn't need Shinji's help throughout all this.  
更重要的是，她在这整个过程中完全不需要真嗣的帮助。

"Screw you, Ikari!" She shouted at nothing in particular. After all, she had proved that even without Shinji, she could still stop the world from ending. Shinji was still nowhere to be seen, though. However, Asuka didn't really care about it right now. If anything, a new dark idea started to form in her mind.  
"去你的，碇！" 她对着空无一物的地方大喊。毕竟，她已经证明即使没有真嗣，她也能阻止世界末日。然而，真嗣依然不见踪影。不过，明日香现在并不太在意这件事。相反，一个新的黑暗念头开始在她脑海中形成。

If she could defeat the MP EVAs all by herself in this cycle, she believed the Asukas in other cycles could do it as well. She gritted her teeth as a disgusting realization dawned on her. What if Shinji's just using her for pleasure, and left her as soon as she found out the truth, in his other cycles as well?  
如果她能在这个循环中独自击败所有 MP EVA，她相信其他循环中的明日香也能做到。她咬紧牙关，一种令人作呕的领悟涌上心头。如果真嗣只是利用她来满足欲望，一旦她发现真相就立刻离开她，在其他循环中也是如此呢？

Even though some of his actions didn't sit well with the concept at all, the small rational voices were flooded by the tsunami of anger.  
尽管他的一些行为完全不符合这个概念，但那些微弱的理性声音被愤怒的海啸淹没了。

She had to hold back another surge of tears and eagerness to cry out loud as she recalled the happy moments she had spent with Shinji. She had been alone for most of her life after her mother's death, and during the periods of time after she met Shinji, Asuka truly felt happy and homely.  
当她回想起与真嗣共度的快乐时光时，她不得不再次抑制住涌上心头的泪水和放声大哭的冲动。母亲去世后，她大部分时间都是孤独一人，而在遇见真嗣后的那些日子里，明日香真正感受到了幸福和家的温暖。

Did those promises mean nothing?  
那些承诺难道就毫无意义吗？

Of course not. In fact, they meant everything to her. However, the promises were made under the prerequisite that Shinji would keep his promises as well, and they were to be totally honest with each other. If Shinji had already left her for the next Asuka, and he broke the trust by deceiving her for such a long time, she felt she didn't need to put up with him anymore.  
当然不是。事实上，那些承诺对她来说意味着一切。然而，这些承诺的前提是真嗣也会遵守他的承诺，并且他们要完全坦诚相待。如果真嗣已经为了下一个明日香而离开她，并且长时间欺骗她，破坏了信任，她觉得她没有必要再忍受他了。

Even though Asuka tried to convince herself that she should think like this, her heart couldn't comply.  
尽管明日香试图说服自己应该这样想，但她的心却无法顺从。

It simply hurt too much.  
只是痛得太厉害了。

"I hate you." She hissed. It wasn't really a hatred directed toward Shinji as a person – it was more to herself, that she wasn't able to sort out the emotions and perhaps just simply let go. She hated feeling weak.  
“我恨你。”她低声怒道。这并非真的针对真嗣这个人——更多的是恨自己，恨自己无法理清这些情感，也许只是简单地放手。她痛恨自己的软弱。

"Unit 02, heading back to the Headquarters," Asuka said after taking several deep breaths. She didn't get any reply, though. Maybe the building was damaged too heavily by the self-destruct of Central Dogma.  
“二号机，正在返回总部。”明日香深呼吸几次后说道。然而，她并未得到任何回应。或许中央教条的自毁已经对建筑造成了过重的损害。

Shaking her head, Asuka turned away from the battlefield and began willing her EVA back to one of the retrieval points, not really caring about its operational status at this point.  
明日香摇了摇头，转身离开战场，开始用意念引导她的 EVA 返回其中一个回收点，此刻她并不太在意其运行状态。

"…suka! Wat…out!" “…讨厌！什…出去！”

Suddenly a muffled voice came out of the speakers, which Asuka immediately recognized as Misato's. However, the meaning of the phrases went over her head since she was still being overwhelmed by the emotions.  
突然，扬声器中传来一个沉闷的声音，明日香立刻辨认出那是美里。然而，由于她仍被情绪所淹没，那些话语的含义并未传入她的脑海。

It wasn't until the radar on her screen blared, indicating fast projectiles incoming, that finally caught her attention. Asuka snapped around, just to see three copies of the Lance of Longinus flew toward her at supersonic speeds.  
直到屏幕上的雷达发出警报，提示有高速弹丸来袭，这才终于引起了她的注意。明日香猛地转身，只见三支朗基努斯之枪的复制品正以超音速向她飞来。

She didn't even have time to think, not about the reasons why weren't the MP EVAs killed by the self-destruct of Unit 00, nor about what she was supposed to do, how to dodge the deadly attack. Asuka simply stood there as she watched the Lances coming in close at her and waited for the inevitable.  
她甚至来不及思考，无论是为何零号机的自爆没有摧毁 MP 初号机，还是她应该如何应对，如何闪避这致命一击。明日香只是站在那里，眼看着长枪逼近，等待着不可避免的命运。

However, before the Lances could even reach her, a purple figure flashed in front of her, blocking the sight.  
然而，在兰斯家族的人还未触及她之前，一道紫色身影已闪现至她面前，挡住了视线。

_CLANK CLANK CLANK 叮叮叮_

Asuka could hear a bone-chilling scream that sent Goosebumps down her arms in a familiar voice.  
明日香能听到一个熟悉的声音发出令人毛骨悚然的尖叫，让她手臂上起了一层鸡皮疙瘩。

"This isn't how everything is supposed to go!" For the first time in a long while, Keel's voice actually sounded genuinely panicked. He had seen most of the things in life that could be labeled as 'disturbing', though what was happening right now still terrified him. "This is our life's work!"  
“事情不应该是这样的！” 久违地，基尔的声音听起来真的慌了。他一生中见过大多数可以被称为‘令人不安’的事物，但眼下发生的事情仍然让他感到恐惧。“这是我们毕生的心血！”

"The condition of Lilith and Adam is unknown. The MP EVAs are all destroyed." SEELE 03 followed, listing out every fact that indicated their complete failure. "There's no turning back from now."  
“莉莉丝和亚当的状况不明。所有量产 EVA 都被摧毁了。” SEELE 03 接着列出了每一个表明他们彻底失败的事实。“现在已经没有回头路了。”

"It seems like we have failed." SEELE 06 stated, his voice oddly calm despite the gravity of the situation.  
"看来我们失败了。" SEELE 06 说道，尽管情况严重，他的声音却异常平静。

"No matter," SEELE 01 finally showed the first sign of calming down. "We still have the resources. We still have the chance. Five years, ten years, even decades. The MP EVAs can be reconstructed. We can start a war fought by Evangelions if we need. As long as-" Suddenly, his voice trailed off, leaving the remaining eleven members of SEELE Committee slightly confused.  
"没关系，" SEELE 01 终于显露出平静下来的第一个迹象。"我们仍有资源。我们仍有希望。五年，十年，甚至几十年。MP 使徒可以重建。如果需要，我们可以发动一场由福音战士进行的战争。只要——" 突然，他的声音渐渐消失，让 SEELE 委员会剩下的十一名成员略感困惑。

"Lorenz?" SEELE 07's quizzical voice echoed in the darkened meeting room.  
"洛伦兹？" SEELE 07 疑惑的声音在昏暗的会议室中回响。

"What a surprise to meet you here, Mr. Kaji." Keel's voice came out again, hitting every other SEELE member like a truck.  
"在这里遇见你真是意外，加持先生。" 基尔的声音再次响起，像一辆卡车一样撞击着每一位 SEELE 成员。

"Kaji? How is he still alive?!"  
"加持？他怎么还活着？！"

"There's no way!" "这不可能！"

"What is he doing here? How did he find out where Keel hides at?"  
"他在这里做什么？他是怎么找到基尔藏身之处的？"

"It really took me some effort to track you down." Kaji's smug, yet carrying a dangerously low tone voice floated from the speakers, with an instinctive sound of unlocking gun safety. "And now… it's your time to pay for it. Go to hell and greet the death himself, you devil."  
"我可是费了不少劲才找到你的。" 卡吉那自满却又带着危险低沉的嗓音从扬声器中飘出，伴随着本能的枪械保险解锁声。"而现在……是时候让你为此付出代价了。下地狱去迎接死神吧，你这恶魔。"

_BANG_

The loud sound of cartridge explosion echoed in the room several times before it finally subsided. A wave of panicked chattering rippled through the room, just to be cut off by a dry cough. "Well, I wonder what are these switches for?"  
子弹爆炸的巨响在房间里回荡了几次，最终才渐渐平息。一阵恐慌的窃窃私语在房间里蔓延开来，却被一声干咳打断。"那么，这些开关是用来做什么的呢？"

"Wait, you can't-" Before SEELE 02 could get his sentence fully delivered, the monolith representing his existence went out after a clear sound of pulling the switch.  
“等等，你不能——”SEELE 02 的话还未说完，代表他存在的石碑便随着一声清晰的开关声熄灭了。

"How convenient," Kaji let out a short laugh and pulled another switch.  
"真是方便啊，" 加持轻笑一声，又拉下另一个开关。

SEELE 03's light went out as well.  
SEELE 03 的灯光也随之熄灭。

"This one...is for Asuka."  
"这个...是给明日香的。"

Pull.

SEELE 04's monolith hologram shut off along with the life-supporting devices.  
SEELE 04 的全息影像与生命维持装置一同关闭。

Ignoring the panicked reactions from the remaining monoliths, one by one, Kaji continued to pull the switches that held the lives of SEELE members. Even though he wasn't really a fan of acting as a serial murderer, he could swear he was thoroughly enjoying every single moment of it.  
无视其余全息影像的恐慌反应，Kaji 一个接一个地拉下控制 SEELE 成员生命的开关。尽管他并不热衷于扮演连环杀手的角色，但他敢发誓，他正充分享受着每一刻。

Cracking a twisted smile, Kaji pulled the switch that had SEELE 11 marked on it, leaving only SEELE 12's monolith hologram and SEELE 01 – the one he was using – standing in the darkened meeting room.  
Kaji 扭曲地笑了笑，拉下了标有 SEELE 11 的开关，只剩下 SEELE 12 的全息影像和他正在使用的 SEELE 01，矗立在昏暗的会议室中。

"Now, I have a few questions for you." Kaji's voice was deadly and piercing. "If your answer satisfies my curiosity…then maybe, just maybe, you'll live through this."  
“现在，我有几个问题要问你。”加持的声音冷酷而尖锐，“如果你的回答能满足我的好奇心……那么或许，只是或许，你能活着度过这一劫。”

The person behind SEELE 12, the chairman of the board of the Japan Heavy Chemical Industries, was already shaking like a leaf in the wind. He was the least politically experienced person among the twelve, and that's why he was SEELE 12 in the first place. The Committee only involved him for his practically limitless resource.  
SEELE 12 背后的那个人，日本重化学工业董事会的主席，已经在风中瑟瑟发抖。他是十二人中最缺乏政治经验的一个，这也是他成为 SEELE 12 的原因。委员会只因他几乎无限的资源而吸纳了他。

But it didn't change the fact that he was a capitalist, and Kaji knew as soon as there's benefit, he would switch sides faster than a tennis ball at Wimbledon.  
但这改变不了他是个资本家的事实，加持知道，只要有利益，他会比温布尔登的网球换边还快地改变立场。

"I will comply." SEELE 12 replied with a trembling voice.  
"我会遵从。" SEELE 12 颤抖着声音回答道。

"Good choice," Kaji spoke, pulling out a questionnaire he had developed for interrogation. The questions ranged from technical details such as how much resources were wasted for the project to how many crimes SEELE had committed against humanity.  
"明智的选择，" 加持说着，掏出一份他为审讯设计的问卷。问题涵盖了从项目浪费了多少资源到 SEELE 对人类犯下了多少罪行等技术细节。

After SEELE 12 had sent Kaji a detailed name list of the people they inserted into different countries' governments and the UN, the ponytailed man smirked. "Thank you for your cooperation. You have my regards."  
在 SEELE 12 向加持发送了一份详细的人员名单，包括他们安插在不同国家政府和联合国的人员后，这位马尾男子微微一笑。"感谢你的合作。向你致意。"

"M-my pleasure." SEELE 12 tried to force a smile. "It's not a-"  
"不-不客气。" SEELE 12 勉强挤出一个微笑。"这并不难-"

SEELE 12's monolith went out.  
SEELE 12 的石碑熄灭了。

"Oof," Kaji shook his head. "My hands aren't listening to me." Laughing, the triple-spy began making his way out of Keel's secret safe house with all the evidence he needed. Everyone on the name list deserved to be put to trial; as for those twelve…  
"哎呀，" 加持摇了摇头。"我的手不听使唤了。" 笑着，这位三重间谍带着所有需要的证据，开始离开基尔的秘密安全屋。名单上的每个人都应该接受审判；至于那十二位…

Kaji couldn't help but smile. By killing them through his own hands, he finally felt he could let go of his guilt and let his brother rest in peace.  
加治忍不住微笑。通过亲手杀死他们，他终于感到可以放下内疚，让弟弟安息。

Turning back and settling her eyes in the direction where the replica of the Lances of Longinus came from, Asuka could see three heavily damaged MP EVAs crawling on the ground with whatever was left of their bodies. Killing every single one of them was easy enough, but something else - no, _someone_ else was gripping her heart.  
转身望向朗基努斯之枪复制品的来源，明日香可以看到三台严重损坏的 MP EVA 在地上爬行，用它们残存的身体。杀死它们每一个都很容易，但有别的东西——不，是某个人——紧紧抓住了她的心。

Shinji. 真嗣。

Asuka gasped as she saw the sight before her. The replicas of the Lance of Longinus stuck inside the left eye, center of the chest, and right leg of the purple EVA Unit 01 as gushes of LCL dripped down from the gigantic wounds.  
明日香看到眼前的景象，倒吸了一口气。朗基努斯之枪的复制品插在紫色 EVA 初号机的左眼、胸口正中和右腿上，LCL 从巨大的伤口中喷涌而出。

She wanted to scold him for his 'heroic' actions, or simply being cold should be enough. He didn't come to help her earlier, why would he come now?  
她本想责备他那所谓的‘英雄’行为，或者仅仅因为他冷漠就足够了。他之前没来帮她，现在又为何会来？

"Isn't it a bit late for you to join us?" Asuka said; even though she wanted her voice to be sharp, it came out mellower than she intended it to be.  
“你现在加入是不是有点晚了？”明日香说道；尽管她想让语气尖锐些，却比她预期的要柔和。

Was it because the pained groans of Shinji were too hard for her to ignore?  
是因为真嗣痛苦的呻吟声让她难以忽视吗？

She didn't care about him anymore, did she?  
她不再关心他了，是吗？

Why was he still here in this world, but not on his way to the next one?  
为什么他还停留在这个世界，而不是走在通往下一个世界的路上？

"A-Asuka...I..." “A-明日香...我...”

Asuka said nothing as she pulled up the video feed to the inside of Unit 01's entry plug. She gasped, her right eye went wide as she saw Shinji's left eye mirror the wound on the EVA – a bloody hole was there replacing the cobalt orb.  
明日香一言不发地调出了零一号机插入栓内的视频。她倒吸一口凉气，右眼瞪得溜圆，只见真嗣的左眼映出了 EVA 上的伤口——原本湛蓝的眼球被一个血洞所取代。

She couldn't see any other wounds, though. But she bet they couldn't be easy.  
尽管她看不到其他伤口，但她敢肯定那些伤绝不会轻松。

He deserved it, didn't he?  
这是他应得的，不是吗？

"I don't need your help! Why are you here?!"  
"我不需要你的帮助！你为什么在这里？！"

"The Lance…it was going for your core," Shinji managed between pantings. "It would've killed you…which I'm not allowing to happen."  
"那长矛……它瞄准了你的核心，" 真嗣喘息着勉强说道。"它会杀了你……我绝不允许这种事发生。"

"But…why?" Asuka found herself unable to comprehend his actions. For all she knew, he would've left her and this world behind and gone on to another cycle, but instead, he stayed, and sacrificed something to save her. "Why? Why for me?" Asuka's eyelids dropped. "I broke my promise. I broke up with you. You shouldn't…"  
"但是……为什么？" 明日香发现自己无法理解他的行为。据她所知，他本可以离开她，离开这个世界，继续进入下一个循环，但他留了下来，为了救她而牺牲了某些东西。"为什么？为什么要为我这么做？" 明日香的眼睑垂下。"我违背了承诺。我和你分手了。你不应该……"

"Do you think it really matters?" Shinji let out a short laugh. "Being together with you is what I want…but it isn't everything. As long as you can live a happy life of your own, I am happy as well. It's what I promised."  
"你觉得这真的重要吗？" 真嗣发出一声短促的笑。"和你在一起是我想要的…但这不是全部。只要你能过上自己幸福的生活，我也就心满意足了。这是我承诺过的。"

Asuka soon found herself at a loss for words. Was it really his true thoughts? Or was he only saying it to manipulate her emotions? "Bullshit! You didn't make that promise to me! I'm just a replacement, a tool for your-"  
明日香很快发现自己无言以对。这真的是他的真实想法吗？还是他只是在操纵她的情绪？"胡说！你没对我做过那样的承诺！我只是个替代品，是你用来…"

"Asuka!" She was cut off by Shinji's abrupt call. "You're not anyone's replacement. You're just Asuka, and I don't see any of you differently!" Neither of them noticed that they were talking in the open channel, though. People on the wrecked command deck listened to their exchanges with confused expressions, unable to make sense of their conversation. "The person I love is Asuka, nothing more."  
"明日香！" 她被真嗣突如其来的呼唤打断了。"你不是任何人的替代品。你只是明日香，我对你的看法没有任何不同！" 他们俩都没注意到他们是在公开频道里交谈。残破指挥台上的人们听着他们的对话，脸上带着困惑的表情，无法理解他们的谈话。"我所爱的人是明日香，仅此而已。"

_He just...loves you... 他只是...爱你..._

The redhead bit down onto her lips. It was a fact that she had been denying, or instead, overwhelmed by the torrent of anger and hatred, that as long as Shinji stayed in this world, he would only love her forever and always.  
红发女孩咬紧了嘴唇。她一直否认这个事实，或者说，被愤怒和仇恨的洪流淹没，只要真嗣留在这个世界上，他就会永远只爱她一个人。

"Bullshit!" Asuka forced herself to violently shake off the thoughts, as hard as it was for her to do at this time. "If you really think like that, then where were you earlier? Why are you here only after...after..."  
“胡说八道！”明日香强迫自己猛烈地甩开这些念头，尽管在这个时候这样做对她来说非常困难。“如果你真的这么想，那你早些时候在哪里？为什么你只在...之后...才来这里？”

After she had to take off her eyepatch and became an Angel?  
在她不得不摘下眼罩并成为天使之后？

Or was it something else?  
还是说另有原因？

"I..." What was he going to say, though? How could he explain his _conversation_ with his mother in the short time the situation allowed, anyway?  
“我……” 他本想说些什么呢？无论如何，在有限的时间内，他该如何解释与母亲的那番对话呢？

"It was a problem on our side," Maya's voice suddenly cut in. "Pilot Ikari...Shinji, was in the EVA long ago. But it won't activate. He really wanted it to move, Asuka, but it wouldn't...but in the end, he did something, something I've never seen before from the readings, to get it to activate."  
"这是我们这边的问题，"真希的声音突然切入。"碇司令...真嗣，很早就进入了 EVA。但它无法启动。他真的很想让它动起来，明日香，但它就是不行...但最终，他做了些什么，从读数上看，我从未见过这样的事情，让它启动了。"

So, he didn't abandon her...  
所以，他并没有抛弃她...

It was nothing like she thought.  
这与她所想的完全不同。

But, did it really matter right now?  
但，现在这真的重要吗？

Her train of thoughts was interrupted by the sudden pain that shot through her body that originated from her left eye.  
她的思绪被突然袭来的剧痛打断，这痛楚源自她的左眼，贯穿全身。

Shinji groaned as he tried to endure the excruciating pain that shot through his body. Being impaled by the fake Lance of Longinus wasn't really a strange sensation to him, though it didn't help soothe the pain by the slightest.  
真嗣呻吟着，试图忍受那穿透全身的剧痛。被假的长枪隆基努斯刺中对他来说并不陌生，但这丝毫不能减轻痛苦。

Even though he knew those wounds would leave scars – he saw them on Asuka at the red beach, he didn't really think it relevant right now.  
尽管他知道这些伤痕会留下疤痕——他在红海滩上看到了明日香身上的那些，但他此刻并不觉得这有什么相关性。

Because he could hear Asuka screaming.  
因为他能听到明日香在尖叫。

"Asuka? Asuka!" Shinji cried as he pulled up the video feed to the inside of Unit 02's entry plug. He gasped with his eyes widened as he saw what's happening to Asuka – the first thing he noticed was the lack of eyepatch, and subsequently, her glowing left eye. He felt his blood run cold as the dawning horror of realization struck him.  
"明日香？明日香！" 真嗣呼喊着，将视频信号切换到二号机的插入栓内部。他瞪大了眼睛，倒吸一口凉气，目睹了明日香的遭遇——首先映入眼帘的是她缺失的眼罩，紧接着是她闪烁着光芒的左眼。当意识到这一切的恐怖真相时，他感到血液仿佛凝固了。

Asuka was turning into an Angel.  
明日香正在变成使徒。

"No!" Shinji shouted, desperately trying to do something but couldn't come up with anything. It was a situation he had never met before. "Asuka!"  
“不！” 真嗣大喊道，拼命想要做些什么却想不出任何办法。这是他从未遇到过的情况。“明日香！”

He didn't get any replies as Asuka continued to scream in agony, arching her back as intolerable and indescribable foreign sensations shot through her fragile young body.  
他没有收到任何回应，因为明日香继续在痛苦中尖叫，她的背部弯曲，难以忍受且无法言喻的异样感觉贯穿了她脆弱的年轻身躯。

Maybe it was after an hour, or merely seconds before Asuka's screams finally faded into gasps and groans. "Sh-Shinji…" She managed between heavy breathes. "I'm…sorry…"  
或许过了一个小时，又或许只是几秒钟，明日香的尖叫声终于转为喘息和呻吟。“真-真嗣……”她喘着粗气勉强说道，“我……对不起……”

Shinji didn't know what to do, or even what to say. He kind of forgot about the possibility that Asuka could turn into an Angel at this point since she had been acting so normally for a long time.  
真嗣不知道该做什么，甚至不知道该说什么。由于明日香长时间以来一直表现得非常正常，他几乎忘记了她在此刻可能变成使徒的可能性。

"Asuka…" Even though Shinji's volume was relatively low, his heart inside was raging like the center of a hurricane. He didn't know what to do with Asuka as an Angel. Was he supposed to kill her, kill someone he loved by his own hands? He had done it before with Kaworu, though his feelings toward him, when compared to Asuka, were like comparing a grain of sand to the entire planet.  
"明日香……" 尽管真嗣的声音相对较低，但他的内心却如同飓风中心般狂暴。他不知道该如何面对作为使徒的明日香。难道他应该亲手杀死她，杀死自己所爱的人吗？他曾对渚薰这样做过，但与明日香相比，他对渚薰的感情简直如同将一粒沙子与整个星球相比较。

Slowly, Shinji took out the trigger.  
慢慢地，真嗣拿出了扳机。

Asuka could see his actions through the video feed. A sad smile crossed her face. "Shinji, you don't need-"  
明日香通过视频画面看到了他的举动。一丝哀伤的微笑掠过她的脸庞。“真嗣，你不需要——”

He threw the device against the entry plug interior with all of his might.  
他用尽全力将设备扔向插入栓内部。

The plastic remote control shattered and broke into small pieces.  
塑料遥控器碎裂成小块。

"Asuka, I'm not giving up on you."  
"明日香，我不会放弃你的。"

"You don't get it, Shinji," Asuka let out a sad chuckle, touching the DSS Choker around her neck with her hand. "I am the last Angel, this is the only way."  
"你不懂，真嗣，"" 明日香苦笑一声，用手轻触颈间的 DSS 项圈。""我是最后的使徒，这是唯一的办法。"

"No Asuka!" Shinji shouted. "We've saved you before! We can do it again!"  
"不，明日香！"" 真嗣大喊。""我们以前救过你！我们可以再做一次！"

"But…Dr. Akagi… she's there when the Central Dogma exploded…" Maya's shaky voice came to them through the speakers, putting out Shinji's last bit of hope.  
“但…赤木博士…她是在中央教条爆炸时在那里的…” 真嗣的最后一丝希望随着扬声器中传来玛雅颤抖的声音而破灭。

Asuka let out another pained yelp, taking several deep breathes before she spoke up again. "I'm sorry Shinji…that I wanted to break up with you. I never wanted to leave you, but I was so confused and angry…I wanted to prove myself that I could be independent, and now I'm paying my debt for it…"  
明日香再次痛苦地叫了一声，深呼吸了几下后才再次开口。“对不起，真嗣…我曾想和你分手。我从没想过离开你，但我当时太困惑和愤怒了…我想证明自己能独立，现在我为此付出了代价…”

It was the end...so why wouldn't she be honest with him?  
一切都要结束了…所以她为何不对他坦诚相待呢？

"Please stop Asuka," Shinji said in a pleading voice. He wanted to move over and pull her out of the entry plug, but his EVA was impaled to the ground by the replica of the Lance of Longinus. "I understand why you did it! I never held it against you!"  
“请停下来，明日香，”真嗣用恳求的语气说道。他想挪过去把她从插入栓里拉出来，但他的 EVA 被仿制的朗基努斯之枪钉在了地上。“我理解你为什么这么做！我从没有因此怨恨你！”

"This is the end, really…" Asuka said as she touched several specific places on the DSS Choker, activating it as how Dr. Akagi had instructed her to do. "Up until now, I don't think I deserve to live anymore…if I stay alive, I'm robbing everyone else's future away." As she spoke, the DSS Choker started to lit up, a dozen rhombus-shaped columns started circling around Asuka's neck. "Perhaps not including your future…I mean, you can still meet the next me, right? I bet you've been through this many times, this should be just another Thursday."  
“这真的是终点了…”明日香说着，触摸了 DSS 项圈上的几个特定位置，按照赤木律子博士的指示激活了它。“直到现在，我觉得自己已经不配再活下去了…如果我继续活着，就是在剥夺其他人未来的机会。”她说话间，DSS 项圈开始亮起，十几根菱形柱围绕着她的脖子旋转。“也许不包括你的未来…我是说，你还能遇到下一个我，对吧？我猜你已经经历过很多次了，这应该只是又一个星期四。”

She chuckled. 她轻声笑了。

"It's just that…I don't want things between _us_, to end like this…"  
"只是……我不希望我们之间的关系就这样结束……"

Shinji listened in silence as he found himself unable to come up with a single word.  
真嗣沉默地听着，发现自己一个字也说不出来。

"Maybe you never saw me differently, but I can't think of it that way. I am different from _other_ Asukas."  
"也许你从未以不同的眼光看待我，但我无法那样想。我和其他的明日香不一样。"

"I don't want you to think that _I_ hated you when you think of _me..."_  
"我不想让你想起我时，以为我恨你……"

"In fact, I never did. I just…" Asuka sighed. "You gave me the happiest period of my entire life…I never thought I'd need anything else other than my EVA, but you proved me wrong. I could never thank you enough for it."  
"事实上，我从未恨过你。我只是……" 明日香叹了口气。"你给了我一生中最快乐的时光……我从未想过除了我的 EVA 还需要别的什么，但你让我改变了想法。我永远无法为此感谢你足够多。"

"Asuka…" "明日香…"

The entire command deck fell in utter silence as they listened to the likely last exchange between the two lovers. The girls soon found their faces wet, though they weren't surprised. Aoba and Makoto simply stared at their screens, feeling the tsunami of sadness wash over them. There were questions, but they could wait.  
整个指挥舱陷入了彻底的沉默，他们聆听着这对恋人可能的最后一次交流。女孩们很快发现自己的脸颊湿润了，尽管她们并不惊讶。青叶和真希波只是盯着他们的屏幕，感受着悲伤的海啸席卷而来。有些问题，但它们可以等待。

The redhead could feel the pressure around her neck start to build up along with intensified heat. "The painting you drew for me…I didn't destroy it. I put it in my drawer. Maybe you can bring it to your next…life? If you can't, I want you to promise…my last request for you…that you will draw another one for the next me…alright? I like it so much...I'm sure she'll like it, too."  
红发女子能感觉到颈部的压力逐渐增大，伴随着愈发强烈的热度。“你为我画的那幅画……我没有毁掉它。我把它放在抽屉里了。也许你可以在你的下一世带来它？如果不行，我想要你承诺……我对你最后的请求……你会为下一个我再画一幅……好吗？我非常喜欢它……我相信她也会喜欢的。”

"Just...be more honest with her, okay?"  
“只是……对她更坦诚些，好吗？”

"I…I promise." Shinji replied almost on autopilot as he refused to believe what was happening.  
“我……我承诺。”真嗣几乎是下意识地回答，他拒绝相信眼前发生的一切。

What else could he say, though?  
他还能说什么呢？

"Maybe…maybe _she_'ll never forgive you…" Even though Asuka didn't specify who she was, Shinji knew perfectly well whom she was referring to.  
“也许……也许她永远不会原谅你……”尽管明日香没有指明是谁，但真嗣很清楚她指的是谁。

"I can forgive you, Shinji."  
“我可以原谅你，真嗣。”

The brightness of the DSS Choker made a sharp increase as it exploded.  
DSS 项圈的亮度急剧增加，随后爆炸了。

People say when one's about to die, their whole life would flash before their eyes like a slideshow. Asuka smiled as her happy life moments with Shinji displayed. She had never thought she could ever be happy again, but one person proved it wrong.  
人们常说，当一个人即将死去时，他们的整个人生会像幻灯片一样在眼前闪现。明日香微笑着，看着与真嗣共度的快乐时光一幕幕展现。她从未想过自己还能再次感到幸福，但有一个人证明了这是可能的。

It was enough for her, wasn't it?  
这对她来说已经足够了，不是吗？

XXXXXX

With a blinding flash of light, the video feed to Unit 02 shut off before the giant mech slumped over. Shinji stared at the whole scene in utter silence.  
随着一道刺眼的光芒闪过，02 号机甲的视频信号突然中断，巨大的机甲随之倾倒。真嗣凝视着这一幕，完全陷入了沉默。

"Pilot Soryu…her life signs are gone…"  
“丽……她的生命迹象消失了……”

Maya's words didn't really register in his mind, though. His brain just shut off to protect itself from taking more damage.  
尽管如此，玛雅的话并没有真正进入他的脑海。他的大脑只是关闭了，以保护自己免受更多的伤害。

Just like Asuka said, he had seen her die many times before, it should be nothing to him already, shouldn't it?  
正如明日香所说，他之前已经多次目睹她的死亡，这应该对他来说已经不算什么了，不是吗？

But why did every time it happen, it would only hurt more?  
但为什么每次发生时，只会让他更加痛苦？

This time, they had won. They defeated the EVA series. They were on the victorious side in the endgame. The third Impact was averted. Lilith was destroyed, and he could demolish Adam easily. Everything would return to normal.  
这一次，他们赢了。他们击败了 EVA 系列。他们在最终游戏中站在了胜利的一方。第三次冲击被阻止了。莉莉丝被摧毁，而他可以轻易地消灭亚当。一切都将恢复正常。

He could finally live a normal life as a teenager without anything EVA-related. He could meet new people, establish a family, maybe even-  
他终于可以作为一个普通青少年生活，不再与 EVA 有任何瓜葛。他可以结识新朋友，建立家庭，甚至可能——

But Asuka would never be in this world anymore.  
但明日香将永远不会再存在于这个世界上了。

After all he had been through…  
毕竟他经历了那么多……

The only thing that mattered to him was only one person.  
对他来说，唯一重要的只有一个人。

Fortunately, he knew there was one way to deal with it.  
幸运的是，他知道有一种方法可以应对。

Shinji willed Unit 01 to put both of its hands around the replica of the Lance of Longinus that had its tip stuck on the purple EVA's chest.  
真嗣命令初号机用双手环绕住那把长枪的复制品，其尖端刺入了紫色 EVA 的胸膛。

"Shinji! What are you doing?!" Misato's frantic cries came through the speakers, though he barely paid attention to them. He would leave this world to the people that deserved it.  
“真嗣！你在做什么？！”美里透过扬声器传来的焦急呼喊，但他几乎没去理会。他要把这个世界留给那些值得拥有它的人。

This way, Adam would be destroyed as well. Without Lilith and Adam, the people in this world could finally live safely and normally.  
这样一来，亚当也会被摧毁。没有了莉莉丝和亚当，这个世界的人们终于可以安全、正常地生活了。

With a sad smile, Shinji started to push the Lance into Unit 01's core.  
带着一丝苦笑，真嗣开始将长枪推进零号机的核心。

Just as the Lance was about to penetrate the core along with the entry plug behind it, time seemed to slow down as Yui's voice echoed through the cockpit.  
正当长枪即将刺入核心，连同背后的插入栓一起，时间仿佛慢了下来，Yui 的声音在驾驶舱内回荡。

_Have you finally done it? Is this the world you want? Without Third Impact happening?  
你终于做到了吗？这就是你想要的世界吗？没有第三次冲击发生？_

He had to admit, though, that saving the world from Third Impact was indeed his very first objective. It was only after so many cycles of pain and sorrow he changed his motives.  
他不得不承认，拯救世界免于第三次冲击确实是他的首要目标。只是在经历了无数次的痛苦与悲伤之后，他的动机才发生了变化。

_Yes…_ So He thought. _But…_  
是的…他曾这样想。但是…

_But at what cost? 但代价是什么？_

_Everything… 一切…_

_I've lost everything…everything that matters to me in this world…  
我失去了所有……这个世界上对我至关重要的所有……_

"I'll see you around, Asuka…"  
“我们还会再见面的，明日香……”

The replica of the Lance pierced through.  
那把长枪的复制品贯穿了过来。

Shinji's vision turned white.  
真嗣的视野变得一片空白。

XXXXXX

## *Chapter 44*: Chapter 44: Fulfillment  
*第四十四章*: 第四十四章：圆满

Disclaimer: I do not own Evangelion.  
免责声明：我不拥有《新世纪福音战士》。

**Chapter 44: Fulfillment 第四十四章：圆满**

Shinji Ikari stared at the black speaker held in his left hand with lifeless eyes. To him, Asuka's death had just happened mere minutes ago. Tears won't come, though. His tears had already run dry by the time, after all the hardships and ordeals he had been through.  
碇真嗣无神地凝视着左手中的黑色扬声器。对他而言，明日香的死仿佛就发生在几分钟前。然而，泪水却无法涌出。毕竟，经历了那么多磨难与考验，他的泪水早已流尽。

He had been crying when he saw Asuka die during early cycles, but he soon found it unnecessary. It wasn't like he could change anything. The only thing he could do was bury the pain at the deepest level of his heart, clean out the wounds, and move on to his new chance.  
他在早期循环中目睹明日香死去时曾哭泣过，但很快发现这并无必要。他无法改变任何事。唯一能做的，便是将痛苦深埋心底，清理伤口，然后迎接新的机会。

But…he was so close…  
但是……他离得那么近……

He had saved the world…at the cost of losing his own world.  
他拯救了世界……却失去了自己的世界。

Was it a worthy trade?  
这是值得的交易吗？

Where could he ever find his redemption? From _her_?  
他能在何处寻得救赎？从她那里？

Shinji's grip on the speaker was so tight that the plastic material began to creak. He didn't need to hear what it was saying. He had heard it so many times that he could practically speak the lines with the exact tone.  
真嗣紧握着话筒，塑料材质因压力而发出吱吱声。他不需要听对方说什么，这些话他已经听过无数次，几乎能用同样的语调背诵出来。

He had failed. Again. Well, not exactly a complete failure – for the first time ever since his loops started, one of the worlds was saved. People in there could live their normal lives without the threat of Angels anymore. Lilith and Adam were both destroyed; they couldn't build more EVAs even if they wanted.  
他又失败了。又一次。不过，这并非彻底的失败——自他的循环开始以来，这是第一次有一个世界被拯救。那里的人们可以过上正常生活，不再受使徒威胁。莉莉丝和亚当都被摧毁了；即使他们想，也无法再制造更多的 EVA。

But... 但是...

"I'm sorry…Asuka…" Sighing, he placed the speaker back onto the telephone.  
“对不起……明日香……”他叹了口气，将话筒放回电话上。

Turning his head to the direction where he knew Ayanami's phantom vision would show up, Shinji waited for the insignia of the start of a new cycle. Taking a deep inhale, he thought of what should he do in this new cycle.  
转头望向心中知晓绫波幻影会出现的方向，真嗣等待着新循环开始的标志。深吸一口气，他思索着在这个新循环中应该做些什么。

He had to admit, though, that working with his father, at least on the surface, turned out better than he had initially thought. Gendo Ikari had been nothing but helpful. Every time Asuka got hurt was because of nothing but his own careless actions.  
不过，他不得不承认，至少表面上与父亲合作的结果比他最初预想的要好。碇源堂一直都很帮忙。每次明日香受伤，都是因为他自己的疏忽大意。

"What are you doing here, young boy?"  
“你在这里做什么，小男孩？”

Shinji snapped his head around, just to see an unfamiliar old man standing not far away from him and looking at him with a slightly irritated expression. "You've been standing here for a long time. Have you finished your call already?"  
真嗣猛地转过头，只见一位陌生的老人站在不远处，带着些许不悦的表情看着他。“你在这里站了很久了。电话打完了吗？”

Shinji frowned. This wasn't right. He had never seen this man ever before. What's stranger, Rei Ayanami's phantom vision hadn't appeared yet.  
真嗣皱起眉头。这不对劲。他从未见过这个男人。更奇怪的是，绫波零的幻影还未出现。

It didn't really matter to him, though, because Sachiel was showing up at any moment. "Sorry for the inconvenience, Mister, but I think you'd better find a shelter."  
不过这对他来说并不重要，因为萨基尔随时都可能出现。“抱歉给您添麻烦了，先生，但我想您最好找个避难所。”

"A shelter?" The old man's expression turned confused. "What for? We aren't in a war."  
"避难所？" 老人的表情变得困惑。"为什么？我们又不在打仗。"

Of course they weren't in an ordinary war. How could he even explain to him that there would be some extraterrestrial creatures that wanted to wipe out the entire humanity for their own survival, anyway? "Haven't you heard the alarms?"  
当然，他们所处的并非寻常战争。他该如何向老人解释，会有一些外星生物为了自己的生存而企图灭绝全人类呢？"你没听到警报声吗？"

"Alarms?" The old man's frown deepened. "Haven't heard one of them since World War two."  
"警报声？" 老人的眉头皱得更深了。"自从二战以来，我就没听到过那种东西。"

Shinji blinked. There was definitely something wrong. He reached to his pocket, trying to take out the picture Misato sent him for identification purposes.  
真嗣眨了眨眼。肯定有什么不对劲。他伸手去口袋里，试图拿出美里为了识别目的寄给他的照片。

And found nothing. 却发现什么都没有。

Wide-eyed, Shinji snapped his head back at the telephone booth, picked up the speaker, and dialed Misato's number.  
瞪大眼睛，真嗣猛地回头看向电话亭，拿起话筒，拨通了美里的号码。

_"Du…Du…Sorry, the number you dialed is unallocated…(music)…Hey there! Thanks for using this landline service provided by Hakone Suburban local government. If you have any questions…"  
"嘟…嘟…对不起，您拨打的号码是空号…(音乐)…嗨！感谢您使用箱根郊区政府提供的固定电话服务。如果您有任何疑问…"_

"I'm sorry," said Shinji as he dashed away from the telephone booth as if he got an electronic shock, leaving a very confused elder standing in front of the telephone booth.  
"对不起，" 真嗣说着，像被电击了一样从电话亭冲了出去，留下一位非常困惑的老人站在电话亭前。

XXXXXX

Running down the busy street full of people, Shinji's heart raced – not only because of the amount of movement he was making, but also that he couldn't make sense of his surroundings. Shouldn't they all be in shelters right now? And why hadn't Sachiel attacked yet?  
在挤满人群的繁忙街道上奔跑，真嗣的心跳加速——不仅是因为他正在进行的运动量，还因为他无法理解周围的环境。他们现在不应该都在避难所里吗？而且为什么萨基尔还没有发动攻击？

As he went past more city areas that people he asked called _Hakone_, Shinji could notice significant differences in the surroundings from what he had remembered. Buildings were taller, there were more cars and people, not to mention the lack of wreckage and flooding.  
当他穿过更多被询问者称为箱根的城市区域时，真嗣能明显察觉到周围环境与他记忆中的大相径庭。建筑物更高了，车辆和行人也更多，更不用说没有废墟和洪水了。

What the hell is going on?  
这到底是怎么回事？

After almost half an hour of non-stop running, Shinji finally became exhausted and fell down on a small lawn at a corner inside a park. He didn't even know what he was supposed to do, or where to go. He could go to where the Geofront was supposed to be, but he doubted he had to go there on foot.  
在近乎半小时的不停奔跑后，真嗣终于筋疲力尽，跌坐在公园一角的一片小草坪上。他甚至不知道自己该做什么，该去哪里。他本可以去到地底都市原本所在的地方，但他怀疑自己是否需要徒步前往。

After all, he didn't bring that much money with him.  
毕竟，他并没有带太多钱在身上。

"Damn it." “该死。”

Did the Geofront even _exist_ anymore?  
地底都市还存在吗？

What changed to cause such a massive ramification?  
是什么变化导致了如此巨大的影响？

But where else was he supposed to go?  
但他还能去哪儿呢？

It was only then Shinji realized the irony of his situation. He was a time traveler that could literally decide the fate of the entire world under several circumstances, a person who had his foot stepped on the doorway to godhood. And now he had to worry about his survival because he might starve to death if he didn't get food soon enough.  
直到那时，真嗣才意识到自己处境的讽刺之处。他是一个能决定世界命运的时间旅行者，在某些情况下，他甚至踏入了神性的门槛。而现在，他却不得不担心自己的生存问题，因为如果不能及时找到食物，他可能会饿死。

Fortunately, no Angel alarms also meant that the trains were working fine. Slowly, Shinji dragged his feet toward the train station.  
幸运的是，没有使徒警报也意味着列车运行正常。慢慢地，真嗣拖着脚步向车站走去。

Unsurprisingly, there wasn't even a station called Tokyo-3.  
不出所料，连个叫第三新东京市的车站都没有。

Perhaps getting on the train that would go to "downtown direction" was a good idea.  
或许搭乘前往“市中心方向”的列车是个好主意。

Sitting quietly with his SDAT in hand, Shinji tried his best to ignore the scenes people around him were making. He felt like it was the first time all over again - when he ran away from the EVA after the fight against the Fourth Angel.  
静静地坐着，手里握着 SDAT，真嗣尽力忽视周围人们制造的场景。他感觉仿佛一切又回到了原点——那次在与第四使徒战斗后逃离 EVA 的时刻。

He wanted to shut himself off from the people around him. He just wanted to be left alone and think about his future – or rather, where he's going to have his next meal.  
他想要将自己与周围的人隔离开来。他只想独自一人，思考自己的未来——或者更确切地说，下一顿饭去哪里吃。

Even though Shinji had acquired dozens of skills during his cycles, his age was still below legal working age in Japan. No mattered how skilled he was in cooking, there was no way a restaurant would just hire and pay him against the law.  
尽管真嗣在多个周期中掌握了数十种技能，但他的年龄仍未达到日本法定工作年龄。无论他在烹饪上有多么熟练，没有一家餐厅会违法雇佣并支付他薪水。

Shinji kept his gaze directed at the outside through the window as the train clattered across the landscape. There were no signs of destruction or apocalypse, only prosperity and life.  
真嗣透过车窗凝视着外面的景色，火车在风景中咔嗒咔嗒地行驶。没有毁灭或末日的迹象，只有繁荣与生命。

A world he had never seen ever before.  
这是一个他从未见过的世界。

He could only find solace from the fact that at least the date shown on the train's calendar was correct.  
他只能从火车日历上显示的日期是正确的这一事实中找到些许安慰。

As the train approached its destination, Shinji could start to recognize familiar terrains such as mountains and rivers. Though something else was still missing – the turrets, missile launchers, weaponry buildings, and EVA launch shafts.  
随着列车接近目的地，真嗣开始能辨认出熟悉的山川地形。然而，有些东西依然缺失——炮塔、导弹发射器、武器建筑以及 EVA 发射井。

Only a small city stood there.  
那里仅矗立着一座小城。

_"Dear passengers, we're approaching Hakone Railway Station. Please check your baggage and make sure to…"  
“尊敬的乘客们，我们即将抵达箱根火车站。请检查您的行李，并确保……”_

The mechanical voice that came out of the PA system brought Shinji back to reality. Thankfully the train station he could identify very well – it looked almost exactly like the station he came to when he tried to ran away the first time.  
从 PA 系统传出的机械声音将真嗣拉回了现实。幸运的是，这个火车站他非常熟悉——它看起来几乎和他第一次试图逃跑时到达的那个车站一模一样。

Which also meant he could find his way to the Geofront entrances…  
这也意味着他能找到通往 Geofront 入口的路……

But Shinji knew he would never find them. Because the Geofront didn't exist anymore.  
但真嗣知道他永远找不到它们。因为 Geofront 已经不复存在了。

He still had to get off the train, though. Sighing, Shinji exited the train station and began wandering aimlessly around the city. The natural sights were all there, Lake Ashi, the hills – but everything else was different.  
尽管如此，他还是得下火车。叹了口气，真嗣走出火车站，开始在城市中漫无目的地游荡。自然景观依旧，芦之湖、山丘——但其他一切都变了。

Tokyo-3 possessed several skyscrapers. But right now, none was in sight.  
第三新东京市拥有几座摩天大楼。但此刻，一座也看不见。

"I hate this," Shinji mumbled to himself. He had already remembered every street of Tokyo-3 and important places. He might as well be a human Navigation app, but now he didn't even know the name of the road he was walking on. The only thing he could do was walk in a general direction – a direction he chose after a serious thought.  
“我讨厌这样，”真嗣自言自语道。他已经记住了第三新东京市的每一条街道和重要地点。他几乎可以算是一个人形导航应用了，但现在他甚至不知道自己走的路叫什么名字。他唯一能做的就是朝着一个大致的方向走——这个方向是他经过深思熟虑后选择的。

The Katsuragi Residence. 葛城宅邸。

XXXXXX

"Gods be praised!" Shinji exclaimed as the familiar apartment complex came into his field of view. Even though he could still notice several discrepancies from his memories, it was the only thing he could recognize in the city so far.  
"感谢神明！" 真嗣惊叹道，当熟悉的公寓楼映入眼帘。尽管他仍能察觉到与记忆中的些许差异，但这是他在城市中迄今唯一能辨认出的地方。

Though Shinji's face quickly fell as a more realistic idea showed up in his mind. For all he knew, the differences in this world were so enormous it might as well be sky and earth. The only reason Misato came to Tokyo-3 was that she wanted to have her revenge against the Angels. Why would she come to such a remote place if – no matter how much he had a hard time believing – that Angels weren't even a thing?  
尽管如此，当一个更现实的念头浮现在脑海时，真嗣的脸色迅速黯淡下来。据他所知，这个世界的差异如此巨大，简直可以说是天壤之别。Misato 来到第三新东京市的唯一原因，是她想要向使徒复仇。如果——尽管他很难相信——使徒根本不存在，她又为何会来到这样一个偏远之地呢？

Still, it wasn't like there was another place he could go to, was there?  
不过，他也没有其他地方可去，不是吗？

He could go to his school, of course, assuming it still existed. The purpose wasn't going to be anything else but merely checking how much of the world had changed. Since it seemed like there were no EVAs anymore, class 2-A, a class full of potential pilots, wouldn't exist anymore, right?  
他当然可以去他的学校，假设它还存在的话。此行的目的无非是看看世界究竟改变了多少。既然似乎已经没有 EVA 了，那么充满潜在驾驶员的 2-A 班，也就不复存在了吧？

Was he supposed to meet new people from now on? Shinji didn't really find himself scared of the idea, though. He had already mastered the art of social interactions, he was sure that he could make new friends if he wanted.  
从今往后，他是否应该结识新朋友呢？不过，真嗣并不觉得这个想法令他害怕。他确信自己已经掌握了社交的艺术，只要愿意，交到新朋友对他来说不成问题。

But did it really matter?  
但这一切真的重要吗？

After all, the only person he cared about was _her._  
毕竟，他唯一在乎的人就是她。

Where was she? Did she even _exist?_  
她在哪里？她真的存在吗？

Violently shaking the dark thoughts off, Shinji made his way to the elevator. The apartment building, aside from certain differences in the patterns, possessed much more residents as well.  
猛地甩开那些阴暗的思绪，真嗣走向电梯。这座公寓楼，除了某些图案上的差异外，住户也多了不少。

It was understandable, though. The main reason people left this area was because of the Angel attacks. Now that those things weren't a concern anymore, no reason for people to not live in such a cost-effective place.  
不过这可以理解。人们离开这个地区的主要原因是因为使徒的袭击。既然那些东西不再是问题，没有理由不选择这样一个性价比高的地方居住。

The elevator door slid open with a screeching metal sound. Shinji walked toward the door where the Katsuragi Residence was supposed to be, no hurry in his pace since he knew it wouldn't change the outcome. Though it didn't get him rid of the nervous feeling that intensified with each passing moment.  
电梯门伴随着刺耳的金属摩擦声缓缓打开。真嗣走向本应是葛城家所在的门口，步伐并不匆忙，因为他知道这不会改变结果。尽管如此，随着时间的推移，他越发紧张的感觉并未因此减轻。

"Hey, Shinji-kun!" “嘿，真嗣君！”

Hearing the familiar voice, the boy snapped his head around, just to see Misato Katsuragi standing in the hallway and looking at him with a smile. She wore some type of uniform, but from the lack of stripe and stars on her shoulder, Shinji knew it wasn't a military uniform.  
听到熟悉的声音，男孩猛地转过头，只见葛城美里站在走廊里，微笑着看着他。她穿着某种制服，但从肩上没有条纹和星星来看，真嗣知道那不是军装。

At first, he didn't even know what he should feel. Perhaps he should be happy about it, that Misato existed, and apparently, she knew him. Or, maybe precisely because Misato knew him, he probably should feel scared about it.  
起初，他甚至不知道自己应该有什么感觉。也许他应该为此感到高兴，美里存在，而且显然，她认识他。或者，正是因为美里认识他，他可能应该为此感到害怕。

"Ah, hi, Misato-san," Shinji made a hasty reply and waited for her to continued their conversation, not knowing what he was supposed to say.  
“啊，嗨，美里小姐，”真嗣匆忙回应，等待她继续对话，不知道自己该说什么。

At least, Misato wasn't surprised to see him here. It's probably a good thing.  
至少，美里看到他在这里并不惊讶。这可能是件好事。

Misato let out a chuckle, waving her hand. "What are you doing here, anyway? Now it's weekend, you can't be here for homework help, can you?"  
美里轻笑一声，挥了挥手。“你在这里做什么呢？现在可是周末，你总不会是来求助作业的吧？”

Homework help? A frown crossed Shinji's face. Even if the homework part was at least understandable since technically he was still a teenager at schooling age, how could Misato help him with his homework, anyway? "No, actually…" Suddenly an idea flashed into Shinji's mind. "I'm lost and can't get back to my home."  
作业辅导？真嗣皱起了眉头。尽管从技术上讲，他仍处于上学年龄，作业部分尚可理解，但 Misato 究竟如何能帮他完成作业呢？“不，实际上……”突然，一个念头闪过真嗣的脑海。“我迷路了，找不到回家的路。”

It was indeed a risky play, though. He only did it since now that he knew the Katsuragi Residence wasn't his home here.  
这确实是一场冒险的举动，不过。他之所以这么做，是因为他现在知道高坂家并不是他在这里的家。

"Eh?" Misato showed him a clear surprised expression. "Are you okay today, Shinji-kun?" She reached out to him with her hand and put it on his forehead, testing his temperature. "No fever…weird."  
“诶？”美里露出明显的惊讶表情，“你今天还好吗，真嗣君？”她伸手摸了摸他的额头，试探他的体温，“没有发烧……奇怪。”

Shinji pulled away from her in exasperation. "I feel fine, Misato-san, just…a bit lost." He said, executing his technically true maneuver.  
真嗣有些恼火地躲开了她，“我感觉很好，美里小姐，只是……有点迷茫。”他说道，执行了他那句技术上真实的操作。

"But you never got lost before, and your home is several kilometers that way, away from the downtown area," now it was Misato's turn to be confused. "You came here before, how could you-"  
"但你以前从未迷路过，你的家在那边几公里外，远离市中心区域，" 现在轮到美里困惑了。"你之前来过这里，怎么可能-"

"Thank you, Misato-san!" Shinji cut her off. He didn't need to raise more suspicion than he already did. Not to mention that only one residential area he could remember resided in that direction.  
"谢谢你，美里小姐！" 真嗣打断了她。他不需要引起更多的怀疑，更不用说，他只记得那个方向有一个住宅区。

Rei Ayanami's apartments.  
绫波丽的公寓。

Shinji's eyes lit up as the apartment complexes came into his field of view. Thankfully, the buildings looked nothing like Rei's apartment other than the unmistakable shape. There were clearly many people living in there, and the exterior of the building looked new and well-flourished.  
当公寓楼群映入眼帘时，真嗣的眼睛亮了起来。幸运的是，这些建筑除了那明显的形状外，与绫波的公寓毫无相似之处。显然，这里居住着许多人，建筑外观新颖且保养得很好。

As he approached the community, people he couldn't even recognize started giving him greetings, from simple nods to vocal ones. He greeted back, of course, but without the mention of their names – it wasn't like he knew them in the first place.  
当他走近社区时，一些他甚至认不出的人开始向他打招呼，从简单的点头到出声问候。他当然也回以问候，但没有提及他们的名字——毕竟他原本就不认识他们。

Though it was a good sign – apparently, he was getting close to his' home'.  
尽管这是个好迹象——显然，他离自己的'家'越来越近了。

"Hey, Shin-man!" Just as he walked past the entrance of one of the buildings, the familiar Toji's voice reached him from inside. "Where did you go? Ken and I came to find you, and you weren't home!"  
"嘿，真嗣！" 正当他走过一栋建筑的入口时，从里面传来了熟悉的战士（Toji）的声音。"你去哪儿了？我和剑介来找你，你却不在家！"

If anything, Shinji only found himself relaxed that he didn't need to worry about not knowing where his home was anymore. Knowing that Toji and Kensuke existed and were obviously friends with him was good, but for now, it was pretty low on his concern list. "I had…some business to attend to," said Shinji as he entered the building. "Good to see you today, guys."  
如果说有什么让他感到放松的话，那就是他不再需要担心不知道自己的家在哪里了。知道托吉和剑介存在并且显然是他的朋友是件好事，但目前，这在他的担忧清单上排名相当低。"我有些事情要处理，"真嗣说着走进了建筑。"今天见到你们真好，伙计们。"

"Yeah, and we came here today because Ken's going to…ah, film warship Atago that would be docking tomorrow," Toji said after they entered the elevator and pressed the button.  
"是啊，我们今天来这里是因为剑介要……呃，拍摄明天将要停靠的驱逐舰爱宕，" 托吉在他们进入电梯并按下按钮后说道。"

"It's a DDG, not _warship,_" Kensuke gave him an exasperated look.  
“这是驱逐舰，不是战舰。”健介无奈地看了他一眼。

"It's a ship built for war, so it's a warship," Toji countered.  
“这是一艘为战争而建的船，所以它是一艘战舰。”透司反驳道。

Kensuke shrugged, giving up on getting the way of military otaku through Toji's thick skull.  
健介耸了耸肩，放弃了向冬二那颗顽固的军事宅脑袋灌输理念。

Moments later, the elevator arrived at the floor which Toji chose, the trio then exited the box and headed off. During the entire process, Shinji simply followed his friends' steps since he had no idea which one was his home.  
片刻后，电梯到达了 Toji 选择的楼层，三人随即走出电梯，继续前行。整个过程中，Shinji 只是默默跟随朋友们的步伐，因为他根本不知道哪一间是自己的家。

His question was soon answered as they came to a stop in front of a door that had a nameplate with 'Ikari Residence' imprinted on it.  
他的疑问很快得到了解答，因为他们停在了一扇门前，门上的名牌上刻着'碇宅'的字样。

"Coming!" A female voice called out from inside the room.  
“来了！”房间内传来一个女性的声音。

听到这个声音，真嗣不由得打了个寒颤，他立刻认出了这是谁的声音。

门缓缓滑开，站在门口的是面带微笑的碇唯，她穿着休闲的家居服，与真嗣记忆中总是穿着白色实验服的形象截然不同。“嘿，大家请进！”

"Thanks, Yui-san!" Toji and Kensuke happily complied and rushed into the apartment.  
"谢谢，Yui 女士！" 冬二和健介高兴地答应着，急忙冲进了公寓。

"还好吧，我想，" 真嗣回答道，这让他的母亲挑起了眉毛。他很快意识到自己的错误——一个普通的十四岁少年不会用他那种语气说话。"对不起，只是真的很累。"

Yui's expression turned understanding and concerned in an instant. "Okay. Come and sit down, I'll get you some water."  
优的表情瞬间变得理解且关切。“好的。过来坐下，我去给你倒点水。”

Shinji smiled a sheepish smile and headed to the living room.  
真嗣尴尬地笑了笑，走向客厅。

Just to meet the sight of Gendo Ikari sitting on the chair beside the dining table reading a newspaper.  
却见碇源堂正坐在餐桌旁的椅子上，读着报纸。

"What's on the news today, darling?" Asked Yui as she dumped water into the cup.  
"今天新闻有什么，亲爱的？" 优一边说，一边往杯子里倒水。

"Hm." It was Gendo's only response.  
"嗯。" 这是源堂唯一的回应。

"Will you move your eyes off that newspaper for one second, darling?"  
"你能把眼睛从那张报纸上移开一秒钟吗，亲爱的？"

"Hm."

"Shinji's home. Shouldn't you at least say hi? What kind of father are you?" Yui sighed.  
"这里是真嗣的家。你至少该打个招呼吧？你算是什么样的父亲呢？" 绫叹了口气。

"Hello, Shinji." "你好，真嗣。"

The called boy chuckled and greeted back.  
被叫到的男孩轻笑一声，回以问候。

现在一切都清楚了。

A world without EVAs and Angels.  
一个没有 EVA 和使徒的世界。

He finally did it, didn't he? His all-time purpose.  
他终于做到了，不是吗？他毕生的目标。

He had absolutely zero idea of what changed to create a world without EVAs and Angels. Perhaps because his last world went on without Third Impact. Or maybe it was the annihilation of both Lilith and Adam during his lastest cycle.  
他完全不知道是什么变化导致了这个世界没有了 EVA 和使徒。也许是因为他的上一个世界在没有第三次冲击的情况下继续发展。或者可能是因为在他最近的循环中，莉莉丝和亚当都被消灭了。

Did it really matter? 这真的重要吗？

What mattered was that he finally got out of everything.  
重要的是，他终于摆脱了一切。

But…something…no, _someone_ was missing…  
但是…有什么…不，某个人不在了…

This world was perfect, was it not?  
这个世界是完美的，不是吗？

Everybody here can live a happy and normal life without being threatened by the Angels. He didn't have Unit 01 anymore, so he couldn't end the world even if he wanted to.  
这里的每个人都能过上幸福而正常的生活，不再受到使徒的威胁。他没有初号机了，即使他想，也无法终结这个世界。

Shinji let out a sad laugh as he settled his eyes on his father again.  
真嗣发出了一声悲哀的笑，目光再次落在了父亲身上。

请带我去见唯…_

就连碇源堂一直以来的愿望也实现了。他现在能和唯在一起了。他真正在乎的唯一一个人。他是否配得上这一切？这很难说。不过，真嗣确信，没有父亲，这一切永远不会发生。

Without the EVAs, there was no reason for Asuka to come to Japan in the first place. They would never meet again.  
没有了 EVA，明日香根本就没有理由来日本。他们将再也不会相遇。

虽然也没那么糟糕。

She could have the love of her parents and never be a lonely girl ever again. She could meet new people in Germany and not be restrained by piloting the EVA any more. She could have her own happy and normal life as well, just like all other people.  
她可以拥有父母的关爱，再也不会是一个孤独的女孩。她可以在德国结识新朋友，不再受驾驶 EVA 的束缚。她也能拥有和其他人一样幸福而正常的生活。

A promising future for her.  
对她来说，未来充满希望。

This was what mattered to him the most, wasn't it?  
这正是他最在乎的，不是吗？

只要她能幸福地生活……

He could be happy as well.  
他也能感到快乐。

Shinji tried to convince himself that he had lived enough of life, but the argument was mercilessly slaughtered by the fact that all the life he lived so far was about EVAs and Angels. He had never experienced a normal life as a teenager ever before.  
真嗣试图说服自己他已经体验了足够多的人生，但这一论点被无情地击溃了，因为他迄今为止的生活全是关于 EVA 和使徒的。他从未作为一个青少年体验过正常的生活。

Now he had his own home as well. With all of the skills he obtained during the cycles, Shinji knew his life here would be like sailing with fair winds and following seas. He was not scared of it at all.  
如今，他也拥有了自己的家。凭借在轮回中获得的所有技能，真嗣知道在这里的生活将如同顺风顺水般顺畅。他对此毫不畏惧。

但他能继续前进吗？从她身边？

遗憾的是，他早已知晓答案。

“是的，亲爱的？” 由依微笑着看着他。

"为什么？" 优衣略显困惑地看着他。"怎么突然感兴趣了？"

"因为……" 他总不能说“那里有个女孩在等我”吧？"我想出去透透气。"

"嗯，" 优衣思索着。"你有没有什么特别想去的地方？"

"我会考虑的，" 由依说。

但真嗣已不再是孩子。

他清楚自己在做什么，也明白为何要这么做。

但他知道该怎么做吗？

What was he supposed to do? Their lives wouldn't have any intersections anymore. Even if he could go to Germany with his parents, how could he find her, anyway? Of course Shinji knew the address of Asuka's home in Berlin, but that was when the Soryu family was still associated with Gehirn, which apparently wasn't the case anymore.  
他应该做什么呢？他们的生活不会再有任何交集。即使他能随父母去德国，他又该如何找到她呢？当然，真嗣知道明日香在柏林的住址，但那是当惣流家还与 GEHRIN 有关联的时候，显然现在情况已非如此。

And even if he could find her in person, why would she want to have anything to do with him, anyway? Their bond, the EVA was lost. If anything, Asuka would be a normal teenage girl with a shining personality and beautiful look, a hot catch for people to claim. Shinji hated to think of it this way, but from the outside, he was no more than a typical young boy that was no match to his _competition -_ if he could actually be qualified to be considered one to others, that is.  
即便他能亲自找到她，她又为何还想与他有任何瓜葛呢？他们的纽带，EVA，已经消失了。如果说有什么不同，明日香现在只是一个性格鲜明、外貌美丽的普通少女，是众人追求的对象。真嗣不愿这样想，但从旁观者的角度看，他不过是一个普通的少年，根本无法与他的竞争对手相提并论——如果他真的有资格被别人视为竞争对手的话。

Not to mention they had already lost their most important connection…their childhoods.  
更别提他们已经失去了最重要的联系……他们的童年。

But Shinji still believed in love.  
但真嗣依然相信爱情。

Perhaps it was only an illusion created by the years after years of time he had spent with her, that Shinji refused to think otherwise.  
或许这只是他与她多年相处时光所营造的幻觉，真嗣不愿去想其他可能。

Still, no matter what, he had to face reality sooner than later.  
尽管如此，无论怎样，他迟早都得面对现实。

It's not like he had any other purpose than to make her happy…  
他除了让她开心之外，似乎也没有其他目的了……

Was she actually happy, though?  
但她真的快乐吗？

_'It's not about anything else. I just want to make sure that she's happy here.'_ He tried to convince himself with it. He didn't need to plan his own future for now, though. That could wait until the most critical business was finished.  
“这无关其他，我只希望她在这里能快乐。”他试图以此说服自己。虽然他目前无需规划自己的未来，但那可以等到最关键的事务完成后再说。

XXXXXX

It had been several days since his newest cycle started. Shinji was to go to school just like every other teenager at his age should - even though his grades absolutely slaughtered everyone else in his school.  
自他最新的循环开始以来，已经过去好几天了。真嗣像同龄的其他青少年一样去上学——尽管他的成绩绝对碾压学校里的所有人。

He had to act timid and shy himself all the time, though, considering many people here knew him.  
然而，他必须时刻表现得胆怯害羞，毕竟这里很多人认识他。

Today, he finally got a chance to test the water at the airport.  
今天，他终于有机会在机场试水了。

The airport was much smaller than he remembered for obvious reasons. He doubted the airport could provide international services with its short runways. Nevertheless, transportation was pretty much the last thing he had worry about for now.  
机场显然比他记忆中的要小得多。他怀疑这短小的跑道能否提供国际服务。不过，交通问题几乎是眼下他最不需要担心的。

Today he was just here to case the point, it wasn't like he had enough money, anyway.  
今天他只是来探探情况，毕竟他也没那么多钱。

"Hello," Shinji walked up in front of the ticket office, speaking to the seller. "I want a ticket to Germany, Berlin."  
“你好，” 真嗣走到售票窗口前，对售票员说，“我要一张去德国柏林的票。”

The ticket seller gave him a quizzical expression. "Um, kid, do you have parents?"  
售票员露出疑惑的表情。“呃，孩子，你有父母吗？”

"Well, I do, but they aren't here," Shinji replied.  
“嗯，我有，但他们不在这里，”真嗣回答道。

"I'm afraid that I can't help you, then." A professional and apologetic smile crossed the ticket seller's face. "I assume you aren't an adult, right? This way, you have to have a guardian who's older than 18 to travel with you."  
"恐怕我帮不了你。" 售票员脸上露出了职业而抱歉的微笑。"我猜你不是成年人，对吧？这样的话，你必须有一位 18 岁以上的监护人陪同才能旅行。"

Shinji made a slight frown. Truthfully, he never really took any international flights before – it wasn't like he needed to. Even though he had _some_ knowledge on the subject of matter, policies could be drastically different for all he knew.  
真嗣微微皱眉。说实话，他以前从未乘坐过国际航班——他并不需要。尽管他对这方面有所了解，但政策可能对他来说截然不同。

This world wasn't the world he remembered anymore.  
这个世界已不再是他所记忆的模样。

"But I really need to go there. It's urgent," Shinji said in an almost pleading voice. "Someone important to me is waiting for me."  
"但我的确需要去那里。情况紧急，" 真嗣几乎是用恳求的语气说道，"对我很重要的人正在等我。"

The ticket seller rubbed her chin for a moment. "Can you show me your ID? Passport?"  
售票员摸了摸下巴，思考了一会儿。"你能出示一下身份证件吗？护照？"

"I…" Shinji found no words to say. This was never a problem in all of his previous lives. "I don't have one."  
"我…" 真嗣发现自己无言以对。这在他的前几世中从未成为问题。"我没有。"

The ticket seller shrugged. In her eyes, he was nothing more than a young kid who hadn't been through a lot, so his behavior was understandable. "I'm sorry, then. There's nothing I can do to help you."  
售票员耸了耸肩。在她看来，他不过是个涉世未深的年轻人，所以他的行为可以理解。“那我无能为力了，抱歉。”

"Thanks." Shinji _sighed_ deeply and turned away from the counter. It seemed like he had no other way than to goad his parents to bring him on a trip to Germany. But when would it happen, though? How could he act that way privately? What would his parents think of him if he let them know his real goal?  
“谢谢。”真嗣深深叹了口气，转身离开柜台。看来他别无选择，只能怂恿父母带他去德国旅行。但那会是什么时候呢？他私下里该如何行动？如果让父母知道他的真实目的，他们会怎么想？

There was still a chance, though.  
不过，还有一线希望。

He felt his chest sore as he thought about her again. Even if he could actually find her, this one would never be the same person he knew ever again. The girl who was so fragile, yet so strong. The redhead who wanted to be forever independent, but would hide all of her pain and loneliness inside the deepest part of her heart.  
他再次想起她时，感到胸口一阵酸痛。即便他真的能找到她，这个她也不再是他所认识的那个人了。那个既脆弱又坚强的女孩。那个红发女孩渴望永远独立，却将所有的痛苦和孤独深藏于心底。

The Asuka in this world though…she would be nothing but a normal teenager.  
然而，这个世界的明日香……她只会是一个普通的少女。

She would never be _his_ Asuka.  
她永远不会是他的明日香。

Was he going to leave all of the EVA Pilot Asukas behind? What choices did he have, anyway?  
他打算留下所有的 EVA 驾驶员明日香吗？他究竟还有哪些选择呢？

All of them… 他们全都……

Feeling another presence behind him, Shinji sighed again and turned around.  
感受到身后另一个存在的气息，真嗣再次叹了口气，转过身来。

_Who?_

Blue eyes. Red hair. Slender body.  
蓝眼睛。红头发。苗条身材。

His cobalt eyes went wide along with hers.  
他的钴蓝色眼睛与她的同样睁大了。

They just kept staring at each other, neither of them said anything.  
他们只是继续凝视着对方，谁也没有开口。

Silence. 沉默。

He didn't think about why would she be here, or how. It didn't matter.  
他没有去想她为什么会在这里，或是怎么来的。这都不重要。

Time seemed to freeze. 时间仿佛凝固了。

No one knew how long it went before the girl spoke up first. "Why are you staring at me?" Her tone wasn't necessarily irritated, but…surprised? Even pained?  
没人知道过了多久，女孩首先开口了。“你为什么盯着我看？”她的语气并不一定是生气，但……惊讶？甚至是痛苦？

"I-I-" Shinji found himself at a loss for words. The girl in front of him looked just like her. Like Asuka.  
“我-我-” 真嗣发现自己语塞了。眼前的女孩看起来就像她。像明日香。

But something was different.  
但有些东西变得不同了。

Of course it wasn't the missing A-10 clips.  
当然，这并不是因为缺少了 A-10 夹子。

It was about her eyes.  
关键在于她的眼神。

They didn't look like what Shinji had always remembered. They weren't sparkling with fire and pride, trying to tell people that she was the most superior existence in the world. They were full of pain, sadness – they were the eyes of someone who had been through so much and lost so much, just like…  
它们并不像真嗣记忆中的那样。没有闪耀着火焰与骄傲，试图向世人宣告她是世界上最卓越的存在。它们充满了痛苦和悲伤——就像经历了太多、失去了太多的人的眼睛，就像……

Just like his own eyes.  
就像他自己的眼睛一样。

She must've noticed how his eyes looked as well.  
她一定也注意到了他的眼神。

"I found you really pretty," it was all he could come up with at the moment.  
"我觉得你真的很漂亮，" 这是他当时唯一能想到的话。

He could see her raise eyebrows but soon regain her composure. "Too bad, I already have someone who loves me and whom I love." She tried not to break their eye contact.  
他看到她挑了挑眉，但很快恢复了镇定。"太遗憾了，我已经有了爱我的人，我也爱他。" 她尽量不打破他们的眼神交流。

"Is it me?" He forced himself to smirk.  
"是我吗？" 他强迫自己露出微笑。

"Who are you?" She frowned. This time, though, Shinji could clearly see the surprise, even _shock,_ from her sapphire eyes, as if she wasn't expecting those words to come out from his mouth at all.  
"你是谁？" 她皱起眉头。这一次，尽管如此，真嗣可以清楚地从她蓝宝石般的眼睛中看到惊讶，甚至是震惊，仿佛她完全没有预料到这些话会从他嘴里说出来。

But why would she _expect_ anything from him, anyway? It's not like she knew him already, was it?  
但无论如何，她为什么会期待从他那里得到什么呢？她又不认识他，不是吗？

"I am Shinji Ikari, nice to meet you."  
“我是碇真嗣，很高兴见到你。”

"Well I am Asuka Langley Soryu."  
"嗯，我是惣流·明日香·兰格雷。"

Both of them fell silent once more.  
两人再次陷入了沉默。

"What are you doing here, anyway?" This time Shinji started first. "You surely don't look Japanese to me."  
“你到底在这里做什么？”这次是真嗣先开口，“你看起来可不像日本人。”

"To find someone." “来找人。”

"Is it me?" Shinji smirked again.  
"是我吗？" 真嗣再次微微一笑。

"Perhaps, perhaps not." "或许吧，或许不是。"

"Where are your parents?"  
"你的父母在哪里？"

"Baggage claim." "行李提取处。"

"It's really nice to have parents who love you, isn't it?"  
"有爱你的父母真是太好了，不是吗？"

"Don't tell me you don't have them. Gott that would be pathetic."  
"别告诉我你没有。天哪，那可真可怜。"

Her attitude was rather familiar, though. Shinji had to hide his own smile. "I do. It's just that…"  
她的态度倒是相当熟悉，这让真嗣不得不掩藏自己的微笑。“我知道。只是……”

"Just what?" Asuka gave an impression that her patience was running thin.  
“只是什么？”明日香给人一种耐心即将耗尽的印象。

"Nothing. Forget I said anything."  
“没什么。忘了我说的吧。”

"Thank you so much for picking up my curiosity!"  
"非常感谢你满足我的好奇心！"

"You'll never understand. You don't know what I've been through."  
"你永远不会明白。你不知道我经历了什么。"

Maybe it was the truth.  
也许那是真相。

Or was it? 还是说，并非如此？

"Do you know what _I_ have been through?" Asuka growled.  
"你知道我经历了什么吗？" 明日香咆哮道。

He could guess, though. Her eyes couldn't lie.  
他虽然猜得到，但她的眼神不会说谎。

"Perhaps, perhaps not." He mirrored her response and spoke up again. "Why don't you smile more, with that angelic face of yours?"  
“或许吧，或许不。”他模仿她的回答，再次开口，“你那天使般的面容，为何不多笑笑呢？”

Her expression left no doubt of how she felt about his smugness. "You know, I'd rather not use that particular phrase."  
她的表情清楚地表明了她对他的自满有何感想。“你知道吗，我宁愿不用那个特定的词。”

Shinji gulped. That was his intention. "Does it...mean anything to you?"  
真嗣咽了口唾沫。那正是他的意图。“这……对你有什么意义吗？”

She might have noticed something; instead of answering his question, Asuka came up with one of her own. "Does 'Lilim' mean anything to you?" This time, an inscrutable expression showed up on her face. It was mixed with anticipation and...nervousness? Even dread?  
"她或许察觉到了什么；没有回答他的问题，明日香反而提出了自己的疑问。“‘莉莉姆’这个词对你有什么意义吗？”这次，她的脸上浮现出一种难以捉摸的表情。混合着期待和……紧张？甚至是恐惧？”

"Yes." "是的。"

But those thoughts were shoved aside as dawning realization struck Shinji like a nuclear strike.  
但这些念头被突如其来的领悟所取代，仿佛核打击一般击中了真嗣。

Of who she might actually be.  
关于她可能的真实身份。

"You know, I think we've met before." Asuka smiled. It was hard to detect what was hidden behind that face. "I have a question for you...Third."  
"你知道吗，我觉得我们以前见过。" 明日香微笑着。很难看出那张脸背后隐藏着什么。"我有个问题要问你……第三。"

"Which one are you?" "你是哪一个？"

XXXXXX

作者注：我真的非常希望这最终能顺利。
